[003,i_003,iv]	namaḥ buddhāya pramāṇa bhūtāya jagat hita eṣiṇe praṇamya śāstre sugatāya tāyine kutarka sambhrānta jana anukampayā pramāṇa siddhiḥ vidhivat vidhīyate prāyas prastuta vastu vistara bhṛtaḥ na īkṣyante eva uccakais vaktāraḥ parama artha saṃgraha dhiyā vyādhūta phalgu kramāḥ tena asmin virala krama vyapagamāt atyanta śuddhān dhiyam dhanyānām vidadhātum uddhata dhiyām dhīḥ samvide dhīyate atra bhagavataḥ hetu phala sampattyā pramāṇa bhūta tvena stotra abhidhānam śāstra ādau śāstra artha tvāt bhagavān eva hi pramāṇa bhūtaḥ asmin prasādhyate 
[003,v]	tatra hetuḥ āśaya prayoga sampad sāṃvyavahārika pramāṇa apekṣayā āśayaḥ jagat hita eṣitā prayogaḥ jagat śāsanāt śāstṛ tvam phalam sva para artha sampad sva artha sampad sugata tvena trividham artham upādāya praśasta tvam svarūpa vat apunarāvṛtti artham su naṣṭa jvara vat niḥśeṣa artham su pūrṇa ghaṭa vat para artha sampad jagat tāraṇāt tāyi tvam santāna arthañcā parinirvāṇa dharmma tvāt evambhūtam bhagavantam praṇamya pramāṇa siddhiḥ vidhīyate pramāṇa adhīnaḥ hi prameya adhigamaḥ bhagavān eva ca pramāṇam pramāṇa lakṣaṇa sadbhāvāt pramīyate anena iti pramāṇam 
[003,vi_003,viii]	tatra sāmānyena pramāṇa lakṣaṇam nirdiśati pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam jñānam pramāṇan tatra sati pramiti siddheḥ avisamvādi visamvāde sati viparyayāt indriya artha saṃyoga ādayaḥ hi visamvāda vivikta jñāna upalakṣitāḥ eva tattvam pratilabhante avisamvāda arthī hi sarvaḥ pramāṇa anveṣaṇa prayuktaḥ 
[003,ix_004,i]	nanu a visamvādi tvam tasya sādhana jñānasya svarūpam eva tasmin ca svarūpeṇa jñāyamāne jñātam eva tat iti kim parīkṣyate atha na svarūpa samvedanam tadā pramāṇam eva na asti iti āpatitam na ca ayam pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ bhavatām iti tat asat na svarūpam eva jñānasya prāmāṇyam samvādi tvamvā api tu artha kriyā sthitiḥ avisamvādanam 
[004,ii_004,iii]	na khalu jñāna svarūpa mātra avagatau idam pramāṇam iti bhavati kintarhi arthasya dāha pāka ādeḥ kriyā niṣpattiḥ tasyāḥ sthiti ravicalana visamvādanam vyavasthā vā sā ca artha kriyā bhāvinī na tad kāle tatas tad sambandhaḥ na svarūpa samvedana mātra avadhṛtaḥ nanu tad sambandhi tā svarūpam eva na asti tat katham na svarūpa samvedana mātra avadhāraṇam 
[004,iv_004,vi]	na etat asti dviṣṭha sambandha samvittiḥ na eka rūpa pravedanāt dvaya svarūpa grahaṇe sati sambandha vedanam katham tarhi pravarttanā kāle tat jñānam etat uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ yadi artha kriyā adhigame pūrvakam pramāṇam saḥ api artha kriyā adhigamaḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam vā apramāṇena artha kriyā adhigama abhāvāt pramāṇantat tatas tatas api artha kriyā adhigamaḥ para anveṣaṇīyaḥ iti anavasthā 
[004,vii_004,ix]	na idam sādhīyaḥ uttara artha kriyā bhāvāt pūrvasya yadi mānatā tadā eva artha akriyā bhāvāt uttarasya kathat na sā yatra artha kriyā sthitiḥ apara upakalpitā tat yāvat pramāṇam yatra tu svatas tadā eva artha kriyā anubhavaḥ tat sutarām eva pramāṇam artha kriyā sthitiḥ avisamvādanam iti sāmānyena abhidhānāt 
[004,x_004,xiii]	nanu dāha pāka ādi artha kriyā iyam svapna īppi sambhavati pītasa śaṅkha ādi jñāne ca śabda viṣaye tu jñāne na dāha pāka ādi artha kriyā svatas paratas ca artha kriyā bhāvāt tasmāt abādhitaḥ bodhaḥ pramāṇam iti yuktam tat api ayuktam yatas śābde api abhiprāya nivedanāt avisamvādanam śabda viṣayam jñānam śābdam api śabdāt anyatra api ayam arthaḥ 
[004,xiv_004,xv]	svarūpa bodha mātreṇa sarvam jñānam bhavet pramā atha avādhita bodha tvāt svapna ādau api kin na tat bodha mātra saṃgamaḥ hi svapna itara pratyaya sambhavī samānaḥ eva sarvatra sa hi na puruṣa arthasya sādhakaḥ atha ābādhita bodha tvam tat api samānam eva jāgrat pratyayena bādhamāna tā ced koyam bādhaḥ nāma 
[004,xvi_005,i]	pareṇa viṣaya abhāva jñāpanam sa yadi hi iṣyate sva arthe pravṛttim ajñānam abhāvam jñāpayet katham na tāvat jñāna antareṇa abhāvaḥ svapna jñānasya anyasya vā kenacid kriyate tad kāle tasya svayam eva nāśāt na ca akṣi nimīlanāt naṣṭe jñāne bādhya tā pratīyate anyena na hi jñānena tasya viṣaya apahāraḥ asattā jñāpana lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ na ca sva viṣaye pravṛttam anya viṣayapahāram racayitum alam svaviṣaya jñāna sva viṣayasya rūpa sādhanam hi jñānānām dharmmaḥ para viṣaya apaharaṇantu narādhipa dharmmaḥ 
[005,ii_005,iv]	kathantarhi bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ na kathañcid atas eva ābādhita tvam pramāṇa tvam tasmāt yatra artha kriyā na asti tad apramāṇam svayam anyena vā yatra jñāyate na kriyā udayaḥ tad apramāṇam na svapna asvapna bheda usti tattvataḥ vyavahāra mātram eva idam svapnāsvapnabhedaḥ nāma tathā pramāṇa apramāṇa bhedaḥ iti hi vakṣyate na ca asau artha kriyā sthitiḥ avicalita tva abhāvāt bhāvanā mātrau asāyata artha kriyā svapne na tatra paritoṣaḥ abādhita tve tu anavasthā eva prathamam abādhanam sarvatra eva tad uttara kālam abādhane tatra api uttara kālam abādhanam iti kutas 
[005,v_005,vii]	bādhakasya purobhāvaḥ sarva vijñāna sambhavī parantu bādhaka abhāva statra api āśaṃkyatena kim pītasam śaṃkha ādi vijñānantu na pramāṇam eva tathā artha kriyā vāpteḥ abhāvāt saṃsthāna mātra artha kriyā prasiddhau anyat eva jñānam pramāṇam anumānam tathā hi pratibhāsaḥ evambhūtaḥ yaḥ sa na saṃsthāna varjitaḥ evam anyatra dṛṣṭa tvāt anumānam tathā ca tat 
[005,viii_005,ix]	yena na kadācid vyabhicāraḥ upalabdhaḥ sa yathā abhiprete visamvādāt visamvādyate eva yaḥ tu vyabhicāra samvedī sa vicārya pravarttate saṃsthānam ātrantā vat prāpyate paratra sandehaḥ viparyayaḥ vā tatas anumānam saṃsthāne saṃśayaḥ paratra iti pratyaya dvayam etat pramāṇam apramāṇam ca anena maṇi prabhāyām maṇi jñānam vyākhyātam tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ 
[005,x_005,xiii]	atha kena dvayam etat iti pratīyate etat api vakṣyāmaḥ śabda viṣayantu jñānam abhiprāya nivedanāt pramāṇam abhipreta artha kriyā svarūpa nivedanam eva samvādanam jñeya sva rūpa saṃsiddhiḥ eva tatra kriyā matā citre api dṛṣṭi mātreṇa phalam parisamāptimat na khalu svarūpa samvedanāt aparam atra artha kriyā jñānam kvacid upalabhyate rūpa ādayaḥ hi sva svarūpa samvedana parāḥ eva na tad viṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ paratra pramāṇam tad svarūpaḥ samvedana mātra kañca sarvatra jñāne samānam iti na sāṃvyavahārika pramāṇa avatāraḥ tatas bhāvi artha viṣayam viṣaya antara gocaram pramāṇam adhyāropeṇa vyavahāra avabodha kṛt 
[005,xiv_006,i]	bhāvi artha viṣaya antara prāpti arthāḥ hi pramāṇa apramāṇa anveṣaṇā aparaḥ yathā ca bhinnaḥ viṣaya sparśa ādikaḥ na rūpa ādi svarūpa grahaṇe antar yāti tathā bhāvi svarūpam api parama arthaṃtaḥ adhyāropeṇa tu tad ekatā viṣaya antarasya api tatas tad dvāreṇa samvādanam uktam jñāne yatra tu tat eva artha kriyā tatra avivādaḥ eva tatra bhāvi svarūpe tad kāraṇa tvena eka tāropaḥ paratra tu sparśa ādau tat ekasāma grī adhīna tvena iti na viśeṣaḥ yatra tu abhimata artha kriyā yathā jalagrāhi vijñānāt marīcikā artha kriyā avāptiḥ tad apramāṇam eva atas eva āha śābde api abhiprāya nivedanāt anyatra api citra ādau tathā ca ghaṭa jñāne paṭa prāptau śuktikāyāñca rajata jñāna paramparāyām api na pramāṇa tā a bhiprāyāvi samvāda abhāvāt 
[006,ii]	abhiprāya avi samvādāt pramāṇam sarvam ucyate na sajāti vijātīya vijñāna utpatti mātrataḥ bādhaka pratyasya api sthiteḥ evaṃprakāra tā tattvataḥ tu vijātīya vijñāna utpatti mātrakam vijātīya vid utpattiḥ yādi bādhakam ucyate ghaṭa jñāne paṭa jñānam bādhakam kin na yuktimat na iti pratyaya buddhyā ced bādhakam kiṃcid iṣyate saḥ eva pratyayonā iti pramāṇāda bhedaḥ āgataḥ abhāva lakṣaṇam mānam tatas ced tat nirūpyate kim anya rūpa samvittiḥ kim abhāvasya tasya vid anya rūpasya vittiḥ ced aviśeṣāt prasajyate tad abhāvasya vittau syāt tasya iti na samanvayaḥ 
[006,viii_006,xii]	abhāvaḥ hi svarūpeṇa pratīyate svarūpañcā bhāvasya na ghaṭa ādi sambandhi tayā pratīyate pratīyamāne hi ghaṭe na tad sambandhitā a bhāvasya tadā abhāva abhāvāt na hi jīvate eva devadattasya maraṇam apratīyamāne na tu ghaṭena sambindhitā a bhāvasya na śakyā grahītum atha kārya kāraṇa bhāva vat pratītiḥ kāraṇe sati paścāt kāryam bhavati tad anantaram tasya upalabdhi krameṇa svarūpa pratipattau kārya kāraṇa sambandha parigrahaḥ evam bhāve satyabhāvaḥ abhāve ca sati bhāvaḥ iti bhavati sambandha pratipattiḥ tat api asat yatas atyanta abhāva sambandhaḥ kasyacid na prasidhyati na bhāve satyabhāvaḥ asau na ca tatra viparyayaḥ kiñca 
[006,xiii^1]	kārya kāraṇayoḥ rūpam vinā tena pratīyate abhāvaḥ tu vinā bhāvam bhavataḥ na pratīyate deśasya śūnyatā yā tu tasyāḥ sarvatra tulya tā prāc abhāva ādi bhedasya tatra atyantam asambhavaḥ yathā ca vastunaḥ bhedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate prāc abhāva ādi bhedaḥ api pratīyate tathā a kṣataḥ abhāveṇa pramāṇena pratītiḥ tasya ced matā kasya abhāvaḥ pramāṇasya pramāṇa abhāvādhivedane kinna bhāvasya sarvasya kin na suptasya sarvathā abhāva grāhikāḥ vittiḥ abhāvaḥ yadi sammataḥ bhāva vittim vinā evāsau kasyacid kinna lakṣyate eṣā eva tatra sāmagrī yadi na abhāva niścayaḥ vastutas vyatiriktasya na abhau asya asti vedanam idat na asti iti vijñānam vetti tad vyatirekitā kutas utpadyatām etat na indriyāt 
[006,xiii^2]	smaraṇamvinā indriya smṛti saṃyogāt abhāva jñāna sambhave prāptam pratyakṣam eva idam akṣa bhāva anusārataḥ anyatra vṛttam akṣañcet na anya vijñāna kāraṇam mānasam na astita ajñānam katham asya pramāṇa tā pramāṇam avisamvādāt aparam mānam eva tat vyatirikte hi na abhāve visamvāda usti kasya cit kevala tve visamvādaḥ tad pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate vinā bhāva matim tat ca kevala grahaṇam sadā parān anupraveśena pratītiḥ kevala grahaḥ kevala grahaṇa idhyakṣe visamvādasya sambhavaḥ tatas pratyakṣam eva idam anyathā anupalambhanam nanu kevala samvittiṃrabhāva avittitaḥ kutas sā api kevala samvittim vinā na iti samāna tā yathā vā kevalaḥ abhāvaḥ vinā bhāvena mīyate tathā bhāvaḥ api naivañced anavasthā pra sajyate 
[007,iv]	abhāva pratītim vinā na kevala pratītirita ced kevala pratītimvinā na abhāva pratītiḥ iti samānam abhāvaḥ vā kevalaḥ katham abhāva antaramvinā tatra api abhāva kalpane anavasthā saḥ eva smaryamāṇa padārtha apekṣaḥ anupalambhaḥ abhāva sādhanaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ abhāva vyahāraḥ tu vāsanā anurodhāt kvacid eva bhavati na anyatra iti vibhāgaḥ 
[007,v_007,ix]	tasmāt yathā jāgrat pratyayaḥ svapna pratyasya bādhakaḥ tathā viparyayaḥ api kevala grahaṇāt iti nyāyaḥ eṣaḥ tasmāt śābde api abhiprāya nivedanāt prāmāṇyam iti nirākṛtam etat śrotra dhīḥ ca apramāṇam syāt itara an abhisaṅgateḥ nanu pramāṇa bhūtena bhagavatā kaḥ arthaḥ vyāvahārika pramāṇāt eva sarva puruṣa artha siddheḥ na etat asti svarūpa grahaṇe dhyakṣam anumāni atra pra varttate vakṣyatedaḥ punar pāścāt aparasya apramāṇa tā 
[007,x]	na tāvat pratyakṣam para loka ādau pravarttate tasya sva rūpa mātra grahaṇāt iti pratipādayiṣyate anumānantu sambandha grahaṇam antareṇa na asti na ca sambandhaḥ vyāpya sarva vidā grahītum śakyaḥ sva rūpa samvedana niṣṭhena hi pratyakṣa ātmanā na sambandha grahaṇam anumānena eva sambandha grahaṇe itaretara āśrayaṇa doṣaḥ saṃvyavahāra mātreṇa tu pratyakṣa anumāne pramāṇam sarvajña sādhana anuguṇa tvena eva na anyathā iti paścāt etat pratipādayiṣyate 
[007,xi_007,xiii]	nanu yadi nāma pramāṇam para loka ādau pratyakṣa anumāna lakṣaṇam na pravarttate tasya svarūpa viṣaya tvāt anmānasya ca sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvāt śāstrantu na evam iti tatas eva samīhita saddhiḥ kimbhagavān pramāṇa bhūtaḥ prasādhyate atra ucyate vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ yaḥ arthau buddhau prakāśate prāmāṇī antatra śabdasya na artha tattva nibandhanam 
[007,xiv_007,xv]	śabdasya hi na apauruṣeya tā iti paścāt pratipādayiṣyate pauruṣeya tā tu syāt tatra ca vaktuḥ vyāpāraḥ vivakṣā vaktā vivakṣitā vivakṣāyāḥ viṣayaḥ yorthaḥ śrotṛ buddhau prakaśate pramāṇi antatra eva śabdasya tatra eva ca vyāpāraḥ śabdasya anyathā anyathā vivakṣitam anyathā pratipādayati iti aprekṣā pūrva kārī syāt tathā ca sutarām eva aprāmāṇyam sa ca vivakṣitā na sarvaḥ sarva vedī anyathā paraspara viruddha tā śāstrāṇām na syāt na ca paraspara viruddha ūrthonuṣṭhātum śakyaḥ yathā anuṣṭhāna mātra artha siddhau vyartha tayā pramāṇa malam śāstrasya sva manīṣika anuṣṭhāne api phala siddhi prasaṅgāt tathā ca nirvivādam syāt yatheṣṭam saṃpravarttatām na hi kiciṃdanuṣṭhānam niṣphalam kasyacid kvacid 
[008,i]	tasmāt vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣaye śabdasya prāmāṇyam na artha tattva nibandhanam yadi vaktā na sarvajñaḥ apauruṣeye api yorthaḥ buddhau prakāśate yadā svayam eva artham pratipadyate yadā tu vyākhyātuḥ tadā vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ vyākhyātā eva vaktā yaḥ ca buddhau arthaḥ pratibhāti na saḥ eva arthaḥ anyathā sakala samīhita artha siddheḥ nna kaścid anuṣṭhāna arthī bhavet anuṣṭheya tayā eva tasya arthasya pratipādanāt na evam iti ced sa tarhi tadā svarūpeṇa na asti iti na tasya pratipattiḥ anya pratipattau sambandha abhāvāt sandehaḥ eva tatas ca yorthaḥ pratīyate sa siddhaḥ eva na tad arthī pravarttate yad arthī ca na sa pratipannaḥ iti na artha tattva nibandhanam prāmāṇyam 
[008,ii_008,iii]	nanu niyogaḥ na vākya arthaḥ niyukta ūham iti pratīteḥ tatas niyogāt eva na asitum samarthaḥ koyat niyogaḥ nāma niśabdaḥ niḥśeṣa arthaḥ yoga arthaḥ yuktiḥ niravaśeṣaḥ yogaḥ niyogaḥ niravaśeṣa tvam ayogasya manāk api abhāvāt avaśya karttavya tā hi niyogaḥ niyoga prāmāṇikāḥ hi niyoga pratipatti mātrataḥ pravarttante 
[008,iv_008,vi]	atra āha vaktṛ vyāpāraḥ ityādi ayam arthaḥ niyogaḥ bhāvanā dhātoḥ arthaḥ vidhiḥ iti īritāḥ yantra ārūḍha ādayaḥ na syuḥ svabhāvāt artha sādhanāḥ tasmāt yaḥ yasya pratibhāsate yathāpratibham sa vākyasya arthaḥ na ca idam artha tattvam yaḥ ca yathā vyācaṣṭe tathā sa śabdaḥ viguṇaḥ na bhavati na ca tathā artha tattva sthitiḥ 
[008,vii_008,x]	kiñca niyuktena nivṛttiḥ ced sarvasya atas prasajyate tad svabhāva tayā ākāśam anākāśam na kasyacid svabhāvaḥ api viparyāsāt anyathā yadi gamyate viparyyāsa aviparyāsa vyavasthā kaḥ kariṣyati yadi viparyāsāt niyoga parāt api vacanāt na pravarttate tathā sati viparyyāsa kalpanā pravarttamāne api na vyāhanyate yathā eva hi dveṣāt ayam na pravarttate viparyastaḥ tathā tad pakṣa pātāt aparaḥ api pravarttate iti samānam etat 
[008,xi]	na ca niyukta ūham iti etat pravarttate niṣphala niyoge pravṛtteḥ abhāvāt pracaṇḍa prabhu niyoge niṣphale api apāya bhayāt pravarttate pramāṇa antarāt ca pratipannaḥ apāyaḥ atra tu na pramāṇa antaram vyarthakaḥ niyogaḥ tathā ced bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ na hi dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma prekṣā pūrva kārī niṣphala niyoge hi prekṣāvattā na syāt iti upālabhyate apauruṣeye tu
[008,xii_009,i]	kasya upālambhaḥ apauruṣeye vyarthateya eva na yuktā iti ced na atra kiñcid pramāṇam anyatra apauruṣeye tathā adṛṣṭeḥ yadi ca niyoga mātrāt pravarttate apauruṣeyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti niṣphalam juhyāt iti niyoga mātrāt eva niyoga pratipatteḥ atha phala abhilāṣiṇaḥ phala upadarśanam phalam eva tarhi tasya upadarśanīyam kinniyogena svayam eva phala abhilāṣāt pravartiṣyate 
[009,ii_009,v]	apauruṣeya tvāt asambaddha tāyām api na ca udyam etat iti ced niṣphala codanāyām api na ca udyam iti vyarthakaḥ vedaḥ na ayuktaḥ : kiñca niyujyamāna viṣaya niyoktṛṇām yadi iṣyate dharmme niyogaḥ sarvatra na śabda arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate niyogaḥ nāma ayam hi kasya dharmaḥ iti cintyatām na khalu niyogaḥ paṭa ādi padārtha vat aparatantra tayā pratīyate tatra anena niyame niyojya ādīnām anyatamasya dharmmeṇa bhavitavyam apara prakāra asam vedanāt niyojya dharmi bhāvaḥ hi tasya anuṣṭheya tā kutas siddhaḥ api yadi anuṣṭheyaḥ na anuṣṭhā viratiḥ bhavet 
[009,vi]	na khalu pariniṣpannam anuṣṭhātum śakyam anuṣṭhānam hi tatra kriyā viśeṣaḥ sva rūpa jananamvā kriyā viśeṣaḥ tāvat anarthakaḥ eva pariniṣpannasya kriyā kimartha kāriṇī svarūpa niṣpādanantu pariniṣpannasya iti vyāhatam na ca pariniṣpannasya aparama pariniṣpannam āste apariniṣpannasya pariniṣpanna padārtha svabhāva tva ayogāt yaḥ hi yat rūpatayā upalabhyate sa tad svabhāvaḥ na ca aniṣpannam upalabdhum śakyam paścāt upalabhyate iti ced tat ayuktam yatas 
[009,vii_009,xi]	tad svabhāvatayā paścāt upalabdhum na śakyate vartamāna svarūpasya grahaṇa idhī akṣa vṛttitaḥ na khalu varttamāna rūpa upagraha pravṛttam adhyakṣam pūrva apara rūpam īkṣitum kṣamate tasmāt na pūrvam eka tāvṛttiḥ na paścāt akṣa janmanaḥ jñānasya akṣa anusaraṇāt adhyakṣam iti mīyate tasmāt niyojya puruṣa dharme niyoge na śabda artha tā viṣaya dharma tāyām api viṣayasya apariniṣpatteḥ svarūpa abhāvāt katham śabdāt asau pratyetum śakyaḥ na hi avidyamānam śaśa viṣāṇa ādikam tathā dṛśyate anuṣṭhāna viṣaya tvena kenacid rūpeṇa vidyamānam kenacid rūpeṇa na iti ced tat asat 
[009,xii]	yena asau vidyate bhāvaḥ tena anuṣṭhīyate na saḥ vidyate yena na eva asau na tena api pratīyate pratīyamāna tā tasya siddha anuṣṭheya tā na ced tat eva tasya svam rūpam na niyogaḥ anyathā bhavet pratīyam āna tā mātram sāmānyam sarva vastunaḥ anuṣṭheya tayā eva asya niyoga tvam ananyathā yadi anuṣṭheya tā tatra pratibhāti na ca aparā anuṣṭhānam bhavet tatra na tu sāmānya vedane sāmānya vedane tatra na anuṣṭheya artha vedanam vākyasya na bhavet arthaḥ niyogaḥ tad pravādinām 
[009,xvii_009,xviii]	nanu yāga ādi viṣaye niyukta ūham iti pratīyate iyam eva ca niyogasya pratītiḥ śābdāt yā niyukta ūham atra anena iti pratītiḥ tatra niyoktā śabde puruṣaḥ vede pramāṇa abhāvāt niyojyaḥ puruṣaḥ yāgaḥ viṣayaḥ sakalam idam pratīyate tatra pratītiḥ bhāvaḥ eva katham pratīyate iti koyam paryyanuyogaḥ tat asat 
[009,xix]	pratīyamānena vinā kasya tatra svarūpa vid vedyate yat svarūpeṇa tasya tad vedanam matam na ca svarūpasya abhāve svarūpasya asti vedanam upalambhaḥ yatas sattā sā asti na asti nu sā katham na ca pratīti mātreṇa vastu asti iti pratīyate paraspara viruddha arthāḥ na āgameṣu bhavet asau vedāt eva pratītiḥ ced hetu doṣa āmalīmasāt na lokān anusāreṇa vedāt buddheḥ asambhavāt yāga ādeḥ upalabdha tvāt loke śabda artha sambhavāt pṛrva dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa pratītiḥ na artha sādhikā kāma śoka bhaya unmāda doṣa upapluta cetasām buddhiḥ pūrva anusāreṇa na dṛṣṭā iṣṭasya sādhikā loke ca dṛśyate vākya padārtha upaplavaḥ kvacid vede tad anusāreṇa upaplavaḥ kim asambhavī na tatra āśaya doṣa usti kasyacid mūḍha tā ādikaḥ tatra api apratipattiḥ kinna doṣaḥ kasyacid mataḥ loka īkṣa āśaya doṣeṇa vastu sambandha hānitaḥ na pramāṇa tvam eṣā ca na na vede api kim pramā loke vākya padārthānām viplavasya upalabdhitaḥ vede te eva ced śabdāḥ kin na viplava sambhavaḥ 
[010,x]	nanu yadi vedaḥ sattya arthaḥ na bhavati svatas tadā loke yāga ādi padārthasya svayam apravṛtteḥ katham yāga ādi kriyā vṛtti anupalambhaḥ na hi svayam vyutpādayitum idam śakyam tatas avisamvāda bhāgi artha pratipādanāt pramāṇam vedaḥ etat sarva āgameṣu samānam na hi pratiniyata āgama artha a āntara vibhāgāḥ sarva āgameṣu api samupalabdhāḥ svayam utprepekṣya vidhātum śakyāḥ puruṣa mātreṇa athavā sā kim aśabda liṅgam svayam kathañcid anusmarataḥ na bhavati buddhiḥ yathā tathā kriyā parikalpyate 
[010,xi_010,xiv]	sarva āgama samāna tvāt yāga ādi artha kriyā ātmanaḥ na sarvaiḥ karaṇantasya tulyam vede pi kinna tat na ced ādṛta tā śiṣṭaiḥ iṃti anyonya samāśrayaḥ veda artha ācaraṇāt śiṣṭāḥ tad ācārāt ca sa pramā kiñca dvijātayaḥ api jāyante āgama antara saṅgitaḥ na bhavati eva ced teṣām na pāpe ramate matiḥ pāpa itara vyavasthā iyam āyātāḥ mānataḥ kutas pāpa ātma tā a dvija tvena pāpa tvāt advija ātma tā kiṃca dvijātitāḥ nāma jāti gotra kriyā āditaḥ śakyā jñātum vivekāt na dvijānām śiṣṭa tā kutas 
[010,xvii]	na khalu dvija ādi bhāvaḥ pramāṇa gocara cārī sa hi jāti yoga lakṣaṇaḥ gotra lakṣaṇaḥ kriyā sāmarthya atiśaya yogaḥ vā bhavet na tāvat go tva ādi jātim iva tad jātim ākāra viśeṣāt eva kecid avadhārayitum īśate ākṛti saṅkarasya darśanāt śūdra ādi abhimatānām api sā eva ākṛtiḥ upalabhyate na khalu vāhuleya ādi ākṛtayaḥ iva kauṇḍinī ādīnām api vijātīya abhimata vyakti vilakṣaṇāḥ vyaktaye upalabhyante atas eva vyakti saṅkareṇa sandeha viṣaya tvāt upadeśa sahitam pratyakṣam pramāṇam 
[010,xviii_011,i]	para upadeśa prāmāṇyam pratyakṣa arthe na yuktimat upadeśaḥ hi lokānām anyathā api pravarttate yadi khalu bāhmaṇa tva ādi jātiḥ pratyakṣeṇa īkṣyate para upadeśasya vyartha tā na hi pratyakṣa arthe para upadeśaḥ garīyān tathā ced na para upadeśataḥ sandehaḥ syāt atas eva pratyakṣam sahāyam apekṣate upadeśam vinā adhyakṣam yadi arthasya prasādhakam tadā upadeśa sattya tvam vidhātum na anyathā kṣamam yadā tu punar pratyakṣam kevalam asamartham upadeśaḥ ca tadā dvayam asamartham puthak sahitam api tādṛśam eva iti na jāti grahaṇe sāmarthyaṃmāsādayet sāmagryāḥ sāmarthyam iti ced na asti etat kārya darśanataḥ sarvā sāmagrīyam pratīyate aṃkurādi vat atra api na kāryam kiñcid īkṣyate 
[011,ii]	na hi ghaṭa paṭa sāmagrī śāli aṅkare anyatra vā bhavati anvaya vyatirekābhyām hi jala ādīnām eva tattva upalabdheḥ na ca atra tathā kāryam jāti niścaya lakṣaṇam upalabhyate kāñcana ādi upadeśasya hi yadā sattyatā āśaṅkā tadā pratyakṣa darśanāt asau nivarttate na evam jāti upadeśasya asattya tā śaṅkā tadā pratyakṣa darśanāt asau nivartate na evam jāti upadeśasya asattya tā śaṅkāyām pratyakṣāt sattya tā jāti svarūpa grahaṇa ākārāt suvarṇṇa ādau hi rūpa viśeṣa sadbhāvāt evam bhūtam eva suvarṇṇa bhavati iti vyavahārasya parisamāpteḥ dṛṣṭasya na kācid kṣatiḥ atra tu punar evaṃvidham eva brāhmaṇyam iti na pāda prasāraṇa mātram trāṇam pāramārthika para loka vyavahārasya vāñchita tvāt eka vākya tayā hi suvarṇṇam sattyam bhavati na tu brāhmaṇyam kiñca tad śaṅkāyām gotra upadeśa antara ādinirūpaṇam eva kriyate na anyaḥ upāyaḥ 
[011,iii_011,vii]	atha adhyayana ādinā kriyā viśeṣaṇam jñāyate na upadeśa mātrāt tat api asat dvijāti tve kriyā sādhyā na kriyātas dvijāti tā saṃskārāḥ api na eva syuḥ jāti niścaya varjitā jāti varjitasya hi na svādhyāya adhyayana saṃskāra ādayaḥ dvijāti tva ādikam ādadhati sarvasya tathā dvija tva prasaṅgāt api ca yadi pratyakṣataḥ jātiḥ na pratīyate kevalāt vacanāt api na eva asyāḥ pratītiḥ aviraudhinī 
[011,viii_011,ix]	prathamam hi pravarttamānam adhyakṣam na tāvat dvija tva ādi vivekam upakalpayitum alam tatas param upadeśaḥ apekṣyate yadi pratyakṣataḥ na pratīyāt vacanāt api na eva pratyeṣyati tat api hi vacanam upalambham eva khyāpayati na khalu puruṣa vacana parijñāna pravarttitam niścayam upajanayati puruṣaḥ paryanuyuktaḥ kathambhavatā idam ajñāyi iti gotra saṃskāra ādikam eva parijñāna viṣaya tayā upadiśati na jāti upalambham kathayati sā eva jātiḥ iti ced uktam atra uttaram dvijāti tve kriyā na tu tat eva dvijāti tvam atha gotra lakṣaṇā jātiḥ tathā ca brahmaṇaḥ apattyam brāhmaṇaḥ iti hi vyapadiśanti 
[011,x^1]	brahmaṇaḥ apattyatā mātrāt brāhmaṇyati prasajyate na kaścid abrāhma tanoḥ utpannaḥ kvacid iṣyate antarā jātibhadaḥ ced nirnimittaḥ katham bhavet antarāle kriyā bhedāt gotreṇa arthaḥ na kasyacid atha dvija ādi gotrāṇām anādiḥ bhedaḥ iṣyate jñāyatām sa kathat nāma pramāṇasya apravṛttitaḥ kriyā tad aparijñānāt akriyā eva prasajyate avicchedaḥ ca gotrasya pratyetum śakyate na ca avicchedaḥ na niyataḥ kasyacid gotra bhāvinaḥ sūta māgadha caṇḍālāḥ katham sambhavinonyathā jñāyante eva te tad jñaiḥ iti ced niyamaḥ na hi anādi gotra paddhatyām asyāt na skhalanam striyā iti jñātam katham nāma kāma ārttā hi sadā striyaḥ brāhmaṇa tve sthite pūrvam tad gotra tvasya sambhavaḥ tad āsthiteḥ kathaṅgotram sā iyam andha paramparā atha śakti viśeṣeṇa yoge brāhmaṇyam iṣyate idānīn dṛśyate na eva śakteḥ atiśayaḥ kvacid śrūyate pūrva kālaḥ ced sarvatra iti vṛthā vacaḥ sarva āgama prasiddhānām śakteḥ atiśayaḥ mahān yoginām gīyate pūrva siddhānām avigānataḥ 
[012,i_012,vi]	tasmāt na śakti viśeṣa yogaḥ dvijāti tvam yuktam na ca veda vacaḥ kiñcid dvijāti tva ādi pra sādhakam vyakteḥ sāmānya vacanam anukta samam eva tat na hi vedaḥ devadatta ādīnām brāhmaṇa tvam upadiśati sarvadā avidyamāna tvāt vedasya ca sarvadā bhāvāt arthasya abhāva kāle veda upadeśaḥ katham sārthakaḥ yadā bhaviṣyati tadā tathā eti ced anarthakaḥ katham vedaḥ paścāt arthena saṅgataḥ udāsīna svarūpasya tatra vyāpṛta tā katham na khalu svabhāva abhāvayaḥ rvedasya viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate tad svabhāva tve ca sarvadā katham ayam vibhāgam pratīyāt 
[012,vii]	tasmāt na idam brāhmaṇa tva ādikam pratyakṣāt upadeśāt ubhayāt vedāda vā pratīyate tat apratīyamānam katham upayogī iti kintena karttavyam tatas saṃvyavahāra mātra prasiddham brāhmaṇyam tatas brāhmaṇāḥ api bedān na artha kriyā krama kṛtaḥ iti katham vyavahāra saṃvādaḥ vedāt kasyacid tu vyavahāraḥ veda viparyyayāt api iti na veda āvedayoḥ viśeṣaḥ tasmāt na aparīkṣitāt vedat niyoga mātrāt eva pravarttanam yuktam tatas apravarttaka tvāt aprāmāṇyam 
[012,viii_012,xiv]	atha niyoktṛ dharma tā niyogasya tat ayuktam niyoktuḥ siddha rūpa tvāt niyogasya api siddha tā sampādyaḥ na niyogaḥ syāt siddham sampādyatām katham na khalu siddham apara nirapekṣam kathañcid sampādayitum śakyam tathā ced anuparatiḥ eva sampadanāyāḥ iti vyartha tā pramāṇasya atha niyojaka dharma tve api niyojya viṣaya apekṣayā niyogaḥ tathā tvam pratilabhate niyojya rahitaḥ kaśican na niyogaḥ pratīyate tathā niyoga viṣayam vinā na asti niyoga tā tathā hi niyuktaḥ ham anena atra viṣaya ye niyogaḥ iti pratītiḥ yatas niyogaḥ preraṇā rūpaḥ vinā na viṣayam kvacid niyojyaḥ api niyojya tvam ātmanaḥ saḥ avagacchati 
[012,xvi]	sa ca tathābhūtaḥ niyogaḥ sādhyaḥ eva na khalu svāvyāpāra sādhanam vinā niyogaḥ sādhitaḥ iti bhavati evantarhi dhātu artha niyoga bhāvanānām paraspara sambandhaḥ niyogaḥ sa ca pratīti kāle na asti tat katham niyoge vākya arthe nirālambanatā na bhavet na ca niyogaḥ paraspara sa apekṣa dhātu artha ādi vyatirekeṇa aparaḥ upalabhyate sambandhaḥ ca hetu phala bhāvena vyavasthitānām krama bhāvinām na pratibhāsa gocaraḥ svarūpa pratibhāsasya vidyamāna viṣaya tvāt para rūpa pratibhāsasya ca atad pratibhāsa tvāt na khalu anyat anya rūpeṇa pratibhāsate tathā ca nirālambane kānyā apoha viṣayā śrutiḥ tathā hi kuru yāga ādikam iti yāga kartṛka tvam ātmanaḥ pratīti viṣaya prāptam manyamā ca pratīti kāle tat asti na ca
[013,i]	śabdāt prāc apratipannam pratyetum śakyam yena hi prāk yāga ādi kriyā āviṣṭaḥ paraḥ pratipannaḥ saḥ eva ātmanaḥ parasya vā tathā abhāvam avagacchati na anyaḥ pūrva anusāreṇa ca iyam pratītiḥ anya apoha viṣaya tām ātmanaḥ na atikrāmati na ca pratyakṣatas kartṛ tvam api pūrva pratipannam paurvāparyye pratyakṣasya āvṛtteḥ sāṃvyavahārika pratyakṣa apekṣayā tu pratītiḥ iti ucyate sarvathā pūrva pratīti anusaraṇāt ātmanaḥ karttṛ tva pratītiḥ 
[013,ii_013,vi]	atha api na karttṛ tvena asau preryate kintu adhikāri tvena eva na hi akurvan karttā bhavati adhikāri tvantu yogyatayā tat api asat yogya tā viṣaye kvāpi vinā na viṣayeṇa sā viṣaya ati akṣatāyāñca pratītā yogyatā katham na khalu yogyatā viṣayam sva vyāpāram ajānānaḥ tad viṣaya viśiṣṭām yogyatām svarūpataḥ avagacchati tatas karttṛ tva vat atra api doṣaḥ eva vicāra gocara atītaḥ vacāra caritaiḥ katham niyogaḥ iṣyate vākyasya arthaḥ ācārya muṣṭitaḥ na khalu vicāryamāṇaḥ niyogaḥ kaścid asti yathā kalpanam ayogāt 
[013,vii]	śuddha kāryasya kim rūpa niyogaḥ kīrttitaḥ paraiḥ kevalā preraṇā kārya saṅga nātha viparyayaḥ prādhānyāt kārya rūpa tvam niyogasya kim iṣyate kim vā preraka tā tasya prādhānyāt ucyate paraiḥ kāryasya preraṇāyāḥ ca sambandhe kinniyoga tā niyogaḥ samudāya utha yat vā tad ubhayāt paraḥ yantra ārūḍhaḥ tathā abhīṣṭaḥ bhogya rūpaḥ thavā sa kim puruṣaḥ vā niyogaḥ syāt iti pakṣāḥ paraiḥ kṛtāḥ 
[013,xi_013,xii]	śuddha kārya niyoga vādinām matam pratyaya arthom niyogaḥ ca yatas śuddhaḥ pratīyate kārya rūpaḥ ca tena atra śuddham kāryam asau mataḥ viśeṣaṇantu yat tasya kiṃcid anyat pratīyate pratyaya arthaḥ na tat yuktam dhātvarthaḥ svargga kāma vat prerakatvantu yat tasya viśeṣaṇam iha iṣyate tasya apratyaya vācya tvāt śabde kārya niyoga tā 
[013,xv_013,xix]	śuddha preraṇā niyoga vādaḥ preraṇā eva niyogetra śuddhā sarvatra gamyate na apreritaḥ yatas kaścid niyuktam svam prabudhyate preraṇā saṅgata kārya niyoga pakṣaḥ mama idam kāryam iti evam jñātam pūrvam yadā bhavet sva siddhau prerakantat syāt anyathā tat na sidhyati kārya saṅgata preraṇā vādinaḥ prāhuḥ 
[013,xx_013,xxiii]	preryate puruṣaḥ na eva kāryeṇa iha vinā kvacid tatas ca preraṇā proktā niyogaḥ kārya saṅga tā kāryasya eva upacārataḥ pravartaka tva vādinaḥ prāhuḥ preraṇā viṣayaḥ kāryam na tu tat prerakam svatas vyāpāraḥ tu pramāṇasya prameyaḥ upacaryate sambandhaḥ eva ubhayoḥ niyogaḥ iti apare 
[013,xxiv_014,vi]	preraṇā hi vinā kārya prerikā na eva kasyacid kāryam vā preraṇāḥ yogaḥ niyogaḥ tena sammataḥ samudāya vāde api ayam abhiprāyaḥ paraspara avinābhūtam dvayam etat pratīyate niyogaḥ samudāyaḥ asmāt kārya preraṇayoḥ yatas apare punar āhuḥ ubhaya svabhāva nirmuktaḥ vākya arthaḥ siddham ekam yatas brahma gatam āmnāyataḥ sadā siddha tvena na tat kāryam prerakam kutas eva tat yantra ārūḍha niyoga vādinām matam kāmī yatra eva yaḥ kaścid niyoge sati tatra sa viṣaya ārūḍham ātmānam manyamānaḥ pravartate bhogya rūpa niyoga vādinām pravādaḥ 
[014,vii]	mama idam bhogyam iti evam bhogya rūpam pratīyate mamatvena ca vijñānam bhoktari eva vyavasthitam svāmi tvena abhimānaḥ hi bhoktari atra bhavet ayam bhogyantadeva vijñeyam tat eva svam nirūpyate sādhya rūpa tayā yena mama idam iti gamyate tad prasādhyena rūpeṇa bhogyam svam vyapadiśyate siddha rūpam hi yat bhogyam na niyogaḥ sa tāvatā sādhya tvena iha bhogyasya preraka tvāt niyoga tā 
[014,xi_014,xvii]	puruṣa niyoga vādiniḥ mama idam kāryam iti evam manyate puruṣaḥ sadā puṃsaḥ kārya viśiṣṭa tvam niyogosya ca vācya tā kāryaṃsya siddhau jātāyām tad yuktaḥpuruṣaḥ tadā bhavet sādhitaḥ iti evam pumān vākya arthaḥ ucyate sarvatra ca vākya arthe aṣṭa prakāraḥ bhedaḥ pramāṇam kinniyogaḥ syāt prameyam athavā punar ubhayena vihīnaḥ vā dvaya rūpothavā punar śabda vyāpāra rūpaḥ vā vyāpāraḥ puruṣasya vā dvaya vyāpāra rūpaḥ vā dvaya avyāpāraḥ eva vā atra ucyate sarvam etat asaṅgatam yatas 
[014,xviii]	preraṇā rahitam kāryam niyojyena vivarjitam niyogaḥ na eva kasya api niyogaḥ iti kīrtyate vṛttiḥ niyoga śabdasya śuddhe kārye yadā matā saṃjñā mātrāt niyoga tvam bhavat kena nivāryate yaktaḥ tu puruṣaḥ kārye tatra na eva pratīyate niyogaḥ sa kathat nāma siddha atīta ādi bodha vat niyojakasya dharmmoyam niyogaḥ loka sammataḥ tat eva kāryam iti ced siddhatvāt na asya sādhya tā sādhya tvena niyogoyam iti ceda vyapadiśyate viṣaye tasya tattvena upacārāt prakīrttanam asiddhasya ca tasyāḥ tu katham preraka rūpa tā sādhya tvena avabodhosya preraka tvam yadi iṣyate aprasiddhasya sādhya tvam bodhaḥ siddha ātmakasya ca paraspara virūddha tvam ekasya katham iṣyate sādhya rūpatayā atasya pratītiḥ prerikā yadi niyoga tvam pratīteḥ syāt na niyogasya tattvataḥ 
[014,xxvi_014,xxvii]	tathā niyogaḥ yadi vākya arthaḥ pramāṇam kim bhaviṣyati māna rūpaḥ niyogaḥ ced prameyam kim punar bhavete niyogaḥ puruṣasya iṣṭaḥ vyāpāraḥ tattvataḥ yadi vyāpāraḥ puruṣasya asau bhāvanā eva anyavā icakā vākya vyāpāra pakṣe tu bhavet sā śabda bhāvana śabda ātma bhāvanām āhuḥ anyām eva liṅa ādayaḥ śabdāt eva tu asau jātāḥ puruṣaḥ kim pravartate śabdena prerita ūnaḥ ced sva vyāpāre pravarttate śabdena ācodita tve asya katham astu pravarttanam śabdena codane tasya nirālamba natāḥ dhiyaḥ 
[015,i_015,v]	evam yantra āruḍha ādayaḥ api vākya arthāḥ vācya doṣāḥ yatas yantra ārūḍha tayā bhogya bhoktroḥ sambandhaḥ ucyate na sambandhaḥ asti bhogyatma ārūḍhaḥ ca na naraḥ tadā pratīti kāle sarvasya sādhya tvena asvarūpa tā tat eva tasya rūpañced na sādhya tvasya hānitaḥ evam niyogaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ 
[015,vi_015,viii]	bhāvanā idānīm vicāryate bhāvanā hi dvidhā śabda bhāvanā artha bhāvanā ca yat āha śabda ātma bhāvanā māhuḥ anyām eva liṅa ādayaḥ iti antu anyā eva sarva arthā sarva ākhyā teṣu vidyate śabda bhāvanā śabda vyāpāraḥ śabdena hi puruṣa vyāpāraḥ bhāvyate puruṣa vyāpāreṇa dhātu arthaḥ dhātu arthena ca phalam 
[015,ix_015,xii]	idam ca ayuktam śabda vyāpāraḥ hi na śabda vācyaḥ tam prati kārakaḥ śabdaḥ na vācakaḥ apratipādakaḥ tathā hi śabdāt uccaritāt ātmā niyuktaḥ gamyate naraiḥ bhāvanātaḥ paraḥ kaḥ vā niyogaḥ parikalpyatām śabda bhāvanā eva khalu niyogaḥ iti śabda antareṇa ucyate tat asat yadi śabda vyāpāraḥ katham agṛhīta saṅketaḥ na avagacchati svabhāvataḥ hi niyojaka tve na śa sam ṅketa grahaṇam upayogi sā eva sāmagrī ced nanu sāmagrī yadi preraṇe bhāvanāyām vā vyāpriyate a yuktam etat yāvatā 
[015,xiii_015,xv]	śasam ṅketagraha sāmagrī vyāpṛtāḥ a rthasya vedane artha pratītau puruṣaḥ svayam eva pravarttate idam kuru iti preraṇa adhyeṣaṇayoḥ eva pratītiḥ tad apratipattau na niyukta tva pratipattiḥ niyukta tvañca nāma kārye vyāpārita tvam kārya vyāpṛtām avasthām pratipadya niyojakaḥ niryukte sā ca tasya bhāvinī avasthā na svarūpeṇa sākṣātkartum śakyā svarūpa sākṣāt karaṇe hi sarvam tadā eva siddham iti na niyogaḥ syāt saphalaḥ yathā prayojakaḥ tatra bādhyamāna pratītikaḥ prayaujyaḥ api tathā eva syāt śabdaḥ buddhi artha vācakaḥ 
[015,xvi]	yathā eva hi prayojakasya prayojyena sva vyāpāra śūnyam ātmānam pratiyatā prayojaka pratītiḥ bādhyamānā nirālambanā tathā prayojya pratītiḥ api tena eva sva vyāpāra āviṣṭam ātmānapratiyatā bādhyate śabdāt tasya sā pratītiḥ iti ced na asti etat saḥ api śabdaḥ buddhi artham eva khyāpayati evam mayā pratipāditam evam mayā pratipannam iti dvayoḥ api adhyavasāyāt athavā evam tāvat pratipannam mayā asya tu abhiprāyaḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt tathā bhavatu evam arthaḥ mā vā bhūt mayā tāvat evam pratipannam atas eva āha 
[015,xvii_016,i]	vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ yarthaḥ buddhau prakāśate prāmāṇī antatra śabdasya na artha tattva nibandhanam vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ iti yatra vaktā asti buddhau prakāśate iti yatra sa na asti athavā tad ukteḥ eva tatra vaktā asti iti gamyatām yat jātīyaḥ yatas iti nyāyāt athavā tad aviśeṣāt sarvam eva apauruṣeyam puruṣa kṛteḥ vādhanāt na evam ced atra api atīndriya tvāt puruṣa kṛteḥ sā na bādhikā iti kutas etat 
[016,ii_016,iv]	athavā apauruṣeyam eva tat vacanam puruṣasya tu mayā kṛtam etat iti bhrāntiḥ tathā hi atyanta naṣṭaḥ yaḥ granthaḥ pratibhāti eva kasyacid mayā kṛtaḥ iti prāpta abhimānasya kṣata smṛteḥ kavayaḥ api janma antara anubhūtam eva grantham kavi tvena utprekṣyante iti kutas etat tathā ca sarvam apauruṣeyam vyarthaka tvam api tathā bhavati iti vyartham apauruṣeya tvam tatra 
[016,v_016,viii]	samāna tatra vede api tatra api vyarthatā iṣyate anya artha kalpanāyān ca samānam ubhayam bhavet veda āvedayoḥ vyarthatā apauruṣeya tā kalpanā ca samānā eva anya artha kalpanāyām na vyarthatā iti ced sattya artha kalpanā tatra pauruṣeyī eva kalpyatām asatya artha avabhāsaḥ tu prathamaḥ yaḥ sa vedatas atas āha vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ ityādi veda artham prāthamikam parityajya yorthaḥ buddhi vyāpāra viṣayaḥ tatra prāmāṇyam puruṣa buddheḥ eva na artha tattva nibandhanam na śabdasya iti vyasta pada sambandhaḥ 
[016,ix]	tathā hi tam parityajya veda artham prathamam naraḥ pramāṇa śuddham anya artham kalpayet tad matiḥ pramā saḥ api veda arthaḥ eva iti na pramāṇam iha asti vaḥ veda ādhipatyataḥ jāteḥ iti ced prathamaḥ na kim tasya api ca tad artha tve vyarthaḥ vedaḥ kathat na saḥ tathā ca sati sandehe apauruṣeye na mānatā 
[016,xii]	veda irtha tattvasya prāthamikasya abhāvāt citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti vyarthaka tvāt karma vaiguṇya vat tatra iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt anya artha kalpanā tu puruṣa prayatnāt bhavantī puruṣa kṛtā eva tathā ca uktam sā kim aśabda liṅgā svayam kathañcid anusmarataḥ na bhavati sarve eva ca vedāt ātmānam niyuktam manyate pūrva anusāreṇa niyogaḥ ca śabda bhāvanā rūpaḥ yadi sa vākya arthaḥ tathā sati devadattaḥ pacet iti karttuḥ anabhidhānāt karttṛ karaṇayoḥ tṛtīye ti tṛtīyā prāpnoti kartṛ abhidhāne tu anabhihita adhikārāt tiṅgā eva ukta tvāt na bhavati kiṃca pacati iti karttā api pratīyate vyāpāra sāmarthyāt karttṛḥ ākṣepāt evam pratītiḥ iti ced na 
[016,xiii_016,xvi]	krama pratītiḥ evam syāt prathamam bhāvanā gatiḥ tad sāmarthyāt punar tasmāt yatas karttā pratīyate na ca krama pratītiḥ upalabhyate dvi vacana bahuvacane ca na prāpnutaḥ eka tvāt vyāpārasya atha kāraka bhedāt vyāpara bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced kriyate kaṭaḥ devadatta yajñadattābhyām iti mahat asamaṃja satvam syāt tathā hi 
[016,xvii_017,i]	eka tvāt karmmaṇaḥ prāptam kriyā eka tvam tathā bhidaḥ karttuḥ bhedaḥ iti itthañca kiṅkarttavyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ nanu dhātu arthasya abhedāt eka vacanam devadatta yajñadattābhyām āsyate sa ca dhātu arthaḥ na niyogaḥ niyogasya pratyaya artha tvāt sa ca dhātu artha atiriktaḥ karttṛ sādhyaḥ tasya karttṛ bhedāt bhedaḥ iti tatas kaṭam kurutaḥ iti bhavati dhātvarthaḥ tu śuddhaḥ na kāraka bhedāt bhedī tat asat 
[017,ii_017,vii]	sambandhāt yadi tad bhedaḥ dhātu arthasya api asau bhavet saḥ api nirvarttya evatiḥ tad bhedena eva bhidyatām asmākantu vivakṣā paratantra tvāt bheda abheda vyavasthiteḥ lābhidhānāt kārakasya sarvam etat samañjasam kriyāḥ hi karttuḥ karmaṇaḥ ca bhedena vivakṣyate sā yadi lakāreṇa abhidhīyate na kartrā tadā karttari tṛtīyā bhavati yadā abhidhīyate tadā prathama artha tvāt prathamā bhavati kriyate mahātmanā karoti mahātme ti yadā bheda vivakṣā asya bhāvanā arthasya jñāyate lakāreṇa abhidhānañca tṛtīyā karttṛrīpsyatām yadā bheda vivakṣā asya karttā lena abhidhīyate tena eva ukteḥ tṛtīyā asti na kattuḥ iti gamyatām 
[017,ix]	yadā tu karttṛ vyā pāraḥ tipā pratipādyate tadā saḥ eva ca bhāvanā tathā ca āha bhāva arthā karmma śabdāḥ bhāvanam bhāvaḥ ṇī antasya pratyayaḥ tathā ca sati bhāvanā eva asau bhāvanā ca karttṛ vyāpāraḥ sa coditaḥ kartrā sva vyāpāre pravarttate niyogasya ca tad śeṣa tvāt apradhāna tvāt avākya artha tvam niyoga viśiṣṭa tvāt ca bhāvanāyāḥ tathā pratipādane niyamena pravarttate kathañca asau sva vyāpāram pratipanne nnotra na pravarttate anyathā sva vyāpāraḥ eva tasya na coditaḥ bhavet tat etada sat 
[017,x_017,xii]	vyāpāraḥ eṣa mama kim avaśyām iti manyate phalam vinā eva naidam ced sāphalye dhik amaḥ kutas yadi avaśyam eṣa mama vyāpāraḥ iti matiḥ tat ayuktam na hi phalam apaśyat mama idam karttavyam iti kaścid pratyeti saphala tve pravarttate saphala tvam na avagamyate iti pratipāditam kiṃca yajate pacati iti atra bhāvanā na pratīyate yaji arthāt atirekeṇa tasyāḥ vākya artha tā kutas pākam karoti yāgañca yadi bhedaḥ pratīyate evam sati anavasthā syāt asamañca satā karī 
[017,xiv_017,xv]	karoti yāgam sva vyāpāram niṣpādayati yāga niṣpattim nirvarttayati vyapadeśāḥ ete yathā kathaṃcid bheda purassarāḥ na etebhyosti padārtha tattva vyavasthā śilāputrakasya śarīram iti na bheda vyavahārāḥ bhedam antareṇa api dṛśyante yathā dvijasya vyāpāraḥ yāgaḥ iti api gīyate tatas parā punar dṛṣṭā karoti iti na hi kriyā yaji kriyā api dravyasya viśeṣāt aparāḥ na hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena devadatta tayā gatiḥ 
[017,xvii_018,i]	nanu ca kim karoti devadattaḥ pacati yajati iti praśna uttara darśanāt karoti iti niścite sati yaji ādiṣu sandehāt anyat tvam prasiddham eva tathā ca āha na ca śarīram eva buddhiḥ tad siddhau api buddhi vikalpe saṃśayāt tat etat ayuktam karoti arthayajati arthau vibhinnau yadi tattvataḥ anyat saṃdigdham anyasya kathane durghaṭaḥ kramaḥ 
[018,ii_018,iv]	yadi hi karoti kriyāḥ anyāḥ yajyādikāyāḥ tadā karoti iti niścite katham anyatra saṃdehe praśnaḥ aniścitaḥ eva praśnasya yukta tvāt sāmānya rūpotha karoti arthaḥ viśeṣa rūpaḥ yajyādiḥ iti ced sāmānyena viśeṣeṇa vinā kiṃcid pratīyate sāmānya ākṣipyamāṇasya nahi nāma apratīta tā kevala sāmānya pratītau hi viśeṣa aṃśe saṃdehaḥ iti uktam 
[018,v_018,viii]	atha sāmānyena viśeṣaḥ ākṣipyate tathā sati saḥ api pratītaḥ eva katham saṃśayaḥ na hi pratīta tvāt aparaḥ ākṣepaḥ atha pratītaḥ eva asau tathā api pratīta tā viśeṣa rūpeṇa na asti sāmānyena ākṣepāt nanu tat eva sāmānyam ākṣepakam tat eva akṣe apyam iti katham etat na ca sāmānyāt aparam sāmānyatā ākṣepyam tathā sati tatas api aparam tatas api aparam iti anavasthā nanu sāmānya pratyakṣāt viśeṣa apratyakṣāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ eva na anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ eva yuktaḥ sāmānyena anupalambha pramāṇa vādinaḥ anyathā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ na anupalabbhimātrāt tathā api anupalabdheḥ eva saṃśayaḥ vyartham etat sāmānya pratyakṣāt iti 
[018,ix]	yadi sāmānya pratyakṣa tāyām api upalabbhilakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ na sāmānya saṃśayaḥ ātma upalambha lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ eva na sambhavati sāmānya pratyakṣa tāyām evantarhi sā eva anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ iti prāptam viśeṣasmṛtiḥ iti ca vyartham na hi viśeṣa smṛti vyatirekeṇa aparaḥ saṃśayaḥ ubhaya aṃśau alam vi smṛti rūpa tvāt asya dṛśyate kānya kubja ādiṣu sāmānya pratyakṣa tām antareṇa api prathamataram eva smaraṇāt saṃśayaḥ tat eva yajya ādikam aniyamena pratīyamānam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭāt anumānāt sāmānyam āha ca atra 
[018,x_018,xi]	atad rūpa parāvṛtta vastumā atra prasādhanāt sāmānya viṣaya proktam liṅgam bhedā pratiṣṭhiteḥ bheda an avadhāraṇa mātram eva sāmānya paricchedaḥ kvacid buddhiḥ eva tad ākāra viviktāḥ bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇa tvāt saṃśaya hetuḥ tathā tathābhūta anupalabdhiḥ eva saṃśaya hetuḥ buddhi rūpāḥ upalabhyamāna padārtha rūpā vā 
[018,xii_018,xiv]	nanu samāna ākāra anubhava abhāve dṛśyate saṃśayaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti ūrdhva tā sāmānyam upalabhyate yadi asti tadā dvaya ākārā buddhi rupalabhyate na bhedāt bhinnam asti atra sāmānyam buddhi bhedataḥ buddhayā ākārasya bhadena padārthasya vibhinna tā atha upalabhyate eva puruṣa sthāṇu svarūpa parihāreṇa dūra deśam ūrdhva tā mātram anyathā sthāṇu puruṣa ākāra antarggata anubhave na tatra sandehaḥ utpadyeta tasmāt tad parihāreṇa avabhāsanam eva tat vyatirekaḥ etāvat mātra lakṣaṇa tvāt vyatirekasya 
[019,i_019,iii]	tat na yuktam tanmātra vyatirekaḥ ced kinnādu ūreva bhāsanam dūrevabhāsamānasya sannidhāna iti bhāsanam yat khalu dūra deśa niveśi daśāyām avabhāsate tad sannidhāna vidhāna adhīnam sutarām avabhāsa vat padārtha antara tve ca sāmānyasya tat eva pratibhāsane katham anyatra trāspaṣṭa pratibhāsa vyavahāraḥ na khalu nīla padārtha pratibhāsane aspaṣṭa śukla pratibhāsa vyavahāraḥ 
[019,iv_019,v]	nanu bhavat pakṣe api kā iyam aspaṣṭa tā nāma aspaṣṭa pratibhāsatā nāma aspaṣṭa pratibhāsa tā hi kadācid apratibhāsa tā kadācid anya pratibhāsa tā kadācid tu tad pratibhāsata iti tasya eva pratibhāsaḥ ced aspaṣṭa pratibhāsa tā aspaṣṭa tā katham nāma svarūpeṇa avabhāsane anyasya pratibhāsaḥ api tasya eva aspaṣṭa tā kutas apratibhāsam vinā bhāvaḥ katham syāt pratibhāsane buddhiḥ eva tathā bhūtā yadi aspaṣṭa avabhāsitā buddhi svarūpa nirbhāsena arthasya aspaṣṭa bhāsitā 
[019,ix_019,xi]	tat etat asat buddhiḥ eva atad ākārā tatas upadyate yadā tadā a spaṣṭa pratībhāsa vyavahāraḥ jagat mataḥ atha tat eva sāmānyan tathā sati varṇṇa saṃsthāna pratibhāsanam na syāt na khalu sāmānyam varṇṇa saṃsthāna vat dravya āśrita tvāt tayoḥ atha dravya gatam varṇṇa saṃsthānam tathā sati tata utpanna sāmānyam anavabhāsanāt varṇṇa saṃsthānayoḥ eva pratibhāsanam tayoḥ ca sādhāraṇa tvāt sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ sandehaḥ iti yuktam 
[019,xii_019,xvi]	tat api asat yatas sa varṇṇonyena rūpeṇa saṃsthānam katham anyathā tat pratīyate itthañca bhrāntā buddhiḥ pratīyate yadi varṇṇa saṃsthānam anyathā pratibhāti bhrāntiḥ eva sā katham sāmānya pratyakṣa tā atha avayavī tatra pratibhāti na sāmānyam na api varṇṇa saṃsthānam iti ced saṃsthāna varṇṇa rūpābhyām vyatireka avabhāsanam kutas dravyasya kintasmāt aparam pratibhāsate śyāma tā ādi rūpam hi varṇṇa ādikam avabhāsate na ca tatra anyat eva dravyam avabhāsate tad vyatirekeṇa aparasya dravyasya apratibhāsanāt tat eva dravyam iti ced na guṇa tvāt saṃsthāna varṇṇayoḥ 
[019,xvii]	atha varṇṇa saṃsthāna vat dravyam na tad vyatirakeṇa anyathā pratibhāsana abhāvāt na khalu spaṣṭa aspaṣṭa vaṇṇa saṃsthāna vyatirekeṇa aparam dravyam upalabhyate aspaṣṭa varṇa saṃsthānasya ca tad apara sāmagrī prabhava jñānena bādhyamāna tvāt na idam evambhūtam iti spaṣṭa ākāra pratyaya udaye sati bhavati iti tad anupalabdhiḥ eva ca tad viparyaya upalabdhi rūpā bādhakam na idam iti kalpanā pratyayasya anutpatteḥ nna evam iti ced na utpadyate eva saḥ api na idam iti pratyayaḥ tathā hi tat varṇṇaṃmetat saṃsthānam na bhavati iti tad vyatirikta saṃsthāna bādhakam upajñāyate eva jñānam vyatiriktasya na bādhakam iti ced yatas eva avyatirikta saṃsthāna bādhakam atas eva vyatireki saṃsthānam bhaviṣyati 
[020,i_020,iii]	tat asat yādṛśasya pratītiḥ prāk bādhanam tādṛśasya ced anyathā na pratītiḥ ca kim anyat avaśiṣyate yādṛśam saṃsthānam dravyam vā varṇṇa avyatiriktam pratipannam yadi tādṛśasya bādhā kim aparam avaśiṣyate na khalu yoga vibhāgaḥ vidyate yena tatra ekasya bādhanam aparasya na iti vyavasthā vibhāgaḥ 
[020,iv_020,ix]	atha api syāt tasya varṇṇasya na prāptiḥ saṃsthāna dravyayoḥ tadā tatas prāpteḥ param dravyantat ca prāk iti vittimat yat ca pūrva uttara bhāvena vedyate yat ca na tathā tayoḥ viruddha dharmma adhyāsa yogaḥ na yuktaḥ prabhedaḥ hi sakalaḥ evam eva sādhanīyaḥ parasya bheda sādhanasya abhāvāt tat asat tat anyat yadi tattvena pratyakṣe kinna bhāsate pūrve pare vā ubhayoḥ dṛśyate sambhavaḥ kadā 
[020,x]	yadi tat paramārthataḥ bhinnam varṇṇa saṃsthānam dravyāt saṃsthānam vā varṇṇāt katham pūrvatra paratra vā pratyakṣe na pratibhāti pratyekam apratibhāsane samudāyasya tad vyatiriktasya abhāvāt tatra pratibhāsanam iti mahat moha sāmarthyam na ca dvayoḥ samavadhānam iti kutas samudāyaḥ anusandhānaḥ ca na pratyakṣāt iti tad abhāvāt anumānam api na asti iti kutas vyatireka pratītiḥ 
[020,xi]	tasmāt na sādhāraṇam nāma kiñcid sarvasya sva ātmani vyavasthita tvāt viśeṣa tā eva tasmāt na kriyā karoti iti sādhāraṇa rūpā yajana ādi kriyāḥ viśeṣāṇām sāmānyam tatas na bhāvanā katta vya apāra rūpā tad vyatirekeṇa avibhāvanāt na ca dhātu arthaḥ pi dravya vyatirekeṇa asti dravyam eva pūrva aparībhūtam anvaya vyatirekeṇa kalpita vyatireki svabhāvam abhede api bheda vat upacarya kriyātas bhinnam kriyā ca tatas bhinnā iti vyavahāra mātram etat na iyam vastu tattva vyavasthitiḥ sva vyāpāra dhātu arthau ca niyoga kāle bhāvinau pratīyete tatas kathantad ālambanā pratītiḥ pūrva vāsanā balāt upajāyamānā na nirālambanā iti uktam 
[020,xii_020,xv]	atha api syāt pratyakṣasya hi varttamāna viṣaya tvāt bhāvi bhūta viṣaye na ālambana tvam śabdasya tu tad viṣaya tve api na tattvam tat āha codanā ityādi tat asat adṛśyamānaḥ saḥ api āsti iti etat vyavasitam katham anumāne tu sambandhaḥ iti tatra tathā sthitiḥ sarvā hi parokṣa viṣayā pratītiḥ artha sambandhāt eva avisamvādinī yathā anumāna pratītiḥ na hi yaḥ yena asambaddhaḥ tad bhāve tasya bhāva niyamaḥ nirālambanā tu tad svarūpa abhāvāt eva na hi avidyamānasya svarūpa grahaṇam iti uktam na ca bhāvinā saha sambandha niyamaḥ anumāne tu
[021,i_021,iii]	kāraṇāt kāryam pratīyate tathā parama darśanāt na ca phala kāraṇa tā agnihotra ādeḥ upalabdhā na api tad akaraṇe pratyavāḥ yaniścayaḥ atha ātmanaḥ sāmarthyam avagacchan yāga karaṇa tām ātmanaḥ pratipadyamānaḥ yāge pravarttiṣyate kāraṇa tvam yadā svarge tasya na pratipadyate yāgasya deśitaḥ api eṣa kasmāt tatra pravarttate 
[021,iv_021,vii]	atas eva bhāvanā niyoga dhātu arthānām paraspara sambandhaḥ phala abhisambandhaḥ vā vidhiḥ vākya arthaḥ iti na yuktam sarvasya bhāvi tvena jñānena agrahaṇāt nirālambanatā eva buddheḥ atas dṛśya vikalpya artha ekīkaraṇāt pravarttate saḥ eva ca anya apohaḥ iti na kaścid prekṣā pūrvaka rī vedāt pravarttate iti alam ati prasaṅgena tasmāt vaktṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ buddhau prakāśate adhyāropitaḥ prāmāṇī antatra śabdasya na artha tattva nibandhanam na khalu adhyāropeṇa sattya artha viṣayeṇa bhavitavyam pratibandham antareṇa iti vyavasthitam etat prathama vārttika alaṅkāre vidhi bhāvanā ādi vārttikam prathamam 
[021,viii_021,x]	yadi tarhi artha kriyā sthitiḥ avi sambādanam atha pratyabhijñā ādi pratyayāt api saḥ eva ayam ityādi jñātvā pravarttamānaḥ avisamvāda bhāj iti pramāṇam syāt tatra apūrva artha vijñānam niścitam bādha varjitam aduṣṭa kāraṇa ārabdham pramāṇam loka sammatam avayavi ādi viṣaya tvam samvādaka tvāt pramāṇam iti atha ālocana ajñāna sāmarthyāt asau vikalpaḥ utpadyamānaḥ na pramāṇam avayavini ca avayava vijñāna sāmarthyāt tathā sati tat api ālocana ajñānam cakṣuḥ sannikarṣa ādi sāmarthyāt iti na syāt pramāṇam tatra yadi kāraṇa paramparā an viṣyate cakṣuḥ ādīnām prasaṅgaḥ atha anantaram vikalpasya eva prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ 
[021,xi_021,xiii]	atra ucyate gṛhīta grahaṇāt na iṣṭam sāṃvṛtam dhī pramāṇa tā pravṛtteḥ tad pradhāna tvāt heya upādeya vastuni saḥ eva ayam iti pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ na ekatve pramāṇam apūrvasya eka tvasya agrahaṇāt dṛṣṭasya eva tasya pratipatteḥ eka tvam hi pūrveṇa saha gṛhyamāṇam eka tām vivāda viṣaya tām svīkaroti varttamāna tā mātrasya eka tve siddha sādhanam eva tat ca pūrvam pūrva pratyena gṛhīta tvāt na aparam pūrva pratyayena ca asau truṭyat avasthaḥ eva apūrva tayā ca gṛhyate tatas punar anusandhīyamānam yathābhūtam
[022,i_022,ii]	gṛhītam tathā bhatam eva vā anusandhātavyam gṛhīta tvena ca grahaṇe smaraṇam etat iti gṛhīta grāhi tvāda pramāṇam apara smaraṇa vat saṃvādaḥ tu artha kriyā karaṇāt na ca eka tva sādhya artha kriyā vastu sāmarthya mātrāt utpatteḥ tasmāt saḥ eva ayam iti pratyadvayam eva etat atha ekatā pratīyate pūrveṇa saha aparasya tat ayuktam 
[022,iii_022,vii]	pūrvam adhyakṣataḥ avittau tena ekatvā isti na pramā eka tvam apratītena pratītam iti sāhasam tena sāṃvṛtam eka tvam pūrva pūrva vikalpataḥ prāmāṇyam pratyayasya asya sāṃvṛtasya na vidyate ghaṭa ādi viṣayaḥ yaḥ api pratyayaḥ sarasa ādike tad pratyayaiḥ gṛhīterthe samudāya vikalpanāt samudāyāt paraḥ tu ekaḥ na eva kenacid īkṣyate anādi vāsanā dārḍhyāt parasya āgraha vaiśasam kathantarhi dhiyaḥ prāmāṇyam yadi pūrva apara ādikasya na ekā pratipattiḥ 
[022,viii_022,ix]	atra ucyate heya upādeya viṣaye pravarttakam hi pramāṇam ucyate tatra ca pravarttane dhīḥ eva pradhānam yadi api nāma bhāvi arthaḥ na pratipannaḥ tathā api tatra pravarttanāt pramāṇam yathā anumānasya agrahaṇe api prāmāṇyam na hi anumānena vastu svarūpa svīkāraḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate na ca cakṣuḥ ādikāt pravarttate jñānam antareṇa vikalpam antareṇa api buddhyā abhyāsāt pravarttate tatas heya upādeya viṣaye dhīrā iva pūrvikā pravarttanāt pramāṇam na vikalpa ādayaḥ yatra tu na abhyāsaḥ tatra anumānam eva pratyabhijñāna ādayaḥ atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ eva antāvat phala arthitām vyavahārika tvena pramāṇa tvam pratipāditam 
[022,x_022,xii]	idānīm adhigama phala viṣaya vibhāga kāritayā pratipādyate viṣaya ākāra bhedāt ca dhiyodhi gama bhedataḥ api ca dhiyaḥ eva prāmāṇyam na anyasya yatas viṣaya ākāra bhedāt adhigamasya pramāṇa phalasya bhedaḥ na pravarttanāt pramāṇam api tu pratipatti karaṇāt pratipattau hi jñātāyām pravarttatām vā na vā tathā api artha tathā bhāvavya sthānāt pramāṇam vyavasthāpiterthe yadi na pravarttate na ayam pramāṇasya doṣaḥ prāpaka tvāt pramāṇam iti ced na prāpaṇa yogya tvāt pramāṇasya tat eva prāptau asatyām katham jñāyate rūpa viśeṣa darśanāt avyabhicāriṇaḥ rūpasya katham paricchittiḥ 
[022,xiii]	samāptaḥ tarhi vāhya artha vyavahāraḥ avyabhicāri tvāt jñāne hi svarūpa samvedana mātram eva parisphuṭam tathā ca kutas vāhya artha para santāna ādi pratītiḥ etat ca uttaratra vakṣyamaḥ viṣaya ākāraḥ iva ākāraḥ asya viṣaya ākāram jñānam tasya bhedaḥ viṣaya ākāra bhedaḥ viṣaye vā ākāra bhedaḥ biṣaya ākāra bhedaḥ ākaraṇam ākāraḥ ullekhaḥ iti arthaḥ viṣaya sadṛśa tā viṣaya unmukha tā ca tad bhedāt dhiyaḥ adhigama bhedaḥ nīlasya saṃvittiḥ tad ākārasya ca iti artha adhigamaḥ ca
[023,i_023,iv]	pramāṇa phalam sva rūpa adhigamaḥ vā tathā ca āha pramāṇa adhīnaḥ hi prameya adhigamaḥ sa ca viṣaya ākāraḥ ātma bhūtaḥ jñānasya tatas jñānam eva pramāṇam nanu yathākāraḥ jñāna ātma bhūtaḥ tathā adhigamaḥ api tatas jñānam eva phalam iti prāptam sattyam etat pramāṇataḥ phalat na anyat pramāṇam na phalāt param evam prakārā sarvā ca kriyā kārakayoḥ sthitiḥ 
[023,v_023,viii]	etat ca uttaratra pratipādayaṣyate yathā cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ na bhavanti pramāṇan tathā aakāraḥ api mā bhūt yathā kārakāḥ api saṃvedanasya cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ na pramāṇan tatha ākāraḥ api iti āha bhāvāt eva asya tad bhāve tad bhāve ākāra bhāve asya adhigamasya phalasya bhāvāt eva na khalu cakṣuḥ ādi bhāvesya phalasya bhāvaḥ eva ākārasya tu bhāve bhāvaḥ eva avyatirekāt iti sādhakatama tvam sādhakatamañca karaṇam avyavadhāne ca sādhakatama tvam iti pratipādayiṣyate 
[023,ix_023,x]	kathantarhi cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpam iti kāraṇe kāryya upacārāt evam ucyate cauraigrāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti yathā tasmāt jñānam eva pramāṇam nanu prāpakam etat jñānam iti katham jñātavyam na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ na khalu sva saṃvedana pratyakṣam pramāṇa apramāṇa vibhāgam upadarśayati sarva jñāneṣu sva saṃvedanasya bhāvāt na ca tad utpatti kālaḥ eva saṃvādi itara jñāna vibhāga saṃvedane pravarttamānaḥ kaścid vipralabhyate na api sandehavān syāt 
[023,xi_023,xiii]	atha ābādhitatva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam svatas eva prasidhyati tad artha āpattyā prasādhyamānam parokṣa jñāna vādinām katham svatas siddhyati yathā artha āpattyā jñāna satttā siddhyati tasya arthāpattyā jñānasya na apareṇa prāmāṇyam jñāyate svatas eva tu pramāṇa tā aprāmāṇyantu bādhaka jñānāt bādhaka jñānasya ca svatas eva prāmāṇyam kiñca kāraṇāt utpadyate vi jñānam prāmāṇyantu tasya svatas eva tat api apavādena bādhaka jñānena ābādhitatva lakṣaṇam apodyate atra ucyate 
[023,xiv^1]	yadi svatas pramāṇa tvam nija kāraṇa bhāvataḥ tathā utpannasya tasya anyaiḥ bbādhakaiḥ na anyathā kriyā atha ātmā jñāna rūpa tvāt pramāṇam svataḥ ucyate bādhakānām sahasrepitasya api asti na vikriyā duṣṭa kāraṇa sadbhāvāt aprāmāṇyam bhavet yadi guṇavat kāraṇa āsaṅgāt prāmāṇyam na kim ipyate doṣa abhāvataḥ eva asya prāmāṇyam yadi sammatam aprāmāṇyam guṇa abhāvāt kasmāt asya na gamyate na ca pramāṇa itarataḥ kaścid ātma īkṣyate paraḥ pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tvam yena tasya anyatas bhavet bodha ātmakaḥ sa ced iṣṭaḥ
[023,xiv^2]	svāpa avasthā gama ādiṣu sva saṃvedana bhāvosya kadācid na apagacchati na vedyate tadā kiñcid ātmā asti iti kathammataḥ bodha itara vyavasthā tu dūrāt dūrataram gatā tasmāt utpadyate jñānam pramāṇam itarat tathā kāraṇāt eva tat bhūtam na svatas tasya mānatā samāna ākāra sadbhāvāt na tu tattvena niścayaḥ abādhita tvam sarvasya prathamantena na pramā paścāt bādhaḥ tu sandigdhaḥ niścayaḥ tasya sonyataḥ pratyakṣataḥ anumānāt vā pramāṇam aparam na hi saṃvāda pratyayaḥ sonya viṣaye yadi varttate tena
[023,xiv^3]	pūrvasya māna tvam atītasya īkṣyate katham sādhana pratyayasya api sandeha viṣaya tvataḥ sādhana tvam kathantasya pramāṇatva aprati iti taḥ bodha ātmaka tvāt mānam ced prasaktā sarvam āna tā abādhita artha bodhaḥ api prathamat na prasidhyati atha artha kāritām jñātvā tad arthasya pramātva vid pramāṇam prāc asiddham yat tasya vittiḥ kathantataḥ yadi pramāṇam prāc siddham kriyā syāt tasya yoga vid artha kriyātaḥ tat jñānam pramāṇam iti gṛhyate yatra eva artha kriyā tatra pramāṇam atha tat matam artha kriyā dayaḥ 
[023,xiv^4_024,xviii]	dṛṣṭāḥ te apramāṇāt matāt api tatas na artha kriyā sā ced anyatas api kathammatā tatas kadācid aprāpteḥ sā anyatra api samīkṣyate yatas na prāpti saṃdehaḥ tat pramāṇam matam yadi sandehasya nivṛttiḥ hi samāna ākārataḥ kutas abhyāsāt lakṣyate paścāt ākāraḥ sa vilakṣaṇaḥ tatas prāpti avinābhāvaḥ eṣa sonyonya saṃśrayaḥ tat dṛṣṭau eva dṛṣṭeṣu saṃvid sāmarthya bhāvinaḥ smaraṇāt vyavahāraḥ ced anumānāt tathā sati tat ca anumānam adhyakṣāt adhyakṣam anumānataḥ itaretara āśrayāt eva na asti anyatara saṃsthitiḥ svabhāva ālambana ākāra paricchedi hi pratyakṣam tṛṇasya api na kubjīkaraṇe samartham 
[024,xix]	na pūrva aparayoḥ tena sambandhaḥ parigṛhyate deśa kāla antara vyāptyā saṅgatiḥ yogaḥ ucyate deśa kāla antara vyāpteḥ adhyakṣam grahaṇe kṣamam yadi sarvasya sarva artham darśitā eva prasajyate sahabhāvaḥ tayoḥ vyāptyā na tasmāt anumodayaḥ kādācid ka tayā tasya sarvatra astu anumā athavā idānīm evam ākāram etat asti iti vedya tām api akṣataḥ na deśa ādi antara stha grahaṇantataḥ agṛhīte ca deśa ādau tad vyāptiḥ gṛhyate katham tasya agrahe na anumānam ca etat atyanta sāhasam anumāna antara ākṣepāt anavasthā avatārataḥ prakṛtā apratipattiḥ syāt tasya tasya iti apekṣaṇāt tasmāt svatas pramāṇa tvam utsarggeṇa vyavasthitam bādha kāraṇa duṣṭa tva jñāna abhyāntadapā udyate pramāṇam avisaṃvādāt bādhakam ced na vidyate pramāṇam eva tat vyaktam tat hi bādhaka tonyathā 
[024,xxvii_025,ii]	atra ucyate bādhaka abhāva mātreṇa na pramāṇa tva niścayaḥ prāpti kāle ca yaḥ bādhaḥ tasya abhāvaḥ puras kutas pramāṇāt jñāyatām prāpteḥ prāptā sā artha kriyā sthitiḥ sā ca svarūpa saṃvedya jñānāt paścāt vibhāvyate prāk tu tatra anumānasya pravṛttiḥ bhāva vastuni tatas navasthā sā eva syāt pramāṇa tva gatiḥ kutas na pratyakṣa anumānābhyām aparam mānam iṣyate atra ucyate svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa 
[025,iii]	svatas hi svarūpasya eva gatiḥ nna para rūpasya sākṣāt gatiḥ hi pratyakṣam sākṣātkaraṇam ca svarūpasya na para rūpasya prāpti kāla viśeṣaṇasya pramāṇatā ca prāpya padārtha avi abhicāritā na ca prāpya padārtha agrahaṇe tad sambandha grahaṇam na ca tathā anavasīyamānam pramāṇam iti avasitam bhavati puras vartti rūpā saṅgitā nu sarva jñānānām aviśiṣṭā na ca yaḥ bhāvi rūpa sambandha parigrahaḥ na api bhāvinā artha kriyā jñānena pūrvarūpa sambandha parigrahaḥ tatas svarūpa saṃvedana ātma tvāt na pratyekam sambandha parigrahaḥ na api samudāya sambhavaḥ krameṇa sādhana artha kriyā grahaṇayoḥ bhāvāt tad uttara kāla bhāvi tu smaraṇam yathā anubhavam pravarttamānam asaṃbaddham eva dvayam vikalpayati yathā anubhava parityāgāt tu tad upaplutam eva iti na tatas sambandha pratipattiḥ tatas tad sambandha agrahaṇāt paścāt api dṛṣṭa sādharmyāt katham pratipattiḥ anumānāt iti na prāmāṇya pratipatti upāyaḥ iti svarūpasya eva svatas gatiḥ na prāmāṇyasya 
[025,iv_025,vi]	atha pramāṇyam svarūpam eva bhāva pratyaya vācyasya tatas avyatirekāt tat ayuktam jñāna svarūpam prāmāṇyam prāpya rūpa samanvayi sva rūpa mātra grahaṇe tat agrāhyam iti īritam na hi jñāna svarūpam eva prāmāṇyam prāpya rūpa sambandhena tattva vyavasthāpanāt tasya ca agrahaṇam iti pratipāditam eva tatas apravṛtti nivṛttikam sva svarūpa saṃvedana mātram eva na bhadeva āda avatāraḥ tasmāt na prekṣāvadbhiḥ kvacid pravarttitavyam nam nivarttitavyam vā kutaścid 
[025,vii_025,ix]	kathantarhi prāmāṇyam apramāṇataḥ nivṛttam vyavasthāpyate prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa sāṃvyavahārikam etat iti pratipāditam saṃvyavahāraḥ ca vicāryaṃmāṇaḥ viśīryate eva tatra yadi etāvatā paritoṣaḥ tadā na kiṃcid karttavyam iti muktiḥ eva saṃsārāt tasya atyantam abhāvāt atha vyavahāra prasiddhaḥ saṃsāraḥ tathā sati pramāṇa itara vibhāgaḥ api asti eva iti na pramāṇa tva pratipādanāya yatnaḥ āstheyaḥ kiñca sāṃvyavahārikam prāmāṇyam pratipādayatā paramārthataḥ ekam eva sva saṃvedanam pratyakṣam iti uktam bhavati tathā hi yadi māna tvam adhyakṣāt anumānataḥ siddhim ṛcchati sandeham vyavahāra padam vṛthā 
[025,x]	yadi pratkṣataḥ anumānataḥ vā parisphuṭā pramāṇa tva siddhiḥ kimartham ucyate vyavahāreṇa iti tasmāt vyavahāra mātra prasiddha anumāna āśrayeṇa prasiddham sambandham āśritya tat etad artha kriyā sādhanam iti darśanena spṛśya ādi sādhanasya pratipattau pravarttate paścāt abhyāsa anumānam antareṇa api pratibhāsa mātrāt eva vṛttiḥ iti pratyakṣam api pravarttaka tvāt pramāṇam atas ucyate prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti 
[026,i_026,iii]	nanu darśanena rūpam eva upalabhyate na spṛśyam tathā varttamānam eva na bhāvi prāpyam tathā sva dṛśyatyam eva na para dṛśya tvam api tat katham anya darśanenya prāptyā pramāṇam uktam atra svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ iti kiñca vyavahārate eka tvāt pramāṇa tva vyavasthitiḥ deśa ādi abhedāt eka tvam dravyasya vyapadiśyate 
[026,iv]	uktam etat prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti tatas vyavahāra prasiddham avayavinaḥ eka tvam samāśritya yat eva dṛṣṭam tat eva prāptam iti vyavasāyāt pramāṇa tā vyavahāraḥ sa ca eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ deśa kāla ādi abhedāt tad abhedaḥ api tad sāmarthyasya sāmagrī jananāt evam bhāvi bhūtayoḥ api tad eka santāna patita tvena samāna artha kriyātaḥ ca ekatva abhimānaḥ 
[026,v_026,viii]	nanu artha kriyā prāpaka tvāt pramāṇam prāmāṇyañca kimartha kriyā ājñāpakam atha kārakam na tāvat kārakāt pramāṇam karaṇam hi tadā syāt atha jñāpaka tvāt pramāṇam ucyate tat api ayuktam jñāpakam na tad arthasya kriyā saṃdeha bhāvataḥ kādācid ka artha kriyā iti tasyāḥ jñāpaka tā kutas sādhana jñānam antareṇa api artha kriyā upalabdhā tat katham tad kāraṇam artha kriyāyāḥ tad antareṇa api bhāvinā tad kāraṇam syāt kāryasya na api jñāpakam dṛṣṭe api arthaḥ kadācid arthaṃkriyā abhāvāt na ca tad jñānam apramāṇam artha aśūnyatvāt atas kāraka tva jñāpakatva abhāve katham pramāṇam prāpakam artha kriyāyāḥ 
[026,ix_026,xiii]	atra ucyate upeye nāma sandehaḥ tāvatā na pramā na sā niścita tvāt upāyasya pramāsau kin na tāvatā na kha lūpeya sandeha parijihīrṣā sarvatra upāya niścaya mātreṇa vṛtteḥ tatas upāya niścaye sati kṛṣīvala ādi vat prāmāṇikāḥ pravarttantām tat asat yatas upeya arthitayā sarvaḥ pravarttana nivarttane karoti puruṣaḥ tasya sandehaḥ ced katham pramā 
[026,xiv_027,i]	yad artham iṣyate pramāṇantatra upeye sandehāt pramāṇam iti kā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ nanu pramāṇena arthaḥ jñāpayitavyaḥ natu artha kriyā karttavyā artha kriyā hi kutaścid sāmagrī viśeṣāt paścāt bhavantī katham jñāpayitum śakyā tat api asat yad arthaḥ eṣa prārambhaḥ tat aniṣpattiḥ eva ced asiddhaḥ sādhya sambandhaḥ katham sādhakaḥ ucyatām amutas pramāṇāt abhimata artha siddhim āsādayā iyam iti pramāṇa tā anveṣaṇa paraḥ prekṣāvān na anyathā vyasanam eva tu anyathā bhavet arthaḥ ca prakāśitaḥ yadi na artha kriyā kārī kutas tasya anarthāt taimirika upalabdha keśa ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ 
[027,ii]	atha kadācid tatra artha kriyā bhavati na taimirika ādau evantarhi tad arthī katham pravarttate na khalu sandehāt pravarttamānaḥ pramāṇāt pravṛttaḥ bhavati pramāṇam hi niścāyakam na sandeha kṛt artha kriyā kāriṇi niścayaḥ ced artha kriyā niścaye katham tathā niścayaḥ atha tena pramāṇena artha sādhana vastu darśitam artha kriyā tu yadi kutaścita vaikalyāt na bhavati na pramāṇasya asau doṣaḥ 
[027,iii_027,vi]	tat api ayuktam ajñāpaka tvam mānasya na doṣaḥ yadi dṛśyate na tasya asti aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti sarvam pramā bhavet pramīyate yena paricchidyate samīhita urthaḥ tat pramāṇam na ca ājñāpakasya pariccheda śaktiḥ iti apramāṇam tasmāt anyathā pratipadyate artha kriyā svarūpasya niścitasya avabodhanāt jñānam pramāṇam tat ātmye tad utpatti prabhāvataḥ 
[027,vii]	yat khalu artha kriyā jñānam tad artha kriyā ātma tvāt artha kriyā aṅgamayati tad artha kriyāya antat eva sādhana jñānam pūrvakantu sādhana jñānam yadi sthiratayā asau avadhṛtorthaḥ tadā pūrvakaḥ hi svabhāvaḥ bhāvinam prāpti kāle avaśyam bhāvayati iti tad prāptiḥ tatas uttaraḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvakasya svabhāvaḥ eva vastutas tatas tatra api tādātmyam eva 
[027,viii_027,ix]	athavā tad avaśyambhāvi kārya kāraṇam eva tena vyāpta tvāt kāraṇasya yat ca vyatiriktam vyāpakam tat kāraṇam eva tena vinā tad abhāvāt anutpannam katham kāraṇam utpannam api katham iti samānaḥ doṣaḥ nanu asmin sati idam bhavati asya utpādāt idam utpadyate etat atra vyāpriyate etat anena kriyate iti kārya kāraṇa bhāvam avagacchanti laukikāḥ na ca bhāvinaḥ sattā na api utpādaḥ na ca vyāpāraḥ na api kāraṇam tena avidyamāna tvāt tadānīm 
[027,x_027,xiii]	atra ucyate satta utpāda ādayaḥ bhāva svabhāva tvāt na para ātmakāḥ asmin sati iti na eva asmāt apara arthasya sambhavaḥ utpādaḥ hi na sattā svabhāvāt aparaḥ kāraṇa antara bhāvinī ced satta utpādaḥ kim anantara bhāvini eva satta utpādaḥ evam ced suptasya ciram utthitasya ye vikalpāḥ teṣām pūrva abhyāsāt utpādaḥ na syāt anantara bhāvi tva abhāvāt śarīra ādi ca kāraṇam na iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ na ca vyāpāraḥ paraḥ svabhāvāt svarūpam iti prāptam na ca kārya kāle svarūpam kālasya
[028,i_028,iii]	pūrvakasya avinā bhāvitām ātrantu bhāvini api vidyate avaśyambha avi kāryaṃsya kāraṇasya api tatas bhāvi api kāraṇam atha dṛṣṭam yat tatra vyāpakam satkāraṇan tathā pūrva bhāvi tat eva kāraṇam na bhāvi iti ceta na na dṛṣṭasya svarūpeṇa vyāpaka tvam pratīyate āropitena rūpeṇa bhāvinaḥ api bhavet idam 
[028,iv_028,vii]	dṛśyamānam hi na tāvatā vyāpakam vyāpyasya tadānīmapratīteḥ yadā ca vyāpya pratītiḥ tadā tad bhāvi bhūta rūpeṇa vyāpakam anyathā bhāvi rūpa agrahaṇe vyāpitā na syāt atha yena rūpeṇa pūrva bhāvi tvena tat dṛṣṭam tena eva tasya rūpeṇa vyāpaka tā pratīyate na bhāvi rūpeṇa tat asat bhāvi rūpā pratītau na vyāpaka tvam pratīyate prādeśikī na hi vyāptiḥ syāt vyāptiḥ sā tathā bhavet 
[028,ix]	tathā vyāpita abhāvāt bhūta bhaviṣyat kāla vyāpi tvena hi pratīyamānam kāraṇam na anyathā sā ca vyāptiḥ pūrvam dṛṣṭasya drakṣyamāṇasya api samānā drakṣyamāṇasya katham kāraṇa tvam dṛṣṭasya api tadānīm asattvāt katham iti na praśna avatāraḥ sattvāt ced drakṣyamāṇasya api sā tadā na iti etat samānam ubhayatra api pūrva tā ced kaḥ pūrva aparayoḥ svabhāve viśeṣaḥ dvayam api āropita ākāreṇa gṛhyate na apareṇa iti na bhedaḥ 
[028,x_028,xii]	atha ekam pūrvarūpa tayā dṛṣṭam āropyate aparantu drakṣyamāṇa tayā para rūpa tayā ca tena na asti dvayoḥ api kāraṇa tā iti anyonyam avinābhāvaḥ dvayoḥ api tayoḥ samaḥ avāntara viśeṣaḥ tu tatra na kva upayogavān yena vinā yat na bhavati tat tasya kāraṇam vyatirikta tve sati yathā ca kāraṇasya pūrvam bhāvam vinā na bhavati kāryan tathā avaśyaṃbhāvi kāryam kāraṇam kāryasya para bhāvam vinā na iti samānam kārya kāraṇa bhāva nibandhanam iti dvayoḥ api parasparam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ 
[028,xiii_028,xv]	samāna tvāt nimittasya kārya kāraṇa tā dvayoḥ vyāpi tva vyatirekasya para lokānumāpyataḥ na khalu vyāpitām vyatirekasya vyudasya aparam atra jagati nibandham upalamāmahe tena dvayoḥ api kārya avaśī ambha avi kārya kāraṇayoḥ parasparam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti yuktam paśyāmaḥ tasmāt kāraṇam yadi tat jñānam svabhāvaḥ vā artha janmanaḥ kāryam vā sarvaṃthā tena jñāpyate artha kriyā udayaḥ 
[028,xvi_028,xvii]	yadi sādhana jñānam artha kriyāyāḥ kāraṇam yadi svabhāvaḥ yadi kāryam sarvathā tena sambandha sambhavāt jñāpyate etat ca vyāpitāt ātmyam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ca vyavahāra prasiddhaḥ iti vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam jñāyate iti nanu yāvat pratyakṣam na bhavati sambandha sādhakam na tāvat anumānam pratyakṣeṇa hi sambandha grahaṇe anumānam prāmāṇyam sādhayati pramāṇam sat pratyakṣam sambandha grahaṇe samartha mitī taretara āśraya doṣaḥ na 
[029,ii_029,iii]	atha na anumānena prāmāṇyam sādhyate api tu artha kriyā anubhavena sa ca sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa prasiddhaḥ tatra na artha kriyā jñānam pratyakṣam sat pramāṇa tām pūrvasya gṛhṇāti na api liṅga bhūtam sat anumāpayati pratyakṣeṇa prāmāṇyasya grahaṇa abhāvāt atīta tvāt ca tad vyakteḥ na hi vyaktim vinā sāmānyam māna tvam pratyetum śakyam abhāvāt sāmānyasya tasmāt pramāṇa tāyām saṃdeha mātram sa ca artha kriyā sambandhaḥ sandigdhaḥ artha kriyā nirbhāsāt tatra saṃdehaḥ vyāvarttate eva tat api asat yatas 
[029,iv]	saṃdeha mātra vyāvṛttyā na hi kaścid pravarttate pratyakṣā niścayāt vā api dṛśyate vṛttiḥ arthinām saḥ eva artha kriyā ābhāsaḥ pratyakṣam iti ced matam pratyakṣāt eva māna tva pratipattiḥ iti iṣyatām pratyakṣāt anumānāt vā saṃdehaḥ api nivarttate viruddhasya upalabdheḥ na vinā anyasya nivarttanam yadi pratyakṣa bhāvāt sā tadā nāma nivarttayet saṃdeham tad abhāvoḥ tu tadā eva katham anyadā tad saṃdeha nivṛtyā ca na asti eva atra prayojanam pravarttana artham seṣyeta pravṛttiḥ sā ca sādhitā sarvaṃsya ca artha sambandhaḥ na jñānasya akṣa vīkṣitaḥ sāmānyena ca sambandham anumānam vyavasyati na ca aparā pramā asti iti kutas saṃdeha vicchidaḥ tatas uktam prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇe ti 
[029,xi_029,xiii]	yadi tarhi vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam pramāṇa lakṣaṇa śāstram tarhi kim artham śāstram hi nidṛ rdṛ ṣṭam api na vacana mātrāt tathā bhavati api tu vyavahāra avisaṃvādena sa ced asti vyarthakam śāstram iti āha śāstram moha nivarttanam yadi vyavahārataḥ pramāṇa svarūpam avagamyate kasmāt paraspara virodhīni lakṣaṇa śāstrāṇi tatas vyavahāre api vimatiḥ eva vyavahāriṇām tathā hi 
[029,xiv_029,xvii]	na sarvaḥ vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam avagacchati pramāṇa lakṣantena paraspara virodha vat pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇena para lokaḥ na gamyate āgamāt aparaḥ prāha iti atas na vyavahārataḥ tasmāt vyavahāra parāmarśāt śāstram moha nivarttanam pūrva aparasya asmaraṇam śāstreṇa anena vāryate 
[029,xviii_029,xx]	atas eva śāstreṇa eva sarvajña uktena mohaḥ nivarttate na anyena iti anena prakāreṇa sarvajña vacanam eva pramāṇam iti paramārthataḥ sarvajña jñānam eva pramāṇam na aparam iti parama arthaḥ anyasya na pramāṇa tvam prameya avyāpti sambhavāt avyāpitāḥ na kārya ādi sambandhasya parigrahaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi atīta anāgata varttamāna kāla deśa vyāpi sāhacarya rūpaḥ na khalu sarvajña jñānasya viṣayaḥ vartamāna sannihita deśa mātra grahaṇāt pratyakṣasya anumānasya tatra ca anavatārāt sarvaṃjña tvam katham jñāyate śāstra kārasya ca etat uttaratra vakṣayāmaḥ 
[030,i_030,ii]	ajñāta artha prakāśaḥ vā athavā idam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam prakāśyate anena iti prakāśaḥ ajñātasya arthasya prakāśakam jñānam pramāṇam sāṃvṛtantu jñānam ajñātasya arthasya na prakāśakaḥ na hi tena kaścid ajñātorthaḥ prakāśyate grahītānām eva rūpa ādīnām anena pṛthak vikalpanāt pratītya parāmarśāt tu tadā ekam iti vyavahriyate 
[030,iii_030,iv]	nanu yadi avi saṃvādanam antareṇa ajñāta prakāśanam pramāṇam dvi candra ādi ākārasi api pramāṇa tā prasaṅagaḥ na artha grahaṇāt asau hi na arthaḥ nanu artha tvam avisaṃvāde na ca jñāyate tatas ca avisaṃvādi jñānam iti tat eva lakṣaṇam iti katham lakṣaṇa antaram na sāmarthya ākṣiptasya alakṣaṇa tvāt ukta sāmarthyataḥ yasya pratītiḥ tat na lakṣaṇam tathā anyasya api vastu tva prabhṛte rlakṣaṇa artha tā 
[030,v_030,vii]	lakṣaṇam hi yat upāttam sākṣāt tat eva yena tu tad lakṣaṇam sādhyate tat api sambhavitva mātreṇa na lakṣaṇam anyathā vastu tva ādikam api bhavet atha api syāt na vastu tvam tatra upayogi sākṣāt anyathā vā avisaṃvādaḥ tu upayogi artha tva jñāpane sattyam etat tathā api ajñāna artha grahaṇena gṛhīta grāhi pratyayaḥ śakyaḥ pariharttum na avisaṃvādi grahaṇena tatra api avisaṃvāda grahaṇāt na ca avisaṃvādena artha tva gatiḥ avisaṃvāde api saṃvṛti satām artha tvasya asiddheḥ kathantarhi artha tva gatiḥ parāmarśāt iti mantavyam 
[030,viii_030,ix]	athavā artha śabdena atra parama arthaḥ ucyate ajñāta artha prakāśaḥ iti parama artha prakāśaḥ iti arthaḥ parama arthaḥ ca advaita rūpa tā tad prakāśanam eva pramāṇam tathā ca pratyaya ādi svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ iti uktañca prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇe ti tatra pāramārthika pramāṇa lakṣaṇam etat pūrvam tu sāṃvyavahārikasya yadi ajñāta artha prakāśakam pramāṇam sāmānya arthaḥ api ajñātaḥ eva prathama bhāvinā sva lakṣaṇa jñānena tad uttarāla bhāvinā prakāśyate tathā sambandha ādiḥ api iti tasya api prāmāṇyam prasajyate na ca gṛhīta grāhi tvāt smṛtiḥ eva eṣā agṛhīte smaraṇa abhāvāt 
[030,x_031,ii]	na sva lakṣaṇa vijñānam sāmānyam gṛhṇadīṣyate grahaṇāt agṛhītasya prāptā sāmānya vid pramā tat eva āha svarūpa adhigateḥ param prāptam sāmānya vijñānam pramāṇam iti sambandha arthaḥ sva saṃvedanena ca sāmānyam jñāna ātma bhūtam pratīyate iti atra avivādaḥ eva tatas yadi para bhūtam jñānāt sāmānyam arthābhūtam sarvathā tat jñānam prāptam na atra ucyate avijñāte sva lakṣaṇe yat jñānam iti abhiprāyāt sva lakṣaṇa vicārataḥ 
[031,iii]	sati api agṛhīta grahaṇe sāmānya jñānasya na pramāṇa tā kiṅa kāraṇam avijñāte sva lakṣaṇe yat jñānam tat eva pramāṇam abhipretam na sāmānye api ajñāta sāmānya jñānam na pramāṇam api tu ajñāta sva lakṣaṇa jñānam kutas etat sva lakṣaṇa vicārataḥ asti na asti iti vā vyavasthāpana artham pramāṇam prekṣāvatāpekṣyate sa ca astinā asti iti vā vicāraḥ sva lakṣaṇasya eva na sāmānyasya tatra puruṣāṇām anādarāt yatra ca vicāraṇā tatra tad uttara kālam tad svabhāvam vā prapadyate pramāṇam iti na sāmānye vṛttiḥ pramāṇasya iti na tatra pramāṇam 
[031,iv]	atha sāmānyānavabodhe katham tat eva idam iti jñātvā pravartate na sāmānyānavabodhe api atyanta abhyāsāt pravarttanāt atha tatra api sāmānyam eva pravarttakam ajñātasya pravarttaka tva ajñānāt jñāne api tasya yadi sva lakṣaṇam na jñāyate na pravarttate sva lakṣaṇa jñāne tu sāmānya aparicchede api abhyāsāt tatas tatra apravarttaka tvāt dunmukha tva abhāvāt ca na sāmānye jñānam pramāṇam 
[031,v_031,vii]	bhavatu vā pravarttaka tvam tathā api tad unmukha tva abhāvāt na tatra pramāṇam sva saṃvedanena tu grahaṇe sva lakṣaṇam eva tat iti sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva pramāṇam yadā tu punar advaitam tadā na sāmānyam tatra ca sva lakṣa pratipatteḥ ūrdhvam anyat vā iti vyapadeśaḥ avid na vidyate vidasya iti avid kva jñāte sva lakṣaṇe tat jñānam iti na khalu pūrva uttara bhāve pramāṇam yena sva lakṣaṇa jñānāt uttara kālam etat iti vilakṣaṇa tā vā pratīyate sva lakṣaṇam eva atra sarvatra jñāne pratīyate na ca bhedaḥ iti 
[031,viii]	kimarthantarhi pratyakṣa anumāna bhedaḥ bāhya vijñāna bhedaḥ ca bhagavatā nirddiṣṭaḥ saṃkleśa vyavadāne ca iti āha abhiprāyāt avisaṃvādāt ca vineya jñāna abhiprāyāt tam apekṣya sva saṃvedanam eva ekam pratyakṣam pramāṇam na aparam prapañca vineya anurodhāt yathā yathā vineyānām tattva mārga anupraveśaḥ sambhavī tathā tathā bhagavataḥ deśanā iti na virodhaḥ kutas etat sva lakṣaṇa vicārataḥ vicāryamāṇam hi sakalam eva viśīryate na advaitāt aparantattvam asti tat eva krameṇa bhagavatā vicāryate akrameṇa vicārayitum aśakyatvāt 
[031,ix_032,i]	atha bahis viparivartamānasya katham sva saṃvedana tā na etat asti bahis antar iti jñānam deśa kāla ādi apekṣaṇāt svarūpa vyatirekeṇa deśa kāla vasaṅgatau etat ca paścāt darśayiṣyate bhagavataḥ tarhi katham prāmāṇyam pratyakṣa anumayoḥ hi vyavahāra mātreṇa prāmāṇyam na bhagavataḥ tat hi param pramāṇam 
[032,ii_032,viii]	atra ucyate tadvat pramāṇam bhagavān tathāgataḥ hi bhagavān tat vāniti kṛtvā pratyakṣa rūpaḥ eva bhagavān pramāṇam paścāt pratipādayiṣyate kutas etat pratīyate tat āha abhūta vinivṛttaye bhūta uktiḥ sādhana apekṣā tatas yuktā pramāṇa tā bhrānti nivṛtti artham yatas tasya bhagavataḥ bhūtoktiḥ tatas saḥ eva sarvajñaḥ na aparaḥ tathā ca pramāṇam āha ca sādhana apekṣā tatas yuktā pramāṇa tā bhagavataḥ eva na vedasya vedasya hi na kiñcid artha sambandhe pramāṇam asya tu bhūtoktiḥ eva pramāṇam pramāṇa viṣaye anyatra tu vakṣyāmaḥ athavā paramārthataḥ tadvat at vaita avabodhāt eva pramāṇam bhagavān api na sarva artha parijñānataḥ sarva artha parijñānantu loka vyavahāreṇa sāṃvṛtam eva tathā ca uktam advayam yānam uttamam 
[032,ix_032,xi]	nanu yadi pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ apramāṇa tvāt sarvajñaḥ eva pramāṇam tadā nityaḥ eva īśvara ādikaḥ jñātā pramāṇam vedaḥ vā nityaḥ pramāṇam tatas kim anya anveṣaṇena iti āha nittyam pramāṇat a eva asti prāmāṇyāt vastu saṅgateḥ jñeya anittya tayā tasyāḥ adhrauvyāt kramajanmanaḥ nittyāt utpatti viśleṣāt apekṣāyāḥ ayogaḥ na khalu sadā sthāyi nityam pramāṇam asti pramāṇa abhāvāt kiñca vastu sataḥ gatiḥ pramāṇam na yasya kasya cit na ca vastu sarvadā vidyate yena gateḥ sarvadā bhāvaḥ tatas jñeya anityatayā tasyāḥ api adhrauvyam 
[032,xii_032,xiii]	nanu jñeyā anittya tayā jñānam anittyam iti kutas jñeya rūpe vyāpāraḥ vā pramāṇa tvam jñeya rūpāt utpattiḥ tad svabhāva tā vā iti na pakṣa antara sambhavaḥ atra vyāpṛtasya avyāpṛtasya vā yadi na viśeṣaḥ katham vyāpāra itara vivekaḥ atha darppaṇa sthānīyam tat yaḥ yaḥ eva arthaḥ sannihitaḥ saḥ eva pratibhātī ti ced artham eva tarhi sva sāmagrītaḥ tathā bhavati na jñātuḥ vyāpāraḥ 
[033,i_033,iv]	atha niścala unmiṣita locanaḥ api samāpatata ūrthān krameṇa paśyati na kadācid apara apara vilakṣaṇa vyāpāra rūpa tā para upalakṣyate tathā tasya api atra ucyate vyāpāraḥ cakṣuṣaḥ tatra api anvaya vyatirekataḥ na anvaya vyatireki tvam sthāṇoḥ nityasya vidyate tasmāt arthaḥ eva ayambhūtaḥ na asya grahaṇe vyāpāraḥ kasyacid iti katham pramāṇam 
[033,v_033,viii]	atha saḥ arthaḥ bhavatu pramāṇam sa tu tad sambandhī iti tena jñātaḥ ucyate na etat upapannam yatas sambandhaḥ nvaya pūrveṇa vyatirekeṇa sidhyati nittyasya avyatirekasya kutas sambandha sambhavaḥ na khalu nittyam avyatirekam kvacid upayogī iti śakyam vijñātum atha tena darśanāt upayogaḥ na tu tat eva idam paricoditam kathantena iti tasmin sati tathābhūtam iti tena iti ucyate ākāśa ādiṣu api tat iti katham saḥ eva draṣṭā ākāśasya tad artha nirdeśa abhāvāt saḥ eva draṣṭā na ākāśa ādiḥ 
[033,ix^1]	nirdeśaḥ vacanam tasmāt etat eva kutas matam sarvathā a vyatireke ca kāraṇa tvam na budhyate atīta anāgataḥ yorthaḥ sa katham pratibhāsate atīta tvena vijñānam iti atītam katham bhavet na ca darpaṇa saṃkrāntiḥ atīta ādeḥ kathat na ca pratibhāsaḥ tathābhūtaḥ darppaṇe sati sambhavī pratibhāsaḥ na nityasya kāryām iti uditam puras ākāśa ādeḥ api prāptam tad artha grahaṇan na kim sarva artha darśane tasya vacasaḥ arthaḥ kaḥ ucyate tad anantara bhāvi tvam niyatam ced na gamyate sarva artha darśana āyātaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya vācakaḥ vivakṣā niyamaḥ nāma na nittyasya upapattimān vivakṣāḥ tāḥ pṛthak bhūtāḥ darśanāni tathā pṛthak 
[033,ix^2]	 kanā eka tā bhavat draṣṭu : pramāṇam sa ca vaḥ katham vivakṣitasya dṛśyasya saḥ eva grāhakaḥ yadi vivakṣita tad anyasya katham ekatas udgrahaḥ pratyakṣa anumayoḥ evam eka tā kena na ucyate paramārthataḥ eka tvam tayoḥ api matam yadi krameṇa yugapad vā api na bheda usti tayoḥ api krameṇa eva ika rūpa tvam pramāṇena pratīyate tena anyena ca yat vastu jñātra eka tve na mīyate tat ekam iti kim sattyam asattya tve vṛthā vacaḥ atha api sa svayam jñātrā sarvathā ātma avagamyate kena eṣa gamyatām evam iti vāc mātram eva saḥ na sva saṃvedanāt anyat iti pūrvam prasādhitam tatas na parama artha usau īśvaraḥ na api saṃvṛtiḥ 
[033,xxii_033,xxiv]	atha api syāt yadi api jñānam jñeya anittya tayā va nittyam yaḥ tu jñātā sa nittyaḥ na ca anyasya anittya tvenyasya api tat iti yuktam ucyate kramajanmanaḥ jñānasya jñeya anitya tvena nityāt utpatti viśleṣāt nittyāt utpatteḥ ayogāt nittyam vyāpi ca ākāśa kalpam na kasyacid kāraṇam iti pratipāditam tena eva ca svarūpeṇa yadi janayati sarvadā janayet viśeṣa abhāvāt viśeṣe ca anittya tvam 
[034,i]	atha aviśeṣe api saha kāri bhāvābhyām kāryasya kramaḥ iti ced na apekṣāyāḥ upayogāt yadi sahakāriṇām eva anvaya vyatireki tvam teṣām eva kāraṇa tvat na tu tasya tasya api tad apekṣayā kāraṇa tvam iti na yuktam apekṣamāṇasya tad itara avasthayoḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt apekṣaka tvam na pratīyate svayam apareṇa vā iti vacana mātrāt yadi param etat pratyeyam atas eva āha 
[034,ii_034,v]	apekṣāyāḥ ayogataḥ nittyam hi sadā eka rūpam apekṣyamāṇena upakarttum na śakyam na hi tatra anupakāriṇaḥ tena apekṣyatām evantarhi anittyam bhaviṣyati pramāṇam na tu dāna ādi sādhana apekṣam vairāgya eśva rya yogasya pūrva pūrva sa jāti kāraṇāt utpatteḥ na tat kadācid anyathābhūtam sat anyathā utpattimat atra ucyate kathañcid na upakārya tvāt anittyevya pramāṇa tā 
[034,vi]	anittye api īśvare na asti pramāṇa tā na tat pramāṇam kutas etat kathañcid na upakārya tvāt yaḥ hi kathañcid kenacid upakriyate upahanyate vā tasya rāga ādi anubhave rāga ādi pratipakṣau abodha ādi sambhave tad deśanā sattva snehena karuṇayā ca deśanā sambhavāt pramāṇantat bhavati lokasya na svarūpa sattā mātrāt na ca tasya iyam vyutpattiḥ na hi akhaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍitaḥ bhavati 
[034,vii_034,viii]	atha svabhāva asit hintasya sakala parijñānam ayuktam etat rāga ādīnām ananubhave katham saṃsāra prapaṃcasva lakṣaṇa avabodhaḥ anubhave saṃsārya iva asau iti katham pramāṇa tā na rāga ādi avabodhāt eva rāga ādi prapaṃca pratipakṣa deśanā rāga ādi yogaḥ eva sarvajña tā avināśitā atula śakti yogaḥ ca iti saḥ eva pramāṇam tat api ayuktam 
[034,ix_034,xii]	rāga ādi pratipakṣasya deśān āvyartha tā bhavet rāga ādi yoge api yadi bhavet aiśvartham acyutam atha vastu vṛttam etat na rāga ādi yogi tām aiśvarya sambhavaḥ tatas tad pratipakṣa deśana iti yadi evam bhāvanā bhāvāt vairāgya ādeḥ asambhavaḥ ākasmikantasya kutas tad aiśvarya ādi sidhyatu na hi yat vairāgya ādi pratipakṣa bhāvanātaḥ bhavati iti jñāyate tat anyathā api bhavati iti jñāyate 
[034,xiii_034,xvi]	kiṃca vara pradāna śaktiḥ sā vidyate tasya na īdṛśī yena anuṣṭhāna rahitaḥ dadāti aiśvaryam arthini atha na asti eva sā śaktiḥ tasya anyā api katham bhavet anugrahītum śaktā iti prāptā tatra apramāṇa tā ayam api arthaḥ anitye api apramāṇa tā na vidyate pramāṇam asminnitya pramāṇantasya bhāvaḥ apramāṇa tā na tatra pramāṇam asti iti yāvat 
[034,xvii_034,xix]	atha ārādhana krameṇa rāga ādi upaśama prakāreṇa anugraha kāryasau dharmma upadeśena anugrahasya anyathā karttum aśakyatvāt tat asat yatas tad ukta anuṣṭhitau loka anugrahaḥ kena gamyate tad ukta āgama mātrā cced evam anyonya saṃśrayaḥ āgama ūsau tad ukta tvāt āgamāt ca tad ukta tā anyonya āśrayataḥ tatra katham ekatara sthitiḥ 
[035,ii_035,viii]	kiṃca īdṛśī tasya sā śaktiḥ kāraṇāt kutas āgatā svabhāvaḥ eṣa tasya iti kutas etat pratīyatām nanu īdṛśī tasya śaktiḥ sarva darśana anugrāhaka rūpā kutas kāraṇāt āgatā atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam yatas evam bhavanti iti ced tathā hi idam evam na ca iti etat kasya paryanuyojyatām agniḥ dahati na ākāśam kotra paryanuyojyatām tat etat asat atyantam svabhāva idhyakṣataḥ siddhe paraiḥ paryanuyujyate tatra uttaram idam vācyam na dṛṣṭenupapanna tā 
[035,ix]	na tu adṛśye tathā hi atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam iti kaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddham etat katham etat iti na paryanuyogasya viṣayaḥ yathā pratyakṣeṇa upalabdhaḥ vahniḥ dāhyam dahana na paryanuyojyate kathandahati iti yadi bhūta tvena vyoma api dahet atha svabhāvāt pratiniyatāt tadā īśvaraḥ api sakala guṇa hetu vikalaḥ guṇavān iti samānam na samānam dṛṣṭa tvāt agneḥ aparasya ca viparyayāt iti na idam uttaram anyathā yat ki kiṃcat ātma abhimata vidhauva nya niruttaraḥ tatra kṛtam tas tad uttaram vastu svabhā vairi ha vācyam ittham tathā uttaram syāt vijayī samastaḥ tasmāt anittyepi api śabdāt nittye api apramāṇa tā iti sūktam
