[035,x_035,xii]	nanu asti pramāṇam sthitvā pravṛttim saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādayaḥ kārya ātmānaḥ katham kāryāt kāraṇasya aprasiddha tā anyathā anyasya api karaṇasya anumānam na syāta tathā hi yat vastu sthitvā sthitvā pravarttate abhimata sādhanāya tat buddhimat kāraṇa adhiṣṭhānāt yathā vā asya ādi dvaidhīkaraṇa ādau na khalu vā asya ādayaḥ svayam eva pravarttante pravarttane vā sadā pravarttanam bhavet sthitvā ca pravarttanama bhimatam prekṣāvatā kenacid pravarttakena bhavitavyam yathāyatnam sam sthāna viśeṣa pārimāṇḍati ādi yogi tad cetanā vat utpāditam tat yathā ghaṭa ādikam tathā yad artha kriyā kāri tad cetanā vat padārtha preritam tat yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ atra āha 
[035,xiii_036,ii]	sthitvā pravṛtti saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādiṣu iṣṭa siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ vā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayothavā ye ete kārya hetu tvena abhimatāḥ sthitvā pravṛtti ādayaḥ na ete samyak hetavaḥ yatas eṣu satsu api iṣṭasya eva siddhiḥ siddha sādhanam na ca siddhaḥ pakṣaḥ bhavati iti asiddhasya pakṣa tvāt yatra hi vivādaḥ tad sādhanāya sādhana upanyāsaḥ yuktaḥ karmma lakṣaṇa cetanā adhiṣṭhitam ca sakalam iṣyate yatas karmma jam loka vaicitryam cetanā mānasam ca tat nanu karmmajam eva iti na sādhyate karmma vyatirikta īśvara cetana adhiṣṭhita tvasya sādhanāt tathā ca āha tat ca īśvara codanā abhivyaktāt dharmmāt eva na ca īśvara codanā adhiṣṭhita karmma pūrvaka tva sādhane siddha sādhanam 
[036,iii]	na etat asti karmmam ced cetanā rūpam asti tadā para cetanā sādhanam vyartham tat kila acetanam tat pravarttitum aśaktam idantat iti nirūpya pravṛtti darśanāt tatas svayam vā nirūpya pravartitavyam nirūpaka preraṇayā gati antara abhāvāt tatra acetanānām svayam nirūpaṇa abhāvāt para nirūpaṇam api yadi na syāt apravarttanam eva prasaktam tasmāt prerakena cetanāvata anyena bhavitavyam iti abhiprāyaḥ tatra 
[036,iv_036,viii]	cetanā karmma rūpā eva pravṛtteḥ yadi kāraṇam nirūpaṇe api na param tat nirūpaṇam iṣyate tathā ca asiddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ cetanā vat kṛta tve api na īśvareṇa ghaṭa ādayaḥ kṛtāḥ prayojana abhāvāt anyathā īśaḥ api sa īśvaraḥ svasyām arthaṃkriyāyām iti anavasthā pravarttate atha pravarttate saḥ api kulāla ādiḥ pravarttitaḥ ajñānāt īśvaraḥ tad jñaḥ na sonyena pravarttitaḥ ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśoyama ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svarggam vā śvabhram eva vā 
[036,x_036,xiii]	ajñaḥ hi cetanāvān api nirūpaṇa asamarthaḥ sa ghaṭa ādi vat apareṇa nirūpaṇa asamartha tvāt apareṇa preryate na īśvaraḥ tasya nirūpaṇa asamartha tvāt iti na anavasthā tat api asat karttṛ tva siddhau sarvajña tva siddhiḥ punar tatas karttṛ tvam iti avasthāyām atra anyonya āśrayaḥ mahān yadi hi sarvasya karttā asau iti prasidhyati parameśvaraḥ tadā asya syāt sarvajña tā na anyathā sarvajña tā yāñca preraka tvam anyathā tasya api aparaḥ prerakaḥ iti sā eva anavasthā 
[036,xiv_036,xv]	kiñca yadi asau sarvajñaḥ kim ajñam janam asat vi avahāre pravarttayati vivekavantaḥ hi sat upadeśa dāyinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ sa tu viparyaya pravṛttam api janam janayati tat katham pramāṇam atha upadeśam asau santam eva karoti tena pramāṇam adharmmakāriṇantu phalam asat anubhāvayati tatas ucita phala dāyī vivekavān eva 
[036,xvi_037,i]	tat api asat yasmāt adharmma karaṇe api eṣa varttayati eva janminaḥ ayuktam kārayitvā asau katham yukte pravarttayet prathamantā vat pāpaḥ eva pravarttayati tatas tad vyāvarttanāya dharmmaḥ iti kā iyam prekṣā pūrvam kāriteśvarasya tat idam āyātam prakṣālya parityakṣyāmi iti atha pāpe pravarttayati tad karmma adhiṣṭhitaḥ eva asau tathā sati prekṣā kriyā hāniḥ tat api karmma kasmāt kārayati iti samānaḥ prasaṃgaḥ 
[037,ii_037,vi]	atha adharmmam asau na kārayati adharmma kāriṇantu tat phalam anubhāvayati tat amyeśvara vat tat api asāram aśaktyā anyā īśvarāḥ pāpa pratiṣedham na kurvate sa tu atyantam aśaktebhyaḥ vyāvṛttam atiḥ iṣyate atha aśaktaḥ eva asau tathā sati na īśvareṇa kṛtam sarvam iti vaktavyam uccakais pāpa vat sva artha kāri tvāt dharmma ādiḥ api kintataḥ 
[037,vii_037,viii]	kiñca adharmmasya phalam bhuṃkte lokaḥ kim na īśvarāt vinā vinā api yadi kaḥ tasya kāraṇa tvam prakalpayet atha tasmāt vinā adharmmaṃphalam bhuṃkte na kaścana prekṣāvān katham etasmin pravartteta nirarthake kriḍā arthā tasya vṛttiḥ ced prekṣā pūrva kriyā kutas ekasya kṣaṇikā tṛptiḥ anyaḥ prāṇauḥ viyujyate 
[037,xii_037,xvi]	kiñca śāstra antarāṇi sarvāṇi yadi īśvara vikalpataḥ sattya asattyā upadeśasya pramāṇam dānataḥ katham sakala śāstra lakṣaṇa paraspara virodha bādhita sattya asattyā upadānāḥ deśāḥ dasau pramāṇam iti mahat adbhūtam prāmāṇika tvañca atha na sakala śāstra artha kriyā tadā śāstra antara vat eva na īśvareṇa sarvam vyadhāyi atha dharma adharmma prerita ūsau sakalam eva karoti na anyathā padārtha sambhavaḥ tathā sati sarve eva ātmā prākṛta janānām dharmma adharmma ādi preraṇāt eva kariṣyati iti vyartham īśvara kalpanam 
[037,xvii_037,xxii]	sarvasya karttā na ātmā ced sarvasya iti yadi iṣyate tasya sarvasya karttṛ tvam kva upayogam prayāsyati sarvaiḥ eva ātmabhiḥ sarva karaṇe kim prahīyate tathā bahubhiḥ ekasya bahūnām ca ekatas kriyā atha ekaḥ eva sarvasya kārakaḥ kaścid iṣyate sarvajña tā anyathā na syāt iti na anyasya karttṛ tā pradhāna bhūtaḥ karttā sauvara prāptiḥ tata ūrthinām na hi sarvajña tā mātrāt asaśas ktaḥ sevyate paraiḥ tat api asat 
[037,xxiii]	artha anartha kriyā śaktaḥ guḍa gorasa kārakaḥ sarvajñaḥ api na sevya tvam prayāti anupakārataḥ sarvajña tve prasiddhe ca śakta tve sarva kārakaḥ sarva kāraka tāyāḥ ca tasya sarvaṃjñatā punar asarvajñasya karttṛ tve darśane sarva vid katham tasmāt dṛṣṭāntataḥ sidhyet tathā ced prekṣata akṣatiḥ na ca ajña tā kulāla ādeḥ sva kāryyesti vṛthā īśvaraḥ karmmaṃsāmarthya siddhau ca na upayogaḥ katham kriyā jānānaḥ api kulāla ādiḥ preryamāṇaḥ yadi kṣamaḥ īśvaraḥ api tathā anyena preryaḥ syāt aviśeṣatas atha sarvajña tā siddhim ātmanā ubhilaṣan asau sarvasya prerakaḥ jātaḥ tat etat kena gamyatām 
[038,ii_038,iii]	kiñca svayam nirūpya yaḥ karttā tatra ākārakaḥ īśvaraḥ īśvarāt eva sarvasya buddhiḥ iti apramāṇakam hetu tvam upadeśa ādeḥ upadeṣṭuḥ tad anyatas upadeśaḥ iti anādi tvāt samāptam sarvam īhitam tasmāt sthitvā pravṛttānām īśvara preraṇam kutas pradhāna puruṣa ādīn āt na atas karttṛ tva niścayaḥ 
[038,vi_038,vii]	saṃsthāna saṅgata tvāt iti ca ayam api ahetuḥ na hi saṃsthānam sakalam eva puruṣa pūrvakam dṛṣṭam bīja ādi kāraṇa viśeṣa mātreṇa api tasya dṛṣṭeḥ vṛkṣa ādi saṃsthāna vat tatra yathā vṛkṣa ādīnām hi saṃsthānam acit hetu samanvayi tathā ghaṭa ādi tadvat syāt pradhāna ādya pravarttitam yathā hi bījam utpannam vṛkṣataḥ vṛkṣa kāraṇam tathā ghaṭaḥ api mṛd piṇḍāt ghaṭa ādeḥ apravarttitāt kulāla ādiḥ punar tasya sākṣī satatam iṣyate śarīra varṇṇa saṃsthānam anyatas tādṛś udbhavāt 
[038,x_038,xii]	na kulāla ādiḥ tasya saṃsthāna ādeḥ janakaḥ na khalu bīja vijātīyam saṃsthānam utpādayitum vṛkṣasya su śikṣitaḥ api cetanāvān samarthaḥ nanuna mṛd piṇḍasya saṃsthānam kulālaḥ utpādayan upalabhyate na mṛd piṇḍasya api tādṛśa tvāt tādṛś varṇṇa saṃsthāna rūpaḥ eva mṛd piṇḍaḥ yathā vaṭa bījam vaṭa vṛkṣa varṇṇa saṃsthāna vat tat api katham iti ced atra ucyate varṇṇa saṃsthāna rūpa tvam bīje yadi na śaktitas kārye kutas tat āyātam bīja hetoḥ abhāvataḥ īśvaraḥ tasya karttā ced bījāt kin na tad anyatas iti pūrvam pratikṣiptam hetuḥ tasya īśvaraḥ katham 
[038,xiv]	bīja kāraṇam hi vṛkṣaḥ tadānīm bīja kāla kārye na asti tatas na tasya saṃsthā kāraṇa tvam na api īśvarasya vijātīya vṛkṣa kāraṇa vījāt asaṃbhāvāt īśvarasya tad kāraṇa tve kim iti na vijātīya bījāt api tat vṛkṣa saṃsthānam tasmāt śakti rūpeṇa vidyamānam eva vṛkṣa bīje vṛkṣa saṃsthānam āvirbhavati yathā andhakāra vyavasthitaḥ bāla dārakaḥ pradīpāt tathā mṛd piṇḍāt api saṃsthānam āvirbhaṃvati kulālāt kulālasya api ghaṭa ādi vidhāne saṃsthānam śakti rūpeṇa saṃsthitam saṃsthānāt eva tatas kulāla ādiḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣi bhūtaḥ eva upabhoktā na tasya vyāpāraḥ kaścid tad apubhoga icchayā tathā tathā śakti rūpasya pradhānasya pravṛtteḥ tathā ca āha 
[038,xv_038,xvi]	puruṣa upabhoga sidhi artham pradhānasya pravarttanam sāmājikā artha siddhi artham naṭaraṅga kriyā yathā tatas ca buddhimat kāraṇa viparyayasya prasiddhiḥ atha prati puruṣam ātmanām bhedāt apareṇa rāga ādi rahitena ātmanā sarveṣām īśvareṇa bhavitavyam anyathā pratiniyata varṇṇaṃsaṃsthāna ādayaḥ saṃsāri puruṣāṇām kena upadarśitāḥ yatra upabhoga icchyā pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ uktam atra 
[038,xvii_039,ii]	yathā sāmājikānām anādi upadeśa darśanāt didṛkṣā vinivṛti artham naṭasya nāṭaka prayogaḥ tathā saṃsāri puruṣāṇam api kṣīrasya katham ajñātvā vatsa vṛddhyai pravarttanam tathā idam api kim na iṣṭam pradhānasya pravarttanam tasmāt paryaṃvasāne sukha ādi arthita rūpa tā darśanāt sukha ādi rūpeṇa sakalasya kāraṇena bhavitavyam tāvatā parisamāptam iti na īśvara siddhiḥ a yuktañcaiṃtat aprekṣā pūrvaka tvasya padārtheṣu upalabdhitaḥ acetana tu antat hetoḥ iti yukti vidām nayaḥ aprekṣāvat padārthānām kāraṇam na na yuktimat chāga ādīnām purīṣa ādeḥ varttulīkaraṇena kim 
[039,iv_039,vi]	pradhānam eva tarhi kāraṇam bhaviṣyati iti sāṃkhyāḥ : atra idam ucyate anvayaḥ ced sukha ādīnām vastu tvāt cetana tvataḥ puruṣāṇām tatas tattvam kāraṇam na kim iṣyate na tu varṇṇa ādi saṃsthānam pradhānasya asti bhāvikam varṇṇa ādi kārya karaṇam pradhānasya matam katham atha api śakti rūpeṇa sarvam atra upagamyate sarva śakti ātmakam vastu pradhānam iti kathyate tasya adṛṣṭasya tādṛś ca kāraṇatva anumāna vat kārya hi kārya antarataḥ kārya tvāt anya kārya vat 
[039,x_039,xi]	na khalu kāraṇam akāraṇam upalabhyate tatas upalabdha rūpa anusaraṇena eva kāraṇa kalpanā atha bhedānām anvayāt anvayinā kenacid tad rūpeṇa kāraṇena bhavitavyam kāraṇasya tu na kenacid anvayaḥ iti katham anvayasya aparam kāraṇam ghaṭa śarāva ādīnām hi bhede mṛd rūpā anvayāt eka mṛd piṇḍa pūrvaṃka tā na tu mṛd piṇḍasya aparamṛd piṇḍa pūrva katā eka tvāt mṛd piṇḍasya mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādīnām api aparam ekam yāvat ekam eva antenvayi 
[039,xii_039,xv]	tat api asat uktam sattva ādīnām puruṣāṇāñca aparam kāraṇam prāptam bhavatu tarhi ekam eva kim api kāraṇam tat api asat triguṇa ādi rūpa tā tasya pradhānasya na sidhyati vastu tvena anvayāt vastu kāraṇam kim api īkṣyatām vastu vastu iti anvayāt kāryāṇām vastu rūpa tā kāraṇasya na ca mṛd ā ādi rūpāt aparā vastu rūpa tā tatas mṛd ādi rūpa tā eva kāraṇasya prāptā tathā sati sarva ātmakam pradhānam iti prāptam 
[039,xvi_039,xix]	na etat asti kāraṇa anugatam kāryam svarūpeṇa na sarvathā anyathā bhūta vahnayādeḥ dhūma ādiḥ dṛśyatenyathā kāraṇam hi tat tasya yat yat anvaya vyatirekau anuvarttate na tu tad rūpam tathā ca vahneḥ dhūmaḥ megha ādibhyaḥ jalam iti tatra na asti sarūpa tā iti na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ syāt atha tatra api asti sarūpam kim api kāraṇam tathābhūta kārya tvāt eva anumīyatām anumīyatām yadi sārūpyeṇa kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya pratibandhosti na ca asti vyāpteḥ abhāvāt yena vyabhicāraḥ tasya api pakṣīkaraṇam iti ced evantarhi na kiñicat anaikāntikam nāma syāt yena yena vyabhicāraḥ tam eva pakṣīkuryāt iti tasmāt anavasthā prasaṅgāt asat etat 
[040,i_040,iv]	atha api ucyate karmmaṇām pariṇāmoyam iti siddham idam kutas anvaya vyatireki tvam karmmaṇaḥ api na vidyate na khalu karmmā api śubha aśubha ādi kam asya jagataḥ vaicitryasya kāraṇam iti jñāyate āstānta avat etat iti anyat ucyate yat uktam rāgāt imān api sakala śakti yuktaḥ bhaviṣyati tatas krīḍā ādi artham jagat vaicitrya karaṇam tatra ucyate 
[040,v]	ajñānām rāgiṇām krīḍā rasaḥ śuddha ātmanām na hi kicinnmātra viśuddhyā api nāryaḥ krīḍāsu varttate naraka ādi bhayāt anyaḥ nāryaḥ krīḍāsu varttate tasya tu etat bhayam na asti kasmāt tābhyaḥ nivarttate rāga ādibhyaḥ yadā duḥkham naraka ādiṣu varttate tasya tat na asti kena idam bhavataḥ suhṛdā ucyate bhāvanātaḥ samudbhūtā vāsī candana kalpanā naraka ādi bhayam duḥkhan na bādhataḥ iti sthitiḥ evam eva tad udbhūtam iti yuktam idat na ca svābhāvika tve tat tasya jagat svābhāvikam bhavet 
[040,x_040,xii]	tasya eva ekasya tat idam vyaktam īśvara ceṣṭitam kiṃca īśvarāt īśvara tvasya prāptiḥ tasya api sā anyatas tad anyasya api sā anyasmāt na svābhāvikaḥ īśvaraḥ utkarṣa usti guṇānām ced śakra brahma tva sambhave īśvara tvam api prāptam na asti nittyeśvara sthitiḥ atha etat api na asti eva saṃsārī na īśvaraḥ tatas atra yasya pratikṣepaḥ tasya anyatra api kā kṣamā 
[040,xv_040,xvi]	yaḥ hi grāmam eva muṣṇāti sādhu jana samavāye tasya araṇye trāṇā sambhavini kā kṣamā tathā yaḥ tāratamya sambhavinyām avasthāyām tad anugamane prakarṣa sambhavam pratyācakṣīta tasya niranugame vastuni na pratikṣepaḥ iti kaḥ evam pratyeti tasmāt saṃsthāna saṅgamāt bhāvāḥ kṛtā kartrā iti sidhyati ahetu guṇa yuktasya kutas eva tu siddha tā 
[040,xvii_040,xix]	guṇa tāratamya darśaṃnāda bhi yoga viśeṣāt sāmarthya sambhavaḥ prāc asamarthānām api pakṣāt iti yuktam etat atyanta vilakṣaṇasya tu svabhāva siddha sāmarthya ātmanā ūnugama rahitasya sādhana asambhavaḥ eva kiṃca saṃsthānam hi nāma idam vastu vṛttena siddhimat bhrānti mātrasya sadbhāvāt paramāṇavaḥ eva te 
[040,xx_041,i]	na khalu paramāṇubhyaḥ vyatiricyamāna śarīram dravya āśritam asti paramāṇavaḥ eva kevalāḥ tatas vaidharmyeṇa paramāṇavaḥ iti katham ucyate atha loka pratīti mātra vyavasthāpitam tat upādīyate tat api ayuktam kalpanā racita mātrasya asādhana tvāt atha paramāṇavaḥ eva tena rūpeṇa ucyante tathā sati paramāṇavaḥ api kāryāḥ eva tatas kāryaṃtvādeva iti ayam eva hetuḥ upanyāsa arhaḥ atha tatra abhūta bhrānti janakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva tathā ucyante evantarhi 
[041,ii]	paramāṇavaḥ sva rūpeṇa avabhāsante yadi bhāvataḥ īśvarasya katham buddhiḥ saṃsthāna karaṇam mama nirūpya karaṇantasya yadi na asti iti bhaṇyate sarvajña tā kathantasya nirūpya karaṇe sati para upagamanena atha saṃsthānasya nirūpaṇam svayam apratipannasya para upagamanam kutas atha avayavi sadbhāvāt idam uttaram ucyate nirūpayiṣyate paścāt etat atyanta durghaṭam 
[041,vi]	athavā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayaḥ tena eva īśvareṇa saṃśayaḥ anaikāntika tā saṃsthānasya asiddha tvāt sva rūpam eva artha kriyā kāri hetu tvena upādīyate tat ca tathā svarūpam īśvarasya api iti tena ev na ekāntaḥ na hi saḥ īśvaraḥ sthitvā sthitvā pravarttate artha kriyā kārī vā anyena preryamāṇaḥ atha asau svayam eva śaktaḥ tatas pareṇa na preryate kulāla ādayaḥ api yatra śaktāḥ pareṇa preryante iti ayuktam eva te asamarthāḥ eva iti ced dṛṣṭasya samartha tvena katham asāmarthyam tasya api tarhi dṛṣṭasya anumānena samartha tā asti anumānena apara anumāne na kulālasya sāmarthyam kevalasya iti ced īśvarasya apara īśvara anumānam iti anavasthā 
[041,vii_041,xi]	kiṃca saṃsthānam paramāṇūnām na asti iti etat kutas matam tattvāt eva iti ced etat kutas tattvam pratīyatām na hi paramāṇūnām parama aṇu tvam evaṃvidham avagatam yena saṃsthāna abhāvaḥ atha evam ucyate yat sthūlam tad avayava upacaya pūrvakam yathā aneka vindu sama āhāra rūpaḥ jala saṃghātaḥ dvi aṇuka paryantam ca sthūlantatoneka saṃghāta rūpam iti paramāṇu siddhiḥ tat api asat 
[041,xii]	aṣṭāṇukāt param rūpam asti iti kutas gatiḥ etat aṣṭa aṇukam rūpam anyathā vā iti kā pramā dṛṣṭa tve paramāṇūnām tad saṃkhyā syāt viniścitā atha sthūlam tat atyantam tena tat dvi aṇukam na hi dvi aṇuka ādi yadā a dṛṣṭam kim apekṣya asya pīnatā anumīyamāna apekṣā ced anavasthā prasajyate anumīyamāna sāpekṣā sarvasya sthūla tā bhavet atha api dṛśyam yat rūpam paryanteṇu ḥ asau mataḥ varttula tva ādi saṃsthānam tasya kim na upalabhyate paramāṇuḥ na siddhaḥ cad kutovaya visambhavaḥ siddhiḥ ced paramāṇūnām kutovaya visambhavaḥ eka deśena saṃsarggaḥ paramāṇuḥ asau katham eka deśena saṃsargge sarvasya eva upalabhyate tatas saṃsaggasadbhāvāt na aṇuḥ sthūla padārtha vat 
[041,xix_041,xxi]	atha api syāt dvayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ upajāyate padārtha antaram na tu saṃsparśaḥ sarva ātmanā eka deśena vā tat api asat asaṃsargge api saṃyogaḥ yadi kutas saḥ eva saḥ katham eka ghana ākārāḥ paramāṇuṣu saṃvidaḥ atha anyaḥ vayavī tatra tatra ekākāra tā dhiyām nittya tvāt paramāṇūnām sa antarāṇām dṛśiḥ bhavet yadi nāma asmad ādīnām adṛśyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ īśvarasya akṣadṛśya tu anteṣām na evahi sambhavi atha dvayam asau paśyet samavāyaḥ katham bhavet bhrānta tā eva janasya syāt tathā sati anyathā īkṣaṇāt 
[042,iv_042,viii]	avayava saṃyoga pūrva kañca sthūlam iti kutas etat yadi nāma mṛd piṇḍa ādau upalabdham aṅakura ādau tu na upalabhyate eva tathā hi vaṭasya bījam ati alpam tat kāryaṃmati pīvaram tatra avayava saṃyogaḥ prāgabhāve katham bhavet vidyamānānām eva avayavānām saṃyogaḥ iti samayaḥ na ca sthūla rūpa kāṇḍa ādeḥ prāk tad avayavānām upalambhaḥ tatas katham saṃyogaḥ kutas ca avayavī iti sakalam andhakāra narttanam atha ākāśa deśa vyāpitaḥ paramāṇavaḥ dṛṣṭa sahāyāḥ sañcīyante tat ayuktam 
[042,ix]	sañcīyante sthitāḥ santaḥ kim apūrva udayaḥ tatas kāraṇāt iti sarveṣām atra saṃdehaḥ eva naḥ atha adṛṣṭaḥ api dṛṣṭāntāt asti iti eva pratīyate pradīpa dṛṣṭānta balāt sāṃkhya darśanam āgatam tatas eva īśvaraḥ karttā iti etat dūrataram gatam vyañjakaḥ ca pradīpa ādiḥ acetana tayā gataḥ acetanāt vyaktiḥ iti katham īśvara sādhanam cetana adhiṣṭhitaḥ saḥ api iti atra prāk kṛtam uttaram tasmāt yatas yatas yat yat tat tat astu tatas tatas kiñcid cetanataḥ kiñcid anyataḥ ca iti niścayaḥ pītam api anyathā śuklam vastu tvāt anya śukla vat pratyakṣa bādhataḥ na iti sotra na iti kutas matiḥ mama na asti iti na eva asau tava adṛṣṭiḥ nahi pramā tava adṛṣṭiḥ pramāṇañcet īśvaraḥ na iti gamyatām 
[042,xvi_042,xvii]	tava apramā sā dṛṣṭiḥ ced īśvaraḥ na iti gamyatām api ca na kāryam iti eva saṃsthānam iti eva vastu iti eva abhimata kāraṇam anumāpayati na khalu puruṣa icchayā hetavaḥ sādhya sādhanāya pravarttante anyathā īśvara viparyayaḥ api syāt tasya api siddhi prasaṅagāt tatas na kiñcid kasyacid na sidhyeta api tu yādṛśāt yathā yat upalabhyate tādṛśam eva anumāpayati iti āha 
[042,xviii_042,xix]	siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat sanniveśa ādi tat yuktam tasmāt yat anumīyate yādṛś adhiṣṭhā turbhāva abhāvāt anuvṛtti kāri dṛṣṭam yādṛśaḥ vā adhiṣṭhātuḥ bhāva abhāva anuvarttamānam yat upalabdham tādṛśāt tu tat eva anumīyate iti yuktam sanniveśa ādi sanniveśaḥ vastu tvam sthitvā pravṛttiḥ vā yādṛśī yādṛśāt upalabdhā tādṛśyāḥ tādṛś adhiṣṭhā atranumānam upapannam na anyathā iti āha 
[042,xx_043,iii]	vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yukta anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravya ādi vat hutāśane yadi hi saṃsthāna bhedam parityajya saṃsthāna śabda mātra vācyam karttṛ viśeṣa anugamam nirasya hetuḥ upādīyate vastu tva mātram vā tadā yukta anumitiḥ syāt pāṇḍu dravyāt iva vahnau tatra hi pāṇḍu viśeṣaḥ vadhāraṇīyaḥ yaḥ dhūma gataḥ dhūmāt eva tad anumānam tarhi kim pāṇḍu tayā atra ucyate viśiṣṭam eva pāṇḍu tvam dhūmaḥ iti abhidhīyate vyatiriktan na dhūma tve pāṇḍu tvasya viśeṣaṇam 
[043,iv]	dhūma gata pāṇḍu tvāt iti korthaḥ agni anvaya vyatireka anu vidhānam eva katham avagantavyam atra api dhūma tvam agni avinābhāvī iti kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya grahaṇena anumā bhavet tathā ca sutarām īśaḥ na siddhim adhigacchati iti lābham icchataḥ mūlasya api nāśaḥ tasmāt vastu bhede dṛṣṭānte yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ vastu bhedaḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣe ghaṭa ādau puruṣa adhiṣṭhāna viśeṣaḥ tasya śabda sāmyāt abhedavataḥ na yukta anumitiḥ tathā īśvarasya api iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ 
[043,v_043,vii]	atha api syāt yadi pāṇḍu tvāt viśeṣa rahitāt anumānam pravarttayemahi tatas pratyakṣa bādhā syāt na sarvasya tu pāṇḍu tāyām agni saṃsarggaḥ pratyakṣatas viparyayasya darśanāt īśvara anumāne tu bādheta tad anumānam na etat asti na na bādhyate iti evam anumānam pravarttate sambandha darśanāt tasya pravarttanam iti īritam anyathā kumbhakāreṇa mṛd vikārasya kasyacid ghaṭa ādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyet valmīkasya api tad kṛtiḥ 
[043,ix]	na khalu valmīkasya kumbhakāraka raṇenu māne bādhakam asti na na darśanam eva bādhakam yadi kumbhakāraḥ karttā bhavet upalabhyeta īśvare api kim anupalambhaḥ nanu evam adṛṣṭam karmmā api na kalpanīyam tat kim idānīm śuṣiram iti eva jānu praveśaḥ atha karmmā api parikalpya aparaḥ īśaḥ parikalpyate tatas tatas anyaḥ api iti evam anavasthā kiñca
[043,x_043,xi]	kumbhakāraḥ api tad kārye kim adṛṣṭaḥ na kalpyate kaṣṭa kalpanam etat kim īśvare api na sambhavi atha daṇḍa mṛd piṇḍa cakra kara prakrama anugamaḥ na valmīkaḥ upalabhyate yadi tarhi mahatī iyam bhavataḥ sūkṣma īkṣikā tadā parvata ādiṣu api aniyata saṃsthāneṣu na prekṣāvat vṛttiḥ upalabhyate iti eṣām api kriyā na kim arddha jaratīyam ālambate 
[043,xii_043,xiv]	atha pṛthivī dhāraṇa mātra karaṇe parvata ādeḥ upayogaḥ kintatra parvata ādiṣu ghaṭita saṃsthānena iti ebam tat hi upayogam vinā bhūbhṛt saṃsthānam kriyate anyathā kim vā na puruṣaḥ tatra hetuḥ tena virūpa tā kim upayoga abhāvāt puruṣa karttṛ tve api saṃsthānam ati śobhanam na jāyate puruṣaḥ vā na karttā iti saṃdehaḥ eva 
[043,xv_044,ii]	nanu eṣa doṣaḥ kārya samaḥ tathā hi prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kārya samaḥ prayatnānāntarīyaka tvāt kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti prayatna antaram vyaktiḥ api dṛṣṭāḥ iti na kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti tathā atra api saṃsthānam atyakāryam api dṛṣṭam iti tat api asat sādhyena anugamāt kārye sāmānyena api sādhane sambandhi bhedāt bheda ukti doṣaḥ kārya samaḥ mataḥ 
[044,iii]	sādhyena hi kāryatva ādinā sāmānyena api sādhane sādhana viṣaye uktaḥ yaḥ doṣaḥ sa kārya samaḥ mataḥ kārya sama jāti rūpaḥ kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ bheda ukti doṣaḥ bhedasya uktiḥ upakṣepaḥ kāryatvad nāma kim abhivyakti gatam upādīyate kim vā utpatti gatam iti sambandhi bhedāt yaḥ bheda ukti doṣaḥ sa kārya samaḥ tatra api yadi anaikāntikam udbhāvayati prayatnāt āvaraṇa vigamāt iti evam api na virodhi iti na jāti uttaram kintu sāmānyena api sādhanam bhavati yata ubhi vyaktiḥ api nittyasya viruddhā eva tatas jāti uttaram anyathā na aikāntika udbhāvanam sattyam eva bhavet 
[044,iv]	atha atra uttaram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ prayatna kārya anyatva upapatteḥ syāt eta t sattvaṃśabde syāt anupalabdhi kāraṇasya vyavadhāna ādeḥ upapatteḥ na ca śabdasya vyavadhāna ādi kāraṇa upapattiḥ tena na asya prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ yatra prayatna anantaram abhivyaktiḥ tatra anupalabdhi kāraṇam upayujyate vyavadhānam vyavadhāna apohāt ca arthasya upalabdhi rūpa tad vilakṣaṇa abhi vyaktiḥ bhavati 
[044,v_044,xi]	atra ucyate śabdasya api na sā iti etat katham kasmāt pratīyate yadi abhivyakti sambandhaḥ nittyasya api upapatti bhāj atha api syāt śabdasya anupalabdha tve vyavadhāna ādi kāraṇam ghaṭa ādīnām iva vyaktam na īkṣyate atas prayatna jāḥ tat api asat vyavadhāna ādayaḥ santi śabdasya iti api kalpyatām pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt śabdasya na vināśitā 
[044,xii_044,xiv]	ghaṭa ādayaḥ api prāk upalabdhā vyavadhāna avasthāyām na vinaṣṭāḥ iti vyavadhāna apagame pratyabhijñānāt eva pratīyaṃte śabdaḥ api pratyabhijñānāt tathā eva yuktaḥ atha anyena upalambhāt evam pratītiḥ na pratyabhijñānāt svayam sākṣāt iti mahatī tattva dṛṣṭiḥ kiṃca pareṇa api pratītam tat pratyabhijñāna tonyatas na gamyate kathantasya parasmāt api nittya tā 
[044,xv_045,i]	tasmāt atra prāk uktaḥ eva parihāraḥ sāmānyena api sādhane sambandhi ityādi athavā kāryatva anyatva leśena yat sādhyā siddhi darśanam tat kārya samam etat tu tridhā vaktrabhisandhitaḥ iti ācārya praṇītam kārya sama lakṣaṇam āśritya it am uktam akṣa pāda lakṣaṇantu ayukta meghā iti pratipāditam vikalpa samam tu sādharmye api viśeṣa uktiḥ vikalpa samam tat yathā pūrvavat ghaṭa sādharmyeṇa anitya tve kṛte sati āha sati etasmin sādharmye kārya tva cākṣuṣa tva ādinā ghaṭaḥ eva anityaḥ na anyaḥ 
[045,ii_045,iv]	nanu atra api kāryatva saṃsthāna tva ādi sāmānyena sādhanam bhavati viśeṣa sambandhi dvāra parikalpane kārya sama pratha vacana tā eva ghaṭa parvata ādi saṃsthāna parikalpanāt tat asattyam saṃsthāna ādeḥ na sāmānyam buddhi pūrva kriyā udbhavaḥ anyatra api asya dṛṣṭa tvāt vṛkṣa ādau iti varṇṇatam pratibaddha viśeṣasya tyāgāt yat sādhanam kvacid tat atyantam asambaddham anittye kāka kārḥ ṇya vat 
[045,vi_045,viii]	atra āha paraḥ yadi nāma buddhi pūrva kriyā anvayaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ eva sādhanam saṃsthānauvirmā abhūt śabda vācya tā anvayaḥ tu saṃsthānam saṃsthānam ityādiḥ bhaviṣyati tatas tad abhinna lakṣaṇa tvāt eka kārya tva siddhiḥ asat etat yatas kalpanā mātra racitāt artha asatti vivarjitāt dharmmāt tad sambhavinī arthe yatra tatra samīhitāt jāti antare prasiddhasya śabda sāmānya darśanāt na yuktam sādhanam go tvāt śaśa ādīnām viṣāṇa vat 
[045,x_045,xii]	śaśa ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ hi jāti antare prasiddhaḥ viṣāṇa sambandhaḥ sa kim gauḥ iti vajana abheda mātrāt anumīyate artha abhede api pāṇḍu tvāt na anumānam iti īritam kim punar yatra na arthaḥ api śabda mātram param samam arthasya tāvat sambhavati samīhita sādhya pratibaddha tā tasya api sūkṣma īkṣikā avadbhiḥ asādhaka tā ucyate kim punar śabda samāna tāyāḥ yasyāḥ sādhya sambandha gandhaḥ api vidūrīkṛtaḥ yatas 
[045,xiii_046,i]	vivakṣā paratantra tvāt na śabdāḥ santi kutra vā tad bhāvāt artha siddhau tu sarvam sarvasya sidhyati kutra ca ete śabdāḥ na santi vivakṣāyāḥ sarvatra apratighātāt tatas ced arthaḥ sādhyaḥ sidhyati na kaścid artha siddhi vaidhuryam āsādayet tasmāt asat parogatam etena kāpila ādīnām acetanya ādi cintitam anittya ādeḥ ca caitanyam maraṇāt tvac apohataḥ 
[046,ii_046,iv]	kāpila ādīnām api acaitanyam itarat vā yatas siddhi saudha śekharībhavati tad artha tva abhāvāt śabda mātra sāmya racitam eva tathā hi anitya tvam na sāṃkhyasya prasiddham vastu vṛttitaḥ tasya avyaktiḥ padārthānām na niranvaya nāśitā na khalu sataḥ eva anabhivyaktiḥ anitya tā bauddhasya prasiddhā kā tarhi niranvaya nāśitā 
[046,v]	nanu na tirobhāvaḥ vinaṣṭa an abhivyakyoḥ tulyaḥ eva koyam tirobhāvaḥ adṛśya ātma tā nanu śaśa viṣāṇa ādīn āñca pradhānānām anitya prāptiḥ vidyamānasya api anittyatā iti ced dṛśya ātmanāyām pradhāna ādīnām api syāt dṛśyasya adṛśya ātma tā prāptau anitya tā iti ced kā iyam dṛśyatā nāma yadi artha svarūpam katham dṛśyasya adṛśya tā tad parityāge vastu rūpam eva na asti atha vastunoni at dṛśya ātma tvam tathā tarhi tasya abhāvaḥ katham na niranvaya vināśaḥ na ca anyasya abhāve anyasya tirodhānam tasya vā sarvadā pradhāna tulya tvāt na anitya tvam tasmāt śabda parikalpanā mātram eva sādhanāt kena upādīyate tathā maraṇa tvāt tvac apohataḥ sarva tvac apaharaṇe maraṇāt iti maraṇa śabda pravṛtti mātrakam eva 
[046,vi_046,viii]	vijñāna ādi nirodhaḥ hi maraṇam bauddha bodhataḥ asiddham yasya taruṣu vijñānam tad matiḥ tathā yasya bauddhasya taruṣu vijānasan dehaḥ tad ādi nirodha rūpa maraṇam asaṃdigdham iti kaḥ pratyeti vijñānasya nirodhaḥ vijñāna abhāve na asti tathā āyuṣaḥ āyuḥ jīvitam ādhāraḥ ūṣma vijñānayoḥ hi yaḥ iti vacanāt katham hi maraṇam ami upapanna caitanyam abhyupeyāt tasmāt śoṣa mayam maraṇam āha tat ca na ekānta sādhanam vijñānasya kart dama ādiṣu api darśanāt maraṇa śabda vṛtteḥ tat api siddham eva iti ced uktam atra vivakṣā para tantra tvāt iti atha artha darśana āyātā atra vivakṣā tatas yama doṣaḥ 
[046,ix_046,xi]	maraṇa siddhau tad śabdaḥ pratibaddhaḥ prasidhyati pratibandhe ca śabdasya tatas maraṇa siddha tā śabdāt vijñāna ādi nirodha lakṣaṇa maraṇa siddhiḥ tathābhūta maraṇa darśana āyātatve tayā bhūta maraṇa darśana āyātatvañca maraṇa siddhau iti ita retara āśraya doṣaḥ atha nittyaḥ śabda artha sambandhaḥ tathā sati vāc ādīnām api viṣāṇi tā atha anyaḥ eva vāc ādiṣu go śabdaḥ sa na pratibaddhaḥ eva viṣāṇa viṣāṇi tve maraṇa śabdaḥ hi tarhi na aparaḥ iti kim atra bhavataḥ pramāṇam tat na anitya tva ādi sādhanasya sādhanam tathā sthitvā pravṛtta ādeḥ iti na sādhya siddhiḥ 
[046,xii_047,v]	yadi tarhi viśeṣa parikalpanena sādhanasya asādhana tā saṃsthāna āt era nitya ādeḥ ca a nyasya api kṛtaka tva ādeḥ asādhanam eva paravādi apekṣayā sarvam eva aprasiddham vikalpanena ca tathā hi ākāśa guṇaḥ śabda dharmmaḥ asiddhaḥ paraṃprati sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmmasya parasparam asiddha tā tat api asat āgamāt vyoma dharmma tvam vācakam na eva kasyacid viśeṣa kalpanāyān tu hetuḥ eva vihīyate tasmāt vastu svarūpe asiddhā iyam nyāyaḥ siddhe viśeṣaṇam abādhakam asiddhau api ākāśa āśraya vat dhvaneḥ 
[047,vi]	āgama prasiddhaḥ hi śabdasya ākāśa guṇa tve asiddhaḥ api śabdaḥ sva rūpeṇa dharmmitayā prasiddhaḥ eva iti dharmma asiddheḥ tathā viśeṣa parikalpanāyām api na hetuḥ asiddha dharmmi sambandhaḥ na aikāntika uvā asādhāraṇa tayā dharmmī hi pramāṇa siddhaḥ iti na viśeṣaṇa aprasiddha avasiddhaḥ na api viśeṣa parikalpanā kvāpi upayoginī iti na hi tatra avaśyam viśeṣa parigrahaḥ tathā hi 
[047,vii_047,ix]	anitya tā kārya tayoḥ sāmānyam upayogavata viśeṣasya prasiddhiḥ tu na kenacid api iṣyate hetu anantara bhāvi tvam tad antara nāśitā na śabda ghaṭayoḥ asti viśeṣaṇa samanvitā na khalu pūrva apara sva rūpa viviktāyāḥ kvāpi asti viśeṣaḥ na ca eva deśaḥ tam viśeṣī karoti tad eka parāmarśa viṣaya tvāt tat asat vikalpanam saṃsthāna ādi tu tat pratibaddham asiddham eva śeṣaḥ prāk eva uktaḥ saṃsthāna śabda mātra kantu asādhakam eva yatas 
[047,x_047,xi]	asiddhau api śabdasya siddhe vastuni sidhyati aulūkyasya yathā bauddhena uktam maurtti ādi sādhanam mūrtta tvāt anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ iti vaiśeṣikam prati bauddhena sādhanam uktam na ca atra śabdaḥ paraspara abhimate viṣaye prasiddhaḥ asarva gata dravya parimāṇasya mūrtti śabda vācya tvāt sparśa yogaḥ ca mūrttiḥ iti saugatāḥ tat ayam eva śabdaḥ paraspara abhimate viṣaye yadi nāma na siddhaḥ tathā api tad abhimatasya arthasya ubhayoḥ api siddha tvāt asiddhau api śabdasya siddhe vastuni bauddhasya abhimate dvayoḥ api sidhyati abhimataḥ sādhyorthaḥ 
[047,xii_047,xiv]	nanu yathā vastunaḥ avyabhicāri tve siddha tve vā sidhyati sādhyam tathā śabde api evam eva konayoḥ viśeṣaḥ na tasya eva vyabhicāra ādau śabde api avyabhicāriṇī doṣavat sādhanam jñeyam vastunaḥ vastu siddhitaḥ na hi yathā śabda asiddhau api vastu balāt sādhya siddhiḥ tathā vastu asiddhau api śabda balāt sādhya siddhiḥ api tu tasya eva vastunaḥ vyabhicāraḥ asiddhau virodhe ca doṣavat sādhanam jñeyam avyabhicāriṇī api śabde na tāvat vastunaḥ vyabhicāra ādau śabdasya avyabhicāritā sambhavati 
[047,xv_047,xvi]	abhyupagamya api tu ucyate bhavatu avyābhicārī śabdaḥ tathā api doṣavat sādhanam kutas vastunaḥ vastu sidhyati na śabdāt nanu yadina sādhya avyabhicārī śabdaḥ tathā sati śabdāt sādhya siddhiḥ atha tatas sādhya siddhiḥ katham avyabhicārī śabdaḥ etat anena darśayati vastu pratipādana dvāreṇa śabdaḥ sādhya siddhau upayogī na tu sākṣāt tatas śabdasya avyabhicāra vāñchāyām api na artha parityāgāt sādhya sādhane sāmarthyam tasmāt artha gatā eva cintā upayogavatī vastu vyabhicāra itara nirūpaṇantu paścāt bhaviṣyati tasmāt na artha rūpaḥ hetuḥ asti yatas īśvara siddhiḥ atas anitya tve api apramāṇa tā iti siddham 
[048,i_048,iv]	tathā nittye api na ca ākāśa ādīnām īśvarasya ca nitya tayā kāraṇatvā kāraṇa tva vibhāgaḥ tathā hi yathā tat kāraṇam vastu tathā eva tat akāraṇam yadā tat kāraṇam kena matam na iṣṭam akāraṇam vyāpi tu ā ekatva ādayaḥ dharmmā yathā īśvarasya tathā ākāśa ādīnām api tatas samāna tve api īśvaraḥ kāraṇam akāraṇam ākāśa ādikam iti kutas vibhāgaḥ atha tasya jñānena cikīrṣā lakṣaṇena sambandhāt evam ucyate tat api asat tatra api samāna tvāt kiṃca 
[048,v_048,vii]	cikīrṣā mātrakeṇa eva na kāraṇam iti īkṣyate kākatālīyam etat kim athavā kāraṇantathā yadi karmma ādini karaṇam kāraṇam bhavet anyathā kāraṇam sarvam sarvasya na kim iṣyate athavā yadā sargāt prāk tad akāraṇam tathā sargga avasthāyāma viśeṣa abhāvāt akāraṇam eva sakala rāga ādi niḥ muktasya audāsīnyam eva yuktam loka karmma ādhipatyāt audāsīnyam na labhataḥ eva iti ced na 
[048,viii]	anya karmma paratantra tayā asau īśvaraḥ katham īśvaraḥ eva tat kṛpā kramataḥ atha viśeṣaḥ nāraka ādi racanāt akṛpaḥ kim karmmā eva lokasya tathā iti tad kṛt aśaktiḥ asmin iti nāryatā asya āryasya karttum yadi sādhu dhva śaktiḥ asādhu kṛtyam kim asau vidhātā upekṣā eva sādhūnām yuktā asādhau kriyā krame na kṣata kṣāra nikṣepaḥ sādhūnām sādhu ceṣṭitam 
[048,xiii_048,xiv]	atha evambhūtaḥ eva ayam kramaḥ tam eva asau prakāśayati ceṣṭate ca tad karaṇāya evambhūtaḥ eva mama svabhāvaḥ na nivārayitum mayā śakyaḥ tatra lokaiḥ yathāyogam viharttavyam ātmani api vaśī na asau iti sa sphuṭam īśvaraḥ sva karmma ucita ceṣṭasya na lokasya kim īśa tā īśvara tva īritaḥ saḥ api yadi anyonya saṃśrayaḥ ekasya api na sadbhāvaḥ tathā sati upapattimān īśvarasya yadi na asti na śaktiḥ sādhu karmma vidhiḥ eva janaḥ syāt sa svatantra caritaḥ yadi lokaḥ karmmavādaḥ iha śastaḥ udagraḥ 
[048,xix_049,i]	atha api syāt īśvarasya api kadācid kāraṇa tvam bhaviṣyati yadi api nāma asmad ādibhirat tva darśibhiḥ na jñāyate evantarhi tattva darśī eva tad vittyai jñauvavyaḥ tasya cāparaḥ jñātā syāt anavasthānāt aneka īśvara sambhavaḥ asmad ādibhiḥ tu śastra auṣadha abhisambandhāt caitrasya vraṇa rohaṇe asambaddhasya kim sthāṇoḥ kāraṇa tvam na kalpyate 
[049,ii_049,iv]	atha sthāṇoḥ na asti vyāpāraḥ iti akāraṇa tvam asambandhāt sthāṇoḥ api kadācid asti vyāpāraḥ sa tu asmābhiḥ na upalakṣyate atatva darśanaiḥ anupalakṣaṇāt eva tarhi na asti sthāṇoḥ vyāpāraḥ evantarhi svabhāva bhedena vinā vyāpāraḥ api na yujyate nittyasya avyatireki tvāt sāmarthyañca duranvayam 
[049,v_049,vii]	nityasya prabandha nityatava anyathā vā svabhāva bhedena vinā kāryasya īśvarasya vyāpāraḥ api upalakṣitaḥ katham yuktaḥ īśvarasya api iti api śabdaḥ bhinnakramaḥ yathā kulāla ādi kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tathā īśvara kṛtaḥ api syāt sāmarthya parikalpanā nityasya ca avyatireki tvāt sāmarthyam duranvayam sadā sthāna vyāpaka tvena vyatireka abhāvataḥ 
[049,viii_049,x]	yeṣu satsu bhavati eva yat tebhyaḥ anyasya kalpane tad hetu tvena hetūnām sarveṣām anavasthitiḥ dṛṣṭa kulāla ādiṣu karmmaṇi ca sati bhavati eva samīhitam tathā api anyasya tatra kalpana sarveṣām eka kāryāṇām hetūnām anavasthitiḥ paryavasānam na syāt na khalu niranugam akalpanā avatāra anugatau tad aparaḥ vyāghātaḥ athavā anavasthitasya cirantanasya tasya eva sthitiḥ hetūnām evam api saḥ eva hetuḥ iti vyarthakam aparam karma iti syāt 
[049,xi_049,xvi]	yathā tarhi pṛthivī kāraṇam aṅakura ādeḥ sadā sthāyinī tathā īśvaraḥ api iti na ca pṛthivī ādīnām ādiḥ upalabhyate atra parihāraḥ svabhāva pariṇāmena hetuḥ aṃkura janmani bhūmi ādiḥ tasya saṃskāre tad viśeṣasya darśanāt sīra vyāpāra ādi viśeṣa vikṛti samanvaya anugamaḥ hi dṛśyate yava ādi prasavānām iti pṛthivī ādi kāraṇa tva parikalpanā punar api codya parihārau yathā viśeṣeṇa vinā viṣaya indriya saṃhatiḥ buddheḥ hetuḥ tathā idam ced na tatra api viśeṣataḥ pṛthak pṛthak aśaktānām santāna atiśaye asati saṃhatau api asāmarthyam syāt siddhotiśayaḥ tatas 
[049,xviii]	cakṣuḥ ādau hi kāraṇa tvam kārya rūpa viśeṣāt avasīyate kāryam hi vijñānam rūpa grahaṇa pratiniyatam rūpa ākāram bodha rūpanta deṣām paraspara parihāreṇa upayogāt bhedasya sambhavāt kāryasya vijñānasya kāraṇam cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ yatas ete pṛthak pṛthak aśaktā vijñāna ākāra samudāye na cakṣuṣaḥ bodha rūpa tā na rūpāt rūpa grahaṇa pratiniyamaḥ na manaskāra dita rat ekaikasmāt evam adarśanāt 
[050,i_050,ii]	atha syāt yathā cakṣuṣi unmiṣite para apara ropaḍhaukane parāpara rūpa darśanam na ca tadā cakṣuṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ tathā rūpe sthitaḥ eva apara apara cakṣuḥ vijñāna bhāvaḥ tathā īśvare api sadā samāna tayā vyavasthite para apara bhāva utpattiḥ iti na akāraṇa bhāvaḥ uktam atra ākāśa ādīnām api kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ viśeṣāt cakṣuṣaḥ rūpa viśeṣāt api vidyate vijñānasya viśiṣṭa tvam rūpa ādeḥ hetu tā tatas rūpa viśeṣāt viparisphurata ākāra ādi lakṣaṇāt saumanasya ādi yogi vijñānam upajāyate 
[050,iv_050,v]	tasmāt pṛthak aśakteṣu yeṣu sambhāvyate guṇaḥ saṃhatau hetu tā teṣām na īśvara ādeḥ abhedataḥ tathā cakṣuṣā ūrdhva nimīlana ādi viśeṣāt aspaṣṭa tā ādi viśeṣaḥ sa tad pratibaddhaḥ tasya kārya tām kāraṇasya upakalpayati na evam īśvara kāraṇa tva kalpane hetuḥ iti tatas pṛthak pṛthak aśaktānām santāna atiśaye asati santāna atiśaya abhāve saṃhatau api asāmarthya saḥ eva svabhāvaḥ kāraṇa viparītaḥ kāraṇam bhavet katham iti kim atra uttaram rūpa ādīn āntu kāraṇa tva upakalpane nimittam uktam iti na doṣaḥ 
[050,vi_050,viii]	yadi tarhi īśvarasya parijñāna ādi hetuḥ na asti jñāpakaḥ kārakaḥ vā na aparatra api sa syāt yatas prāmāṇyam ca parokṣa artha jñānam tad sādhanasya ca abhāvān na asti anuṣṭhānam iti kecid pracakṣate yaḥ tāvat asarvajñaḥ eva sarvajñaḥ bhavati tasya parokṣa artha parijñāne kaḥ hetuḥ na khalu īdṛśam kim api kāraṇam upalakṣitam yatonuṣṭhānāt sarva vedanam bhavati mantra tantra ādayaḥ tu prāyaśas sakala samaya sambhavinaḥ na api tat niścaye hetuḥ asti eka deśa saṃvādaḥ sakala vacanānām eva na ca parokṣāṇām sākṣātkaraṇa sambhavaḥ sakala arthānām indriya jñānasya sannihitā viṣayasya darśanāt 
[050,ix^1]	indriya artha aviśeṣe api yadi sarva vid udbhavaḥ sarvajñaḥ eva sarvaḥ syāt indriya artha aviśaṣataḥ aśuci ādiḥ asaṃvāda saṅgamaḥ ca anivāritaḥ prāpya kāri indriya tve ca sarva vid katham ucyate manaḥ vijñānam api asya na indriyān anusārataḥ svatantrantu manaḥ jñānam na eva kenacid īkṣyate abhyāsāt spaṣṭa tā tasya na sarva viṣayā bhavet āgāmaya āśrita tve api abhra anta tā api prasajyate anumāna prasiddhe tu vastu sarvam na labhyate tatas na sarva viṣayā bhāvanā sarva vid katham śāstra ādi abhyāsataḥ śāstra prabhṛti eva avagacchatu sākalya vedanantasya kutas eva āgamiṣyati sarvam vetti iti vijñānam tat jñeya āvedane kutas tat jñeya vedane
[050,ix^2_051,xv]	api syāt saḥ eva khalu sarva vid rāga ādi rahitaḥ yaḥ ca vikalpa rahitaḥ tathā deśanā tad kṛtā iti etat tu yācita kamaṇḍanam bhūtam bhavat bhaviṣyat ca anādyantam kaḥ pṛthak kramāt pratyekam śaknuyāt boddhum vastu kalpa antaraiḥ api eka deśa parijñānam kasya nāma na vidyate na hi ekam na asti sattya artham puruṣe bahu kalpake yaḥ ca atiśayavān dṛṣṭaḥ sa tāvat mātra saṃsthiteḥ kiṃcid mātrā antara jñaḥ syāt na atīva atīndriya artha vid na ca eka deśa tattva jñaḥ sarvajñe upapattimān kākatālīyam etat syāt apara bhrama kārakam yugapad sarva vijñāne a nādi saṃsāra tā katham yasmin parisamāpti jñaḥ saḥ eva atra ādiḥ ucyate atra ucyate na paras pramāṇam sarvam vetti iti iṣyate api tu vipralambha na kārī na bhavati astu samīhita sampādana samarthaḥ kiṅkāraṇam jñānavān mṛgyate kaścid tad ukta pratipattaye ajña upadeśa karaṇe vipralambha na śaṃkibhiḥ 
[051,xvi]	na khalu anyat anuṣṭhātum īhitam anyatra jñānam upadeṣṭuḥ anviṣyate tad viniścaye api samīhita vipralambhana sambhavāt atha tatra api tasya jñānam asti eva iti niścayaḥ na sarvatra jñānam jñāna asambhavāt tasmāt tat eva tena jñāta vyantat ced jñātam iti jñāyate atas ajñaiḥ ajña upadeśa kāraṇe vipralambhana śaṅkibhiḥ tad viṣaya jñāna jñāne pramāṇam eva asau anyatra api tasya jñānam sambhāvanoyam yaḥ hi pradhāna puruṣa artha jñaḥ pramāṇa pariśuddha sakala tattva jñaḥ ca saḥ eva pramāṇam tāvatā eva asau upāsyaḥ pariśiṣṭantu sakalam eva samānam sarva upāsyānām tat ca kasya sambhāvyate yena upadiṣṭam ye tu pramāṇa dṛṣṭam pradhāna puruṣa arthañca na vadavidanti ayam eva vidantinaḥ te pramāṇam tatra api aparijñāna sambhavāt katham upadeśaḥ iti ced anādi paramparātaḥ nāstikya upapadeśa vat 
[051,xvii_051,xx]	atha sarva aparijñāne sarvatra śaṅkā utpatteḥ aparijñānam aparasya api iti sambhāvyate tatas ca sarva jñānam asambhāvayan katham atra api sambhāvayet parijñānam upadeśaḥ tu pāraṃparya upadeśāt iti tat asat apramāṇe sphuṭā vastuni upadeśa paramparā prāmāṇike tu asambhāvyā sa upadeśa paramparā nitya tva ādau hi pramāṇa asambhavini na upadeśa paramparā atonyā gatiḥ pramāṇena ced vastu paricchinnam katha tatra ajñāna āśaṅkā bhavatu vā tathā api tatra pravarttanam avaśyambhāvi pramāṇena niścayāt atha pramāṇa dṛṣṭe api aniścayaḥ sākṣātkaraṇe 
[052,i_052,iii]	tat etat āyātam sūkṣma īkṣikā īdṛśī jātā pramāṇāt dṛṣṭa darśī api śaṃkyate yena tīrthyeṣu kathā kā eva bhaviṣyati pramāṇa dṛṣṭasya kathanam asti tathāgatasya bhagavataḥ tatra api yasya śaṅkā tasya tīrtheṣu kā gaṇanā yeṣu parijñānān anugamaḥ eva tasmāt prāmāṇika artha kathanāt pramāṇam eva bhagavān 
[052,iv_052,vii]	svargga apavargga mārgasya pramāṇam vedakaḥ naraḥ anyasya api aparijñāne saṃbhavet api tasya tat tasmāt anuṣṭheya gatam jñānam asya vicāryatām kīṭa saṃkhyā parijñānam tasya naḥ kva upayujyate yatas dharmma jña tva niṣedhaḥ tu kevalotra niṣidhyate sarvam anyat niṣedhan tu paraḥ kenani vāri aṃte 
[052,viii_052,x]	nanu yadi eka deśa parijñāna saṃvādāt tathāgataḥ sarva vedī iti sambhāvyate āgniḥ himasye tyādi saṃvādāt aparaḥ api iti anavasthā eva syāt na ca evam anuṣṭhānasya paraspara virodhena asambhavāt tat api asatti am heya upādeya tattvasya hāni upāyasya vedakaḥ yaḥ pramāṇam asau iṣṭaḥ na tu sarvasya vedakaḥ 
[052,xi]	yasmāt na sarvasya eva deśasya apuruṣa artha lakṣaṇasya vedakaḥ iti tāvatā sarvaḥ sarva vedyasau bhavati puruṣa artha lava vedanam hi na kasyacid asambhavi tatra heya upādeyata tvam duḥkha nirodha satye abhyupāya tattvam tayoḥ eva duḥkha nirodha sattyayoḥ kāraṇam samudaya mārga sattye tatas catur ārya sattya lakṣaṇasya heya upādeya tattvasya vedakaḥ yaḥ pramāṇa siddhasya vedayitā sa pramāṇam iti yāvat sva rgga mārggasya ca pramāṇa pariccheda sambhavinaḥ anyat tu strī śūdra vismāpanam sugata vacasi na asambhavi tasmāt pradhāna puruṣa artha vedakaḥ eva pramāṇam anyasya ayogāt 
[052,xii_052,xiv]	tasmāt dūram paśyatu vā mā vā tattvam iṣṭam tu paśyatu pramāṇam dūra darśī ced eta gṛdhrān upāsmahe na hi dūra darśanam asti iti eva sarva vedanam sambhāvyate yadi tu evam bhavet gṛdhra ādīnām api tat iti eta gṛdhrān dūraśrutīn ca varāha ādīn upāsanayā svīkurmmaḥ iti sakala nyāya mārgga parityāgaḥ eva jātaḥ 
[052,xv_053,ii]	atha kim sakala artha jñānam asambhavi nirarthakan ca ekāntena yena pradhāna puruṣa artha jñānemavāsya mṛgyate na etat asti sarvam jānātu sarvasya vedakaḥ na niṣidhyate na asmābhiḥ śakyate jñātum iti santoṣaḥ iṣyate na khalu sarvajñaḥ sarvajñam jānāti upāya abhāvāt tathā hi jānāti sarvam iti eṣā tat jñeya jñānataḥ matiḥ tat eka deśa vijñānam tad jñasya eva upajāyate 
[053,iii_053,iv]	vṛkṣa ādayaḥ api strī śūdra jñāna sādhāraṇāḥ pareṇa jñāyante na vā iti tad jñānāt eva matiḥ svayam avijñāte tu jñātam anena iti na upāyaḥ samasti ye tu mahāntaḥ dūra darśana gatayaḥ teṣām eka deśa parijñāna pūrvikā sakala jña tā sambhāvanā teṣām api tad apareṇa tattva sambhāvanā nanu ubhaya lakṣaṇasya api pramāṇasya kutas sādhanam kaḥ vā hetuḥ iti āha 
[053,v_053,vii]	sādhanam karuṇā abhyāsāt sā buddheḥ deha saṃśrayāt tasya prāmāṇyasya sādhanam kutas bhavati karuṇā abhyāsāt sā ca karuṇā burddheḥ deha saṃśrayāt buddheḥ yaḥ dehaḥ tad āśrayāt sā karuṇā abhyāsa parikarā parām prakarṣa gatim āsādayati yadi nāma karuṇā tathā api tatas prāmāṇyam iti kutosya sambhavaḥ asti sambhavaḥ yatas 
[053,viii_053,x]	duḥkha hetoḥ tathā duḥkhāt viyoga icchā parasya yā sā kṛpā tadvataḥ tena tad upāya arjane matiḥ avaśyam hi para duḥkha viyoga icchāvataḥ tad upāya paryeṣaṇam iti paścāt pratipādayiṣyate athavā sādhanam karuṇā karuṇāvān hi para upakāra virahitaḥ na bhavati tatas para artha deśanayā pramāṇam karuṇāvān upāye pravarttate tad upāyaḥ ca sva prāmāṇya sādhanam 
[053,xi_053,xii]	sā eva karuṇā sarvatrāṇa icchā lakṣaṇā kutas bhavati iti āha karuṇā abhyāsāt karuṇā hi duḥkha abhyāsāt udāsīna śatru pakṣayoḥ api pravarttate tatas sakala trāṇam asarvajña tve na sambhavati iti tad upāya abhyāsaḥ samāsādyate nanu sva buddhiḥ deha āśritāḥ buddhimatām karuṇā api buddhiḥ eva tatas sā api śarīra āśritā eva tatas śarīrasya bhasmībhāva ādau asiddha ubhyāsaḥ yadi hi janma antara sambhavaḥ tadā aneka janma abhyāsa upacayāt samīhita samāpattiḥ tathā hi 
[053,xiii_053,xvii]	deha ātmikā deha kāryā dehasya ca guṇaḥ matiḥ mata trayam iha āśritya na asti abhyāsasya sambhavaḥ tat āha buddheḥ deha saṃśrayāt asiddha ubhyāsaḥ iti ca id na āśraya pratiṣedhataḥ pūrva anvaya buddhi rahitasya kevalasya dehasya āśrayaṇasya pratiṣedhāt na khalu kāryatve guṇa tve anyathā vā bhavati āśraya bhāvaḥ dehasya kevalasya na deha ādi āśritā buddhiḥ
[053,xviii^1]	nanu deha āśritā buddhiḥ upalabhyate deha kāryā mātā pitṛ deha āśrayaṇa darśanāt tathā hi tad rūpa ācāra cetaḥ pāṭava ādayaḥ mātā pitṛ anvayinaḥ janya śarīra mahā bhūta āśrayā tad citra ādayaḥ iva citrakara rūpa vijñāna ādi anvayinaḥ kuḍaya āśritāḥ citrakara kārya rūpāḥ tatas na citram kuḍaya virahitam avatiṣṭhate kuḍya antaram vā saṃkrāmati āgatam vā kuḍya antarāt āmra phala ādi pākaja rūpa vat vā kāryam vā dhūmaḥ na dhūma dhvaja antarāt āgacchati na api dhūma dhvaja antaram prayāti mada śaktiḥ tu madya āśritā kaṣāya ādi rasa saṃparkāt apūrvā prādurbhavati vilīyamānā na madya antaram avalambate tathā indriya cetanā viśeṣāḥ
[053,xviii^2]	 tathā ca āha pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ iti tattvāni pṛthivī ādīni eva tattvāni tattvāni eva pṛthivī ādīni na ākāśa ādīni na kṣaṇika tva ādīni tathā tattvāni eva na vijñāna mātram na api sakalam eva śūnyam sarvatra pramāṇa abhāvāt tad samudāye viṣaya indriya śarīra saṃjñā mahābhūtānām eva aparimitaḥ pariṇati viśeṣa saṃbhūta samudāyaḥ śara ādi vyapadeśa viṣayaḥ tebhyaḥ śarīra indriya viṣayebhyaḥ caitanyam yathā kiṇva ādibhyaḥ mada śaktiḥ tasmāt mada śakti vat vijñānam na para lokāt āgacchat pratisandhimat mada śakti vat iti ca upalakṣaṇam citra vat dhūma vat iti ca na khalu ete sañcāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ 
[054,i_054,v]	tat asat rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa kutas bhūta upalambhanam tāni pañca tatas saṃkhyā avadhāraṇam ayuktimat rūpa śabda gandha rasa sparśāḥ pañca mahābhūtāni tad samudāye pṛthivī ādi saṃjñā pṛthivī ādīnām anyathā upalambhana abhāvāt atha rasasya spṛśyatā eva iti catur parimāṇa tā tathā api pṛthivī ādīni iti na yuktam rūpa ādīni abhidheyam syāt kṣaṇika tva ādayaḥ paścāt bhaviṣyanti sādhyāḥ iti na tad pratikṣepaḥ kiñca 
[054,vi]	dṛśyam dṛśyam iti hi evam sarvam ekam prasajyate prakāra bhede tu punar ananta tvam prasajyate tasmāt paṃca āśraya grāhyam pañcadhā vyapadiśyatām tasya avāntara bhedaḥ tu pañcatva anuparodha kṛt yat ca uktam sarva śūnya tve pramāṇam ced na śūnyatā śūnyatā ced pramā na asti tat idam vyāhatam dvayam pratipādayiṣyate paścāt yādṛśī sarva śūnyatā tatra yādṛś pramāṇam ca tvarā atra kva upayoginī 
[054,x_054,xiii]	nanu mātā pitṛ śarīra ādi anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyīni indriya ādīni śarīra mahābhūta svabhāva tvāt tad āśritāni eva na anyathā upalabhyante para lokāt āgata tvena tat katham para loka astitva vādaḥ sādhīyān tat api asatti am yatas prāṇa apāna indriya dhiyām dehāt eva na kevalāt sva jāti nirapekṣāṇām janma janma parigrahe atiprasaṅgāt 
[054,xiv]	prāṇa ādayaḥ hi svabhāva viśeṣāt capala tā ādi kṛtāt sva jāti nirapekṣāḥ na yuktāḥ capalatā ādayaḥ ca ātma abhyāsa anvayinaḥ na mātā pitṛ abhyāsa anvayinaḥ anyathā mātā pitṛ svabhāvaḥ na syāt asat saṃparkka ādinā tasmāt sva jāti nirapekṣān mātā pitṛ deha mātrāt eva na bhāvaḥ yadi tu mātā pitṛ svabhāve abhilāṣa ādayaḥ prāk āsan tadā mātā pitṛ ādi śarīram api kāraṇam iti yuktam 
[055,i_055,iii]	atha abhyupagamyate janma parigrahaḥ para loka nirapekṣaḥ eva tadā janma parigrahe abhyupagamyamāne ati prasaṅgaḥ sarve eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ viśīryeta sa ca anumāna paricchedāt avadhāryaḥ abhyāsa pūrvakāḥ sarve prāṇa apāna ādayaḥ yadi sva abhyāsa rahitāḥ ca syuḥ kathat nāma nirāśrayāḥ eṣa hi kāryasya dharmmaḥ yat kāraṇam apahāya anyathā na bhavanam anyathā sa tasya na janyaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām janya janaka bhāvaḥ tasmāt samāna jātīya abhyāsambha vicakṣuḥ ādi pūrvakāḥ eva cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ 
[055,iv_055,x]	nanu dhūmaḥ dhūma antara utpannaḥ na dhūmāt eva sarvathā śālkāt api śālūkaḥ kathambhavati gomayāt tathā citram citrakarāt jātam patatriṣu api kintathā bhyāsāt hi viśeṣaḥ yaḥ sonyayā api bhaviṣyati tat api asat dhūmaḥ dhūmāt yathābhūtaḥ sonyataḥ api na jñāyate abhyāsāt tu viśeṣaḥ yaḥ sa janma ādau tathā sthitiḥ 
[055,xii]	yaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ śruta abhyāsa ādi janmakaḥ saḥ eva tathābhūtaḥ iha janma abhyāsa vyatireke api dṛśyate na ca tasya abhyāsa saṅgamaḥ bādhyate atīta abhyasasya anyatra api tadānīm upalabdhum aśakyatvāt grāma antarāt āgata abhyāsa vat tatas eva na apāra laukika abhyāsa pūrvaka tvam api sādhayati iti kāraṇena saha kāryasya pratibandhāt adṛṣṭa kāraṇasya api tad kāryatvāt deśa antara abhyāsa pūrvaka tvam api sādhayati iti kāraṇena saha kāryasya pratibandhāt adṛṣṭa kāraṇasya api tad kāryatvāt deśa antara abhyāsa pūrvaka parijñāna vat tat atra tauta upākhyānam āyātam 
[055,xiii_055,xvii]	kaścid tautaḥ kila anyena pṛṣṭaḥ kathaya sambhavam mātuḥ dīrgha viṣāṇasya vṛṣabhasya katham sthitiḥ sa prāha kukṣeḥ jāyante na mātuḥ mahiṣāḥ amī haṭṭa āgatānām eṣāntu mūlyena kraya mātrakam tathābhūtam eva idam lokāyata matam athavā atiprasaṅgāt iti yadi janma antarāt āgatim antareṇa tebhyaḥ eva mahābhūtebhyaḥ caitanyam kāryam udbhavati kin na sakala prāṇi mayam bhavati pariṇati viśeṣa sadbhāvāt iti ced saḥ eva pariṇati viśeṣaḥ kasmāt na iti samānaḥ paryanuyogaḥ 
[055,xviii_055,xxi]	atha anādiḥ pariṇatiḥ paramparā viśeṣaḥ vā anupalakṣyamāṇaḥ kaścid asti yatas kecid prāṇinaḥ na anye tat api ayuktam yadi pariṇateḥ viśeṣaḥ sa dṛśyate na iti kalpanā kā eṣā darśana yogyam adṛśyam sat vyavahārasya naḥ viṣayaḥ yadi sa pariṇati viśeṣaḥ bhavet upalabhyeta atha kārya darśanāt eva kalpyate tathā sati dṛṣṭaḥ eva abhyāsaḥ kalpanīyaḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā gauravāt tatas sādhu uktam samāna jātīya bhāva pūrvakāḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ 
[056,i_056,iv]	bhavatu kāryāt kāraṇānām siddhiḥ pūrva janma bhāvinām para janminā antu katham anumānam tat āha yat dṛṣṭam pratisandhāna śaktimat kim āsīt tasya yat na asti paścāt yena na sandhimat pūrghvaṃpūrvasya hi pratisandhānam niścitam anu amāna anumita anumādibhiḥ nanu cāpala ādikam acā pala tvāt tad abhyāsataḥ bhavati aspanda manda tā ādi lakṣaṇāt sā tu mahābhūma mātrakāt eva tatas tatas api bhāve dhūma mad dhūma antara bhāve api na sarvadā prabandhaḥ eva tatas ucchedaḥ api dhūma vat eva iti na ananta tā api prāṇinām apūrva sattva prādurbhāvaḥ ca doṣāḥ tat api na asti 
[056,v_056,vi]	manda pravṛtti abhyāsena manda tā api asti janminām tatas tapūrvikā sa apātyanādi bhava cakrakam na khalu prāṇinām svabhāvataḥ eva manda tā ādayaḥ prakārāḥ api tu samāna jātīya abhyāsāt yathā eva capala ādayaḥ tad abhyāsataḥ tathā manda tā ādi api kausīdya abhyāsāt iti siddham anādi tvam saṃsārasya svāpa ādi abhyāsataḥ hi manthara tā cakṣuḥ ādīnām tatas capala cakṣuḥ ādikaḥ supta pravuddhaḥ capala cakṣuḥ ādinā yujyate anyonyena iti tatas janma ādau api supta prabodha vat eva abhimukhī bhūta vāsanā prabodhasya cakṣuḥ ādi yogaḥ katham anya śarīra gatam cakṣuḥ anya śarīre pratisandhīyate katham dravya antara gatā śaktiḥ anyatra sañcāriṇī 
[056,vii]	mantra tantra ādi sāmarthyāt guḍa ādau viṣa śaktayaḥ tathā eva karmma sāmarthyāt anya deha īkṣa śaktayaḥ yathā svapna antikaḥ kāyaḥ trāsa laṃghana dhāvanaiḥ jāgrat deha vikārāya tathā janma antareṣu api atha asau sattya tā hīnaḥ sutarām eva śobhanam asattyaḥ api vikarāya yatra sattye tu kā kathā vyavahāra mātrakam idam sattyatā asat tyatā iti ca svarūpa sākṣāt karaṇe sattyatā ādi iti durghaṭam 
[056,xi_056,xiii]	tasmāt yat pratisandhāna śaktimat pūrvaṃpūrvam upalabdham tasya kim āsīt adhikam yat paścāt na asti tad abhāvāt paścāt asandhimat kāraṇa vaikalye hi kāryasya abhāvaḥ sakale tu kalāvati kāraṇe kāryam anutpattimat iti vyāhatam nanu kaḥ iva atra vyāghātaḥ nanu ayam eva yaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvaḥ sarva avasthā samāne api kāraṇe yadi akārya tā svataṃtram kāryam evam syāt na kāryantat tathā sati 
[056,xiv_056,xv]	kāraṇa paratantram hi kāryam tat samartham kāraṇam haṭhāt eva janayati tathā api abhāve na kāryam bhavet atha tad abhāve na bhavati iti kāryam tad abhāve na bhavati iti kutas nanu tad bhāve avaśyam bhavati iti etat api kutas tathā ttvena paricchedāt tad abhāve na bhavati iti etat api paricchidyate eva sarvadā iti kutas iti samānam ubhayatra tasmāt yathā dṛśyate tathā abhyupagantavyam ubhayañca dṛśyate
[057,i_057,v]	tad bhāvā ivaśyam bhavati asākalyena bhavati eva iti tat ubhayam aṅgīkarttavyam evam adṛṣṭaḥ na kāryaṃkāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti ced vyāptyā na vyatirekasya na anvayasyā asti darśanam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya katham asya asti darśanam yadi vyāptyā na darśanam iti na kāryaṃkāraṇa bhāva siddhiḥ evantarhi na kasyacid anvaya vyatiriktasya darśanam iti uktam etat svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ iti na para lokaḥ na iha lokaḥ na para loka bādhanam na saṃdehaḥ na mahābhūta pariṇatiḥ ityādi vijñāpti mātrakam eva atha api vyavahārāt etat evam para lokaḥ api iti yadi advā etena toṣosti muktaḥ eva asi sarvathā vartate vyavahāraḥ ced para lokaḥ api cintyatām 
[057,vi]	sati upalpave varam evam upalpavaḥ praśamasya svarga ādi anukūla tvāt rāga ādi upalpavaḥ hi sakala samīhita sat jana tva ādi bhāva hānim eva vidhatte tathā hi cakṣuḥ ādi rāga ādi bhedāḥ sakalāḥ eva anādi va āsanā bala avalambinaḥ vijñaptimātrataḥ na bhidyante tatas cakṣuḥ ādi vikalasya api janma antare punar avikala cakṣuḥ āditā tatas janma paramparā su ayam eva prakāraḥ nāditā ca saṃsārasya yāvat ca na upalpava praśamaḥ tāvatī tasya ananta tā api satyatāyām api cakṣuḥ ādīnām bāhi arthaṃtu evā na ādiḥ asau svabhāvaḥ iti saṃsārān ādi ananta ta 
[057,vii_057,x]	na mahābhūta udbhavā buddhiḥ nanu mahābhūta viśeṣaḥ kaṭhina tva ādayaḥ upalabhyante eva tatas tad viśeṣāt mahābhūta udbhava tve api na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti tatas kaṭhina tva ādi viśeṣaḥ eva bīja ātmakaḥ tatas eva prāṇi sambhavaḥ iti uktam atra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva na syādi ti api ca na sa kaścid pṛthivī ādeḥ aṃśaḥ yatra na jantavaḥ saṃsveda ja ādyāḥ jāyante sarva bīja ātmakam tatas 
[057,xi]	na khalu kaṭhina tva ādi viśeṣa vibhāgena prāṇi vibhāga utpattiḥ sarve tra prāṇi darśanāt saṃsveda ja ādayaḥ api hi prāṇinaḥ na khalu vibhāgena na dṛśyante tatas kaṭhina tva ādi kṛtaḥ na vibhāgaḥ karma eva cetanā lakṣaṇam yadi param avaśiṣyate atha kāṣṭhā dyanvayinī prāṇi jātiḥ upalabhyate iti vadet tadā samāna jātīyam sarvam tad rūpa prāṇi mayam bhavet yad parimnā vyavasthāpitām ambhaḥ bhavati tat sakalam tad rūpa prāṇi mayam bhavet kutas varṇṇa saṃsthāna vailakṣyaṇyam prāṇinām 
[057,xii]	tathā hi raktaśirasaḥ pītakāya ādayaḥ pare jala ādi pāṇinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ saḥ ākāraḥ kutas bhavet tad rūpa bījāt kamala ādi bhedaḥ kiṃdṛṣṭa dṛṣṭaḥ a niyataḥ kadācid na prāṇi bhedaḥ niyata usti bījāt santi atra karmāṇi niyāmakāni tad sva jāti anapekṣāṇām akṣa ādīnām samudbhave pariṇāmaḥ yathā ekasya syāt sarvasya aviśeṣataḥ 
[058,ii_058,iii]	api ca manaḥ vijñāna āśritāni indriyāṇi sva kārya kārīṇi na tu manaḥ vijñānam eva tad āśritam tatas manaḥ vijñānāt eva indriyāṇām sambhavaḥ na bhū jala ādibhyaḥ iti darśayati pratyekam ityādi athavā manaḥ vijñānam na tāvat na tad samudāya rūpa śarīrāt utpattimat prāṇa apāna ādayaḥ tu mahābhūta pariṇati svabhāvāḥ eva mātā pitṛ bījamātrakāt manaḥ vijñānañca saṃsāri na indriya ādayaḥ yatas 
[058,iv_058,vii]	cheda sandhāna vairāgya hāni cyuti upapattayaḥ manaḥ vijñānaḥ aivaṣṭāḥ upekṣāyām cyuta udbhavau iti uktam tatas manasaḥ saṃsāri tvam na bhūta āśrita tvam yatas pratyekam upaghāte api na indriyāṇām manaḥ mateḥ upaghāta usti bhaṅgesyāḥ teṣām bhaṅgaḥ ca dṛśyate manaḥ mateḥ hi bhaṅge bhaya śoka harṣa krodha ādinā cakṣuḥ ādi vikāra darśanāt cakṣuḥ ādīni manaḥ vijñāna āśritāni tatas janma ādau api tad āśritāni eva iti bhava antara prasiddhiḥ na ca evam manaḥ vijñānam śarīra āśritam manaḥ vijñāna vikārya paṃca indriya samudāya kārya āśrita tvāt 
[058,viii_058,xi]	nanu yadi nāma cakṣuḥ ādīni manaḥ vijñāna vikāryāṇi tatas eva tu utpattiḥ iti kutas na hi agneḥ vikāram āsādayat ghaṭa ādi vastu vahneḥ eva utpadyate atra ucyate ghaṭa ādiḥ anyathā dṛṣṭaḥ tatas na tatas eva saḥ na anyathā tu punar dṛṣṭam indriyanta dvikārataḥ prāsāda ādi lakṣaṇa lakṣitam hi sakalam eva indriyam upalabhyate na tu ghaṭa ādikam agni kṛta vikāram eva tatas na ghaṭa ādiḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
[058,xii_058,xv]	atha yadi api nāma idānīm manaḥ vijñānam āśrayaḥ dṛṣṭa unyadā api tathā eva iti kutas tat etat asat vahneḥ yadi api dhūmaḥ dṛśyate tatas eva saḥ anyadā api iti na adhyakṣam pramāṇam iha kasya cit tasmāt yathā dhūma igni pūrva tva gatiḥ tad pratyabhijñayā tathā manaḥ vikārya tva gatiḥ janma ādi bhāvinī 
[058,xvi_058,xvii]	janma ādau cakṣuḥ ādīni cāpala ādi yogi manonurūpa vikārya tayā pratyabhijñāyamānāni tathā eva tāni iti avagamaḥ yuktaḥ yathā sakṛt agni pūrvakaḥ kvāpi tad prasavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pradeśa antare tad pūrvaka tayā eva pratyabhijñāyamānosti putra ādi indriya vaikalye api asti mānasa vikriyā tad āśritam manaḥ prāptam niyamaḥ na ubhayoḥ api 
[058,xviii_059,i]	yadi sarvatra putra ādi cakṣuḥ ādi vikāre na vikriyā iti niyama abhāvāt putra ādi cakṣuḥ ādīni iti na āśrayaḥ saḥ eva niyama abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ubhayoḥ api na ātma cakṣuḥ ādi vikāre api vikāraḥ manasaḥ kasyacid iti na tāni api na āśrayaḥ iti indriyāṇām na āśraya tvam evantarhi manaḥ vijñānam indriyāṇām āśrayaḥ indriyāṇi tu na manasaḥ iti anāśritam manaḥ prasaktam ṣaṇṇām api cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānānām āśrayeṇa kenacid bhavitavyam 
[059,ii_059,viii]	indriyam manasā ujñānāt tasmāt casti manaḥ matiḥ tatas tatrā api syāt ca iti anādi ananta bhava sthitiḥ yadi manaḥ matiḥ api indriya vikārataḥ na vikāryāḥ evam netra ādi nāśe anekatra manaḥ dainya ādi dṛśyate tatra āśritam kutas tena na iha aśobhanam ūhyate na etat asti na avaśyam āśrayaḥ sarvasya kaścid iti niyama usti atha nirbandhaḥ tat api ucyate tasmāt sthiti āśrayaḥ buddheḥ buddhim eva samāśritaḥ kaścid nimittam akṣāṇa antasmāt akṣāṇi buddhitaḥ 
[059,ix]	tasmāt buddheḥ sthiti āśrayaḥ yaḥ sa nimittam akṣāṇām cetanā lakṣaṇa karmma sañjñitaḥ saḥ eva tarhi cakṣuḥ ādi indriyam samāśritaḥ iti tat āha sa ca buddhim eva samāśritaḥ na indriyāṇi na hi indriyāṇi tasya āśrayaḥ cetanā karma cetayitvā vākkarmma iti vacanāt cetanā ca idam ca idam ca iti evam ātmikā sā ca pūrva anusandhāna rūpā buddhim eva āśritya bhavati na kāya āśritā sā ca kācid eva indriyāṇām sva āśrayaḥ na sarvāḥ ārūpya dhātau indriyāṇām abhāvāt śarīrasa tṛṣṇena hi karmmaṇā śarīra indriyāṇām jananam tatra abhiḥ ati yogāt tuṣṇā viṣaye hi labdhebhiratiḥ utpadyate iti tasmāt akṣāṇi buddhitaḥ na tu akṣebhyaḥ buddhiḥ iti upasaṃhāraḥ tasmāt manasaḥ eva kāraṇa tvam iti manasā pūrva pūrva janma ākṣepaḥ 
[059,x_059,xii]	yadi tarhi manaḥ mateḥ aham iti evam ātma kalpanā rūpāyāḥ idānīntanam janma paratra tarhi janmani kaḥ saṃpratyaya hetuḥ katham vā kāya āśritam manaḥ uktam iti āha yādṛśyākṣepikā sāsāt paścāt api astu tādṛśaḥ tad jñānaiḥ upakārya tvāt uktam kāya āśritam manaḥ yādṛśya ātma grahaḥ tāsām manaḥ buddhiḥ anādi janma prabandhasya ākṣepikā saṃsāriṇā mā āsīt tādṛśī paścāt api ākṣepikā bhavatu na anyathā tayā bhāvyam iti saḥ eva paścāt api janma parigrahaḥ yaḥ hi yat karaṇa svabhāvā viśiṣṭa svabhāvaḥ sa karoti eva tat tat yathā dhūma janana svabhāvāḥ viśiṣṭaḥ eva aparaḥ sārndra indhana ādi saṅgataḥ kṛśānuḥ anyathā na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na vyavahāraḥ iti anīham jagat syāt 
[059,xiii_060,ii]	atha manasaḥ api kāya āśrita tvam pratipāditam bhagavatā anyonya anuvidhāyi tvam kāya citta yoḥ api vadatā atra parihāraḥ kāya vijñānaiḥ upakriyamāṇa tvāt uktam kāya āśrita tvam manasaḥ bhagavatā na tu sākṣāt kāyaḥ tasya āśrayaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānānām iva cakṣuḥ ādīni tasmāt ahaṅakāra lakṣaṇam manaḥ na cakṣuḥ ādi indriya āśritam na deha āśritam samāna jātīya manaḥ samāśrita tvam eva asya yuktam ārūpya dhātau api tasya bhāvāt tasya ca sambhava pratipādanāt mā bhūt vā akṣaiḥ vinā buddhiḥ tathā api na para loka abhāvaḥ anyonya āśrayasya bhāvāt tat āha yadi api akṣaiḥ vinā buddhiḥ na tāni api tayā vinā tathā api anyonya hetu tvam tatas api anyonya hetuke 
[060,iii]	yathā eva hi bhavatā ubhyupagamaḥ śarīram antareṇa na buddhiḥ indriya ātmakam tathā darśanāt iti tathā tāni api indriyāṇi na manaḥ buddhim vinā iti abhyupagamyatām abhyupagama nibandhanasya tathā darśanasya samāna tvāt tathā sati anyonya hetuka tvam prasaktam ubhaya santānasya parasparam upakārāt anyonya hetukayoḥ ca sāmagrī sāmagrī antarāt utpattimatī tatas api sāmagrītaḥ pūrvake pare ca kāya manasī anyonya hetuke madhya avasthāvat iti jñātavyam 
[060,iv_060,vii]	yadi ca kāyaḥ eva āśrayaḥ manaḥ buddhiḥ nam sā kāyasya tatas kāyāt buddhiḥ bhaṃvantī kramavataḥ akramāt vā bhavet prakāra antara abhāvāt tatra na tāvat akramāt yatas na akramāt kramiṇaḥ bhāvaḥ na api apekṣāḥ a viśeṣiṇaḥ kramāt bhavantī dhīḥ kāyāt kramantasya api śaṃsati iyam hi manaḥ buddhiḥ kramavatī anyathā aham iti su a ākārasya grahaṇetīta varttamāna anāgata sakala sva svabhāva grahaṇam iti sakala janma grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
[060,viii_060,xi]	atha avasthānām agrahaṇe na pūrva apara vyāpti pratītiḥ avasthā a grahaṇe avasthātṛ pratītiḥ katham bhavet vyāpya apratītau anyasya vyāpaka tva apratītitaḥ yadi hi vyāpinī avasthā na pratīyate vyāpya apratīteḥ katham asau vyāpakaḥ tathā pratipannaḥ bhavati na hi tena rūpeṇa apratīyamānaḥ api tathā bhavati pratītiḥ eva hi tattvam anyat tvam vā vyavasthāpayati vyāpaka tvañced asya na pratīyate tadā tad anyena rūpeṇa pratīyate iti āpannam tatas kāla antara sthāyitā asya na asti iti na kāla antara tā prati iti antarasya tatas kramavatī pratītiḥ tatas na akramāt kramiṇaḥ bhāvaḥ 
[060,xii_061,i]	nanu yadi nāma akramam kāraṇam tathā bhūtena eva kāryeṇa api bhavitavyam iti kutas na hi kāraṇāt abhinnam eva kāryam vilakṣaṇasya api darśanāt atra ucyate akramāt yadi kāryam syāt tadā eva sakalam bhavet anyadā tu sa na asti eva tadā parisamāptitaḥ evam hi tad kāryaṃkāri yadi kārya kāle gṛhyeta na hi apratīyamānam tadā tasya kāraṇam pratītiḥ ced tadā ekatvāt vināśa avadhi pratītiḥ iti tadā eva vinaṣṭaḥ syāt evam hi tasya akamatā tatas vinaṣṭāt aparam kāryan na bhavet eva bhavat vā na tat kāryam atha krameṇa pratīyamānam kramavataḥ kāraṇam tathā sati na ākramam na hi nīlatayā pratīyamānam anīlam athavā 
[061,ii_061,iii]	na ucyate kāraṇāt kāryan tat rūpa mupajāyate anvaya vyatirekābhyām kārya kāraṇa tā iti tu kāraṇa vilakṣaṇam api kāryam kāryam eva anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāna lakṣaṇa tvāt kārya kāraṇa lakṣaṇa tāyāḥ yatra tu anvaya vyatirekau na bhavataḥ tat na kāryam kāraṇañca yat ca tathābhūtaḥ eva kāraṇe na bhavati na tasya kāraṇa anuvidhāyitā 
[061,iv_061,vii]	nanu na tu tad bhāvena utpadyate iti eva tad bhāve tu bhavati avaśyam iti kva upayogosya tad bhāve api na bhāvaḥ ced abhāve a bhāvitā kutas tad abhāva prayuktosya saḥ abhāvaḥ iti tad kutas yadi asau samarthaḥ api kāraṇe na bhavati kāraṇam eva tasya tat na syāt kutas vā etat avagamyate tad abhāva prayuktaḥ asya abhāvaḥ iti yathā eva tad avasthaḥ eva kāraṇe sati svayam eva na bhavati tathā tad abhāve api svayam eva na bhaviṣyati svātantryāt tasya aparatantra tve kāraṇasya sati sāmarthye avaśyam eva bhavet iti 
[061,viii_061,x]	abhāvaḥ hi padārthānām svayam eva bhavet api bhāvaḥ tu paratantra tvāt katham hetoḥ bhavet na saḥ abhāvaḥ hi nirhetuka tvāt svayam eva bhavati iti yuktam bhāvaḥ tu hetu paratantra tvāt samartha hetau na bhavati iti na yuktam etat nanu kārya abhāvaḥ svatantra tvāt kāraṇe sati aṃpi ca na bhavati iti yuktam eva etat evam tarhi tad abhāve abhāvaḥ iti na kāraṇa abhāva prayuktaḥ abhāvaḥ iti katham bhavet kāryam asya tatas svayam eva na bhavet yaḥ ca svayam eva na bhavati na asau niyamyate tena tatas yathā svayam na bhavati tathā bhavat api tatā na kāya yadā tu kāraṇe sati bhavet eva tadā svarasa nirodhe api apara aparakṣaṇāt pattaḥ tad abhāvaḥ eva santānācchadaḥ iti kāraṇa pratibaddha tva tasmāt na akramāt kramiṇā bhāvaḥ 
[061,xi_062,ii]	atha akramāt api sahakāriṇam kramiṇam apekṣamāṇāt krama vat kāryam iti tat api na asti na asti apekṣā a viśeṣiṇaḥ anādheya viśeṣasya kvacid diśeṣa lābhāya na apekṣā na tasya viśeṣa usti iti viśeṣe vā a nitya tā vyatirikta viśeṣa abhyupagame ca tad viśeṣa apekṣam kāryantataḥ eva bhavat na tatas nityāt tasya asau viśeṣaḥ iti ced na viśeṣaḥ iti viśeṣa kara tvam viśeṣa pratyaya kara tvam vā na viśeṣa kara tvam tasya aviśeṣāt viśeṣāt viśeṣaḥ iti tat eva anitya tvam vyatireke pūrvakaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti atha viśeṣa pratyaya hetu tvam tat api ayuktam 
[062,iii]	na eva abhāve viśeṣasya viśeṣa pratyaya udayaḥ tathā ced bhrāntiḥ eva iyam iti vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ aviśeṣa pratītau hi sa nityaḥ iti gamyate viśeṣe abhra anta tāyāñca nityatāyām pramā kutas aviśeṣa pratītiḥ ced apekṣya tve katham bhavet audāsīnyam yatas tasya viśeṣaḥ api na vidyate viśeṣa sambhave tasya tatra apekṣā iti yuktimat etad artham apekṣā iti vyavahāra usti laukikaḥ 
[062,viii_062,xiii]	tasmāt na asti apekṣā a viśeṣiṇaḥ iti yuktam kāyāt kramāt bhavantī dhīḥ kramam kāyasya bodhayet anyathā yatkṛtaḥ tasyāḥ kramaḥ hetuḥ asau sphuṭaḥ pūrva pūrva anubhavataḥ sā manaḥ dhīḥ pravarttate saḥ api pūrvatas eva iti saḥ pītya syānavasthitiḥ atha pūrva pūrva buddhi sāpekṣaḥ kāyaḥ krameṇa buddhim janayati tathā sati kāyasya viśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam tatas kāyasya buddhi sahitasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ tathābhūtaḥ eva kāyaḥ hetuḥ iti prāptaḥ 
[062,xiv_062,xvi]	tathā sati pratikṣaṇam apūrvasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥ bhavet tasya hetuḥ atas hetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ eva astu sarvadā yaḥ eva khalu buddhi sahakārī dehaḥ parasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ upalabdhaḥ hetuḥ saḥ eva sarvadā madhya avasthāvat janma maraṇayoḥ api hetuḥ iti siddham anyathā vyāpteḥ apratipatteḥ hetuḥ eva kaścid kasyacid na bhavet upāya antara abhāvāt 
[062,xvii_062,xix]	tasmāt sakṛt tatas dṛṣṭaḥ tatas eva anyadā api saḥ kāryaṃkāraṇa bhāvoyam evam eva prasidhyati na ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na abhyupagamyate vyavahāribhiḥ iti pratipāditam etat purastāt iti viramyate nanu yathā madhya avasthāyām sa vijñānaka kāya pūrvaka tvena kāyasya upalabdheḥ pūrvaṃkaḥ api janma ādi kāyaḥ vijñāna sahita kāya pūrvaka iti janma antara vijñānāt eva vijñānam aihikāt api bhāvi janma vijñānam iti para loka prasiddhiḥ tathā hetu antarāt viparyayaḥ api iti para pakṣa prasiddhiḥ tathā hi 
[063,i_063,v]	yat yat maraṇa vijñānam na tad janma antara anugam tad citta tvāt yathā vīta doṣasya mṛti vedanam yat maraṇa vijñānam tad citta antaram na pratisandhatte yathā vīta rāga maraṇa cittam maraṇa cittam ca jama antara pratisandhāna kāritayā iṣṭam pṛthagjana cittam iti na pratisandhiḥ asti atha ayam hetuḥ eva na bhavati viparyayeṇa pratibandhāt viparyayaḥ api tarhi na hetuḥ anena pratibandhāt iti samānam na samānam yatas yaḥ yena viruddhaḥ sa tad abhāvam sādhayet yaḥ yena sambaddhaḥ sa tad bhāvam na ca maraṇa cittasya pratisandhāna virodhaḥ yatas citta antarasya sandhāne kaḥ virodha untya cetasaḥ tadvat api arhataḥ cittam asandhānam kutas matam 
[063,vi]	antya cetasaḥ hi citta antara pratisandhāne asattvena sādhye kaḥ virodhaḥ tena saha tad viṣaye na vā yena tasya abhāvaḥ sādhyate kaḥ virodhaḥ na kaścid na saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ paraspara parihāra lakṣaṇaḥ vā maraṇa citta tva āgame pratisandhāna viparyayasya adṛṣṭeḥ atas eva tad parihāreṇa avasthānasya adṛṣṭiḥ adṛśya tvāt janma antara pratisandhānasya tatas maraṇa citta tvam na pratisandhāna viruddham ubhaya rūpasya api virodhasya adṛṣṭeḥ tatas pratisandhāna abhāvam na sādhayati kāryatvantu pratisandhāna abhāva viruddham tatas tad abhāva sādhanāya samartham iti viparyayāt pratisandhāna prasiddhiḥ na ca paraspara viruddha artha avyabhicāriṇā a a ekatra staḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate 
[063,vii_063,ix]	nanu atra paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇaḥ virodha usti eva katham virodha abhāvaḥ yatas arhan maraṇa cittasya pratisāndhiḥ na vidyate pradīpasya iva nirvāṇam vimokṣaḥ tasya cetasaḥ pradīpasya iva hi nirvāṇam arhat sammata puruṣa maraṇa cittasya tatas tad parihāreṇa vyavasthitam maraṇa cittam iti pratīteḥ virodha prasiddhiḥ iti virodha abhāvaḥ na prasiddhaḥ 
[063,x]	tat api asambaddham tat api nāma arhataḥ cittam kutas pramāṇāt asandhānam matam bhavatām na atra bhavatām pramāṇam asti tad vādhanāya eva bhavatām udyamāt yadi arhan ahi abhyupagamyate tatas tasya kleśa visaṃyoga kṛtam asandhānam na anyathā sa ca kleśa visaṃyogaḥ pṛthagjanānām na asti iti kutas a pratisandhāna maraṇa citta tve api na hi maraṇa citta tvam pratisandhāna virodhi kleśa visaṃyogasya pratisandhānena virodha abhyupagamāt sa ca na abhyupagataḥ 
[063,xi_064,iii]	nanu ca siddhāntāt eva gamyate virodhaḥ na siddhāntasya arhan maraṇa cittaḥ eva virodha pratipādanāya vṛtteḥ siddhāntaḥ hi na sarvasya virodhasya vidhāyakaḥ mṛte cittasya sandhānam kva cittena upapāditam atha pramāṇataḥ siddhiḥ pratisandheḥ na vidyate tena tatra apramāṇa tvāt virodhasya asti sambhavaḥ tat rapi asat yadi siddhāntaḥ pramāṇa bādhitaḥ tadā apramāṇam eva kutas tatas samīhita siddhiḥ asiddhārthaḥ pramāṇena kim siddhāntonugamyate hetoḥ vekalī ataḥ tat ced kintadeva atra na uditam 
[064,iv^1]	yadi na pramāṇam eva siddhāntaḥ tadā tatas na virodha siddhiḥ pratisandhānena maraṇa cittasya kim asau anugamyatenuvartyate vā na khalu a pramāṇam anuvarttyamānam api pramāṇam bhavati pramāṇam ced sarvatra pramāṇam iti viparyyaya asiddhiḥ kvacid pramāṇam kvacid apramāṇam iti ced na icchāyāḥ ubhayoḥ api vādi prativādinoḥ samāna tvāt atha ahetuḥ vaikalyāt iti hetuḥ virodhasya sādhakaḥ na siddhāntaḥ hetoḥ vaikalyataḥ tad asandhānam yadi tat eva hetu vaikalyam kasmāt na uditam na uktam hetu tvena kim maraṇa citta tvāt anaikāntikaḥ 
[064,iv^2]	hetuḥ uyanyastaḥ athavā hetoḥ vaikalyataḥ tat ced hetoḥ śarīra ādi lakṣaṇasya maraṇa avasthāyām vaikalyam yadi hetu tve tu kim atra adhikam uktam ayam api hetvābhāse eva pūrvakaḥ anaikāntikaḥ ayam punar asiddhaḥ yatas tat eva atra hetu vaikalyam na rvidyate athavā kim tat eva atra na uditam no iti pratibodhe amāna ūnāḥ pratiṣedha vācakāḥ iti kim na uditam na ditam ditam khaṇḍitam khaṇḍitam eva iti arthaḥ vaikalyam eva asiddham avikalasya pūrvakasya manasaḥ hetu tvāt yathā ca etat tathā pratipāditam 
[064,v_064,vii]	atha api syāt na ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ hetulya vaikalya lakṣaṇaḥ tathā hi sa indriyaḥ kāyaḥ anindriyaḥ vā keśa nakha agra ādi lakṣaṇaḥ manaḥ vijñānasya āśrayaḥ tathā hi kāyāt eva utpadyate hṛdaya lakṣaṇāt anyatas vā tat ayuktam kāyasya dvayī gatiḥ sa indriyaḥ anindriyaḥ vā pratyekam hetuḥ anyathā vā na tāvat sa indriyaḥ tat dhīvat grahaṇa prāpte manaḥ jñānam na sa indriyāt jñāna utpādana sāmarthya bhedāt na sakalāt api acetana tvāt na anyasmāt hetu abhedāt saha sthitiḥ akṣa vat rūpa rasa vat artha dvāreṇa vikriyā 
[064,ix]	na tāvat pratyekam sa indriyaḥ kāyaḥ āśrayaḥ saha indriya śaktibhiḥ varttate iti sa indriyaḥ indriya rūpaḥ eva śakti śaktimatoḥ abhedāt tatas ca pratyekam indriyebhyaḥ eva manaḥ vijñānam utpadyate iti pakṣaḥ tat āha manaḥ jñānam na sa indriyāt na indriyebhyaḥ pratyekam bhavati tat dhīvat indriya buddhi vat prativiṣayam grahaṇasya prāpteḥ cakṣuḥ indriya anusāri hi manaḥ niyamena apara indriya anusāri manaḥ svabhāvam anyathā tad hetoḥ atad svabhāva tve sa kutas svabhāvaḥ tasya iti ahetukaḥ syāt 
[065,i_065,iii]	nanu ekam api kāraṇam tad atad svabhāva kārya janana svabhāvam upalabhyate yathā vanhiḥ dhūma janana svabhāvaḥ sāmagrī bhedaḥ ca vidyate rūpa sāmagrī samavadhāne cakṣuḥ ca cakṣuḥ vijñānam janayati rūpa virahe manaḥ vijñānam iti evam śrotra ādiṣu vācyam tat asat akṣa vyāpāram āśritya bhava t akṣajam iṣyate tad vayā pārī na tatra iti katham akṣa bhavam bhavet 
[065,iv]	tat dhīvat grahaṇa prāpteḥ iti asya ayam arthaḥ akṣa buddhiḥ hi tad vayā pāram anusarantī prāhikā athasya iti tathā vyapadiśyate yadi manaḥ buddheḥ api tattvam sā api tat dhīvat grāhiṇī syāt tadvayā pāra anusaraṇena anyathā katham tathā vyapadiśyate tad vyāpāra anusāraṇañca na upalabhyate tad ja tvena ca pratipattiḥ iti vyāhatam indriyāt ca asat nihite api arthe puras vyavasthita artha nirūpaṇa ākāra cakṣuḥ vijñāna vijñānam timira upahata keśa kalāpa ālocana ākāra vat manaḥ vijñānantu nimīlita locanasya api upajāyate katham tatra indriya vyāpāraḥ yat vikāre ca na vikāraḥ kathantat indriya jam tatra tad dhīvat grahaṇa prāpteḥ iti tad vikāreṇa vikāri vijñāna prāpteḥ iti arthaḥ grahaṇam vijñānam eva atha tad vikāreṇa na vikāraḥ tadā na tad jatā samudāyāt api na utpadyate iti ayam eva parihāraḥ 
[065,v]	parihāra antaram āha jñāna utpādana sāmarthya bhedāt jñāna utpādanam prati bhinnam eva sāmarthyam pṛthak bhūtam anya anapekṣyam eva dṛśyate na paraspara apekṣyam anyathā samudāyasyaka abhāve api abhāvāt aṅkuraḥ iva kṣiti ādi vaikalye na syāt bhavati ca cakṣuḥ ādi vikalānām api manaḥ vijñānantan na samudāya pratibaddham manaḥ api śabdena pūrvakaḥ hetuḥ samuccitaḥ 
[065,vi_065,viii]	acetana tvāt anyasmāt api na utpadyate anindriyāt nanu acetana tvāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ yadi indriya vijñāna virahāt iti tat iṣyate eva katham ayam hetuḥ yadi nāma indriya jñānam tatas na bhavati manaḥ vijñānantu kasmāt na bhavati atha manaḥ vijñāna abhāvāt acetana tvam tat eva vicāryamāṇam iti pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ atra ucyate cetayantaḥ na dṛśyante yadā keśa nakha ādayaḥ tadā tebhyaḥ manaḥ jñānam bhavati iti katham sthitiḥ 
[065,ix]	yathā hi cetanataḥ sparśa ādayaḥ upalabhyante tad vijñānaiḥ na tathā manaḥ vijñānena keśa nakha ādayaḥ tad paribaddha tve tad abhāve manaḥ vijñānam na yasyāt tad upaghāte ca upahatam bhavet yadi na kāyaḥ āśrayaḥ tadā saha sthitiḥ katham tat āha hetoḥ karmma saṃjñitasya saha sthiti niyama kāriṇaḥ abhedāt sāmarthyasya tathā vyavasthita tvāt akṣa vat rūpa rasavat yakṣa akṣāṇām rūpa rasayoḥ ca parasparam anāśri tve api kañcid kālam saha sthiti niyamaḥ na hi saha sthitau āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ eva kāraṇam 
[065,x_065,xi]	nanu tad vikāra vikāri tvāt āśrayāḥ cakṣuḥ ādaya ścakṣuḥ vijñāna ādīnām tathā śarīra vikārāt viśleṣa ādi nāma na stimita ādi lakṣaṇaḥ vikāraḥ iti āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ tat api asad arthasya grāhyasya dvāreṇa vikriyā pīḍām asahamānasya tad bhāvanayā tad manasikāreṇa vikriyā ālambamānāḥ hi śastra prahāra ādayaḥ manasā manasaḥ pīḍā kāriṇaḥ na āśraya bhūtāḥ ālambanañca bāhyam api vikāra kāri na ca tasya āśraya bhāvaḥ tad abhāve api āropa mātrāt pīḍā utpatteḥ 
[066,i_066,vi]	tasmāt āropita ākāram antar vāhyañca vedyate manasā tad vikāreṇa vikriyā mānasasya sā na ca āśraya ālambanayoḥ eka tā tatas tad āśrayaḥ na kāyaḥ iti na kliṣṭam manaḥ kāya āśritam tatas yaḥ ca tasya āśrayaḥ sa paścāt āvedayiṣyate pūrva apara samāropa mātram ālambanam param manasaḥ na anyat asti iti nirālambana āśrayaḥ api ca na upakārakaḥ iti eva hetuḥ tasya nivarttakaḥ viśiṣṭam eva hetu tvam kāryasya vinivarttakam kaḥ asau viśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ yasya nivarttaka tvam tat āha sattā upakāriṇī yasya nityantat anubandhataḥ sa hetuḥ saptamī tasmāt utpādāt iti ca ucyate 
[066,vii]	sa hi hetuḥ nirvarttakaḥ yasya satta upakāriṇī nittyam tad anubandhataḥ tad anubandhena iti anubandha unuvarttanam sadā anuvarttanāt upakāriṇī yasya sattā yasya tu kadācid upakāra sāmarthī an tad abhāve api kadācid upakāraḥ anyatas api bhavati viśeṣa lakṣaṇaḥ sa nityam anuvarttakaḥ na bhavati iti na tad nivṛtya api tad nivṛttiḥ dehasya ca sattā na sarva dā upakāriṇī pūrva citta mātra vikāre api kadācid vikāra dṛṣṭeḥ tatas deha abhāve api kadācid citta vikāra vihita vikāra tvāt tad upastambhāt āḥ te eva citta santatiḥ iti saṃbhāvyate na ca dehaḥ sadā upakāritayā kāraṇam iti prasiddhaḥ tathā hi 
[066,viii_066,ix]	svayam pareṇa vā dehaḥ hetuḥ ggamyeta kenacid utpannena anyathā vā api vedanena iti kalpanāḥ na tāvat anutpannam vedanam jānāti aham atas bhaviṣyāmi bhavāmi a bhūvam vā iti utpannasya tu vedanasya aham iti svarūpam ālambamānasya anyat vā tad adhigatiḥ eva kutas punar anyasya avagatiḥ idam am uta utpannam iti na khalu anyat ālambamānam anyat avagacchati cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānānām api tarhi sā eva kalpanā iti kutas cakṣuḥ a ādi kāraṇa tva matiḥ na teṣām anvaya vyatireka gati sambhavāt tathā hi 
[066,x]	cakṣuḥ unmīlayan eva naraḥ pratyavagacchati rūpa darśanam utpannam gamyate tad anantaram janma ādi deha ubhimukhaḥ hetu tvena na gamyate jñānasya prāgabhāve hi jñātṛ tvasya vivodhakaḥ pareṇa asya pratītiḥ ced prāc abhāva gatiḥ kutas adṛśya anupalambhaḥ hi na abhāvasya prasādhakaḥ suptasya api prabodha usti prāk jñāna anupalambhane na tatra svapna vijñāna prāgabhāva gatiḥ satī 
[066,xiv_067,i]	atha asya syāt sva saṃvirttiḥ yadi prāk vidyate matiḥ prasupta avasthāyām na asti eva smṛteḥ abhāvāt prabuddhasya yatas dṛṣṭā svapna saṃvedane smṛtiḥ tat asat abhāvaḥ pratipatteḥ kim kiṃvā sat api vismṛtam jāgratā hi kṛtam svapne smaryate na eva kenacid na khalu svapna saṃvedanam jāgrat vijñāna antaram iti kenacid pratīyate tathā api tat tatas eva atha prabodhe sati tasya pratītiḥ tasya api prabodhe na pratīyate iti kutas etat tasmāt apratītiḥ eva dehasya sadā upakāri tvena tatosya nivarttane vijñānam nivarttate iti na gatiḥ 
[067,ii_067,v]	atha gomayāt utpadyate śālūkaḥ na ca tasya satta upakāriṇī nityam tad anubandhena tathā api gomaya abhāve prathama bhāvaḥ eva śālūkasya tat api yat kiñcit yatas gomayāt prathama utpattiḥ yādṛśī tādṛśī punar tad abhāve na dṛṣṭā eva jñānasya tu viparyayaḥ yādṛśaḥ hi gomayāt utpadyamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śālūkaḥ sa kim tādṛśaḥ eva anya dā api upalabhyate manaḥ vijñānantu tathā bhūtam eva ādau paścāt ca iti na tena aikāntika tā 
[067,vi]	nanu asmin sati idam bhavati asya utpādāt idam utpadyate iti etat eva hetu lakṣaṇam bhagavatā uktam na tu sadā anuvarttakam aparam vicāritam bhagavān eva ca paramārthataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāve pāramārthikam pramāṇam vyāpyanvaya vyatireka grahaṇāt iti pratipāditam na ca sambhavī upakāravān arthaḥ na ucyate bhagavatā tat katham etat 
[067,vii]	na eṣa doṣaḥ tasmāt eva asmābhiḥ uktāt sadā upakāri tvena saptamī tasmāt eva pañcamī utpādāt iti ca ucyate asmin sati idam bhavati iti sadā anuvarttanam āha satī iti nimitta saptamī anyathā tad abhāve api bhavane na tad nimitta kosya bhāvaḥ pañcamī apādāne apādāna tā ca janikarttuḥ prabhavaḥ iti prabhavaḥ ca nimittam eva 
[067,viii]	athavā anyathā vyākhyāyatesmābhiḥ yadi vijñāna pūrvakam vijñānantathā api janma ādi vijñānāt pūrvaka janma vijñānam iti pratīyatām tasya tad kāryatvāt bhāvi janma vijñānantu kutonumīyate atha samartha kāraṇa darśanāt kārya anumānam tat tarhi hetu antaram prasaktam kāraṇa lakṣaṇam atha kārye sandehāt yogya tā anumā nam na bhāvi para lokā niścaye vyartha tā yogya tā anumānasya bhāvi para loka anumāne hi dharmma ādiṣu pravarttana prayāsaḥ saphalaḥ 
[067,ix_067,xi]	atra ucyate kāraṇam eva bhāvi janma vijñānam kāryam api tat yatas sattā upakāriṇī yasya nityantat anubandhataḥ sa hetuḥ yasya hi satta upakāriṇī nittyam tad anubandhataḥ vyāpi tvena vyāpakam vyatireke sati kāraṇam artha antare gamye kāryam eva hetuḥ yad artha antarasya gamakam tat vyāpakasya eva anyathā vyabhicāri tvāt agamaka tā syāt yat ca yam antareṇa na bhavati tat tasya kāraṇam kāraṇam katham kāryam iti ced na tasya kāryatvāt tathā hi 
[067,xii_068,ii]	vikārāḥ cetanā ādīnām udaya ādeḥ prasādhakāḥ tad vikāratayā īkṣyante tat ca kāryatvam ucyate ayam vikāraḥ eva na syāt yadi abhyudayena na bhavitavyam tat kṛtoyam vikāraḥ iti sakala loka vyavahāraḥ etāvatā eva anyatra api kārya tvam bhāvi katham kāraṇam tat avyabhicārāt eva nanu yaḥ upakārī sa kāraṇam katham ca bhāvya vidyamānam upakāri atītam tarhi kāraṇat na prāpnoti 
[068,iii]	tat api asat na upakārī iti na tad utpatti kāle vidyamāna tvāt koyam utpatti kālaḥ yadi kāryāt prāk katham avidyamānasya upakārakaḥ atas eva kāraṇam avidyamāna karaṇāt avidyamānasyam karaṇam iti korthaḥ tad anantara bhāvinī tasya sattā tat etat ānantaryam ubhaya apekṣayā api samānam yathā eva bhūta apekṣayā tathā bhāvi apekṣayā api na ca ānantaryam eva tattve nibaṃdhanam vyavahitasya api kāraṇa tvāt 
[068,iv_068,vii]	tathā hi gāḍha suptasya vijñānam prabodhe pūrva vedanāt jāyate vyavadhānena kālena iti viniścitam na khalu tatra śarīram kāraṇam pūrva saṃskāra anuvarttane na tasya dṛṣṭeḥ tādṛśaḥ eva hi śarīrenyathā ca anyathā pūrva vijñāna anurūpyeṇa utpatteḥ tasmāt anvaya vi atiḥ eka anuvidhāyi tvam nibandhanam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya tad bhāvini api vidyate 
[068,viii_068,x]	yat eva yat anvaya vi atireka anuvidhāyi tat eva tasya kāraṇam aparaḥ tu viśeṣaḥ vyarthaḥ atha api syāta asmin sati idam bhavati asya utpādāt idam utpadyate iti kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇam na ca atra anvaya vyatireka mātram anena kathyate yatas saptamyā pūrva bhāvasya paṃcamyā ca nidarśanam para bhāvaḥ prathamayā tatas api ca nidarśyate 
[068,xi_068,xiii]	na hi tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāna mātram atra upadarśitam pūrva apara bhāva upadarśanasya parisphuṭa tvāt tat api asatti am saptamī tasmāt āt utpādāt iti ca ucyate na khalu saptamyā pūrva bhāvasya upadarśanam pañcamyā vā nimitta tva mātra tvasya upadarśanāt etat nimitta koyam iti arthaḥ yad abhāve ca na bhavati yaḥ saḥ eva bhavan tad nimitta koyam iti arthaḥ nanu sati iti katham bhāvī vyapadiśyate tasya avidyamāna tvāt evam vyapadeśa anupapatteḥ tathā na utpāda unutpannasya 
[068,xiv]	nanu atītasya api katham sattā yena asau satī iti vyapadiśyate vinaṣṭasya ca katham utpādaḥ āsīt iti ced anyasya api bhaviṣyati kaḥ prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvayoḥ viśaṣaḥ athavā asmin sati idam bhavati iti yasya ca bhāvena bhāva lakṣaṇam iti anena saptamī tatas sati iti anena nimitta bhāva mātram lakṣyate na tu tadā sattvam tad abhāvena ca bhāva lakṣaṇam bhāvena ca bhāvaḥ bhāvinā api lakṣyate eva mṛtyu prayuktam ariṣṭam iti loke vyavahāraḥ yadi mṛtyuḥ nā bhaviṣyan na bhavet evam bhūtam ariṣṭam iti na ca utpādāt iti kāla vibhāgaḥ na khalu vibhaktayaḥ kāla viśeṣa vidhāyinyaḥ kāraka tva mātra pratipādane sāmarthyāt kāraka tvam eva asataḥ katham iti ced katham aṃkuraḥ jāyate ghaṭam karoti iti kartṛ karmma bhāvaḥ buddhi stha tayā kāraka tve na atra tasya kākaiḥ bhakṣaṇam 
[069,i_069,iv]	atha yasya upalambha pūrvikā yasya upalabdhiḥ tat kāraṇam tat api asat yasya upalabdhiḥ prathamam tat tasya yadi kāraṇam na khala antargatam bījam hetuḥ syāt aṃkura udaye atha tad jātīyasya prathamam upalabdhiḥ iti tathā ucyate katham anupalabdhasya kāraṇa tvam na hi anyasya upalabdhau anyasya upalabhyamāna tā upacaramātrantu syāt tasmāt upalabdhyā sattā upalakṣyate tathā ca saḥ eva arthaḥ asmin satī iti nimitta bhāvaḥ sattāyāḥ sa ca avyabhicāra viṣaya tvam eva yasya tu prāk upalabdhiḥ iti tu sarvasya tu pūrva bhāvinaḥ kāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ avyabhicāra viṣaya tve tat eva kāraṇa tvam
