[129,v_129,vii]	na hi go pratyayasya asti samāna artha bhuvaḥ kvacid tāratamyam pṛthivī ādau prāṇita ādeḥ iha api vā go pratyayaḥ hi samāna ātmanaḥ sambhavati atha prāṇitām prati na viśeṣaḥ bhūtānām rāga ādīn api viśeṣe kaścid tad rūpa vyāvṛtteḥ anyatas api vā na ca asau tāratamya yogī bhavati gaurgotaraḥ gotamaḥ iti lokāyata darśaṃna apekṣayā pṛthivī ādau prāṇī prāṇi itaraḥ prāṇitamaḥ iti tasmāt samāna hetoḥ samāna tvam apakarṣe tu atyantam ucchedaḥ api auṣṇyasya tāratamye api na anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ kadācana tathā iha api iti ced na agneḥ auṣṇyāt bheda niṣedhataḥ 
[129,viii]	asti eva iha agneḥ auṣṇyasya tāratamyam na ca sarva ātmanā auṣṇyam asambhavi tathā api na rāga ādīnām tadvat eva sarvathā sambhava abhāvaḥ na rāga ādīnām kāyāt vyatirekāt na atra auṣṇyāt agneḥ bhedaḥ auṣṇyasya eva agni vyapadeśāt yadi auṣṇyam na syāt agniḥ eva asau na bhavet na tu rāga ādi abhāve bhūtam eva tat na bhavati yadi tu bhūta saṃghātaḥ anyaḥ dharmī tasya dharmmaḥ auṣṇyam parikalpyate tadā tasya uṣmā avasthāyām ucchedaḥ eva auṣṇyasya atha jvālāya adharmi tvam parikalpyate auṣṇyam dharmaḥ sa ca tatra na vicchidyate tādatamye api iti parasya parihāraḥ saḥ api ayuktaḥ 
[130,i_130,vii]	mantra tantra ādi sāmarthyāt jvālā auṣṇyena vinā bhavet maṇeḥ jvālā vinā evau ṣṇyam dṛśyate tat na yuktimat jvālāyāḥ na ca dharmi tvam auṣṇyam pratyavimuktitaḥ jvālā ādi varṇṇa saṃsthānam tat hi na auṣṇyasya sambhavāt na tasyāḥ dharmi tā yuktā tena na etat nidarśanam jvālā na auṣṇyam vinā na auṣṇyam jvālā vinā bhavati tena na sā dhārmitayā yuktā na ca atyantam aviyoge jvālā tad auṣṇyayoḥ ddharma dharmi bhāvaḥ tena sa viśeṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ tāratamya anubhavinaḥ yasya anyasya sataḥ guṇāḥ te kvacid pratihanyante tad bhede dhavala ādi vat 
[130,viii]	yasya anyasya guṇāḥ santaḥ tāratamyam anubhavantaḥ na te kvacid pratighātavantaḥ yathā ghaṭa ādiṣu dhavala ādayaḥ nanu dhavala ādi rūpa vyatirekeṇa kaḥ iva aparaḥ paṭa ādiḥ yena tasya anyasya sataḥ dhavala ādīnām ucchedaḥ sattyam etat tathā api spṛśya rūpāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ na varṇa viśeṣa rūpāḥ tad abhāve paṭasya bhāvāt tena anyasya iti ayam arthaḥ yasya santānena anuvartamānasya yaḥ uccheda dharmmāṇaḥ udaya dharmmāṇaḥ ca te atyantam uccheda dharmmāṇaḥ api yathā dhavala ādayaḥ iti vākya arthaḥ 
[130,ix_130,x]	athavā anagni tvenu vartamāne auṣṇyasya udayavyayayoḥ tāratamye api na ca evam rāga ādīnām uccheda sadbhāvāt śakteḥ anucchedaḥ iti ced na śakteḥ artha antara tvāt na rāga ādayaḥ eva śaktiḥ śakteḥ api kvacid uccheda dṛṣṭeḥ atas eva āha rūpa ādi vat na niyamaḥ teṣām bhūta avibhāgataḥ tat tulyañcet na rāga ādeḥ saha utpatti prasaṅgataḥ 
[130,xi]	na khalu rūpa rasa ādi vat avibhāginaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ rāga ādayaḥ tad abhāve api bhūtānām bhāvāt na tu rūpa ādi abhāve atha tatra api evam eva tat api asat rāga ādīnām śarīreṇa saha utpatti prasaṅgāt bhūtebhyaḥ na viśiṣṭa tā rūpa avabhāsanam api na ca rāga ādīnām deha sahabhāvitā sarvadā na ca mahābhūta tva mātra vādinaḥ rūpa ādīnām bhūtebhyaḥ anyat tvam tattva bahutva prasaṅagāt tatas avinirbhāga bhāgī saha utpādaḥ viṣaya hetuka tvāt 
[131,i_131,iv]	viṣaya āsannidhāne kadācid abhāvaḥ api iti ced tat na vikalpya viṣaya tvāt ca viṣayāḥ na niyāmakāḥ sa bhāga hetu virahāt rāga ādeḥ niyamaḥ na vā sarvadā sarva buddhīnām janma vā hetu sannidheḥ na khalu viṣaya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāna prasaṅga tad santānā rāga ādayaḥ tad abhāve api bhavana anubhavāt sa bhāga hetuḥ ca na iṣyate tatas na rāga ādīnām tad abhāvāt kadācid anutpattiḥ tatas aniyamena ekaika rāga ādi sahabhāvī dehaḥ syāt athavā sarve eva rāga ādayaḥ deha sahabhāvinaḥ bhaveyuḥ sarveṣām hetoḥ dehasya sannidheḥ atha dehasya pariṇati viśeṣaḥ eva tādṛśaḥ yena na rāga ādi sahabhāvaḥ yadi evam 
[131,v_131,xiv]	kutas pariṇatiḥ tasya tādṛśī yena tu tathā yatas kutaścid iti ced na bhavet apim sarvadā adarśanena na evam ced na syāt kaścid sa hetukaḥ anagneḥ api dhūmaḥ syāt sarvatas kinna sambhavaḥ tasya kācid pariṇatiḥ iti vaktum hi śakyate ahetoḥ api bhāvasya deśa ādi niyamaḥ bhavet dṛśyate niyamaḥ na iti vaktum tatra api śakyate dṛṣṭa mātra pariṣvaṅgaḥ kriyate yadi sarvathā dṛṣṭam advaitam eva atra vyavahāraḥ viśīryate vyavahāraḥ parityaktum aśakyaḥ kalpyate yadi para loka ādike api eṣa vyavahāraḥ anyathā katham vyavahāraḥ anumānena sakalaḥ kriyate yathā para loka ādike api evam eva tattya jyate katham na jñāna artha tayā bhedaḥ na api nīla ādita ākṛtiḥ na pūrva apara bhāvena pratyakṣeṇa prasidhyati tatas anumānataḥ bhedaḥ sakalaḥ vyavahāra vat tena anumānam utsṛjya na kaścid jīvitum kṣamaḥ tatas idam pratyuktam 
[131,xv]	dṛṣṭam artham vidhūyān yat adṛṣṭam kalpayanti ye mūḍhāḥ piṇḍam parityajya te nihanti karam vṛthā heya upādeya viṣayaḥ na vivekaḥ akṣa vṛttitaḥ heyam etat na bhavati kutas pratyakṣa mātrataḥ upādeya tva bhāvāt vā heya tvasya niṣedhataḥ upādeya vyavasthānam heya tvasya viparyayāt artha kriyā arthinām artha kriyā upādeya tā sadā pratyekṣaṇa na dṛṣṭā sā tatas vṛttim vidhitsatām pratyakṣatas upādeya bhāvasya atas na vedanam na bhāvi artha kriyāṃvetti pratyakṣam na api apratītikām heya tvasya niṣedhaḥ api heyā kṣādatyayaḥ kutas tat atra vastu na asti iti pratītiḥ na iyam akṣataḥ dvayoḥ adhyakṣayoḥ na asti heya upādeya tā gatiḥ atra api pūrvakaḥ nyāyaḥ pratyāvṛtya pravartate atyanta abhyāsa todhyakṣāt yadi sarvam pratīyate apratīte asti na abhyāsaḥ tatas anyonya samāśrayaḥ abhyāsāt yāvat adhyakṣam na asti nāsti pratīta tā 
[131,xxv_131,xxvi^1]	yāvat pratīta tā na asti na abhyāse adhyakṣata udayaḥ adhyakṣa mātram yadi mānam asmin aheya tattva itarayoḥ vivekaḥ sva rūpa mātra prativedanam tat advaitatatvesya tatas prasaktiḥ anumānam samāśritya heya ādi pravibhāgi tā vyavahāram pratītam tat na param parimṛgyate atha advaitam samāśritya para loka nirākriyā asya api kriyatā an na idam iyati eva avatiṣṭhate iha lokaḥ api na eva asti na asti nāstika tā tatas cetaḥ sarva upasaṃhārāt yuktam eva tathā sati atha vyāmohe eva ayam iha loke yaḥ ādaraḥ asya api kṣayam icchan kaḥ vyāmoha antaram icchati vyāmohaḥ kutas eva ayam yadi anādiḥ anantakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa paraḥ lokaḥ kim anyat bhāṣitam
[131,xxvi^2_132,xiv]	vṛthā atha ahetukaḥ eva ayam sarvam eva astu ahetukam tathā sati vṛthā prāptam nāstikena uditam tvayā uditam na upayogī idam yadi kvāpi kimarthitā atha arthaḥ kaścid asya asti tatra eva asyāstu hetu tā para paryyanuyogaḥ atha yadi evam kriyate paraiḥ korthaḥ tena kṛtena api yadi hetuḥ na kasyacid avidyā kṛtaḥ eva ayam iti kasya aparādhitā yadi na ucchidyate avidyā vṛthā eva para bhāṣitam atha api ucchidyate aviṃdyā para uditam anarthakam avidyā hetuka tve vā anādya vidyā gatiḥ bhavet tathā ca sati saṃsāraḥ siddhaḥ eva avivādataḥ vikalpāt na aparā avidyā saḥ api pūrva vikalpataḥ bhāti anādi prabandhoyam vikalpasya prasidhyati tasmāt anādi vāsanā paripāka upanītāḥ evam sukha ādayaḥ na paramārthataḥ tatas duḥkham eva paramārthataḥ sakalam iti 
[132,xv_132,xviii^1]	tatra duḥkham kadācid upalambhāt tat adhruvam doṣa niśrayāt duḥkham hetu vaśa tvāt ca na ca ātmā na api adhiṣṭhitam na akāraṇam adhiṣṭhātā nityam vā janakam katham tasmāt anekam ekasmāt bhinna kālam na jāyate anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ ca iti catur ākāram duḥkha satyam tat kadācid upalabhyamāna tayā anityam na hi nityasya nityam eva upalabhyamāna tayā anityam na hi nityasya nityam upalabhyamānasya kadācid upalambhaḥ yuktaḥ upalabhya itara svabhāvayoḥ paraspara parihāra sthita tvena virodhāt upalabhya tayā eva saḥ iti pratipādanāt na ca sarvadā sarvam upalabdhum śakyam 
[132,xviii^2]	krama upalabhyasya nitya tvāt na ca kramaḥ eka tve sambhavati kramavataḥ eka tvena apratibhāsanāt pratyakṣasya apravṛtteḥ anumānasya tad abhāve abhāvāt pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt anumāna pūrvaka tve andha paramparā prasaṅgāt tasmāda dhruva tā saṃsāri skandhānām duḥkha tā ca rāga ādīnām doṣāṇām niḥśrayāt hetu vaśa tvāt ca hetu pratibandhāt ca dukham sarva para vaśam duḥkham iti nyāyāt cakārāt abhyāsa mātra niśrayāt iti avagantavyam na ātma rūpam na api anātma adhiṣṭhitam akāraṇasya adhiṣṭhātṛ tva abhāvāt avaśyam adhiṣṭhātrā sa upayogena bhavitavyam upayoga hetoḥ hetu tvāt yadi ca ātma rūpa tvam skandhānām nitya tā bhavet na ca nityam janakam ajanakasya bhāvaḥ tatvam upalabdhum aśakyatvāt anekañca bhinna kālam jñānam ekasmāt nitya tayā na utpattimat na ca api ātma adhiṣṭhāyaka tayā pratīyateyat ca pratīyate skandhānām rūpam
[133,i_133,iv]	tat adhruvam atha anadhiṣṭhitāni kāraṇāni katham sva kārye pravartante tena adhiṣṭhātā anumīyate na anitya cetanā adhiṣṭhāna mātrāt samāpta tvāt cetanā ca anādiḥ iti tatas kārya anutpādataḥ anyeṣu saṅgateṣu api hetuṣu hetu antara anumānam syāt na etat nityeṣu vidyate yadi anye hetavaḥ samuditāḥ api kāryasya ajanakāḥ tadā hetu antaram api vidyate yat abhāvāt kāryam ajātam na ca evam samanantara pratyaya yogya tā viśeṣa mātreṇa siddheḥ na ca nitya vyāpinām kadācid kvacid vā abhāvaḥ yena tad abhāvāt abhāvaḥ pratīyate anvaya mātreṇa janane sarve eva ākāśa ādayaḥ adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhaveyuḥ teṣu api satsu kāraṇānām nija kāryeṣu pravṛtteḥ teṣām api vyāpi nitya tayā samāna tvāt teṣām anadhiṣṭātṛ tvāt iti ced tat eva vyāpi nitya tayā na sidhyati avyāpinaḥ api nityasya bhavet sarvatra hetu tā sāmīpyāt eva naḥ hetuḥ hetuḥ dūre api dṛśyate dūra deśaḥ api śabda ādiḥ sva kāryasya vidhāyakaḥ tasmāt anvaya mātreṇa kāraṇam sakalam bhavet 
[133,vi_133,vii]	kādācid ka tayā siddhā duḥkhasya asya sa hetu tā nittyam sattvam asat tvam vā ahetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt samudaya sattyam api caturvidham eva hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ ca iti tatra hetuḥ ahetu parihāreṇa samudayaḥ eka kāraṇa parihāreṇa aprabhavaḥ asāmarthya parihāreṇa prabhavati asmāt iti prabhavaḥ pratyayaḥ prādhānya parihāreṇa tatra duḥkhasya hetuḥ asti iti pratipādyate na 
[133,viii_133,xiii]	kādācid katayā anyasya hetu yogaḥ hi dṛśyate ahetoḥ hi padārthasya sattvam eva anyathā athavā yathā yathā hi hetunām abhāvaḥ nityatā tathā timira jñāna keśa ādeḥ viṣayeṇa vinodayāt sva saṃvedana gamyasya dharmmadhātoḥ ahetukaḥ dṛśyate nitya sadbhāvaḥ akādācitkatva lakṣaṇaḥ bandhyā suta ādyasannityam abhāvāt kāraṇa ātmanaḥ atra ca udyam taikṣṇya ādīnām yathā na asti kāraṇam kaṇṭaka ādiṣu tathā akāraṇam etat syāt iti kecid pracakṣate 
[133,xiv]	ahetuka vādinaḥ svabhāvena mahābhūta rūpam na kriyate viśeṣāḥ eva deśa kāla avasthāḥ viśeṣa yogi tayā kriyante tatra viśeṣāṇām ahetuka tvam upalabhyate tomara sūcī śūla tūlikā ādīnām hi na loha ādi rūpa tā kriyate lohakāra ādibhiḥ tīkṣṇa tā eva kriyate loha ādīnām api aparaiḥ na pṛthivī tva ādikam kriyate loha tā ādi rūpa tāyāḥ karaṇāt lohakāra ādi abhāve api tu kaṇṭaka ādīnām taikṣṇyasya tad abhāve api bhāvāt na ayam eva ca aniyata hetuka tā ahetuka tā tathā anye api jagataḥ vaicitrya kāriṇaḥ viśeṣā ahetuka tā eva bhaveyuḥ kaḥ eva atra virodhaḥ tat api asat 
[134,i_134,ii]	sati eva yasmina yat janma vikāre vā api vikriyā tat tasya kāraṇam prāhuḥ tat teṣām api vidyate atra abhiprāyaḥ yadi viśeṣāḥ eva janyāḥ teṣām na akāraṇa tvam na khalu badarī kaṇṭakānām vakra tva tīkṣṇa tve badarī kaṇṭakam antareṇa staḥ tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt tat kāryatā iti na ahetuka tā atha lohakāreṇa api kriyate tatas vyabhicārāt evam ucyate tat api na yathāvat 
[134,iii]	buddhi pūrva kriyā dṛṣṭeḥ buddhimat kāraṇam bhavet syāt tathā īśvara kartṛ tvam na asti ahetuka tā tatas badarī kaṇṭaka ādīnām tatas eva nidarśanāt viśeṣa kalpanā at naḥ ced viśeṣaḥ astu sa hetukaḥ badarī bījataḥ kiñcid loha kāra āditaḥ param viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate no ced viśeṣaḥ na eva vidyate na hi darśana mātreṇa viśeṣaḥ parigṛhyate tat eva advaitam āyātam tat eva ahetukam bhavet tasmāt yatas viśaṣāḥ te tatas eva sa hetukāḥ na hi hetu vihīnasya viśeṣa tvam prasidhyati 
[134,viii_134,x]	tasmāt yadi bhedāḥ yadi bāhya artha tā sarvaṃthā sa hetuka tvam anyathā viparyayaḥ nanu sati eva yasmin yat janma tasya hetu tve sparśasya darśana hetu tā prasaktā sparśa abhāve asvabhāvāt tat asat eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt aviyogaḥ parasparam rūpa sparśa tayoḥ tena tad abhāve na darśanam tatra hi sparśam antareṇa rūpam eva na bhavati yadi tu rūpam bhavet bhavet eva darśanam na ca evaṃvidhāt vyatirekāt kāraṇa tvam api tu rūpam upadarśya yadi sparśa abhāve abhāvam upadarśayet darśanasya athavā 
[134,xi_134,xiv]	sparśasya rūpa hetu tvāt darśane asti nimitta tā paraspara aviyogena samāna kālayoḥ api hetu tvāt upādāya rūpasya rūpasya sparśa rūpāṇi bhūtāni hetuḥ tatas pāraṃparyeṇa darśane sparśasya asti eva hetu tā iti na vipakṣa vṛtti tā hetoḥ iti avyabhicāraḥ eva evam tāvat ahetuka tvam pratiṣiddham iti hetutaḥ iti eka ākāraḥ vyavasthitaḥ samudayaḥ iti dvitīyam ākāram āha nityānām pratiṣedhena na īśvara ādeḥ ca sambhavaḥ 
[134,xv]	sa hetuka tve api duḥkhasya tatas nitya eka kāraṇa niṣedhena samudaya ākāra tā nirṇṇayaḥ yadi kāraṇam ekam nityam eva bhavet anapekṣaṇāt nityasya anādheya viśeṣa tvāt teṣāñca nityānām pradhāna ādīnām prāk eva niṣedhaḥ kutas etat iti ced asāmarthyāt krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā śakti vaikalyāt na prabhava tvam tṛtīyaḥ ākāraḥ tṛṣṇāyāḥ eva saḥ ākāraḥ etat eva āha 
[134,xvi_134,xvii]	asāmarthyāt atas hetuḥ bhava vān śā parigrahaḥ yasmāt deśa viśeṣasya tad prāpti āśā kṛtaḥ nṛṇām anyasya kāraṇasya karmmaṇaḥ anyasya vā na prabhava tvam na khalu karmma śarīram avidyā vā prabhavaḥ samartha kāraṇa apara nāmā tṛṣṇā abhāve abhāvāt janmanaḥ dṛśyate ca tṛṣṇāyāḥ prabhavanam yatas parigrahaḥ āgraha apara vyapadeśaḥ tad prāpti tṛṣṇā kṛtaḥ parigrahaḥ ca ayam janma samāgamaḥ tasmāt asya tṛṣṇā prabhavaḥ bhava vān chāna āgata janma prārthana ākārā 
[134,xviii_135,ii]	nanu na deśa viśeṣa ādi prārthanā samudaya sattyam uktam hi bhagavatā tatra katamat samudayaḥ ārya sattyam yā iyam tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī yat uta kāya tṛṣṇā bhava tṛṣṇā vibhava tṛṣṇā ca iti na ayam virodhaḥ yasmāt sā bhavet śāpti anāpti icchoḥ pravṛttiḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ yatas api prāṇinaḥ kāma vibhava icche ca te mate 
[135,iii_135,iv]	yā iyam sthāna upakaraṇa ādi tṛṣṇā sā bhava icchā saṃsāra tṛṣṇā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī sā sarvā eva kāma tṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhava tṛṣṇā yā sthāna ādi tṛṣṇā sā bhavatṛṣṇā sā bhava icchā yā svarga prārthanā ākārā sā kāma tṛṣṇā yā duḥkha viyoga icchā sā vibhava tṛṣṇā tasmāt avirodhaḥ eva samudaya satti a nirdeśaḥ na āgama virodhaḥ kaścid iti sarvatra ca ātma snehasya hetu tvāt saṃpravarttate asukhe sukha saṃjñasya tasmāt tṛṣṇā bhava āśrayaḥ 
[135,v]	ahaṅkāra sanniśrayāt eka tvena āropitam tā cittamālā tatra yaḥ snehaḥ sarvatra saṃpravartane sthāna upakaraṇa ādau asukhe sukha ādi rūpa rahita tvena paramārthataḥ citta viparyaya upahatasya pravartanāt hetu tvam atas tṛṣṇā prabhava āśrayaḥ na hi adṛṣṭaḥ kvacid api pravartana sambandhitaḥ karūṇā yogataḥ anyatra na saṃsāra kāraṇam atas eva pravartanam prati tṛṣṇāyāḥ sahakāri tvāt pratyaya mātra tā na upādāna tvam tatra cittam eva upādānam tasya pratyayaḥ tṛṣṇā kadācid karūṇā anena pratyayate iti ākāraḥ kathitaḥ 
[135,vi_135,viii]	nanu pratyaya tve api na tṛṣṇā pratyayaḥ api tu dehaḥ tatas deha saṅgataḥ na vīta rāgaḥ etat eva darśayati virakta janma adṛṣṭeḥ iti ācāryāḥ saṃpracakṣate adeha rāga at ṛṣṭeḥ ca dehāt rāga samudbhavaḥ yathā eva hi vīta rāgasya janma na dṛṣṭam iti rāgaḥ janmanaḥ hetuḥ atas eva yuktaḥ dehaḥ rāga ādeḥ hetuḥ adehasya rāga adṛṣṭiḥ atra ucyate rāga manteraṇā api janma bhavati karuṇā vaśāt abhirati viṣaya tvam tu tasya tṛṣṇayā hriyate iti viśeṣa mātra hetu tvāt tṛṣṇā pratyaya mātram evam yadi dehaḥ api pratyaya mātram rāga ādīnām ayoni śomana sikāraḥ eva tu upādāna kāraṇam tadā iṣṭam eva saṃgṛhītam iti darśayati 
[135,ix_136,i]	nimitta upagamāt iṣṭam upādānam tu vāryate imāntu yuktim anvicchan bādhate sva matam svayam dehaḥ api rāgasya ayoni śomanaskāram anuvartamānaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate iva sa kadācid vāsanā prabodhasya hetuḥ viṣaya vat eṣā tu yuktiḥ rāga hetu tvam api dehasya sampādayati tatas anyonya hetu tvāt tathābhūta an ādi sāmagrī prabhavam janma iti janma antara prasiddhiḥ iti carccitam cā rvā kaḥ ca rccitam arcciṣmatā nanu sa guṇam dravyam eva udyate tatas anayoḥ anyonyam ahetu tā janmanā sahabhāvaḥ ced jātānām rāga darśanāt sa bhāga jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇa tve api na uditam ajñāna muktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna preraṇāt bhave 
[136,iii_136,iv]	yadi hi janmanā sahabhāvaḥ rāga ādīnām iti na rāga ādayaḥ dehasya hetuḥ tadā dehaḥ api na rāga ādīnām na ca ahetuka tā tatas samāna jātīya kāraṇa janitā rāga ādayaḥ iti siddham abhimatam nanu na tṛṣṇā kāraṇam ekā eva avidyā tṛṣṇā karmma ca iti trayasya kāraṇa tvāt tṛṣṇā eva tatra tatra abhinandinī iti samudaya satti a nirdeśaḥ katham 
[136,v_136,vii]	na etat asti kāraṇa tve api na anantara kāraṇa tvam tṛṣṇā eva ānantaryeṇa kāraṇam saṃsāre santānasya preraṇāt na hi moha karmmaṇoḥ satoḥ api tṛṣṇām antareṇa kaścid prerayitā na hi viparyastaḥ api saṅga tṛṣṇām antareṇa pravarttate atas eva āha ānantaryāt na karma api sati tasmin asambhavāt karmmā upāttam api rājya ādi parityajati atṛṣṇaḥ 
[136,viii_136,xii]	nanu buddhiḥ karma anusāriṇī iti parityāgaḥ karmmā eva tat tādṛśam yena upanatam avadhīrayati atha mukta ātmanām janmanaḥ asambhavaḥ iti ucyate teṣām api karma kṣayaḥ eva muktiḥ anyathā abhāvāt atra ucyate tṛṣṇā virahitasya asya yadi karmma parikṣayaḥ pradhānam kāraṇam tṛṣṇā iti etat eva atra yuktimat atha tṛṣṇā asti na eva asti karmmaṇaḥ asya parikṣayaḥ sa tṛṣṇasya asya hi bhavet punar karma apara aparam evam tāvat catur ākāram ārya sattyam vyākhyātam samudaya lakṣaṇam idānī tad duḥkham nirodha sambhavī iti nirodha sattyam catur ākāram āha 
[136,xiii_136,xiv]	tad anāti antikam hetoḥ pratibandha ādi sambhavāt saṃsāri tvāt aniḥ mokṣaḥ na iṣṭa tvāt aprasiddhitaḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītataḥ niḥśaraṇataḥ ca iti catvāraḥ ākārāḥ nirodhaḥ eva na asti iti vādinam prati nirodha tā hi ucyate muktānām api rāga ādi sambhavaḥ iti paraiḥ abhyupagamyate tad pratiṣedhena śāntataḥ atas paraḥ api sambhavati mokṣa tā ati pratikṣepeṇa praṇītataḥ iti ākāraḥ muktaḥ api punar amuktaḥ bhavati iti nirasya etat niḥsaraṇate iti caturthaḥ ākāraḥ tat prathamaḥ ākāra tāti anāti antikam na atyantam bhavati nirudhyate api na ca saṃsāri tvāt asambhavaḥ mokṣasya doṣaḥ iṣṭa tvāt na hi kasyacid mokṣa usti yohi baddhaḥ na hi tasya mokṣa usti tattsvabhāva tvātna muktaḥ sya api bandhaḥ sadā tasya mukta svabhāva tvāt kevala citta santānasya apariśuddhasya sataḥ sāmagrī viśeṣataḥ paraḥ bhāgaḥ viśuddhaḥ utpadyate tat apāsya pariśuddhasya saṃsāritā eva asiddhā na ca saṃsārī paramārthataḥ kaścid asti kṣaṇānām asaṃsaraṇāt santānasya ca paramārthataḥ abhāvāt tatas saṃsāritva āditya siddhaḥ hetuḥ na ca api moktā avidyate yasya mokṣaḥ 
[137,ii_137,iii]	nanu yadi baddhaḥ na moktā anyasya bandhaḥ anyasya maukṣaḥ anyasya kṣudh anyasya tṛptiḥ anyaḥ cikitsā duḥkham anubhavati anyaḥ vyādhi rahitaḥ anyaḥ tu yaḥ parikleśa vān aparaḥ svarga sukham anubhavati paraḥ śāstra abhyāsa āyaḥ taḥ anyaḥ adhigata śāstraḥ tadā kim iti hetoḥ abhiyogaḥ prekṣāvataḥ atra samādhiḥ yasmāt yāvat ātmani na premṇaḥ hāniḥ sa paritasyati tāvat duḥkhitam āropya na ca svasthaḥ avatiṣṭhate mithyā dhyāra upahāna artham yatnaḥ asati api moktari 
[137,v_137,vi]	avasthā vīta rāgāṇām dayayā karmmaṇā api vā atra ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi tāvat tattva darśinaḥ prati etat ucyate tadā siddha sādhya tā eva na hi te kvacid pravartante yatnam vā kurvanti dharmmāḥ eva prahātavyāḥ iti vacanāt atha asmad ādīnam tadā tasya ekatva abhimānāt saḥ eva badhyate saḥ eva muktimān iti eka adhikaraṇa tā eva tayoḥ na hi paramārthataḥ vastu asti itye tāvatā eva tathā vyavahāraḥ prati iti apekṣa tvāt vyavahārasya tathā hi na paramārthataḥ sarpaḥ parihāra viṣayaḥ api tu sarpatayā vimokṣa viṣayaḥ 
[137,vii_137,viii]	atha yadi nāma saṃvṛtyai eka tvam tathā api saṃvṛtyā vyavahāroḥ tu parama artha eka tva abhāvāt katham pāramārthikaḥ vyavahāraḥ tat asata saṃvṛtya asya yathaka tvam vyavahāraḥ api sa saṃvṛtiḥ na tattvena yathā ekatvam vyavahāra upyatātvikaḥ yatnaḥ api khalu na eva asti svarūpāt aparaḥ kvacid kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu na ca udyasyāvaka śakṛt kasmāt asmāt idam kāryam iti kā iyam vidagdha tā na evam prekṣāvataḥ kvāpi pravartana nivartane paurvāparya upalambhasya pramāṇena apravedanāt kṣaṇa mātrasya ca kvāpi na pravartana sambhavaḥ 
[137,xii_137,xiv]	tatas yatnaḥ api na asti eva kasyacid vibhramaḥ tatas abhyupagamya api ucyate avasthā iti evamādi pāramārthika bodhe hi yadi na eva pravartate virāgāṇām na ceṣṭā syāt pūrva uttara vibhāga bhāj ceṣṭā jñānāṃvabodhe api karuṇātaḥ pravartanam yathā prajā hitaḥ rājā svasantāna yatnavān praṇidhāna pradhānasya kāryam tad praṇidhānataḥ karmma sāmarthyataḥ jātam kaḥ atra paryanuyujyatām 
[138,i_138,iii]	tasmāt mithyā adhyāropasya evaṃvidhasya prahāṇāya yatnaḥ anyathā mūḍhasya na duḥkha saṃvedana hāniḥ yadi tarhi karmmaṇā avasthānam janma antara karmmā api asti iti janma antara saṅgatiḥ syāt atha asamartham karmmam vīta rāgasya avasthānam na bhavet atra ucyate ākṣipte avinivṛtti iṣṭeḥ sahakāri kṣayāt alam na akṣeptum aparam karmma bhava tṛṣṇā vilaṃghinām 
[138,iv]	na ākṣiptaḥ yatnam antareṇa nivatayitum śakyaḥ yatnaḥ ca vīta rāgasya pratihanyate upekṣayā na tasya kvacid āsthā iti atas eva āsthā abhāvāt na apara janma upārjanam tatas sahakāriṇaḥ tṛṣṇā lakṣaṇasya abhāvāt tat eva pūrva tṛṣṇā janitam idam janma na aparam iti nanu dayā nāma iyam satve duḥkhāt trātavye bhavati na anyatra na ca sattvaḥ kaścid asti napi sattva darśanam prahīṇa ātma darśanānām tatas dayātaḥ na prahīṇa ātma darśanāḥ atra parihāraḥ 
[138,v_138,vi]	duḥkha jñāne aviruddhasya pūrva saṃskāra vāhinī vastu dharma udaya utpattiḥ na sā sattva anurodhinī yadā hi sakalam eva duḥkham iti sākṣātkṛtam tri duḥkha tā yogi tadā asya samudaya lakṣaṇā tṛṣṇā apaiti prahīṇa samudayasya na rāga ādayaḥ iti samatā avirodhitā sakalena eva sattva saṃghātena tatas duḥkhita darśanāt vastu āśraya ādayā utpattiḥ mahatām na tasyām avasthāyām sattva graha anurodhataḥ tathā bhūta sattva graha parityājanāya yaḥ āśayaḥ sā dayā sā ca prahīṇa ātma darśaṃnasya eva aprahīṇa ātma darśanaḥ hi katham tat tyāgāya pareṣām yateta 
[138,vii_138,ix]	nanu rāgasya dayāyāḥ ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ aātma antara samāropāt rāgaḥ dharmm etat ātmake duḥkha santāna saṃsparśa mātreṇa eva dayā udayaḥ dayāyāḥ rāgasya ca mahān bhedaḥ hetu bheda viṣaya bhedāt tathā hi rāgaḥ ātmanaḥ anāgata sukha āsaṅga sandhāna para vaśīkaraṇam anāgata santam āropya tasmāt pravarttate viṣaye api atad ātmake tad ātmanā dṛśyamāne caturvidha viparyāsa vāsita mānasasya rāgitā na anyasya dayā tu duḥkha santati mātra sākṣātkaraṇāt eva mithyā abhimāna vyapagamāya 
[138,x_138,xi]	nanu aham asya duḥkha nivartanam vidhāsyaḥ iti āśayam antareṇa katham bhavet atra parihāraḥ ātma arthe yadi vṛttiḥ syāt evam eva prasajyate para artha mātra vṛttīnām na hi kāraka darśanam darśitaḥ rāja dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad etat nāsamaṃjasam pūrva pūrva ahita utkṛṣṭa saṃskārāt vā pravartanam na ca paśyati saṃtānam na api kaścid pravartate na tiṣṭhati prabhā abhāvāt kevalam bhavataḥ bhramaḥ 
[138,xiv_139,i]	tat ayam dayā rāgayoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti alam ati vistareṇa nanu dayā mā abhūta rāga rūpā tattva darśinām udayāt dveṣa rūpā tu bhavet aśuci ādi darśanāt vaimukhya abhāvāt na aśubhā abhāvanātaḥ muktiḥ api tu anitya ādi darśanāt ātmani hi sati sa svatantraḥ para duḥkha vidhāyi iti kopaḥ syāt yadā tu punar asau hetu para adhīnaḥ pravartate sva rūpa mātreṇa na ca apakāraḥ tasya śakyaḥ karttum apakāra kāle tasya eva abhāvāt vṛthā kopa parigrahaḥ 
[139,ii_139,iii]	mohaḥ ca mūlam doṣāṇām sa ca sattva grahovinā tena ādya hetau na dveṣaḥ na dveṣaḥ atas kṛpā matā yadi ātmānam apakriyamāṇam paśyet kopaḥ bhavet na ca ātmā kaścid api tu sattvam antareṇa api sattva grahaḥ eva kevalaḥ kopasya kāraṇam vinā ca sattva graham na dveṣaḥ mohaḥ tu na asti svayam eva sattva darśanasya mohasya abhāvāt atas sarva doṣa virahitā kṛpā na doṣaḥ 
[139,iv_139,viii]	nanu yadi vīta rāgaḥ sa śarīraḥ eva āste tadā amuktaḥ eva bhavet na doṣa rahitasya cetasaḥ bhāvāt kiñca na amuktiḥ pūrva saṃskāra kṣaye anya apratisandhitaḥ akṣīṇa śaktiḥ saṃskāraḥ yeṣām tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ janma antara pratisandhāna viruddhe hi manasi vartamānaḥ katham amuktaḥ pūrva saṃskārasya ca tad janma sambhavinaḥ kṣayāt apratisandhānam yeṣāntu punar apratisandhi karaṇāya saṃskāra kṣaya icchā na asti te akṣīṇa saṃskārāḥ anaghāḥ eva avatiṣṭhante yāvat saṃskāram anuvṛtteḥ manda tvāt karuṇāyāḥ ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān tiṣṭhanti eva para adhīnāḥ yeṣāntu mahatī kṛpā saṃskāra hāneḥ karuṇāyāḥ ca manda tvāt na sthāpane yatnaḥ iti na sadā tiṣṭhanti mahā karuṇā yogātu sthānam eva tatra āsthā sambhavāt 
[139,ix_139,xi]	yadi mārggasya sāmarthya tad ādya eva srotaāpanna mārggaḥ eva abhavaḥ bhavet satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ vigayāt tathā hi satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ vicikitsāyāḥ śīla vrata parāmarśasya ca prahāṇāt srotaāpannaḥ bhavati mohaḥ ca mūlam doṣāṇām sa ca satva parigrahaḥ iti ca uktam tatas mārgga antaram vyarthakam bhavet atra ucyate satkāya dṛṣṭeḥ vigamāt ādyaḥ eva abhavaḥ bhavet mārge ced sahajā hāneḥ na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutas 
[139,xii]	na khalu sat kāya darśana prahāṇam ābhisaṃskārikasya eva prahāṇāt sahajasya prahāṇa abhāvaḥ satya darśana mātram hi sa mārggaḥ darśanena ca abhisaṃskārikasya amūla kleśa tvāt ātma grahasya prahāṇam tat hi ātma darśanam aupadeśikam darśana mātreṇa eva viparyayassya prahīyate sahajasyatu sat kāya darśanasya virūḍha tvāt anādi abhyāsataḥ pratipakṣeṇa bhāvanā mārggeṇa eva prahāṇam atas sahaja ahāneḥ 
[139,xiii_140,iii]	yasya tu mate na sahajasya api hāniḥ tatra mate na hānau vā api bhavaḥ kutas bhavati paṭu prajñasya hi prartham amārggaḥ eva sakala sāmarthya yogī iti tasya saḥ eva sakala mārgga svabhāvaḥ nanu sahajam sattva darśanam yadi ātma ākāram tadā atma abhāve tatra abhisaṃskārāt eva buddhiḥ na anyathā vastunaḥ janakasya abhāve yadi param upadeśaḥ kāraṇam atra āha sukhī bhaveyam dukhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajam sattva darśanam na hi apaśyan aham iti snihyati ātmani kaścana na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha kāmaḥ abhidhāvati 
[140,iv_140,v]	anādi vāsanā balāt udayam āsādayantī aham iti buddhiḥ sahajam etat sattva darśanam sukhī bhaveyam aham iti evam ākārā mā bhūvam anyathā iti vā tad aprahāṇāḥ nnābhavaḥ aham iti ca apaśyan ātmani snihyati na tu paśyan na ca sukha kāmasya abhidhāvanam vinā ātma snehena yasya tu sahajam sattva darśanam pravarttita ātma sneha saṃgati tasya katham punar janma abhāvaḥ tatas sahaja sattva darśanāt ādyaḥ eva mārgge na saṃsāra abhāvaḥ sattva darśana prahāṇāt avaśyam eva iti niścayaḥ anena śānta eti ākāraḥ kathitaḥ nanu ātmani sati bandhaḥ tasya eva mokṣaḥ tatas paritoṣa viśeṣāt ātmanaḥ sa praṇītaḥ mokṣaḥ ātma abhāve tu kasya paritoṣaḥ 
[140,vi_140,viii]	yadi bhavet bhrāntiḥ eva sā iti sa doṣa tā na asau mokṣaḥ atra samādhānam duḥkha utpādasya hetu tvam bandhaḥ nityasya tad kutas aduḥkha utpāda hetu tvam mokṣa nityasya tad kutas yadi ātmā nityaḥ tathā vyāpī tadā anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt na asau svayam ātmanaḥ duḥkham utpādayitum śaktaḥ ākāśa vat yadi ca svatantraḥ śaktaḥ ca katham ātmanaḥ duḥkham utpādayet na khalu sva badhāya kṛtyotathā apanam prekṣāvataḥ yuktam atha asau mūḍhaḥ tadā ātmānam ajānānaḥ katham ātmā anupalambhāt asattvam eva asya syāt atha tad svabhāvaḥ eva asau tadā na kadācid anyathā iti na sā muktiḥ bhāvinī atha jānān asya api tasya arthāḥ na sa dharmmeṇa utpādyate duḥkham tathā api nityasya vyāpinaḥ ca na kasyacid duḥkhaḥ tpāda hetu tvam yadi asau tadā duḥkha svabhāvaḥ tadā na duḥkhasya dukham yuktam tad svabhāva tve ca nā anyathā bhāvaḥ tatas na mokṣaḥ anya svabhāva bhāve ca na nityaḥ iti na ātmā bhavet atha vyatiriktam duḥkham sukham vā tad ātmā na sukhī duḥkhī vā na hi anyena sukhena anyaḥ sukhī bhavati atha tatra samavāyāt nanu samavāyaḥ api anyaḥ eva ananya tve saḥ eva doṣaḥ sukha asukha ādi svabhāva tve ca arāpara svabhāvāt anitya tvam atha nirvikāraḥ asau paramārthataḥ bhrāntiḥ eva tu sukhitva ādi pratipattiḥ tat api asat 
[140,ix]	ātmanā uvyatirekaḥ ced bhrānteḥ na ātmā avittitaḥ tad svarūpasya vittiḥ ced katham bhrāntiḥ sva vedane sukhi tvam yadi mokṣe api mukteḥ na syāt praṇīta tā mohaḥ tatra asti tasya iti tasmāt ātmā na mukti bhāj parituṣṭaḥ kṣaṇaḥ yasya sambhavati apara aparaḥ tasya mokṣaḥ praṇīta ūsau bhrāntyayukti vinā arthataḥ na eka adhikaraṇa tvam ced prasaktam bandha mokṣayoḥ sa vṛtyā eka adhikaraṇa bhāvaḥ na eva nivāryyate yaḥ muktasya bandhena tadā kim vā prayojanam pūrvam mama āsīt iti ced tat api kva upayujyate apekṣā pūrva kārī syāt prāk eka tvasya niścayāt ayuktañca etat iti cede tat iṣyate eva hi para arthaḥ vā prayogoyam iti ca āveditam punar praṇīta tā asya mokṣasya pasraya tu viparyayaḥ 
[141,viii_141,x]	atha api syāt na nityaḥ ātmā pūrva ukta doṣāt na api anityaḥ aprekṣā pūrva kriyā prasaṅgāt atas nitya tva anitya tvābhyām avācyaḥ tat api na yuktam anitya tvena yaḥ avācyaḥ sa hetuḥ nahi kasyacid bandha mokṣau avācye api na vidyete katham ca na anitya tvena avācyaḥ iti anitya tvam asya na asti tasya na hetu tā anitya tayā hetu tva vyāptam iti ca anyatra nirṇṇayaḥ tatas vyāpakasya abhāvāt hetu tāpyasya asambhavinī yasya tu punar nitya tā api na asti tasya atyantam abhāvaḥ eva atha bandha mokṣayoḥ eka adhikaraṇa tvāt anitya tā na hetu tvāt nitya tā na iti samādhiḥ sa ca ayuktaḥ 
[141,xi_141,xv]	nitya anitya vinirmuktaḥ svabhāvaḥ na upalabhyate vyāvṛtta anugata tvena sarvasya eva upalambhanāt atha api syāt ubhaya rūpa tā aḥ tu yadi na anyathā tathā api na doṣaḥ yasmāt nityam tam āhuḥ vidvāṃsaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ na naśyati tyaktvā imām hrepaṇīm dṛṣṭimataḥ nityaḥ sa kathyatām na āśī ca nityaḥ ca iti vyāhatam yasmāt na naśyati yaḥ sa nityaḥ nāśaḥ abhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti eka artha tā prasādhayiṣyate anāśaḥ nityatā upalabdhiḥ iti ca tatas nitya anityayoḥ ekatvam iti upalabhya anupalabhyayoḥ iti arthaḥ upalabhya anupalabhyayoḥ ca katham eka tvam ekatvena pratīteḥ yaḥ saḥ eva ekaḥ iti sthitiḥ apratītam pratītañcet tat etat ati sāhasam 
[141,xvi]	yadi nityam anityañca ekam eva tadā pratipannam apratipannañca ekam iti prasaktam tathā ca asambaddham pratīyamānam eka tvena anyathā na śakyam pratipattum na apratītam eva pratītam śaśa viṣāṇam apratītam kenacid pratītena saha ekam śakyam niścetum tatra ekasya apratīteḥ iti ced iha api apratīte avaśyam apratītiḥ yasya ekatvena pratītiḥ na tasya pratītiḥ eva naśyati na utpadyate vā atha anya pratītiḥ apratītiḥ tena anya pratīti rūpā na asti pratītiḥ na asti tad anya rūpa pratītiḥ eva tasya apratītiḥ evam tarhi yat anya rūpam tatas eva tasya abhāvaḥ iti prāptam tat ca ayuktam yatas 
[141,xvii^1]	anya tām pratijānānaḥ katham brūyāt ananyatām anya tā tasya na iti evam anitya tvam na sidhyati anitya tve anupalabdhiḥ syāt na upalabdhau anitya tā ananyat tve ca upalabdhiḥ upalabdhau ca nityatā kenacid tasya rūpeṇa na upalabdhiḥ parānyathā avittiḥ yena rūpeṇa tat asya iti katham matam pūrva tvena asya vittiḥ ced pūrvam eva tathā bhavet idānīntana tad rūpam asya iti katham ekatā ekaḥ pūrva apara abhyāñcet rūpābhyām aviyogataḥ viyoge dṛśyamāne api viyogaḥ na katham mataḥ krameṇa asyāḥ viyogaḥ ced viyogaḥ api tathā abhavet atas eva ubhaya ātma tvam aviyoga viyogataḥ yathā eva asya ākramam sattvam daṣṭiḥ asya tathā bhavet akramasya ca sattvasya
[141,xvii^2]	na yogaḥ krama bhāvikaḥ na pūrvā para rūpasya apratītau vyāpita āgatiḥ krameṇa vyāpita āyāñca tasya eva vyāpitāḥ na hi na hi dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭañca tasya ekasya upapattimat tadā eva tasya dṛṣṭa tvam adṛṣṭa tvam ca durghaṭam kāla abhedena sakalam na asamañjasam īkṣyate eka tvāt ekadā eva asya kāla bhedaḥ katham bhavet punar punar pratītau ca gṛhītam grahaṇam bhavet gṛhītam iti yat grāhyam smaryamāṇam hi tat bhaveta smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt na krama graha sambhavaḥ na ca apratītam tad rūpam yena pratyakṣatā bhaveta idānīntanam astitvam ced na na pūrva dhiyā gatam bheda abhāvāt kutas tasya vibhāgaḥ ayam pramā anvitaḥ dṛṣṭa tvam tasya
[141,xvii^3]	na asti iti sarvadā vartamāna tā yadi pūrva aparībhāvaḥ kena tasya pratīyatām prāk para pratyaya abhyāñcet tayoḥ bheda gatiḥ kutas sva saṃvedana bhāvāt ced na syāt dvi tva gatiḥ tatas na ca api avidyamānasya parapūrvasya tad gatiḥ ekam saṃvedanam tat ced parapūrvatayā iṣyate eka tve parapūrva tvam sākṣātkṛta tayā katham na sākṣāttkriyamāṇasya pūrva tā bhāvitā api vā na pūrva tvam yadi bhavet katham pūrva tayā gatiḥ na asti eva asya gatiḥ sākṣāt smaraṇañca na tad gatiḥ tasya smaraṇam etat ced tasya iti katham ucyate yadā tena vinā api etat smaraṇam bhavadīkṣyate kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt ced na grahaḥ tāvatā bhavet sākṣātkāraṇa tā arthasya grāhyatā
[141,xvii^4_142,xxvi]	na viparyayāt na ca arthāt smaraṇam sākṣāt saṃvidā vyavadhānataḥ saṃvedanam na pūrṇantat pūrva tva grahaṇa kṣamam na param tena pūrva tvam smaraṇāt na eva sādhyate atīta sākṣāt karaṇam pūrvam iti abhidhīyate bhāvī sākṣātkṛtau bhāve bhāvi tvasya vyavasthitiḥ atha utpāda vyaya dhrauvyam yuktam yat tat sat iṣyate eṣām eva na sattvam syāt etad bhāva aviyogataḥ yadā vyayaḥ tadā sattvam katham tasya pratīyate pūrva pratīte sattvam tat tadā tasya vyayaḥ katham dhrauvye api yadi na asmin dhīḥ katham sattva pratīyate pratīteḥ eva sarvasya tasmāt sattvam kutas anyathā tasmāt na nitya anityasya vastunaḥ sambhavaḥ kvacid anityam nityam athavā vastu ekāntena yuktimata idānīm mārgga prasaṅge nirodhasya eva caturtham ākāram darśayan āha 
[142,xxvii_142,xxviii]	uktaḥ mārgaḥ tad abhyasāda āśrayaḥ parivartate sātmye api doṣa bhāvaḥ ced mārgga vat na avibhu tvataḥ prāk eva mārggaḥ uktaḥ tasya abhyāsāt āśrayasya citta santānasya ālayasya vā pariśuddha tvam bhavati ātma ātmīya graha viparyaya bhūtasya nairātmyasya sātmye sakala doṣa viśleṣaḥ 
[142,xxix_143,ii]	nanu yathā doṣa yoge guṇa yogaḥ tathā guṇa yoge api doṣa yogaḥ iti na niḥsaraṇam saṃsārataḥ na doṣāṇām guṇa sambhavena bādhanāt viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavati guṇānām vastu svabhāva tvāt katham etat iti ced ucyate viṣaya grahaṇam dharmaḥ vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ gṛhyate saḥ asya janakaḥ vidyamāna ātmanā iti ca 
[143,iii_143,iv]	vijñānam mārggaḥ prerakaḥ janminām tasya dharmmaḥ svarūpam viṣaya grahaṇam yena tat vijñānam bhavati na vijñānam asaṃvedane bhavati asaṃvedanānām tathā abhāvāt yathā ca asti tathā sa gṛhyamāṇaḥ janakaḥ ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam hi kāraṇam vijñānasya viṣayaḥ tat svarūpa pratipādanam vijñānasya dharmaḥ tathā eva pratīyamāna tvam viṣayasya tatas anitya anātma ādi rūpaḥ viṣayaḥ vijñānam tathābhūta grāhyā iva na anyaḥ tad svabhāvaḥ iti āha eṣā prakṛtiḥ asyāḥ tu nimitta antarataḥ skhala da vyāvṛttau pratyaya apekṣam adṛḍham sarpa buddhi vat 
[143,v]	yasya yaḥ dharmaḥ anātmaka tva ādi grahaṇa svabhāvaḥ asau prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ skhalantyāḥ āgantuka pratyaya vaśāt amūlakāt skhalitañca tatas skhalanāt vyāvṛttau pratyaya apekṣam atas amūlaka tvāt adṛḍham phaṇi buddhi vat nanu phaṇi buddheḥ sādṛśya dūra deśa tva āt ayaḥ rajvām kāraṇāni nitya buddheḥ tu kim kāraṇam na pratyakṣam nityatāyām pravartate na api anumānam na āśaṃkā niḥpramāṇikā iti pratyakṣataḥ ca kṣaṇika tvam pratīyate iti sādhayiṣyate tatas kutas nitya tva grahaḥ atra āha tām punar anitya tām paśyan api manda buddhiḥ na adhyavasyati satta upalambhena sarvadā tad bhāva śaṅkā vipralabdhaḥ sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralabdhaḥ vā antyakṣaṇa darśinām niścayāt 
[143,vi^1]	etat uktam bhavati yadā tāvat upalabdhe padārtha ātmani punar anupalambhaḥ tadā paśyati eva anityatām atādavasthyam anitya tām brūmaḥ kintu anupalabdhe api manda buddheḥ āśaṅkā na vyapaiti tatas tad bhāvam śaṅkataḥ iti tad bhāva śaṅkaḥ pūrvam kim ayam adyāpi āste na vā iti tatas punar darśanāt artha kriyā avāpteḥ avipralabdhaḥ san kim ayam na vyavasyati vipralabdhaḥ hi tat anavāpteḥ vyavasyet tat naḥ iva ghaṭe artha kriyā lakṣaṇa satta upalambhe tu kaḥ viparyaya vivecanasya avasaraḥ vyavahāriṇaḥ pratibhāsa bhedena tu tattva cinta kodhyavasyati eva vyavahārī tu punar artha kriyā arthī tad avāpteḥ parituṣṭaḥ param na
[143,vi^2]	vivecayati kṛtārtha tvāt sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralabdhaḥ vā sadrśe hi tat eva idam iti buddhiḥ yam a je pūrvaṃtra māyā golaka tad artha kriyāyām arthāda mātram eva vivakṣitam yatas parāpara tṛṇa ādi kāraṇa jātasya vahneḥ ekatā adhyavasāya viṣaya tā indhanam eva tatra upādānam na vahniḥ na khalu vahneḥ eva utpadyate vahniḥ ādau anutpatti prasaṅgāt upala āsphālanena prāk vahneḥ abhāvāta athavā tatas eva vahneḥ utpattiḥ evam sarve padārthāḥ pūrva samāna jātīyāt utpadyante na vā samāna jātīyam kāraṇam karmma ādhipatyāt eva utpatteḥ atas etad apekṣayā vikalpaḥ tat ca karmma vādi matena pūrvam uktam anya matena param iti nirṇṇayaḥ 
[144,i]	athavā atadbhāva śaṅkā vipralabdhaḥ iti vyākhyātavyam na hi tad bhāve śaṅkā kācid vidyate sarvadā satta upalandheḥ anupalambhe hi tad bhāve śaṅkā bhavet yadā tu madhye anupalambhaḥ tadā kaḥ vṛttāntaḥ atra api sadṛśa apara utpatti vipralabdhaḥ lūna punar jāta keśa nakha ādi vat mṛta pratyabhijñātaḥ ekatvam iti ced na pratyabhijñāyai apramāṇa tvāt pratyakṣatvā anumāna tva ayogāt tathā ca pratipādayiṣyate tasmāt āntarā davidya upaplavāt āgantavaḥ malāḥ 
[144,ii_144,vi]	atas eva āha prabhasvaram idam cittam prakṛtyā aagantavaḥ malāḥ nitya tva virahitasya eva tena grahaṇāt āgantavaḥ malāḥ asat bhūta samāropasyā mūlaka tvena tautamudrā mātraka tvāt na paramārthataḥ nitya tvam kvacid pratibhāti tatas vicāra śūnya tvāt āgantavaḥ malāḥ tad prāk api asamarthānām paścāt śaktiḥ kva tad maye 
[144,vii_144,ix]	prāc api asamarthāḥ eva śruta cintā kāle yatas na alam praroḍhum atyantam syandinyām agni vat bhuvi bādhaka utpatti sāmarthya garbhe śaktaḥ api vastuni nanu ahetoḥ api mṛdu śraddhā ādikasya arha tvāt prahāṇiḥ bhavati eva tad katham anutpattiḥ doṣāṇām yadi api ca utpattiḥ doṣasya tathā api antar ggata bādhaka utpatti sāmarthye śaktaḥ api utpattum na atyantam prarodum samarthaḥ malaḥ yathā syandinyām bhuvi agniḥ utpannaḥ na prarohati sātmye tu sthitasya na doṣa utpattiḥ tathā hi 
[144,x_144,xii]	nirupadrava bhūta artha svabhāvasya viparyayaiḥ na bādhā yatnavat tve api buddheḥ tad pakṣapātataḥ na hi svabhāvaḥ yatna rahitena nivarttayitum śakyaḥ yatnaḥ ca doṣa darśinaḥ guṇeṣu vartate doṣeṣu ca guṇa darśinaḥ na ca sa ātmībhūta nairātmya darśanasya doṣeṣu guṇa darśanam na guṇeṣu doṣa darśanam adarśanam vā guṇeṣu nairātmya darśana sya nirupadrava tvāt 
[144,xiii_144,xv]	tatas svabhāvaḥ bhūtātmā nirupadravaḥ eva ca katham asya parityāgaḥ karttum śakyaḥ sacetasā pakṣapātaḥ ca cittasya na doṣeṣu pravartate tatas tasya na doṣāya yatnaḥ kaścid pravartate nikhila padārtha svabhāva paryālocana samarthasya yadi nāma doṣa utpatiḥ tathā api asau sattyaḥ arthaḥ prahīṇaḥ iva pathikaḥ samvega samāgamāt madhyastha bhāve vartamānaḥ mārggaḥ eva yatnam ārabhate guṇa pakṣapātāt na tu doṣe abhiramate 
[144,xvi_145,i]	nanu ca rāga dveṣayoḥ viparīta ākāra tve api na ekasya eva bādhā bādhitasya rāgasya dveṣeṇa punar bādhaka tva dṛṣṭeḥ tathā dveṣasya tathā nairātmya ātma darśanayoḥ api syāt na etat asti yasmāt ātma graha eka yoni tvāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ rāga pratighayoḥ bādhāḥ bhede api na parasparam dvayoḥ adhyātma graha kāraṇa tvāt satya ātma grahena atyantam ekasya api ucchedaḥ sati api paraspara vaiparītye ayugapad bhāvaḥ ca syāt kiñca 
[145,ii_145,iii]	kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt api yaḥ hi yatra vivakṣitaḥ duḥkha hetau sa pīḍitaḥ niyamena sukha hetu artham icchati tatra anyatra vā tena anayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sukha hetau anugṛhītaḥ niyamena tad upaghātaḥ iti pratighavān atas kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na bādhā bhede api rāga pratighayoḥ atas eva moha avirodhāt maitrī a ādeḥ na atyantam doṣa nigrahaḥ tad mūlāḥ ca malāḥ sarve sa ca sat kāya darśanam 
[145,v_145,vii]	yadi api dveṣasya pratapakṣaḥ maitrī rāgasya aśubhā vihiṃsā pratipakṣaḥ karuṇā īrṣyā pratipakṣaḥ muditā sarvasya pratipakṣa aupekṣā tathā api na atyantam doṣa nigrahaḥ moha avirodhāt nanu sati api mohe ahaṅkara abhāvāt sakala doṣa prahāṇam eva na etat sādhīyaḥ saḥ eva mohaḥ sat kāya darśanam kliṣṭaḥ hi mohaḥ sat kāya darśanam eva 
[145,viii_145,xi]	arha tāntu yat ajñānam na tat kliṣṭam atas na te mohe api ayukta santānāḥ hīna sat kāya darśanāḥ vidyāyāḥ pratipakṣa tvāt caittatvena upalabdhitaḥ mithyā upalabdhiḥ ajñāna yukteḥ ca anyat ayuktimat nanu asaṃprakhyāna rūpā avidyā satkāya darśanantu pratipatti rūpam tat katham sat kāya darśanam eva avidyā iti na doṣaḥ yatas 
[145,xii_145,xiv]	asaṃprakhyāna rūpa ādeḥ avidyā nirvṛtteḥ api tattvam syāt upadhīnām hi kṣaye kim avaśiṣyate asaṃprakhyānam hi nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇe nirodha samāpattau ca mukhye atha tasya kleśa nidāna tvam na asti na tarhi tad avidyā lakṣaṇam satkāya dṛṣṭiḥ eva tad nidāna tvāt avidyā na aparā yatas vidyā aviruddhaḥ dharmaḥ anyaḥ avidyā adharmmā nṛta ādi vat vidyā nairātmya dṛṣṭiṣu tad virodhi ātma darśanam 
[145,xv_145,xvi]	na tāvat vidyā bhāvaḥ avidyā tad bhāvasya nirvāṇe api bhāvāt na ca abhāvaḥ hetuḥ na apita danyo rūpa ādīnām avidyā tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt vidyā aviruddhaḥ dharmaḥ avidyā adharmma anṛta vat tat ca sat kāya darśanam eva tathā hi para anugraha lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ tad abhāva mātram na adharmaḥ api tu tad anya mātram api tu anugraha viruddhaḥ upaghātaḥ adharmmaḥ tathā na bhūta artha pratipādana abhāvonṛtam api tu abhūta pratipādanam asatti a vacanam evam sati satya arthe yadā bhrāntyā na astitām manyamānaḥ asti iti pratipādayati tadā asatya tā na syāt asati ca satyatām manyamānaḥ tadā mṛṣā syāt na etat asti vikalpya viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ yat yathā vastu niścitam tathā eva vacanam sattyam anyathā vacanam mṛṣā 
[145,xvii]	adhyavasīyamāna vastu viṣayāḥ hi śabdāḥ adhyavasāya anurūpa pratipādanam eva sattya tā anyathā asatya tā iti nyāyaḥ bodhisattvānāntu bhrāntyā api sattva visambādanam parama vadyam atas eva te sarva ākāra jña tāyām abhiyoginaḥ bhavanti tatas sat kāya dṛṣṭeḥ eva avidyānyasya vidyā pratipakṣa tva abhāvāt caittatvena ca kāraṇena upalabdhitaḥ mithyā upalabdhiḥ eva avidyā āśra yā ālambana ākāra kāla dravya samatābhiḥ samam prayuktāḥ iti samprayuktāḥ uktañca prajñā kāra viparīta pratipattiḥ upa eva avidyā iti tatra tatra sūtraḥ uktāḥ tatra katamaḥ ajñāna vigamaḥ yaḥ yathā bhūtānām dharmāṇām adhyāra upādhigamaḥ tathā yāḥ kāścana loka upacāra upapattayaḥ sarvāḥ tāḥ ātma abhiniveśataḥ bhavanti ātma abhiniveśa nigamataḥ na bhavanti nanu ātma abhiniveśaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ sā ca avidyā saṃprayuktā tatas dṛṣṭi dvāreṇa avidyā eva uktā iti mantavyam na antarīyaka tvāt na tu sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ eva avidyā iti na etat api sādhīyaḥ 
[146,i_146,iii]	avidyā aṅga ihi nirdeśye tad svarūpa prakāśanam yuktā tad anya nirdeśaḥ kauśalam na nivedayet pramāṇam atra na kiñcid avidyā evam niveditā viparyaye pramāṇantu yathāvat upadarśitam dṛṣṭi dvāreṇa avidyā eva nirdṛṣṭā iti na kiñcid atra pramāṇam satkāya dṛṣṭiḥ eva tu avidyā sarva doṣa nidānam iti upadarśitam atra pramāṇam 
[146,iv_146,v]	nanu sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ moha ja deśa bhūtāḥ mohaḥ tu sakala kleśa anugataḥ asaṃprakhyāna lakṣaṇaḥ anyathā vā sa katham satkāya dṛṣṭiḥ ucyate viśeṣa śabdasya sāmānya artha tva abhāvāt tathā yadi avidyā dṛṣṭiḥ eva tadā dṛṣṭi saṃprayuktā avidyā iti saṃprayukta arthaḥ na syāt na sa tena eva saṃprayuktaḥ atra codye parihāraḥ vyākhyeyaḥ atra virodhaḥ yaḥ tad virodhāt ca tad mayaiḥ virodhaḥ śūnyatā dṛṣṭeḥ sarva doṣaiḥ prasidhyati 
[146,vi]	sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena hi bheda prakalpanayā saṃprayukta arthaḥ tat yathā palāśa yuktam vanam iti paramārthataḥ palāśa svabhāva tā eva kathitāḥ evam viśeṣa abhidhānena tad svabhāvaḥ avidyā nidāna bhūtā prādhānyena nirdiṣṭā yatas ātma darśanam avidyā tatas tad mūlakāḥ sarve eva kleśāḥ nairātmya darśanāt mūla cheda kāriṇaḥ mūla chedāt ucchidyante yatas sakala kleśa virodhi nairātmya darśanam tat ca yoginaḥ na vyapaiti iti na punar kleśa udayaḥ tatas niḥsaraṇa ākāra tā nirodhasya kathitā 
[146,vii_146,xi]	na akṣayaḥ prāṇi dharmma tvāt rūpa ādi vat asiddhitaḥ sambandhe pratipakṣasya tyāga saṃsarjanāt api na kāṭhinya vat utpattiḥ punar doṣa virodhinaḥ sa ātma tvena anapāya tvāt anekāntāt ca bhasma vat iti antaraślokau nanu ātma bhāvanāt api bhavati eva mokṣaḥ tat kim nairātmya darśanena atra āha āgamaḥ ātmā mantavyaḥ ityādiḥ tat api asat yatas 
[146,xii_147,ii]	yaḥ paśyati ātmānam tatra aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃsthirī kurute ātma darśī hi niyamena ātmani śāśvatena snehena sambadhyate snehāt ca tad sukheṣu tṛṣṇāvān yasya yatra snehaḥ sa tad sukhe paritarṣavān yathā putra ādi sukhe nanu ātma darśanāt ātmani snehaḥ iti uktam kim kāṣṭa darśana ādeḥ kāṣṭe snehaḥ strī darśanāt eva striyām tasmāt yaḥ paśyati ātmānam tatra tasya snehaḥ iti ayuktam na etat asti 
[147,iii_147,v]	yasya anyatra snehaḥ tasya ātmani na bhavati iti kutas snehaḥ dṛśyate eva ātmani atra na asti vivāditā ātma sneham vinā anyatra snehaḥ iti ati durghaṭam yadi ātma darśana mātrakeṇa na snehaḥ snehaḥ eva kasyacid na syāt anyasya kāraṇasya abhāvāt kāṣṭañca ātma upayogi na paśyati tena na snehaḥ yasya ca ātma upayogini snehaḥ sa katham ātmani na snehavān atha sattva viśeṣāt ātmani snehaḥ eva na asti paratra tu mahā anubhāva tayā karuṇātaḥ snehavān tat asat 
[147,vi_147,x]	mahā anubhāvatā nāma para upakaraṇam yadi aprekṣā pūrva kāritve tathā satya samaṃjasam ātmānam parityajya para upakāraṇīkurvatā sva artham mahat aprekṣā pūrva kāri tvam ātmani prakaṭitam syāt atha para artha kriyā eva sukham tathā ca sati sukha tva āsaṅga sammūḍhaḥ katham muktaḥ tathā ca sa gaṇikā svāṅga sammardam api kuryāt sa tādṛśaḥ asattyavyavahāroyam iti ceta na asti asattyatā 
[147,xi]	sva ātma vyavasthitaḥ yathā dhyāna sukham ākāṃkṣati tathā gaṇikā aṅga saṅgam asukham api na khalu sukhasya tasya aparasya vā viśeṣaḥ asattya tā tathā syāt iti ced na asattyatā viśeṣa abhāvāt naraka ādi gamanāt na yuktam iti ced na mahā anubhāvatā viśeṣāt para artham naraka gamana aṅgīkaraṇam mahatī mahā anubhāvatā iti tathā abhyāsāt asatti a vyavahāraḥ anyaḥ ca sukha hetuḥ tatas varam sattya vyavahāraḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ na viśeṣa abhāvāt tathā ca ātmani sa tṛṣṇaḥ tad vaśāt doṣa adoṣau samīkuryyāt tatas doṣa tiraskaraṇe 
[147,xii_147,xiii]	guṇa darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tad sādhanāni upādatte tena ātma abhiniveśaḥ yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre ātmani parama artha tayā vidyamāne yaḥ tatra upakāraḥ saḥ api parama arthaḥ tatas parama artha upakārī yaḥ saḥ eva guṇavān iti pratīyāt tatas guṇa darśī mama iti sādhanāni upādatte tena ātma abhiniveśāt saṃsāraḥ iti sukha sādhanam garta sūkarī saṃsparśam api prārthayate 
[147,xiv_147,xvii]	tasmāt ātmani sati para saṃjñā sva para vibhāgāt parigraha dveṣau anayoḥ saṃpratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante ātma para vibhāgaḥ hi parigraha dveṣau janayet tatas parigraha dveṣa saṃpratibaddhāḥ īrṣyā mātsarya ādayaḥ doṣāḥ bhavanti atha api syāt ātmani eva snehaḥ na ātmīye tena ātmīya sneha abhāvāt asatti a vyavahāra abhāvaḥ atra ucyate 
[148,i_148,ii]	niyamena ātmani snihyan tadīye na virajyate na ca asti ātmani nirdoṣe sneha apagama kāraṇam ātmani hi snehaḥ pravartamānaḥ na doṣam antareṇa apaiti na ca snehavān ātmani ātmīye niḥsnehaḥ tasmāt ātmani ātmīye ca snehavān sakala doṣa tiraskaraṇena sarvatra āvṛttimān iti saṃsāra saṅgamaḥ eva asya avirataḥ atha ātmani ātmīye ca snehasya saṃsāra hetu tvāt sneha saṅgatasya ca duṣṭa tvāt ātmīyasya na tatra snehaḥ 
[148,iii_148,v]	anya doṣa duṣṭa tve api snehaḥ na kriyate kim punar yatra snehaḥ eva duṣṭaḥ bhavati tatra āha snehaḥ sa doṣaḥ iti ced tatas kim tasya varjanam adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyam tasya varjanam anya doṣeṇa hi snehaḥ na iti viṣaya doṣādi uktam etat aduṣṭe tu viṣaye sneha abhāvaḥ na yuktaḥ sukha hetau na asti doṣaḥ guṇasya bhāvāt atha snehaḥ eva doṣaḥ bhavatu kim bhaviṣyati duṣṭa tvāt snehasya varjanam iti ced na etat asti viṣaya doṣam antareṇa sneha parityāga abhāvāt tasmāt 
[148,vi_148,viii]	prahāṇiḥ icchā dveṣa ādeḥ guṇa doṣa anubandhinaḥ tayoḥ adṛṣṭiḥ viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ icchā dveṣau hi guṇa doṣa darśanāt bhavataḥ tad abhāvāt na bhavataḥ iti nyāyaḥ ātma sukha sādhanañca guṇaḥ tad duḥkha sādhanam doṣaḥ tat ced vidyate na asti icchā dveṣa prahāṇam atha api syāt bāhyam vastu guṇavat api parityajyate 
[148,ix]	tat api asat bāhyam vastu hi bāhya kāraṇa adhīnam parityajyate sneha ātma darśana balāt upajāyamānaḥ apara aparaḥ katham parityaktum śakyaḥ viṣayasya hi sneha viṣaya tvam upādānañca guṇa tvena tad abhāvāt tatra sneha parityāgaḥ anupādānañca snehasya tu na guṇavat tvāt upādānam api tu viṣaya guṇāt tatas viṣaya guṇa kāraṇa sadbhāvāt kutas snehasya anudayaḥ 
[148,x_148,xiv]	na hi sneha guṇāt snehaḥ kintu artha guṇa darśanāt kāraṇe a vikale tasmin kāryam kena nivāryate iti saṃgrahaḥ api ca kā vā sa doṣa tā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha samāśrayaḥ tathā api na virāgotra sva tva dṛṣṭeḥ yatha ātmani ātmā hi prathamam duḥkha samāśrayaḥ ātmani sati paścāt snehaḥ duḥkhasya kāraṇam atma abhāve tu kasya duḥkham tatas ubhayasya api duḥkha hetu tvāt dvayoḥ api na virāgaḥ na vā ekatra api 
[148,xv_149,ii]	atha api syāt ātma ni duḥkha hetu tvam para upādhikam na tasya api svagataḥ doṣaḥ ātma sneha dharma adharmma saṃskāra sahāyaḥ ātmā duḥkha hetuḥ atra āha na taiḥ vinā duḥkha hetuḥ ātmā ced te api tādṛśāḥ nirdoṣam duḥkham api evam vairāgyam na dvayoḥ tatas nakhalva nirdoṣe vairāgyam kasyacid na ca ātma sneha udayaḥ ātmānam āśrayam antareṇa duḥkha hetavaḥ atas na te api ātma vat sa doṣāḥ atas na vairāgya sambhavaḥ 
[149,iii_149,v]	duḥkha bhāvanayā āsyāt ced ahidaṣṭa aṅga hāni vat ātmīya buddhi hānya atra tyāgaḥ na tu viparyaye upabhoga āśraya tvena gṛhīteṣu indriya ādiṣu sattva dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyam tatra tat kutas nanu sukha hetu tvam snehasya hetutaḥ tad viparyaya sambhavāt vairāgyam na khalu apakāriṇi snehaḥ 
[149,vi]	atra ucyate na ātmīya buddhi viṣaye duḥkha hetau api sneha vigamaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt ātmīya buddhi parityāge vairāgyam ātmīya buddheḥ eva parityāgaḥ iti ced na upabhoga āśraya tvena pratipanneṣu śarīra ādiṣu kasyacid ātmīya buddhi vigamaḥ tathā hi devaḥ syām nāgaḥ syām iti viśiṣṭam śarīra ādi mama syāt iti teṣu ātmīya buddhim vidhatte tatas evaṃbhūta buddhimān ā iva katham viraktaḥ tathā hi 
[149,vii_149,x]	pratyakṣam eva sarvasya keśa ādiṣu kalevarāt cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhiḥ jāyate anyatra sa spṛhā yadāhi keśa ādiṣu upabhoga viṣaya tā tadā sa spṛhata ātmīya buddhi janmikā yadā tu viparyayaḥ tadā vairāgyam sa spṛhatā vigama svabhāvam na anyathā iti vibhāgaḥ kiñca vai śe ṣi kā dīnām samavāya ādi sambandha janitā tatra hi svadhīḥ sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭau api na hīyate 
[149,xi]	sukha ādinā samavāya sambandhaḥ śarīreṇa saṃyogaḥ śarīra āśritaiḥ rūpa ādibhiḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ rūpa tva ādibhiḥ samaveta samavāyaḥ śrotra indriyeṇa saṃyogaḥ cakṣuḥ ādinā sāṃyogi saṃyogaḥ iti ātma sambandhaḥ na vyapaiti tatas doṣa darśane api na hīyate teṣu snehaḥ atha samavāya ādi sambandham na aṅgīkuryyāt tatra api parihāraḥ 
[149,xii_149,xvi]	samavāya ādi abhāve api sarvatra asti upakāritā upakāra prabhāvitaḥ hi sarvatra snehaḥ tena kutas vairāgya ādayaḥ atha paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭheta duḥkha upakāra anubhavet aṅgulyām iva ced svadhīḥ na hi ekāntena tat duḥkham bhūyasā sa viṣān na vat yathā tat duḥkham tathā sukham api sa viṣān na vat na hi sa viṣam annam duḥkham eva sukha tvasya api sambhavāt tathā garta sūkara ādi śarīram duḥkham api sukham eva kathañcid ataḥ na pari tyāga viṣayaḥ indriya ādiḥ nanu tādṛśam duḥkha sammiśram duḥkham eva evam tarhi sukha saṅgatam sukham eva iti prāptam kiñca 
[150,i_150,iii]	viśiṣṭa sukha saṅgāt syāt tad viruddhe virāgi tā kiñcid parityajet saukhyam viśiṣṭa sukha tṛṣṇayā nairātmye tu yathālābham ātma snehāt pravartate alābhe mattakāśinyā dṛṣṭā tiryakṣu kāmitā yadi viśiṣṭam sukham labhyeta syāt anyathā vairāgyam na ca avivekinaḥ viśiṣṭa sukha tṛṣṇā viveka abhāvāt eva vivekaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced vivekaḥ eva tarhi duḥkha hetuḥ iti vivekaḥ eva vairāgyam syāt atha vivekaḥ avaśyam eva hetu balāt evam tarhi nairātmya avabodhataḥ api vivekavataḥ anivāryya eva iti na ātma darśanāt mokṣaḥ ātma bhāvanā tu asambhavinī 
[150,iv_150,viii]	yādṛśaḥ khalu asau ātmā sukha ādīnām samāśrayaḥ tādṛśe bhāvanā bhāvāt tādṛśa ūsau kutas anyathā buddhi sukha duḥkha ityādi samāśrayaḥ hi asau ātmā bhāvyamānaḥ api asau tādṛśaḥ eva bhavet atha puruṣakāra āśrayāt doṣa rahitaḥ asau kriyeta tat asat ghṛṣyamāṇohi na aṅgāraḥ śukla tām eti jātucita nijaḥ svabhāva samparkkaḥ kenacid na nivāryate na ca duṣṭaḥ svayaṃsvasya doṣa vyāvartana kṣamaḥ duṣṭaḥ aduṣṭaḥ katham bhāvī na saḥ anyaḥ bhavati kvacid atas eva āha 
[150,ix_150,x^1]	yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśam katham icchati duṣṭaḥ rāga ādinā na ātmā tena yoge pṛthak svayam na daṇḍa yoge daṇḍa tvam daṇḍinaḥ bhāvikam bhavet asaṃvidita rāga āde rna rāgi tva ādi sambhavaḥ samvedanā drāgitā ced strīmān syāt tad nirupaṇāt sambandhāt rāgitā tasya na tu rāga ādi vedanāt rāga ādi vedane yogī rāgī syāt para rāgataḥ vyatireke viśeṣaḥ kaḥ saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ bhedasya apratipattiḥ ced bhedaḥ tarhi kutas mataḥ bhinnam ātma svarūpañcet na vā iti ātmā sva vid katham na hi svarūpa samvittau bhrāntiḥ asti iti sādhitam atha asamvedanasya asya vedanam ghaṭa rūpa vat grāhya tvāt grāhakam tat syāt na iti na asya asti bhoktṛtā rasa ādīnām hi bhogya tve bhoktṛtā na upalabhyate
[150,x^2]	 bhoktā tatas anyaḥ eva syāt evañca iti anavasthitiḥ bhogaḥ tad samavetaḥ ced tena bhoktā sa kathyate na bhogonubhavāt anyaḥ sa ca bhogye api avasthitaḥ mayi buddhiḥ ma ma atra iti prabodhaḥ loke īdṛśaḥ tena adhārya ādhāra bhāvaḥ ubhayatra api vidyate atha ānumīyamānaḥ asau bhoktā iti vyapadiśyate pratyakṣā sambhave tatra na anumānam iti sthitiḥ atha asau yoginām eva gamyaḥ iti upadiśyate ati sūkṣma tayā tasya vedanam na asmad ādibhiḥ idānīm tāvat asmābhiḥ vedanam na asya saṃbhavi tām avasthā gatānāntu na vidmaḥ kim bhaviṣyati yogi bhāvam upakṣipya vastūnām yadi nirṇṇayaḥ asmākam te yogibhiḥ tasya na abhā asya na vedanam 
[151,i_151,iv]	tasmāt sva samvedana rūpaḥ eva ātmā upaśāntaḥ anyathā tasya abhāva prasaṅgāt sa ca sukha ādi samvedana svabhāvaḥ yadi anyathā bhavet nāśaḥ eva asya syāt yasya ca ātmā vallābhaḥ sa tasya nāśam katham icchet duḥkhe ca tena ātmaiṣṭavyaḥ yadi duḥkhī sukhī na tu duḥkhī avasthā vināśe hi naṣṭaḥ eva svayam bhavet avasthāḥ tasya nāśinyaḥ na avasthāta iti ced matam tad rūpa vyatirekeṇa na avasthāta upalabhyate atha api syāt samvid rūpa tā na vinaśyati eva sukha ādīnām eva vināśaḥ na etat asti 
[151,v_151,x]	sukha ādi bhedāt samvitteḥ api bhedaḥ prasajyate sukha ādi vyatirekeṇa samvitti anupalambhanāt ātma bhūtena bhinnena na abhinnaḥ upalakṣyate yathā tasya eva bhedasya nābheda upalakṣyate samvid samvid iti jñānāt bhedaḥ yadi vibhedyate atas eva parātmā api parasya ātmā svayam bhavet na eva samvedanam tasya iti etat api ati durghaṭam asaṃvedana bhāvaḥ hi sarva unyaḥ syāt anātmakaḥ pṛthak saṃvedanam tat ced ekatā na kvacid bhavet tatas na pūrva aparayoḥ aka tā iti vināśitā tathā ca 
[151,xi]	yasya ātmāvallabhaḥ tasya vināśam katham icchati kūṭastha nityatāyām hi tatra eva asthitiḥ iṣyatām pratyabhijñā prabhāvāt ced na atra atīva prasajyate tad rūpa sambhave sā eva pratyabhijñā na kimmatā viṣaya asambhavena ādi vāsanā mātra bhāvinī pratyabhijñā padārthānām bhavet na sthiti kāraṇam nanu kūṭastha nitya tve na uttarottara vedanam tathā api tasya nitya tvam prasidhyatu mate tava samāna ta upalambhe vā syāt ekatvam idam matam asamāna upalambhetu spaṣṭe bhede vināśitā 
[151,xvi_151,xviii]	yadi api nāma kūṭastha nitya tayā na uttarottara upalambhaḥ tathā api tasya nitya tā avikārita eva tathā krama abhāvena ca upalambhasya tasmāt yadi krama bhāvi upalambhaḥ tasya truṭyattayā upalambha nāśaḥ eva prasaktaḥ evam ca krama upalambha icchāyām nāśa icchā eva prasaktā tatas ca yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśam katham icchati 
[151,xix]	anupalambham katham icchati iti ced mṛtāt varam durbala tā vallabha tvesya jīvitam varam astu na mṛd dṛṣṭiḥ jīvitasya uparodhinī nanu adṛṣṭena tena kim kartavyam iti punar darśanam eṣitavyam tathā ca sati krama bhāvi tve saḥ eva vināśaḥ ayam aparaḥ asti eva ātma vādinaḥ doṣaḥ athavā samāna rūpa upalambhāt ekatā pūrva aparayoḥ yuktā bhinna rūpa upalambhe tu bhinna tā eva spaṣṭā tathā ca sati pūrvakasya vināśaḥ evam ca yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya vināśam katham icchati 
[151,xx_151,xxi]	athavā bodha rūpa tayā ātmā sarve ekaḥ eva satu punar upādhi bhedāt bhedam āśrayate yathā ākāśasya eka tve ghaṭa ākāśam paṭa ākāśam iti bheda avabhāsaḥ tasmāt ātmanām avidyā kṛtaḥ eva bhedaḥ yadi evam muktasya bhrāntyabhāvena yadi anya ātma tayā sthitiḥ na syāt ātmā saḥ eva ekaḥ tad avasthā bhava sthitiḥ 
[151,xxii]	yadi ghaṭa ākāśam ghaṭa abhāve na bhavati yathā tathā avidyā abhāve na bhavet prāṇī tathā sati ghaṭa ākāśa abhāve sati anyena saha ekam ākāśam jātam iti ākāśa vibhāga abhāva vat ātma vibhāgaḥ api na syāt iti na sva para vibhāgaḥ iti vinaṣṭaḥ eva ātmā syāt aham iti para vyavacchedena ātma tvāt ākāśa tām upagatasya na kriyā bhoga ādayaḥ iti na ākāśāt viśeṣaḥ tatas yadi ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśam katham icchati vastu balāt idam āyātam iti ced nairātmyam eva tarhi prasaktam 
[152,i_152,iii]	svarūpa saṃvid mātrasya vyāpitā kā iyam ucyate aneka deśa avaṣṭambhe vyaptirucyeta mukhyatas aneka kāla vyapitve nityatā vyapadiśyate na vyāpi tvam na nitya tvam katham ātmā vyavasthitaḥ atha apara ghaṭa ādi rūpeṇa asau vyavasthitaḥ tathā sati sutarām eva saṃsārī deva datta ādi rūpeṇa api vyavasthānāt tasmāt mukta tve satyabhāvaḥ eva tasya ākāśa vat iti na ca tādṛśām mokṣeṇa kiñcid prayojanam iti aho mahat prekṣā pūrva kāri tvam yoginām 
[152,iv_152,vi]	atha paramārthataḥ na ātmā kriyā bhoga ādi āśrayaḥ tatvam tasya avidyā vaśāt eva tathā sneha ādayaḥ atra parihāraḥ ucyate nivṛtta sarva anubhava vyavahāra guṇa āśrayam icchet prema katham premṇaḥ prakṛtinā ihi tādṛśī sarva vyavahāra atīta ādi ātma upalambha tūla avalambi gagana ātmā evā atas yasya yatra prema asau na tam tādṛśam icchati premṇaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva etādṛśī na bhavati bhavantī vā aprekṣā pūrva kāritām paridīpayet tad varam saṃsāraḥ eva prārthitaḥ saṃsāra sukhasya aparitoṣa janaka tvāt iti ced ucyate 
[152,vii_152,viii]	nirvāṇe api sukham na eva paritoṣa kriyā kṣamam prārthanīyatayā atyantam sukha tvāt sakalam sukham nahi sukham aprārthanīyam nāma kiñicat asti tatas sakala sukha sampad ā āsīnasya api tatas param sukha atiśaya vāñchā vidyate eva tat eva sukham punar punar prārthayate iti na aprārthanam cittam asya asti prārthanā ca nāma tṛṣṇā apara vyapadeśā mahat etat mahatām duḥkham tatas sarvam sukham aparitoṣa janakam eva tatas sukhī na kaścid api parinirvṛtaḥ yatas paryāyeṇa sakala sukha akāṃkṣā eva asya bhavati tatas dṛṣṭvā vā anupādānam tatas sukhasya karma upacinoti iti saṃsāraḥ eva anena sthātavyam 
[152,ix_152,x]	nanu vairāgyam api dṛśyate eva na nāma na dṛśyate tat tu sukha āśayā eva yatas parikhinnaḥ tad upāya anveṣaṇa prayāsena duḥkham eva manyamānaḥ sukha abhimukhaḥ prakāra antara abhilāṣī vairāgyam abhimukhī karoti natu ātmani nisnehaḥ atas eva āha sarvathā ātma grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayati alam ātmīya sneha bījam tad tad avastham vyavasthitam 
[152,xi_152,xiii]	ayam atra parama arthaḥ yāvat ātma grahaḥ tāvat ātma snehāt na mucyate ātmīye api tatas snehaḥ upakāra samāśrayāt nanu ātma graham eva ayam parityajya doṣa parihārāya varttiṣyate tatas katham ātmīya sneha ādayaḥ ucyate yadi ātma grahaḥ eva asya na asti doṣa nirākriyā kim artham na hi anarthi tve kiñcid kartum pravartate 
[152,xiv]	duḥkha bhāgi anyathā syāt ced na tam duḥkhinam icchati na ca tatra grahaḥ tasya iti etat anyonya bādhitam para artha karaṇa icchāyām sukhinam tam yadi icchati pareṇa kriyatām eva rucau ātma grahaḥ punar ātmanaḥ kṣaṇika tve api viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa sambhavāt para arthaḥ sambhavati evatasmāt ātma grahaḥ vṛthā mahā anubhāva tā yogāt tena eva yadi tat kriyā mahā anubhāva tā kā eva tasya mithyā abhimāninaḥ tasmāt duḥkhinam ātmānam yaḥ na vāñchati bhāvataḥ saḥ eva ātma grahaḥ tasya tathā ātmīya graha udayaḥ atha dīrgha kāla sukha akāṃkṣaḥ na ātmīya grahavān yadi dīrgha kāla sukha adṛṣṭeḥ icchā tatra katham bhavet kadācid syāt iti yadi pravṛtiḥ na bhavet api na syāt api kadācid tat naṣṭā markaṭacāndrikā yogi avasthā gatasya asya na vipraḥ kim bhaviṣyati anyonya saṃśrayāt evam vṛttiḥ tatra bhavet katham 
[153,viii_153,x]	tasmāt yatne api ātmīya vairāgyam guṇa leśa samāśrayāt vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛṇoti ca yasya nāma ātma grahaḥ sa yat kiñcit ātma upakāriṇam guṇa leśam āśritya tatra abhimukhībhūtaḥ ātmīye vairāgyam pratibadhnāti eva doṣa darṣī na evam iti ced na doṣa darśanasya eva tena guṇa darśanena pratibandhāt tasmāt ātmani aviraktaḥ viraktaḥ eva ātmīye 
[153,xi_153,xiv]	ātmani api virāgaḥ ced na idānīm yaḥ virajyate tyajati asau yathā ātmānam vyarthātas duḥkha bhāvanā syāt etat ātmānam parityaktum asamarthaḥ na hi saḥ eva tena lakṣyate tathā hi yathā asti na tathā tyāgaḥ yathā na asti tena na ātma parityāgaḥ rāgasya kevalaḥ tatas rāgitā parityāgāt sadā eva sukhī atra ucyate sukheṣu asthāpanā sā eva rāgaḥ āgraha lakṣaṇaḥ sā ca asti rāgaḥ eva asti iti etat pūrvam vivecitam yadi ca ātmani virāgaḥ kasya sa virāgaḥ na idānīm asti yaḥ virajyate anyohi anyaḥ tatra viraktaḥ bhavati saḥ eva ced avirakta svabhāvaḥ sa na viraktaḥ bhavati atra ucyate 
[153,xv]	na ātmā ātmani kim yathā asti sa virajyate na tathā na yathā sosti tathā api na virajyate na hi tasya anyathā bhāvaḥ na api anyasya tathā sthitiḥ sarva ātmanā eka deśena sarvathā durghaṭam tatas ekasya na eka deśa usti na eka deśa ustya bhinna tā yasya eka deśaḥ sonyaḥ syāt tathā asatyanava sthitiḥ syāt ananyaḥ katham cicced tathā api aḥ tu anavasthitiḥ apara apara kalpānām tatra aparisamāptitaḥ 
[153,xix_153,xxii]	tasmāt ātmā eva tena parityaktavyaḥ yathā tyajati asau ātmānam tathā vyarthāḥ duḥkha bhāvanā yena api ākāreṇa na parityajati tathā api vyarthāḥ duḥkha bhāvanā vairāgyam kartum aśakyatvāt athavā ātmani api virāgaḥ ca id na idānīm yaḥ virajyate yatra tyajati asau tam yathā ātmānam atas abhāvat tyāgasya vyartha duḥkha bhāvanā na duḥkha bhāvanā artha atyāgāt samarthā na khalu virāgasya asya kāraṇam yathā ātmanaḥ tathā ātmīyasya api tatas na tādṛśā virāgeṇa muktaḥ bhavati itas api vyarthāḥ duḥkha bhāvanā yatas duḥkha bhāvanayā api eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet pratyakṣam pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān 
[154,i]	yadi duḥkha bhāvanā virāgāya syāt yuktam yadā sāviṣyeta na ca asau virāgāya duḥkha bhāvanā hi duḥkha sākṣāt karaṇa hetuḥ eva na anyathā asau virāgāya bhāvanā vibhāvita duḥkha santānaḥ virāgī yathā syāt na ca evam yatas pūrvam iti tat duḥkham pratyakṣam eva pratyakṣa pūrvaka niścaya sambhavāt anyathā na saṃsāra parityāga arthī bhavet nahya sākṣātkṛtam duḥkha pīḍayati na ca tathā api virāgaḥ tatas vyarthikā duḥkha bhāvanā priya viprayoga ādi duḥkham hi sakala lokasya pratyakṣam tadā ced aviraktaḥ duḥkha bhāvanayā katham virāgaḥ bhavet 
[154,ii_154,iv]	nanu duḥkha bhāvanā sakalasya duḥkhasya smaraṇa saṃkalane bhavantī mahatīm duḥkha saṃhatim vibhāvayati tatas virāgi tā iti ced tatas udvegāt virāgaḥ syāt na etat asti yasmāt yathā eva duḥkha pracayaḥ smaryyamāṇaḥ vibhāvayet tathā sukhasya pracayaḥ tatas rāgī bhavet ayam yathā duḥkha santānam vibhāvya virāgaḥ tathā viparyayāt sa rāgaḥ api iti katham muktiḥ 
[154,v_154,ix]	nanu praśama sukhasya annaḥ dvejanāt na saṃsāra sukha sa tṛṣṇaḥ tat api asat yatas na ātma dṛṣṭi niviṣṭasya śama audvega kāraṇam śmaśāna vāsaḥ kākasya kim udvegasya kāraṇam kākaḥ padma vane prītim prāpnoti na hi tādṛśīm yādṛśīm aśuci sthāna viniveśita saṅgamaḥ nanu dṛśyate eva prīti hetau doṣa darśanāt vairāgyam tat katham doṣa darśane api duḥkha bhāvanayā na viraktaḥ na etat yatas yadi api ekatra doṣeṇa tad kṣaṇam calitā matiḥ viraktau na eva tatra api kāmī iva vanitā antare 
[154,x_154,xi]	yadi api kvacid aparādha kāriṇi jane viraktiḥ kṣaṇam tathā api asau na sarvathā viraktiḥ na khalu kāmī kvacid kāminyām viraktaḥ tathā api vanitā antare aviraktaḥ eva tatra ca paryāyeṇa tathā hi rāga virodhi avasthānāt eva asau viraktaḥ tad avirodhi avasthātaḥ janaḥ punar aviraktaḥ eva tasmāt rāga śakti saṅgataḥ eva asau viraktaḥ na tu sarvathā punar tatra eva rāga darśanāt atas eva uktam tat hi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇam yadā aryayā prajñayā tasmāt asya tyājya upādeya bhedena saktiḥ yā eva eka bhāvinī sā bījam sarva saktīnām paryāyeṇa samudbhave 
[154,xii_155,ii]	yasya hi heya upādeya vibhāgaḥ tasya icchā dveṣau na sarvaḥ sarvadā heyaḥ na api upādeyaḥ paryāyeṇa icchā dveṣau paraspara bījakau paryāyeṇa asya bhavataḥ eva iti katham ātmadhī yuktaḥ nairātmya darśinaḥ punar sarvatra upekṣāḥ heya upādeya vibhāgaḥ tatas sakala sakti nirmūlane vyavasthitasya kutas rāga ādi sambhavaḥ api ca virāga bhāvi rūpe vastuni bhavet na anyathā na ca ātma darśiniḥ kvacid virūpa tā na tāvat asya ātmā sa doṣaḥ tatra snehaḥ api nirdoṣa viṣaya tvāt adoṣaḥ upalabdhi sādhanāni api nirdoṣāṇi etāvat eva sakalam jagat kva idānīm sa virajyate nirdoṣa biṣayaḥ snehaḥ nirdoṣaḥ sādhanāni ca etāvat eva ca jagat kva idānīm sa virajyate iti saṃgrahaḥ atha api syāt sa doṣa tā api ced tatra tasya ātmani api sā samā tatra aviraktaḥ tad doṣe kva idānīm sa virajyate 
[155,iii]	nanu viṣayasya sa doṣa tā api dṛśyate śarīra ādeḥ ca nanu kā teṣām sukha hetūnām sa doṣa tā dukha hetu tā nanu paryāyeṇa sarvasya sukha hetu tā kadācid duḥkha hetu tā ced nanu ātmani api sā samānā eva tatra ced ātmani tad doṣaḥ eva aviraktaḥ kva virāgavān bhavet ātmā parityaktum aśakyaḥ iti ced ātmīye api na virāgaḥ doṣān tyaktum śakya tvāt ca ātmīyasya eva tyāgaḥ iti api mithyā yadā yadā yasya doṣaḥ tadā tasya tyāgaḥ na sarvadā yathā doṣāṇām tyāgaḥ tathā doṣa anitya tayā tyāga anitya tā api sukha hetau aparityakte paścāt abhāve mahat duḥkham iti ced tasmāt mūlataḥ eva parityāgaḥ yuktaḥ evam tarhi duḥkhe api sati tad anantaram mahat sukham bhavati iti dukham api upādātavyam tasmāt na kvacid virāga ustya ātma darśinaḥ api ca 
[155,iv_155,vii]	guṇa darśana sambhūtam sneham bādheta doṣa dṛś sa ca indriya ādau na tu evam bāla ādeḥ api darśanāt tathā doṣavatī api sadbhāvāt svabhāvāt guṇavatī api anyatra ātmīyatāyām vā vyatīta ādau vihānitaḥ na guṇa darśanāt indriya ādau snehaḥ api tu ātmīya dṛṣṭeḥ tathā hi doṣavatī api ātmīyatayā parigṛhīte snehasya bhāvāt indriya ādau guṇavatī api paratra abhāvāt bāla paśu ādīnām ca aparikalita guṇa doṣāṇām bhāvāt ātmīye api ca vyatīte abhāvāt anāgate ca tasmāt na doṣa darśanāt nivartate snehaḥ evam tarhi doṣa darśanāt ātmīya buddhiḥ eva na bhaviṣyati tad bhāvāt ca snehaḥ guṇa darśana sambhūtasya ātmīya darśanasya doṣa darśanena apākaraṇāt na kiñcadetat yatas 
[155,viii_155,xi]	tatas eva ca na ātmīya buddheḥ api guṇa īkṣaṇam kāraṇam hīyate sā api tasmāt na aguṇa darśanāt doṣavatī api kvacid ātmīya bṛddheḥ bhāvāt guṇavatī api ca abhāvāt vyatīta ādau ca iti apicā sat guṇa āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate tasmāt tad kāraṇa ābādhī vidhiḥ tam bādhate katham iti snehaḥ hi nāma api doṣa darśanena hīyeta yadi tāvatā yāvatā snehena tat eva doṣa darśanam apākriyate sat guṇa āropa vidhāyinā madhyastha tayā cetasaḥ doṣa darśanam anāropaḥ ca guṇānām iti ced na snehena saḥ eva madhyastha bhāvaḥ na labhyate viṣaya antare sneha antareṇa yadi paramasau bādhyate na anyathā tathā ca 
[155,xii_156,ii]	upaghātaḥ saḥ eva asya tathā sati vivartate yādṛśaḥ bhakṣitaḥ mātrā sa ḍākinyā api tādṛśaḥ tasmāt na duḥkha bhāvanayā sneha parityāgataḥ muktiḥ ātma darśinaḥ atra sām khyāḥ prāhuḥ na ātma darśinām duḥkha bhāvanā sambhavati api tu prakṛti puruṣa antara parijñānataḥ muktiḥ tathā hi śuddha bodha svabhāvoyam puruṣaḥ paramārthataḥ prakṛti antaram ajñātvā mohāt saṃsāram āśritaḥ 
[156,iii_156,v]	prakṛtiḥ sukha ādi svabhāvāyāḥ vivekena agrahaṇāt amuktiḥ ātmanaḥ tatas kevala jñāna udayaḥ eva m uktiḥ ātmanaḥ tat api asat yatas parāpara prārthanātaḥ vināśa utpatti buddhitaḥ indriya ādeḥ pṛthak bhūtam ātmānam vetti ayam janaḥ tasmāt na eka tva dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan saḥ ātmani upalambha antaraṅgeṣu prakṛtyā eva anurajyate 
[156,vi]	hāmi udaya darśanam eva bheda darśanam anvaya vyatireka bhāvataḥ hi bhedaḥ ātma anvayī sukha ādayaḥ na anvayinaḥ tatas viruddha dharmma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ iti atha etat eva na paryālocayati saṃsārī tathā satya muktiḥ eva viveka adhyavasāyasya asambhavāt na khalu sukha arthī tasya hānau ādriyate sukha ādi rahitena ātmanā na kaścid arthī prekṣāvān kevalasya arthinaḥ saṃsarggāt prāk na saṃsāraḥ pradhānena saha ekatām ātmani paśyataḥ saḥ iti ced tat asat 
[156,vii]	cetanasya ca svapitasya katham ekatva vibhramaḥ viṣaya abhilāṣaḥ kutas yatas saṃsāra saṅgatiḥ pradhāna anupraveśaḥ hi na tatra asti eka tā kutas ātmani evahi na bhrāntiḥ prāk etat pratipāditam viṣaya tvena dṛṣṭiḥ ced nābheda grahaṇam bhavet buddheḥ abhāvāt dṛṭiḥ ca na yuktā sāṃkhya darśane abhilāṣaḥ ca dṛṣṭerthe puruṣāṇām pravartaṃte smaraṇasya ca sadbhāvaḥ sa rgga vṛtteḥ puras kutas abhilāṣa smaraṇayoḥ prakṛteḥ eva vṛttitaḥ abhilāṣāt ca tad vṛttiḥ iti anyonya samāśrayaḥ anādi vāsanātaḥ ced tathā asya sukhita ādayaḥ vāsanā api pradhānasya vikriyātaḥ puras kutas tasmāt sva bodha rūpasya prakṛtiḥ sā yadi iṣyate na sā śakyā anyathā kartum iti saṃsāri asau sadā 
[156,xiv_156,xvii]	nanu duḥkha saṃvedanāt dṛśyate eva nirvedaḥ sa katham anyathā kriyeta atra āha pratyutpannā tu yaḥ duḥkhāt nirvedaḥ dveṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ na vairāgyam tadā api asya snehaḥ avasthā antareṣaṇāt yatas dveṣasya duḥkha yoni tvāt sa tāvat mātra saṃsthitiḥ tasmin nivṛtte prakṛtim svām eva bhajate punar 
[156,xviii_156,xix]	duḥkha saṃvedana udvignaḥ api na vairāgya yogī snehena eva hi asau ātmani ātmīye ca pratikūla darśanāt vidveṣavān eva hi tadā aśubha ādi vastu pratyaya mātram etat vairāgyasya pāramārthikasya ātma darśinaḥ tu snehāt amuktiḥ eva avasthā antara prārthanātaḥ dveṣaḥ eva sarvadā bhāvī tatra tu vairāgyam na etat asti yāvat kālaṃca tat duḥkham tāvat dveṣaḥ pravartate kāraṇasya tu dukhasya nivṛttau dveṣitā kutas duḥkhasya api anuvṛttiḥ ced śivam muktiḥ kara utu asau duḥkha dveṣa abhibhūtasya sadā sthānam adhogatiḥ 
[157,i_157,vi]	nanu udvegam antareṇa katham muktiḥ anudvignaḥ hi saṃsārāt mukti arthī na asti cetanaḥ na ca duḥkha aparābhūtaḥ udvegī jāyate janaḥ tat asat tatas eva ca audāsīnyam tu sarvatra tyāga upādāna hānitaḥ vāsī caṃdana kalpā nām vairāgyam nāma kathyate dharmatā mātra darśanena hi mamatām avāpyate cetasaḥ nanu naya pratidha prahāṇena vairāgya yogitā yoginām asmad pakṣe na anyathā katham tarhi duḥkha bhāvanā uktā bhagavatā atra prativacanam 
[157,vii_157,ix]	saṃskāra duḥkha tām matvā kathitā duḥkha bhāvanā sā ca naḥ pratyayayā utpattiḥ sā nairātmya dṛś āśrayaḥ yuktiḥ tu śūnyatā dṛṣṭeḥ tad arthāḥ śeṣa bhāvanāḥ anityāt prāha tena eva ittham duḥkhāt nirātma tām na khalu duḥkha duḥkha tā mātram abhisandhāya duḥkha bhāvanā uktā rāginām hi tāvat mātreṇa vairāgya sukha bhaṅge sati pakṣapāta parityāgāt saṃsāra duḥkha bhāvanā yogya tā yathā asyāt iti tu uktā sā ca saṃskāra duḥkha tā śūnyatā eva paramārthataḥ tatas śūnyatā dṛṣṭeḥ eva muktiḥ 
[157,x]	śeṣāḥ tu bhāvanāḥ tad arthāḥ eva atas eva nairātmya darśana avasānāḥ bhagavataḥ deśanā yat āha rupam bhikṣavaḥ nityam anityam vā anityam bhadanta yat anityam tat duḥkham sukham vā duḥkham bhadanta yat anityam tat duḥkham vipariṇāma dharmmakam kalpyantu tat evam draṣṭum etat mama eṣaḥ aham asmi eṣa mama ātmā iti no hi idam bhadantaḥ itye vam hetu phala bhāvena anātma darśanam eva mukteḥ upāyaḥ iti kathitam bhavati yaḥ punar ātma darśī saḥ aviraktaḥ eva 
[157,xi_157,xii]	aviraktaḥ ca tṛṣṇāvān sarva ārambha samāśritaḥ saḥ amuktaḥ kleśa karmmabhyām saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ ātma darśana bīje hi vyavasthite ātmīya darśanam anupahatam saṃsāra hetuḥ tatas ātmani ātmīye ca aviraktaḥ niyamena tṛṣṇāvān tatas sarva karmmā ārambha samāśritaḥ kleśa karmma bhyām amuktaḥ saṃsārpya iva asau iti kutas tasya mukti gandhaḥ api 
[157,xiii_158,i]	atha api syāt atmīyam eva paramārthataḥ na asti tena kutas sneha sambhavaḥ snehaḥ hi nāma viṣaye bhavati na nirviṣayaḥ tat api asat ātmīyam eva yaḥ na icchet bhoktā api asya na vidyate ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā bhogau hi lakṣaṇam dṛśyamānam ātmīyam katham iva śakyam na asti iti pratipādayitum avidyā nibandhana tvāt sarvasya iti ced nā avidyāyāḥ ātma vyatirekeṇa abhāvāt na avidyā puruṣāt anyā puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam iti vacanāt tatas avidyā svabhāva tvāt asya bhrānta tā na kadācid apeyāt na hi tad ā ātma bhūtā bhrāntiḥ tatas apaiti tasya eva apāya prasaṅgāt 
[158,ii_158,iv]	pratikṣiptaḥ casyāḥ dvā daḥ kiñca ātmīye asati kriyā bhogau na staḥ kriyā bhoga ātmaka tvāt ātmanaḥ atha paramārthataḥ etat api na iṣyate eva iti ced ātmanaḥ api para artha tve kaḥ avaṣṭambhaḥ samvedanena tasya paricchedāt iti ced sarva samvedana prasaṅgaḥ abhyāsāt svapna ādi vat asattvam iti na yuktam ātmanaḥ api na pāramārthika tvam atha advaitam tadā citra advaitam iti na ātmā nāma asti nitya tvasya pratyutpanna svabhāva mātra grahiṇā pratyakṣeṇa agrahaṇāt pūrva apara pratyakṣayoḥ yugapad a bhāvāt ekaikena nitya tā ātmanaḥ atha parama arthaḥ etat api na iṣyate eva iti cit pratītiḥ na ca saṃghaṭanam smṛteḥ apramāṇa tvāt pratyakṣa abhāve anumāna abhāvāt ca iti tatas na ātma darśanāt samīhita artha siddhiḥ tasmāt anādi santāna tulya jātīya bījikām utkhāta mūla aṅkuruta sattva dṛṣṭi mumukṣavaḥ nairātmya darśanāt eva mokṣaḥ na anyā gatiḥ prāmāṇikī iti upasaṃhāraḥ 
[158,v_158,vi]	nanu āgamāt ātma astitvam tasya ca mokṣaḥ sa ca mokṣaḥ ekānta sukha rūpaḥ na kadācid tasya abhāvaḥ saṃsāra sukham tu viccheda vat iti na tatas paritoṣaḥ sa ca dīkṣā ādi vidheḥ iti acodyamā iva pūrvakam sakalam tathā ca uktam atīndriyān asambedhān paśyaṃti ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā ye bhāvān vacanam teṣām na anumānena bādhyate 
[158,vii_158,ix]	apauruṣeyam vā vacanam iti tat api ayuktam āgamasya tathā bhāva nibandhanam apaśyatām muktim āgama mātreṇa bruvan na paritoṣa kṛt sattyam etat anīndriya darśinām vacanam anumān ema bādhyate tat eva tu tad prayukta tvam vacanasya na gamyate sarva āgama sādhāraṇa tvāt asya na ca sarva āgama pramāṇa tvam na tad artha anuṣṭānasambhavaḥ apauruṣeyatvantu na yuktam iti uktam 
[158,x_159,i]	nanu bīja ādīnām aprarohaṇa dharmma tā dīkṣā vidhi saṃsarggāt upalabdhā tat api ayuktam na alam bīja ādi saṃsiddhaḥ vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane taila abhyaṅga agni dāha ādeḥ api mukti prasaṅgataḥ atha taila abhyaṅgasya tāvat mātram eva sāmarthyam evam sati dīkṣāyām api samānam tathā 
[159,ii_159,iii]	prāk guroḥ llāghavāt paścāt na pāpa haraṇam kṛtam mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpam guru amūrtitaḥ yadi nāma dīkṣitasya sataḥ prāk guroḥ llāghavam bhavatu na tāvatā pāpa apahāraḥ lāghavam hi gaurava virodhi upalabhyamānam guru tva abhāvam eva gamayati na pāpa abhāvam pāpasya gaurava abhāvāt pāpena eva asau guruḥ iti ced kutas etat āgamāt iti ced uktam atra api ca 
[159,iv_159,xi]	tāvat mātrasya pāpasya muktiḥ na asti vināśataḥ sāmarthyāt aparatra api śaktiḥ iti anirūpaṇam darśaṃnam devatā ādīnām kva ca nāma na vidyate sarvatas muktiḥ asti iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tathā sati nanu bhavat pakṣepi tṛṣṇā ācchedaḥ yadi nāma nairātmya bhāvanātaḥ muktiḥ tu katham iti cintyam eva tat api na yathāvat tathā hi mithyājñāna tad udbhūta tarṣa saṃcetana avaśāt hīna sthāna gatiḥ janma tena tat chinna jāyate tayoḥ eva hi sāmarthyam jātau tanmātra bhāvataḥ yatas te cetane svayam karmmā atyakhaṇḍam janma kāraṇam tṛṣṇā vaśāt eva deśa ādi saṃprāptiḥ upalabhyate 
[159,xii]	nanu janmanaḥ karmmā api kāraṇam tatas katham tanmātra bhāvaḥ tat api asat te eva cetane svayam karmma yat pūrvakam cetanā lakṣaṇam dāna ādi karmma tad saṃskāra ādantye janma antara bhāvinī cetane mithyājñāna tad bhūta tarṣa saṃcetane te eva sākṣāt karmma tad anantara bhāvi tvāt janmanaḥ pūrvakantu tad kāraṇa tvāt upacārāt karmma na sākṣāt svatas saṃpūrṇṇa janma kāraṇam dīkṣitasya api tat asti iti na muktiḥ 
[159,xiii_159,xvi]	atha api syāt gati pratītyoḥ kāraṇāni āśrayaḥ tāni adṛṣṭataḥ adṛṣṭa nāśāt na gatiḥ tad saṃskāraḥ na cetanā daśavidham kuśalam akuśalam api daśavidham eva na cetanā lakṣaṇam tasya ca dīkṣā ādinā vidhānena nāśaḥ iti tat api asad arthasya asiddha tvāt api ca sāmarthī aṃkaraṇa utpatteḥ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttitaḥ dṛṣṭam buddhe rna ca anyasya tāni santi na santi kim 
[159,xvii_160,i]	buddheḥ anvaya vyatirekau anuvidhīyamānāni karaṇāni cakṣuḥ ādīni tāni buddhyā vidhī yamānāni santi paramparayā utpadyante tatas kasmāt na janma atha dīkṣayā upaghātāt na janmani sāmarthyam evam sati dhāraṇa preraṇa kṣobha nirodhāḥ cetanā vaśāḥ na syuḥ teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā ādi anantaram 
[160,ii]	buddhi ādayaḥ hi ātma guṇāḥ yadi dīkṣayā upahatā analam janmani sāmarthya bhājaḥ tadā dīkṣā anantaram eva buddhiḥ upahatā satī dhāraṇam sva icchā vṛttiḥ viṣayeṣu nivarttanam preraṇam abhimate kṣobhaḥ visaṃsthula tvam nirodhaḥ vināśaḥ ete na syuḥ atha maraṇa anantaram asāmarthyam pariṇati viśeṣa apekṣa tvāt kāraṇānām tat api ayuktam 
[160,iii_160,iv]	idānīm na asti sāmarthyam dīkṣā ādīnām ajanmane yadi syāt maraṇāt ūrdhvam iti na asti pramedṛśī idānīm eva yadi sāmarthyam leśataḥ pratīyate tatas utkarṣa lābhāt aparam api syāt iti syāt yadā tu anugamaḥ eva tāratamya bhāgī na upalabdhaḥ tadā nirniṃbandhanam eva mukti parikalpanam atha idānīm buddhi sat bhavāt rāgāt ayosya samāna svabhāvāḥ bhavanti maraṇān antarantu buddheḥ abhāvāt eva saṃsāra dharma abhāvaḥ 
[160,v_160,vii]	tat api asat buddhiḥ eva janma antare na asti iti kutas maraṇāt iti ced vyartha tā dīkṣā vidheḥ sarvasya maraṇe buddhi abhāve sati mukteḥ atha buddheḥ tadā abhāvāt na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ buddheḥ teṣām asāmarthye jīvataḥ api syuḥ akṣamāḥ rāga ādayaḥ hi malāḥ buddheḥ santaḥ na hetavaḥ santi iti na buddheḥ abhāvaḥ atha upahata ārāga ādayaḥ dīkṣayā na samarthāḥ tadā jīvataḥ buddheḥ pratisandhi hetavaḥ na syuḥ tatas dīkṣā anantaram eva muktiḥ syāt asti eva iti ced tat na 
[160,viii_160,ix]	nihrāsā atiśayāt puṣṭau pratipakṣa sva pakṣayoḥ doṣāḥ sva bīja santānāḥ dīkṣite api anivāritāḥ doṣāḥ hi sva bīja bhāvinaḥ kutas etat nirhrāsāt atiśayāt ca pratipakṣasya nairātmyasya puṣṭau nirhrāsāt sva pakṣasya ayoni śoma naskārasya atiśayāt evaṃbhūtāḥ ca doṣāḥ dīkṣite api anivāritāḥ iha janmani anyatra ca tat katham asau muktaḥ 
[160,x_160,xi]	nanu nairātma darśanañcet kasya asau muktiḥ ātmāhi rāga ādi mala upahataḥ śuddhaḥ yadā kutaścid bhavet tadā muktaḥ bandha vigamohi muktiḥ nairātmya darśane ca yaḥ bandhaḥ sa bandhaḥ eva na saḥ eva muktaḥ nitya tayā ātma darśana bhāvāt tat api asat śuddhiḥ yasya na tasya anyā nirvāṇa ugniḥ napāvakaḥ tathā api vyapadeśa uyam nirvāṇaḥ agniḥ iti sthitaḥ 
[160,xii_161,i]	tatra asmad pakṣe vācaḥ yukti mātram eva na ghaṭate tat ca dṛṣṭāntena samāhitam ātma vāde tu arthaḥ eva na ghaṭate vācoyukti mātreṇa tu ghaṭate na api na kiñcid pradhānasya vastunaḥ vighaṭanāt na ca atra dṛṣṭānta usti yatas nityasya nirapekṣa tvāt krama utpattiḥ viruddhyate kriyā āyām akriyā yāñca kriyā ca sadṛśa ātmanaḥ 
[161,ii_161,iii]	avasthā bhede hi ātmanaḥ mukta tā aśuddha avasthasya sataḥ śuddhi sambhave na krameṇa avasthānām kārya tā ātmanaḥ nirapekṣasya yugapad eva avasthā bhāvi tva prasaṅagāt iti pradeśa antare nirṇayāt api ca kriyā virūdhyate kiyā kriyā avasthayoḥ sadṛśa tvāt aikyañca hetu phalayoḥ vyatireke tatas tayoḥ kartṛ bhoktṛ tva hāniḥ syāt sāmarthyañca na sivyati 
[161,iv]	tādātmye sati hetu phalayoḥ aikyam prasaktam eka ātma antarggata tvāt tad ātma vat bhede tayoḥ hetu phalayoḥ na asau karttā na bhoktā karaṇa bhoga sambandha abhāvāt apara ātma vat anubhavataḥ api na sambandhaḥ ātma antara vat eva yogī para ātma karaṇa bhoga sākṣātkaraṇāt karttā bhoktā ca syāt atha samavāya sambandhāḥ evam na samavāyasya abhāvāt eva na ca yoginām api samavāyāt ekatva buddhi hetuḥ atha kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt kāraṇa phalābhyām karttā bhoktā ca asau bhavet tat api ayuktam sāmarthyañca na sidhyati na nityasya sāmarthyam asti iti pratipāditam 
[161,v_161,vii]	nairātmye api tarhi smaraṇa bhoga ādayaḥ na sidhyanti tat na anya smaraṇa bhoga ādi prasaṃgāḥ ca na bādhakāḥ asmṛteḥ kasyacid tena hi anubhūteḥ smṛta udbhavaḥ na kasyacid smaraṇam smarttuḥ tad abhāvāt eva na api bhogaḥ bhoktṛ a bhāvāt api tu smaraṇam eva tat eva smartṛ smaraṇa viṣayaḥ evam bhoge api vācyam sukham eva bhogyam bhogaḥ bhoktā ca tat ca smaraṇam hetoḥ anubhavāt utpadyate nanu anyatas api anubhavāt parakīya abhimatāt kasmāt na utpattimat para karmmaṇaḥ api ca bhogaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamāt ātma vāde api vā kasmāt na bhavati eṣa doṣaḥ ātmanaḥ bhedāt saḥ eva bhedaḥ kutas 
[161,viii_161,xii]	yathā eva ātmā aviśeṣe api na anyatas smṛti sambhavaḥ tathā manaḥ viśeṣe api na anyatas smaraṇa udayaḥ manasām hetu bhedena bhedaḥ eṣa bhavet api ātmanā antu kutas bheda vibhāgaḥ yama hetukaḥ nanu asati ekasmin ātmani paśyāmi aham smarāmi iti kutas eka tva saṅgatiḥ ātmani api samānoyam doṣaḥ na atra pramodayaḥ ātmā api kena pramāṇena smaraṇam darśanañca eka adhiṣṭhāna tayā vetti pratyakṣeṇa iti ced 
[161,xiii]	pūrva aparatvena adhyakṣa gatiḥ asti iti sādhitam pratyakṣa asambhavāt tatra na anumānam pravartate pūrvarūpa tayā ātmānam yadi ātmā vetti tattvataḥ samvedanasya pūrvasya sattvam syāt adhunātanam tatas pūrva tayā tasya samvitteḥ sambhavaḥ kutas na hi samvedyamānasya pūrva bhāvaḥ pratīyate smaraṇāt eva pūrva tvam na pramāṇam smṛtiḥ na hi smaraṇāt eva tat tvañced anyatra api na kim matam tasmāt ātma pravāde api na ekatvam tattvataḥ sthitam tayoḥ ca yugapad bhāvāt eka tvam abhimanyate ekatva mātra abhimate vyavahāraḥ vibhāgataḥ eka kārya tayā ca eka vyavahāroyam īkṣyate anādya vidyā abhyāsasya sāmarthyam idamāñjasam na ātmā asti vedena eva ekā tathā ātma graha kāriṇī
