[224,i_224,ii]	abhāvaḥ api hi prāc abhāva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ prameyaḥ iti katham asat aprameya miti vyāptiḥ avyāptikaḥ ca katham hetuḥ aikāntikaḥ tathā hi prāgabhāva ādya vedane sarvam eva miti ambhavet na kāyanna api kāraṇam tathā ca pratipādayiṣyate itaretarāve ca satim miśrībhaveyuḥ dravyāṇi iti advaitva sakalam bhavet tat niścayaḥ pramāṇam vā dvitīyam yatas na akṣajā matiḥ na akṣa jñā matiḥ abhāve artha balāt jāte artha śakti anapekṣaṇe vyavadhāna ādi bhāve api jāyeta indriya jā matiḥ 
[224,iv]	na khalvabhāvaḥ nāma indriya gocaraḥ śabda ādi svabhāvasya eva tatra pratibhāsanāt tat atra na asti iti tu tasya rūpam asat tayā na akṣa gocaraḥ vyavahitasya api tasya asattvena vyavasthāpanāt atha vivikta pradeśa upalambhāt eva tathā niścayaḥ kā iyam viviktitāḥ nāma yadi pradeśa ādi rūpam tasmin upalabdhe anyat na asti iti kutas tasya tad abhāva rūpa tvāt iti ced katham anyaḥ anyasya abhāvaḥ tena sahāsaṅgam āt cet asaṅgamaḥ kutas saha āvedanāt ced saha āvedanāt tarhi vyavasthā abhāvasya tad anya vedanam eva tasya āvedanam tat anyat tvam eva tasya āvedane kathaṅ gṛhyate tasya prāk vedanāt iti ced tat etat na vedyate iti katham abhāva gatiḥ tasmāt ayama bhās vaniḥ cayaḥ na indriya jaḥ tatas na pratyakṣam etat 
[224,v_224,vii]	atha api syāt pratyakṣam eva nivarttamānam abhāva niścaya nimittam tat api asat abhāve vinivṛttiḥ ced pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ viruddham sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya vyatirekiṇī pratyakṣasya eva nivṛtteḥ abhāva niścayaḥ iti ced vyāhatam etat tat ca na asti tena ca pratipattiḥ pratyakṣam hi samvedana ātma tayā yatra pravarttate tatra niścaya kṛt anubhūte niścāt anubhava abhāve tu kathat niścayaḥ tathā hi vaktāraḥ bhavanti na jāne kim asti anyat atha na asti iti na atra sama samvedanām iti katham aniścaya heta uḥ asamvedanāt niścayaḥ atha upalabdhi yogyasya anupalambhaḥ na sati padārthe tatas abhāva niścayaḥ iti ced na tarhi para loka ādeḥ atīndriyasya abhāva niścayaḥ yadi ca anupalabdhiḥ sadbhāvāt vyāvṛttā tadā tad viparyaya vyāptā satī gamikā iti liṅgam anvaya vyatireka yogāt siddham anumānam aparam pramāṇam liṅgāt utpatteḥ 
[224,viii_224,xi]	anena svabhāva retuḥ anupalabdhiḥ ca tad antargata uktā kārya hetum āha siddhañca para caitanya pratipatteḥ pramā dvayam vyāhāra ādau pravṛtteḥ ca siddhaḥ tad bhāba niḥ cayaḥ nahim para caitanyam ātmanaḥ iva pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati na khalu jāne kim asya caitanyam asti na vā iti tad ākāra parisphuraṇāt eva tathā pratipatteḥ kārya viśeṣeṇa viśeṣasya dveṣa ādeḥ niścayaḥ 
[225,i]	bhavatu yathā kathañcid ayat niścayaḥ sa tu pramāṇan na bhavati na eṣa doṣaḥ tad anurūpasya vyavahārasya vyāhāra ādi lakṣaṇasya darśanāt yathākathañcida pramāṇikā eva pravṛttiḥ iti ced na vicārya parityāga prasaṅgāt anyasya upāyasya abhāvāt agatyai aparityāgaḥ iti ced anyasya upāyasya abhāvaḥ iti eṣaḥ api niścayaḥ pramāṇam eva tat ca anumānam iti uktam 
[225,ii]	para abhyupagamena etat ucyate tenā adoṣaḥ na para abhyupagatasya para artha anumānaḥ eva avatārāt nahi atmānam eva para abhyupagamā iva pratipādayati kaścid gati antarantāvat na pratipadye tena eva mahampravṛttaḥ para loke api tarhi pratipattiḥ astu para loka tyāge api jīvitum śakyam tena tatra apravṛttiḥ iti ced evan jīvitum śakyam iti kutas etat jīvita arthī api kim atīta jīvita arthī atha varttamāna jīvita arthī iti tatra atīta arthī na atīta tvāt eva na varttamāna arthī tasya api prāpta tvāt anāgata arthī ced anāgatantarhi jīvita manena upāyena bhavati na anyathā iti anvaya vyatirekataḥ pratīteḥ anumānam eva 
[225,iii]	kiñca yathā kathañcit ayam vyavahāraḥ iti kimbhavataḥ eva atha anyasya yadi bhavataḥ eva ubhaya asiddha tvāt kathamparaḥ pratipāditaḥ atha anyasya api upāya abhāvaḥ eva tathā sati para caitanya pratipattiḥ avaśyam iti katham yathā kathañcidiyampratītiḥ atha iyam api bhavati yathā kathañcid eva evantarhi bhavataḥ eva asampratyayaḥ kathamparasya pratipattiḥ mama tāvat evamparasya tu katham iti na jāne avacanam eva tarhi prāptam parasya api evam eva bhaviṣyati iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt iti yaktiñcid etat tasmāt asti para pratītiḥ tatas anumānam abhyupaganta vyampareṇa api 
[225,iv_225,v]	pramāṇam avisamvādāt tat kvacid vyabhicārataḥ na āśvāsaḥ iti ced liṅganduḥ dṛṣṭeḥ etat īdṛśam avisambādaḥ hi pramāṇa lakṣaṇanta dasti anumānasya iti pramāṇa tā atha visambāde api kvacid dṛśyate iti viparyayaḥ tathā hi sa śyāmaḥ tad putra tvāt iti anumānam vyabhicāra asaṅgī api tat ayuktam anumānam eva etat na bhavati liṅga ābhāsāt utpatteḥ pratibandha abhāvāt na hi śyāma tāya antad putra tvam pratibaddham eka sāmagrayadhīna tayā samāna rūpa tā ced na eka sāma grayadhīnatā abhāvāt karma āhāra kāla viśeṣasya sambhavāt eka sāma grayadhīnatāyām yugapad utpatti prasaṅgāt tasmāliṅga rūpa tattva anupalakṣaṇāt ahetau api hetu tva adhyāropataḥ vyabhicāra abhiprāyaḥ 
[225,vi_226,ii]	atha api syāt evam prāyam eva sarva anumānanna aparambiśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti kasya avyabhicāraḥ tat api asat yatas kadācid siddhāsya pratītiḥ vastunaḥ kvacid tat avaśyantataḥ jātantad svabhāvaḥ api vā bhavet tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇa pratibandha saṅgatam hi liṅgaṅgamakam anyasya tad ātma tvāt yatas ca pratītiḥ avyabhicāriṇī sādhyasya tat niyamena tatas utpannam tat niyatam tattva svabhāvam vā na anyayā avyabhicāra gati sambhavaḥ ati prasaṅgāt na ca sarvatas pratipattiḥ sarvasya upajāyate kādācid katayā upalabdheḥ tasmāt iyampratipattiḥ niyamena pratibaddha padārtha janitā prativandhaḥ ca dvividhaḥ eva eka sāmagrayadhīnasya api tad utpatti lakṣaṇam eva pāramparyeṇa pratibandhaḥ tatas eva avyabhicāraḥ yatas sva nimittam svabhāvam vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ yat ca rūpantayoḥ dṛṣṭanta devānyatra lakṣaṇam 
[226,iii]	yasya ca kārya svabhāva hetoḥ lakṣaṇam yat dṛṣṭam anyatra api tat eva na ca tad putra ādeḥ tat asti na tena sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ lakṣaṇa yukte hi bādhā sambhave tad lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitam syāt iti sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ na anyathā iti nyāyaḥ na ca nimittam abhāvam vā vinā kasyacid sambhavaḥ tathā śaṅkāyām avyavahāraḥ eva sarvatra syāt vyāvahārika pramāṇa prastāvaḥ ca eṣa na anyaḥ tasmāt samvyavahāra arthinā niyamena anumāna arthinā bhāvyam anupāye kathampravṛttiḥ iti ced na asiddha tvāt upāya tvasya vicāryamāṇe viśīryate iti ced na vicārasya api anumāna ātmaka tvāt soyam yathā gacchataḥ saḥ eva vismṛtaḥ panthā 
[226,iv_226,vi]	anupalabdheḥ tarhi kaḥ pratibandhaḥ saḥ eva tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti darśayati tathā hi svabhāve sva nimitte vā dṛśya darśana hetuṣu anyeṣu satsu adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham yatas eva asau tatra pratibaddhaḥ atas eva tad abhāvāt na bhavati anyathā anyasya abhāve kim iti na bhavet atiprasaṅgaḥ evam sati syāt evam hi asau pratibaddhau yadi tad abhāvena bhavet anyathā pratibandha abhāvāt tasmāt yatra upalabdhi la kṣaṇa prāptasya kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā anupalambhaḥ tatra tayoḥ abhāvaḥ yatra ca tayoḥ abhāvaḥ na tatra kārya vyāpyayoḥ sambhavaḥ iti anupalabdheḥ api avyabhicāraḥ evaṅ kārya svābhāva anupalambha lakṣaṇam trividham api anumānam asti iti sādhitam 
[226,vii_226,x]	yasmāt aprāmāṇye ca sāmānya buddheḥ tat lopaḥ āgataḥ pretyabhāvavat akṣaiḥ ced paryāyeṇa pratīyate tat ca na indriya śakta yādau akṣa buddheḥ asambhavāt abhāva pratipattau syāt buddhi janma animittakam yadi hi sāmānya buddheḥ apramāṇa tā tadā parokṣat nāma prameyat na asti iti prāptam para loka vat eva atha na sarvaḥ parokṣa arthaḥ na asti paryāyeṇa akṣaiḥ pratīteḥ para loke tu na paryāyeṇa akṣa vṛttiḥ iti tathāvidhaḥ eva na asti yadā eva tarhi pratīyate tadā eva asti prāk asti iti kutas prāk api anyena pratīyate tena asti para lokaḥ api prāk anyena na pratīyate svayam va iti kutas para loka ādeḥ anyaḥ api vā anyena pratīyate iti kutas tathā vyavahārāt iti ced āyātam anumānasya prāmāṇyam na ca akṣe yogyatāyām vā paryāyeṇa akṣa vṛttiḥ kārya svabhāva hetu bhāva anumānena eva tayoḥ avagamāt tad abhāve ca buddheḥ janma ca padārtha nāma nimittakam eva bhavet tasmāt kārya darśanena kārya vyatirekeṇa ca yogyatā
[227,i_227,v]	cakṣuḥ ādi kañcā anumīyamānam asti eva na ca paryāyeṇa tatra akṣa vyāpāra avatāraḥ tatas para loka ādikam api evam eva tasmāt sāmānyam anumānam antareṇa na pratīyate yasmāt sva lakṣaṇe ca pratyakṣam avikalpa tayā vinā vikalpena na sāmānya grahaḥ tasmin tatas anumā sāmānya avadhāraṇa rūpāḥ api pratipattayaḥ vyavahāra kāriṇyaḥ na ca sāmānyam avikalpya gṛhyate na ca sa vikalpa kamprati akṣama vicāraka tvāt tasmāt sāmānya viṣayam anumānan na pratyakṣam yat tarhi iṃda m anitya ādibhiḥ ākāraiḥ varṇṇa ādi gṛhyeta etat katham sāmānya rūpa grahaṇam etat prameya niyamaḥ ca bhavatā iṣyate prameya niyame varṇṇa anitya tā na pratīyate pramāṇam anyat tad buddhiḥ vinā liṅgena sambhavāt 
[227,vi]	niyamaḥ hi nāma prameyasya sva lakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya ca pratiniyata pramāṇa grāhya tā miśra pratipattiḥ ca iyam varṇṇa ādi anityam iti sva sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ paraspara miśra tayā pratipatteḥ tatas ubhaya rūpa pratipattiḥ anyat pramāṇam prasaktam liṅgena ca vinā sambhavāt anumānam etat na bhavati sāmānyasya ca grahaṇāt na pratyakṣam sva lakṣaṇasya ca na anumānam iti tad pramāṇa antaramvinā liṅge na vṛtteḥ sāmānyasya ca pratibhāsāt viśeṣa dṛṣṭe ca anumānena sāmānya gatiḥ liṅgasya sāmānyena sambandhasya apratīteḥ tat āha 
[227,vii_227,x]	viśeṣa dṛṣṭe liṅgasya sambandhasya apratītitaḥ tad pramāṇa antaram meya bahu tvāt bahu tā api vā pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtteḥ ekatra vā yathā viśeṣa dṛṣṭeḥ eka tri saṅkhyā apohaḥ na vā bhavet viṣayān iyamāt anya prameyasya ca sambhavāt anityam idam varṇṇa ādi iti na khalu kiñcana atra liṅgam asti na ca tat pratyakṣam sāmānyasya api anitya tvasya pratīteḥ viśeṣa dṛṣṭe ca viśeṣasya eva pratītiḥ tasya viśeṣasya liṅgasya sāmānyena sambandha apratipatteḥ tena tat tvad matena pramāṇa antaram na sākṣāt pratītiḥ iti na pratyakṣan na sāmānya viṣayam iti na anumānam 
[227,xi]	kiñca sāmānya viśeṣa ubhaya bhedena prameya bahu tvāt pramāṇa bahu tvam iti na tri saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ anekasya apramāṇasya ekatra vṛtteḥ na eka saṅkhyā apohaḥ yathā viśeṣa dṛṣṭena saha pratyakṣasya vṛttiḥ ekatra sva lakṣaṇe tathā sāmānye api pratyakṣasya iti yat uktam eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ prameya dvaya darśanāt iti sa na bhavet pratyakṣasya eva sāmānye api vṛtti sambhavāt viṣaya niyame prameya antara abhāve ca tri eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ na ca uktena nyāyena ubhayam api iti na abhimata prayojana siddhiḥ pramāṇa samplavāt prameya bahu tvāt ca pramāṇa bahu tvam 
[227,xii_228,i]	nanu śakti aśaktitaḥ ityādinā prameya bahu tvat nivāritam eva tat kathantasya upanyāsaḥ sattyam etat api dṛśyate iti upadarśyete viruddha avyabhicāri upadarśanam vā pareṇa kṛtam iti adoṣaḥ pramāṇa samplava upadarśanantu yuktam eva tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣa ūrthaḥ viśeṣeṇa na gamyate iti etasya api asiddhim udbhāvayati tasmāt na tri eka saṅkhyā nirāsaḥ atra ucyate yojanāt varṇṇa sāmānye na ayan doṣaḥ prasajyate 
[228,ii_228,iv]	varṇṇa tvam sāmānyam anitya tvena yojayati anityam varṇṇa ādi iti tena sāmānyaka rūpam eva prameyam na ubhaya rūpam iti na doṣoyambiṣayāni yaḥ mādanya prameyasya ca sambhavāt iti sāmānya viśeṣa bhāve hi syāt ayan doṣaḥ na sāmānya eka bhāve yadi anitya tvam varṇṇa tvena sāmānyena eva yojayati tat vastu dharmmaḥ na syāt yatra hi yaḥ dharmmaḥ yuktaḥ pratīyate tasya eva asau dharmaḥ sāmānya yukta tve ca sāmānyasya tad rūpam na vastunaḥ sāmānyasya ca vastu tvāt tad dharmaḥ avastu dharmaḥ eva syāt na etat asti yatas na avastu rūpantasya eva tathā siddheḥ prasādhanāt anyatra na anya siddhiḥ ced na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ 
[228,v]	yadi vastu dharmaḥ na bhavati avastuta tvena kalpita tvāt sāmānyasya tat api vastunā nitya tva ādi kam bhavet ubhayam api vastu rūpat a iti ced na vastunaḥ eva tathā prasiddheḥ yohi vikalpe pratibhāti varṇṇa tva anitya tva ādikaḥ sa sva lakṣaṇe api vidyate eva sva lakṣaṇa anubhavāt eva tad rūpa vikalpa utpatteḥ yadi vikalpaḥ sva lakṣaṇena na pratibaddhaḥ tatra sva lakṣaṇasya apratibhāsanāt tat kathantasya eva tathā prasiddhiḥ na pāramparyeṇa sambandhāt sākṣāt apratibandhe api pāramparyeṇa pratibandhaḥ iti tasya avikalpasya avisamvādi tā 
[228,vi_228,ix]	nanu vāsanā pratibandha tve katham vastu pratibaddha tā tad vāsanāyāḥ vastu pratibandhāt katham iti āha yaḥ hi bhāvaḥ yathābhūtassa tādṛś liṅga cetasoḥ hetuḥ tad jā tathābhūte tasmāt vastu niliṅga dhīḥ yaḥ hi sādhya dharmaḥ sa sādhanasya hetuḥ vyāpakaḥ vā bhavet iti pratipāditaṅ kārya vyāpya cetasaḥ kāraṇam vyāpakaḥ ca hetuḥ tatas api ced sā yā utpannā liṅgadhī sā pāramparyeṇa vastu pratibaddha tā tatas liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ evampā āramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam 
[228,x]	na vastu prāptiḥ pratibhāsāt eva adhyavasāyāt api vastu prāpteḥ sambhavāt pravarttamānaḥ hi prāpnoti pratibhāsa mātrāt pravarttanañcā adhyavasāyāt api dṛṣṭam anyathā pratibhāsāt api na pravattate adhyavasāyena pravarttitaḥ prathamam abhyāsāt paścāt pratibhāsāt pravarttetum kṣamaḥ taramāt pravṛttā astitve prāptiḥ yathā ca pratibhāsamānasya astitā tathā pratibhāsamāna kāraṇa vyāpakasya api iti ubhayatra api prāptiḥ astu na ca kvacid pratibhāsinaḥ prāptiḥ iti prāk eva idam pratyapādi yathā ca pratibhāsanāt asti iti jñāyate tathā pratibaddha pratibhāsanāt api 
[229,i_229,ii]	yadi ca prāpti viṣayaḥ na asti iti matiḥ pratibhāsa mātram eva jagat syāt bhrānta abhra anta vivekān avadhāraṇāt na hi pratibhāsa mātre bhrānteḥ avivekaḥ tasmāt parokṣa gatau bhrānta abhra anta vyavasthā na anyathā iti niścayaḥ liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ evam pāramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam tad rūpa adhyavasāyāt ca tayoḥ tad rūpa śūnyayoḥ tad rūpā vañcaka tve api kṛtā bhrānti vyavasthitiḥ 
[229,iv]	atra kecid āhar liṅga buddhiḥ liṅgi pratibaddha tayā dhūma ādeḥ buddhiḥ na hi liṅgam indriya vat sattā mātreṇa gamakam na api sva ālambana vijñāna pratibhāsana mātreṇa adṛṣṭantat rūpantad sambandhasya api pratipatti prasaṅgāt tasmāt pratibaddha tayā grahaṇam liṅga grahaṇam sa ca pratibandhaḥ na ubhaya rūpa saṃsparśam antareṇa grahītum śakyaḥ anyathā grahaṇasya adarśanāt tatra yathā liṅga grahaṇam liṅga viṣayan tathā liṅga grahaṇam api kevalam prādhānya itara tā liṅga grahaṇe hi liṅgampradhāna tayā liṅga grahaṇe liṅgī pradhāna tayā pratīyate tena yat uktaṃliṅginaḥ tu na mātrā anumānantasya ca avisamvādena bhrāntate prastute tad koliṅga gateḥ avasaraḥ yena tasyāḥ api vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ atha sā api anumāna ātmikā tathā sati liṅgi pratipattiḥ eva iti na pṛthak nirdeśaḥ pratyakṣa rūpā api liṅga pratipattiḥ nna sā liṅga ābhāsa śūnyā liṅgī ābhāsa śūnya tve ca sati api na bhrānta tā tad aviṣaya tvāt na hi stambha vijñānam kumbhakāra śūnya tayā bhrāntam iti tad nirā kṛtam eki viṣaya tvāt liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ epratyakṣa tvāt ca atra ucyate 
[229,v]	pratibaddha tayā liṅga grahaṇam yadi liṅga dhīḥ pratibandha grahaḥ sāmya dharmayoḥ anumānataḥ tathā sati anavasthā syāt tatra api pratibandha vid anumāna antarāt eva tatra api ca tad antarāt atha pratyakṣataḥ liṅgam liṅga tvena pratīyate evam sati tad ābhāsa śūnyatā asya katham bhavet 
[229,viii]	gṛhītaḥ api pratyakṣeṇa tadā smaryate liṅga tvena dhūma ādikaḥ evam sati smaraṇam apramāṇam eva kim asya avañcaka tva pratipādanena na hi tat tatra pramāṇam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ eva pramāṇa tvena avisamvāda saṅga gamaḥ atha smaraṇam api pāramparyeṇa pratibandhāt pramāṇam eva tat eva tarhi liṅgi jñānam anumānañca iti kim liṅga liṅginoḥ bhedena nirdeśaḥ atha tad apramāṇam eva gṛhīta grahaṇāt iti ucyate tathā sati pratyakṣa vṛttam pratyakṣam eva tatra pramāṇam tat ca tad ābhāsa śūnyan na bhavati iti virodhaḥ tasmāt anyathā upapattyā vyākhyāyate liṅga dhīḥ svabhāva hetoḥ jātā liṅgi dhīrā iva liṅga liṅginoḥ paramārthataḥ bheda abhāvāt liṅgi dhīḥ kārya hetoḥ kāraṇa viṣayā tatra bhedāt asau na liṅga dhīḥ na ca atyanta abhyāsāt asmāt dhamāt agni dhīḥ sva lakṣaṇa grāhiṇyā dhūma dhiyaḥ na udeti 
[230,i_230,ii]	dhūmasya ca tattvena grahaṇam eva pratibaddha tā tat tvañca pratyabhijñānāt pratyabhijñānañca tad rūpa darśanāt anumānam eva tad rūpa darśanañca pratyakṣam atyanta abhyāsāt vyavahāra kāraṇam iti na anavasthā tasmāt sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇam eva liṅga pratipattiḥ yaḥ t tu agni pratibaddha dhūmasya tad sāmānya grahaṇantad rūpa darśanāt udayam āsādayat anumānam eva liṅgi pratipatti rūpam iti na anyathā vyapadeśaḥ 
[230,iii_230,iv]	tasmāt vastuni boddhavye vyāpakam vyāpya cetasaḥ nimittantad svabhāvaḥ vā kāraṇantat ca tat dhiyaḥ dvividham hi sādhyam vastu tad pratiṣedhaḥ ca vastuni sādhye vyāpakam sādhyam yatas tad vyāpakam vyāpya cetasaḥ nimittam tat ca vyāpyasya liṅgasya svabhāvaḥ kāraṇam vā tat ca vyāpaka cetasaḥ nimittam iti parāmparyeṇa pratibandha sambhavāt pramāṇam anupalabdheḥ katham pratibandhaḥ iti darśayati 
[230,v_230,vi]	pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvatra sādhyate anupalambhataḥ siddhimpramāṇauḥ vadatām arthāt eva viparyayāt yatra nāma kvacid pratiṣedha sādhanan tatra sarvatra anupalambhataḥ eva yatra vastu sādhanāya pramāṇam pravarttate tatra vastu eva sidhyati na tasya pratiṣedhaḥ atas viparyayāt eva pratiṣedha siddhiḥ tathā hi yukta upalambham anupalabhamānā asti iti āhuḥ anupalambhaḥ eva hi pratiṣedhaḥ iti tanmātra anubandhi tvāt tā dāmyam eva pratibandhaḥ iti 
[230,vii_230,ix]	nanu virodhaḥ api nāma sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā pratibandhaḥ eva tatas api vastu pratiṣedha siddhiḥ upalabhyate yathā na asti śīta sparśaḥ agneḥ na asya romaharṣa ādi viśeṣaḥ sannihita dahana viśeṣa tvāt iti tat katham sādhyate anupalambhataḥ tatra parihāraḥ asti etat kintu dṛṣṭā viruddha dharma uktiḥ tasya tad kāraṇasya vā niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇa tva sūcanā 
[230,x]	viruddhaḥ api padārthaḥ tad abhāvaṅgamayati na virodha sambandhāt eva nahi virodhī pramātum iṣṭaḥ asat rūpa tayā iṣṭaḥ iti ced asattvena eva tarhi pratibandhaḥ sampradhāryom na ca tena saha virodhaḥ yatra asau tatra asat tvam bhavati iti ced kutas etat evam eva prāk dṛṣṭa tvāt iti ced tad asattvam virodha grahaṇa kāle kim upalambhe vastunaḥ cetarathā yadi upalambhaḥ katham abhāvaḥ atha anupalambhaḥ tat idam āyātam anupalambhāt eva pratiṣedhaḥ 
[230,xi_231,ii]	anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva uktyā parasya tat nāstitvaṅkena gamyeta virodhāt ced asau api siddhaḥ kena saha sthānāt iti ced tat kutas matam dṛśyasya darśana abhāvāt iti ced sā apramāṇa tā ekasya hi sadbhāve yadi paraḥ na bhavet sarvasya bhāve parasya pratiṣedhaḥ bhavet virodhaḥ api saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ vinā anupalabdhyā na pratīyate yadi evam virodhaḥ anupalabdhyā pratīyate tatas virodhinaḥ liṅgat abhāva gatiḥ na anupalabdheḥ atha virodha sādhikā nupalabdhiḥ prāk āsīt tad anusaraṇāt eva viroghinaḥ api liṅgada bhāva gatiḥ iti sā eva paramārthataḥ abhāvasya sādhanī yadi evam 
[231,iii_231,v]	pratibandha prasiddhi artham upayogī yaḥ īkṣitaḥ sādhya siddhiḥ tatas ced syāt anumānaṅkatham pramā pratyakṣeṇa hi sambandhaḥ anumānasya prasiddhi bhāj tatas eva hi sādhyasya siddhiḥ iti apramā anumā na yatas eva hi pratyakṣāt anumānasya sambandha grahaṇantataḥ eva sādhyasya agneḥ siddhiḥ iti katham anumānam aparampramāṇam 
[231,vi_231,vii]	atha parokṣe agnai na pratyakṣampravṛttam iti tatra anumānam parokṣe api khalvabhāve kim anupalabdhiḥ pravṛttā yā api pravṛttā sā na upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ atha smaryamāṇa upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ tat api asya durnītam smaryamāṇam yata udhyakṣam anumāne api na asti na adhyakṣasya eva tatra api prāmāṇyam anumā vṛtha 
[231,viii_231,xi]	tasmāt idam atra artha sat tattvam abhāvena hi śītasya bahneḥ prāk upalaṃbdhi bhāj sambandhaḥ tena tad siddhyā tad abhāvaḥ prasidhyati sa ca abhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ eva tena anupalabdhiḥ eva anumāna siddhā sādhayati abhāva vyavahāram yathā pratyakṣa siddhā yatas vakṣyati tasmāt anupalambhoyam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gataḥ iti 
[231,xii]	atra api anumānataḥ gataḥ iti avagantavyam yadā tu romaharṣa abhāvaḥ sādhyate tadā agninā śīta anupalabdhiḥ tayā kāraṇa anupalabdhyā roma harṣa abhāvaḥ tatra agniḥ upeṇa sparśasya uṣṇa ātmanaḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tayā anumānam sa ca śīta bhāva svabhāvaḥ tasya anumāna upalabdhiḥ eva śīta anupalabdhiḥ tena kārya hetu kāraṇa anupalabdhyoḥ ekatra pravṛtta tvāt na virodhi liṅgantaram tasmāt anupalabdhiḥ eva anumāna siddhā abhāvaṅgamayati tena anumita anumānam etat 
[231,xiii]	yadi evam anumānena pratyakṣamprasādhyate tena ca vastu bhāvaḥ iti na vastu viṣayamprāmāṇi ambhavet anumānasya tat api yat kiñcadeva yatas pratyakṣam upalambha rūpam eva upalambhaḥ sattā ca ucyate iti tena vastu viṣayam anumānam anupalambhaḥ eva asattā iti ced bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ agninā abhāvaḥ sādhyate na anupalambhena iti mahān doṣaḥ nanu agniḥ eva śīta abhāvaḥ iti saḥ eva tena eva ca sādhyate yāvān eva deśaḥ uṣṇa tayā vyāpyate tāvatī eva śīta abhāvaḥ iti na uṣṇa sparśa vyatirekī śīta abhāvaḥ svabhāva hetuḥ ayam iti ced iṣyate eva anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetu tā tena na asti atra sīta sparśaḥ agneḥ iti kārya svabhāva hetū nirddeśyete 
[231,xiv_232,i]	tasmāt sva śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā yasyāḥ pramāṇam sā avācyaḥ niṣedha rutena sarvathā virodhinaḥ hi vahnayādeḥ yaḥ sva śabdaḥ tena uktā api pratipāditā api sā eva anupalabdhiḥ anya bhāva lakṣaṇā sā eva anupalabdhiḥ abhāvasya sādhikā yasya sā na pramāṇantena virodhi sadbhāvena avācyaḥ niṣedhaḥ na khalu niṣedhasya anyā gatiḥ 
[232,ii_232,iv]	etena tad viruddha artha kārya uktiḥ upavarśiṇa tā prayogaḥ kevalam bhinnaḥ sarvatra arthaḥ na bhidyate pratiṣedhya śīta ādi viruddhasya agni ādeḥ arthasya yat kāryantatrā api anumita anumānena anupalabdhiḥ eva sādhitā abhāvaṅgamayati vyavahārataḥ tathā hi dhūmāt agniḥ kārya bhūtāt prasiddhaḥ śīta abhāvam sādhayet pūrva yuktyā 
[232,v_232,vii]	śīta abhāvaḥ hi anyathā na eva sidadhyeta pāramparyāt eva tatra api abhāvaḥ dhūmāt agniḥ agneḥ śīta abhāva rūpāt upalabdhi viparyayāt śīta abhāva vyavahāraḥ iti tasmāt prayoga vacana vinyāsa mātram eva vidyate viruddhantat ca sa upāyam avidhāya apidhāya ca pramāṇa uktiḥ niṣedhe yā na sā nyāya anusāriṇī ukti ādeḥ sarva vid prebhau ādi pratiṣedha vat atīndriyāṇām arthānām virodhasya aprasiddhitaḥ 
[232,ix]	na khalu vacanam sarva vedana viruddham na khalu atīta indriyeṇa saṃha virodha siddhiḥ samvedanāt eva vacanam pravarttate kathantada bhāvam sādhayet sarva vedanena viruddham iti ced kena virodha grahaṇam yadi hi vedanā utkarṣa anvaye apacayaḥ dṛśyate vaca śvitā svitā yāḥ sarvam śobheta sarva vedane sakala vacasvi tā abhāvaḥ eva na ca etat vaktāraḥ asarva vedinaḥ upalabdhāḥ iti ced vaktāraḥ mūrkhāḥ upalabdhāḥ iti kin na sarvasya mūrkha tā vaktuḥ pāṇḍityam upalabhyate iti ced tat api na upalapsyate iti kutas tathā hi 
[232,x_232,xi]	bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ kaḥ syātām yat yukti samvidau tādṛśaḥ anupalabdheḥ ced ucyatām sā eva sādhanam yathā hi mūrkhasya vacanantat abhāve api pāṇḍitya samaye viśeṣam vacanan tathā yadi sava vedanā avasthāyām api kaḥ virodhaḥ na hi sarvam vedana utkarṣa virodhi vacanam atyanta utkarṣe viroghya iva iti ced na virodhasya agrahaṇāt tādṛśasya vaktuḥ anupalambhaḥ eva iti na uttaram anupalambhasya draśya viṣaya tvena gamaka tvāt 
[232,xii_233,i]	aniścaya karam proktam īdṛkkva an upalambhanam tatra atyanta parokṣeṣu sat asat tā viniścayau atyanta parokṣasya hi sarva vid pretya bhāva ādeḥ anupalambha mātrāt abhāva niścayāt atha api syāt sarva vedane sati abhra antasya kutas vacana sambhavaḥ vivakṣā hi pūrva apara parāmarśataḥ bhrānta upajāyamānā pravarttayati vacāṃsi na etat api samyak spaṣṭam sarva padārthānām vedane api pravarttate vivakṣā abhyāsataḥ tatra vacasaḥ asambhavaḥ kutas 
[233,ii]	na khalu bhāvanā bala avalambi spaṣṭatara parimita itara padārtha darśana sama kāla abhyāsataḥ vivakṣā na bhavati vivakṣā abhāve api pūrva āvedhataḥ vacanam na hi vacanānām sannihitā eva vivakṣā kāraṇam pūrva āvedha tonya manasaḥ api pada vākya vivikta pāṭha darśanāt aneka pūrva abhyasta kriyā prakrama darśanāt ca anena pūrva apara paryālocanam antareṇa api sannihita pratipattṛ prativacan aṅkatham iti pratyuktam 
[233,iii_233,vi]	śatru sannidhi mātreṇa pravarttante avikalpataḥ prage ca tad nirākāri prakriyāḥ kāya nirmitāḥ yathā ca pūrva abhyāsataḥ jhaṭiti prabodhitasya ariṇā prahāra ādi dānena anurūpaḥ eva prakramaḥ śastra uddharaṇa ādikaḥ tathā sarva vedinaḥ api sakalāḥ kriyā iti aviruddham tasmāt viruddhāt eva abhāva niścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ bhinnā abhinnaḥ api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prasajyate yathā agniḥ ahime sādhye sattā vā janma bādhanī 
[233,vii_233,ix]	śīta uṣṇa sparśayoḥ parasparambhedāt saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ sattā janmanoḥ ca paraspara parihāra lakṣaṇaḥ iti abhedaḥ na khalu janma sattā vyatirekeṇa virodhaḥ ca na hi sat eva jāyate sataḥ hi sarva nirāsaṃśa śaṃsasya kaḥ janma arthaḥ katham avyatiriktayoḥ parasparam virodhaḥ pareṇa avyatirekeṇa abhyupagamāt evam ucyate nanu koyamvirodhaḥ nāma nivartti a nivarttaka bhāvaḥ tathā hi avikala kāraṇam ekam yat apara bhāve yadā bhavet na bhavet bhavati virodhassa tayoḥ śīta hutāśa ātmanoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ 
[233,xi]	nanu yadi anyasya abhāvaḥ anyena kriyate tat ayuktam abhāvasya kāryatva abhāvāt atha na kriyate tadā svayam eva vinaśyataḥ kaḥ pareṇa virodhaḥ na ca kṣaṇasya vināśaḥ anyena kriyate utpannān utpanna avasthayoḥ ayogāt anutpannam asat kasya virodhaḥ vināśaḥ vā utpannam sva kāle vināśayitum aśakyam kṣaṇasya avikārya tvāt anya kāle tu eva na asti kasya vināśaḥ santateḥ vināśaḥ iti ced na tad vyatirekeṇa santati abhāvāt 
[233,xii_233,xiv]	nanu santateḥ saḥ evam vināśaḥ yaḥ uttara kṣaṇa prabandha vighātaḥ tat api asat yadi kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ katham vyāghāta kṛt paraḥ atha kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ katham vyaghāta kṛt paraḥ yadi uttara kṣaṇa utpattau kāraṇam asti katham vyāghātaḥ atha na kāraṇandā eva raktāḥ kiṃśukāḥ atha kāraṇa vaikalyam eva virodhinā kriyate tat api asat yatas 
[233,xv_233,xviii]	asataḥ yadi vaikalyaṅ kiṃśuke daiva rakta tā sataḥ ca svena rūpeṇa vaikalyaṅ kim kariṣyati yadi tatra asti avaikalya kāraṇantadasat katham atha avaikalya kṛt na asti vikalaḥ svayam eva saḥ kāraṇasya api hi vaikalyam avaikalya kāraṇa sadbhāve na śakti abhāve tad kāraṇasya svayam eba bhavati vaikalī antatra kimvirodhī kariṣyati atra parihāraḥ śītāt śīta antara utpattiḥ anagni sahakāriṇaḥ sahakāriṇam āsādya tad aśītasya kāraṇam 
[234,i]	sannidedhīyamāna dahana sahakārī mandataratamādi śīta sparśa janakaḥ hi pūrvakaḥ śīta sparśaḥ yāvat śīta antaram śīta sparśasya ajana kambhavati tasya svayam eva nivṛtteḥ aparasya ca kāraṇa abhāvena anutpattiḥ iti sahakāri tvena viguṇa śīta kāraṇa jananena nivarttakaḥ vahniḥ śītasya iti vyapadiśyate tad kṛtā tasya vikala kāraṇa utpattiḥ iti tatas anutpattiḥ eva tasya prāgabhāva lakṣaṇā nivṛttiḥ iti vyapadiśyate utpattau hi kāraṇāni vyāpriyante na nivṛttau athavā śītasya sva hetu niyataḥ sa svabhāvaḥ yena agni sannidhāne śītakṣaṇa antaram sva kāryat na utpādayati pratiniyatāḥ hi bhāvānām śaktayaḥ ekatra sannidhānam viruddhayoḥ katham iti ced evam eva virodhaḥ anyathā ayogāt na ca kṣaṇayoḥ virodhaḥ api tu prabandhayoḥ dṛśyate ca evam uṣṇam anubhavataḥ api na adya api śītam apaiti iti samvedanam tathā na su aṣṭa andhakāram apaiti iti ati parisphuṭa āloka sambhave tasmin eva kṣaṇe apaiti iti ced na tatra api tad kāraṇa sahitasya andhakāra antara janana sāmarthyāt ālokaḥ eva utpattimān na andhakāraḥ saḥ eva naṣṭaḥ iti ced na tasya sva rūpeṇa utpanna tvāt 
[234,ii_234,iv]	yena svabhāvena utpattiḥ na te na eva vinaśyati yena api tasya anutpattiḥ tathā api na vinaśyati tasmāt na saḥ eva vinaṣṭaḥ nanu adarśanam eva vināśaḥ saḥ eva ca vināśa vasthāyāma pratīteḥ katham saḥ iti pratītiḥ yadā pratīyate na tadā vinaṣṭaḥ yadā api vinaṣṭaḥ tadā api na pratīyate tena eva asau vinaṣṭaḥ yena na praṃtīyate anyathā pratīyamāne kaḥ vināśa arthaḥ yadi na upalabhyamānaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ na pradeśaḥ ghaṭopalabdhiḥ iti saḥ api naṣṭaḥ bhavet prāk dṛṣṭaḥ na upalabhyate yaḥ sa vinaṣṭaḥ iti ced saḥ api prāk dṛṣṭaḥ eva yatra dṛṣṭaḥ tatra tadā eva na upalabhyamānaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ tadā eva upalabhyate tadā eva na upalabhyate iti vyāhatam kāla antare na upalabhyate anantaraḥ iti ced deśa antare anantare anupalabhyamānaḥ kathat na naṣṭaḥ 
[234,v_234,vii]	kāla antarena naṣṭaḥ ced naṣṭaḥ deśa antare na kim na ced deśa antara vyāptiḥ nanu kāla antarasya kim yadi deśa antara vyāpī na sambhavati eva kaścid tena saḥ eva na naṣṭaḥ kāla antara vyāpi api na eva sambhavapti katham saḥ api naṣṭaḥ nanu deśa antare anupalabhyamāne api deśa antaraḥ upalabhyamānaḥ katham vinaṣṭaḥ deśa antara vat eva tarhi kāla antare api upalabhyamānaḥ katham vinaṣṭaḥ kāla antare anupalabdhiḥ iti ced samānam etat ubhayatra api tasmāt 
[234,viii_234,ix]	yaḥ yathā dṛśyate bhāvaḥ sa tathā eva anyathā na hi nīlat nīlatayā dṛṣṭat na sitattvena vidyate tasmāt na saḥ eva vinaṣṭaḥ api tu paraḥ na utpannaḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt tad anupalabdhau sa naṣṭaḥ iti abhimāna mātrakam tena evambhūte viṣaye saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇa virodha vyavasthā paramārthataḥ kāraṇa bhāva viśeṣaḥ eva virodhaḥ paraspara parihāra sthita lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ evam eva yaḥ kṣaṇikañjanayati sa nitya svabhāvan janayitum asamarthaḥ tena nitya tvasya anutpattiḥ eva yathā ca anitya tvam api tad nitya tvena tathā nīlatva ādayaḥ api parasparam iti na anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
[235,i_235,ii]	na anayoḥ paramārthataḥ parasparam virodhayoḥ viśeṣaḥ tatas parasparam vilakṣaṇa tvam eva virodhaḥ kāraṇa vaśāt sa ca padārtha svarūpam eva anyathā svarūpa abhāvāt sā ca tayoḥ para sva rūpa vilakṣaṇa upalabdhiḥ anyā apekṣayā anupalabdhiḥ eva iti sarvaḥ anupalambhataḥ eva abhāva vyavahāraḥ iti prayogaḥ kevalam bhinnaḥ sarvatra arthaḥ na bhidyate
[235,iii_235,iv]	iti yuktam uktam atīndriyāṇāñca na ayam virodhaḥ iti na abhau asādhikā viruddha upalabdhiḥ na api anupa la bdhi mātram na upalabhyate iti etāvatā na asti iti na bhavati yasya hi darśanan jñeya sattām vyāpnoti saḥ evambruvāṇaḥ śobheta tadā api saḥ eva sarvajñaḥ iti apratikṣepaḥ sarva vidaḥ na api para loka ādeḥ sarva darśinā na upalabhyate iti atra pramāṇa abhāvāt viparyaye ca pramāṇam uktam tasmāt yathā vastu eva vastūnām sādhane sādhanam matam tathā vastu eva vastūnām sva nivṛttau nivarttakam 
[235,v]	yathā pratibandhataḥ vastu eva vastunaḥ sādhanam yathākathañcin na vastu vastunaḥ sādhakam apratibaddham eva tathā vastavā iva sva nivṛttau nivartakam vastunaḥ na hi pratibandham antareṇa vastu nivṛttau vastu aparat nivarttate yathā kāryaṅkaraṇam sādhayati vyāpakañca vyāpyantathā kāraṇa abhāvaḥ kāryasya abhāvam vyāpaka abhāvaḥ ca vyāpya abhāvasya iti anyathā saḥ eva pratibandhaḥ na syāt ayam api pratibandhasya bhāvaḥ yau anvaya vyatirekau na anyaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti 
[235,vi_235,vii]	etena kalpanā nyastaḥ yatra kvacana sambhavāt dharmaḥ pakṣa sapakṣa anyatara tva ādiḥ apa uditaḥ na hi pakṣāsa pakṣānyatara tvad nitya anityayoḥ ekatra api pratibaddham icchā kṛtaḥ hi pakṣaḥ tad anusāreṇa yaḥ sa pakṣaḥ saḥ api tathā eva tatas icchā mātra pratibaddha tvāt na vastu gamayati na hi anya pratibaddha tvamanyaṅga mayati atiprasaṅgat na api vyāparttate kutaścid yena tad abhāvaṅgamayet tasya api pakṣa tvam icchā kṛtam asti eva tasmāt sa pakṣa anyatara tvam agamakam tathā avipakṣa tva ādi kañca 
[235,viii_235,xi]	tasmāt pratibandhāt eva vidhi niṣedha prasiddhiḥ tatra api vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ nivṛtteḥ gamakaḥ mataḥ vyāpyasya sva nivṛttiḥ ced paricchinnā kathañcana nanu svabhāva anupalambhaḥ api gamakaḥ eva na etat asti na tatra paramārthataḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ eva asau yaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhaḥ tatas tena siddhena vyāpyasya abhāva sādhanam yat apramāṇa tā abhāve liṅgantasya eva kathyate tad atyanta vimūḍha artham āgopālam asamvṛteḥ 
[235,xii]	ayam eva abhāvaḥ svabhāva anupalambhaḥ nāma āgopāla aṅganā prasiddham etat sām khya stu śāstra dṛṣṭyā vyāmūḍhaḥ prabodhyate etāvat mātra nimitta koyam anyatra api abhāva vyavahāraḥ anyathā sukha ādīnām ātmanāñca na bheda siddhiḥ śāstrāt eva bheda siddhiḥ iti ced na prāmāṇika tvāt bhedasya śāstrasya api ca parasparat na bhedaḥ syāt paraspara vivikta upalabdhim antareṇa sā eva ca vivikta upalabdhiḥ anyasya anupalabdhiḥ vyakta avyaktayoḥ ca bhedaḥ na anupalabdhim antareṇa sidhyati 
[236,i_236,iv]	etāvat niścaya phalam abhāve anupalambhanam tat ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśya tayā mate trividhaḥ eva anupalambha hetoḥ vyāpakasya svabhāvasya ca iti tasya ca hetu ādeḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhaḥ gamakaḥ na anyasya na anyathā tasmāt kārya svabhāva anupalabdhi janitam liṅga jñānam sādhya pratipādakam avisamvādi tatas tena vastu eva tathā asiddham iti na avastu dharmaḥ nanu anitya upamvarṇṇaḥ iti sva lakṣaṇa yojanā anitya tvasya tat katham yojanāt varṇṇa sāmānyaḥ ityādi na etat asti anumānāt anitya ādeḥ grahaṇeyaṅgamaḥ mataḥ prāmārāyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta grahaṇāt matam 
[236,v]	sva sāmānya lakṣaṇābhyām hi avyapadeśya varṇa tvābhyām varṇṇa ādi gṛhītvā anitya tayā ca anityam varṇṇā ādi iti manasā saṃdhatte yat uktam ācāryeṇa tatra ayaṅkramaḥ varṇitaḥ yojanāt varṇa sāmānyaḥ ityādinā anumānena varṇṇa tva sāmānye anitya tā pratipattau pramāṇa antaram tad sāmāndharmi kena pratipannam anumānena pratipattau aparaḥ tatra api dharmī iti anavasthā syāt yadā ca aliṅga jñānam pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvi tadā pramāṇa antaram eva sva lakṣaṇena yojanāt ubhayatra api parihāraḥ prāmāṇyam eva tatra na asti ubhayatra api pratyakṣatas eva siddha tvāt vikalpasya sāmānya grāhiṇaḥ gṛhīta grahaṇa tvāt katham anitya tvam pratyakṣa siddham yatas 
[236,vi_236,vii]	na anyāsya anitya tā bhāvāt pūrve siddhaḥ sa ca aindriyāt na aneka rūpaḥ vācyaḥ asau vācyaḥ dharmaḥ vikalpa jaḥ na khalu anityatā varṇṇa tva ādi ca anya bhāva svarūpāt abhāva svarūpam eva tat tādṛśam tat eva vikalpasya tad rūpa grahaṇa aśakteḥ sāmānya rūpam bhavati grahaṇa vyāpāraḥ eva na tu sāmānyantat na hi nīlam etat iti pratyakṣa pratibhāsamāna rūpāt aparam idat nīlam iti vikalpe pratibhāti tat eva tu tathā vyavahniyate atha yathābhūtantad nīlan tathā bhūtam etat iti sāmānyam pūrvā apara pratyayā bhyāmāgṛhītam eva gṛhyate tat api ayuktam na hi pūrva apara rūpa vyatirekeṇa aparam sāmānyam upalabhyate tat eva tu tena vyavahriyamāṇam sāmānyam vyavahārasya ca tat eva sva lakṣaṇam āśrayaḥ 
[236,viii_236,ix]	nanu sāmānyānām anitya tva ādīnām parasparantadvataḥ ca bhedaḥ nānā tvam atra ucyate na aneka rūpaḥ vācya ūsau sva lakṣaṇa ātmā vikalpa mātrasya anādi va āsanā sāmarthyāt bhedaḥ vikalpasya hi vyāvṛtti bhedāt anvaya vi atireka kalpanayā bheda adhyāra upavṛtta tvāt sāmānya āśrayam asiddhau sāmānyam siddham eva tat tad asiddhau tathā asya eva hi anumānasya siddhaye 
[237,i_237,iii]	vyavahāra mātrakam hi sāmānya vyahāra viṣayasya ca prasiddhau vyavahāraḥ niyamena sāmānya adhika raṇyena anyathā vā prasidhyati vyavahāra aprasiddhau tu nimitta pradarśanena sa vyavahāraḥ vismṛta vyavahāra nimittasya nimitta tva smaraṇena smaraṇa viṣaya bhāvam upanīyate tasmāt anumānam vyavahāra mātrakam eva sādhayati na aparam nanu kārya hetoḥ anumānāt vastu eva asiddham agni ādikam sādhyate na vyavahāraḥ tat api asat tatra api hi anumānena yadi vastu prasādhyate sarva ākāra prasiddhau syāt na tatra eva pramā antaram 
[237,iv]	yadi anumānāt agni ādi vastu prasidhyati tadā tatra kīdṛśaḥ agneḥ ayam iti avāntara bheda ji ghṛkṣāyām pramāṇa antaram adhyakṣa ādikat na pravarttate tasya prathama anumānataḥ eva sarva ākāra prasiddheḥ prāk sambhavaḥ asambhavaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca iti kāraṇāt yogyāt kāryam utpattimat iti sambhavaḥ kāraṇa abhāve kārya anutpattiḥ iti asambhavaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ api śītaḥ agneḥ iti tatra adhyakṣeṇa sarvā akāra grahaṇam iti sambhavaḥ anumānena asambhavaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca iti pramāṇa antara pravṛtteḥ tat etat tamaḥ vijṛmbhitam yatas 
[237,v_237,vi]	asambhave virodhe ca vastunaḥ grahaṇaṅ kutas grahaṇe vastunaḥ prāptam dvayam etat ayuktimat yadi tad avyatirikta ākāra parityāgaḥ asambhavāt sarva ākāra grahaṇasya pramāṇa antara pravṛtta virodhāt ca tadā vastu grahaṇam api na asti eva katham hi tad grahaṇe tad avyatirikta aparigrahaḥ na khalu tat eva gṛhītam agṛhī tañca yuktimat tathā jñānam api tat grahi tad agrāhi ca iti eṣaḥ api asambhavasya 
[237,vii_237,xi]	atha api syāt sarva ākāra grahe hetuḥ na liṅgam vyabhicārataḥ sāmānya avyabhicāri tvāt viśeṣasya aprasiddhitaḥ liṅgam hi sakala vyakti sādhāraṇa tayā parigṛhītam anaikānti kamprati niyata vyaktau yadi evam a viśeṣa grahaṇat na asti liṅga sāmarthya sambhavi anaikāntika tā hetoḥ iti vastu grahaḥ katham 
[237,xii_237,xv]	na jñāyate kotra vahniḥ iti vahni mātram eva pratīyate kaḥ api atra vahniḥ iti pūrva aneka vahni darśana anusāreṇa pratītiḥ eva iyaṅ kevalāḥ na vastu saṃsparśaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vastu saṃsparśe kimbheda sandehaḥ sambhavī nanu sandehe kathamprāptiḥ prāptiḥ api sandeha anurūpā eva kadācid kasyacid agne prāpteḥ tena kārya hetau api vyavahāraḥ eva kevalan na vastu sādhanam nanu svabhāva hetau vastu dṛṣṭam iti prāpyate kārya hetau tu katham adṛṣṭasya prāptiḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti eva arthasya prāptiḥ astitvataḥ sadā tasya vastu nivṛttiḥ tu bhrānteḥ api tad arthinām 
[237,xvi]	na khalu keśa ādiṣu darśanam asti tathā api tarda artha tayā bhavati eva vṛttiḥ yatra asti tatra prāptiḥ anyatra na iti nirṇṇayaḥ na ca svabhāva hetau pratyakṣe kārya hetau ca vastu gṛhyate agṛhī tasya eva sarvatra prāpteḥ bhāvi hi vastu prāpyam na ca svarupaṅ kathantasya grahaṇam bhāvi rūpeṇa eva gṛhyate iti ced na tathā apratīteḥ atha api bhāvi rūpeṇa pratīyate tathā api tat anyathāpratītam anyathā utpattimat na syāt sāmānyasya pratītiḥ iti ced sāmānyasya pratītau viśeṣasya kathamprāptiḥ sthita tvāt ced na hi sāmānyam viśeṣa vastu antareṇa bhavati dhūma ādikam eva tarhi liṅgam vastu antareṇa na bhavati iti tatas eva astitvam iti kim sāmānyena āsāmānya pratītim antareṇa kathampravarttate liṅga pratītau eva pravarttiṣyate anye pratītau katham anyatra pravṛttiḥ sāmānyam api anyat eva iti samānaḥ doṣaḥ na ekāntena anyat sāmānyam yadi evam 
[238,i_238,ii]	sāmānya grahaṇe arthasya tat eva grahaṇam bhavet tathā sati na saṃdehaḥ gṛhīte sa katham bhavet sāmānya rūpeṇa grahaṇan na viśeṣa rūpeṇa iti ced viśeṣa rūpe kathampravarttate tat api gṛhītam eva iti ced kimartham pravarttate prapti artham iti ced nanu sā api prāptiḥ svarūpa pratipattiḥ eva sā api yadi jātā kimartham pravarttate kenacid rūpeṇa pratipattiḥ kenacid na iti ced yena rūpeṇa pratītiḥ tena na pravarttate vyartha tvāt yena ca na tena api na aśaktoḥ na ca pratipanne sandehaḥ na api apratipanne ubhaya rūpa saṃsparśa rūpa tvāt sandehasya sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ eka rūpa tvāt apratipanne api viśeṣe pravarttate iti ced na aviṣayīkṛte ayogāt na ca pratipannena apratipannasya ekatvam iti pratipāditam pratipanna eka tvam pratyeti na apratiyan atha api kāla antare pratyeti kāla antare na pratyakṣat na anu mānam iti pratipāditam 
[238,iii_238,v]	nanu yadi vastu anitya tvāt ekaṅgṛhītam eva sarva ātmanā kathantasya anumeya tvam vyavahriyamāṇa tayā ced kasmāt saḥ eva niścayaḥ na bhavati vyavahāra ātmā na idam uttaram yatas kvacid tad aparijñānam sadṛśa apara sambhavāt bhrānteḥ apaśyataḥ bhedam māyā golaka bheda vat na khalu māyā golake bhedasya na pratītiḥ tathā api sadṛśa tvāt tad antareṇa saḥ eva ayam iti pratīteḥ nna bheda vyavahāraḥ 
[238,vi_238,vii]	nanu yadi api saḥ eva ayam iti pratīciḥ bhrāntā darśanantu punar abhra antam eva kathat na bheda pratītiḥ atha tiraskṛtā satī pratītiḥ api apratītiḥ eva kāryataḥ na tiraskaraṇat nāma asti svarūpa samvedanayoḥ vedanayoḥ paraspara parihāreṇa avasthānāt dvayoḥ vā paraspara antiskaraṇam iti prāptam anyonya parihāreṇa vyavasthitā ced tiraskriyā anyonya parihārasya samāna tvan dvayoḥ api 
[238,ix_238,x]	yathā eva vikalpaḥ svarūpa samvedana ātmā anubhavataḥ bhinnaḥ iti anubhavasya tiraskāra kārī tathā anubhavaḥ api vikalpasya syāt atha ekatve samāsakta cetanasya bhede buddhiḥ eva na upajāyate tathā sati anubhavaḥ eva na asti iti kaḥ tasya tiraskāra arthaḥ atra ucyate bhinnantat pūrva kam vastu na paśyati vināśataḥ nitya tva adhyavasāyāt ca nityam eva iti manyate 
[238,xi_239,ii]	saḥ eva vyavahārayati lokam tatas saḥ eva tasya tiraskāraḥ yaḥ tad anurūpa vyavahāra abhāvaḥ paraspara bhedena anupalakṣaṇāt tatas māyā golakasya iva dvitīya ādi kṣaṇasya bhedena anupalakṣaṇa tvāt saḥ eva ayam iti vyavahāraḥ tathā hi aliṅgam ābālam asaṃśliṣṭa uttara udayam paśyan paricchinatti eva dīpa ādinnāśinañjanaḥ 
[239,iii_239,v]	nanu māyā golaka ādau bhedaḥ parigṛhyate eva nirūpaṇataḥ nirūpaṇaiḥ na tu evam kṣaṇika tā tat api asat tathā hi atādavasthyam vināśaḥ anitya tā iti ca vyapadiśyate na ca pradīpa ādīn a antādavasthyam api tu parāpara taila upādāna janyamānā parāparā eva pradīpa jvālā kevalantu sādṛśyāt samāna sāmagrītaḥ vā saḥ eva ayam iti vyavahāraḥ nanu ekadā eva taila janitaḥ ekaḥ eva asau pradīpa jvālā vitānaḥ na etat api samyak yatas yadi prathama sampāta mātrāt utpannaḥ eva saḥ kāla antara sthāyitayā vṛthā taila ādi atas param 
[239,vi]	na khalu prathama taila ādi sāmagrī sampāta mātrataḥ sakala kāla kalā kalāpa vyāpinī pradīpa ādau utpattimati tatas param sthāla bhū tala taila anala jāla samavadhānaṅ kathañcid artham puṣṇāti niṣpatteḥ apara adhīna svabhāva tvāt atha niṣpannasya api kāla antara vyāpitā taila ādi anuvarttamānasya eva na anyathā iti ced na kāla antara sthāyitayā eva utpatteḥ akāla antara sthāyinaḥ tu paścāt taila ādi sāmagryā na kiñcid karttum śakyam iti vyartha tā syāt anyasya utpādane sā eva anitya tā tathā ca yadi asau utpannaḥ sarva ātmanā gṛhyate cakṣuḥ ādinā sarva ātmanā tasya graham iti vyartha tā eva cakṣuḥ ādi anuvarttanasya atha apara apara darśanena kāla antara sthāyitā grahaṇena vā tathā sati parāpara darśanānām viccheda ādikena api na kāla antara sthāna grahaḥ grahaṇasya tu kāla antara sthāna vat tve sakṛt eva tathā grahaṇam iti tat eva cakṣuḥ anuvarttanam vṛthā iti prāptam tasmāt darśanasya na pūrva apara svarūpa grahaṇam īṣat api iti kṣaṇa mātrakam eva pratibhāsate 
[239,vii_239,ix]	atha api syāt saḥ eva pūrva aparahitaḥ vastu svabhāvaḥ āyataḥ bhaviṣyati tat asat kāla dairghya sakṛt dṛṣṭau syāt ced sarvaḥ tathā bhavet darśanasya anuvṛttyā eva kāla daiḥ ghyam pratīyate yathā yathā darśanam apara aparamprabandhena upajāyate tathā tathā dīrgha kāla ātām pratyeti na anyathā na ca sakṛt eva pratipannaṅ kālāḥ di dīrghatayā dīrgha tasmāt darśanaṅ kṣaṇika tām eva pratyeti yadi kṣaṇikatā eva pratyakṣeṇa paricchidyate svabhāva bhūtāḥ kathamparicchidyamāna tāyām api vyāmohaḥ atra idam ucyate 
[239,x_239,xiii]	bhāva svabhāva bhūtāyām api śaktau phale adṛśaḥ anānantaryatas mohaḥ viniścetuḥ apāṭavāt yathā khalu śaktiḥ paricchinnā api na niścīyate anantaraṅ kāryam adṛṣṭavatā tasya eva vinivṛtti artham anumāna upavara arṇanam vyavasyanti īkṣaṇāt eva sarva ākārān mahā dhiyaḥ darśane api sarva ākāra tayā bhāvasya vyāmohaḥ abhyāsavajitasya tatas na niścayaḥ tatas vyāmoha vyāvarttanāya anumānampravṛttimat yeṣāntu punar abhyāsa pāṭava ādayaḥ niścayasya hetavaḥ santi te mahām atitamatra śaktaḥ yaḥ adhyavasāya adarśana mātrakāt eva tasmāt sāmānyam āśraya siddhau sāmānyam siddham eva yatra na vyāmohaḥ yatra tu vyāmoha usti tatra anumānam
[240,i_240,ii]	kathantarhi vastunaḥ eka tvāt tad anusāribhiḥ vikalpaiḥ api nānā dharma tā vyavasthāpyate nahi nīla anubhava anusārī vikalpaḥ pīta adhyavasāya svabhāvaḥ atra uttaram vyāvṛtteḥ sarvatas tasmin vyāvṛtti vinibandhanāḥ buddhayorthe pravarttante abhinne bhinna āśrayāḥ iva yathā codanam ākhyāḥ ca saḥ asati bhrānti kāraṇe pratibhāḥ pratisandhatte sva anurūpāḥ svabhāvataḥ 
[240,iv]	sajātīyavījātīya vyāvṛtti bhājaḥ hi jagati janma bhūtaḥ te yatas yatas vyāvarttante tatas tatas bhedam avadhi bheda upakalpitam tantam upādānam ādāya nānā dharmāṇaḥ pratīyante yadi sarvatas vyāvṛttimantaḥ bhāvāḥ katham ekayā eva helayā sakala vyāvṛtya niścayaḥ bhrānti kāraṇa sadbhāvāt iti brūmaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya vismaraṇāt na hi pūrva dṛṣṭasya tathā eva viṣayīta kaṇe vyāvṛtti aniścayaḥ tathā hi 
[240,v_240,vi]	niścayaḥ hi anubhūtasya tathā eva smaraṇa udayaḥ viparyayonyathā dārḍhye ye sandehaḥ calane dvayoḥ na anubhūtasya tathā eva smaraṇa niścaya abhāvaḥ ayam eva niścayaḥ yat tathā eva smaraṇam abhyāsataḥ ca tathā eva smaraṇāt tasmāt abhyāsavatām īkṣaṇa antaram eva niścayaḥ anyathā smaraṇa nivāraṇāya anumānam iti sthitam etat aparaḥ prāha 
[240,vii_240,ix]	siddhaḥ atra api athavā dhvaṃsnaḥ liṅgadanupalambhanāt udaya vyayānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ hi sarva bhāvāḥ udayaḥ pratyakṣa vidhi sādhaka anumāna sādhyaḥ vyayaḥ ca abhāvaḥ saḥ anupalabdhi sādhyaḥ yāvān pratiṣedhaḥ sarvaḥ anapalabdhi sādhyaḥ iti na aparaḥ pratiṣedhasya sādhana upāyaḥ nanu nitya tā bhāva svabhāva bhūtā vidhiḥ sādhakena eva pramāṇena pratīyate na idam asti na svabhāva mātrakā t eva anitya tā api tu 
[240,x_240,xii]	prāk bhūtvā hi abhavan bhāvaḥ anityaḥ iti abhidhīyate bhūtvā yaḥ na bhavati saḥ a nityaḥ na bhavana mātrataḥ sa cā bhāvaḥ anyatra api anupalabdhi sādhakaḥ nanu asya vāditaḥ ubhaya anta vyavadhāyikā sat tā iva anitya tā nābhāva lakṣaṇā ubhaya anta tvañca pūrva apara antayoḥ sattā ca na anupalambha mādhyā tat katham etat atra āha 
[240,xiii_241,i]	yasya ubhayānta vyavadhi sattā sambandha vācinī anitya tā śrutiḥ tena tāvantau iti kau smṛtau na tāvat satta mātram anitya tā atma ādīnām api anitya tā prasaṅgāt rūpa vedanā ādīnāñcā viśeṣeṇa ubhaya bhūta anta madhyam adhyāsīnā sattā anitya tā vaktavyā na ca ubhaya antatā abhāvam antareṇa kācid asti abhāva saṅkame ca saḥ abhāva anupalabdhyā gṛhyate na anyena 
[241,ii_241,v]	prāk paścāt api abhāvaḥ ced saḥ eva anitya tā na kim yadi prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva ubhayāpta vyavadhāyikā sattā anitya tā saḥ eva abhāvaḥ anitya tā kinneṣyate ṣaṣṭha ādi ayogāt iti ced antayoḥ sa katham bhavet yadi ayam abhiprāyaḥ bhāvasya anitya tā iti ṣaṣṭhī ādi yogaḥ na bhavet yadi abhāvaḥ nityatā abhāvena sambandha abhāvāt na hi bhāvasya abhāvasya ca saṃyoga samavāya ādi lakṣaṇa sambandhaḥ ayogāt 
[241,vi_241,viii]	viśeṣaṇa viśeṣa tva sambandhaḥ kena vāryate na syāt saḥ api iti ced evam antayoḥ sa katham bhavet yadi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāve api samavāya ādi sambandham antareṇa na iṣyate sa tarhi ṣaṣṭhī ādi yogaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vāntayoḥ sat tayā bhāvena vā katham upapannaḥ anta vyavadhi bhūtā sattā tad viśiṣṭhā ca iti vacana vyaktau sattā sambandhayoḥ dhrauvyāt antābhyāt na viśeṣaṇām 
[241,ix]	ubhayānta vyavadhiḥ sattā sat sambandhaḥ vā samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ anitya tā iti vacane niyamena sattā sambandhayoḥ antābhyām viśeṣaṇam abhyapagatam na ca idam yuktam dvayoḥ api nitya tva abhyupagamāt anta viśiṣṭā hi sattā katham bhavet yadi sa utpāda vyayavatī atha sa tatra bhāve sattā sambandhaḥ vā na syāt tābhyām viśeṣaṇam evantarhi saḥ eva bhāvaḥ tad viśiṣṭaḥ anityaḥ kim sattayā avyatirekāt ṣaṣṭhī na bhavet iti ced sattāyāḥ astitva miti katham kiñca bhāvasyāḥ nitya tā iti bhāvasya prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvau tau eva anitya tā tatas vyatirekāt asti vyatireka vibhaktiḥ atha kārya kāraṇayoḥ ubhayānta tā kāraṇam iti ekaḥ antar kāryam iti dvitīyaḥ tābhyāñca kārya kāraṇābhyām sattāyāḥ sambandhasya vā viśeṣaṇam na uktaḥ bhāve ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ sambandhaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sattāyāḥ samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ atra prativacanam 
[241,x_241,xii]	aviśeṣaṇam evam syāt antau ced kārya kāraṇe asambandhāt na bhāvasya prāgabhāvam sa vā ācchati tad upādhi samākhyāne te api asya ca na sidhyataḥ yasya hi prāc abhāvaḥ sva kāraṇena sambadhyate na ca bhāvasya prāc abhāvena sambandhaḥ abhyupagamyate tad abhyupagame prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvau eva anitya tā iti prakṛta hāniḥ pakṣa antara samāśrayaṇam ca tasmāt asambandhaḥ eva prāc abhāvena bhāvasya prāc abhāva upādhiḥ ca ayam samākhyā viśeṣaḥ sa tad abhāve na syāt idaṅkāryam iti na ca kāryam antareṇa kāraṇam athavā na anyena prakāreṇa kārya kāraṇa tva abhāvaḥ yatas 
[242,i_242,ii]	sattā sva kāraṇa āśleṣa karaṇāt kāraṇaṅkīla sā sattā sa ca sambandhaḥ nityau kāryam atha iha kim sattā sambandha karaṇena hi kāraṇam sva kāraṇa sambandha karaṇena ca sva kāraṇam samavāyi kāraṇam samavāyi kāraṇa samavetam hi prāyaśas vastu utpattimat na ca sattā sambandhayoḥ kārya tā bhāvasya api sambandhaḥ eva sat tayā kāryaḥ na anyathā asya kārya tā sva rūpeṇa eva kārya tā ced na 
[242,iii_242,v]	yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvavān sambandha anabhyupagamāt nityam viśvamidantataḥ na hi bhāvasya kasyacid api prāc abhāvena sambandhaḥ yadi api nāma avastu tvāt asambandhaḥ tathā api pūvam asau avidyamānaḥ eva tatas kārya tā bhaviṣyati nanu yasya avidyamāna tayā sambandhaḥ saḥ avidyamānaḥ anyathā sarvam eva avidyamānam bhavet tatas ca asti prāc abhāvena sambandhaḥ iti prāptam na ca abhyupagamyate tatas sakalam eva nityan jagat prasaktam kathantarhi abhāvena sambandhaḥ 
[242,vi_242,viii]	tasmāt anarthāskandiyaḥ abhinna artha abhimateṣu api śabdeṣu vācya bhedinyaḥ vyatireka āspadam dhiyaḥ bhinnaḥ vā bhavati abhinnaḥ vā arthaḥ tatra buddhi parikalpitaḥ eva sarvatra sambandhaḥ vastu vastunaḥ yadi vyatiriktaṅkaḥ sambandhaḥ vyatirekaḥ eva iti ced yadi nāma vyatiriktantasya kaḥ sambandhaḥ vyatirekasya sarvatra samāna tvāt asambandhaḥ eva na syāt tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ iti ced bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kārya kāraṇa tā api vā bhāve anyasya ca viśliṣṭau śliṣṭau syātām kathannatau 
[242,x]	na khalva bhinnasya sambandhaḥ dviṣṭha tvāt tasya kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na syāt tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ tu kathat na syāt na tatra sambandhasya kalpita viṣaya tvāt kalpitau hi tatra sambandhinau bhinna tve tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ na asti iti siddham etat kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti ced kim idam kārya kāraṇa tvad nāma anvaya vyatireki tvam iti ced na tasya kalpita tvāt pratyakṣataḥ agrahaṇāt tasmāt sarvaḥ kalpanā nirmitaḥ eva āyat na parama arthaḥ tasmāt ayam vyatireka vibhaktiḥ yathā kathañcid kalpitam sambandham āśritya pravarttate na aparaḥ prakāraḥ iti prāgabhāva ādinā api bhāvasya samvṛtyā sambandhaḥ na paramāthana kasyacid kena api iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tasmāt yojanāt varṇṇa sāmānye na pramāṇa antara tvam prameya antara abhāvāt na ca punar punar abhijñāne aniṣṭhā āsakteḥ smṛta ādi vat punar abhijñānam hi smaryamāṇam eva 
[242,xi_243,i]	nanu indriya vyāpāra anuvidhānāt avisamvādāt ca pramāṇam eva katham apramāṇam prati abhijñānam na indriya vyāpārasya sannihita mātra viṣaya tvāt yadi sannihita mātra viṣaya tvaṅkatham saḥ eva ayam iti kṛtvā pravarttate na etat asti yasmāt na saḥ eva ayam iti eva prekṣāvān pravarttaṃte samīhita phala prāpti hetuḥ iti eva varttate yadi api saḥ eva asau tathā api na pravarttana viṣayaḥ artha kriyā sādhana viṣayāḥ hi prekṣavatām vṛttayaḥ na ca tena eva sārtha kriyā sādhanīyā sva kāraṇa adhīna śaktayaḥ hi bhāvāḥ tām anyām vā artha kriyā aṅkalpayanti na ekatva bhājana tvena na ca artha kriyā sambandhaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya eva smaraṇāt tad artha kriyā kāri tvena ca saḥ eva ayam iti pratyayasya viṣayaḥ na sva rūpeṇa pūrvam yadi dṛṣṭa tvena ca grahaṇe smaraṇam eva iha yojane tu anumā anantad artha kriyā yogya tvam atra api tad abheda upacārāt eka tva vyavahāraḥ avisamvādaḥ api na ekatva viṣayaḥ anaika tve api artha kriyā avāpteḥ agamyā āgamana ādikantu tad prasūti tvāt eva santati apekṣayā 
[243,ii_243,v]	tasmāt na pratyakṣam sāmānya viṣayam na api anumānasya viśeṣa viṣaya tā nanu viśeṣa dṛṣṭam anumānam viśeṣam eva pratyabhijānāti tat api asat viśeṣa pratyabhijñānan na pratikṣaṇa bhedataḥ na ca viśeṣa viṣayan dṛṣṭa sāmyena tad grahāt yadā khalu dṛṣṭaḥ vahniḥ punar apasṛtya vyavadhāne sati dhūmāt avasīyate tadā kāla antare saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ na pratyabhijñāyate apara aparasya bhedasya sambhavāt bhede ca sati eka tva adhyāsena pratipattiḥ sāmānyam eva viṣayīkaroti yatra tarhi sthire padārtha ātmani na bheda sambhavaḥ vikāra abhāvāt tatra tasya eva viśeṣasya pratyabhijñānam tat etata katham avagantavyam na hi adṛśyamāne vikāraḥ na sambhavati iti niścayaḥ atha anyatra api evam eva dṛṣṭaḥ tathā sati dṛṣṭa sāmyena vyaktayantareṇa pratipattiḥ nna viśeṣa viṣaya tvam 
[243,vi_243,vii]	nidarśanantat eva iti sāmānya agrahaṇam yadi nidarśana tvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kim punar yadi tat eva nidarśaṃnam pūrva pratyakṣeṇa siddha tvāt tathā sati pūrvakeṇa eva pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt kimpunar pramāṇena na anumānena atra kāryam yadi pūrvakam eva pratyakṣam viśeṣa dṛṣṭa anumāna kāla bhāvi sattā upagrāhitena eva siddha tvāt kim anumānena pratyakṣa aviṣaye hi pravarttanam anumānasya iṣyate na tatra eva atas eva viśeṣa dṛṣṭam iti ced bhavatu viśeṣa dṛṣṭam tasya pramāṇantu na syāt atha darśanena samāna kāla bhāvyā iva padārthaḥ parigṛhyate na itaraḥ tatas bhāvini pravarttamānam anumānampramāṇam eva yadi evam anyat nidarśanam yat rūpam pūrvam pratītam anyadā dārṣṭa antikam yat uttara kālam anumānena pratīyate atha gṛhītam eva tat kintu vismṛtam tatas yam a doṣaḥ iti āha 
[243,viii_243,ix]	vismṛta tvāt adoṣaḥ ced tataḥ eva anidarśanam vismṛtasya tasya punar liṅga dvāreṇa tathā eva smaraṇam iti na vyartha tā anumānasya kathantarhi vismṛtasya dṛṣṭānta tā dṛṣṭānta dvāreṇa hi sādhanam pravarttate tasya ced vismaraṇam katham sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ yadi liṅgāt prāk asya vikalasya dṛṣṭānta tayā smaraṇantadā kim aparam atra liṅgena karttavyam tat eva punassmarī aṃte iti ced anavasthā bhavet atha vismṛtam tadā na dṛṣṭānta tā atha dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa eva akasmāt dhūmāt agni pratipattau itarasya vismṛtasya liṅgāt pratipattiḥ tadā tasya avikala kāla kalā vyāpinaḥ pūrva pratyakṣeṇa eva grahaṇāt viśeṣam apratiyataḥ kathampramāṇa tā 
[244,i_244,ii]	smaraṇe sati tatra vyavahārāt iti ced tathā hi svabhāva hetoḥ gṛhītasya api sarva ātmanā tathā eva vyavahāre sati pramāṇa tā na tatra apara dṛṣṭānta sādharmyeṇa eva vyavahāra yogya tā sādhanāt na tu iha tathā prāk eva abhāvāt abhyāsān utthānāt dṛṣṭam etat iti api na saṅgatam anyathā bhāva sambhavāt na khalu gṛhītaḥ eva smaraṇam etat iti siddham agṛhīta tvasya bhāvāt pramāṇam sva kāla paryavasāyi hi rūpam pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate anyathā maraṇa avadhi gṛhyeta iti tadā eva maraṇam bhavet anuvarttamānena maraṇa avadhi gṛhyate iti ced 
[244,iii_244,vi]	dīrgheṇa dīrgha grahaṇam adīrgheṇa itara grahaḥ pratyakṣeṇa tadā eva asya maraṇa avadhi na grahaḥ yat tarhi na anuvarttate na tena kāla antara vyāpi parigrahaḥ tatas kathaṅgṛhītaḥ eva anumānam pravarttate viśeṣa dṛṣṭam kathantad eva nidarśanam iti asāmānya grahaṇam atha dṛṣṭe kāla antara sambandhena kāla antare yat anyat utpadyate tasya tad bhāva siddhiḥ iti viśeṣa dṛṣṭam eva etat atra ucyate dṛṣṭe sadbhāva siddhiḥ ced pramāṇāt anya vastuni tattva ārope viparyāsaḥ tad siddheḥ apramāṇa tā 
[244,vii]	atha dṛṣṭam anyat api punar kāla antare tat eva idam iti sādhyate iti abhyupagamaḥ sa tarhi tat anyatra tatu āropaḥ niyogataḥ eva viparyāsaḥ na hi dṛṣṭe anyatayā tattvantatvataḥ sambhavati aparidṛśyamāne ca paridṛṣṭa rūpa adhyāropaḥ eva śakyaḥ na tattva grahaḥ tasya pūrva dṛṣṭasya pūrva pratyaye na ananya rūpa saṃsṛṣṭasya eva grahaṇāt yadi api na gṛhyate tathā api anumānena tattvena eva gṛhyate na anya tvena iti ced na anumānasya pūrva grahaṇa anusāri tvāt na smaraṇa mātrāt anyat anumānam atha vastu grahaṇa rūpam anumānam tadā 
[244,viii_244,ix]	pratyakṣa itarayoḥ aikyāt eka siddhiḥ dvayoḥ api yadi pratyakṣam itarat ca rūpam ekam eva tadā ekena eva pramāṇena pratyakṣeṇa itareṇa vā siddha tvāt itara da pramāṇam bhavet viśeṣasya kasyacid itareṇa akaraṇāt tadā spaṣṭa ākārā pratītiḥ ubhayatra api bhavet itarā vā atha cakṣuḥ ādi avyāpārāt aspaṣṭa tā tad pratibaddha tvāt spaṣṭa tāyāḥ na etat asti 
[244,x_244,xiii]	cakṣuḥ ādi nibaddhā iyam yadi spaṣṭa avabhāsitā aprayojakaḥ eva syāt ālokaḥ rūpa nigrahe atha āloka kṛtā spaṣṭa tā tadā satya āloke katham anumānam aspaṣṭa avabhāsi kādācitka tvāt ālokasya iti ced sa tarhi paramārthataḥ vidyamānaḥ api ālokaḥ na avadhāryate tat katham vastu grahaṇam āloka rahitasya vastu mātrasya grahaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti ced āloka sahitasya tat rahita grahaṇam iti sāhasam tathā ced tat eva sāmānya grahaṇam iti na viśeṣa dṛṣṭam etat sandhīyamānañca anyena vyavasāyam smṛtim viduḥ tad cihna apekṣaṇāt no ced smṛtiḥ na vyabhicārataḥ api ca pūrva dṛṣṭau usandhāna mātram etat na spaṣṭa svarūpa tayā parigrahaḥ tadā smṛtiḥ eva na hi eka rūpa tāyām pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ kiñcid adhikampramīyate iti smṛtiḥ eve yat na vastu grahaṇam 
[245,i]	atha liṅgāt utpadyate tat katham smaraṇam na etat asti na hi liṅgatā asya vidyate tvad matyā trairūpya abhāvāt eka tvāt dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antikayoḥ asmat pakṣe tu anumānam eva etat sāmānya viṣayam iti pratipāditam yat eva hi pūrva tayā avagamyate tat eva smaryamāṇam na grāhyam gṛhyamāṇa tayā apratīteḥ na hi anumāna smaraṇāt anyat smaraṇam eva liṅgāt utpadyamānam anumānam tasmāt asakṛt tat eva yena pratīyate tat smaraṇam eva kathantarhi idānīm asti iti pratītiḥ idānīntanam astitvam pakṣa dharma sāmarthyāt eva gamyate tad pradeśa varttī dhūmaḥ tad pradeśa varttinā eva vahninā janyate iti evam eva pūrva sambandha grahaṇāt anādi vāsanā prabodhataḥ evañca sati sakalam anumānam smaraṇam eva iti sthitam etat prameya dvaividhyāt pramāṇa dvaividhyam pratyakṣa anumāna bhedāt iti sākṣāt itara pratīti bheda vyatirekeṇa prakāra antara abhāvāt iti 
[245,ii_245,v]	tatra pratyakṣaṅ kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam viśeṣaṇa ādi sambandha vastu pratibhāsā pratītiḥ kaḥ lpa nā anyathā pratibhāsaḥ bhrānta tvam tena ubhayena rahitam pratyakṣam nanu bhrānta tvampunar pratyakṣeṇa anyathā darśanāt avagamyate kalpanā apoḍha tā tu kutas na hi pratyakṣa pūrvakam anumānanta d abhāve avataraṇam āsādayati sakalaḥ ca pratyayaḥ śabda anure dhāt eva upajāyate tatas pratyakṣam sa vikalpa kaṅ katham ātmanaḥ avikalpatām avagacchet yasya api ālocana ajñānam vikalpa rahitam prathamam upajāyate tasya api smaraṇa ādi sāmagrī samavadhānāt sa vikalpaka pratyaya udayaḥ sa ca akṣa vya apārataḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva tasya api katham avikalpaka tva siddhiḥ atra prativacanam 
[245,vi_245,vii]	pratyakṣaṅkalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣeṇa eva sidhyati pratyātma vedyaḥ sarveṣām vikalpaḥ nāma saṃśrayaḥ vikalpa rahitam pratyakṣam sva samvedanāt eva pratīyate vikalpaḥ hi nāma janayati nāma api vikalpam sa nāma saṃśrayaḥ vikalpaḥ pratyātma vedyatayā anubhūyate sva samvedanena vikalpasya anubhavāt cakṣuḥ ādinā dṛśyasya tatas viruddha dharma adhyāsataḥ bhedaḥ eva vikalpa ketara pratyayayoḥ atha api sarvaṃdā tad bhāva ādikaḥ eva ayam pratyastat api na asti yatas 
[245,viii_245,ix]	saṃhṛtya sarvatas cintām stimitena antarātmanā sthitaḥ api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sākṣa jā matiḥ yadi akṣam vikalpa sāmagrī virahi na pravarttate eva tad abhāve saṃhṛta vikalpa avasthāyām anya vikalpa sammukhībhāve vā cakṣuṣaḥ vyāpāraḥ na syāt padārtha grāhī tatas tasyām avasthāyām asaṅgatavikalpaḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyakṣatas eva gamyate 
[246,i_246,ii]	nanu yadi saṅgataḥ vikalpaḥ na asmin iti tadā eva pratyayaḥ katham vikalpa virahiṇī sā avasthā atha na vikalpaḥ ādhāra ādheya abhāvaḥ eva tad ānīnta dā nirvikalpakam etat iti kathampratītiḥ na hi vikalpam antareṇa vyavahāraḥ na ca parama vyavahārayatā paraḥ pratipāditaḥ bhavati anyathā kṣaṇika tve api kim svabhāva hetunā vyavahāra kāriṇā atra ucyate punar vikalpayan kiñcid āsīt vaḥ kalpanā īdṛśī iti vetti na pūrva ukta avasthāyām indriyāt gatau 
[246,iii]	na khalu tat iva tasya vikalpaḥ upajāyate nirvikalpakam etat iti anyathā vikalpa pratyakṣa vādinaḥ api yāvat sa vikalpakam etat iti na jāyate niścayaḥ tāvat kutas sa vikalpaka tva vyavahāraḥ tatas sa vikalpaka tva vyavahāre api sa vikalpaḥ punar eṣitavyaḥ tatra api aparaḥ iti anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ atha svayam eva asau sa vikalpakaḥ iti kintatra apareṇa avikalpakasya api pratīti rūpa tvāt kim vikalpena iti samānam ubhayasya api 
[246,iv]	atha vikalpake paścāt vyavahāraḥ sa vikalpa koyam iti atra api paścāt nirūpayataḥ evamvidha vikalpa paramparā āsīt iti vyavahāraḥ na saṃhṛta vikalpa avasthāyām tatra nirvikalpaka tvam mama āsīt iti avyavahārat atha tadānīm avidyamānasya katham vikalpena vyavahāraḥ mṛte katham mṛtaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ anyathā sa vikalpakasya api katham sa vikalpaka tva vyavahāraḥ punar tad jātīyasya darśanāt iti ced iha api saṃhṛta vikalpa avasthāyāmpunar punar darśanam anivāritam eva tena lakṣaṇa bhedāt anyonya vyatirekeṇa ca bhāva anna eka tvam sa vikalpa ketarayoḥ 
[246,v_246,vii]	atha sāmagrī sadbhāvāt vikalpa ārambhāt sa vikalpakaḥ anyaḥ eva utpadyate tad abhāvāt avikalpakaḥ iti tad asaṅgatam sāmagrī yadi kalpitāḥ bhinna tvad nīla pītayoḥ samudāyaḥ anyaḥ eva ayam utpannaḥ iti kalpanāt sa hi tatra anyaḥ eva nīla pīta ādi samudāyaḥ utpannova antara sāmagrī sambhavāt atha pratyabhijñānāt tat eva idat nīlam na punar aparaḥ samudāyaḥ iti pratīteḥ nānātvantayoḥ sarva kalpita rūpayoḥ api samānambheda kalpanam tasmāt avikalpakam eva pratyakṣam 
[246,viii_246,ix]	na ca asau sāmagri indriya vijñānasya sa vikalpaka tve smaraṇa ādikā indriyasya artha grahaṇa pravṛtta tvāt na ca indriya grāhyorthaḥ śabdena yojyate śabdasya tad vācaka tā abhāvāt sva lakṣaṇe saṅketasya apravṛtteḥ sāmānyasya indriya agrāhya tvāt kasmāt etat iti ced āha ekatra dṛṣṭaḥ bhedaḥ hi kvacid na anyatra dṛśyate na tasmāt bhinnam asti anyat sāmāni ambuddhi abhedanaḥ 
[246,x_246,xi]	deśa kālān anvayī hi bhedaḥ yatas ekatra dṛṣṭaḥ punar anyatra dṛśyate tena anyena vā pratyakṣeṇa tasya kāla antara vartini abhāvāt sva kāla paricchinnaḥ hi bhāvaḥ pratyakṣataḥ avagamyate tatas na pūrvamparatra na parampūrvatra pratyakṣam pratyabhijñāya pūrvam saḥ eva ayam iti gṛhlāti iti ced na pratyabhijñāyai apratyakṣa tvāt tatra indriya vyāpāra abhāvāt tathā hi yogya deśa sthite akṣāṇām vṛttiḥ na atīta bhāvini tadā aśri tañca vijñānan na kāla antara bhāvini 
[247,i]	nahi kāla deśa vyāptiḥ akṣa vijñānena gṛhyate tathā sati sarvaḥ sarva ākāra darśī bhavet atha akṣāṇi yadi na atīta bhāvini varttante tad āśritasya vijñānasya kaḥ virodhaḥ yadi tad āśritasya vijñānasya atīta ādau vṛttiḥ cakṣuṣaḥ api syāt na hi cakṣuṣā unyāvṛttiḥ na ca pūrva apara grahaṇe cakṣuḥ vyāpāraḥ pratīyate pūrva aparayoḥ smaraṇasya sambhava anumānasya ca vṛtteḥ indriya vṛttiḥ eva sā iti ced anumānasya api pratyakṣata aprasaṅgaḥ iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ atas bhedānāt na anvayi tvam sāmānyam indriya grāhyam anvayi iti ced tat asat yatas 
[247,ii_247,iii]	na tasmāt bhinnam asti anyat sāmāni ambuddhi abhedataḥ na vyaktīnām anvayaḥ na api sāmānyasya abhāvāt eva vyaktīnāmbhāvaḥ na tāsām anvayaḥ sāmānyasya anvayaḥ na ca tat dṛśyate tasya abhāvāt na indriya grāhye anvaya sambhavaḥ na hi sāmānyam atra pratibhāti ākāra antara apratibhāsanāt avyatireke vyaktayaḥ eva tāḥ ca na anvayinyaḥ atas eva bhinna abhinnam avācyañca na sāmānyam 
[247,iv_247,vi]	tasmāt viśeṣa viṣayā sarvā eva indriya jā matiḥ na viśeṣeṣu śabdānām pravṛtteḥ asti sambhavaḥ ananvayāt viśeṣāṇām saṅketasya apravṛttitaḥ na hi anvayini pratibhāsamāne sāmānya rūpa tā na ca viśeṣe śabdānām vṛttiḥ ananvayena saṅketasya āvṛtteḥ saṅketaḥ hi deśa kāla antare vyavahāra vṛtti artham vyavahāribhiḥ iṣyate atas nyathā vyasanam eva bhavet dharma arthaḥ iti ced kaḥ evam pratyeṣyati tasmāt na deśa kāla pratiniyate saṅketa vṛttiḥ tena na viśeṣaḥ śabda viṣayaḥ 
[247,vii_247,ix]	viṣayaḥ yaḥ ca śabdānām saṃyojyeta saḥ eva taiḥ tatas saṃyojya grahaṇat nirviśeṣasya tatas na viśeṣa grāhī pratyayaḥ sa vikalpakaḥ yaḥ ca sa vikalpakaḥ na sa viśeṣa grāhī sāmānyasya śabdena yojanāt kasmāt iti āha asya idam iti sambandhe yau arthau pratibhāsinau tayoḥ eva hi sambandhaḥ na tadā indriya gocaraḥ 
[247,x]	dṛṣṭe api arthe asya ayam vācakaḥ asya ayam vācyaḥ iti yayoḥ pratibhāsaḥ sambandha kāriṇi vijñāne tayoḥ eva vācya vācaka lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ na ca tadā indriya gocaraḥ kutas asya idam vācyam iti korthaḥ asmāt idam pratyetavyam kena pratyayena kim sa vikalpakena parokṣa vastunā atha pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkāriṇā yadi sākṣātkāriṇā adhyakṣeṇa pratyetavyam vaiphalyam eva indriya saṃhateḥ prāptam atha parokṣa tayā tadā indriya gocarasya arthasya na sambandhaḥ na hi tadā indriya gocara urtha usti iti atha vācya gate api arthe śabde ca asya idam vācakam iti sambandha karaṇāt tathā hi 
[247,xi_247,xii]	viśada pratibhāsasya tadā arthasya avibhāvanāt vijñāna ābhāsa bhedaḥ hi padārthānām viśeṣakaḥ indriya gocaraḥ hi arthaḥ viśada pratibhāsaḥ viprakṛṣṭe ca arthe aspaṣṭa pratibhāsitā na ca pratibhāsa bhede api ekatā atha dūra āsanna tayā spaṣṭatara pratibhāsa bhedasya eka viṣaya tā eva jñānānāṅ katham pratibhāsa bhedena bhedaḥ artha kriyā bhedena bhedāt 
[248,i_248,iii]	nanu artha kriyā bhede api pratibhāsa bhedaḥ eva na vyatirikta kārya bhedaḥ bheda lakṣaṇaḥ na hi kārya bhedena kāraṇasya bhedaḥ pratibhāsa bheda vinā kṛtasya pratibhāsa bhedaḥ api asti eva iti ced tatas eva tarhi bhedoḥ tu kim kārya bhedena yadi ca kārya bhedāt bhedaḥ kāraṇasya kāryasya kutas bhedaḥ kārya bheda antarāt ced anavasthā pratibhāsa bhedāt ced kāraṇesya api tatas eva bhedoḥ tu kiṅkārya bhedena atha kriyā bhedena api bhede saḥ eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhedakaḥ spaṣṭa pratibhāsasya eva artha kriyā karaṇāt tasmāt na dūra deśa vyavasthitasya aspaṣṭa pratibhāsaḥ vastu viṣayaḥ avisamvādāt eka viṣaya tā iti ced anumānasya api sa usti eva tatra api pratibhāsa bhedāt eva bhedaḥ tasmāt pratibhāsa bhedāt eva bhedaḥ yadā tarhi samunmīlita locanaḥ tathābhūtāya saṅketaṅ karoti tadā bhaviṣyati vastu viṣaya tā śabdasya tatra nirṇṇayaḥ cakṣuṣortha avabhāse api yam parosya iti śaṃsati saḥ eva yojyate śabdaiḥ na khalu indriya gocaraḥ 
[248,iv]	yadi api nāma cakṣuṣaḥ kṣotrayoḥ śabda ghaṭa ādyoḥ pratibhāsaḥ tathā api svarūpeṇa pratibhāsa mātreṇa na sambandhaḥ tasya idam vācakam iti yam vyatireka vibhaktyā śaṃsati saḥ eva tyājyate na ca pratyakṣe vibhakti arthaḥ pratibhāti pratipadikā artha mātrasya pratibhāsanāt vibhakti arthaḥ tu vikalpa pratibhāsa viṣayaḥ eva tathā hi asya iti sambandhaḥ upakārya upakāraka bhāvam antareṇa na bhavati tatas kadācid buddhi viṣayāt śabdaḥ arthāt kadācid śabdāt arthaḥ buddhi sthaḥ bhavet iti buddhi rūpa vijñaptyoḥ kārya kāraṇa lakṣaṇam sambandham āśritya vibhaktiḥ bhavati na ca pratyakṣa pratibhāsanam eva sambandha karaṇe nimittam tad antareṇa api bhāvāt yadi ca sva lakṣaṇe cakṣuḥ ādi janita pratibhāsini saṅketaḥ tadā tat eva pratibhāseta na ca evam 
[248,v_248,viii]	avyāpṛta indriyasya anvavāc mātreṇa avicāraṇāt atha api syāt yadi nāma na sva lakṣaṇe saṅketaḥ tathā api tat eva vācyam iti kaḥ virodhaḥ na ca anudita sambandhaḥ svayam jñāna prasaṅgataḥ athavā sva lakṣaṇe yadi saṅketaḥ katham sāmānya pratītiḥ evam eva iti ced tatra āha na ca ityādi tasmāt indriya jñānam avācyam eva asambandham pratyeti iti avikalpakam kathantarhi soyaṅgaurahirahiḥ iti vikalpa pratyayaḥ spaṣṭa avabhāsī pratīyate na ca vikalpaḥ pṛthak eva atra iti śakyaṅ grāhakasya parasya anupalakṣaṇāt na ca vikalpasya parokṣam atra grāhyam spaṣṭa itara pratibhāsa dvaya prasaṅgāt atha pūrvam api tad pratibhāsitam avikalpayataḥ na ca vikalpa kāle grāhyatā viśeṣaḥ grāhye ca viśeṣam anāracayan kathaṅ grāhakaḥ tat api asat 
[248,ix_248,xi]	niścitā niścita tvena viśeṣasya upalabdhitaḥ katham viśeṣaḥ na asti atra na dṛṣṭenupapanna tā na hi pratīyamānam eva pratiṣedha viṣayaḥ vikalpikā pratītiḥ asatyeti ced tat asat asattva tvac kutassiddham vikalpa tvāt pramātra kā nirvikalpaka bodhe api tat asattya tvam ucyatām 
[249,i_249,iii]	na hi sa vikalpakam iti eva asattyam avikalpaka tve api asattya tva prasaṅgāt avikalpaka tvāt na iti ced sa vikalpaka tve api samānam etat iti na viśeṣaḥ kiñca sākṣātkaraṇaṅkatham asati eva avikalpake hi niścaya abhāvāt asattyatvambhavet api niścita rūpa sākṣāt karaṇe tu katham asattya tva āśaṅkā atha anumānikaḥ ayat niścayaḥ tad asattyam aparokṣa viṣaya tvena anumāna tva asambhavāt viṣaya bhedāt eva pramāṇa bhedasya sādhanāt pramāṇa samplava abhāvasya ca pratipādanāt tat etat sakalam asat yatas manasaḥ yugapad vṛtteḥ sa vikalpa vikalpayoḥ vimūḍhaḥ laghu vṛtteḥ vā tayoḥ aikyam vyavasyati 
[249,iv^1]	asya ayam arthaḥ yadi khalu avikalpaḥ gauḥ iti gakāra ādi varṇṇa adhyavasāyī sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa pravaṇaḥ bhavet sa vikalpakaḥ ekaḥ eva ayam pratyakṣa pratyayaḥ iti yuktam bhavet yāvatā varṇṇa ākāra avagrahaḥ hi pūrva darśana bala āyātavāsanā bīja su bodhāt aspaṣṭa varṇṇa avabhāsī pratyayaḥ tatonyaḥ eva spaṣṭa puraḥ vartti stambha avabhāsī tu pratyakṣaḥ tatra vikalpā sambhavāt saḥ eva pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ kathantarhi ekatā adhyavasāyaḥ na asti eva na tāvat ayaṅgauḥ iti pratyayaḥ śāvaleya gakāra ādi varṇṇānām ekatām adhyavasyati pratibhāsa bhedena bhedasya eva gateḥ gakāra ādi varṇṇa vikalpānām api krameṇa udayam āsādayatām ekatva abhāvaḥ na ca varṇṇa avabhāsaḥ eva pratyayaḥ śāvaleya avalambanaḥ tad abhāve api śāvaleya pratibhāsanāt tasya api varṇṇa avabhāsasya cakṣuḥ nimīlane
[249,iv^2]	api pratibhāsāt tad abhāve api pratibhāsanam aniścaya ātmakam tatas niścayaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced koyat niścayaḥ nāma rūpasya sphuṭasya pratibhāsanam iti ced na prāk eva pratibhāsanāt pūrva tvena pratibhāsane tad ākāra antaram eva aspaṣṭam tad katham ākāra antara pratibhāse anyat niścitat nāma tad eka tā niścayāt niścayaḥ iti ced kathambhedena pratibhā samānayoḥ ekatvena niścayaḥ sattyaḥ kathantarhi eka tva vyavahāraḥ pravarttanasya ekasya kāryasya bhāvādeva kārya tayā tad eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ kathantarhi krameṇa grahaṇan na bhavati yugapad viṣaya sannidhānāt eva na hi varṇṇa vikalpa kāle pratyakṣa arthaḥ na sannihitaḥ yathā ca bhavataḥ laghu vṛtteḥ viṣaya sannidhānena krameṇa grahaṇa adhyavasāyaḥ tathā grahaṇam api mama iti aviśeṣaḥ 
[249,v_249,vi]	nanu yadi vikalpaḥ anyatra eva kathantasya viṣayaḥ spaṣṭa tayā na pratibhāti vācya rūpaḥ na asti eva tasya viṣayaḥ aparaḥ iti ced yadi tarhi nirviṣayaḥ tatra arthe api asiddha tvāt yat tena vyavadhāne darśana chedaḥ syāt na vyavadhāna abhāvāt na hi samāna kāle na vyavadhāna sambhavaḥ kiñca vikalpa vyavadhānena vicchinnan darśanam bhavet iti ced bhinna jātīya vikalpe anyasya vā katham 
[249,vii_250,ii]	yasya hi sa vikalpakam eva adhyakṣantasya na vicchedaḥ na hi tena eva tasya vyavadhānam nirvikalpaka vādināstu vikalpaḥ anyaḥ eva tatas vyavadhānam iti ced bhinna jātīya vikalpa sambhave padārtha antara darśanaṅ kathat na vidyate na hi asau bhinna jātīyaḥ vikalpaḥ pratyakṣa pratyaya svabhāvaḥ parasya dṛśyamāna rūpa vikalpanā bhāvāt atha asti eva atra vicchedaḥ kintu darśana dvaya bhāvena antarāla vartti adarśanambalavatā tiraskṛtam na sva vyavahāram labhate tena avicchinna adhyavasāyaḥ tad anakṣa samam yatas alāta dṛṣṭi vat bhāva pakṣaḥ ced balavān mataḥ anyatra api samā anantat varṇayoḥ vā sakṛt śrutiḥ 
[250,iii]	yadi bhāva pakṣaḥ bala vaān samāna jātīya vikalpe api nirvikalpaka vādinaḥ samāna tvāt avyavadhānam eva iti na doṣaḥ abhyupagamya ca etat uvatam na ca vyavadhāna sambhavaḥ na hi lāghavāt vyavadhāne api avyavadhāna pratyayaḥ yatas lāghavāt varṇṇayoḥ api āśu uccāritayoḥ sakṛt śruti prasaṅgaḥ na ca asti tasmāt na lāghavam atra krame api avyavadhāna pratipatti kāraṇam atha tatra lāghavam eva na asti tena asakṛt śrutiḥ atra lāghavam asti iti kutas manasoḥ yugapad vṛtyabhāvāt iti ced etat uttaratra pratipādayiṣyate yaugapadya pratipattiḥ eva anyathā na syāt iti ced na yaugapadyasya eva bhāvāt utpala patra śata bedhe api tarhi yaugapadyam eva astu kiṅ krama kalpanayā na tatra krameṇa deśa prāptiḥ anumānena gamyate na iha tad anumānam iti kathaṅ krama kalpanā akrama kalpanāyāḥ kinnimittam iti ced pratibhāsaḥ eva pratyakṣa ātmā na sākṣāt pratibhāsanāt aparam api sādhanamparam īkṣyate yat api prāc abhihitam lāghavam eva varṇṇa sakṛt śravaṇa nimittat na asti tatra ucyate 
[250,iv_250,vi]	sakṛt saṅgata sarva artheṣu indriyeṣu iha satsu api pañcabhiḥ vyavadhāne api bhāti avyavahitā iva yā sā matiḥ nāma paryanta kṣaṇika jñāna miśraṇāt vicchinna abha iti tat citrantasmāt santu sakṛt dhiyaḥ yasya matan na yugapad buddhayaḥ upajāyante yatra tu yugapad bhāva adhyavasāyaḥ na tatra āśu vṛtteḥ aparaṅ kāraṇam laghu vṛtti tvāt tathā adhyavasāyaḥ tatra idam ucyate varṇṇānāndruta uccāraṇe api kathat na bhavati 
[250,vii]	nanu lāghavam eva tathābhūtat na asti iti paraḥ iha api tarhi tatas api nyūnataram lāghavam yatra pañca viṣayī samavadhānam vikalpa ṣāḍguṇyañca yathā surabhi kamanīya kāminī baktra sarva āsvādanam madhura gītim ākarṇṇayataḥ tatra pañcabhiḥ ekaikasya vyavadhānañcetasaḥ tatra tādṛśasya sutarām lāghavasya abhāvaḥ atha ca sakṛt graha avabhāsaḥ tathā varṇṇānām api syāt yatra hi pañcabhiḥ vyavadhāne api lāghavasya sakṛt adhyavasāya sādhana sāmarthī antatra kimvarṇṇa viṣaya kṣaṇika jñāna vyavadhāne na syāt tasmāt sakṛt eva dhiyām udayaḥ yuktaḥ anyathāyām virodhaḥ samarthayitum aśakyaḥ eva tatas upapannam etat samasoḥ yugapad vṛtteḥ iti kiñca 
[250,viii_251,iii]	pratibhāsā viśeṣaḥ ca sāntara anantare katham śuddhe manaḥ vikalpe ca na krama grahaṇam bhavet kvacid sāntaram yatra dhīḥ jātīya vyavadhānaṅ kvacid anantaram vijātīya vikalpa avyavadhānena te sāntara anantare vijñāne kathambhavataḥ pratibhāsasya ced aviśeṣaḥ manaḥ vikalpasya ca yaḥ śuddhaḥ prabandhaḥ tatra pratibhāsaḥ kramavān na bhavet āśu sambhavāt nanu yadi yugapad vijñāna sambhavaḥ saṅgate api arthe grahaṇa abhāvaḥ kathaṅ kadācid bhavet atra pratyuttaram yaḥ agrahaḥ saṅgate api arthe kvacid āsakta cetasaḥ saktyā anya utpatti vaiguṇyāt ca udyañca etat dvayoḥ api 
[251,iv_251,vi]	anya āsakti vaiguṇya sambhave hi na sa pratyayassamanantara pratyayaḥ bhavati sakala sannihita vijñāna udaye dvayoḥ api samānaḥ paryanuyogaḥ na samānaḥ manasaḥ ekatra sakteḥ tathā api sakṛt graha avasāyaḥ bhavatu yatra āsaktiḥ mahatī na asti tatra bhavati eva iti ced vayam api evambūmaḥ yatra āsaktiḥ tatra krama grahaḥ aparatra yugapad na tu sarvatra krama grahaḥ iti pramāṇam atra na ca anyat manaḥ pūrvakavi jñāna vyatiriktampramāṇa viṣayaḥ nanu alābhe krama grahaṇa sambhave api yugapad pratibhāsa sambhavaḥ na etat api sattyam na hi tatra krama pratibhāsinām saṅghaṭanena sā buddhiḥ api tu yugapad pratibhāsaḥ eva tatra yatas śīghra vṛtteḥ alātā ādeḥ anvaya pratighātinī cakra bhrāntindṛśā dhatte na dṛśā aṅghaṭanena sā 
[251,vii]	śīghra parivarttinām hi alā takṣaṇānām anvayāt upahatañcakṣuḥ eva cakra avabhāsanīndhiyañcanayati na tu asau manasaḥ pratyayaḥ bhāva pakṣasya balavat tvena atha atra api pañca viṣayī sannidhāne bhrāntiḥ eva yugapad pratibhāsaḥ sarvatra tarhi yugapad pratibhāsaḥ bhrāntaḥ eva iṣyate eva iti ced na bhrānta tve pramāṇa abhāvāt yugapad pratibhāsaḥ hi pratyakṣatas eva abhra antāt pratīyate sa tathā pratīyamānaḥ api bādhakam antareṇa api yadi bhrāntaḥ sakala pratyayānām eṣa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sakṛt upalabhyam ānamba adhaka abhāvāt vijñāna pañcakam yugapad eva iti siddham tatas nirvikalpakam eva pratyakṣam 
[251,viii_251,x]	idānīmparamatam upanyasya nirasyati kecid indriya ja tvādeḥ bāla dhī vat akalpanām āhuḥ bālā vikalpe ca hetum saṅketa manda tām indriya ja tvāt anubhava ākāra pravṛtta tvāt amāna satvāt itya ādeḥ akalpakampratyakṣam iti āhuḥ anyebāla indriya jñāna vat bālasya ca indriya vijñānam avikalpakam saṅketa grahaṇa asamartha tvāt 
[251,xi_252,i]	teṣām pratyakṣam eva syāt bālānām avikalpanāt saṅketa upāya vigamāt paścāt api bhavet na saḥ teṣām evam vādinā ambālānām pratyakṣam eva bhavet bhavatu bālasya sakalam eva avikalpa kamiṣyate eva na bālasya api sva artha kriyāsu pūrva apara parāmarśaḥ vidyate eva atha na asti tadā paścāt api vikalpena na bhavitavyam saṅketa grahaṇasya upāyasya abhāvāt vikalpena hi saṅketa grahaṇam sa ca bālasya na asti atha manaḥ avyutpanna saṅketam asti tena sa ced mataḥ evam indriya je api syāt śeṣavat ca idam īdṛśam 
[252,ii]	yadi bālānām api manaḥ vyavahāra patitam vicārakam vidyate bālāna antena saṅkata grahaṇāt paścāt vikalpaka tā manasaḥ yadi evam iya mi ndriya je api syāt indriya jam api vikalpa kambhavet paścāt kena nivārya tat api ca indriya jñānan na saṅketa grahaṇa samarthambālasya iti kutas indriya ja tvāt eva iti ced na pratibandha abhāvāt api ca yadi nāma bālasya avikalpakam indriya jñānam sarvatra tathā bhavati iti kutas etat na hi bādhaka pramāṇa pratibandha siddhim antareṇa hetoḥ gamaka tā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa atha indriya jam yat tad sannihita mātra grahaṇāt pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnyam iti na sa vikalpakam tadā eva pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnya tvam asya katham siddham sākṣātkaraṇasya pūrva aparayoḥ abhāvāt asākṣāt kāri ca na pratyakṣam evantarhi indriyaja tvāt bāla vijñāna vat iti ca vyartha pratyakṣa prasiddham eva syāt avikalpaka tvam sākṣātkaraṇasya pratyakṣeṇa pratiniyatasya anubhavāt anyathā yadi na kvacid pratyakṣam sādhanam avikalpaka tvasya tad anusāri katham anumānampravarttete 
[252,iii_252,v]	atha sākṣātkaraṇa ākārambāla vijñānanta tonyat api indriya vijñānantathā bhūtam eva evantarhi yat eva sādhanambāle tat eva atra api kathyatām sāmyāt akṣa dhiyām uktam anena anubhava ādikam sākṣātkaraṇasya parokṣe adarśanāt anyatra ca darśanāt pratyakṣam aparokṣa viṣaya tvāt avikalpakam iti sāmānyena sādhyatām kim indriya ja tu ā ādi hetunā tat ca sākṣāt karaṇam avikalpaka tvena kathitam avikalpaka tvasya sa vikalpaka tva bādhāt yat sākṣāt kāri tad avikalpaka tvena vyāptam tatas viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ eṣā athavā avikalpaka tvena sākṣātkaraṇam sādhyate tatas api pratyakṣa tvam yadi avikalpaka tvena sākṣātkaraṇam sādhyate tena pratyakṣa tvandvi candra ādi vedanānām api syāt abhrānta tve sati iti vācyam 
[252,vi_252,vii]	nanu bhrāntam iti eva astu kim avikalpaka tvena na parama tāpekṣa tvāt viśeṣaṇasya tathā ca āha viśeṣaṇam lakṣaṇe parama ta apekṣam sarvetu avikalpakāḥ eva sarve eva abhrāntāḥ pratyayāḥ avikalpakāḥ eva abhrānta tvaḥ cā cā rye ṇa apavāda dvāreṇa pratipāditam athavā akṣamprativarttate iti pratyakṣam tena sākṣātkaraṇam upalabhyate tat sarve sākṣātkaraṇa ākāra pravṛttāḥ pratyayāḥ avikalpakāḥ eva athavā aśnute vyāpnoti iti akṣam viṣaya svarūpa vyāptiḥ ca sākṣātkaraṇam eva tatas sarve akṣajāḥ avikalpakāḥ eva 
[252,viii_253,iii]	athavā na asti eva abhra anta grahaṇamā cā ryaḥ sya kalpanā apoḍham iti eva lakṣaṇam kathantarhi bhrānta vijñāna vicchedaḥ sarvasya sākṣātkaraṇasya pratyakṣa tvāt dvi candra ādi jñānasya api pratibhāsamāne dvi tve pratyakṣa tā eva tena yatra yat sākṣātkāri tatra tat pratyakṣam bāhye hi tat bhrāṃtantatra ca na sākṣātkāri pratibhāsamāna rūpa vyatirekeṇa aparam asti iti kalpanaiva iyam tathā ca āha manaḥ bhrānti viṣaya tvāt vyabhicāriṇaḥ nanu abhra antam api bāhye arthe kalpanā jñānam eva sattyam etat tathā hi idam vastu bala āyātam yat vadanti vipaścitaḥ yathā yathā arthāḥ cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā iti vakṣyate 
[253,iv_253,vii]	api ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyañca sambandham lokikīm sthitim gṛhītvā saṅkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā yathā daṇiḍani jāti ādeḥ vivekena anirūpaṇāt tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā api atra na asti atas saṃyojya grahaṇam hi kalpanā pratyekañca viśeṣaṇa ādīnām grahaṇam antareṇa na saṃyojanam yathā daṇḍī iti pratītau jāti ādīn āñca vivekena anavadhāraṇāt tadvatā yojanā na asti iti katham vikalpakam indraya jñānam tathā hi 
[253,viii_253,ix]	abhinna pratibhāsasya yojanaṅ kasya kena vā vibhinna pratibhāsasya yojanam me pratīti bhāj abhinna pratibhāse hi tat ekam eva kaḥ tatra yojana arthaḥ ubhaya apekṣa tvāt yojanāyāḥ atha bhinna pratebhāsan dvayanta dā paraspara vivekena pratibhāsanāḥ natarām yojana iti asambhavaḥ yojanāyāḥ tasmāt na pāramārthikī yojanā 
[253,x]	bhavatu vā yadi pratyekampratibhāsanam viśeṣaṇa ādīnām na ca jāti jāti mat ādīnām etat sambhavati na jāti guṇa kriyāḥ tadvataḥ bhedena avabhāsante atas eva saṃsṛṣṭa pratibhāsanam yojanā iti ced na bhinnayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭa pratibhāsā yogāt samāna deśa kāla tvāt evam iti ced na samāna deśa kālānām api svarūpasya bhedāt bhinna deśa kālānām api hi svarūpa bhedāt eva tathā apratibhāsaḥ na deśa kāla bhedāt yadi hi tatra na svarūpa bhedaḥ deśa ādi bhede api na bheda pratibhāsanam deśa abhede api pareṣām varṇṇa saṃsthānayoḥ avabhāsataḥ eva bhedaḥ vāta ātapayoḥ ca iti na deśa ādi abhedāt avabhāsa bhedaḥ hīyate 
[253,xi_253,xii]	atha samavāya sambandha balāt eka lolībhāvena pratibhāsanan tathā sati sarvatra tathā tva kalpanā prasaṅgaḥ sarve eva abheda pratibhāsaḥ abheda sā ghanan na bhavet nanu gauḥ iti viśiṣṭa pratyayāt eva yojanā rūpā buddhiḥ eṣā viśiṣṭa pratyayaḥ hi na viśeṣa viśeṣaṇam antareṇa kvacid upalabdhaḥ daṇḍī iti pratyaya vat idantat iti na nirdiśyate vivekena apratibhāsanāt na hi daṇḍī iti api pratyaye daṇḍasya vivekena pratibhāsaḥ puruṣa mātrasya eva tatra pratibhāsanāt prāk eva daṇḍa sambandhāt kasmāt na bhavati iti ced na sā me grya bhāvena viśiṣṭa tvasya abhāvāt viśiṣṭa tvañca na aparampuruṣe tasya apratīteḥ daṇḍaḥ eva tu viśiṣṭa tvam yathā
[254,i_254,ii]	vījasya sahakāriṇaḥ eva jala ādayaḥ śaktiḥ yadi tu daṇḍa pratibhāsaḥ api bhavet daṇḍa puruṣau iti pratyayaḥ syāt tat etat sakalam ayuktam kevala pratibhāsaḥ ced apratīti viśeṣaṇat na bhavet pratibhāse tu syāt daṇḍa puruṣau iti yathā eva hi puruṣa pratibhāse kevalasya na viśiṣṭa tā pratītiḥ tathā daṇḍī iti api atha viśiṣṭa pratyaya viṣaya tvam eva viśiṣṭa tā atra api ucyate sva gatena viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet prameyasya viśeṣāt vā dvayasya api na sattya tā 
[254,iii]	yadi tāvat svagataḥ viśeṣaḥ pratyayasya tadā na arthasya yojanā rūpā kalpanā na khalu sukha dinā sva gatena viśeṣeṇa sa vikalpaka tā indriya jñānasya viṣayam antareṇa saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ pratyayasya na iti ced na samanantara pratyayāt api viśeṣa prasiddheḥ iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ viṣaya gate tu viśeṣe daṇḍa puruṣayoḥ dvayoḥ api pratītiḥ iti kathampuruṣa mātra viṣaya tā daṇḍi pratyayasya dvayoḥ api pratītiḥ iti vyavahāra mātrataḥ etat ucyate na hi paramārthataḥ vikalpasya nirviṣaya tvāt iti dvayoḥ api viṣaya tve kathat na dvivacanam vyavahāra mātram etat pūrva pūrva vāsanā viśeṣa prabhavam iti na doṣaḥ aprādhānyāt viśeṣaṇasya pratīyamānam api tat na vivakṣitam iti puruṣa mātra saṅkhyayā eka tvam yadi anena vyāyena puruṣa mātra viṣaya tvam ucyate ucyatān na tu pratibhāsana abhāvena
