[312,xviii_313,i]	nanu abhyāsāt gamana ādayaḥ api vikaṭa ādi rūpāḥ bhavanti na ca te bodha rūpāḥ atra ucyate abodha rūpāt abhyāsāt abodhasya eva sambhavaḥ bodha rūpāt tathā abhyāsat bodha rūpa udayaḥ na kim prajñā ādivadeva atha api syāt bodha rūpa abhyāsaḥ iti kim sva samvedanā abhyāsaḥ atha bodha rūpa gṛhīta artha abhyāsoḥ yadi sva samvedanā abhyāsaḥ tam vedanam asiddham atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ sona ekāntika sambhavāt ayuktaḥ eva bodha rūpa gṛhīta gamana abhyāse api gamana ādi baḥ rūpatā anupalambhāt atra ucyate 
[313,ii_313,iii]	yobhyasyate yathābhūtaḥ sa tathā eva prakṛṣyate antar samvedana abhyāsaḥ sukha ādīnān tathā phalaḥ antar samvedana rūpāḥ hi sukha ādayaḥ upalabdhāḥ jaḍa rūpāḥ santaḥ eka artha samavāyena upalabhyante tathā iti etat tu va samvedana samāsādana upanata paritoṣam tatas sva samvedana rūpam eva abhyasyati tatas tathābhūtam eva bhāvanā prakarṣa abhyāse prādurbhavet prathamantarhi sva samvedanā bhāvaḥ syāt na yat jātīyaḥ ityādinā tasya api tathābhūta tvāt tasmāt bhāvanā balāt upajāyamānāḥ prajñā ādivat samvedana svabhāvāḥ eva iti sthitam 
[313,iv_313,vii]	anena etat api nirastam tat atad rūpiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ tad atad rūpa hetu jāḥ tad rūpa ādi kim ajñānam vijñāna abhinna hetu jam tasya ayam arthaḥ paraspara sahakāri tvena cakṣuḥ manaskāra puras vartti śakaṭa ādayaḥ samāna sāmagrīkāḥ upajāyamānāḥ sarve bodha rūpāḥ syuḥ abodha rūpā vā na hi tatra kaścid pradhāna itara vivekaḥ iti sā hi rūpa ādi sāmagrī bodhābodha rūpa aneka kārya janena dṛṣṭa śaktikā na anyathā śakyāḥ vidhātu tayā eva anaikāntika tvam atas eva iti ced na anyathā hetu arthasya vivakṣita tvāt bhāvanaḥ yat a janmānaḥ yathā prajñā ādayaḥ tathā sukha ādayaḥ api kintasmāt kāraṇāt asva samvidaḥ 
[313,viii]	yaḥ hi yathā bhūtobhyasyate sa tathā eva bhavati iti pramāṇa arthaḥ na ca rūpa ādīnām āntara svabhāva abhyāsa sambhavaḥ yasya tāvat arthāpatti gamyāḥ prajñā ādi viśeṣāḥ tena te ātma samavāyinaḥ iti katham avagantavyam kevalam artha apatyāḥ yena vinā yatna upapattimat tat avagamyate na ca ātma samavāyi tvena vinā abodha rūpa tayā ca na upapattimat kiñcid kevalam apareṇa api kenacid bhavitavyam yatas para ukṣata arthasya jātā tatas katham ātma samavāya ādi gatiḥ tasmāt mayā etat avagatam iti a antara tvam eva bodhasya abhyastam janena yena atara tva pratītiḥ iti parihāraḥ 
[313,ix]	ye api buddhi antarasya pratyakṣata ambuddhau varṇṇayanti teṣām api sā ātma samavāyinī bodha rūpā ca pratibhāti iti evam avaśya mayam abhyupagamaḥ anyathā padārtha antaram eva bhavet grāhaka tvasya tu prasiddhiḥ eva tasmāt pratyakṣa antare tad ārūḍha grāhaka tvā eva asau pratibhāti tathā ca sati tatra api sorthaḥ pratibhāsate naṣṭasya ca katham pratibhāsaḥ kevala abuddhiḥ pratibhā samānā katham grāhikā tvena grahaṇa tvena vā pratibhāseta tathā ātma ādayaḥ api iti codye ātma samaveta tvena vā adhyāroponādi kālikaḥ upajāyate iti parihāraḥ syāt tathā ca sati tathā eva bhāvanā balāt upajāyamānāḥ prajñā ādayaḥ vā sukha ādayaḥ api bodha rūpāḥ eva 
[314,i_314,v]	nanu tathā api buddhi ādīnām sva samvedana rūpa tān na abhyupagacchanti pare nanu asam vedana tve api sati na pratyakṣatā na antara tvam iti pratipāditam sva samvedana tve punar tathābhūtam eva ātmānañcakāsayanti arthañca sā cakāsti iti yuktam etat eva atha bhāva nāvalāt api sukha ādayaḥ udaya tyāginā ātma samavāyinaḥ eva santaḥ eka artha sama vāyi vijñāna grāhyāḥ tena bodhena saṃsparśāt bodha rūpa avabhāsanam na tu bodha svabhāvena iti evaṅ kasmāt na kalpyate atra ucyate anādi bhāvanā abhāvāt idam evam iti sthiteḥ tad anyaya prakriyā kalpaḥ na lokena avatāryate 
[314,vi]	yad bhāvanā balāt idam upajāyate iti pratipādyate na tatra aparā prakriyā kaḥ samupajāyamāna upalabhyate evan ca evañcā idam iti api tu bhāva nāvalāt yathā etat dṛśyate tathā eva itat iti vyavahāraḥ kimva eka artha samavāya kalpanayā prayojanam kasya tarhi tat sukham yadi ātmani samavāyaḥ na iṣyate evantarhi kasya saḥ ātmā yadi anyatra tasya samavāya aniṣṭiḥ 
[314,vii_314,x]	svatantraḥ ātmā nitya tvāt para adhīnaḥ katham hi saḥ sukha ādīnām tu anitya tve para adhīna tva kalpanā ātmā hi nitya tvāt svātaṃtri adana āśritaḥ yuktaḥ iti yuktam etat sukha ādayaḥ tu guṇāḥ anityāḥ ca tatas niyamena teṣām āśrita tvena bhāvyam tat etat asat yatas āśraya tve guṇa tvam syāt guṇat tve vā āśraya sthitiḥ anyonya saṃśrayāt evam na syāt anyatara sthitiḥ 
[314,xi_314,xiii]	yadi guṇa tvam prathamam sidhyet tadā guṇena āśritena bhavitavyam iti kalpanā avatāraḥ na ca tat sidhyati para āśraya tvāt siddheḥ na āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ kasyacid asti iti pratipāditam etat yadi api uktat nitya tvāt svatantraḥ ātmā na sukha ādayaḥ viparyayāt iti anityam api hetubhyaḥ utpartteḥ nirapekṣaṇam karttavyatā asya na asti iti paratra āyattatā katham 
[314,xiv_314,xvi]	yadi tat na utpannam eva katham asya parāyattatā atha kutaścid hetorūpat pannantataḥ api kā tasya parāyattatā sva kārya janane parāyat tata iti ced sva hetoḥ eva kārya jananantasya iti nāya adhīna tā yogaḥ iti alamprasaṅgena tasmāt sukha ādayaḥ eva svatantrāḥ bhavantu kim āśrayeṇa ātmanā upakalpitena asvasam vedane ca sukha ādīnām katham artha grāhaka tā eka artha sama bāyi vijñānena vedane bhaviṣyati iti ced atra ucyate kim eka artha samavāyinā vijñānena indriya jena vedyante atha anyena na tāvat indiya vijñānena yatas 
[314,xvii_315,i]	yasya arthasya nipātena te jāta dhī sukha ādayaḥ tam muktvā pratipadyena sukha ādīn eva sā katham sā eva indriya buddhiḥ rūpa ādi abhinipeśinī katham sukha ādīn eva pratipadyate yā cakṣuḥ ādinā rūpa ādiṣu niyuktā na hi sukhe pravṛttañcakṣuḥ mam eti buddhiḥ atha sukha āgrāhakam vijñānam rūpaḥ eva pravṛttam varttayiṣyati tathā asati atiprasaṅgaḥ iti pratipāditam anumānasya api cākṣuṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[315,ii^1]	atha indriya jñānāt aparaḥ grāhaka ākāraḥ na upalabhyate tena tena eva iti ucyate vikalpaḥ api tarhi samāna kāle indriya vijñānena eva gṛhyate iti prāptam anumeye api prasaṅgaḥ iti niveditam na hi tatra aparaḥ grāhaka ākāraḥ upalabhyate iti atha grāhya ākārāt tathā grāhaka ākāra parikalpanā vikalpye api śabde samānam etat sukha ādau api grāhaka ākāraḥ kinna kalpyate iti ced na grāhya tvena ananubhavāt nahya eka artha samavāye api grahaṇa antareṇa grahaṇāt grāhyatā na asti iti śakyam vaktum ekalolībhāvena pratipatteḥ iti ced sa tarhi tad ātmā sukhambuddhiḥ vā ekasya api
[315,ii^2]	svarūpeṇa agrahaṇāt sukha ākāram eva kevalam samvedanam aparasya api asamvedanasya sukha abhāvaḥ iti ced na para upadhāna tvasya apratīteḥ vṛkṣa piṇḍa ākāra pratipatti vat atha anumānāt para upadhāna tā sādhyate yat pratīyate tad para upadhānam piṇḍa vat na bāhya artha abhāva prasaṅgāt vāsanā upadhānasya sambhavāt tasmāt yat yathā pratīyate tat tathā eva upagantavyam na tu tad anumānena anyathā sthāpanīyam tatas vāhya arthaḥ sva rūpeṇa grāhya tayā pratīyamānaḥ tathā avasthāpyate pratīti mātra anubandhi tvāt sthāpanāyāḥ sukha ādikantu na grāhya tayā vedyate tatas sva samvedanam 
[315,iii_315,v]	atha ātma manaḥ yoga mātrāt utpannam jñānam sukha ādīnām grāhakam na indriya jñam tathā sati yuga pañjñāna anudayāt krama grahaṇena bhāvyam tatas ca avicchannā na bhāseta tad samvittiḥ krama grahe krama grahe hi apagamyamāne na sukha ādi buddhiḥ avicchinnā pratibhāseta ayam eva hi kramaḥ yat asaha bhūta tvad nāma saha eva ca rūpa ādi grahaṇena sukha ādi grahaṇām upalabhyate tatra ca saha grahaṇam iti viruddham na hi viruddhayoḥ ekatra bhāvaḥ 
[315,vi_315,viii]	tad lāghavāt ced tad tulyam iti asamvedanat na kim yadi sukha grahaṇasya laghu vṛtteḥ aviccheda pratipattiḥ pratipattiḥ eva na antara apratipattiḥ tat etat lāghavam agrahaṇe api sukha ādeḥ samānam iti agrahaṇam eva avicchinnam sukha rūpayoḥ prasaktam athāḥ grahaṇam api avicchinnam pratibhāti eva yatas sukhasya agrahaṇam rūpa grahaṇāt aparat na hi rūpasya api agrahaḥ na asti sukha grahaṇataḥ paraḥ 
[315,ix_315,xi]	tatas ca sukha āsya avicchinnam agrahaṇam bhavet iti ayam arthaḥ rūpa udeḥ grahaṇam avicchinnam iti tat asti avaḥ evam viparyaye api vācyam tatas siddha sādhanam eva etat agrahaṇan na kim iti atra ucyate ekasya bhāvaḥ yoni asya abhāva tvena nirucyate tad vivikta tayā tasya tad abhāvasya cintitaḥ na hi svarūpeṇa kasyacid asā abhāvaḥ api tu tad vivikta tvena tatas ca rūpa grahaṇam sukha grahaṇa viviktam upalabhyate iti abhyupagame tad vivikta grahaṇam lāghavena iti tad avicchedasya sambhavāt katham sukha samvedanam sukha samvedanasya api saḥ eva kramaḥ iti dvayoḥ api agrahaṇam iti 
[316,i_316,ii]	sādhu uktam agrahaḥ eva na kim iti na hi paratra api upalabhyamāne parasya tad vivikta grahaṇam tad vivikta grahaṇam eva tad svarūpasya tatra apraveśāt iti ced na paraspara svarūpa apraveśa grahaṇe akrama grahaṇam samāna kāla grahaṇe api sambhavāt avayava avayavinoḥ tulya kāla grahaṇa abhyupagamāt nanu dūra tas sa antara aneka keśa grahaṇena antarasya agrahaṇe api agrahaṇam eva keśa rūpasya tatra yathā nirantara keśa rūpa grahaṇena tad antara agrahaṇamba adhyate na tathā antara agrahaṇena keśa grahaṇa bādhā evam atra api na agrahaṇam antarā grahaṇasya bādhakam atra ucyate 
[316,iii_316,vii]	antara grahaṇantatra na eva sat bādha kaṅkatham asat na bādhyan āpīṣṭam lokaḥ kevalam icchati kasmāt antara grahaṇam eva na bhavati iti ced śaktiḥ eṣā eva bhāvānām sā kim paryanuyujyate tena antarāṇām grahaṇam anutpannat na bādhakam na ca bādhyam kevalam vyapadeśaḥ eva yathākathañcit loke nirūḍhim āgataḥ tatra tu punar sukha rūpa ādi grahaṇayoḥ agrahaṇat na utpannam iti na yuktam tathā sati na krama grahaṇa sambhavaḥ asti eva agrahaṇantatra paraṅ grahaṇat na utpannam iti ced na etat asti grahaṇe grāha kanna asti grāhake grāhaka antaram paraiḥ api evam eva iṣṭam anyathā tu asamaṃjasam 
[316,viii]	grahaṇena hi sva prakāśa ātmanā bhavitavyam grāhakasya tu kāraṇa ātmanaḥ karttuḥ vā grāhakam aparam iṣyatām aprakāśe grahaṇe sarva artha agrahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ grahañcet sva prakāśam indriyāt anyatas vā yadi bhavet kim idānīm apareṇa grāhakeṇa iti ced ayam aparaḥ asya eva doṣaḥ na tu aprakāśam svayaṅ grahaṇat nāma apareṇa prakāśyate tat ced nanu apareṇa api prakāśanamparokṣam eva tasya api apareṇa iti artha tā eva āyatā sarvasya jagataḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate tat ca pratibhā samānamparaspara kāla vivekena utpannaṅkatham parasparasya na bādhakam iti yat kiñcid etat atha sukha grahaṇamba adhyate eva kadācid kevalasya rūpa ādeḥ grahaṇāt tathā hi manohāri rūpa darśana īpa kadācid na sukha samvedanam asti tatas keśa antara grahaṇam eva sukha grahaṇam api na utpannam iti bādhanam avasthāpyate na etat api sat yatas 
[316,ix_316,x]	sarvadā eva na kimbādhā keśa antara vidaḥ yathā tadā tu na sukha ādīnām udayaḥ loka sammataḥ yathā keśa grahaṇam antarā grahaṇasya bādhakam sarva daiva evam rūpa ādi grahaṇam api sukha ādi grahaṇasya syāt na ca paramārthataḥ tat keśa gra ha ṇam keśa svarūpasya apratipatteḥ yadā tu sukhā pratipattiḥ kevala rūpa ādi grahaṇe tadā sukham eva na udapādi na tu utpannam agrahaṇam kevalam iti vyavasthā anupalambhāt anutpanna vyavahāraḥ iti ced u i cchannaḥ idānīm utpāda ādi vyavahāraḥ tatonupalabdhiḥ api tasmāt yadā eva sukha ādīnām utpatti grahaṇasya tadā eva sukha ādīnām utpattiḥ tadā api na rūpa ādi grahaṇena abhibhavaḥ bhavat mate keśa antara agrahaṇa vat prāptaḥ atha ekā eva indriya buddhiḥ atha sukha ādi grahaṇe pravarttiṣyate tena ayam krama grahaṇa doṣaḥ bhavet tat asat iti āha 
[316,xi_317,i]	na ca ekayā dvaya jñānat niyamāt akṣa cetasaḥ sukha ādi abhāve api arthāt ca jāte tad śakti asiddhitaḥ yadi indriya buddhiḥ eva artha sukha ādi grāhīṇī yuktam na ca etat iti pratipāditam ātma manaḥ saṃyoga mātra jena ātindriya jena sukha ādikam gṛhyate pratyayena iti abhyupagamāt atha kaścid evam api upagacchet tat api na śakyam sukha ādi abhāve api arthāt eva kevalāt utpādāt indriya buddheḥ sukha ādīnām kāraṇa tva anirddhāraṇāt yaḥ hi yena vinā na utpattimān satsu api samartheṣu anyeṣu tasya tad kāraṇatva avadhāraṇam na ca rūpa ādi sāmagryam api vinā sukha ādikam anutpattimat indriya cetaḥ 
[317,ii_317,iii]	atha api syāt nīlam yadā pītena saha indriya vedane pratibhāti na tadā tasya sāmarthya syāt nīlam antareṇa api pītāt utpatteḥ atha ca tatra api tasya sāmarthya atha nīla pīta avabhāsi vijñānan na kevalāt pītāt jāyate evantarhi sukha rūpa avabhāsasya api na kevalāt rūpāt iti samānaḥ nyāyaḥ na samānam etat nīlasya indriya vijñāne pṛthak sāmarthya darśanāt śakti siddhi ssamūhe api na sukhasya evam īkṣaṇam 
[317,iv_317,vii]	abhyupagame vā pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayoḥ nīla ādi vat sukham gṛhyeta kevalam tasya tad hetu artham agṛhyataḥ na hi samvedanam yuktam dṛṣṭam iṣṭañca kasyacid rūpa ādeḥ eva sukha ādi rahitāt utpadyate tad akṣa vijñānam na hi vijñānāt pūrva sukha ādikam asti rūpavat vijñānena saha tatas eva rūra ādeḥ tasya utpatteḥ atha samāna kāla bhāvinaḥ api saha bhūhetu tvam iṣyate tat asat saha bhūhetu tvena paraspara pratibaddham dvayam bhavatu bhūta vat na tu vedya vedaka bhāvaḥ 
[317,viii_317,xi]	asamvedana rūpasya grahaṇan na parasparam sva samvedana rūpasya grahaṇan na parasparam sva hetoḥ unmukhībhāvāt yadi grahaṇam iṣyate samāna kālasya api asya para samvedana ātmanā sukhe tad unmukhībhūtam katham indriya jammatam na akṣāvyāpāra vid tatra prāk eva etat niveditam api ca pṛthak sāmarthye kevalam sukha ādi gṛhyeta nīla vat eva gṛhyate eva iti ced na na hi sukha hetu rūpa ādi grahaṇam antareṇa sukha ādi grahaṇam yuktam samvedyamānam api ayuktam eva na khalu lalanālālitya pratipattim antareṇa sukhena kaścid arthī tadā eva tat sukham icchati sakalaḥ kāmī janaḥ na ca evam upalabdhiḥ atha tasya eva sāmarthyam evantarhi candramasaḥ api dvitīyasya syāt atas eva āha arthena eva saha grahe 
[317,xii_317,xv]	kim sāmarthyam sukha ādīnāt neṣṭā dhīryat tat udbhavā na hi anvaya vyatirekam antareṇa sāmarthya siddhiḥ na ca iṣyate na iṣṭā eva tad udbhavā cakṣuḥ ādi buddhiḥ pareṣām iti api ca vinā arthena sukha ādīnām vedane cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ rūpa ādiḥ strī ādi bheda uktyā gṛhyeta na kadācana sukha duḥkha ādi hetu tvena rūpa ādi kamprati kūlā pratikūla tvena ca satri ādikan na gṛhyeta kevalasya grahaṇe kāraṇam kim api astī ti pratītiḥ syāt saha grahaṇe kāraṇa pratītiḥ iti ced parasparat nīla ādīnām api kāraṇa tva pratītiḥ syāt na ca bhavati tasmāt anupapannam etat yadi ca sukham kevalañcakṣuḥ ādinā gṛhītum śakyam tadā rūpa ādi grahat a eva upajāyate yatas 
[318,ii_318,v]	na hi sati antaraṅgerthe śakteḥ dhīṃrbāhya darśanī bāhyaḥ tri ādi bheda darśanam antareṇa yadi sukha samvedanam eva na bhavet tadā bāhya darśanantat nāntarīyaka tvāt sukha samvedanasya atha artha grahaḥ pīṣyate eva iti matiḥ tadā ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ artha grahe sukha ādīnā an tad jānām syāt avedanam artha grahaṇa kāle hi yadi api sukham udaya vat tathā api tasya grahaṇa sāmagrī na asti indriya artha manaḥ saṃyoga bhāvinā manasā rūpa ādi arthasya grahaṇam na ca aparam manosti yugapad jñāna utpattya nabhyupagamāt atas tad jam sukha ādi kat na gṛhyeta atha yugapad vijñāna udayaḥ iṣyate tadā api aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti āha 
[318,vi_318,viii]	dhiyoḥ yugapad utpattau tad tad viṣaya sambhavāt sukha duḥkha vidau syātām sakṛt arthasya sambhave arthasya iṣṭā aniṣṭasya sambhave sati yugapad sukha duḥkha ādi samvedanam nivārayitut na śakyate nanu dṛśyate eva etat tathā hi śīta kāle śīta uṣṇa sparśa samvedana janmanī sukha duḥkhe vedyete tat api asat yatas sadā syātām iti abhiprāyaḥ na ca raṇa rasau arjita cetasaḥ svāmi sammānana upakāra nirdeśa para adhīnam ātmanam sa phalañci kīrṣataḥ śāstra saṃsparśa duḥkha samvedanam avaśyañca duḥkha hetu sadbhāve tad utpattiḥ tatas ca sukha duḥkha sahasam vedana prasaṅga 
[318,ix_318,xiii]	atha apareṇa abhibhavāt parasya āvedanam tat ayuktam abhibhavasya asambhavāt mahat tva ādinā abhibhavaḥ iti na samyak hastimaśakyoḥ yugapad pratipatti abhāva prasaṅgaḥt iṣṭa tvena iti api na samyak dvayoḥ api saha darśanāt duḥkha sukhayoḥ hi yugapad anubhavasya pratipādita tvāt paṭa saṃskārāt kvāpi anubhavaḥ iti ced na bhāvanā vyatirekeṇa saṃskārasya aparasya adarśanāt bhāvanā balena ced utpattiḥ tu vaḥ sukha ādayaḥ tadā bodha rūpāḥ eva iti pratapa āditam atha api syāt bhāvanā balataḥ jñānam sukha ādiṣu vivarttate sukha ādayaḥ tu rūpa ādi kāraṇāt eva bhāvinaḥ iyam api alīka kalpanā yatas yat vastu balataḥ jñānam jāyate tatra bhāvanām na aṅgīkurvanti vidvān saḥ tathā ceda samaṃjasam 
[318,xiv]	yadi sukha ādikam sannihitam eva tad bhāvanām antareṇa api dṛśyante eva na hi prāc acintitān anubhūtāḥ bhāvāḥ ekadā eva na upalabdhi viṣayaḥ tatra api vyavahitā bhāvanā asti iti ced kim atra pramāṇam api ca jñānasya bhāvanā na artha ākāra bhāvanām vinā kevalasya bhāvayitum aśakyatvāt bhāvanā balena ced udaya vat jñānam kim artha ādikam apekṣate atha arthena saha abhyāsāt tathā sati artha ākāraḥ api bhāvanā balāt eva upajāyate tathā sati svapna ādi jñāna vat artha rahitam eva jñānam iti bāhya rūpa sukha ādi vijñānāt siṣā dhayiṣatā arthasya api avāhya rūpa tā sādhitā iti mahatī parasya para dūṣaṇa abhijña tā 
[319,i_319,ii]	atha api matiḥ yugapad sukha duḥkha asambhavaḥ eva yatas sattya antare api upādāne jñāne duḥkha ādi sambhavaḥ na upādānam viruddhasya tat ca ekam iti ced matam avijñānasya vijñānam kena upādāna kāraṇam ādhipatyantu kurvī iti tad viruddhe api dṛśyate akṣṇoḥ yathā ekaḥ ālokaḥ naktañcara tadanyayoḥ rūpa darśana vaiguṇayā vaiguṇye kurute sakṛt 
[319,v]	yadi upādāna pūrvakam jñānam apekṣya sukha ādi sambhavati tadā na upādānam ekam viruddhasya yuktam dvayasya kintu tat eva ayuktam viruddhānām api jñānam sukha ādīnām dṛṣṭam atha viruddhasya upāgānan na bhavati eva tathā satya vijñānasya vijñānam upādānam katham bhavet na ca upādāna bhāvaḥ nāma ādhipatyam eva kevalam kāraṇānām kārye tat ca viruddhe api yathā kauśika itarayoḥ akṣṇoḥ upadhātā itarau bhavataḥ ālokāt ekasmāt eva 
[319,vi_319,vii]	tasmāt sukha ādayorthānām sva saṃkrānta avabhāsinām vedakāḥ sva ātmanaḥ ca eṣām arthebhyaḥ janma kevalam yadi abodha rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ rūpa ādi sāmagrītaḥ vijñāna samāna kāle eva udayavantaḥ tadā sarva dā iṣṭā aniṣṭa viṣaya saṃmukha abhāve yugapad sukha duḥkha vidau syātām tava api kasmāt na evam iti ced na vāsanā prabodhasya tādṛśasya abhāvāt rūpa ādi vikalpa vat kadācid eva kasyacid kiñcid eva bhavati vāsanā prabodha kāraṇam mama api evam iti ced na yatas 
[319,viii_319,ix]	vāsanā bala bhāvi tve bodha tā eva prasajyate vāsanā smṛti abhijñāna kāraṇa tvena lakṣitā nanu smṛti ādayaḥ api na svarūpa samvedana ātmakāḥ tatra api arthasya eva pratibhāsanāt varṇṇa saṃsthāna ātmakam tatra artha rūpam eva pratibhāti na ca aparantatra vijñāna rūpam samvedana viṣayaḥ tasmāt parokṣā eva sakalā buddhiḥ 
[319,x_319,xi]	yadi arthaḥ eva tatra asti pratibhāsasya gocaraḥ pratyakṣa vat tad arthasya grahaṇam saṅgatam bhavet na hi arthaḥ svena rūpeṇa bhāsamānaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati svarūpa pratibhāsasya eva pratyakṣa tvāt anyasya pratyakṣa lakṣaṇasya abhāvat tathā sati na pratyakṣa smaraṇayoḥ viśeṣaḥ atha pūrva tvena parokṣa tayā ca pratibhāti tatas yama doṣaḥ iti ced keyampara ukṣatā nāma na hi sā pratyakṣeṇa upalabdhā 
[319,xii_319,xiv]	pratyakṣeṇa upalabdhe ca smaraṇasya pravarttanam anyathā pūrvarūpasya grahaṇe smaraṇam katham na hi smaraṇa pūrva artha viṣayam atha gṛhītasya eva arthasya parokṣatā grahaṇāt smaraṇam tat iti matiḥ tat api asat parokṣa tā kimarthasya svabhāvaḥ vedanasya kim arthasya asau svabhāvaḥ ced pratyakṣe pratibhāsatām 
[319,xv_320,i]	yaḥ hi arthasya svabhāvaḥ sa pratyakṣe pratibhāti yathā nīla ādi tā śakti niyamāt smaraṇaḥ eva pratibhāti iti ced yathā bhāva abhāva ātmake vastuni bhāva rūpa tā pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate abhāva rūpa tā tu para rūpeṇa bhāva pramāṇa gocaraḥ tat api sva pakṣa pāti tvam tathā hi abhāvasya hi bhāva tve katham pratyakṣataḥ agrahaḥ vyatireke tatas tasya bhāvasyaḥ bhayatā katham 
[320,ii_320,iii]	ākāra bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt bhāva bhedasya ākārasya bhedena api abhede sakalam eka rūpam bhavet atha bhāvayoḥ ākāra bheda ādinā ekatā na bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhāvayoḥ abhāvataḥ bhedāt bhāva abhāvayoḥ tu na aparaḥ bhāvaḥ anyathā anavasthā syāt abhāvaḥ yadi abhinnaḥ syāt bhāvāt bheda grahaḥ katham pramāṇa bhedāt iti ced abheda grahaṇam kutas 
[320,iv^1]	yadi pratyakṣeṇa bhāva aṃśaḥ parigṛhyate pramāṇa antareṇa abhāva aṃśaḥ tathā sati paraspareṇa āmiśratā pratipatteḥ katham ekaḥ bhāva abhāva ātmakaḥ bhavati iti pratipattiḥ yadi cakṣuḥ vijñānena rūpa pratipattiḥ anyena śabda ādeḥ katham mayā eva dvayam pratipannam iti karttuḥ eka tā pratipattiḥ anādi vāsanātaḥ eṣā pratīrtiḥ na tu tattvataḥ iti kasya atra upālambhaḥ evam atra api iti ced yadi evam anādi vāsanā balāt eva abhāva vyatireka pratītiḥ api bhaviṣyati kimartha antara kalpanayā pramāṇam api tad abhāva ākhyam vāsanā bala bhāvi ā iva na pāramārthikam tatas vilakṣaṇa tvāt eka
[320,iv^2]	tatas vyāvṛttam kim abhāvena vailakṣaṇañca pratyakṣatas eva pratibhāti tatas idam atra na astiti tad uttara kāla bhāvī tad sāmarthya bhāvī gṛhīta grāhi tvāda pramāṇam eva na abhāvaḥ nāma pramāṇa antaram abhāvena pramāṇena mayā abhāvaḥ pratipannaḥ iti pratisvikoyam vyavahāraḥ lokasya tu yena mayā na upalabdhan darśana yogyam sat tena iha na asti tasya ca atra abhāvaḥ iti samāna arthaḥ vyavahāraḥ sā ca anupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣam eva iti vakṣyāmaḥ paramārthataḥ tu na abhāvaḥ nāma pramāṇa antarat na ca prameyam iti asiddhau dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad ātmake api śakti niyame 
[320,v_320,vii]	api ca yathā abhāvaḥ pramāṇa antaran tathā smṛtiḥ api syāt parokṣa tve pramāṇam eva smṛtiḥ iti ced na pramāṇa lakṣaṇa ayogāt parokṣa tve gṛhīte api kaḥ iva arthaḥ prasidhyati anumānasya vṛttiḥ hi dharmi sambandha vedanāt syāt etat parokṣa tve jñāne satyatredānīm pratyakṣasya anavasaraḥ iti anumānam pravarttayanti prekṣāvantaḥ tatas idam prayojanam parokṣa tva vedanasya iti smṛteḥ prāmāṇyam na etat yatas sambandha grahaṇa pakṣa dharmma samāśrayaṇa mātrakā deva anumāna pravṛtteḥ na hi kaścid dhūma ādi kārya darśana anantaram upajāyamāna anumāna vahni grahaṇe parokṣata antataḥ prāk eva avadhārayati avadhāreṇe vā prayojanam atha kadācid avadhāraya pratyeva kañcid iti ced tat api yat kiñcit tathā hi 
[320,viii_320,xi]	prayojakaḥ aṅaśaḥ kim kaścid kadācid katayā īkṣyate prayojakorthaḥ kiṅ kaścid kāraṇa tvat nivartate prayojakaḥ hi kāraṇam eva na ca anvaya vyatireka vyatikrame kāraṇa tvan tad lakṣaṇaka tvāt tasya api ca smaraṇena parokṣa tvam jñāpyate kasya vastunaḥ yasya anumānena gatiḥ tatra smaraṇa gocaraḥ 
[320,xii_321,ii]	anumāna kāla bhāvī hi yorthaḥ sa na smaraṇa gocaraḥ anyathā anumānasya vaiyarthyam arthāt āpatati parokṣa tayā tasya smutyā eva grahaṇāt parokṣatām eva tasya smṛtiḥ avagacchati na tat ātana sattām iti ced kasya tarhi sā para upakṣatā pratīyate pūrva gṛhītasya iti ced tad kāla avadheḥ eva vastunaḥ tarhi smaraṇam parokṣa tām vetti na anyasya iti vyarthakam evam smaraṇam smṛtvā parokṣa tāmpravarttate tatas pramāṇam smaraṇat nānu māna pravarttanāt iti ced smṛtvā pravarttate iti vicāryam etat kintad kāla sattāyām pravarttatethet ānīntanyām iti tad kāle yadi vartteta prāptum etat na śakyate prāpti arthī ca pravartteta prekṣā varttā eva na anyathā 
[321,iii]	idānīntanam astitvat na smṛtyā jñāyate tatas kathampramāṇa tā pūrva kāle arthe parokṣatā jñāyate sa ca prāptum aśakyaḥ athavā pratyakṣeṇa eva parokṣatā grahaṇam tad kāla avadheḥ grahaṇam yat pratyakṣeṇa tat eva uttara kāla pekṣayā parokṣa tvam iti tad ākāra tā tu saṃskāra balāt asya ātma bhūtā eva smaraṇasya tathābhūta arthaḥ eva asau iti ced na artha tā adhimuj adhimokṣa vaśāt eva tathā tattvavyasthitiḥ svarūpam hi sva samvedanena pratīyamānam arthaḥ iti vā narthaḥ iti vā na vyavasthām āpnoti tad uttarayā adhimuktyā tathā vyavasthā sā ca na asti smaraṇa ākāre tathā hi sorthaḥ yorthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvam ayantu punar ākāra dadānīm bhāvanā balādeva udaya bhāgi ti pratiyanti prekṣāvantaḥ 
[321,iv_321,v]	tasmāt sukha ādayorthānām sva saṃkrānta avabhāsinām vedakāḥ sva ātmanaḥ ca eṣām arthebhyaḥ janma kevalam yathā sva samvedana saṃskārāt upajāyāmānā smṛtiḥ ātma saṃkrānta artha ākārasya sāmvid ekā tathā sukha ādayaḥ api yatas te api bhāvanā saṃskāra samupanata antaram spraṣṭavya viśeṣasya ātma bhūtasya eva vedakāḥ kathantarhi rūpa ādika arthapekṣaṇam tad dvāreṇa tad anurūpa vāsanā prabodhāt 
[321,vi_321,viii]	spṛśya saṃssarga saṃbhūta sukha ākāra pravedanāt saṃskāraḥ jāyate tasya prabodhaḥ tasya dṛṣṭitaḥ āliṅgana sukha samvedana saṃskāraḥ hi gāḍhataram upajātaḥ punar tādṛśa rūpa darśanāt prabodham upagacchan tathābhūtam eva antara sparśa sukha samvedanam janayati etat eva darśayati artha ātmā sva ātma bhūtaḥ hi teṣa antaiḥ anubhūyate tena artha anubhava khyātiḥ ālambaḥ tu tad ābhatā 
[321,ix_321,x]	sva ātma bhūtaḥ eva antara spraṣṭavya viśeṣaḥ sukha ādibhiḥ anubhūyate tatra eva artha anubha vaḥ khyātiḥ anyathā para samvedane tena iti na sambandhaḥ bhavet tathā hi svarūpa anubhavaḥ yuktaḥ svarūpam hetutaḥ yatas parasya rūpa anubhavaḥ katham tasya pṛthaka kṛtaḥ anya rūpam hi na anyasya kathantasmāt prakāśate pradīpāt tu tathābhūta bhāsvara tva udayaḥ ghaṭe na tu prakāśāt vijñānāt prakāśa ūrthaḥ prajāyate kārya tāyām hi tad jñānāt avabodhaḥ katham bhavet 
[321,xiii_321,xiv]	yasya hi yat kāryan na tena kāraṇena tat avagamyate iti nyāyaḥ anyathā avabodhāt upajāyamānaḥ kāyikaḥ vyāpāraḥ tena veditaḥ bhavet tasmāt ātma rūpam eva vedayitum yuktam atha unmukhībhāvāt hi vedanam na sva samvedanāt tat ayuktam sva rūpam unmukhībhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ yadi jāyate arthasya atra kim āyātam yena asau veditaḥ bhavet arthāt api unmukhībhāvaḥ tasya iti evam atha ucyate cakṣuṣaḥ api unmukhībhāvaḥ tasya tat vedanan na kim cakṣuṣā urtha unmukha tvañcet arthasya iti katham mati artha unmukhya pratītiḥ tu pratīterthe bhavet iyam 
[321,xvii_322,i]	na hi apratīyamāne svarūpeṇa arthe tad unmukha tā pratītiḥ pratīyate ced arthaḥ svayam kim idānīm samvedanāt mukhyena na khalu siddha upasthāyī tad upayogī tena vinā arthasya pratibhāsanā pratīteḥ iti ced tena tarhi saha eva pratibhā samānatāḥ tu kevalam na tu tatas param tatas tasya grahaṇam iti yācita ka maṇḍanam etat aparaḥ kaścid bahis sthitān eva sukha ādīn apracetanān grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛt yuktaḥ dvaya grahaḥ 
[322,ii_322,iv]	niyamena iti vākya śeṣaḥ na hi nīla ādi vat svatantram ālambanat niyamena anyena eva saha nīla ādinā sukha ādi gṛhyate iti kāraṇam asti atha sukha duḥkha dirūpa pradhāna vipariṇati rūpāḥ ete sukha ādayaḥ tathā hi prakriyā pradhānāt mahān mahataḥ haṃkāraḥ haṃkārāt pañca tanmātrāṇi pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañcakarmendriyāṇi manaḥ ca pañcatanma ātremyaḥ pañca mahābhūtāni iti etāvat eva sakalam vikāra jātam prakṛti svarūpa anvayī ca vikāraḥ tat yathā mṛd vikāra ghaṭa ādikaḥ atra ucyate sukha ādya bhinna rūpa tvāt nāla ādeḥ ced sakṛdagrahaḥ bhinna avabhāsinoḥ grāhi añcetasoḥ tad abhedi kim sukha ādi rūpa pradhāna rūpāḥ eva sukha ādayaḥ iti kutas etat tad rūpa anvaya darśanāt iti ced tathā hi mṛd vikārāḥ tad anvayinaḥ dṛśyante 
[322,v_322,vi]	nanu anaikāntikam etat bherī daṇḍa saṃyogāt upajāyate śābdaḥ na ca bherī daṇḍa rūpā anvayī yadi api vāyoḥ aṇūnām śabdasya śabda tva āpattiḥ iṣyate tathā api na siddham etat atha mṛd vikāra vat samāna jātīyam atra api kāraṇam parikalpyate evantarhi yat kiñcit kāryantat rūpam tat sarvam vijātīyāt yathā śabda ādi kāryañca ghaṭa ādiḥ tat api vijātīyāt eva kulāla ādi kañca vijātīyam sat sajātīyāt eva sakalam udaya vat iti na vyāptiḥ sajātīya vijātīyāt vodaya vat iti viparyaya siddhiḥ na asahāyam sajātīyam kāraṇandṛśyate kvacid atha sakalam eva sukha ādi anvitam dṛśyate tena sukha ādi svabhāvam eva kāraṇam mṛd vikārāṇām mṛd piṇḍa vat uktam atra sahāyasya api aparasya kāraṇa tvāt tad samāna asamāna jātīyam prasaktaṅkāraṇam iti na pradhāna siddhiḥ 
[322,vii]	api ca sukha ādīnām api grāhyatā ādi anvayāt aparam grāhyam pradhānam sidhyati tatas paryante grāhya tā avastu tvam ityādi kāraṇam syāt atha tat api sukha ādi ātmakam sukha ādi ātmaka tvāt anvayinaḥ padārtha ādi tvasya evantarhi ghaṭa ādi ātmaka tvāt sukha ādīnām ghaṭa ādi ātmaka tvam pradhānasya prasaktam atha iṣyate eva sarva ātmaka tvantasya yadi sarve eva vikāra grāmaḥ pradhāna ātmani tena eva ātma rūpeṇa paraspara vyāvṛttena vedyate kaḥ iva atra prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāva mātrakam iti ced āvirbhāvaḥ vikāraḥ tirobhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ koyam āvirbhāvaḥ nāma koyantirobhāvaḥ vyaktiḥ āvirbhāvaḥ nāma koyantirobhāvaḥ vyaktiḥ āvirbhāvaḥ tad abhāvaḥ tirobhāvaḥ iti ced kā iyam vyaktiḥ dṛśya ātma tā tad abhāva unupalabdhiḥ tirobhāvaḥ iti 
[322,viii_323,ii]	nanu siddha svabhāve pramāṇe na tasya anupalabdhiḥ iti śakyam asiddhau tu abhāvaḥ eva utpattiḥ iti na pradhāna siddhiḥ yadi ca anupalabdhāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ pūrvam evam bhūtāḥ eva tiṣṭhanti kimpradhāna kāraṇa parikalpanena sukha ādi rūpa tā eva eṣām pradhānam iti ced na sukha ādi rūpa tāyāḥ bhedena grahaṇāt bhinna avabhāsi manaḥ grāhyañca katham abhinnam api ca tasya aviśeṣe bāhyasya bhāvanā tāratamyataḥ tāramyañca buddhau syāt na prīti paritāpayoḥ 
[323,iii_323,iv]	yadi bāhya nīla ādi rūpāḥ eva sukha ādayaḥ na tarhi nīla ādi vat eva bhāvanā viśeṣataḥ prīti paritāpa ādi viśeṣa sambhavaḥ na khalu nīla ādi svarūpa nirbhāsaḥ bhāvanā viśeṣataḥ viśiṣyamāṇaḥ upalabdhaḥ tathā ced bhāvanā anvayam eva sakalam āntarambāhyañca iti bhāvanā bala prabhavam atattvam eva sakalam jagat iti āpatitam bahīrūpeṇa ca pratibhāsa prasaṅgaḥ yadi bāhyaḥ sukha ādayaḥ bhrāntiḥ iyam iti ced na bhrānti kāraṇa ādarśanādabādhanāt ca sukha ādi ātmatamayā buddheḥ api yadi avirodhitā saḥ idānīṅ kathambāhyaḥ sukha ādi ātmā iti gamyate 
[323,v]	syāt ayabhiprāyaḥ pradhāna pariṇati svabhāvāḥ yathā śabda ādayaḥ tathā buddhiḥ api atas ātmanā buddhi rūpa sukha ādi vedane niyamena abahīrūpa vedanam bhāvanā tāratamyataḥ buddhi tāratamye sukha ādīnām api tad ātmanā tāratamyam bhāvanā hi nāma ahaṃkāra manaḥ pravarttitā sa ca ahaṅkāraḥ buddha āvaham iti manasaḥ ca saṅkalpa ātmaka tvāt saṃkalpa kamanaḥ eva bhūyas bhūyas bhāvanā tatas buddhiḥ sātvikā ahaṅkāra para adhīnām sukha ātma tā pratipannā satī tathā prakāśate yadi evambāhya rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti katham avagatiḥ bāhyānām api śabda ādīnām pradhāna pariṇati rūpa tvāt iti api na saṅgataḥ samādhiḥ 
[323,vi_323,vii]	etat eva kutas jātam pradhāna pariṇāmataḥ śabda ādyāḥ sambhavanti ete na tad rūpa anvaya īkṣaṇam yadi śabda ādīnām buddhi vat sukha ādi anvayaḥ pramāṇataḥ avadhāryeta tadā kāraṇa anvayi kāryam iti tathābhūta kāraṇa janya tām jānīyāt jagat nivāsī janaḥ sukha ādi rūpa pradhāna vipariṇateḥ eva tathā niścayaḥ iti ced itaretara āśrayaṇam eva etat tathā hi 
[323,viii_323,x]	pradhāna pariṇāmi tve jñāte asya syāt sukha āditā sukha āditā parijñānāt śabda ādeḥ tattva niścayaḥ pradhāna pariṇāmi tve śabda ādīnām sukha ādi anvayaḥ sukha ādi anvaye ca niścite pradhāna pariṇati rūpa tā iti eka asiddhau ubhayasya aprasiddhiḥ api ca yadi nāma agni pariṇati rūpa tā dhūmasya tathā api kintasya ujjvala tvam prasidhyati pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt na evam iti ced samānam śabda ādiṣu 
[323,xi_323,xiii]	syāt etat a yadi śabda ādayaḥ na sukha rūpāḥ syuḥ teṣām grāhikā na buddhiḥ syāt bhinna jātīyayoḥ grāhaka tā ayogāt atra ucyate agrāha grāhaka tvāt ced bhinna jātīyayoḥ pumān agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tatas hīyeta bhoktṛtā na hi pumān śabda ādi samāna jātīyaḥ tasya apradhāna ātmaka tvāt sukha ādīn ān tu viparyayāt bhavatu tasya āgrāhaka tvam iti ced na bhoktṛ tva abhāva prasaṅgāt bhoktā hi puruṣaḥ iṣyate na ca anubhavāt aparam bhoktṛ tvam 
[324,i_324,iv]	kārya kāraṇa tā anena pratyuktā kutas akārya kāraṇe grāhya grāhaka tā bhāvāt bhāvenyatra api sā bhavet buddhi śabda ādi sukhe grāhya grāhaka tāyāḥ bhāvāt eva yatas nīla ādiḥ su a ākāra arpaṇena buddhi jananāt grāhyaḥ na anyathā grāhyatā kārya kāraṇa tā bhāvāt tatas grāhya tayā eva kārya kāraṇa tā sidhyati sā ca grāhyatā kāryatva dāyikā puṃsi api śabda ādīnām iti sa ca api kāryanteṣām bhavet na tathā iti anekāntaḥ 
[324,v_324,vi]	athavā kārya kāraṇa tānena pratyuktā asiddha tvāt iti āha akārya kāreṇa buddhi sukhe grāhya grāhaka tāyāḥ bhāvāt na hi yatra grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ tatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ puruṣa śabda ādi sukhayoḥ iva atha buddhi sukha ādīnām grāhya grāhakam āvāt eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tatvāt eva tarhi sā kārya kāraṇa tā evam sati puṃsi api kārya tā prasaṅgaḥ iti aniṣṭam anaikāntika tā vā tena eva 
[324,vii_324,xii]	athavā na kārya kāraṇe buddhi sukhe grāhya grāhaka tāyāḥ abhāvāt bhāve vā sā anyatra api bhavet tasmāt te āntarā eva samvedya tvāt ca cetanāḥ kutas samvedanam na yadrupanna hi tat tasya vedanam bāhya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt āntara tvena eva samvedyamāna tvāt yat yathā vedyate vastu tat tathā eva upagamyate samvedanam vinā na asti bhāvānāmbhāva nirṇṇayaḥ 
[324,xiii]	na hi yat rūpam samvedanan na bhavati tat tasya vedanam na ca sukha ādīnāmbāhya rūpa anurūpam vedanam anyathā vedanam anyathā padārthaḥ iti na yuktam na hi nīlasya vedanampītasya iti yuktam tathā samvedanam sva vid rūpa tayā pravarttamāne sva vid rūpa tām eva āvedayate na hi pareṇa pratīyamānāḥ sukha ādayaḥ vedyaṃte rūpa ādayaḥ tu cakṣuḥ ādivatyāḥ vedyante iti asamvedana rūpāḥ athavā nirākāraṇe na gṛhyante sukha ādayaḥ tatas sukha ākāreṇa eva vedyante iti sukha ākāra tā vijñānasya siddhā tad antargatam sukhambodha rūpam eva iti siddham ghaṭa ādi vat eva tarhi sukha ādayaḥ api bāhyāssyuḥ na yuktam evam ghaṭa ādi ākārasya vijñāna ātma bhūtasya api para upadhānena utpatteḥ bhāvanāyāḥ tatra vyāpāra apratīteḥ sukha ādi ākārasya bhāvanā balataḥ prakṛṣyamāṇa tvāt na para upadhāna adhīna tā 
[324,xiv_325,iii]	nanu bhāvanā adhīna tāyām api na samvedana rūpa tā sukha ādīnām atad svabhāvena anubhavena vedanāt na hi bhāvanātaḥ prakṛṣyamāṇāḥ api sukha ādayaḥ samvedana rūpāḥ atra ucyate atad svabhāva unubhavaḥ bauddhān tān samavaiti ced sva samvedana tve hi sati bodha rūpa tā sukha ādīnāt na pareṇa ātmanā atad ākāreṇa atas kārya tā api na bhavati puṃsaḥ tad ākāratā utpanna tvena tasya kārya tā bhavet na ca asau asti tasya atad ākāra tvāt atad svabhāvaḥ eva hi buddhi antargatam sukha ādikam anubhavaḥ vā iti samavaiti vā tatas samavāya sambandhāt ekatva abhimānaḥ samvedanasya buddheḥ ca muktvā adhyakṣa smṛta ākārām samvittimbuddhiḥ atra kā kā iyam buddhiḥ adhyavasāyaḥ kim idam samvedanam anubhavaḥ 
[325,iv]	nanu bhede pramāṇe sati evam ucyate adhyavasāyaḥ samvedanam iti ca paryāya mātram viṣaya ākāra tā asam vedana ātmikā buddhiḥ anākāra samvedanam bodha rūpam iti ced anākāram samvedanam iti na atra pramāṇam apratyakṣā samvittena pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti ced anākāra samvedanam iti na atra pramāṇam apratyakṣā samvid tena pramāṇa bhāvaḥ iti ced na abhyupagamasya ahetutvāt na hi pratyakṣa abhāvenu mānam api tatobhyupagamaḥ eva na yuktaḥ atha aparam samvedanam vinā sukha ādīnām avedana prasaṅgaḥ iti ced sva samvedana tayā vedane kaḥ virodhaḥ tāvatā eva ca samāptaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti vyartham aparam 
[325,v_325,vii]	atha api syāt yadi samvedanam aparat neṣyate tadā mokṣa avasthāyām sukha duḥkha vinirmuktaḥ katham muktaḥ bhaviṣyati svabhāvasya parityāge dharmi lopaḥ prasajyate na hi sva ātmā hātum śakyam vyatiriktāḥ tu sukha ādayaḥ viveka adhyāra upagocarīkṛtāḥ śabdāḥ eva hātum yadi nāma abhedena idanīntana avasthāyām pratīyante yadi nāma idam iṣṭantathā api pramāṇa aprasiddhan na sidhyati na hi iṣṭam mama na sidhyati iti apramāṇa korthaḥ bhavati siddha viṣayaḥ na ca kāraṇāni iṣṭim anuvarttante na ca asya arthasya kāraṇam asti iti pramāṇam atra kiñcat idānīm eva bhāvanā āptau leśasya hāni dṛṣṭeḥ samvedana antaram eva idānīn tathā bhūtam upajāyate na tu sukha ādeḥ samvedanāt bheda avagamaḥ evam muktā avasthāyām api iti na virodhaḥ tasmāt 
[325,viii_325,ix]	tān tān arthān upādāya sukha duḥkha ādi vedanam ekam āvirbhavat dṛṣṭanna dṛṣṭantu anyat antarā nanu buddhi sukha dukha ādayaḥ iti vyapadeśa bhedāt eva bhedonyathārtha bhedam antareṇa katham vyapadeśa bhedaḥ na ekam eva idam harṣa viṣāda ādi aneka ākāra vivartamya śyāmaḥ tatra yatheṣṭam saṃjñāḥ kriyantām avasthā bheda pratyāyana artham eva bheda vyapadeśaḥ vīja aṅkura patra nāḍa vyapadeśa vat 
[325,x_325,xi]	saṃsarggāt avibhāgaḥ ced ayaḥ golaka vahni vat bheda abheda vyavasthā evam utsannā sarva vastuṣu yadi dṛṣṭānta uḥ ti iti etāvatā eva saṃsṛṣṭa dvayam etat iti pramāṇam antareṇa eva kalpyate tathā sati sarvatra eka ākāra pratipatti ke stambha ādau na ekatva prasiddhiḥ eka tā prasiddhau ca tad samudāya rūpasya aneka tvasya api na prasiddhiḥ iti utsīdet sakala bhāva vyavasthā eka aneka vyatirekeṇa bhāvasya abhāvāt tathā hi 
[325,xii_326,ii]	abhinna vedanasya aikye yat naivantadvi bheda vat sidhyet asādhana tvesya na siddhambheda sādhanam tasmāt ekā siddhau dvayoḥ api asiddhiḥ tasmāt abhinna vedanam eva tad viparyayāt anekam iti yuktam sām khya sya tu bhinna ābhassita duḥkha ādirabhinnaḥ buddhi vedane abhinna ābhe vibhinne ced bheda abhedau kim āśrayau 
[326,iii_326,v]	iti antaraḥ cokaḥ atha api syāt yathā vedanā cetān ādīnān caittānām mahā bhūmikā ādīnāt na parasparambhedaḥ upalabhyate athavā anupalakṣaṇe api bhedaḥ iṣyate tathā buddhi samvedanayoḥ api kinneṣyate abhinna vedanam ekam iti citta parikara bhūtaḥ ca etaiḥ anekāntaḥ tatra edam ucyate tiraskṛtānām paṭunā api ekadā bheda darśanāt pravāhe cita caittānām siddhā bheda vyavasthitiḥ 
[326,vi]	na evam abhyupagamyate cittebhyaḥ caitasā na anyāḥ iti vacanāt abhyupagamya parihāraḥ yadi api ekena paṭutara vṛttinā cetanā ādi tiraskṛtam na paṭutara upalabdhi viṣayaḥ tathā api anyadā upalabdhi viṣayaḥ iti bhinnam eva vedanā āditaḥ cetana ādikam anyadā sva rūpeṇa upalakṣamāṇa tvāt dinakara nikara parākṛta sva prakāśana śaktikam iva tārakā nikurumbam na tadā na asti na tu evam buddhi samvedanayoḥ ekadā api vivekasya spaṣṭa grahaṇam caitasāna antu kadācid kasyacid prakaṭībhūtasya grahaṇam 
[326,vii]	nanu vikalpa pratyayaḥ eva nimitta grahaṇa ādikam upalabhyate na avikalpake na tatra api santi eva caitasāḥ tathā hi kadācid anubhava anantaram nimitta vikalpaḥ kadācid idam kariṣyāmi ityādi vikalpaḥ tatonubhava anusāri vikalpatovasīyate santi avikalpāḥ api ca etāḥ iti tatas eṣām bhede yukti leśaḥ api vidyate na eṣaḥ api buddhi samvedanayoḥ iti parama arthaḥ 
[326,viii_326,x]	prāk uktam yoginām jñānanteṣa an tat bhāvanā mayam vidhūta kalpanā jālam spaṣṭam eva avabhāsate catur ārya sattya viṣayam yoginām jñānam prāk uktam kutas hetoḥ tat bhavati iti āha bhāvanā mayam bhāvanā hetukam bhāvanā balena ca spaṣṭa ābham spaṣṭa ābha tvāt eva avikalpakam tatas pratyakṣam nanu arthasya sāmarthyena samudbhavāt varttamāna artha viṣayam āvikalpakam iti yuktam atīta anāgata viṣayasya avidyamāna viṣayasya ca kathambhāvanā mātrāt avikalpaka tā bhāvanā api eva bhūta kārya samarthā eva iti darśayati avidyamāna viṣaye api athāḥ hi 
[326,xi_327,i]	kāma śoka bhaya unmāda caura svapna ādi upaplutāḥ abhūtān api paśyanti pura tova sthitān iva na hi abhūta viṣayam samvedanam artha sāmarthyate upajāyate na ca tat sa vikalpakam puras sthita tvena darśanāt tathā ca sākṣātkaraṇa kāratayā avikalpakam pratyakṣam atha sa vikalpakam api sat spaṣṭa ābhanna avikalpakam iti ced tat na na vikalpa anubaddhasya spaṣṭa artha pratibhāsitā svapne api smaryate smārttam na tat tādṛś arthavat 
[327,ii]	vikalpasya parokṣa viṣayam eva rūpam iti pratipāditam tat ca yadi na syāt tat eva savi kalpakat na bhavet svapne api vikalpāḥ parokṣa viṣaya ākārāḥ samvedyante na ca te spaṣṭa avabhāsinaḥ viplava balāt tu spaṣṭa tāyāt na kiñcid svapna ādiṣu aspaṣṭam bhavet dṛśyante ca spapnenu bhūta smaraṇa ākārāḥ vikalpāḥ tasmāt na viplavāt vikalpasya api spaṣṭa tā tatas nirvikalpaḥ eva parisphuṭa ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ 
[327,iii_327,iv]	atra vaibhāṣikāḥ āhuḥ nanu vastuni pramāṇa prasiddhe bhāvanā balāt spaṣṭa ābhata iti yuktam bhāvanayā avidyā kāluṣya apagame svena rūpeṇa arthasya pratibhāsanāt avidyamāne tu na svarūpām iti kasya pratibhāsaḥ yoginā antu atīta anāgata viṣaya jñānam atīta anāgatasya vidyamāna tvāt atra āha aśubhā pṛthivīkṛtsnā ādi abhūtam api dṛśyate spaṣṭa ābhat nirvikalpañca bhāvanā bala nirmitam 
[327,v]	atattva manaskāra tvāt aśubha ādīnānna ākāśe pṛthivī ādīnām sambhavaḥ atha pṛthivī āt ayaḥ vi vidyante yogi pratyakṣaṇe dṛśyamāna tvāt na bhāvanā mātrataḥ eva yogī bhavati api tu śruta mayena jñānena arthān gṛhītvā yukti cintā mayena vyavasthāpya bhāvayatā antat niṣpattau yat avitatha viṣayantat eva pramāṇanta dyuktāḥ yoginaḥ tathā ca śamatha vipaśyanā yuga naddha vāhī mārgaḥ yaḥ gaḥ iti vacanam 
[327,vi]	tatra yoginām yadi api amī pratibhāsante tathā api kārya artham asau atattvarapa eva bhāvanā tatas atattva rūpeṇa eva teṣām amī pratibhāsante tena yadi yoginām a tattva rūpa tayā pratibhāsatante kathantāvatā sattvam tad smāt atattva rūpa tā eva teṣām yogi pratyaya pratibhāsanām api na hi pratibhāsa mātrāt tattvam api tu parīkṣātaḥ na ca kalpanā mātrāt udayam āsādayantī bhāvanā tattva pratipatti hetuḥ pramāṇa bala āyātā tu tathā iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tathā hi 
[327,vii_327,x]	bhāvanā mātra bhāvi tvam atattvam iti gīyate vastuddhāra pratīteḥ tu vastu nirṇṇayaḥ iṣyate bhāvanā mātrataḥ tu tasmāt bhūtam abhūtam vā yat yat eva abhibhāvyate bhāvanā pariniṣpattau tat sphuṭa ākalpa dhī phalam na hi sat eva bhāvyatenyasya api bhāvanā gocara tvāt tatas yadi yat eva abhibhāvyate tat tat sphuṭa ākalpa dhī phalam eva abhibhāvanam bhāvanā pariniṣpattau na hi bhāvanā anyathā bhavantī dṛśyate 
[327,xi_327,xii]	tatra pramāṇa samvādi yat prāk niṇarṇīta vastu vat tad bhāvanā jam pratyakṣam iṣṭam śeṣāḥ upaplavāḥ yat khalu bhāvanā bala bhāvi tve api avisamvāda sambhavi prāgnīrṇṇītavaḥ tu para loka catur ārya satti ādikam tat viṣayam eva pratyakṣam na tu kāma ādi viṣayam tad vispaṣṭa ābha tayā nirvikalpaka tve api upaplave eva etena svapna ādi jñānānām visamvādinām apratyakṣa tā eva 
[328,i_328,iii]	nanu bhāvanā balāt jñāna pratyakṣam iti sakala tīrthya saṅgata samvedana pratyakṣatā prasaṅgaḥ na hi teṣām bhāvanā na astiti śakyam etat tathā hi loka sādhāraṇaḥ yorthaḥ kasyacid sambhavet asau iti kid niyamaḥ nyāyam anatikramya varttate tatas ca teṣām api tī rtha kara antarāṇām bhāvanā prabhava pratyakṣa prasiddhā sva prakriyā prapañca antargatāḥ padārtha rāśayaḥ na bhavanti iti kutas etat tatas ca tad upadeśataḥ api vartitavyam anumāna ādinā bādhanāt na iti ced na 
[328,iv_328,vi]	atīndriyāḥ na samvedyān paśyanti ārṣeṇa cakṣuṣā ye bhāvān vacananteṣāt na anumānena bādhyate atha etat eva na jñāyate taiḥ idan dṛṣṭam iti yadi paśyanti na bādhyate etat vacanam yadi evambhagavatā api vyajñāyi satya ādikam iti kutas etat tat asat tāthāgate hi vacasi pramāsam vādaḥ īkṣyate pramāṇa bādhā tu anyeṣām atas draṣṭā tathāgataḥ 
[328,vii_328,x]	nanu pauruṣeyampramāṇam apramāṇam eva atīndriya irthe tat kathantena sādhanambādhanam vā arthasya atīndriyasya samāna viṣayā yasmāt bādhya bādhaka tā sthitiḥ atīndriye ca saṃsāri pramāṇan na pravarttate yogi jñānena api teṣāmbādhanam eva tathā hi tāthāgatam vacaḥ teṣām virodhena vyavasthite tad vacaḥ hetu vijñāna bādhita tvam prakāśayet 
[328,xi_328,xiv]	tat etat viparyaye api tulyam tat asat yatas atīndriya artham kathayet kevalam yadi vedakaḥ tad vacastaḥ pravartteta na kaścid api paṇḍitaḥ atīndriya artham hi vacaḥ sarveṣām eva vidyate paraspara viruddhañca tatas tatra apravarttanam tasmāt param pratipādayatā śakya paricchedaḥ eva itaraiḥ pratipādayitavyāḥ asambhavān naim iti ced yogi jñānam api tatra kutas sambhavati iti cintyam etat 
[328,xv_328,xxi]	vedaḥ svabhāva siddhaḥ vā yogī tad pratipādakaḥ iti cerd nirṇṇayaḥ bhāve vastuni atra pramā kutas atha śabda paricchadaḥ na upādeyaḥ tad arthinām iti ayuktat na duḥkhasya vicchitteḥ apradhāna tā na khalu sakala duḥkha vyapagamaḥ na upādeyaḥ tathā hi ātma ātmīya graha āveśāt jantūnānduḥkha saṅgatiḥ tasya vyapagame sarva duḥkhānām pralaya udayaḥ sukhānām api ced evanduḥkha abhāvaḥ param sukham yadi samvedayan āste sadā duḥkha viparyayam tatas param ṛpādeyaṅ kim anyat yukti saṅgatam pradīpasya iva nirvāṇam iti ced na apramāṇakam idam yatas 
[328,xxii^1]	dāha cheda ādinā jñānam vicchettum hi na śakyate tatas prabandha āvicchedāt āste eva nirākulam tām avasthā aṅgatasya asya vaimukhyam syāt vivekataḥ udvejanīye vaimukhyam yadi kasmin virodhitā śamatā darśinaḥ tasya vaimukhyam api kiṅkṛtam na asya pīḍā kṛtaḥ kecid samādhi bala bhāvinaḥ kṣudh duḥkha ādi samādhānāt sarvam eva pratyīyate śastra ādi pīḍā api tatas sarvā eva asya pratīyate bhāvanā balataḥ sarva śaurya dherya ādi sambhavi dhṛtimvinā hi na āhāraḥ kasyacid paripuṣṭaye dhṛteḥ yogāt tu yaḥ kaścid āhāra paripuṣṭaye vinā api ca evamārādasya athasya āpti sambhavaḥ 
[328,xxii^2]	janma antara ādi samvittiḥ abhyāsāt eva jāyate tatas karmma phala jñānam tatas sarvasya vedanam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya viśeṣeṇa viniścaye atīta anāgata jñānam asya bhāvi parisphuṭam bhāvanā avalataḥ jñānambāhyānām api bhāvi ced tat etat iṣyatesmābhiḥ sarva ākārantu tāyinām sthira madhya akṣaṇambhāva nairātmya ādi pravedanam rāga ādi vyākula tvāt na tīrthyānām vedanan tathā evam bhūta artha vacasaḥ tad karttuḥ jñāna vat gatiḥ pariśuddhamvacaḥ na asti pariśuddha vidamvinā sva tarka anusmṛteḥ eṣa prapañcaḥ kcasām yadi bhāvanā jñānam api asti sat artha ūnādaraḥ na hi tatosya vīta rāga tve sarva artha jñāna sambhavaḥ
[328,xxii^3]	 samāhitasya sakalam cakāsti iti viniścitam sarveṣām vīta rāgāṇām etat kasmāt na vidyate rāga ādi kṣaya mātre hi taiḥ yatnasya pravarttanāt tad nivṛttau tatas teṣāṅa kṛtārtha ātma abhimāninām yatnaḥ na eva uttaraḥ tāvat viśrānti sukha lipsayā punar kāla antare teṣām sarvajña guṇa rāgiṇām alpa yatnena sarvajña tvasya siddhiḥ avāritā pradīpasya iva nirvāṇam iti ced tat na sambhavi niṣkleśe hi ātmani kutas tasya vairāgya sambhavaḥ prekṣā pūrva kṛtaḥ tasya tad ādhikyena vāñchitam yadi tasya api kim hānim asau vāñchāyanā dṛtaḥ na vīta rāgasya sukham yoṣit āliṅgana ādi jam vīta dveṣasya
[328,xxii^4]	tu kutas śatru senā vimarda jam vīta mohasya na sukham ātmīya abhiniveśa jam tatas kintā dṛśā tena kṛtyam mokṣeṇa janminām tat etat asat ava ittham madya pāna ādi cintyatām madya pāna ādi sukham dvijāḥ na atra asti santatam purīṣa bhakṣaṇa sukhat nāgara kroḍa janminām āma mānuṣam āsiddhi sukhat na eva asti arakṣām svāmi prasāda ādi sukham kim abhṛtyasya vidyate śirasaḥ tāḍana sukha nnādāsasya vikāśa vat iti sarvam idam prārthyam āyātam adhimuktiṣu na apārasīke mātrā ādi śroṇī saṅgamaḥ iti api aprāptasya ca avīcim tad viyoga sukham kvacid tatas naraka pāta ādi sa vaṃmiṣyeta janmibhiḥ 
[329,xxi_329,xxii]	atha viśiṣṭam iṣyate sukhan tathā sati tat eva asmad īpsitam āyātam atha sarva vedanasya katham sambhavaḥ katham vā tatra samvādaḥ katham vā sakala vedane sakala rāga ādi para citta sākṣāt karaṇena rāga ādita ādayaḥ doṣaā iti āha aneka upāyam adbhāvāt kāla vaipulya yogataḥ abhyāsāt sarva vid tvasya prāptiḥ asya iti yuktimat 
[329,xxiii_329,xxv]	asaṅkhyepa kalpa tayā abhyāsaḥ hi kintat asti yat na prāpayati samvādaḥ tu punar asmākam sarva vedanam prati na astotīṣyate etra etat tathā ca uktam asarva vid sarva vidam kaḥ katham tvām avabhātsyate svayam vidita māhātmya vistarāya namaḥ stute na asarva jñaḥ sarvajñam jānīte tathā mā bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalam praviṇotu aham vā praviṇuyām yaḥ vā syāt yadvidhaḥ iti 
[329,xxvi_329,xxix]	sarva vedate tu sarva ātmanā para santāna rāga ādi vedane rāga ādimattvam iti na sat tathā hi para santāna samvittau vīta rāgi tva vedane tasya rāgi tvam api asti iti etat atyanta durghaṭa yadā eva asau rāgī para rāga vedane tathā para vīta rāga vedane vīta rāgaḥ api ubhayam api tadā eva iti ced na ekanā api anubhūta tva abhāve rāgaḥ kathammataḥ taṭa sthasya hi samvittaḥ na rāgi tva ādi sambhavaḥ 
[330,i_330,iii]	tathā hi na ghaṭa vedane ghaṭī bhavati evam rāga ādayaḥ api para santāna antargatāḥ taṭa stha tayā avagamyamānāḥ na rāgi tvat nirvarttayanti atha sarva ātmanā vedane yathā svayam vetti asau tathā yogī api iti na rāgi tva hāniḥ tat ayuktam tad rṛpeṇa eva vedya tve svayam rāgi tva sambhave katham api avyavasthāpyam para rāga ādi vedanam 
[330,iv_330,vii]	na hi tad ātmā ananupraveśe para rāga ādi vedanam saḥ eva ātmīyaḥ rāgaḥ iti ayam api aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced tathā hi taṭa stha tvena vedya tve tattvena āvedanam bhavet tad ātmanā tu vedya tve rāgitā eva prasajyate tat asat tathā hi rāga ādinā para sthena tasya vāc kāya vikriyā para sthāḥ na bhavatthā iva tasya rāga ādi vāsanā 
[330,viii_330,x]	vāsanā sāmarthya āyātaḥ hi rāgaḥ rāgitam āvahati na para vāsanā abala āyātaḥ siddha upasthāyi tayā samvedyamānaḥ nanu svarūpa samvedane romāñca dikāya vikāraḥ api kasmāt asya na bhavati vacana vikāraḥ ca na sat etat kāya vācoḥ vikāra uyam vāsanā bala sambhavī prahīṇa vāsanasya asya dvayoḥ api na sambhavaḥ 
[330,xi_330,xiii]	nanu bhāvanā balāt eva para citta vedanam bhāvanā saṃskāraḥ ca vāsanā tatra bhāvanā saṃskāra sambhave kathat na vāsanāḥ na hi bhāvanā vāsanāyāḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ na yuktam etat tathā hi gamakasya viśeṣasya tātparyeṇa upalakṣaṇe viśeṣa pratibhāsosti para cittasya vedane liṅga viśeṣa upalakṣaṇe hi tatra bhāvanā vyāpāraḥ na ca tatra arthasya gamyasya bhāvanā satyām vā na ātma sambandhi tayā tatas tatra vāsanā abhāvāt pratibhāse api arāgitā 
[330,xiv_330,xvi]	anena aśuci rasa ādi vedane api doṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ apavitra tva yogaḥ syāt indriyeṇa asya vedane karma jena na ca anyena bhāvanā bala bhāvinā bhāvanā balāt rasanam utpādya yadi veda nam adoṣaḥ eva tadā na hi svapne agamyā gamane doṣaḥ asattya tā tasya tena adoṣaḥ iti ced samvāde sati katham asattyatā 
[330,xvii_330,xix]	yadā mātuḥ api svapnaḥ tathābhūtaḥ tadā bhavet tad āgamya āgatau doṣaḥ bhavataḥ kinna sambhavī tasmāt parama tamasat krameṇa vedane anādi vastunaḥ vedanam katham iti ced na akrameṇa eva sarva arthānām pravedanāt yathā sakala śāstra arthaḥ su abhyastaḥ pratibhāsate manasi ekakṣaṇena eva tathā ananta ādi vedanam 
[330,xxi_330,xxii]	yathā hi śāstra arthaḥ su abhyāsate eka kṣaṇaḥ eva manasi pratibhāti tathā ana ādi ananta vedanam api parimāṇavat tvāt śāstrasya iti ced na parimāṇa vat iti pratibhāsanam api tu abhyāsāt tat sakalam śāstra abhidheyam pratibhāsitam tena smaraṇe pratibhāti iti ced na apūrvasya api śāstra arthasya bhāsanāt nanu śāstra arthaḥ parasparam sambaddhaḥ tatra kenacid pratyāsatti nimittena aparam api pratibhāti na tu evam anādi anantānām iti katham apūvasya pratibhāsaḥ iti sarve samānam tathā hi 
[331,i_331,ii]	kārya kāraṇa sambandha vinābhūtāḥ na vidyate pratyāsattiḥ padārthānām vyavahāre api asau na kim kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi padārthānām śāstre pratyāsattiḥ tatas pūrvasya pratibhāsanam evam ca vyavahāre api tulyaḥ tathā hi ayam asya vikāraḥ evaṃbhūtena asya kāraṇena bhavitavyam tat ca kāraṇam iyat kāryāṇām pāramparyeṇa janakam 
[331,iii]	īdṛśāni asya pūrvāṇi yena asya sahakāriṇaḥ na santi santi vā iti etat para citta vidīkṣate pūrva janma ādi vittau ca pāraṃparyāt parasparam sambaddham sarvathā vetti tatas kalpa antarāṇi api kalpāt kalpa antara utpattau kārya kāraṇa tā vidā vetti sarvam jagattatvam tasya ca avāntara sthitim iti sakala padārtha vedanam sa kalanayān avadhūya darśitam iha nayam anusṛtya yat parantat api sukhena paraiḥ parīyatām 
[331,viii]	yadi bhāvanā balataḥ spaṣṭa ākāram pramāṇaṅ kalpanā jñānat na tarhi pramāṇam spaṣṭa ākārasya abhāvāt atha arthe aspaṣṭa ākāra tā iṣyatenyathā na pramāṇam svarūpe api tarhi iṣyatām na svarūpantadeva spaṣṭa ākāram arthaḥ tu na tathā tatas svarūpe tad nirvikalpakam arthe tat sa vikalpakam iti smaraṇam artha smaraṇam svarūpe pratyakṣam kutas etat svarūpe tat abhra antam arthe bhrāntam iti svarūpasya ananya samvedya tvāt para rūpasya tu vedanā antareṇa tatas tena tasya anyathā vedanāt bādhā tatas bhrāntiḥ na hi svarūpe smaraṇasya saṃbhavaḥ tadā eva tasya utpatteḥ vedanāt ca yadi ca svarūpam api pūrvam āsīt idānīm na asti iti na idānīm smaraṇam bhavet atha tena eva idānīm smaraṇam tat idam āyātam mṛtena api kukkuṭena vāsitavyam atas eva āha 
[331,ix_331,xiii]	kalpanā api sva samvitta āviṣṭāḥ na arthe vikalpanāt svarūpasya avikalpa tvāt parokṣa tva aprasiddhitaḥ tena eva tasya grahaṇe sākṣātkaraṇa saṃbhavāt atas eva samvedanam pratyakṣa muktam yatas śabda artha grāhi yat yatra tad jñānantatra kalpanā svarūpaḥ ca na śabda arthaḥ tatra adhyakṣam atokhilam 
[331,xiv_331,xv]	sa vikalpasya itarasya ca svarūpan na śabda arthaḥ na sāmānyat na parama artha viṣayaḥ tathā sati śabda ayojanā abhāvāt sāmānya saṃsarga abhāvāt ca avikalpaṃka śabda artha grāhi ca jñānam kalpanā tasmāt avyaktam spaṣṭa abhatā kathat na bhavati spaṣṭam eva tat kim ucyate na iti yatas tad rūpasya parityāgāt aspaṣṭam iti gīyate svarūpasya parityāgaḥ katham iti avagamyatām 
[331,xvi^1]	na hi svarūpanti aktum śakyam tad parityāge samvedanat na asti iti uktam tathā ca na svarūpa samvedanam na para samvedanam iti sarva abhāvaḥ eva atha artha apatyāḥ vedanam iti na svarūpa vedanam na arthāpatteḥ api svarūpam samvedanena eva gantavyam atha atra api arthāpattiḥ sā api tathā iti anavasthā artha samvedane siddhe yadi arthāpattiḥ kimartha saṃvedane arthāpattyā arthe siddhe na artha saṃvedane siddhaḥ iti ced kā iyam arthasya siddhiḥ yadi utpattiḥ sarva artha vedana prasaṅgaḥ atha artha jña ananta dāyam arthaḥ artha jñānāt artha jñāna vedanam iti sādhvī vācā uyaktiḥ atha arthāt jñāpanāt artha jñāna vedanam kim idam arthasya
[331,xvi^2]	jñāna tvam jñāne pratibhāsanañceta ajñāte jñāte jñāna pratibhāsanaṅkatham jñāyate pratibhā samāna ūrthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva iti ced pratyakṣa prasiddhiḥ ced tathā eva astu kimartha antara kalpanayā idam eva pratyakṣam anyathā ghaṭeta yadi pratyakṣam jñānan na syāt cakṣuḥ vyāpāre sati etat bhavati anyathā na iti kim jñānena śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam iti ced kā iyam śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ jñānam iti ced tat jñānam parokṣam katham jñātam śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ eva jñānam iti ced śrota ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣā tena jñāyate jñānam tu kutas anyathā kim śrotra ādi vyaktyā iti ceta kim bhavataḥ prayojanam apekṣya bhāvāḥ bhavanti 
[332,i_332,ii]	kāraṇāt eva bhāvānām bhāvaḥ na eṣām prayojanāt prayojanamvitā bhāvaḥ na bhavet anyathā tava yadi nāma aśrotra samat makhī bhatam jñānasya kim āyātam yadi jñānanna udapatsyata parokṣaḥ eva arthaḥ syāta yadi jñānamat pannam arthasya kim āyātantathā api parokṣaḥ eva syāt na hi jñānasya utpattiḥ arthasya pratyakṣatā parokṣa tva prasaṅgāta tasyāḥ parokṣa tvāta dṛśyate ced yathā tarhi dṛśyate tathā eva astu tava api katham iti ced tad ākāra tā jñānasya arthasya jñāta tvad nāma sā ca sva samvedana gamyā na tad ākāra jñāna antara gamyā yena anavasthā patet tasmāt sva samvedanam eva jñāna svarūpa sādhanam iti yuktam 
[332,iii_332,vi]	yadi tarhi bhāvanā balāt upajāta vaiśadyam pratyakṣam svapna jñānam api pratyakṣa prāptam avisamvādaka tvam api tatra asti eva tatra api gamana prāptayaḥ na etat asti yatas bhrānti samvṛti saṃjñānam anumāna anumānikam smārtta abhilāṣikañcā iti pratyakṣa ābham sa taimiram dvividhaḥ pratyakṣa ābhaḥ vikalpaḥ viplavaḥ ca punar caturvidhaḥ tat āha trividhaṅkalpanā jñānam āśraya upaplava udbhavam avikalpam ekañca pratyakṣa abhañcaturvidham 
[332,vii^1]	saḥ eva dvividhaḥ vikalpasya tridhā bhedāt caturvidhaḥ kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣantataḥ vikalpaḥ trividhaḥ api pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ tatra bhrānti jñānam mṛgatṛṣṇā ādiṣu toya ādi kalpanā pravṛtta tvāt pratyakṣa ābhāsam samvṛti satsvartha antara adhyāropāt tad rūpa kalpanā pravṛtta tvāt anumāna tad phala ādi jñānam pūrva anubhūta kalpanayā iti na pratyakṣam prabhāsvara spanda māna marīci nicaya pratibhāsam pratyakṣam eva toya ādi kalpanā tu pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ toye asākṣāt karaṇa ākāra tvāt samvṛti satsu api rūpa ādi grahaṇa mātram eva pratyakṣam avayavini
[332,vii^2_333,ii]	tu tad samavāya kāraṇa tvena abhimatena sākṣātkaraṇam artha antarasya sparśa ādeḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya adhyāropāt dravyasya vā pūrva pūrva pratyayena kalpitasya na avayavī rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa kvacid pratyakṣe pratibhāsitaḥ iti anumāna jñānam liṅga jñānam tat phalam liṅga jñānan na pūrva anubhūtim antareṇa etat ca anumāna jñānam kvacid apratyakṣam kvacid tu pratyakṣam eva akasmāt dhūmāt agni pratipattau na hi pūrva anubhūta kalpanā asti avikalpya katham liṅga pratipattiḥ iti ced tathā eva dṛṣṭeḥ na khalu dṛṣṭam anyathā bhavitum yuktam kasmāt punar kalpanā prabheda nirdeśaḥ udāharaṇa prapañca artha tvāt iti ced na lakṣaṇasya abhedāt prapañca mātra nirdeśe tu ati prasaṅga na etat asti anyat asti prayojanam iti tathā hi anakṣaja tu asiddhi artham ukte dve bhrānti darśanāt siddha anumādi vacanam sādhanāya eva pūrvayoḥ 
[333,iii]	akṣa jam eva tat iti pareṣa ambhra antiḥ mṛgatṛṣṇikā jala jñāne tathā hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyadeśyam avyabhicāri pratyakṣa miti atra lakṣaṇe marīci jala jñāna vyavacchedāya avi abhicāri grahaṇam kṛtam yadi punar anindriya jam eva tat syāt prathama padena eva vyāvarttanāt kim etad arthena avyabhicāri grahaṇena dvi candra ādi jñānasya anartha saṃbhatasya nivṛtti artham iti ced na artha sannikarṣa grahaṇena eva tasya vyāvarttanāt indriya grahaṇena anindriya jasya vyāvarttanam samvṛti sat viṣayasya tu indriya jatvā abhimānaḥ pareṣām sa vivādaḥ eva anumāna ādi vacanantarhi vyartham na hi tena anidra yaja tvam sādhyate siddha tvāt anumāna ādiḥ anindriya ja tu asya atra ucyate 
[333,iv_333,vi]	siddhasya api anumāna ādeḥ sādhana tvāt upātta tā dṛṣṭāntena hi siddhena sarvatra eva prayojanam na hi asiddham asiddhena sādhyate kim atra bhrānti kāraṇam yena sādhya tā pūrvayoḥ iti ced āha saṅketa saṃśrayānyārtha samāropa vikalpane pratyakṣa āsannivṛtti tvāt kadācid bhrānti kāraṇam 
[333,vii]	saṅketa saṃśrayaḥ vayavī saṃketa mātrasya tad vyavasthā hetu tvāt anya arthaḥ jalam samāropodhika adhya āropaḥ vikalpanam smaraṇam jalam hi pūrva dṛṣṭa tvāt smaryate na tasya āropaḥ eva kevalaḥ darśanasya samatayā bhāvāt athavā viparyayaḥ āropaḥ jalasya vikalpanam avayavinaḥ ubhayatra vā ubhayam iti te ca samāropa vikalpane pratyakṣasya indriya jasya āsannivṛttī kadācid abhavata iti īdam asanna vṛtti tvam vā tatra bhrānti kāraṇantaḥ eva vā tena bhrānti kāraṇam iti asmin bhrānti kāraṇe sati dṛṣṭānta dvāreṇa anumānam 
[333,viii_333,x]	yathā eva iyam parokṣa artha kalpanā smaraṇa ādikā samayā apekṣiṇī na artham pratyakṣam pratyavasyati tathā anubhūta smaraṇam antareṇa ghaṭa ādiṣu na pratyayonuyan tat ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate anumādi kalpanā hi sambandha grahaṇa apekṣiṇī sambandha grahaṇam eva ca samayaḥ tatassambandhāt parokṣa arthaṃpratipattiḥ iti na adhyakṣataḥ sākṣātkaraṇena hi sā bhavet evaṅ ghaṭa ādiṣu api ekena kenacid indriyeṇa rūpa ādi kampratipannantataḥ pariśeṣe rasa ādau smaraṇam pūrva anusārataḥ rasa ādau eva smaraṇam na avayavinī iti ced na rasa ādi vyatirekeṇa tasya anupalakṣaṇāt yat etat śuklantad eva karkaśam iti ādi eka tā pratipatti viṣayaḥ vayavī iti ced tathā hi na tāvat varṇṇasya sparśasya ca ekatā 
[334,i_334,ii]	tatas ekatva pratītiḥ eva va syāt yadi avayavī na bhavet yadi api avayavī tathā api katham varṇṇa sparśa ādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam na hi tayoḥ eka tā eka adhikaraṇa tvāt ekatā iti ced upacāraḥ eṣaḥ na ca atra upacāra pratipattiḥ pratipattau ca upacārasya na avayavi siddhi ssyāt anyathā api upacāreṇa sāmānya dhikaraṇya sambhavāt samāna deśatā bhāvāt eka artha viniyogataḥ tad vikāra vikāri tvāt ekatā vyapadiśyate 
[334,iii_334,vi]	yaḥ eva deśaḥ sparśasya saḥ eva rūpasya pratīyate tena aikatā adhyavasāyaḥ yat eva udaka ādi dhāraṇam sparśasya kāryantatra eva rūpasya api vyāpāraḥ spṛśye masṛṇa tām āpādyamāne rūpasya api ca ekacikya āditā tatas ekam eva idam iti vyavahāra adhyavasāyāḥ yadi punar anyat eva adhikaraṇam rūpa ādhibhyaḥ teṣa antasya vivekena pratipatyā bhāvyam apratīyam ānantu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam asat iti atha avayavinam antareṇa parasparasya kasmāt na vighaṭanam sati api avayavini etat kasmāt na vighaṭanam traye samavāya sambandha balāt tasya api astu viyogi tā ayam eva svabhāvaḥ ced ādau eva idam ucyate rūpa ādīnām svabhāvoyam sva hetoḥ upapatti bhāj samavāyasya nityasya kutas etat vicintyatām 
[334,vii]	yadi api avayavī paraḥ tathā api tritayam jātam kasmāt trayasya api parasparasya na vighaṭanam atha samavāyaḥ hetuḥ avighaṭane asau api kasmāt na vighaṭate tasya saḥ eva svabhāvaḥ iti api na uttaram rūpa ādīnām eva sa svabhāvoḥ tu kimartha antara kalpanayā rūpa ādīnāñca sva hetoḥ svabhāvaḥ iti yuktimat etat samavāyasya tu ahetukasya kutas svabhāvaḥ samavāya āśrayasya sva hetoḥ sa svabhāvaḥ yena samavāyaḥ evam iti ced tat kim anayā paramparayā taiḥ sva hetoḥ tathābhūtaiḥ bhāvyam yena samavāyaḥ teṣām avighaṭanam kuryāt tad hetuḥ eva tad avighaṭane hetuḥ iti kim atra nyūnam āste yad artham paramparā iṣyate evam etat dṛśyate iti ced bhavatu yadi dṛśyate dṛśyamānasya anyathā vikalpayitum aśakyatvāt rūpa ādayaḥ eva tu dṛśyante parasparam aviyuktā na tu tad adhikam iti eṣām eva sa svabhāvaḥ kalpyatām tasmāt avayavi adhyāropaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ 
[334,viii]	tat asya nyāya prapañcasya pradarśana arthan daṣṭānta dāṣṭa antika upanyāsaḥ sa taimirika grahaṇam kim artham taimiram api sa vikalpakam iti kaścid tad vyāvarttana arthantat vacanam anyathā smārtta ādi grahaṇena asya api grahaṇāt pṛthak upādānam anarthakam yadi avikalpa kaṅ kalpanā apoḍha tvāt pratyakṣam prāptam na sarvaṅ kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣam api tu abhra anta tve sati abhra antaṅ kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣam na sarvam yatas prakalpya apavāda viṣayam tad apavarjite tu utsargaḥ pravarttate kopa vādaḥ iti ced 
[334,ix_334,xi]	apavādaḥ caturthotra tena uktam upaghāta jam kevalantatra timiram upaghāta upalakṣaṇam trividhāt vikalpāt caturthan taimira grahaṇam apavādaḥ kalpanā apoḍham iti sāmānyena pratyakṣa vidhānam ataimiram iti viśeṣe pratyakṣa ābhāsa tā vidhānam viśeṣa vihitañca sāmānya vihitasya bādhakam kim atra pramāṇam sāmānya pratipattiḥ viśeṣa pratipattyā bādhyate yatas prāc adarśana mātreṇa anumānam śeṣavat yadā kalpanā apoḍha tā mātrāt vipakṣasya pravarttate tasya atīva prasaktasya viśeṣe bādhakam sphuṭam tatas tad aparatra eva tasya pūrvasya vṛttitā 
[335,i]	nahi sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam adarśana mātreṇa vipakṣasya anumānam apareṇa pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā na bādhyate tena pratyakṣa siddhaḥ sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ viśeṣe bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tad artha sūcakayoḥ api vacasoḥ saḥ eva bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ ācāryaḥ tarhi sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa anumānāt lakṣaṇam kasmāt āha na ācāryeṇa viśeṣataḥ dṛṣṭam eva anumānam abhipretam tasya tu yorthaḥ saḥ ekena vacasā nirdeṣṭum aśakyaḥ iti apavāda sahitam na uktavān kimarthantarhi kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇa sahitam eva abhrānta grahaṇan na kṛtam kiṅga ja snāna aṅgīkaraṇena sa taimira grahaṇena ca apavādena abhrānta grahaṇa arthaḥ labdha vyoni athā a iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ anantaram eva kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇasya labhyatām iti ced na viśeṣa abhāvāt 
[335,ii_335,v]	arthataḥ hi asamānānām ānantaryam akāraṇam bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ ca pramāṇa viṣayaḥ sūcitaḥ yathā syāt iti evaṅkāraṇam na hi avaśyambādhakam anantaram eva bhavati abhra anta grahaṇam eva kasmāt na kriyate iti ced sattyam etat sākṣātkāri hi pratyakṣan tat ca abhra anta grahaṇena śakyat nidarśayitum na hi asākṣāt karaṇa ākāram abhra antam sa vikalpakasya bhrānta tvāt pare tu sa vikalpam api sākṣātkaraṇa ākāram abhra antam icchati tad anurodhena dvayam etat ucyate tathā ca āha viśeṣaṇa lakṣaṇe parama tāpekṣam sava tu avikalpakāḥ eva iti athavā pratipattrapekṣaḥ saklaḥ bādhya bādhaka tānayaḥ adṛṣṭa bādhakaḥ pūrvam sāmānyena avagacchati 
[335,vi]	na ācārya abhiprāyañjānāti viśeṣotra abhimataḥ iti bādhaka darśanāt avagacchati asau api paścāt viśeṣam apauruṣeye tu vacasi pramāṇa mūla tva abhāvāt na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ pauruṣeye tu pūrva buddheḥ bhrānta tā jñāpyate pramāṇa mūlayā parayā buddhyā na tu vedāt bhrānta buddhi udayaḥ tathā veda pramāṇa tā sarvasya tathā tva prasaṅgāt abādhane pramāṇam eva iti ced na paścāt api bādhaka sambhavāt paryāya ālocaya tonyaḥ eva arthaḥ bhavati iti pramāṇe api evam iti ced na pramāṇasya sthira tvāt tathā ca pramāṇa viruddhaḥ āgama arthaḥ tyajyate veda vādibhiḥ anyathā arthavāda vyākhyānam anibandhanam syāt tasmāt pauruṣeyaḥ eva vacasi bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ taimiram iti eva bādhakan na kāmalā ādi iti ced āha sarvam eva tena upaghāta jamuktam timiram punar upaghāta upalakṣaṇat na upaghāta antarāṇām vyāvarttakam yatas 
[335,vii_335,ix]	taimirasya artha śūnya tvāt asākṣātkaraṇa tvataḥ pratyakṣa ābhāsa tāndatvā pratyakṣa tva nirākriyā sā ca artha śūnyatā kāmalā vahala avalepa lupta locana balānām vijñānasya na nyūnākalayā api tena upalakṣaṇam sa taimira grahaṇam iti nyāya vādibhiḥ avagantavyam timiram aśeṣa upaghāta upalakṣaṇam anye tu kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇam pratyudāharaṇam eva etat na apavādaḥ tat āha 
[335,x_336,i]	mānasantat apī iti eke teṣāṅ granthaḥ virudhyate nīla dvi candra ādi dhiyām hetu rakṣāṇi api iti ayam mānasam eva etat dvi candra ādi jñānam marīcikā jala jñāna vat tathā hi marīcikāsu prathamam indriya jñānam abhra antam eva upajāyate paścāt tu jala anubhava vāsanā prabodhāt sa vikalpakam jala jñānam sa ca prabodhaḥ marīci darśanāt eva sādṛśya bhājaḥ marīcayaḥ evaṃdharmāṇaḥ tathā atra api candra viṣayam abhra antam prathamam jñānam paścāt dvi candra ākāraḥ vikalpaḥ 
[336,ii_336,vi]	tatra kecid āhuḥ stimita akṣṇoḥ madhye sthātā saḥ ekaḥ candraḥ ubhaya pāśve krameṇa upalabhyamānaḥ kāla saukṣmyāt yugapad eva lakṣyate pārśva dvaye ca dvi tva adhyāropaḥ teṣāṅ grantha virodhaḥ yadi api indriya vijñapteḥ kāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ atad ābhatayā na asyāḥ akṣa vat viṣayoṇavaḥ te eva hi cakṣuḥ ādi paramāṇavaḥ tathā anyathā ca bhavantaḥ dvi candranīla ādi ābhāsa hetavaḥ dvi candra pratibhāsasya hi mānasa tve na indriya hetu toktiḥ samarthā atha mānasa tve paramparayā hetu tvam indriyasya na virudhyate sākṣāt hetu tvam indriyasya mānasa tvena viruddham dvi candra pratyaye atra ucyate pāramparyeṇa hetuḥ ced indriya jñāna gocare vicāryamāṇe prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ 
[336,vii]	indriya jñānasya gocaraḥ kaḥ iti paryanuyukte yatas sākṣāt indriya jñānam utpadyate tad ākāratayā anyathā vā iti pareṇa vaktavyam na tāvat tad ākāratayā viṣaya tvam asambhavāt paramāṇūnām ekadhana ākāra sthūla tva abhāvāt atha atat ākārasya api yaḥ hetuḥ sa viṣayaḥ tat api ayuktam indriya vat anya ākāra vijñāna hetu tve api aviṣaya tvam tatra yadi pāramparyeṇa hetu tvam abhipretam ācāryasya te eva hī tyādi vacasā tadā param prati na indiyasya viṣaya tām prasañjayet sākṣāt paramāṇūnām hetu tve viṣaya tvasya pareṇa ukta tvāt prasaṅgaḥ eva tarhi na yuktaḥ iti vaktavyam kim ucyate prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ 
[336,viii_336,x]	paraspara vivikta aṇu prathama pratibhāsanam vikalpakāt tu vijñānāt ghana ākāra avabhāsitā paraḥ prāha vikalpakasya vijñānasya eka ghana avabhāsitā tasya api pāramparyeṇa paramāṇavaḥ hetu tvāt viṣayaḥ yathā smaraṇasya artha viṣaya tā ācāryaḥ prāha atad ābhatayā na asyāḥ akṣa vat viṣayoṇavaḥ 
[336,xi_336,xiii]	yathā akṣāṇi paramparayā hetu tve api na viṣayaḥ tathā aṇavaḥ api anyathā bhavanti hi akṣāṇi dvi candra jñānasya pāraṃparyeṇa hetuḥ atra uktam indriya jñāna gocare vicāryamāṇe prastāvaḥ mānasasya iha kīdṛśaḥ iti na ca mānasa tve viṣaya nirūpaṇā sādhvī nirviṣaya tvāt tathā na atra pramāṇaṅ kiñcid iti yuktam uttaram ācāryasya na tu ati prasaṅga codanam tat eva uktam prastāvaḥ mānasasya ityādinā anye tu bruvate mānase dvi candra ādi jñāne yadā indriyāṇām kāraṇa tvam kathayati tadā mānasam eva prativiṣaya tva cintā syāt tatas ca prastāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ iti uttaram tat ayuktam iti pratipāditam kim vaindriyam yat akṣāṇām bhāva abhāva anurodhi ced tad tulyam vikriyāvat ced sā eva iyaṅ kinniṣidhyate 
[336,xiv]	yadi tāvat mānasam etat dvi candra ādi jñānam indriya bhāva abhāva anurodhi na syāt atha indriya bhāva abhāva anurodhi api mānasam eva etat tathā sati stambha ādi jñāneṣu api mānasatva prasaṅgaḥ prathamam su a ākāram eva jñānam paścāt artha ākāra tā manasi atha mānasam eva indriyam prasaktam aindriyasya api vikāraḥ eva iti ced dvayam api tarhi indriya jam prasaktam sākṣāt iti ced na aparasya vikārasya adarśanāt etad anusāreṇa tat api vikṛtam eva jñātavyam iti ced tat api mānasam eva iti vikṛta tvāt etadvat iti anavasthā tasmāt etat eva indriya jam 
[337,ii_337,iv]	sarpa ādi bhrānti vat ca asyāḥ syāt akṣa vikṛtau api nivṛttiḥ na nivartteta nivṛtte api akṣa viplave kadācid anya santāne tathā eva api eta vācakaiḥ dṛṣṭa smṛtim apekṣeta na bhāseta parisphuṭam yadi mānasī dvi candra ādi buddhiḥ akṣa vikṛtau api nivṛttiḥ akṣa vikāre hi sarpa bhrāntiḥ sati api vicāre nivarttate na dvi candra ādi bhrāntiḥ atha sarpa ādi bhrāntiḥ api śyāma tā ādi lakṣaṇāḥ na nivarttate samandhakāre hi pradeśe sarpa bhrāntiḥ tatra rajvādeḥ timiram antareṇa api śyāma tā ādi rūpa tā timiratiskāre tu cakṣuṣā unvathā bhūte api śyāma tā ādi rūpa tā sā katham akṣa vikāre api nivarttate tatas nivarttanam asiddham katham sādhanam 
[337,v_337,vi]	yat api ucyeta na nivartteta nivṛtte api akṣa viplave iti tat api asat na hi manasi api jala bhrāntiḥ nivṛtta akṣa viplavasya dṛṣṭā prabodhaka pratyayasya ātapa upatapta tvasya abhāve abhāvāt na ca anya santāne jala bhrānteḥ arpaṇan dṛṣṭam na asaṃtaptasya para vacanasya asau bhavati sarpa ākāra tā api na eva dṛṣṭa smaraṇam apekṣate śyāma tā āditāyāḥ prathamataram eva bhāvāt parisphuṭa pratibhāsanantu mānasyāḥ api bhrānteḥ svapna ādau asti eva tatas na bhāseta parisphuṭam iti sakalam etat ayuktam tad bhāva bhāvitā tad vikāra vikāritā tu pāramparyāt api kārye bhavati eva atra ucyate śyāma tā ādi avabhāsaḥ yaḥ tatra aindriyakaḥ eva sa anivṛtti ādayaḥ dharmāḥ tatra iti na sat uttaram 
[337,vii]	avaśyam hi śyāma tā ādi pratibhāsaḥ tatra aindriya jaḥ tad vikāra anivṛttau na nivarttate parisphuṭa tā api indriya janya tāyām eva na mānasa tve bhāvanā balāt ātapa upataptasya mānasa tāyām api iti ced parisphuṭa tāyām avikalpikā eva asau iti na indriyaja tvāt viśiṣyate tathā ca apavāda tvan timira grahaṇasya na vyāhanyate sa vikalpaka tvam hi mānasa tvāt abhipretam pareṣān na mānasatva mātram tathā hi avikalpakam ekañca iti etāvat mātram atra sādhyam dvividhaḥ pratyakṣa ābhāsaḥ vikalpaḥ nirvikalpaka viplavaḥ ca sā ca sa vikalpikā sakala bhrāntiḥ tadā vighaṭate na anyathā parisphuṭā api tarhi dvi candra ādiḥ bhrāntiḥ mānasī bhavatu iti ced na mānasī bhāvānām antareṇa bhāvāt bhāvanā balena hi mānasī sphuṭa tām bhajeta tad abhāvāt indriyaja tvat na śakyannivārayitum dvividham eva spaṣṭa ākāra tāyāḥ kāraṇam akṣam bhāvanā ca atra api bhāvanā vyavahitāḥ asti eva iti ced vyapagataḥ tarhi bāhya artha vādaḥ iti alamprasaṅgena 
[337,viii_338,i]	kā tarhi sarpa ādi bhrāntiḥ mānasī yasyāḥ dṛṣṭānta tvam jala ādi bhrāntiḥ ca upaghāta anugrāhaka tva avabhāvaḥ upaghāta anugrāhaka tva avabhāsaḥ hi akṣa vikṛtau api nivarttate eva nivṛtte api ca akṣa viplave na nivarttate eva cintayataḥ evam anyat api yojanīyam evañca suptasya jāgrataḥ vā api yā eve dhīḥ sphuṭa bhāsinī sā nirvikalpa ubhayathā api anyathā eva vikalpikā 
[338,ii_338,iv]	mānasa tvenyathā vā ubhayathā api avikalpaka tvam spaṣṭa tāyāt nirvikalpaka tvam iti pratipāditam etat tasmāt tasya avikalpe api prāmāṇayam pratiṣidhyate visamvādāt tad arthañca pratyakṣa ābham dvidhā uditam vikalpa bhrānta tābhyām dvidhā eva pratyakṣa ābhāsa tā darśita ācāryeṇa iti karaṇa vyavacchinnāt vikalpa vaśāt pṛthak taimira upalakṣitasya vipla va sya nirdeśāt anyathā pṛthak nidaśasya prayojana abhāvena akauśala tva udbhāvana hetu tā syāt 
[338,v]	kathantarhi tad uktam sa naḥ bhrānti viṣaya tvāt vyabhicāriṇaḥ para abhiprāyeṇa tasya ukta tvāt yasya hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇantasya manaḥ bhrānti viṣaya tā vyabhicāriṇaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate nahi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannasya eva vyabhicāritā sambhavati pāriśeṣyāt manasā yat adhikasya vikalpanantatra vyabhicāraḥ 
[338,vi_338,viii]	nanu artham antareṇa indriya mātrāt yat uti adyate tasya api vyabhicāritā tat kim manaḥ bhrānti viṣaya tvāt iti vacanam na tasya artha grahaṇena nirākṛt tvāt vidyamānam api tad avidyamāna kalpam eva tathā ca uktam indriya artha udbhave na asti vyapadeśya ādi sambhavaḥ iti vyapadeśya ādayaḥ mānasāḥ eva iti pratipattavyam 
[338,ix_338,xi]	nanu na vyāvarttakamvacanam avyapadeśya ādi kintarhi svarūpa kathana param tad indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannanta devambhūtambhavati na anyathā na vyavasāya ātmakam iti anirdeśa prāpteḥ nahi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam eva vyavasāya ātmakam anumānasya api vyavasāya ātmaka tvāt tasmāt yat vyavasāya ātma kantat adhyakṣam anyat tu na bhavati iti vyāvarttaka tā eva yuktā atha kiñcid vyāvartta kaṅ kiñcid svarūpa kathanam iti tena yadi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam vyavasāya ātma kañcet tat avyābhicāri bhavati avyapadeśyañca 
[338,xii]	tat ayuktam avyabhicāri tvaṅ kathayitum yuktam evam hi pramāṇa tā avyapadeśya viṣaya tvena tu kim na hi tathā pramāṇyam anyathā api pramāṇyāt tatas yat kiñcid etat svarūpa kathane ca atiprasaṅgaḥ ātma ādi sat sannikarṣasya api katham aprasaṅgāt atha yat pratyakṣa tve asādhāraṇantadeva kathyate na tu asādhāraṇam ātma ādi evantarhi vyāvarttakam viśeṣaṇam na svarūpa kathana param 
[338,xiii]	etena sat sannikarṣa ādi kathanam pratyākhyātam tathā hi lakṣaṇam eva etat syāt sva rūpa kathanam vānya artha vidhāna artham tatra yadi lakṣaṇam sat sannikarṣaḥ iti eva vaktavyam sat artha grāhi pratyakṣam indriya jam vā pratyakṣam abādhitam atha dharmam pratyanimitta tā pratipādana artham svarūpam anūdyate tathā api indriya jam iti eva vaktavyam kim apareṇa vyartha jalpitena 
[338,xiv_339,ii]	kiñca anuvāda mātram ayuktam tathā hi bāhya artha sādhane yatnaḥ karttavyaḥ veda vādibhiḥ mīmāṃkasakairatonyeṣām lakṣaṇena nirākriyā bau ddhā dīnām hi lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya anyathā abhimatam tu aprakriyā anukūlam tatas tad vyavacchedāya niyamena anyathā lakṣaṇam vidhātavyam sau ga tāḥ nām vijñāna vāda śūnya tā vāda anukūla tvāt lakṣaṇasya avaśyam eva tad nirāsāya lakṣaṇa antara karaṇam eva śobhate na avapatitairu ṣṭra haraṇa śakyam kaḥ vā lakṣaṇa karaṇe doṣaḥ pramāṇena aprasiddha tā iti ced tathā hi 
[339,iii_339,vi]	prāmāṇikam vidhātavyam lakṣaṇat niścayaḥ tatas itaretara hetu tvāt na ekam api atra sidhyati itaretara āśraya tvāt ekasya api aprasiddhiḥ iti na lakṣaṇa karaṇam yadi evam anuvādaḥ api na apramā prasiddhasya yuktaḥ loka prasiddhitaḥ ced prasiddhiḥ yadi evam dharmaḥ api loka prasiddhaḥ eva bhaviṣyati akāraṇam mī mām sā dharma viplavasya darśanāt asiddhiḥ eva paramārthataḥ iti ced yadi evam mīmāṃsayā api kim dharma viplavaḥ daṇḍa vāritaḥ anyathā etāvatas kālān nāma na syāt matā antare tasmāt pramāṇa siddhaḥ eva anuvādaḥ api karttavyaḥ tathā lakṣaṇam api anavadye 
[339,vii]	na ca sau ga taiḥ rapi lakṣaṇam kriyate prasiddha artha anuvādāt yathā eva hi dharmaṃpratyanimitta tva pradarśana artham anuvādaḥ tathā nimitta tva pradarśana artham iti samānam ubhayatra api yathā ca etat tathā upadarśitam eva prāk tatā ūrtha ajñānam pratyakṣam iti tu lakṣaṇam eva tatas iti anena anyasya prakṛtasya abhāvāt yorthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tatas eva iti gamyate tena dvi candra ādi jñāna parihāraḥ na hi tat tatas eva api tu anyatas kathantarhyā cā ryai ṇa uktam 
[339,viii_339,ix]	yad ābhāsā na sā tasmāt citta ālambam hi pañcakam na hi para māṇubhyaḥ utpadyam ānantat ākārañcakṣuḥ ādiṃjñānam anya ākārasya api vijñānasya kāraṇa tvena ālambana tve cakṣuḥ ādi paramāṇūnām api ālambana tva prasaṅga te api hi tathā anyathā vā bhavantaḥ dvi candranīla ādi ābhāsa vijñāna hetuḥ iti parama artham adhikṛtya uktam etat loka prasiddhyā tu vāda vivecanam lokaḥ hi na paramāṇu ādi kalpanā etāvat pratyakṣam loke prasiddham vicāryam āṇantu na yuktam 
[339,x_339,xii]	tatā ūrtha ādi tva siddha tvam anaikāntika tā sphuṭā paramāṇūn abhipretya anaikāntikam idam bhavet paramāṇūnām eva janakatu anteṣām ālambana tve cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anekāntaḥ atha ca te iti pratibhāsamānam ucyate tadā asiddha tā na hi tasya samāna kālasya jananam dvi candra ādinā ca anaikāntika tā atha samāna kālam api janakam tat api ayuktam avastu tvāt samudāyasya anaikāntika tā ca bhrānta vijñānaiḥ iti atha prāc bhāva janakam tadā api asiddha tā 
[339,xiii_340,i]	na hi jñānāt purobhāvaḥ tena jñānena gṛhyate pareṇa grahaṇe tasya api evam eva anuyogi tā anumānena vijñāne pratyakṣāt eva tat punar itaretara hetu tve prathamaṅkasya saṃbhavaḥ samāna kāla tā na asti pratyakṣa anubhayoḥ kvacid tasmāt asiddham eva etat parama arthena lakṣaṇam loka prati iti apekṣa tayā na virudhyate yat api ucyate śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam iti tat api asat śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ bhrānte api nahi nāma na vidyate na ca jñānamvinā vṛttiḥ śrotra ādeḥ upapadyate 
[340,ii]	pravarttana kāmaḥ hi pratyakṣa ādikam pramāṇam anvicchati śrotra ādīn āñca vṛttiḥ avijñātā katham lakṣaṇam anupalakṣitāt katham ayam pravartteta atha pratyakṣatas śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ upalakṣyate asya tarhi pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam vaktavyam tatas sākṣātkaraṇa ākāram pratyakṣam tat tu svayam eva upalakṣyate iti parihāraḥ tathā sati tat eva sākṣāt karaṇam abhra antam lakṣaṇam bhrānte api ca vijñāne śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ katham lakṣaṇam bhavet artheṣu vṛttiḥ iti adoṣaḥ artheṣu vṛttiḥ artha āmi mukhya tvam tat api bhrānte vidyate eva atha tad svarūpa samvedanam tat eva tarhi svarūpa samvedanam iti lakṣaṇam tat ca sākṣātkaraṇam eva avikalpakāpara nāmakam tasmāt aparama lakṣaṇam eva 
[340,iii_340,v]	kimpunar asya pramāṇasya phalam prameya adhigatiḥ uktañca pramāṇa adhīnaḥ hi prameya adhigamaḥ nanu tat jñānam eva tat ca phalam iti kim idānīm pramāṇam indriya artha sannikarṣa ālocana viśeṣaṇa jñānāni iti kecid tat ayuktam adhigamasya sādhanam tat eva yuktam yatas sa bhavati nanu jñānasya tāvat utpattiḥ indriya ādeḥ dṛśyate tatodhigamasya api tat eva iti kim akalpanayā 
[340,vi_340,x]	na hi dṛṣṭa parityāgāt kalpanā ani atra yukti bhāj anavasthā prameye syāt tathā satya nivāritā na etat asti kriyā sādhanam iti eva sarvam sarvasya karmaṇaḥ sādhanan ahi tat tasyāḥ sādhanam yā kriyā yatas yadi ekatra dṛṣṭa sāmarthyam iti eva tat eva ekam aparatra api sādhanāya upakalpyate yasya kasyacid sādhanasya upādānāt sakala samīhita sādhanam iti sarvan jagat alpa āyāsena sustham syātam na ca evam atas yā kriyā yatas dṛṣṭā tat eva tatra sādhanat na aparam 
[340,xi_340,xii]	tatra anubhava mātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśa ātmanaḥ bhāvyam tena ātmanā yena pratikarma virudhyate anubhavaḥ hi sā ṅaḥ khya sya nīla pīta ādau samānaḥ sattā mātreṇa tatas sarvam vyavasthāpayet abhimata vyavasthāpita padārtha vat navā anavasthāpita vat vyavasthāpana arham api tasya aviśeṣāt tathā hi 
[340,xiii_341,ii]	yathā tad vodhakam vastu tathā eva tat abodhakam yadā tad vodhakam kena matat neṣṭama bodhakam avyāpṛta avasthāyāḥ hi viśeṣam ātmasāt kurvāṇam idam atra vyāpṛtan a iti gamyeta tathā api kim svabhāvāt asaḥ pracyavate yadi ātmā aham tad ātma bhūtaḥ api na jāne tadā mayā sorthom na jñātaḥ eva bhavati tatas na pramāṇa tā puruṣa ātmā eva lokoyam bhogyam vastu avagacchati sa ca ātmā na vijānāti sādhvī bhoga vyavasthitiḥ 
[341,iv]	buddhiḥ sukha nīla ādi avasāya rūpam ātmā anan tathā vyavasthāpayati iti ced saiṃva tarhi bhoktrī kim apareṇa samvedanena sukha ādi avasāya rūpā sukha ākāravā iti ākāraḥ eva pramāṇam buddhi adhyavasitam artham puruṣaḥ ced yatas iti ced kā iyam buddhiḥ koya madhyavasāyaḥ kaḥ puruṣaḥ iti vācyam buddhiḥ karaṇam adhyavasāyaḥ karma karttā puruṣaḥ iti ced puruṣa ūrtham avagacchati tatas karttā adhyavasāyasya iti kim buddhyā adhyavasāyasya buddhiḥ sādhanam avagamasya puruṣaḥ iti ced avagamasya adhyavasāyasya ca na viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ tad ākāra sākṣāt karaṇam avagamaḥ saḥ eva ca adhyavasāyaḥ tad ākāra tā eva adhyavasāyaḥ na sākṣātkaraṇam iti ced 
[341,v_341,viii]	yadi nāma tad ākārā buddhi vat tā kathantaraḥ tad rūpa sākṣāt karaṇāt arthaḥ eva tathā na kim tad ākārā yadā buddhiḥ sākṣātkriyate arthaḥ eva tathā iti vyarthā artha ākārā buddhiḥ buddhi aḍhaurtha ākāraḥ ḍhaukyate tatas adūre deśasya pratipattiḥ vyāpit tvāt ātmanaḥ adūra deśakam eva sakalam na ca dūra deśaḥ iti pratipattiḥ syāt na ca tad ākāra buddhi vyatirekeṇa arthaḥ iti ca artham antareṇa tad ākārā buddhiḥ kutas iti ced nanu buddhitaḥ eva tad ākāra tā arthānām iṣyate tat ki m ayam viparyayaḥ sva mukham iva na asaṅkrāntam pratipattum śakyam na ayogya deśa tvāt mukhasya saṃkrāntiḥ ddarppaṇāt āviṣyate 
[341,ix]	na evam anyeṣām darppaṇasya ca asaṃkrāntasya katham pratipattiḥ tasya api buddhi darppaṇe saṅkrānta tvāt iti ced buddhiḥ api tarhi buddhiḥ darppaṇa antare ca asaṃkrāntiḥ iṣyatām buddhiḥ aviditā eva astu iti ced ātmā aparokṣa iti vyartham jagat syāt ātmanaḥ apakṣa tve tena arthaḥ eva vedya tām kim atra dhiyā karaṇam antareṇa katham paśyati iti ced cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ karaṇam antaḥkaraṇena prayojanam iti ced antarantaḥkaraṇa ūna api prayojanam iti anavasthā na ca anupakārakam karaṇam taiḥ abhivyajyate puruṣaḥ ca id na udāsīnasya iva abhivyakteḥ agrāhaka tvam tasmāt artha antareṇa ātmanā bhavitavyam 
[341,x_342,iv]	darppaṇaḥ iva tatra avikāra kāriṇī tat ākāra tā iti ced na darppaṇam pratītya tad ākārā buddhiḥ upajāyate tena vikāronyathā kaḥ saṃkrama arthaḥ yadi na vikāraḥ darppaṇa ibhi mukha ākārā bhrāntā buddhiḥ udayavatī atra api viṣaya ākārāḥ buddhiḥ bhrāntā eva na paramārthataḥ viṣaya prapañca : pradhāna puruṣa mātra ātmakattvāt jagataḥ pradhāna ātmakattvam api tarhi bhrāntam eva jagataḥ ghaṭa ādyāḥ maka vat tathā puruṣa ātmaka tvam api etat ca paścāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ anyathā na sām khya prasthānena tasmāt asya śuddhasya anubhavasya bhāvi antena ātmanā yena karmma karmma prativibhāgaḥ nīlam idam pītam iti ādikaḥ nanu śrotra ādi vṛtti pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti aktam uktam idam ayuktam tu tathā hi anātma bhūtaḥ bhedaḥ sya vidyamānaḥ api hetuṣu bhinne karmmaṇi abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
