[469,iii]	paridṛṣṭa pūrvam artha smṛtvā api pratyakṣa ādikam antareṇa kinna pravartate kim idānīm smaraṇam api pramāṇam atha tad apramāṇam eva vacanam api tathā artham na pramāṇam iti samānam yatra tu pramāṇantatra anumāna kāraṇa tvena eva na anyathā etāvat mātram atra vivakṣitam na tu sarva vacanam sarva anumāna kāraṇam vacanasya anumāna tvam eva na svātantryeṇa pramāṇa tvam sarva anumāna tva pradipāt anantu na upayogi tasmāt trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam eva vacanam 
[469,iv]	veda vacanasya tarhi katham pramāṇa tā tatra api pratyakṣa anumāna artha kathanāt eva pramāṇa tā dvādaśa māsāḥ iti ādau anyatra apramāṇa tā eva yathā puruṣa vacasi apauruṣeya tvāt eva pramāṇa tā iti ced na apratyaya tvāt na hi vacana mātrāt kasyacid saṃpratyayaḥ yadi pratyakṣa vat vedaḥ kim na sarvaḥ pratyeti kṣaṇika tva ādi anumānāt api na sarvaḥ pratyeti bhrāntyā ced atra api bhrāntiḥ tad jātīya anumānena sa pratyaya sthānena nivarttyate anumāne vede tu na tad jātīya vacana tvena iti asamānam etat 
[469,v_469,vi]	anvaya pratibaddha tve anumānasya pramāṇa tā vede tu na anvayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti pūrvam vicāritam athavā ayam arthaḥ vacanam trirūpa liṅga ākhyāna rūpam eva para artha anumānam na veda vacanam tasya trairūpya abhāvāt tasya hi sattya tva anvayaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ na pakṣa dharma tvam tathā hi apauruṣeya tvena asattya tvāt vyākhyā tam sattayanvena tu na asti anvayaḥ atha dvādaśa māsāḥ iti anvayaḥ atra ucyate 
[469,vii_469,viii]	agnihotra ādi vākyasya na veda tvam viniścitam pauruṣeya tvam api asya sambhavet kenacid kṛteḥ kadācid apauruṣeya madhye kenacid etat pātitam bhavet śrūyate ca kvacid śākhā antare kṛta tvam smaraṇe sati tathā vyavahāraḥ iti ced na apratyaya tvāt anyatra api prasaṅgāt etat ca sakalam pratipāditam eva prāk iti na prapañcitam iha iti āstām 
[469,ix_469,xi]	yadi trirūpam liṅgam eva sva dṛṣṭa śabdena ucyate trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam para artham anumānam iti vaktavyam kim sva dṛṣṭa artha grahaṇena na anyārtha tvāt tathā hi parasya pratipādya tvāt adṛṣṭaḥ api svayam paraiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanam iti eke tat kṣepāya ātma dṛś vacaḥ na hi para artha anumāne sva pratipati adhikāraḥ parasya eva pratipādya tvāt parasya ced tat prasiddham liṅgam paraḥ pratipadyate eva vādi pratipattyā vinā katham paraḥ pratipattimān iti na vācyam 
[469,xii_469,xiii]	na vādi pratipattau api aparaḥ pratipadyate sva pratītimvinā sā ced sā eva astu atra pareṇa kim na tāvat asau vādinaḥ atra pratipattiḥ iti saṃpratyeti api tu mayā evam eva pratipannam iti sva pratyayāt anena tu jñātvā prakāśitam anyathā vā iti kim anena vicāreṇa atiricyamāna prapañcena atobhi prāyāt svayam apratītam api paraiḥ pratītam iṣyate liṅagam tasya abhiprāyasya pratikṣepa artha 
[470,i]	sva dṛṣṭa vacanam yadi evam svena eva dṛṣṭam iti para dṛṣṭa vya chedāt anartha antaram āpatitam na ubhaya dṛṣṭa pratipādana artha tvāt yathā avasthita lakṣaṇam etat tena ca vipratipattiḥ api nirākṛtā atas dartham eva iti syāt na yad arthaḥ ca ayam ārambhaḥ sa ca śabda samuci cataḥ iti yuktam na hi svayam apratītam parasya pratītam iti śakyam vaktum 
[470,ii_470,iii]	nanu parasya pratītam tat astu pareṇa tu pratipannam iti parijñānam na upayogi sva pratīti mātrakeṇa parasya parisamāpta artha tvāt kathantarhi svayam ajñātasya upanyāsaḥ para prasiddhyā ced parasya prasiddham iti tat etarhi āyātam tatas svayam apratīteḥ katham etat na hi parasya pratītimarvāk darśī pratyakṣayati anumānam api sva pratītim apekṣate tena para pratītam iti niścitam sva pratītam api atha āgamāt pareṇa pratipannam svayam api tat pratipannam eva kintu tasya āgamasya vādinā anabhyupagamāt na sva pratipannam iti vyapadeśaḥ tena āgamāt yat pareṇa pratipannam na svayantat api sādhanam eva atra ucyate anumāviṣaye na iṣṭam parīkṣita parigrahāt vācaḥ prāmāṇyam asmin hi na anumānam pravarttate 
[470,iv]	saḥ āgamaḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam vā pramāṇañcet ubhaya siddha tvam anya pramāṇa dṛṣṭa vat apramāṇa tve na kasya cit api abhyupagamāt parasya eva siddham iti cit na anumāna viṣaye abhyupagamena āgamaḥ pramāṇam parīkṣitasya abhyupagamāt pratyakṣa anumāna aviṣaye ca pramāṇam na tad viṣaye sarvatra prāmāṇye kim anumānena vacana mātreṇa artha siddheḥ tathā hi acetanāḥ sukha ādayaḥ utpatteḥ anitya tvāt vā rūpa ādi vat iti sāṃkhyasya para prasiddham abhimatam na svayam sāṃkhyasya utpattimat tvam anittya tvam vā prasiddham tatra ca yadi vacana prāmāṇyāt prasiddhiḥ sāṃkhya vacanam api pramāṇam eva iti tatas eva acetana tvam buddhi sukha ādīnām prasiddham kim anumānena atha anittya tva ādi sādhanam bauddham vacaḥ tadā tena buddhi ādeḥ sa cetana tvam siddham iti na anumānena viparyaya prasiddhiḥ iti vyarthakam eva anumānam 
[470,v_470,vii]	atha anumānasya api prāmāṇyāt tad viparyayasya siddhiḥ tathā sati na pramāṇam iti āha bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya param prati saḥ apramāṇanta dā asiddham tat siddham akhilantataḥ yadā eva anumānena viparyaya sādhana ārambhaḥ tadā tad vacanam apramāṇam eva parīkṣā kṣama tvāt abhyupagamasya api śithilībhāvāt abhyugama kṛta pramāṇa bhāve hi saḥ āgamaḥ tasya śaithilye tasya prāmāṇyam api tathā bhavet tatas tad prasiddha hetu śaithilyāt sādhya siddheḥ api śaithilyam na khalu tad adhīna sarva ātmakam tat na anuvarttate atad adhīna tva prasaṅgāt hetu siddhau pramāṇam na cetanatu asya iti ced na kvacid vyabhicāra darśanena sarva tra anāśvāsa prasaṅgāt 
[471,i_471,iii]	atha pramāṇa samvādī sa vacana eka deśaḥ tadā tarhi sa hetuḥ ubhayava ādi prasiddhim adhyāsīt atha pramāṇa prasiddham api pramāṇa vṛtta anabhijña tvāt para prasiddham eva sāṃkhyasya tat api ayuktam evam hi sa sāṃkhyaḥ sva kaupīnam eva vivṛṇuyāt tathā api kaḥ doṣaḥ sva siddhena hi liṅgena tena asau pratipāditaḥ na anyatra ajñāna mātreṇa sarvatra ajñānam arhati 
[471,iv_471,vi]	na hi hetum sādhayitum aśaktaḥ iti sādhya sādhane api tasya aśaktiḥ na tāvat tad hetoḥ sva pratipanna sādhyaḥ sva siddha hetu sadbhāvāt atha asau nirmukhayitum śakyaḥ iti prauḍha vādī tat api ayuktam siddhaḥ hi hetuḥ sādhyam sādhayitum kim apareṇa tathā hi tava tāvat prasiddhoyam asmad siddhyā tu kaḥ guṇaḥ sarvaḥ mayā eva vyāpāraḥ karttavyaḥ iti kaḥ vidhiḥ 
[471,vii_471,ix]	sādhya vat hetuḥ api mayā eva sādhayitavyaḥ iti kim iyam rājā ājñā na hi sarva ajñaḥ pratipādayitum śakyaḥ atha sva niścaya vat anyeṣām niścaya utpādana icchayā sādhanam ucyate iti nyāyāt ayuktam etat tat api na samyak tathā hi niścaya utpāda mātreṇa parasya atra prayojanam sva niścaya vat iti etat viśeṣaṇam anarthakam 
[471,x_471,xiv]	niścaya mātreṇa hi parasya arthitāḥ na tu tatra apareṇa anupayoginā viśeṣaṇena na hi anupayogi viśeṣaṇam prekṣāvata abhyupagamyate atra ucyate pratipatim na jānāti yaḥ parasya vivekataḥ pratipannam anena iti katham asya matiḥ bhavet na mayā ayam vañcitaḥ saṃpratipattiḥ eva asya iti svayam apratiyataḥ katham pratītiḥ atha api syāt kim anena pratipatti mātrakam parasya bhavatu tāvatā caritārtham vādi vacanam iti kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ evantarhi idam api bhavet uttaram vipralapya api yat kiñcit mayā tvam pratibodhitaḥ mama pratītyā bhavataḥ kim atra anyat prayojanam 
[471,xv_471,xvi]	yam kañcid sādhana ābhāsam prapañcena āmidhāya mayā tvam pratipāditaḥ iti yadā bravīti tadā tasya kim uttaram vaktavyam tatra dūṣaṇam vaktavyam iti ced na dūṣaṇena vādinaḥ pratipattiḥ vidhātavyā sa ca vādī tadā idam uttaram dadyāt mama pratipattyā kimbhavataḥ prayojanam iti pramā api a ivam apratipattiḥ iti ced brūyāt parasmai tarhi dūṣaṇan na nivedanīyam apratipattiḥ mama atra iti etāvat eva vaktavyam na sa upapattikā apratipattiḥ iti darśana artham dūṣaṇam api vaktavyam eva evantarhi pareṇa yadi vaktavyam dūṣaṇam sa upapattikam vādinā api hi vaktavyam sādhanam sa upapattikam 
[471,xvii]	yathā mama atra evam pratipatti abhāvaḥ iti sa upapattikam prativādinā kathayitavyam tathā vādinā api sa upapattikam sādhanam anyathā yathā mama atra apratipattiḥ tathā parasya api kadācid iti śaṅkā na apagacchet nahi para artha vṛttiḥ para artha prasiddhi niḥśrayam akṛtvā paritoṣa bhāgī na ca vijigīṣu tā mātreṇa paṇḍitāḥ pravarttante śāstrāṇi vā tad arthāni tattva avatāra artha tvāt tasmāt svapa pratipannaḥ evam bhavati anena pratipannam etat apratipannam tu asya asattya vacanam eva sva pratipattim antareṇa
[472,i_472,ii]	tu yadi paraḥ na abhyupagacchet na pratipādayitā vādī syāt kaḥ hi bhaṅgam ātmanaḥ icchet sva pratīte tu pramāṇena anabhyupagame api pratīyate asatti avāditā parasya atha sva pratīte api pareṇa pratipannam iti katham pratipattiḥ yadi nāma prativādinaḥ pratītiḥ prāśnikāḥ pratyeṣyanti prāśnikaiḥ pratipannam tena yadi na pratīyate tadā tasya sāmagrī na asti na vādinaḥ doṣaḥ 
[472,iii_472,iv]	na andhāya dugdha akathane pratipādaka tā kṣayaḥ cakṣuḥ nna vādinā deyam kenacid prativādine sitam dugdham iti kathane yadi na pratyeti cakṣuḥ vaikalyāt prativādinaḥ eva andhasya doṣaḥ katham atra doṣaḥ pratipādayituḥ prāśnikaiḥ pratipannam bhavatu tāvatā carita artham vādi vacanam atha api ucyeta 
[472,v_472,vi]	para artha kāriṇām etat karuṇā ākṛṣṭa cetasām prāśnika pratipad mātrāt dūṣya tvam saṃgatam katham na hi sva paritoṣa mātrakam para artha kāriṇām abhimatam para vyāmoha vyāvarttanam tu teṣām arthaḥ abhimataḥ tatra prativādi pratipādanāyāḥ baddha parikaraḥ prāśnika mātra pratipādanena parituṣyati iti kva āsthāḥ kva nipatitāḥ kva prativādi pratipādanāya ārambhaḥ kva prāśnika mātra pratipādanena parisamāptiḥ kiñca 
[472,vii_472,xii]	tad pakṣapāta upahataḥ prāśnikaḥ vivadet yadi tatra api ca punar mṛgyam vādinām prāśnika antaram prāśnika antara sañcāre prāśnike prativādini anavasthā tatas vādī kasyā syāt pratipādakaḥ atha prāśnika lokasya vādinī api anurakta tā tathā api pakṣapātāt na prāśnika tvam parisphuṭam atra ucyate para artha kārī nāma ayam kim ayogye api asau tathā atikramya n na sāmarthyam akṛta a akṛpā ātmakaḥ karuṇāvān api yogye vidhātum artham vibhavati 
[472,xiii]	ayogye hi śaktiḥ vyāghātaḥ na karuṇāyāḥ na hi asāvakāruṇikam iti pratītiḥ prāśnikānāntu pakṣapāti tve prativāditā eva iti avaśyam prāśnika antara apekṣaṇam na ca sarve eva vipra vadante prayojana abhāvāt paraspara apekṣataḥ vā atha teṣām api parasparam vādi prativāditā evam sati sakala vyavahāra ucchedaḥ na ca dṛśyate tasmāt prāśnika pratibodhanam eva vāda parisamāptiḥ idam punar akṛpa tvam eva yat agrahaṇa ādi vidhānena parājayaḥ pareṣām tasmāt sva pratipattim prāśnika ādibhyaḥ nivedya pratipādana śaktiḥ ātmasāt karttavyā tasmāt āgama siddham eva na para siddham 
[472,xiv_472,xvi]	nanu saḥ api āgamaḥ yadā pareṇa pramāṇyena abhyupagataḥ tadā tad siddha pakṣa dharmataḥ svayam asau pratipadyate eva na bādhita eka deśasya tathā abhyupagama ayogāt atas eva āha tat āgamavataḥ siddham yadi kasya kaḥ āgamaḥ : bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ katham āgamaḥ yadi apramāṇam anabhyupagataḥ ca pareṇa tadā kasya kaḥ āgamaḥ yadi anabhyupaga me api tad āgamavattā sām khyasya api iti ubhaya siddhiḥ eva atha anabhyupagamāt na evam na kasyacid api tad āgamavat tā iti
[473,i_473,ii]	na kasyacid siddham āgamaḥ api asau na eva bhavati pramāṇena bādhanāt āgama ābhāsaḥ sa bhavet pramāṇa ābhāsataḥ pratipattau vyāmūḍhaḥ eva asau iti na vyāmoha nivartanam parasya tena iti na vādī bhavet pramāṇa abhāsa tām ajānānaḥ paraḥ na vyāmūḍhaḥ katham na ca na jānāti tathā hi tad viruddha abhyupagamaḥ tena eva ca katham bhavet tad anya upagame tasya tyāga aṅgasya apramāṇa tā 
[473,iii]	yadā eva asau tad viruddham abhyūpa gacchati tadā eva tad āgamasya asattyatām api pratibudhyate tat na antarīyaka tvāt viruddha abhyupagamasya mūḍha tvāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na mūḍha tāyām apratipādaka tvam iti uktam vyāmoham ādhāya asau apasāritaḥ iti siddham vādinaḥ kāryam na viṣa ādi dānasya api prasaṅgāt vāgmitayā vyāmohanam vādi tvam iti ced na pariśuddha vastu parisphuṭa pratyāyanasya vāgmi tvāt tathā hi 
[473,iv_473,vi]	samāsa vyāsa rūpeṇa pramā upetasya vastunaḥ prakāśanena vāgmi tvam iṣyate tattva vedibhiḥ jigīṣuṇā apasārayitavyaḥ eva yathā kathañcitparaḥ iti ced na yathā kathañcit apa sāraṇena upahāsa āspada tā prāpteḥ yadā tarhi pariśuddha vastu vacanena api paravyāmohaḥ tathā katham vāditoditā prāśnika pratipādanena paryāpta tvāt na andhasya adarśane savituḥ aprakāśaka tā tathā hi pratipādayituḥ doṣaḥ bhevat a pratipādane yogyaḥ api na vijātīyāt yadi artham vacanāt tatas 
[473,vii]	yadi parisphuṭa vacanāt api na pratye api kā asya prativādi tve śraddhā siddha mātrikā pāṭhaka upa adhyāya śālā praveśaḥ eva tasya yuktaḥ atha api syāt na vidagdheṣu evaṃbhūta sādhana upanyāsaḥ avidagdha prativādinam pratyupanyāsāt yatas saḥ api dūṣaṇam asambaddham eva dadyāt tathā hi mūlye mūlye tathābhūtaḥ eva puṭikā bandhaḥ tat idam tauta upākhyānam āyātam mama anena bhikṣā pātre madya pānam kṛtam mayā tu asya mūtra pānam kartavyam api ca 
[473,viii_473,x]	na ācaitanyam svayam sāṃkhya unitya tvāt avagacchati tatas sva vittau sāṃkhyasya pramāṇam aparam bhavet na hi svayam sādhyam para prasiddha sādhanāt avagantam yuktam tatas sva siddhena sādhanena asya tad artha sādhana kāriṇā bhāvyam asti eva tat iti ced evam tarhi tat kinna sādhanam proktam sva pratītiḥ yat udbhavā 
[473,xi_473,xii]	tat eva sva prasiddhi nimittam sādhanam kinna upanyastam kim apareṇa ākāśa carvaṇa prayāsena na hi parisphuṭa svarūpe sambhavati hetau kaṣṭa kalpanā prayāsaḥ sādhīyān āgamāt sāṃkhyasya tat siddham iti na sva pratīta sādhana upanyāsaḥ nanu saḥ āgamaḥ parasya api sādhakaḥ eva na param pratyapramāṇa tvāt apramāṇāt svayam api katham pratītiḥ tam prati pramāṇa tvāt yadi pramāṇam kin na sarvasya abhyupagama abhāvāt sāṃkhyasya api katham asmāt abhyupagamaḥ tena parīkṣita tvāt yadi evam parasya api syāt yatas 
[474,ii_474,v]	yuktyā yayā āgamaḥ grāhyaḥ grāhikā asya api sā na kim yathā yuktyā parīkṣitaḥ āgamaḥ sāṃkhyasya pramāṇa tayā abhimataḥ bauddhasya api kim asau na yuktiḥ tena anabhyupagamāt iti ced evantarhi anityat tvāt acetanā iti api yuktim katham abhyupagacchet nyāya prāptam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam iti samānam śāstra upagame api tathā ca ubhaya siddhe sambhavati sādhake kaḥ sādhana antara upanyāsa prayāsam ātmanaḥ vidadhīta yogi gamyoyam arthaḥ tena paraḥ sādhanena yena kena cit pratyāyyaḥ nanu yogi gamyam etat iti paraḥ api sva sādhye vaktum samarthaḥ eva na ca tad yogini na pramāṇam iti śakyam tathā hi prākṛtasya sataḥ prāk yaiḥ pratipatti akṣa sambhavau sādhanaiḥ sādhanāni artha śakti jñānesya tāni alam 
[474,vi]	na hi yogī kaścid svabhāva siddhaḥ āste pramāṇa abhāvāt tathā ca pratyapādi prāk anittye api apramāṇa tā iti tasmāt prākṛtasya sataḥ paścāt upāya anuṣṭhānāt yogitā na svasti sādhanena tathā ca yaiḥ sādhanaiḥ tad sādhana upāya pratipattiḥ tad apāya anuṣṭhānāt akṣa sambhavaḥ tad artha pratipatti rūpam pratyakṣam eva uktaḥ athavā tādṛś pratipatti sādhanam uktam tāni tad sādhanāni arthasya upāya bhūtasya tad akṣa sādhanasya śakteḥ sāmarthyasya jñāne samarthāni eva tad yogi pratipanna artha upagame tatas kim asat sādhana upanyāsena yathā saugataiḥ yogi sādhanam uktam tathā paraiḥ api vaktum yuktam atha yogi sambhava t vāreṇa api na tad sādhanam upādātum śakyam tadā avacanam eva atra prāptam yatas 
[474,vii_474,viii]	vicchinna anugamāḥ ye ca sāmānyena api agocarāḥ sādhya sādhana cintā asti na teṣu artheṣu kācana yohi arthaḥ sādhanena anugantum śakyaḥ sāmānyena eva sāmānya viśeṣeṇa vā tatra sādhya sādhana cintā kriyeta tatra sāmānyena cintā yogī tāvat sambhavati asmākam iti tena dṛṣṭoyam arthaḥ iti idam api saṃbhavati athavā ayam eva arthaḥ sambhavati iti viśeṣeṇa ye tu punar sarvathā ananugamena sāmānyena api viṣayīkartum aśakyāḥ tathābhūteṣu vastuṣu na kācid sādhya sādhana adhikaraṇā cintā āstāntāvat pramāṇa cintā āgama eka samadhigamyaḥ api asau na arthaḥ tatas tatra pramāṇam avatārayan pramāṇa viṣaya anabhijña tām eva ātmanaḥ durātmā prakāśayati 
[474,ix_475,i]	atha yāvat asau na vyutpattimān tāvat sādhana ābhāsa tām na jānāti tatas tad abhiprāyāt sādhanam eva yadā tu sādhanam etat na bhavati iti pratibudhyate tadā sādhanat na bhaviṣyati iti kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ tat api asat yatas puṃsām abhiprāya vaśāt tattva atattva vyavasthitau luptau hetu tad ābhāsau tasya vastu samāśrayāt 
[475,ii_475,iii]	puruṣa abhiprāya mātram hi hetau api ahetutān dadyāt ahetau api hetu tām iti hetu tad ābhāsa vyavasthā na vāstavī bhavet bhavantī vā puṃsām abhiprāyam apahastayati tasmāt na para upagatam sādhanam api ca aparīkṣitāt āgamāt jñāna mātram eva utpattimat na vastu niścayaḥ na ca jñāna mātrāt vastu sidhyati yatas san arthaḥ jñāna sāpekṣaḥ na āsan jñānena sādhakaḥ sataḥ api vastu saṃśliṣṭā asaṅgatyā sadṛśī gatiḥ 
[475,iv_475,v]	san ā iva arthonyasya sādhakaḥ na āsan asataḥ siddhiḥ iti ahetuka tā asati jñānam asti tatas siddhiḥ iti ced tat asattve tasya tat jñānam iti kutas jñānam eva sākṣāt sādhakam iti ced na pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt atas na asati jñānāt siddhiḥ nanu asti tāvat jñāna mātrāt api gatiḥ yathā kathañcid āropita arthāt na sa vastukasya āropasya vastu dvāreṇa eva gatiḥ yadi tu gatiḥ api asau vastu bhūtam liṅgamvinā tadā gati ābhāsaḥ eva asau hetvābhāsāt udayāt 
[475,vi_475,x]	na ādhūme dhūma samvitteḥ gatiḥ sattyā asti pāvake viparītaḥ samāraḥ apī na hi sādhyasya sādhakaḥ a api ca sva artha anumāna paricchede nirṇṇītam etat liṅga trayam eva arthasya sādhakam na aparam tatas ca liṅgam svabhāvaḥ kāryam vā dṛśya adarśanam eva vā sambaddham vastutas siddham tat asiddham kimātmanaḥ yadi sādhya svabhāvam vastutas prasiddham pramāṇa prasiddha tvāt tadā kimātmanaḥ sāṃkhyasya aprasiddham pramā pra siddhiḥ ubhayasya api pramāṇasya sādhāraṇa tvāt atha pramāṇat na asti tadā pareṇa api anyatas gantum ayuktam 
[475,xi]	yathā eva hi sāṃkhyaḥ pratipādayati anitya tva ādikaḥ hetuḥ tava siddhaḥ tatas pratipadyasva iti tathā paraḥ api tava prasiddham etat pramāṇāt siddhāt eva hetoḥ yathā tava pratipattiḥ tathā anyasya api prekṣāvataḥ anyathā sāṃkhyasya prekṣā pūrva kāritā eva na syāt na hi aham eva ekaḥ vidagdhaḥ paraḥ tu na tathā iti sa cetana pratītiḥ tasmāt na para upagama mātreṇa sādhana prayogaḥ vidvatsu yuktaḥ kathantarhi pūrva ācāryaiḥ bhavatā ca para prasiddha sādhanaiḥ sādhya siddhiḥ samīhitā 
[475,xii_476,i]	tat asat yatas para kalpitaiḥ prasaṅge dvaya sambandhāt eka abhāveni ahānaye prasaṅga sādhanam tat na tu tatas sādhya niścayaḥ na hi para upagati mātrakāt sādhya niścayaḥ kimarthaḥ tarhi tat ekasya prasaktasya abhāve anyāḥ bhāva sādhana artham na hi sādhya abhāve sādhana sambhavaḥ idañca tad prasaṅga sādhanam deśa kāla avasthā viśeṣa niyata eka vyakti saṃsarga vyavacchinna svabhāva antara virahāt aneka vṛtteḥ ekasya na deśa ādi viśeṣavatā anyena yogaḥ tathā abhedāt sarva rāgaḥ avayava rāge api ityādi yatas tathābhūta svabhāvasya virodhāṃd bhinna deśa ādi yogena 
[476,ii]	nanu ekam api vyāpi tvāt aneka deśa ādi yogi yadi kaḥ virodhaḥ na aneka kāla yogasya draṣṭum aśakyatvāt na hi pūrva apara kāla vyāpitā pratyakṣataḥ upalabhyate pūrva apara bhāvasya kalpanā viṣaya tvāt yasya atītam darśanam sa pūrva kālaḥ yasya anāgatam saḥ uttarakālaḥ na ca tad kāla dṛśya padārtha vyatirekeṇa aparaḥ kālaḥ 
[476,iii_476,iv]	nanu kāla abhāvāt katham pūrva apara vyavahāraḥ tathā diś abhāvāt kāle api sati katham pūrva apara vyavahāraḥ nahi kāla saṅgataḥ iti eva pūrva ādi vyavahāra viṣayaḥ varttamāne api prasaṅgāt kāla bhedāt iti ced tathā hi pūrva kāla ādi yogī yaḥ sa pūrva ādi apadeśa bhāj pūrva apara tvam tasya api svarūpāt eva na anyatas 
[476,v_476,viii]	pūrva kāla bhāvī pūrvaḥ tathā para kāla bhāvī paraḥ ityādi kālaḥ eva katham pūrvaḥ iti ced svarūpataḥ eva kālasya pūrva ādi tvam tathā diśaḥ tat etat asatti am yatas nittya tā vyāpitā yā hi pūrva ādi tvam kathantayoḥ sahacāri tathā tvāt ced anyonya āśraya tā bhavet sahacāriṇām hi rāga ādīnām pūrva ādi tvāt vyāpinoḥ api dikkālayoḥ tathātvam iti kā vyāhatiḥ na khalu sahacāriṇā kaścid na vyapadiśyate mañcāḥ krośanti iti yathā tathā atra api gataḥ sa kālaḥ iti vyapadeśaḥ tat atra itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ tvaritam bhavantam anudhāvati 
[476,ix_476,xi]	sahacāriṇām tu purva tvam pūrva kāla samāgamāt kālasya pūrva ādi tvañca sahacārya viyogataḥ prāc aprasiddhau ekasya katham anyatara sthitiḥ sahabhāve dvayoḥ nna syāt anyāni akṛta pūrva tā na yāvatkālasya pūrva ādi tvam na tāvat sahacāriṇām iti aprasiddhiḥ samīhitasya atha dvayoḥ api samāna kāla apūrvādi tā tathā sati samāna kālayoḥ paraspara vyāpāra apratipatteḥ nna parasyara kṛta tvam iti sva hetu samutthaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ iti padārthānām eva sa pūrva ādi tā bhāvaḥ iti vyarthikā kāla parikalpanā tathā hi yat atītam vastu tat pūrvam ucyate yat anāgatam tat param yat sat tat varttamānam 
[476,xii_476,xiv]	nanu ca kāla abhāvāt etat eva katham kāla sadbhāve api katham iti etat api pratipāditam eva iti na uttaram kiñca hetu bhāvāt abhāvāt ca kāryam sat asat iti atas pūrva apara vyavasthā api kim adṛṣṭasya kalpanā pūrva apara madhya bhāvaḥ hi sahasa dvayavasthayā sā ca kāraṇa bhāva abhāvābhyām tat api kāraṇam sva kāraṇāt eva bhāva abhāva vat iti na adṛṣṭasya kalpanā yuktimatī 
[477,i_477,iii]	atha cira kṣipra ādi rūpa pariccheda hetuḥ anādi nidhanaḥ kālaḥ iṣyate tat api yat kiñcit yatas anādinidhanāt kālāt katham kṣipra ādi buddhayaḥ cira kṣipra ādi buddhinām grāhyaḥ kālaḥ yadi iṣyate yadi etāḥ buddhyaḥ kāla svarūpa ugrāhiṇyaḥ tadā saḥ eva anādinidhana tayā vyāpitayā ca gṛhyatām anyena cira ādi tvena tathābhūtasya grahaṇa asambhavāt 
[477,iv_477,vii]	yat eva gṛhyate rūpam tat eva arthasya yukti bhāj na eva anyena prakāreṇa padārtha sthitiḥ iṣyate cira kṣipra ādi rūpāṇām paraspara vibhevataḥ kālasya api prasaktoyam iti vyāpi ekate katham cira kālaḥ padārthoyam iti sthiti vivekataḥ cira acira ādi bhedānām kāla rūpa anugāmitā cira kṣipra ādayaḥ hi kāla rūpa anugamanena pratīyante na padārtha rūpa anupraveśena iti vyāpi kāla vyavasthitiḥ tathā hi yoyena anugataḥ pratīyate sa tad yogī tat yathā śāvaleyaḥ pratīyamānaḥ go rūpeṇa tad yogī iti kālasya api tathā vyavasthā evam tarhi 
[477,viii_477,xii]	cira kṣipra ādi bhedānām kāla rūpa anuyāyinām kāla tvam nāma sāmānyam iti kālaḥ na sidhyati kāla tvam nāma sāmānyam iti kālaḥ na sidhyati dravya padārtha madhye hi kālaḥ iṣyate na sāmānyam tasya padārtha antara tvāt na ca cira ādi rūpa vyatiriktaḥ vedyate kālaḥ kālaḥ iti tu saṃjñā mātram teṣām eva lāghava artham kenacid niveśitam cira ādayaḥ api na eva amī kriyātovyatirekiṇaḥ ciram kṛtam iti ittham hi kriyā rūpa praveśataḥ ciram karoti iti hi kriyā sāmāna adhikaraṇyena pratīteḥ kriyā rūpa anupātinaḥ eva tattvataḥ cira ādayaḥ 
[477,xiii_477,xv]	na ca kriyā api karma karttṛ padārtha vyatiriktā tathā hi devadattaḥ karoti iti na kāraḥ karttṛtaḥ paraḥ pratīyate pramāṇena tad eka tva pratītitaḥ na hi karmakaraḥ karoti kaṭam iti kaṭakarmakara viśeṣati atiriktā krithā upalabhyate pratyakṣataḥ tad abhāvāt anumānataḥ api iti asattvam eva kriyāyāḥ tathā hi 
[477,xvi_477,xvii]	bhidyamānāt na bhedonyaḥ bādhatau na aparā gatiḥ anādi vāsanā bhedāt pratyayāḥ eva bhedinaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām hi bhedam upara cayya anādi vāsanā sanāthīkṛta santāna śithilīkṛta padārtha tattva abhiniveśaḥ hi pṛthagjanaḥ jānāti bheda viparyaye api bhedam iti viparyāsa mātrakam eva idam kriyā bheda adhyavasānam yatas 
[477,xviii_478,i]	deva dattāt kriyā abhinnā yadi na syāt tathā aparaḥ anyasya api kriyā yogāt kriyā anyeti vikalpyate etat ca prāk eva pratipāditam na ca anvaya vyatirekayoḥ pratyakṣa gamyatā anyatra anādi va āsanā janita mānasa pratyaya gamya tvāt atha kriyā nāma iyam asattva bhūtā tena na pratyakṣataḥ upalabhyate nanu yadi nāma asattva bhūtā tathā api liṅga ādi yogaḥ mā bhūt padārtha vyatirikta tve tu pratyakṣataḥ upalambhakaḥ virodhaḥ tatas kalpita kriyā viśeṣaḥ eva cira kṣipra ādayaḥ na tāttvikāḥ 
[478,ii_478,v]	katham evam ityādi arthavat tathā hi katham ittham tathā iti ete padārtha vyatirekiṇaḥ bhaveyuḥ vyatirekasya vikalpāḥ sādhakāḥ yadi yadi yaḥ yaḥ eva vikalpaḥ udayavān tad artha rūpaḥ saḥ eva padārthaḥ kalpanā viṣayaḥ pāramārthikaḥ tadā evamādayaḥ api padārthāḥ syuḥ ced kva antar bhāvyaṃtām na hi kāla ādayaḥ tat nibandhanam iṣyante na api pratīyante atha te kriyā viśeṣāḥ eva tathā sati cira ādayaḥ api iti vyarthakaḥ kāla ādi kalpanā prayāsaḥ tasmāt pūrva apara kāla bhūta padārtha grahaṇa abhāvāt pratyakṣeṇa agrahaṇam eva vyāpinaḥ 
[478,vi_478,viii]	atha kāla vyāpteḥ agrahaṇe api deśa vyāpti grahaṇam avirodhī iti matiḥ na tatra api tad ādhāra vyatirekeṇa sāmānya ādeḥ anupalambhāt tathābhūta svabhāvasya virodhāt bhinna deśa ādi yogena na hi tatra anupraviṣṭam anyatra api tadā bhavati bheda abhāvena sarva anupraveśaḥ eka piṇḍa tā syāt na hi tad ādhāra an anupraveśe tad anupraviṣṭa anupraveśaḥ atha samānam etat dvayam iti dhīḥ udeti tatas sāmānyam bhinna abhinnam atra ucyate dhiyaḥ samāna ākāra tve katham artha samāna tā na hi anyatra samāna tve tad samānaḥ paraḥ bhavet arthe samāna ākāraḥ ced syāt bhedena vedya tām adṛ śya mānam artheṣu katham artheṣu kalpyatām 
[478,x]	anugata ākārā dhīḥ udayam āsādayati iti kosya bhāṣitasya arthaḥ na hi vacanam avivecita artham eva yathā kathañcid pratīyamāna artham arthasya sattya tām vidadhāti vivecanañca samāna kārā dhīḥ iti śabdasya arthasya prakāra dvi tvena kadācid svarūpa samāna tvāt samāna ākāra artha ākāra samāna tvāt vā prakāra antara asambhavāt svarūpa samāna ākāra tve svarūpam eva tat bhavet na arthaḥ samāna ākāra yogī iti sāmānyam arthaḥ sa ca buddhi ākāraḥ sva lakṣaṇam eva na tat sāmānyam buddhi antarasya tad abhāvāt artha gata tva abhāvāt ca 
[478,xi_478,xiii]	atha artha ākāraḥ eva samānaḥ iti tad ākārā dhīḥ iti vacaḥ tat api asatti am ākāra dvaya pratibhāsana prasaṅgāt pratibhāsate eva tad ākāra dvayam iti ced na yatas sva dṛṣṭau pakṣapātena vacaḥ na atra pratītitaḥ arthaḥ sidhyet samastasya dhvaneḥ sarvatra vṛttitaḥ tatas samāna ākārā dhīḥ iti vyākuleyam dhīra dhiyaḥ atas na sāmānyam 
[478,xiv_479,ii]	atha sāsnādimattvena samāna ākāra tā tad avyatirikta lakṣaṇam sāmānyam deśa kāla viniyata vyakti antareṇa yuktam iti na doṣaḥ asat etat yatas ākṛteḥ api na ekatvam pratyakṣeṇa tathā agrahāt eka tvāt eka vijñāne sarva vyakti grahaḥ bhavet eka tvāt ākṛteḥ eka ākṛti grahaṇe api sarva ākṛtimat artha parigraha prasaṅgaḥ atha gṛhyate eva ākṛtiḥ ākṛtimataḥ tu grahaṇa asambhavaḥ tad bhedāt na hi bhinnam grahītum śakyam anyat tu tādātmyāt eva gṛhyate 
[479,iii_479,v]	tat api asat tad ātmanā hi tādātmyam na tu tādātmyam ucyate pāramparyeṇa tad ātmye abhedaḥ eva prasajyate tadātmā nāmā kṛti antareṇa ākṛti antarasya tādātmyam tad ākṛti antaram ākṛtimatā tad ātmakam iti tad ātmaka ākṛtimat grahaṇam yadi ca ākṛtimataḥ tad abhinnasya na grahaṇam ākṛti antara grahaṇe api tad antara grahaṇan na bhavet na hi abhedaḥ grahaṇa nibandhanam ākṛti mada grahaṇāt 
[479,vi_479,ix]	atha tad bhedāt ākṛti antaram eva tat na bhavati evantarhi ākṛtya bhedāt ākṛtimat antaram api na bhavet etenā bhāṣya kāra vacanam nirastam na hi ekatra utsannā sarvatra utsannā bhavati vyakti antarat no palabhyate na hi ākṛtya bhedāt tat abhinnam vyakti antaram bhavati ākṛti antara vat eva atha ākṛtimat antaram eva bhavati kārṣṇya ādi bhedāt na ākṛti antaram tat asat kārṣṇya ādi vyatiriktañcetat bhedāt bheditā kutas tad saṃsargeṇa bhedaḥ ced ākṛteḥ api asau na kim 
[479,x]	yadi kṛṣṇa tva ādikam anya deva ākṛtimataḥ kathantat bhedāt bhedaḥ na hi anyat bhinnam anyat bhinatti kāraṇa tvena bhinati evam ced na kāraṇa tva abhāvāt na hi guṇāḥ eva dravyasya kāraṇam tad eka yogakṣematayā udayāt kāraṇa tve vā tasmāt aparaḥ bhinnaḥ udeti tasya api apareṇa saṃsargiṇā bhedakena bhavitavyam na ca kāraṇam eva saṃsargi anyathā agniḥ api dhūmasya saṃsargī bhavet na evam adṛṣṭeḥ iti ced saṃsargiṇaḥ api tarhi kāraṇa tvam na dṛṣṭam iti na kāraṇa tvam kalpanīyam 
[479,xi_479,xii]	abheda pakṣe bhedaḥ ced ākṛteḥ api bhinna tā bhinnādabhinnam bhinnam hi na anyathā bhinna tā bhavet ākṛtimataḥ a bhinnam kārṣṇya ādikam tatas bhinnādabhinnam yat tat api bhinnam iti ākṛtimataḥ bhedaḥ ākṛteḥ api tarhi tad abhedāt bheda prasaṅgaḥ ākṛtiḥ api na ākṛtimataḥ bhidyate tatas ca bhinnādabhinnā bhinnā bhavati ākṛtimat antarāt ākṛteḥ ca ākṛtiḥ abhinna eva ced na hi ākṛteḥ gguṇa bhūtāyāḥ guṇena kṛṣṇa tva ādinā saṃsargaḥ guṇānām parasparam asamavāyāt guṇavati samavāyaḥ tu guṇānām iti samayaḥ na yuktam etat 
[479,xiii_479,xvii]	bhede vaktum idam yuktam abhedena avibhāgataḥ idam atra na ca idam hi kalpanā bhinna bhāvinī bhedaḥ tarhi bhavatu etat bāla krīḍana kambhavet bheda pakṣam parityajya pakṣa antara samāśrayāt tatra api doṣasya dṛśā punar pūrva samāśrayāt tasmāt na sāmānyam ākṛti lakṣaṇam api etena pradhāna lakṣaṇam api pratyuktam tasya api anvaye sakala tad avasthā grahāt sarvasya sarva darśi tva prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthānām pradhāna rūpāt a tattva antara tvāt 
[480,i_480,ii]	atha paramārthataḥ sarvam eva pratibhāsitam bhrāntyā tu apratibhāsaḥ iti vibhramaḥ tat api ayuktam yatas sarvasya apratibhāsaḥ kim pratibhāse api vā bhramaḥ pramāṇam atra na asti eva kevalā kalpanā eva tu kāraṇe śakti rūpeṇa sarveṣām eva yā sthitiḥ tatas pradhānantat sarva jagatā mudyodyaḥ tat eva yadi sāmānya vyāpi nitya tayā sthiteḥ vyaktiḥ vyaktiḥ dṛśyamānā paraspara vibhedataḥ 
[480,v_480,viii]	idam atra viruddham yat ucyate guṇānām su mahat rūṃpa na dṛṣṭi patham ṛcchati yat tu dṛṣṭi patha prāptam tat māyā iva su tucchakam yatas kārya dvāreṇa yat kalpyam tasya tucchatayā nanu tasya api tucchatā hetau tad rūpasya eva sambhavāt atha anyat eva satkārya vādaḥ samprati hīyate yat ca na eva īkṣyate vastu tat eva apāramārthikam 
[480,x_480,xiii]	tasmāt pradhāna lakṣaṇam api na sāmānyam atha api syāt yadi api na sāmānyam kāla bheda bhinna vyakti vyāpi gṛhyate pūrva apara bhāve pratyakṣasyā pravṛtteḥ samāna kāla bhinna deśa vyakti vyāpi tu gṛhyate eva tat api asat yasmāt bhinna kāla bhava vyakti vyāpteḥ agrahaṇe sati na sāmānya upayoga usti vyavahāraḥ tathā na hi 
[480,xiv]	śveta chāgam ālabheta iti pūrva dṛṣṭa ālambhanasya tat eva idam iti jāti anvayāt ālambana artham tad vyavahāra arthibhiḥ sāmānyam iṣyate yugapad dṛṣṭayoḥ ca na tad vyavahāra upayogi tā dvayoḥ api pūrvanusāreṇa tad jāti tayā pratīteḥ na ca pūrva aparayoḥ api pūrva uttara vyakti spaṣṭa itara ākāra vyatirekāt aparam sāmānyam īkṣyate tatha samāna kālayoḥ api spaṣṭa dvaya ākārāt kathantarhi samānāḥ vetau iti pratyayaḥ ayam pratyayaḥ pūrva uttara kāla bhāvinoḥ api samānaḥ tathā hi 
[480,xv_480,xvii]	tatra na asti samānā samākāraḥ pratyakṣeṇa samīkṣitaḥ samāna kāla vyaktīnām api na īkṣaṇam akṣataḥ sāma nyasya iti vākya śeṣaḥ na samāna ākāra tā pūrva apara vyakti vat samāna kālānām api nirūpyate vyatirekiṇī pratyayaḥ eva ayam kevalaḥ pratīyamānasya adṛṣṭeḥ na hi pratīyamāna ākāra vinākṛtaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyeti kiñcid 
[480,xviii_480,xx]	pratyayaḥ samāna ākāraḥ sa nirālambana udayaḥ tad grāhya apratibhāsi tvāt pūrva uttara viśe ṣa vat yaḥ samāna ākāraḥ sa sakalaḥ nirālambanaḥ pratyayaḥ tatra grāhya apratibhāsāt tat yathā bhinna kāla vyakti sāmānya ālamba nābhimataḥ apratibhāsamāna sāmānya ākāraḥ ca samāna kāla vyakti sāmānya viṣayaḥ api pratyayaḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ 
[480,xxi_481,ii]	atha sa pratyayaḥ samāna tām antareṇa sarvasya vilakṣaṇa tvāt katham udayī tat api yat kiñcit pratyayaḥ yadi nāma ayam kvacid eva pravarttate niyamaḥ hetu mātra tve sāmānye tu gatiḥ katham na ahetukaḥ niyamaḥ iti hetuḥ eva parikalpanām arhati sāmānyasya tu kim āyātam athavā tad anya vyāvṛtti mātram eva astu sāmānyam iti na kṣatiḥ sā ca arūpā iti pratipāditam api ca 
[481,iii_481,v]	āropitaḥ yaḥ ākāraḥ vāsanā bīja bodhataḥ tāvat mātreṇa paryāptaṃjātiḥ anyā vṛthā na kim vyavahāra mātram avicārita ta tattvayā api jātyā sampadyate eva kim aparaḥ paratra prayāsaḥ āsthīyate dharma adharma prasidhi artha jātiḥ ced pāram ārthikī dharma sādhana tā tasyāḥ kena mānena mīyatām 
[481,vi_481,viii]	dharma ādi sādhana tvam hi jāteḥ svarūpeṇa prasiddhāt api na vivekena gamyate jāti antarāt abhedāt na ca tathā aprasiddhā satī kārya upayoginī iti vyarthaḥ eva jāti grahaḥ athavā tathābhūta pratyaya viśeṣa upalakṣita vyaktīnām eva dharma ādi sādhana tvam iti tat eva sāmānyam atha yadi sāmānyam nittyam vyāpi na bhavet samāna ākāraḥ eva vyāpī na bhavet pratyayaḥ tat ayuktam 
[481,ix_481,xi]	kāraṇantasya kim api pratyayasya iti gamyate prameya ākāra sadbhāvāt prameya parikalpanā na ca samāna ākāra prameya anubhavaḥ tathā ca prāk pratipāditam tasmāt pratyakṣataḥ ananubhavāt abhāvaḥ eva sāmānyasya dṛśyamānasya api rūpasya tad aparasādhāraṇa tvena ananubhavāt a sāmānyam nanu eka vyakti niṣṭha tvāt sāmānyasya dharmiṇaḥ abhāvāt bhavataḥ dharmiṇaḥ asiddha tvāt āśraya asiddha tā 
[481,xii_481,xvi]	na sat etat prasaṅga sādhanam idam na āśraya asiddha tā tatas yadi evam syāt idam api na ca ubhayam iti iṣṭitaḥ yadi evam eka vyakti niṣṭa tvam tadā na deśa viśeṣavatā anyena yogaḥ na ca ubhayam iti syāt nanu yadi anyena yogaḥ eka vyakti niṣṭha tvam na syāt siddha sāvyatā na ekasyām vyaktau sthitiḥ sarva vyakti vyāpi tvāt na ekasyām eva vyaktau sthitam sāmānyam iṣyate na eṣa doṣaḥ sādhāraṇa tve tasya syāt vayāpita āvitti rakṣataḥ na hi tad rūpam anyena rūpeṇa grāhyam abhramam 
[481,xvii]	yadi vyāpi sāmānyam vyāpitayā eva adhyakṣaṇe pramāṇena gṛhyeta na khalu viparīta grahaṇam pramāṇam yadi ca vyāpitā pratīyate sakala vyakti pratītiḥ eva bhavet vyāpya grahaṇe vyāpaka tāyāḥ apratīteḥ na ca pratīyate tatas na tathārūpam tena sāmānyam eva na asti iti ubhaya dharma nivṛttiḥ yadi ayam sthita pakṣaḥ syāt bhavet dharmya siddhi doṣaḥ paraspara virodha prakaṭana param eva etat na vayam evambhūtam artham pratipattum kṣamāḥ evambhūtasya aparasya adarśanāt anumānañca na dṛṣṭāntam vinā avatarati 
[481,xviii_482,ii]	atha sāmānyam anyathā anupapattyā pratīyamānam sakala apara padārtha vilakṣaṇam eva na tasya anya dharma virodhena virodhaḥ udbhāvanīyaḥ na hi anya dharmonyasya yuktaḥ na hi mūrtta padārtha dharmāḥ amūrtte sāmānye yojanīyāḥ na etat asti yatas amūrtenti aviśeṣe api vyāpitā na iṣyate paraiḥ tadvat avyāpitā prāptā sāmānyasya api gṛhyatām 
[482,iii_482,iv]	ye api khalu amūrtti saṅga tāḥ antyāḥ viśeṣāḥ te api pratiniyata adhiṣṭhānāḥ na vyāpinaḥ tathā sāmānyam api na amūrttat avyāpitām atikrāmet atha sa viśeṣaḥ amūrtta tve api avyāpī tattvāt eva na tarhi mūrttetara svabhāva kṛtoyam vibhāgaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ eva tarhi vyāpita itara tve nibandha nam bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced nanu asiddhiḥ eva 
[482,v_482,viii]	nanu sāmānyam siddham eva tvayā api dharmi tayā upādānāt na etat asti yatas vyāpitā agra gahaṇe sāmānya grahaṇam katham ucyatām sva rūpeṇa grahaḥ tasya yadi sāmyam tatas katham gṛhyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ sva rūpeṇa hi gṛhyamāṇam sāmānyam vyapitayeta rathāḥ vā gṛhyeta vyāpita agrahaṇañcet na pratyakṣasyeyatī gatiḥ yad aśeṣa vyakti vyāpi sāmānye asya pravarttanam 
[482,ix_482,xii]	atha vyaktayaḥ na gṛhyante tathā tarhi sāmānyam eka vyakti samanvitam gṛhyamāṇam katham vyāpitayā gṛhītam eka vyakti viśeṣaṇa tve tad vyakti viśeṣaṇam viśeṣa vat asāmānyam bhavet atha paryāya antareṇa vyakti antara viśeṣaṇa tā grahaṇam api tathā sati tat eva idam sāmānyam iti katham gatiḥ tat eva idam iti pratītiḥ nnādhyakṣa iti vicāritam tasmāt asiddham eva sāmānya rūpa tvam katham vyāpita asādhanam tasmāt na amūrtta tvāt na sāmānyāt vyāpita asādhanam kvacid pratyakṣeṇa ca naḥ dṛṣṭiḥ iti sāmānya śūnyatā yadi sāmānyam asiddham kathambhavatā sāmānya viṣaya vyāpi tvam sādhyate dharmi tvena sāmānyasya upādāne tatra dharmasyam kasyacid sādhanam na anyathā 
[482,xiii]	na sat etat yatas uktam etat prasaṅga sādhanam etat na tu ayam maulaḥ hetuḥ yadi tvayā sāmānyam vyāpi abhyupagamyate pramāṇena tat pratipattavyam pratyakṣasya tad ādinā pramāṇa nibandhana tvāt abhyupagamasya deśa kāla avacchinna eka vyakti saṃsarga avacchinna svabhāva antara viraha tayā ca pratīyamānam katham vyāpi tat iti abhyupagantum yuktam pratyakṣeṇa ca aneka vastu grahaṇena tad vyatiriktam anyathā vā pratīyate iti na apratīyamāna abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ ākṛtiḥ eva sāmānyam upalabhyamānā iti ced na ākṛteḥ vyāpitvā abhāvāt vyāpi tvena upalambhe sakala vyakti upalambhaḥ syāt tathā ca deśa kāla bhinna sakala vyakti pratīti prasaṅgaḥ eka vyakti niṣṭha tve ca ākṛtera pya yāpitā sādhane dharmya siddhiḥ api parihṛtā eva kathantarhi prasaṅga sādhanam etat pareṇa ākṛtiḥ eva sāmānyam abhyupagatam anyena anyat iti prasaṅga sādhana tā 
[482,xiv_483,i]	athavā vyāpi tvāt na eka vyakti niṣṭhatayā upalambhaḥ syāt iti prasaṅga arthaḥ viparyastu maulaḥ hetuḥ prasaṅgaḥ tu maulaḥ tu hetoḥ vyāpti sādhana arthaḥ eva anye tu virahāt iti maulaḥ hetuḥ prasaṅgaḥ tat nīyamānaḥ eva maula niṣṭhatāñca darśayitum evam upanyāsaḥ virahāt iti ca hetuḥ prasajya pratiṣedha rūpaḥ sa ca abhāve api sāmānyasya siddhaḥ eva na hi abhāve hetau vastu rūpaḥ dharmī abhyupagamyate 
[483,ii_483,v]	tad abhāvāt ca tat na iti vacanāḥ da pi tad gateḥ tat asat eva sāmānyam yadi dharmi syāt tatra avyāpi tva sādhanam abhāva mātrake hetau kva kiṅkena prasādhyatām viraha mātrakasya hetu tve tasya kenacid asambandhāt katham sādhya sādhanam atha vyakti antara saṃsargga virahaḥ tadā api kasya asau iti nirūpyam eva tasmāt niyamena paroktena sāmānyena buddhi sthena bhavitavyam na ca pakṣa dharma upasaṃhāram antareṇa hetuḥ samarthaḥ sādhya sādhanāya 
[483,vi_483,viii]	atha anya apoha lakṣaṇam sāmānyam siddham saugatānām tathā asati parasya iṣṭam eva para abhyupagatasya tena api dūṣayitum abhipreta tvāt api ca anya apoha lakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya vyāpitā iṣyate eva tathā hi vyāvṛttyā api samāna tā asti eva vastu na anveti pravṛtti ādi prasaṅgataḥ atha sāmānyasya avidyamānasya api viraha lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ asti eva iti 
[483,ix_483,x]	tat api asat avidyamānasya hetu tva ayogāt avidyamāne sādhye yogaḥ eva iti ced na pratibandhe sati eka abhāva unya abhāvam gamayet pratibandhaḥ ca anvayena gṛhyate atas tad sāmarthyāt yatra vyāpakaḥ na asti tatra vyāpya abhāvaḥ iti vipakṣe abhāva mātram ādarśyate na sa maulaḥ hetuḥ atha vyāpaka tā anupalabdhiḥ api pratiniyata vastu viṣaya abhāva sādhanāya upādīyate tathā sati na atra śiṃśapā iti nyāyāt anyena dharmiṇā bhavitavyam pramāṇa prasiddhena atha atra api bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇam dharmīṃti upādīyate 
[483,xi_483,xiv]	tat api ayuktam bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇasya aparasya abhāvāt vikalpa pratibhāsaḥ eva ubhaya dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ iti ced evam tarhi tasmin bhāva anupādāne sādhye asya anupalambhanam anyaḥ eva hetuḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt na atra maulaḥ hetuḥ sāmānyasya dharmiṇaḥ siddheḥ abhāvāt rūpa ādayaḥ eva sāmānyam iti pakṣe na idam prasaṅga sādhanam pratyakṣeṇa teṣām avyāpita apratīteḥ tasmāt ubhaya vādi siddhi eva hetuḥ nna tu anyatarasya prativādinaḥ eva 
[483,xv_484,i]	nanu yaḥ ubhaya siddhaḥ saḥ arthaḥ eva kim artham artha grahaṇam na etat asti yatas kalpanānā mātrataḥ siddhaḥ yathā ekasya ubhayoḥ api kalpanā hi na na nāma etāḥ niyata udaya saṅgamāḥ tatas ubhaya siddha tve api pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tva ādeḥ artha tva abhāvāt ahetu tvam yatas tad artha grahaṇam śabda kalpanā āropita ātmanām aliṅga tva prasidhi artham arthāt artha prasiddhitaḥ yad artha grahaṇam sva dṛṣṭa grahaṇa viśeṣyam tad chadbakalpanā mātra ghaṭita ātma nām ahetutā pratipādana artha arthasya eva gamaka tva sambhavāt 
[484,ii]	nanu asiddha viruddha anaikāntika lakṣaṇaḥ eva hetuḥ apratinna artha pratipādane yadi ca asya traiḥ upyam asti katham ahetuḥ atha trairūpya abhāvaḥ tadā sva artha anumāna lakṣaṇāt eva nivṛttiḥ kim artha grahaṇena trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam hi para artha anumānam na sva artha anumāne api kalpanā āropitam trairūpyam prāptam eva hetu lakṣaṇam kathantataḥ nivṛttiḥ na atra tarhi tad artha grahaṇam karttavyam sva artha anumānaḥ eva karttavyatā prāpteḥ 
[484,iii_484,v]	atra ucyate sva niścaya vat anyeṣām iti vacanāt atra kṛtam tatrāmi bhaviṣyati iti adoṣaḥ tatra eva kasmāt na iti ced tatra vā kriyatā amātrava iti kaḥ virodhaḥ asti ca atra prayojanam tathā hi kalpanā ādi kṛtam hetum sva arthe kaścid na kalpayet ātmānam eva kim kaścid visamvāda yatī hitāt kiñca para arthaḥ eva yatna paraḥ kāryaḥ iti ca atra eva mahān yatnaḥ vidheyaḥ mahātmanā iti artha grahaṇam atra paramārthataḥ tu kalpanā āropitaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ eva tathā hi 
[484,vi_484,vii]	kalpanā āgamayoḥ karttuḥ icchā mātra anurodhataḥ vastunaḥ ca anyathā bhāvāt tad kṛtāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ na khalu kalpanā samāropitasya sādhya vastu pratibandhaḥ vāsanā mātra pravarttita tvāt yadi evam apratibandhāt eva na hetuḥ na pratibandhasya atas eva ākṣepāt na hi sākṣāt pratibandha pratipādanam asti tata urtha grahaṇam na hi pakṣa sapakṣa antara tvam nittya anittyayoḥ ekatra niyatam yaḥ yaḥ pakṣīkriyate tad apekṣayā tatra tatra sañcārāt na ca īdṛśī vastu siddhiḥ vivakṣa antarenyasya sādhanāt 
[484,viii_484,x]	nanu pakṣaḥ sādhyaḥ eva tad apekṣayā anyasya sa pakṣa tvāt tatra pakṣa sama pakṣa anyatara tvam nāma dharmaḥ tad vipakṣāt vyāvarttate tatas kathat na hetuḥ na hi pakṣa sa pakṣa niyataḥ dharmaḥ sādhya vyabhicārī tat asat yatas na pakṣasya sa pakṣasya bhāvasya niyamaḥ kvacid na pakṣaḥ nitya tā mātram aparasya api sambhavāt 
[484,xi_485,ii]	yadi ayam arthaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tvāt iti śabda ghaṭa anitya tā sāmānya avyabhicarita dharma yogāt iti tadā sa dharmaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ eva avyabhicaritasya sādharmyasya anyatara śabdena pratipādanāt na tva vyabhicārī dharmaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ eva evam ca sati sa hetuḥ arthaḥ eva na kalpitaḥ atha pakṣīkṛta itara tvena vivakṣita tvāt tat asat yadi api nāma anitya tayā pakṣatva vivakṣā tathā api na tāvatā anitya tā sidhyati nitya tayā vivakṣita tve tadā eva apagamāt vāstavañcet anityatayā pakṣa tvam prasidhyet siddham eva sādhitam bhavet tasmāt na kalpitaḥ dharmaḥ sādhanam 
[485,iii_485,iv]	sa ca sva siddhaḥ arthaḥ sādhanam trirūpam eva liṅgam atas trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam para artham anumānam tatas yaiḥ pakṣa vacanam api sādhanam iṣyate ayukta vādinaḥ te iti pratipāditam bhavati tasya asiddha tvāt sādhanam hi sādhyam sādhayet na sādhyam eva vādhyam sādhanāt vacanam sādhanam iti ced na vacanasya sākṣāt asādhana tvāt sādhya apratibandhāt na vacanasya arthe pratibandhaḥ tasmāt arthāt artha gateḥ śaktiḥ pakṣa hetu abhidhānayoḥ na arthe tena tayoḥ nna asti svatas sādhana saṃsthitiḥ 
[485,v_485,vi]	anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti trirūpam kṛtaka tvam eva anitya tām gamayati tasya tatra avyabhicārāt na pakṣa vacanam hetu vacanam vā anyathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāk iti sādhya siddhiḥ bhavet atra api hetu pakṣa vacanam asti tad arthasya tatra apratibandhāt ahetuḥ iti ced arthāt eva tarhi arthasya gatiḥ pratibandhāt na vacanam sākṣāt sādhanam iti prāptam vacanasya artham antareṇa api bhāvāt yatra ca hetu vacanam asādhana tatra pakṣa vacanasya asādhana tvam anukta siddhim eva atha sādhya vacanam sādhya arthaṃpratipādanāt sādhanam na hetu vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt atha pratijñā mātram na sādhanam iti hetuḥ upādīyate katham asādhanam sādhanam sahitam sādhanam iti ced katham anupayogi sāhityam vidadhyāt na anupayoginā kaścid sāhityam vāñchati tasmāt na vacanam sādhanam api ca 
[485,vii_485,viii]	tat pakṣa vacanam vaktuḥ abhiprāya nivedane pramāṇam saṃśaya utpatteḥ tatas sākṣāt na sādhanam na hi saṃśaya hetuḥ eva tatra hetuḥ artha apratibaddha tvena ca saṃśaya hetu tvam anyathā hetu pādānam anarthakam yathā tarhi vacanam sādhya artha asādhanam tathā sādhana arthaḥ api na eva tasmāt pratipattavyaḥ tatra api na eva tasya pratibandhaḥ pratibandhe vā sādhye api kaḥ pratibandhaḥ prativandhasya 
[485,ix_486,i]	sattyam etat sādhana artham api na eva vacanam pratipādayati tatra abhiprāya nivedane pramāṇa tvāt atas sākṣāt na sādhanam sādhane api pramāṇam eva vacanena ākṣipyate sādhye api pramāṇam ākṣipyatām iti ced na tadānīm eva tatra pramāṇa sadbhāvāt pūrva vṛttam hi pramāṇam ākṣipyate vacanena tatra vismaraṇa sambhavāt varttamāne tu pramāṇam pratyakṣam eva kintatra vacanena na hi pratyakṣe arthe para upadeśaḥ garīyān yasmāt vacanam asādhanam pāramparyeṇa tarhi sādhanam pakṣasya vacanam yathā sādhanasya etat api asat 
[486,ii_486,iii]	sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāramparyaiṇa na api asaṃ śaktasya sūcakam hetu vacaḥ aśaktam api svayam yathā sādhana vacanam sādhanam tathā pakṣa vacanam api bhavet yadi śaktasya sūcakam bhavet pramāṇa siddhasya asiddhasya tu sūcanam katham sādhanam na hi svayam aśaktam aśaktam āśritya śaktimat tathā hi 
[486,iv_486,vi]	na patantam āśritya patat sthirībhavati kvacid tathā a siddham asiddhena na tena eva prasādhyate sādhyasya pakṣa vacanena asiddhatayā abhidhānāt katham sādhanam pakṣa vacanam hetu vacanantu svayam aśaktam api śaktasya vācakam iti sādhanam uktam pratibaddhasya sādhyerthe sādhanasya abhidhānataḥ vacanam sādhanam proktam sādhanam tat svatas na tu 
[486,vii]	tatas yat uktam parārthañca anumānañcā iti vyāhatam tathā hi pratipādya apekṣayā sva artham eva pratipādaka apekṣayā tu anuvāda mātrakam tad nirākṛtam yatas anumānantat anu māna kāraṇa tvena upacārataḥ uktam na svatas tatas prativādi apekṣayā tat sva artham iti yat kiñcana vādi tā eva tasya hi tri rūpam eva liṅgam pratipādaka tvāt svārtha na vacanam tatorthasya apratipatteḥ smaraṇena tasya api upakāraka tvāt pratipādakam eva iti ced na arthavāda mātrakasya vacanena vidhānāt tatas ubhaya apekṣayā api vacanam anuvādaḥ eva parārtha tā tasya pratipādaka apekṣayā na pratipādakasya tena kakcit upakāraḥ anumāna kāraṇa tvena tu anumānantad pratipādya apekṣayā eva 
[486,viii]	nanu artha apekṣayā para artha m anyapekṣayā anumānam iti prāptam tat katham etat nanu guṇaḥ eva hi doṣatayā adhyāropyate yena eva tasya pratipādakasya tad anumānan na bhavati pratipādyasya vātaḥ eva tat pratipādakasya para artham anyathā sva artham api bhavet svayam api tena tasya artha karaṇāt upacāre ca prayojanam uktam vacanasya anyena prakāreṇa artha sādhana abhāvāt nanu smaraṇe api vacanam pramāṇam apramāṇam vā pramāṇañcet kinna arthe athā pramāṇam katham tatas smaraṇam atas eva anyathā tatas pramāṇam eva bhavet na smaraṇam smaraṇe ca tad kārakam na jñāpakam iti pramāṇa svabhāvaḥ smaraṇam eva tatas katham arthe pratibandha abhāvāt ghamaḥ hi pāvake pratibaddhaḥ iti janayati smaraṇam tat yadi śabdaḥ api pratibaddhaḥ tathā smaraṇam janayet 
[486,ix_486,xii]	tathā hi yat yat smaraṇam tat asti pratibandhataḥ yathā asti dhūmāt smaraṇam parokṣe kṛṣṇava atmani tat asat na smaraṇa mātrakam pratibaddha tvāt iti pratibandhaḥ smaraṇañca bhaviṣyati apratibaddha tvāt ca iti konayoḥ virodhaḥ tathā hi ābhogat api dṛṣṭerthe smaraṇam kinna jāyate yatas kutaścid arthāt vā prāyeṇa sahacāriṇaḥ atha niścita rūpam smaraṇam sambaddhāt eva na anyatas 
[487,i]	tat yuktam na hi asati pratibandhe tasya niścayaḥ tatra kintu śabdāt niścita rūpam smaraṇam iti asiddham atas na sambandha siddhiḥ tathā hi sambandham anālocayataḥ saṃdehaḥ eva bhavati śabdāt ca sandehaḥ upajāyamānaḥ upalabhyate eva kathantarhi niścayaḥ evame vai tat yathā āha ayam iti na pramāṇāt eva tad niścayāt yatas pūrva pravṛtta pramāṇa paryālocanāt eva niścayaḥ na vacana mātrāt pramāṇe tarhi niścayaḥ na vacanāt tathā api vacanam pramāṇam eva atra ucyate 
[487,ii_487,iii]	etat iṣyate eva atra pramāṇe tad svatas na hi asmin arthe prasiddhe api na kācid naḥ kṣatiḥ yatas arthe hi vacanam apramā pramāṇe tu pramāṇam iti na eva kiñcid kṣīyate na ca pramāṇam api vacanāt sidhyati tasya sva samvedanena siddheḥ smaraṇa mātram eva tatra bhavati niścayaḥ tu sva samvedanāt eva kin na vacana mātreṇa bhavati eva ābhoga mātrāt api smaraṇa darśanāt atha yadābhogataḥ na bhavati tadā vacane pramāṇam iti ced na sat etat yatas 
[487,iv_487,vi]	mithyā smaraṇam api arthe vacanāt jātam īkṣyate vacanasya viśeṣaḥ na sattyāsattyatayā īkṣyate īkṣaṇertha unumā anantatsva artham eva tadā bhavet ābhogāt api jāyante mithyā smaraṇa vṛttayaḥ tasmāt pūrva pramāṇa svarūpa avadhāraṇam atyanta paryālocanataḥ eva kutaścid liṅgāt iti na vacanam pramāṇam pramāṇena api arthena api ābhogaḥ iti anumānam eva parokṣe arthe pramāṇam tad dvāreṇa vacanam 
[487,vii_487,ix]	nanu pramāṇam pratibandha grāhi idānīm atītam iti katham pratibandha niścayaḥ smaraṇam idānīn na ca tad pramāṇam tena pramāṇena janita tvāt pramāṇam eva tatas ca pramāṇāt smaraṇam jātam upacārāt pramā na kim apramāṇāt tu yat jātam apramāṇanta diṣyate nanu pramāṇāt etat smaraṇam iti smṛtiḥ eva atra api nibandhanam tat api smaraṇam anyatas smaraṇāt pariśuddhi bhāj iti kutas niścayaḥ jāyatām 
[487,x_487,xii]	dṛḍham smaraṇam etat ced mithyā dāḍharyan na kim matam artha prāpteḥ nna mithyā ced siddha upasthānam eva tat atra api ucyate uktam eva ādau etat svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa vyavahāraḥ ca artha prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ eva upalabhyate na anyaḥ upayogī nanu svatas eva kiñcid dṛḍham smaraṇam tatoyam pramāṇat iti niścayaḥ na vyavahārāt iti ced 
[487,xiii_487,xv]	tat asat yatas abhyāsāt eva dṛḍha tā sā asti prāpti samāśrayāt anyat abhyastam anyatra dṛḍha tā na eva jāyate yadi ayam artha prāpti lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ na abhaviṣyat abhyastaḥ tat katham prāpti upayogi dāḍharyam bhavet anyat abhyastam anyatra dāḍharyam iti saḥ eva vyavahāra ucchedaḥ lokasya syāt tasmāt etāvatī gatiḥ saṃsāriṇām iti sāṃvyavahārikam pramāṇama vi calitam iti na doṣaḥ tasmāt vacanam anumāna kāraṇa tvāt anumānam iti sthitam etat 
[487,xvi_488,iv]	nanu ācāryasya pakṣa vacanam abhimatam eva yat āha sva niścaya vat anyeṣām niścaya utpādana icchayā pakṣa dharma tva sambandha sādhya ukteḥ anya varjanam na etat asti yatas hetu artha viṣaya tvena tad aśakta uktiḥ īritā yat āha asmākantu tatra anumeya nirdeśaḥ hetu artha vipayaḥ mataḥ 
[488,v_488,vi]	asmākantu yonu meya nirddeśaḥ sa hetu artha viṣaya tvena na sādhana tvena atas sākṣāt sādhana tva pratikṣepāt tasya sādhyasya ukteḥ aśakta tā kathitā kathantarhi pakṣa dharma tvam sambandha sa adhya ukti nirddeśa abhyupagamaḥ na asya ayam arthaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ ca sambandhaḥ ca sādhya uktiḥ ca iti api tu sambandha ukti saṅga tā sādhya uktiḥ sambaḥ dhasādhyoktiḥ yat kṛtakam tat anittyam iti vyāpti antargatā sādhya uktiḥ nna pratijñā rūpeṇa avaśyam hi sādhane vyāpaka tvam sādhyasya upadarśanīyam atas avayava dvayam eva darśanīyam sambandhena rūpa dvaya ākṣepāt eva tri rūpa tā hetoḥ tasmāt anittyaḥ śabdaḥ iti na ādau antevā darśanīyam rūpa dvaya mātrakāt eva sādhyasya siddheḥ śaktiḥ tasya api ced hetu vacanasya pravartanāt tad saṃśayena jijñāsoḥ bhavet prakāraṇa āśrayaḥ vipakṣa upagame api etat tulyam iti anavasthitiḥ 
[488,viii]	atha api syāt yadi pakṣa vacana abhāve hetu vacanamata kiṃtam udgura pātāyamānam asambaddham iti na pravarttate tatas hetu vacana pravṛtteḥ tat api sādhanam eva iti na saṃśaya jijñāsā prakaraṇa tad avabodhaḥ icchānām api sādhana tva prāptau daśa avayava tā vākyasya syāt idam atra sandigdham bhavataḥ idam eva jijñāsitam idam eva bhavatā prastutam idam mayā avagatam atra mama icchā iti evam kūrcca śobhā māraca yaḥ tāḥ daśa avayavam vākyam prayoktavyam tathā vipakṣa upagame api sādhanam pravarttate tatas tasya api sādhana tva prasaṅgaḥ tena saha vipakṣasya atha sādhya niścaya mātram saṃdeha ādi pratipādanam antareṇa api bhavati iti na taiḥ śabda prapañca mātra upayogibhiḥ kaścid artha gata urthaḥ tatas saṃśaya ādi parityāgaḥ tad anuvādasya akiñcat kara tvat yadi evam pratijñā vacanam api anuvāda mātram eva vādinaḥ na antaraṅga tā tasya 
[488,ix_488,x]	attaraṅgam tu sāmarthyam triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam tatra smṛti samādhānam tad vacasi ā iva saṃsthitam trirūpāt eva tāvat svārtha anumāne sorthaḥ sādhyaḥ pratīyate na hi sva artha anumāne sādhya arthaḥ prathamam āyāti hetoḥ tena adhyavasitena bhavitavyam tatas sva niścaya vat eva na prathamam sādhya upādānam paścāt rūpa ādānam iti ced paścāt api na upādānam sva artha anumāna vat eva parasya api
[489,i_489,ii]	yadā tri rūpāt upajāyate pratītiḥ tadā tasyāḥ sva artha anumānāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tasmāt pratijñā nigamanayoḥ anuktiḥ eva upanayaḥ api na va ktavyaḥ dṛṣṭa sāmarthya darśana para tvāt na ca tasya tatra sattā mātrāt aparam sāmarthyam tat ca sattā mātram śabde pakṣa dharma tvā deva gatam atha api syāt āgamaḥ pratijñā hetuḥ anumānam pratyakṣam dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ upamānam sarva pramāṇa vyāpāra viṣaya pradarśana param nigamanam 
[489,iii_489,v]	tat etat asat yatas anumānāt prasiddhiḥ ced pramāṇaiḥ atra kim paraiḥ na anumānāt prasiddhiḥ ced pramāṇaiḥ atra kimparaiḥ hetu sāmarthyāt eva yadi asau arthaḥ pratīyate kim apara pramāṇa vyāpāreṇa kim atra kurmaḥ yat sarva pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ na khalu hetu paratantraḥ kāraka grāmaḥ tathā bhavan paryanuyoga bhāgī kim ayam evam bhavati iti sattyam etat yadi evam syāt na khalu pratijñā pramāṇantataḥ saṃśaya utpatteḥ iti pratipādanāt 
[489,vi_489,viii]	upamānam pramāṇam na khalu tathā ca ayami tyupamānam antareṇa hetoḥ sādhya siddhiḥ na idam asti yatas pakṣa dharma tvam eva idam upamānena darśyate tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti evam upadarśitaḥ sāmānyena hi pratibandha grahaṇe katham viśeṣa ādhāra tā a nitya tā ādi prasiddhiḥ viśeṣa ādhāra tayā kṛtaka tva ādeḥ prasiddheḥ sā eva ca viśeṣa ādhāra tā tathā ca ayam iti upamāna prasiddhyā kutas ca ayam iti pakṣa dharma tayā pradarśyate upamānam pramāṇam aparam prasaktam iti ced na anumāna antargata tvāt go sādṛśyāt ayam sa gavayaḥ iti viśeṣa sambandha sādhanam śabdasya upamāna viṣayāt aparaḥ na bhavati iti anumānam eva tatra pramāṇam na anumānam aparam upamāna vādibhiḥ apīṣyate kṛtaka tvena sādṛśyam tasya viṣayaḥ iti ced na kṛta kaḥ tu advaya vyatirekeṇa sādṛśya bhāvāt na daṇḍa ādhāra dvaya vyatirekeṇa aparandaṇḍi tva sādṛśyam 
[489,ix_489,xiii]	sādṛśyam yadi na asti atra vyatireke gatiḥ katham sadṛśoyam iti prāptam anya kāraṇa kalpanam tat asat kāraṇam kalpyate kāryāt dṛṣṭi sambandhataḥ yadi kāraṇena tadā prāptam kāraṇasya api darśanam api ca yadi sādṛśyam atra asti kasmāt na pratibhāsate sūkṣma tvāt iti ced tattvam adṛṣṭe kalpyatām katham bhāva rūpa atirekeṇa vikalpe api na bhāsate nija ābhāsa viviktasya vyavasthā iti mahā adbhutam anādi vāsanāsā aṅgi kalpanā āropita ātmakam sādṛśyan na parīkṣāyām tat tvam asya iti na asti tat vastu sambandha ta ūnena vyavahāraḥ ca sidhyati artha kriyā kutorthaḥ ca sadṛśāt eva na īkṣyate 
[489,xvii_490,i]	avāntara viśeṣaḥ ceta tatra api na kim īkṣyate na khalu sadṛśa abhimatāt eva artha kriyā avāptiḥ yena tad artha kriyā kāri sādṛśyam bhavet mahiṣī āditas api kṣīra ādi artha kriyā avāpteḥ atha avāntara bhedaḥ tatra vidyate tena visadṛśī visadṛśān na tu sā eva artha kriyā yadi evam avāntara bhedaḥ gavām api parasparatā usti eva tatas sādṛśya anurūpa artha kriyā na asti eva iti na samvādaḥ kiñca vilakṣaṇa pratyaya utpatteḥ aparatra vailakṣaṇyam api asti iti prāptam 
[490,iii]	sādṛśya abhāva mātreṇa tat iti ced sādṛśyam api vailakṣaṇya abhāva mātreṇa iti prāptam sādṛśyam eva bailakṣaṇya abhāvaḥ iti ced na kathambhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ vailakṣaṇya abhāvam eva sādṛśyam iti kinna bhavati baila kṣaṇī añca ubha yava ādi prasiddham na tat abhāva mātreṇa sādṛśya vyavahāra parisamāpteḥ anarthakam aparam sādṛśya parikalpanam tasmāt na upamānam aparam pramāṇam 
[490,iv_490,x]	atha pratijñā arthaḥ āgama siddhaḥ iti pratijñā āgamaḥ ucyate evam api kinna pratijñāyāḥ prayojanam tathā hi āgamāt eva siddhoyam yadi arthaḥ kim pratijñayā āgamāt na prasiddhoyam yadi arthaḥ kim pra tijñayā anāgama pramāṇena kimarthaḥ na prasādhyate na pratijñāna mātreṇa sa āgama artha tva sādhanam atha api atyantam abhyāsāt pratijñā hetu mātrataḥ pratīti siddhiḥ tatra asti pratijñā padam arthavat tadā api pañca avayavam abhyasta tvāt kutas vacaḥ pratijñā api tadā na asau pañca dharma tva darśanāt kathantarhi idam uktam asmākam tu pakṣa nirddeśaḥ yaḥ sa na sādhana tvena api tu hetu artha viṣaya tvena iti etat eva āha akhyāpite hi viṣaye hetu vṛtteḥ asambhavāt viṣaya khyāpanāt eva sāmarthyam iti ced matam 
[490,xi]	kṛtaka tvāt iti etāvat mātrakāt anityaḥ iti uktena jñāyate kasya anitya tā sādhyā tatas sa śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti pratijñā padam upādeyam tat idānīm hetu viṣaya tvena na upādīyatām anyathā vā sarvathā asyām bāhya vyavasthāyāma khyāpite viṣaye hetu vṛtteḥ asambhavāt avaśyam viṣayaḥ khyāpayitavyaḥ tatas sādhya siddheḥ prāc avaśyam bhāvaḥ pratijñāyāḥ sādhanasya sādhana tā anyathā sādhana tvasya abhāvāt pramāṇa phala upanyāsaḥ iti ced nirddeśe pramāṇa phalam pratijñā pakṣaḥ iti na nāma antara karaṇāt parihāraḥ sa ca ayam nyāyaḥ śūlam cakram iti āha iti atas viṣaya khyāpanāt eva tasya śakta tā siddhā uktam atra saṃśaya ādīnām api sādhana tva prasaṅgaḥ 
[490,xii_491,i]	viṣaya adarśanañca idam vyāpti pūrva kavācakam anyathā vā vidhīyeta tat idam dvayam api asat viṣayaḥ pratijñayā nidarśanīyaḥ iti atra vicāryate kim vyāptita pūrvaka prayoge atha hetoḥ pañcamyā nirddeśe kiñcātas vyāptiḥ ve vinā api asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ īdṛśaḥ sarve anityāḥ iti prokte api arthāt tad nāśa dhīḥ bhaveta 
[491,ii_491,iii]	yat kṛtakam tat sarvam anityam iti sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti darśane tat vyaptam kṛtaka tvam tatra upadarśitam tathābhūtam eva iti anitya tā śabdasya iti jñāyate eva kim pratijñā pādena viṣaya upadarśana arthena iti anyathā eva viṣayasya prasiddheḥ atha pratijñā pada mantareṇa katham viruddha hetu niścayaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ prativādī viruddhasya parijñātā bhavet iti pratijñā kriyate na eva sva badhāya kim udyamaḥ 
[491,iv_491,v]	yadi pratijñāpada anupādānam katham viruddha uyam hetuḥ iti jñāyate pareṇa iti kasya ayam paryanuyogaḥ vādinaḥ iti ced na samyak etat bhadram eva apatitam mā jñāsīt prativādī kim mayā tasya saurkya karaṇīyam vyāpti pūrvake prayoge śāstra kāreṇa karttavyatayā abhihite vihitaḥ viruddhasya asambhavāt vādinaḥ mahān umapakāraḥ iti ca śāstra kārasya api na doṣaḥ na hi asau vādi badhāya śāstra kṛt prativādinā unugrahaḥ karttavyam eva iti ced kaḥ pradveṣaḥ anyatra iti yat kiñcid etat yadi nittyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt yat kṛta kantat anittyam iti atra viruddha hetu codanam tadā na kaścid anunmattaḥ tadā eva nittya tvam pratijñāya anittya tvena vyāptim upadarśayet atha nittya tvena vyāptim upadarśayet tadā vyāpti viparyayāt eva viruddha tva pratītiḥ api ca yasya pratijñāpada prayogaḥ tad apekṣayā viruddha abhidhānam nittyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti ca avasare atha pratijñā padam antareṇa adṛṣṭa mudgara pātāyamānam sādhana vākyam uddhegāya bhavet atas tad upādānam yatas prakaraṇa artha nivedanāya pratijñā atra ucyate prastāvam antareṇa pratijñā vacanam api adṛṣṭa m udgara āyate eva prativādinā prastāvaḥ kṛtaḥ iti ced kṛtam pratijñāpadena iti alam prasaṅgena 
[491,vi_491,ix]	nanu pratijñā padam antareṇa sādhana nyūna tā bhavet tathā ca āha hīnam anyatamena api avayavena pratijña ādīnām nyūnam sādhana avayava tve hi siddhe tat nayūna tā bhavet sādhana avayava tvañca pratijñāyāḥ nirākṛtam sādhana avayavena nyūnam sādhanam nyūnam bhavet pratijñāyāḥ ca na sādhana avayava tvam yatas anuktau api pakṣasya siddheḥ apratibandhataḥ triṣu anyatama rūpasya eva anuktinnaryūna toditā 
[491,x]	na hi tad asambaddham tad avayavaḥ na api tena nyūnam nyūnam anupayoginā api nyūna tvena anupayoginām anaṅgan tattvāt anyūna tā eva na bhavet atha anupayogya bhāve api na nyūnam pratijñāpadena api tathā satya satā samānam iti acodyam yadi ca pratijñā sādhane sati upagamyate tadā sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti pratijñā lakṣaṇam ati vyāpi bhavet sādhyam asiddham api sādhanam bhavati iti asiddha hetu abhidhānam api pratijñā bhavet yasya tu na pratijñāsādhanantasya sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti api pratijñā lakṣaṇena hetvābhāsasya pratijñā tvam asādhana bhūtasya sādhya nirddeśasya pratijñātvāt 
[492,ii_492,iv]	atas sādhya uktim vā pratijñām sa vadan doṣaiḥ nna yujyate sādhana adhikṛteḥ eva hetvābhāsā prasaṅgataḥ na khalu sādhanam asādhanam bhavati tatas sādhana tvāt tatra aprasaṅga sādhana tvena hetvābhāsasya adhikṛta tvāt sādhya nirddeśa tva abhāvāt pratijñā lakṣaṇasya abhāvāt sādhana ābhāsa nirddeśaḥ na pratijñā 
[492,v_492,vi]	nanu sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā na sādhana nirddeśaḥ iti kutas sādhana ābhāsasya pratijñātva prasaṅgaḥ atra ucyate sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti atra yadi sādhya tvena nirddeśaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ tadā na bhavati sādhana ābhāsaḥ pratijñā asādhya tvena anirddeśāt kintu nirddeśyam anirddiṣṭam bhavet sādhya tvena nirddeśaḥ iti na jñāyate kasya nirddeśaḥ 
[492,vii]	atha sādhanam arhati yaḥ tasya nirddeśaḥ tadā api katham nirddeśaḥ iti prakāra anirddeśāt sādhana tvena sādhya tvena vā iti viśeṣa abhāvāt sādhana ābhāsasya api syāt pratijñā tvam kathañca sādhana tvena sādhya tvena ca nirddeśaḥ iti vaktavyam pañcamyā parayā vā aprathamayā nirddeśaḥ sa sādhana tvena prathamayā sādhya tvena kutas etat tathā śabda artha prasiddheḥ yadi evam sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti pratijñā lakṣaṇan na vidhātavyam sādhya tayā nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti loke prasiddhaḥ śabda arthaḥ pakṣasya tu lakṣaṇam vipratipatti nirāsa artham iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt sādhya nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti lakṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti sādhana ābhāsasya api prasaṅgaḥ 
[492,viii_492,xi]	nanu bhavat pakṣe api sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti katham na hetvābhāsaḥ pratijñā nanu asādhana bhūtaḥ yaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti parihṛtam etat nanu sādhana bhūtaḥ api syāt kadācid iti kaḥ saṃdeha nivṛtti hetuḥ vijātīya tvam eva iti brūmaḥ tathā hi aviśeṣa uktiḥ api eka jātīye saṃśaya āvahā anyathā sarva sādhya ukteḥ pratijñātvam prasajyate 
[492,xii_492,xiv]	ayantāvat idam codya cañcuḥ codayitavyaḥ kriyate ghaṭaḥ iti sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā prasaktā jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt tu tad apekṣaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā yadi evam asādhana bhūtaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti sādhana ābhāsaḥ na pratijñā iti siddham etat siddha ukteḥ sādhana tvāt ced parasya api na duṣyati idānīm sādhya nirddeśaḥ sādhana aviyavaḥ katham nanu paraḥ api etat bruyāt sādhana bhūtaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā sādhana ābhāsaḥ tu na sādhanam asiddha tvāt asādhana tvāt na pratijñā pratijñāyā sādhana tvāt yadi asiddha tvena sādhana ābhāsaḥ na sādhanam pratijñā api asiddhārthā katham sādhanam asiddha tvena eva sādhana tvam pratijñāyāḥ yadi
[493,i]	siddhārthā syāt viṣaya upadarśana tvam eva na bhavet yadi evam sādhana ābhāsaḥ api pratijñā tvena sādhanam anivāritam eva bhavatu pratijñā tvena sādhanam kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ iti ced hetoḥ asiddha tva doṣaḥ na syāt hetvābhāsakhyā pratijñā sādhya rūpāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ na sādhanam tatas doṣaḥ eva iti ced sādhana tve kathat na sādhanam sva artha apekṣayā sādhanam ced na artha sahitasya sādhana tvāt na ca saḥ eva tasya sādhanam sa ca śabda gaḍu mātrasya sādhana tvam sarvatra abhidheyasya sādhana tvāt abhiprāya nivedane tu pramāṇa tā uktā eva 
[493,ii_493,vi]	atha arthaḥ eva sādhanam sarvā tarhi pratijñā bahis artha pratyāyana samartha iti tatas eva sādhya prasiddhiḥ syāt tasmāt sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca tatas siddheḥ anutpatteḥ nna pratijñā sādhanam anyaḥ punar āha pratijñā sādhanam sābhāsa tvena ukteḥ sābhāsa tvasya sādhana tvena saha darśanāt dūṣaṇa vādī āha pratyakṣeṇa anekāntaḥ vacana ātmaka tvena viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti parihāraḥ dūṣaṇena anekāntaḥ iti ced adūṣaṇa tve sati iti parihāraḥ tat etat sakalam asat tathā hi sa ābhāsa ukti ādi upekṣā pa parihāra viḍambanā asambaddhā tathā hi eṣa na nyāyaḥ iti sūcitam 
[493,vii]	na khalu a darśana mātreṇa vipakṣe hetoḥ gamaka tvam na ca asti na eka parihāraḥ yathā kathañcit viśeṣaṇena vipakṣa viruddhena tat parihārāt etat ca uktam prāk adhyayana madhyayana antara pūrvakam iti bhārata adhyayanena akānta paricodane vedena viśeṣaṇāt iti parihāraḥ ukteḥ kaḥ pūnarvede viśeṣaḥ yadi anyathādhyetum na śakyate na bhavati eva parihāraḥ na hi viśeṣaṇam aviruddham vipakṣeṇa asmāt hetum vyāvarttaḥ i yatum alam anyathā aneka tve satī iti kaḥ vaktum na śaknuṃyāt tasmāt asat etad upakṣepa parihāra ādikam iti pūrvakam eva dūṣaṇam pratijñāyāḥ sādhana tvasya 
[493,viii_493,x]	yadi tarhi pratijñāyāḥ na avaśyam niddaśaḥ kim artham tarhi pakṣa lakṣaṇam hetu sāmarthyāt gamyamānaḥ eva sādhya arthaḥ sa ca pakṣaḥ bhavatya nyaḥ thāḥ vā kim anena vicāreṇa yathā pratīyate tathā bhaviṣyati sattyam etat gamya artha tve api sādhya ukteḥ asaṃmohāya lakṣaṇam tat catur llakṣaṇam rūpa nipāteṣu svayam padaiḥ asiddha asādhana artha ukta vādi abhyupagama grahaḥ 
[494,i^1]	lakṣaṇam hi nāma sakalam eva vyāmoha dhvastaye prakāśanīyam aparimapi ca vacaḥ tatra ca sādhya itara viparyaya viṣayā mahatām api mahatyaḥ vipratipattayaḥ anapanīyamānāḥ ca mahāntam anartha pratha prasthān anayam upanayanti na khalu a nirākṛtaḥ doṣa samāgamaḥ śreyase tathā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti paratva mātram asādhyam api sādhyam iti āhuḥ sādhyam api ātma artham asādhyam siddham api śāstrāt sādhyam āhuḥ śāstra prāmāṇya vādinaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti anena lakṣaṇena sādhana tvena nirdiṣṭasya api pakṣa tvam prāptim iti ca vipratipattiḥ śāstra kāre ṇe ṣṭam asādhyam api anabhyupagame api sādhyam tatas tad nirākaraṇāya caturbhiḥ svarūpa nipātaḥ iṣṭaḥ svayam padaiḥ asiddhaḥ asādhana artha ukta vādya bhyupagama grahaḥ veditavyaḥ
[494,i^2]	 asiddhaḥ eva sādhyaḥ evam anyat api tatas avadhāraṇāt etad viparyaya nirāsaḥ veditavyaḥ tatra nyāyaḥ yadi śāstrāt eva pramāṇa bhūtāt asau arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kim punar pramāṇena apareṇa sādhyate param prati pramāṇan na śāstram iti tad artham iti ced ātmanaḥ katham pramāṇam abhyupagamāt eva iti ced paraḥ api abhyupagamayitavyaḥ tathā yadi tat sādhyam kim iti sādhana tvena nirddeśaḥ artha uktasya tu asādhya tve vākya artha jña tā eva na syāt anyatra ca siddha sādhya tā prakaraṇa sāmarthya śabda antara sannidhānebhyaḥ śabda artha niścayāt aprakaraṇa jñaḥ punar nna vivakṣitam artham pratyeti iti kaḥ tena saha vyavahāra mārga avatāraḥ tathā ca pravājaḥ udīrita ūrthaḥ paśunā api gṛhyeta kaḥ tatra sāmarthya atiśayaḥ atas eva āha 
[494,ii_494,iv]	anuktaḥ api icchayā vyāptaḥ sādhye ātma arthavat mataḥ tat yathā saṃghātānām parārthye sādhye ātma artha tvantat anuktam api icchayā vyāptam sādhyam iti tad pradarśana artham iṣṭa grahaṇam icchayā vyāptantat iti eva kutas iti ced prakaraṇāt prakaraṇa anurūpā hi vāñchā bhavati anyathā aprekṣāva tva prasaṅgāt tathā hi anyat prakṛtam anyat ca sādhyate yadi vādyasau na bhavati eva doṣaḥ ayam eva tasya añca saḥ bhavet yadi asau ātmanā eva brūyāt aprastuta abhidhāna dvāreṇa ātmanaḥ doṣaḥ eva tena udbhāvitaḥ syāt bhavatu tasya doṣaḥ prativādinaḥ api na bhūta doṣa udbhāvanam iti bhavet eva doṣaḥ na yadi artha pratipādanena doṣa abhāvāt yat āha ātmā paraḥ ced saḥ asiddhaḥ iti 
[494,v]	yadi ātmā paraḥ sa dṛṣṭāntena siddhaḥ yadi tu para mātra sādhanam tadā na prastuta sādhanam siddha sādhanam vā evañca vadataḥ kaḥ prativādinaḥ doṣaḥ yadi tarhi iṣṭa grahaṇam icchayā vyāptasya anuktasya api sādhya tva pratipādana artham tathā niṣṭa nivṛtti artham api vyavaccheda phalam vākyam yatas na ca aniṣṭat nāma kiñcid kasyacid kenacid iṣṭa tvāt atas iṣṭa grahaṇam vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ iti pratipādana artham tatra svayam iti arthaḥ labhyate eva śāstra kāra iṣṭam api yadi tasya iṣṭam iṣṭam eva tat iti na tad nivṛttiḥ aniṣṭa tve nivṛttiḥ ita ced na iṣṭa grahaṇena eva nivṛtteḥ yathā prativādi prāśnikānām iṣṭat na sādhyam iti iṣṭa grahaṇena sādhyate tathā śāstra kāra iṣṭasya api nivṛttiḥ tatas eva svayaṃgrahaṇena sarvasya anyā iṣṭasya nivṛttiḥ iti kim śāstra mātram eva prayojanam uktam ācāryeṇa svayam iti śāstra anapekṣam abhyupagaman darśayati iti 
[495,ii_495,iv]	atra parihāraḥ sarvānyeṣṭā nivṛttau avyāśaṃkā sthāna vāraṇam vṛttau svayam śruteḥ prāha kṛtā ca eṣā tad arathikā yadi api nāma iṣṭa grahaṇena eva vādi apekṣayā sarvānyeṣṭa nirākaraṇam tathā api śāstra kāreṣṭe bhavati eva sādhya tā āśaṃkā śāstra kāra iṣṭam hi bhavati avaśyam vādinā api iti kasyacid asti matiḥ anyathā na śāstra viruddhaḥ hetuḥ gamakaḥ iti tatas āśaṃkā sthāna vāraṇa artham svayam grahaṇam atas eva svayam grahaṇasya śāstra nivṛttiḥ eva prayojana m uktam yatas eṣā svayam śrutiḥ śāstra iṣṭa nivṛttaye kṛtā anya iṣṭa nivṛttiḥ tu ayatnatas eva siddhā tasmāt iṣṭa grahaṇasya etat eva prayojanam anuktam api icchayā vyāptam sādhyam para arthāḥ iti asaṃhata para artha tvam sādhyam iṣṭa grahaṇāt 
[495,v_495,viii]	nanu sa viśeṣaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ nna sādhyaḥ sādhya tve viśeṣa tā katham na sādhya viśeṣayoḥ eka tā uktañca ācāryeṇa dharma viśeṣa viparyaya sādhanāt hi viruddhaḥ ityādi tat āha viśeṣaḥ tad vyapekṣātaḥ kathitaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ saḥ eva vāñchayā viṣayīkṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ para vyapekṣayā uktam eva sādhyam iti sukumāra prajñaḥ paraḥ tathā hi para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti
[495,ix_495,xi]	pareṇa ukte dūṣaṇa vādī āha ātmā na siddhaḥ dṛṣṭānte tad arya tvam na sidhyati sādhyam tat na iti ced tarhi sa viśeṣoḥ tu tasya vaḥ na ātma artha tvam sādhyam asmākam para artha tva mātrasya sādhanāt yadi na sādhyam tasya eva sa viśeṣaḥ iti bhavatu viśeṣa viruddhaḥ iti sādhyatām eva kasmāt na pratipādayati na para apekṣayā parihārā bhiprāyāt tāvat mātreṇā para nirākaraṇe kaḥ sva pakṣa sādhana prayāsam vidadhīta katham idānīm anukta mapi sādhyam ukta tvāt uktam eva sādhyam anyathā atiprasaṅgat anukta tva aviśeṣāt sarvam eva sādhyam na ca dṛṣṭānte sarvam upadarśayitum śakyam tathā ca viparyaya sādhanāt sarve eva na hetuḥ bhavet atra āha 
[495,xii_496,ii]	anuktau api vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇāt gatiḥ ananvayaḥ hi dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ tasya yathā uditaḥ ātmā paraḥ ced saḥ asiddhaḥ iti tatra iṣṭa ghāta kṛt yadi api nāma idam eva anena uktam tathā api prakaraṇa āt ayam atra arthaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ na khalu sakalam vacanam prakaraṇa nirapekṣam artha pratyāyana samartha tasmāt vicāryam kaimparyam ārya maryādayā sthitiḥ vākya artha niścayam karttum pravarttante jagat gatāḥ a 
[496,iii]	iyam eva sakala vidagdha jana vyavasthitiḥ atra ca para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti ātma arthāḥ iti vākya arthaḥ atas ca ananvayaḥ api tad apekṣayā dṛṣṭa antarasya tasya sādhya tvāt ā cā ryeṇa api tathā eva darśitaḥ ātma paraḥ ced saḥ asiddhaḥ iti dṛṣṭāntena siddhaḥ iti draṣṭavyam tatas tasya iṣṭasya viparyaya siddhyā ayam iṣṭa vighāta kṛt 
[496,iv_496,vii]	nanu katham etat jñāte prākaraṇikaḥ eva sādhyaa ātmā iti tat āha sādhanam yat vivāde na nyastam tat ced na sādhyate kim sādhyam anyathā aniṣṭambhavet vai phalyam eva vā yadi yatra vivādaḥ tat eva na sādhyate ātma artha tvam yatas ātmani siddhaḥ tadā anya sādhanam api asambaddham iti na kiñcid sādhyam tathā ca ubhaya pakṣa sādhanam apekṣya aniṣṭam vā viruddha sādhanāt tad parityāge vā sādhana vaiphalyam siddha sādhana tā prāpteḥ atha ātmā asādhye api sidhyati sādhane paratva mātrasya api na ca asādhya viṣayaḥ ananvaya doṣaḥ prativādinā udbhāvayitavyaḥ sādhya apekṣa tvāt ananvaya ādi doṣasya 
[496,viii_496,ix]	na etat asti yasmāt yadi asmin sādhyamāne api asādhyam sidhyet iṣṭam sarva siddhiḥ tathā syāt pratyāsatteḥ tāratamyam vinā hi sidhyet kiṃcid na anyat eta tat kutas syāt yadi sādhyamānenyasmin anyat sidhyati tadā iṣṭavat viparyayaḥ api sidhyet tathā ca sarve eva hetuḥ viruddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ syāt paraspara viruddhasya sakala dharma kalāpasya kvacid ananvayāt iṣṭa tvāt tat eva sādhvam sidhyati na anyat iti ced na icchā vaśena hetu vyāpāra vibhāga ayogāt tadā ca parasya viparyayasya iṣṭa tvāt dvi paryaya siddhiḥ anivāryā icchāyāḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt na ca pratibandha viśeṣa usti yena vādī abhimatasya siddhiḥ nna prativādinaḥ vivakṣita dharmān anvaya doṣaḥ iti ced yadi evam na kaścid iṣṭa vidhāta kṛt viruddhaḥ bhavet uktena sarvatra ananvaya sadbhāvāt uktena ananvaye sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt eva viruddhaḥ viśeṣa viruddhaḥ tu anukta apekṣayā eva anyathā bhāvāt sa dvitīya prayogeṣu niranvaya viruddhate etena kathite sādhyam sāmānyena atha sammatam tat eva artha antara abhāvāt dehān āptau na sidhyati vācyam śūnyam pralapatām tat etat jāḍya cintitam 
[496,xi_497,iv]	sa dvitīya sādhanāya prayogeṣu niranvaya doṣaḥ viruddha tā vā anena eva nyāyena pratipāditā yathā vibhakta caitanya śarīra lakṣaṇa puruṣa ghaṭā anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpana nna tvāt kuḍya vat iti cārvākāḥ āhuḥ āvirbhūta caitanya viśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ na anyaḥ ātma ādiḥ para lokī tatra ca pratyakṣa aviṣaya tvāt anumānam eva sādhanam iti hetum āhuḥ abhiprāyaḥ na puruṣaḥ tathābhūtaḥ sādhayitum śakyaḥ śrṛṅga grāhikayā dṛṣṭānte a siddha tvāt iti sāmānyena anyatarasa dvitīya tvam sādhyate upāyāḥ sādhya sādhakāḥ atra ucyate sāmānyam vā viśeṣaḥ vā yaḥ sa vā sādhyatām iha vivakṣitena sādhyena bhāvyam iti a eka niścayaḥ a tātparya arthaḥ tathā hi puruṣaḥ eva śabde na upāttaḥ tad apekṣayā vā ananvayaḥ iti pūrvakaḥ nyāyaḥ atha sidhyati kevalam na tu tad sādhyam tadā api atiprasaṅgaḥ iti pratipāditam 
[497,v]	nanu na atra viśeṣa ākṣepaḥ tat asat yatas dehasya asiddhau vyakti abhāvāt kutas sāmānyam na hi go vyakti abhāve sāmānyam vyakti vināśe api sāmānyam na vinaśyati nitya tvāt vyañjaka abhāvāt na vyavahāra gocaraḥ vyakti sambhave punar tathā bhāvāt ced na atra sambhava abhāvāt na hi tathābhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pramāṇam antareṇa sambhavī yathā vā vyakti abhāve sāmānyam na vyavahāra gocaraḥ tathā anyatara sāmānyam api pramāṇadataḥ eva siddhiḥ iti ced na itaretara āśraya doṣa prasaṅgat pramāṇe anumāne sati sāmānyam sāmānyenumānam na hi asiddhasya sāmānya ākāra tvam iti tasmāt anyatara tvāt iti yathā na hetuḥ tathā sādhyam asti tathā hi pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tvāt iti pakṣa tvam eva śabdena pakṣa sa pakṣa anyatara tvam dvayoḥ śabde avirodha abhāvāt vikalpa viṣaya tvāt anyatara śabdasya na ca niyata dharma sambhave apara upakṣepaḥ na ca upakṣepam antareṇa aparasya anyatara śruteḥ avatāraḥ tasmāt asat etat 
[497,vi]	api ca yadi tathābhūta puruṣasya eva atra na pratipādanam tadā puruṣa ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti eva uktam bhavet kimartham ubhayatra ghaṭaḥ eva upāttaḥ tatra ayam abhiprāyaḥ sādhana vādinaḥ yadi dharmī ghaṭaḥ upādīyeta sa ghaṭena sa dvitīyaḥ iti siddha sādhanam syāt sāmānyena api sa dvitīya tve ayam eva doṣaḥ iti pratipāditam tad anākṣepe kim sādhana phalam aniṣṭam vā tasmāt ubhayatra ghaṭa jāteḥ pratipādanam sāmarthyāt puruṣeṇa eva sa dvitīya tva pratipattiḥ bhavet iti arthaḥ tathā ca niyamena puruṣaḥ eva atra abhidhātum iṣṭaḥ iti vyartham anyatara grahaṇam tat ayam sva vacana virodhaḥ mātā vandhyā iti vacana vat tathā hi 
[497,vii_497,viii]	sāmānyāt niyamaḥ prāptau vikalpa unyatara uktitaḥ niyamaḥ ca vikalpaḥ ca dvayam ekatra durlabham a sa hi ubhayatra ghaṭa upādānāt ghaṭa jāteḥ svena sa dvitīya tvā yogāt sāmarthyāt puruṣaḥ eva sādhyaḥ katham anyatara uktiḥ tad viparyaya pratipattaye na anyatara ukteḥ anvaya artha tvāt na kuḍyasya puruṣeṇa anvayosti nanu anyena anvaye katham anyasya puruṣasya siddhiḥ sāmarthyāt iti ced kasya idam sāmarthyam kim hetoḥ atha vacanasya na tāvat hetoḥ nna anutpala tvam puruṣa sa dvitīya tve pratibaddham anaikāntika tvāt tathā hi para loki puruṣa ghaṭā anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti api sādhanāt bhavatu vivakṣā antare anyasya api sādhanam iti ced na vivakṣā apekṣayā sādhana tva asambhavāt iti pratipāditam 
[498,i]	atha vacana sāmarthyāt tat etat vilakṣa īkṣitam na ca vacana sāmarthyāt arthāḥ sidhyanti tatra pratibandha abhāvāt tathā hi pīnaḥ divā na bhuṅkte ca iti evamādi ukti sambhave naktam bhujiḥ avaśyam na mithyā ukteḥ api sambhavāt yadi tathābhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pramāṇa prāpita santataḥ syāt ghaṭa vat tadā pramāṇa mūla vivakṣā prayuktam vacanam para artha anumānam bhavet sva dṛṣṭa artha prakāśanasya para artha anumāna tvāt anena eva pramāṇena siddhaḥ iti ced na itaretāra āśraya doṣāt iti pratipāditam pramāṇe sati sādhanam sādhane sati pramāṇam iti 
[498,ii_498,iv]	nanu nāśe api sādhye samānaḥ nyāyaḥ tathā hi kim śabda gatam anitya tvam sādhyam atha ghaṭa gatam yadi śabda gatam na tat sapakṣaḥ atha ghaṭa gatam na tad śabdaḥ iti virodhaḥ tathā kṛtaka tvam api atha etat vikalpa samam sādharmye api viśeṣa uktiḥ vikalpa samam tathā sati puruṣe api iti samānam atra parihāraḥ tulyam nāśaḥ api ced śabda ghaṭa bhedena kalpane na siddhena vināśena tadvatas sādhanāt dhvaneḥ tathā artha antara bhāve syā tadvān kumbhopi 
[498,vi]	yathā puruṣaḥ na siddhaḥ vākya sāmarthyā prāpitaḥ tathā anitya tvat na siddham iti na asti etat tathā yathā pakṣa sapakṣa anyatara tvam tathā kṛtaka tvam iti api ghaṭe hi anitya tā prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva madhya sthā svabhāva aprasiddhā yadi nāma prasiddhā sā anyā eva tatas śabdaḥ katham anityaḥ na khalu sā eva anitya tā śabde tad sadṛśī bhaviṣyati 
[498,vii_498,x]	sādṛśyam sidhyati katham anyena anvaya sambhave tathā ced puruṣaḥ api syāt siddhi bhāj uttaram vṛthā a tat asat anyat tvaḥ eva sādṛśyam anyathā bhāj katham bhavet eka tve hi na sādṛśyam pratiyogi vyapekṣaṇāt a tathā hi yādṛśi anitya tā ghaṭe prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva upalakṣitā śabde api tathā eva prāc abhāva ādi sambhavāt uccarita pradhvaṃsinaḥ hi varṇṇāḥ iti na vivādaḥ tathā ghaṭaḥ api dharmī yadi tadvān kuḍya sādṛśyāt bhavet syāt idam sādhanam na ca puruṣa sa dvitīya tva sādṛśyam kuḍya dharmi ghaṭayoḥ 
[498,xi_499,i]	nanu ātṛ api yadi nāma anitya tā sāmānyam vacana upāttamaidaṃparyā yā rthaḥ tu viśeṣaḥ eva śabda gataḥ tena ca na anvayaḥ iti kathantad siddhiḥ atra brūmaḥ anitya tā viśiṣṭāḥ dhvaninā anveti no ced na ayoga vāraṇāt dvividhaḥ hi vyavacchedaḥ viyoga apara yogayoḥ vyavacchedāt ayoge tu vārye na ananvaya āgamaḥ yadi api nāma anitya tā viśiṣṭā na anveti anvitā viśiṣṭā bhaviṣyati samudāyaḥ hi sādhyaḥ sa ced prāk eva prasiddhaḥ kim artham sādhanam tasmāt kevalena anvaye śabde sidhyat anitya tvam samudāyatām viśiṣṭāñca ātmanaḥ prakaṭayati 
[499,ii]	nanu kevalena anvaye viśiṣṭā nityatā katham sidhyet anyena anvaye anya sādhana iti prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca sarvaḥ hetuḥ viruddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ syāt ukta dharma anvayaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ na anyatra iti ced na sādhya tva aviśeṣāt adoṣe ca iṣṭa vighātaḥ kasyacid api na syāt iti sarvaḥ sva abhimatam sādhayet na ayoga vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt ayoga anya yoga vyavacchedena hi dvividham viśeṣaṇam na hi evam kriyate śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti api tu śabdaḥ api sadṛśa tvāt anitya tāyāḥ na ca puruṣa sādhane tathā saṃbhavati na hi ghaṭa sa dvitīya tvam kuḍya ghaṭayoḥ samānam anyatarasa dvitīya tvam samānam iti ced na tena api abhāvāt anyatarasa dvitīya tvena hi sādṛśyam evam bhavati yadi niyamasya abhāvaḥ atra ca niyamaḥ eva ghaṭena evam sa dvitīya tvam kuḍyasya tathā bhūta puruṣeṇa eva ghaṭasya iti para abhiprāyaḥ 
[499,iii_499,v]	nanu pratiniyame api anyatara śrutiḥ prayujyate eva tad kathat niyamenyatara tva abhāvaḥ tatas na vikalpa eka pratiniyamayoḥ virodhaḥ tathā hi deva datta yajñadattayoḥ anyataraḥ bhojanīyaḥ iti niyamataḥ ekatra eva bhojanam vyavatiṣṭhate tathā atra api puruṣeṇa sa dvitīya tva niyamaḥ na atra vacana prāpitaḥ niyamaḥ kākatālīya nyāyena niyama sambhavāt sa ca pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate na ca atra puruṣa ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīya tva uktau puruṣa niyamaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ bhojanam hi vastu sāmarthyāt eka niyatam na vacana sāmarthyāt sva rucyā preṣyasya pravarttanāt bhoktuḥ ddātuḥ vā yadi hi asau uktaḥ na bhojayet na tu bhañjīta bhavān aniyamaḥ vyavatiṣṭheta atra api sādhana sāmarthya prāpitaḥ niyamaḥ iti ced na viparyaye api sambhavāt iti pratipāditam etena idam api nirākṛtam viśeṣenugama abhāvaḥ sāmānye siddha sādhya tā yadi anitya tā sāmānyam sādhyate tasya kvacid vidyut ādau siddha tvāt siddha sādhya tā atha śabda viśiṣṭam anitya tvam tadā tasya ghaṭe abhāvāt anvayā bhāvaḥ yatas sāmānyam eva śabde a siddhatvāt sādhyate tat āha 
[499,vi_500,i]	sāmānyam eva tat sādhyam na ca siddha prasādhanam viśiṣṭam dharmiṇā tat ca na niranvapa doṣavat yadi ādhāra viśeṣa anapekṣam anitya tvam sādhyam syāt siddha sādhanam śabde tu sādhyate sāmānyam atas na siddha sādhya tā nanu śabde sādhyate sāmānyañca iti vyāhatam śabda viśiṣṭa tvam eva viśeṣaḥ yadi ca sāmānyam katham viśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ ced katham sāmānyam na etat asti sāmānyena anvaye siddhe pakṣa dharma tva yogataḥ viśeṣa niṣṭatā tasya sambandha grahaṇa ātmanā a 
[500,ii]	na hi śabda viśiṣṭena anvaya pradarśane śabda viśiṣṭa tva siddhiḥ kevalena api anvaya darśane tad viśiṣṭa tva siddhiḥ sādṛśyena eka tvasya vivakṣita tvāt tadvat eva iti pratipādayatā hi param dhūma ugninā antarīyakaḥ darśanīyaḥ sa tathā agninā vyāptaḥ siddhaḥ yatra ovopadanīyate tatra eva agni buddhi janayati sambandhasya tathā eva grahaṇāt yad deśaḥ hi pāvakaḥ tad deśam eva dhūmam janayati aparāpara deśa sañcāraṇena sambandha pratīteḥ 
[500,iii]	nanu sāmānyena pratītau katham viśeṣa pratītiḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣam antareṇa abhāvāt iti pratīteḥ adoṣaḥ na hi deśa kāla avasthā pratiniyama pratipattyā kasyacid vyavahāra siddhiḥ etat ca prāmāṇya nirūpaṇe prāk eva pratyapādi iti na āvarttanīyam punar tasmāt dharmi viśiṣṭa sāmānya prasādhanāt na siddha sādhya tā na ananvaya doṣaḥ 
[500,iv_500,vi]	nanu sādhyena saha sāmānyam pratyetavyam sādhyañca anumāna sāmarthyāt pratyeṣyate na ca tat bahis vyāpti mātreṇa prasidhyati na hi evam vyāptiḥ ādarśyate sarvā apekṣaḥ kṛtakaḥ anityaḥ iti tatas antarvyopteḥ aprasiddhiḥ bbahis ced vyāptiḥ tasyām sādhya siddhiḥ nna jātu anya vyāptyā asya siddhiḥ yadi syāt sarvasya syāt sarva siddhi prasaṅgaḥ tat api yat kiñcat tathā hi uktam etat yatas dharmi sāhityāt vyāptiḥ īyate yaḥ yaḥ pradeśaḥ evam syāt sa sa sādhyāvinākṛtaḥ 
[500,vii]	agni mānayam pradeśaḥ dhūmavat tvāt mahānasa pradeśa vat tathābhūta pratyaya sāmarthyāt pūrvam eva gṛhītaḥ iti ucyate anyathā hi yadi sādhyaḥ api svabhāvaḥ parigṛhītaḥ kim anumāna pūrva dhūma pratītau eva asya api dhūmasya pratīteḥ agni pratītiḥ na ca avidyamānam bhāvi śakyam pratyetum tasmai tta drupa pratyaya sambhavāt eva pratītam iti vyavahāra mātra te ucyate vyavahāra mātreṇa grahaṇena parama artha grahaṇam iti kathat na visamvādaḥ tathābhūta artha kriyā kāriṇi ā iva sa parāmarśaḥ iti avisamvādaḥ 
[500,viii_500,ix]	nanu saḥ eva niyamaḥ katham grāhyaḥ asmāt eva vyavahārāt vyavahāreṇa sakalam eva samvādakam anādinā jñāyate na parama arthaḥ iti pratipāditam tasmāt sāmānyena pratibandha grahaṇe tasya viśeṣam antareṇa abhāvāt viśeṣa pratipattiḥ evam eva sakalaḥ vyavahāraḥ etena dharmi dharmābhyām viśiṣṭau dharma dharmiṇau pratyākhyāta aunirākurvan dharmiṇī evam asādhanāt
