[500,x]	anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāyām yadi anityaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ śabda viśiṣṭam anitya tvam śabde sādhyam iti prāptam anitya tva viśiṣṭaḥ vā śabdam iti tatas tad viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ yathā ayam hetuḥ śabde anitya tvam pra sādhayati tathā śabda viśiṣṭa anitya tva abhāvam api iti viruddhaḥ iti yaḥ āha saḥ api anena iṣṭa sādhya vacanena nirākṛtaḥ na hi śabdaḥ anitya śabda tvam prasādhyate anitya tā mātrasya
[501,i_501,iv]	prasādhanāt anitya tā mātra sādhane katham samudāya sādhanam iti ced na tathā eva samudāyasya sādhanāt dharmiṇā saha samudāya sādhanāt na hi dharmiṇī aparaḥ śabda anitya tva samudāyaḥ śabde sādhyaḥ tatas tasya nirākaraṇe api na doṣaḥ anitya tā mātra nirākaraṇe hi doṣaḥ katham samudāya viparyāsanam iti ced dvayoḥ eka abhāve samudāyasya nirākaraṇāt na eka śeṣa tve samudāya sambhavaḥ tasmāt kevalaḥ eva dharmaḥ dharmiṇi sādhyaḥ tathā eva samudāya sādhanāt ekatra dvitīya sādhane samudāya sampatteḥ katham tarhi dharma dharmi tat samudāya viśeṣa nirākaraṇa bhedaḥ tad dvāreṇa nirākaraṇāt yad dvāreṇa hi samudāyaḥ nirākriyate tena vyapadiśyate paramārthataḥ samudāya nirākaraṇam eva anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabda anitya tvavān vā śabdaḥ iti samudāya nirākaraṇañced na evam pratijñā yāḥ asaṃbhavāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tu pratijñāyām na samudāya sādhanatva pratītiḥ aparatra dharmiṇi tasmāt anyathā samudāya sādhana asambhavāt kevala dharmī ādi nirākaraṇena eva samudāya nirākaraṇam na tu śabde anitya śabda tva nirākaraṇāt evam sādhyasya anabhipreta tvāt anabhipreta nirākaṇe na doṣaḥ samudāya apavādaḥ hi na dharmiṇi virudhyate sādhanam yatasyatha aneṣṭam sādhyaḥ dharmotra kevalaḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ 
[501,v_501,vii]	yadi tarhi iṣṭa grahaṇam anabhipreta sādhya nirākaraṇe api adoṣa pratipādana param tatra yathā śabda niviṣṭāḥ nitya tā bādhane dharmiṇi na doṣaḥ tathā akāśa guṇa tva viśiṣṭa anitya tva vādhane api adoṣaḥ eva sattyam etat tathā api vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artham svayam grahaṇam tathā hi ekasya dharmiṇaḥ śāstre nānā dharma sthitau api sādhyaḥ syāt ātmanā eveṣṭaḥ iti upāttā svayam śrutiḥ 
[501,viii]	bhavatu eva śāstra dṛṣṭam sādhyam tad prabādhane ca hetu pratijñayoḥ doṣaḥ iti eke tathā hi nyāya bhāṣye āgamaḥ pratijñā āgama artha nirddeśāt āgamaḥ iti ucyate na anyathā iti nyāya vārtikam anyathā agamasya pramāṇa tvāt pratijñāyāḥ ca sandeha sādhanāt katham eka tvam saḥ eva āgama arthaḥ param prati nirddeśyamānaḥ pratijñā arthaḥ tasmāt āgamaḥ pratijñā tad artha bādhane hetoḥ ddoṣaḥ śāstra artha bādhanāt na ca śāstra viruddhaḥ hetuḥ sādhya sādhakaḥ pratijñā doṣaḥ ca anitya tvam api ākāśa guṇa tva eka artha samavāya sambhavi sādhyam yathā anyena hetunā kenacid tatra ākāśa guṇa tvam śāstreṇa vā sādhyam tathābhūtam anitya tvam pratijñā arthaḥ tasya ca tena nirākaraṇe pratijñā doṣaḥ tathā hi 
[502,i_502,ii]	kṣaṇa anantara nāśi tve vṛthā kāsa guṇa ātma tā kāla antareṇa nāśe api vṛthā ākāśa guṇa ātma tā yadi tasya śabda ātmanaḥ kṣaṇa an antaram ahetutvāt nāśaḥ kim ākāśa guṇa tvena āśrayaḥ hi nāma sthiti hetuḥ na ca kṣaṇikasya sthitiḥ kṣaṇam ekantu sva kāraṇāt eva atha kāla antara sthāyī sa sva kāraṇāt upajātaḥ tathā api kāraṇa vaśāt eva sthāsyati iti kim āśrayeṇa atha āśraya vaśāt kāla antara sthānam nanu avināśāt eva sthāsyati kim āśrayeṇa na ca śabdasya guru tvam yena āśrayam antareṇa pāta sambhavaḥ na ca ākāśasya dhāraṇa svabhāva bhāktvam na khalu gurūṇām ākāśena dhāraṇam 
[502,iii_502,xi]	guru tvāt patane na asti vyomnaḥ sandhāraṇa ātma tā laghavaḥ na patanti eva dhārakaḥ kiṅkariṣyati vāyunā pahṛtau śabdaḥ tena asau dhāryatām patan vināśaḥ eva tasya syāt yasya ākāśam abādhakam svabhāvaḥ hi sa tasya ittham apekṣya eva vinaśyati yāvat vināśakaḥ na asti sthānāt anyā na tad gatiḥ iti āśrayam vinā eva asya sthānam iti eva niścayaḥ yadi kṣaṇa sthiteḥ nna asti na api kāla antara sthiteḥ nityānām api na eva asti sa āśraya tvam anarthakam sattyam etat tathā api eṣa svabhāvaḥ sahajassadā na hi paryanuyojyosau iti syāt api kalpanā tasmāt anityasya padārtha ātmanaḥ na āśrayaḥ iti anitya tvasya sādhakaḥ āśraya tvasya bādhakaḥ iti hetu doṣaḥ pratijñā doṣaḥ ca iti 
[502,xii_502,xv]	atra ucyate śāstra abhyupagamāt eva sarva ādānāt prabādhane tatra ekasya api doṣaḥ syāt yadi hetu pratijñayoḥ śabda nāśe prasādhye syāt gandhe bhū guṇa tā kṣateḥ hetuḥ viruddhaḥ aprakṛteḥ no ced anyatra sā samā yadi śāstram abhyupagatam iti eva śāstra bādhane doṣaḥ pratijñā hetvoḥ tadā śabda ākāśa guṇa tva bādhana vat gandhe pṛthivī guṇa tva viparyāsane api tatas yathā tad paripaṭhita tad dharma ākāśa guṇa tva saṃsargga sambhavi tad anitya tvam sādhyam tathā tad śāstra kāra iṣṭa gandha dharmī antara saṅgata pṛthivī guṇa tva saṅgata śāstra pratipādita tvam api tad bādhane api tad śāstra sambandha tvam ayuktam iti syāt eva pratijñā doṣaḥ aprakaraṇa āpanna tvāt gandhasya katham iti api na vācyam ākāśa guṇa tvasya api na prakaraṇa āpannatā iti api na ubhayatra viśeṣaḥ 
[502,xvi_503,ii]	atha atra dharmī prakṛtaḥ tatra śāstra artha bādhanam dharmi antare api prakṛtaḥ śāstra artha upagamāt na kim yadi nāma atra dharmī prakṛtaḥ sa tu tad dharma ādhāra tayā eva atha śāstra dvāreṇa dharma antara ādhāra tayā api evantarhi tad eka śāstra paripaṭhita dharmī antara gata dharma saṅgata tvam api iti samānaḥ doṣaḥ atha api syāt tad dharma ādhāraḥ dharmī prakṛtaḥ iti dharma antaram api sādhya pakṣa nikṣiptam eva vādinaḥ api tathā iṣṭa tvāt tat āha 
[503,iii_503,v]	atha vādīṣṭatām brūyāt dharmi dharma ādi sādhanaiḥ ākāśa guṇa tvam api vādinaḥ iṣṭam eva upātta sādhya dharmi dharmi tvāt anitya vat tathā sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣa tvāt ityādi tat āha na sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣaḥ iti eva aprakaraṇa icchā bhavati tathā hi kaiścid prakaraṇaiḥ icchā bhavet sā gamyate ca taiḥ balāt tava iccheyam iti vyaktam īśvara ceṣṭitam 
[503,vi]	na sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣa tva mātrakam icchām pravarttayati pravarttane vā sadā icchā sādhana pravṛttyoḥ avirāma prasaṅga atha sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣa tvena na iṣṭa tvāt iti matiḥ tathā sati tat eva iṣṭa tvam sādhyam tat eva sādhanam iti pratijñā arthaḥ eva sādhanam tasmāt yatra prakaraṇam tatra eva icchā anyathā atiprasaṅga tasmāt vivāda āspadaḥ eva icchā pravarttate na ākāśa guṇa tve 
[503,vii_503,ix]	nanu prakaraṇāt icchā bhavati prakaraṇañca tasyāḥ kāraṇam tad kathaṅkāraṇāt kārya siddhiḥ apratibaddham kāraṇam kāryam gamayati iti ced kathantathā avagantavyam vacanasya tad kāryasya dṛṣṭeḥ vacanāt eva tahi gatiḥ kāryāt na prakaraṇāt iti katham taiḥ eva gamyate iti ucyate atra ucyate sāmarthyam vacanāt gamyam tasya eva iti tatas gatiḥ icchāyāḥ niyata tvena prakaraṇāt gatiḥ ucyate 
[503,x_503,xi]	vacanāt vi icchā mātrasya gatiḥ prakaraṇañca kāraṇa tvāt icchāyā na gamakam tatas vacanāt gatā pratibaddha sāmarthyam prakaraṇam eva icchāyāḥ pratiniyamasya gamakam iti taiḥ eva iti ucyate apra karaṇā da pi tu tava iyam eva icchā iti na atra kaścid nyāyaḥ tatas vadan na kārya liṅga antām vyabhicāreṇa bādhyate anāntarīyake ca arthe bādhitenyasya kā kṣatiḥ 
[503,xii]	icchāyāḥ hi kāryam kāraṇam vā gamakam prakaraṇañca kāraṇam na ākāśa guṇa tvaṅgamayati tatra tad abhāvāt vacanam kāryam tat api na ākāśa guṇa tvasya tathā api tava iyam iccha iti akārya liṅgām icchām vadan vyabhicāreṇa bādhyate na hi sādhya samudāya eka deśa viśeṣa tva ādi kam i chāyāḥ kāryam na api apratibaddha sāmarthyam kāraṇam na antarīyaka tva bādhane ca vyāpaka abhāvāt sādhyasya abhāvaḥ iti bhavet sādhya sādhana doṣaḥ na ca ākāśa guṇa tvam na antarīya kam anāntarīyake ca bādhite sādhyasya tatonyasya kā kṣatiḥ 
[504,i_504,iii]	nanu śāstram abhyupagamya eva vādaḥ pravarttate tatas sva śāstra vyavasthitasya tad artha bādhane niyamena doṣaḥ na ukta uttara tvāt gandhe pṛthivī guṇa tva viparyāsane api doṣaḥ iti uktañca na āgama apekṣam anumānam sva gocare siddham tena su siddhantan na tadā śāstram īkṣyate anumānam hi sva viṣaye pratibandha balam avalambamānam śāstram apekṣate pratyakṣa vat pramāṇa tvāt yat kim api dṛśyate tat kim āgama apekṣam sakalam tathā anumānam api kim āgamam apekṣate tathā asmad ādi pratyakṣam niyamena āgama apekṣam āgama bādhita tvena bhrāntiḥ eva na khalu divya cakṣuṣām bacanam asmad ādi pratyakṣeṇa bādhyate na taimirika darśanam itara darśanam bādhate 
[504,iv]	sattyam etat yadi divya cakṣuḥ akhilaḥ vacasām karttā bhavet ucitam eva vacaḥ sattve api kasyacid iyam sa tathā iti na asmad viniścayaḥ idam sphuṭayati paraspara vacana virodhitayā hi sarvatra eva āgama kṛtaḥ sarva vedinaḥ iti na gamyante mā bhūvan sarva vedinaḥ tathā api na bhavataḥ api parihīyante evantarhi sarva āgama virodhaḥ eva pariharttavyaḥ sa ca na śakyataḥ eva tatas na bhavet eva anumāna utthānam 
[504,v]	atha sva āgama viṣaya śāstra virodha parihāraḥ eva vidhātavyaḥ evantarhi saḥ api abhyupagamaḥ parīkṣya karttavyaḥ parīkṣā kāle ca anumānam apramāṇam śāstra virodha aparihārāt na asti eva tadā śāstra abhyupagamaḥ kim parihāreṇa iti ced evantarhi siddham tena su siddham eva sādhyam na hi siddham paścāt asiddham bhavati tad viruddha śāstra abhyupagamāda siddham eva iti ced saḥ eva tarhi sakala śāstra virodha parihāraḥ abhyupagata apekṣayā bhavati na anyathā iti ced abhyupagamaḥ api kasmāt na sarvatra iti parīkṣā kṣamaḥ eva iti ced evantarhi pramāṇam eva parīkṣā sā eva ca tena bādhyate iti sva badhāya kṛttyā utthāpana prakāraḥ eṣaḥ tasmāt śāstram eva pramāṇa viruddha tvāt tadā na apekṣate tatas na tad vādhakam 
[504,vi_504,viii]	yadi tarhi śāstram tadā na apekṣyate vāda tyāgaḥ eva prāptaḥ vāda tyāgaḥ tadā syāt ced na tadā anabhyupāyataḥ upāyaḥ hi abhyupāye ayam anaṅgam sa tadā api san na hi śāstram anāśritya na vādaḥ tadā anabhyupagamāt parīkṣā eva upāyaḥ abhyupagamasya aparīkṣya ced abhyupagataḥ tadā san api tadā pramāṇa bādhi tvāt anaṅgam eva na hi aparīkṣā kṣamam śāstram tadā bādhakam kadā tarhi śāstram abhyupagatam aṅgam vā sādhanasya 
[504,ix_505,ii]	atra ucyate tathā viśuddhe viṣaya dvaye śāstra parigraham cikīrṣoḥ sa hi kālaḥ syāt tadā śāstreṇa bādhanam tathā iti anumānena pratyakṣeṇa ca viṣaya dvayasya pratyakṣa parokṣasya viśuddha tāyām yadi tāvatā na paritoṣaḥ tadā śāstra parigraha cikīrṣāyām sa hi kālaḥ syāt ubhyupa gamasya tadā eva śāstreṇa bādhanam 
[505,iii_505,vii]	yatas tad virodhena cintāyāḥ tad siddhārtheṣu ayogataḥ tṛtīya sthāna saṃkrāntau nyāyyaḥ śāstra parigrahaḥ na hi parīkṣye śāstra abhyupagame tad virodhena cintā tad śāstra prasiddherthe yuktā tathā hi parīkṣitam tat yadi śāstram uccais pratijñayā tat katham asya vācyam parīkṣaṇantasya punar nna kāryamparīkṣaṇañced na parīkṣitam tat 
[505,viii_505,xi]	tasmāt parīkṣya pratyakṣa anumānābhyām tat aviṣayam tṛtīya sthāna saṃkrānti nimittam śāstra abhyupagamaḥ iti na anumāna viṣayasya śāstramba adhakam atha api syāt a vicārya yasya śāstra abhyupagamaḥ tasya śāstram bādhakam iti bhavet pratijñā doṣaḥ na etat asti yatas tatra api sādhya dharmasya sambaddhasya eva bādhanam parihāryam na ca anyeṣām anavasthā prasaṅgataḥ 
[505,xii_505,xiii]	yadi śāstram abhyupagatam iti eva tad artha bādhanam pariharttavyam gandhe pṛthivī guṇa viparyāsane api doṣaḥ syāt tasmāt sādhya dharma sambaddhasya eva bādhanam parihāryam na anyeṣām asambaddhānām iti sthitam etat nanu śāstram anabhyupagamya api vāde vaitaṇḍikaḥ syāt anāśrita śāstrakasya nāstika tvāt nanu pramāṇa siddham abhyupagacchataḥ kā nāstika tā tathā pramāṇa bādhitam anabhyupayataḥ tṛtīya sthāne yaḥ śāstram na abhyupagacchati nāstikaḥ tṛtīyāt anyatra tu kim śāstreṇa tathā hi 
[505,xiv_505,xvi]	kena iyam sarva cintāsu śāstram grāhyam iti sthitiḥ kṛta idānīm asiddhāntaiḥ grāhyaḥ dhūmena na analaḥ yadi siddhāntam abhyugamya eva sarva pramāṇa pravarttanam pāvakaḥ api loke gopālaka ādinā dhūmataḥ na pratipattavyaḥ atha api syāt para loka upayogī yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ ena śāstra abhyupagama puraḥsaraḥ na anyaḥ iti 
[505,xvii_506,i]	tat asat anabhyupagate śāstre yadi tasya viniścayaḥ pramāṇataḥ tadā śāstram kva upayogi puras saram yadi na abhyupagamyate śāstreṇa bādhā śaṅkyate abhyupagame tu jñāyate śāstra bādhā tena tat na sādhyate eva na pramāṇa prasiddhasya anicchataḥ bhāvāt śāstrantu tadā parityajyate ātmīyam katham parityāga arham iti ced na sambandha abhāvāt sa guṇa tvena tasya tat tathā hi 
[506,ii_506,iv]	riktasya jantoḥ jātasya guṇa doṣam apaśyataḥ vilabdhāḥ vata kena amī siddhānta viṣamagrahāḥ yadi nyāya bādhitaḥ api siddhāntaḥ parityaktum aśakyaḥ tadā na asau siddhāntaḥ siddhānta vyājena viṣamagrahaḥ bālānām tatas mocayitum aśakyatvāt sambandhāt saha jāteḥ ca parityakunna śakyate riktasya jantoḥ jātasya tad yogaḥ sahajaḥ katham 
[506,v_506,ix]	guṇa doṣa vivekaḥ api pramāṇam tyajataḥ kutas tasmāt na śāstra abhyupagama pūrvakam anumānam nanu śāstra virodhi katham anumānam niścāyakam tasmāt śāstra virodhaḥ pariharttavyaḥ tad anukūla nidarśanena tat asat yatas yadi sādhanaḥ ekatra sarvam śāstram nidarśane darśayet sādhanam syāt iti eṣā lokottarā sthitiḥ 
[506,x]	śāstra virodhaḥ hi pariharttum aśakyaḥ eva śāstrāṇām eva paraspara virodhāt sarveṣām pramāṇa tvam apramāṇa tvam vā na tāvat pramāṇa tve sarva virodha parihāraḥ paraspara viruddha tvāt na api apramāṇa tve sakala jana vacasām virodhasya sadā bhāvāt na hi aparimitaḥ virodhaḥ śakya parihāraḥ evañca sādhanam bhavati iti loka atikrānta uyam mārgaḥ 
[506,xi_506,xiii]	nanu yadi tad dharmi dharmaḥ eva bādhyate ukte api kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ na hi bādhakasya sādhaka tva sambhavaḥ na idam api yuktam evam hi sādhanam eva kiñcid na syāt evam hi sādhayatā niyamataḥ param bādhitavyam api ca asambaddhasya dharmasya kim asiddhau na sidhyati hetuḥ tad sādhanāya uktaḥ kim duṣṭaḥ tatra sidhyati 
[506,xiv_506,xv]	asambaddhasya hi dharmasya yadi bādhanam pariharttavyam na hetuḥ eva syāt yadi ca anyaḥ bādhyate kasmāt anyat na sidhyati ekaḥ api hi dhūmaḥ pāvaka śīta sparśayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ sādhakaḥ upalabdhaḥ virodhāt sādhanam aviruddham iti ced ākāśa guṇa tve api samānaḥ virodhaḥ atha bhavatu sa hetuḥ sādhakaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ pratipādyasya tu katham śāstra viruddha artha pratipattiḥ tatas śāstra artha anugamaḥ api dṛṣṭānte darśanīyaḥ na hi tad dharmān upanaye hetutaḥ sādhya pratipattiḥ 
[507,i_507,iii]	na etat asti yatas dharmān anupanīya eva dṛṣṭānte dharmiṇaḥ akhalān vāgdhūma ādeḥ janonvā iti caitanya dahana ādikam āstām tāvat śāstra prasiddhaḥ asambandhaḥ dharmaḥ tad dharmi dharmasya api kasyacid dṛṣṭāntenupanaye vāc dhūma ādikāt hetoḥ ayam lokaḥ caitanya dahana ādikam pratyeti na hi tad aparaḥ dharmaḥ bādhitaḥ iti pāvaka aprasiddhiḥ 
[507,iv_507,vi]	na ca na pratyeti pratipādyaḥ api ca anicchataḥ api pratipādyasya svabhāvam kāraṇam vā arthaḥ avyabhicāreṇa sādhayan kasyacid vāda bādhāyām svabhāvāt na nivarttate na khalu sva kāraṇa āyattaḥ svabhāvaḥ padārthānām puruṣa icchayā vyāvarttate avyabhicāraḥ ca hetoḥ sādhya sādhane nimittam sa ca asti kinna sādhakaḥ 
[507,vii_507,ix]	atha bhavatu asau sādhakaḥ sa tu pratipādyaḥ katham pratipadyate tat āha svabhāvam prapadyamānaḥ ca anyaḥ tam na antarīyakam īpsitaiḥ sādhya arthaiḥ hetunā tena katham apratipāditaḥ kāraṇam hi kārya jananāya pravṛttam apratibaddha sāmarthyāt itarat nivārayitum śakyam jñāpakantu pratibandha balāt pratītim upajanayat pratipanna rūpa trayasya na tena eva nivārayitum śakyam a 
[507,x_507,xiii]	dahyamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ pāvakena vinā icchayā dāha duḥkham tiraḥkuryāt yadi hetoḥ nna niścayaḥ na hi tat avyabhicāritām pratipadyamānaḥ eva tat na pratīyāt viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa viśeṣya pratipatte rviśeṣa pratītinā antarīyaka tvāt sarvam asti kintu vādya yukta kārī bhavet atra ucyate uktaḥ nuktaḥ api ced hetuḥ viruddhaḥ vādinotra kim na hi tasya ukti doṣeṇa sa jātaḥ śāstra bādhanaḥ 
[507,xiv]	vacana guṇa doṣau hi para arthe anumāne adhikriyete na arthasya na vaktra atra kiñcid doṣa jātam akāri śāstram bādhitam iti ced na hetuḥ eva śāstrasya bādhakonuktaḥ api evambhūtam eva hetum kasmāt upādatte iti ced anyasya asambhavāt na hi kaścid anitya tva sādhakaḥ sambhavati yaḥ ākāśa guṇa tva ādikam na bādhate tūṣṇīm eva kasmāt na aste iti ced na asādhana aṅga vacanasya sutarām eva nigraha sthāna tvāt avaśyam hi prativādi avavodhayitavyaḥ tasmāt atra na vādinaḥ doṣaḥ 
[507,xv_508,iv]	bādhakasya abhidhānāt ced doṣaḥ yadi vadet na saḥ kin na bādheta saḥ akurvan ayuktam kena duṣyati iti antaraślokaḥ evam tarhi hetvābhāsa vacane api na doṣaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ api svayam eva tathābhūtaḥ iti kimvādinaḥ doṣaḥ na hi asau api tad ukta doṣeṇa eva duṣyati svayam eva doṣāt uktaḥ nuktaḥ api ced hetuḥ asiddhaḥ vādinotra kim na hi tasya ukti doṣeṇa tasya asiddha viruddhate tat asat anyeṣu hetvābhāseṣu sveṣṭasya eva aprasādhanāt duṣyet vyartha abhidhānena na atra tasya prasādhanāt 
[508,v]	atra sādhya sādhanāya sādhane vaktavye tat asādhanasya vacane doṣaḥ vyarthaka tvāt abhidhānasya sārthaka abhidhāna adhikāre vyarthaka vacanam hi vyartham atra tu sādhya sādha nāt adoṣaḥ avacanaḥ eva atra doṣaḥ iti atra api ākāśa guṇa tvasya avacane doṣaḥ iti ced na sādhakasya api sambhavāt vādi iṣṭa sādhye avacanam doṣaḥ yuktaḥ na tu atra śāstra artha ākāśa guṇa tva ābādhakasya sambhavaḥ atas na avacanam doṣaḥ 
[508,vi_508,x]	nanu yadi hetuḥ śāstra artham bādhate anitya tvam api katham sādhayet tena eva anaikāntika tvāt atra ucyate yadi kiñcat kvacid chāḥ tre na yuktam pratiṣidhyate bruvāṇaḥ yuktam api anyat iti rāja kula sthitiḥ na hi sakala śāstra artha virodhaḥ kvacid eva śāstre tasya bhāvāt sambandha bhāva abhāvābhyām sādhanam asādhanañca iti kaḥ iva atra virodhaḥ ayuktasya pratiṣedhe yuktasya api pratiṣedhaḥ iti rāja śāsanam etat api ca sarvān arthān samīkṛtya vaktum śakyam na sādhanam sarvatra tena utsannā iyam sādhya sādhana saṃsthitiḥ 
[508,xi]	sarva artha avirodhena na kiñcid sādhanam śakyam vaktum prakṛta sādhya sambandha mātram eva apekṣyate anyathā asambhavāt śāstra artha avirodhaḥ eva karttavyaḥ iti ced na aviśeṣāt aparasya api prāpteḥ atha śāstrasya api virodhaḥ pariharttavyaḥ tathā sati sādhanam eva kiñcid na syāt iti utsīdet sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ sarvatra śāstram tarhi kasmāt aṅgīkṛtam iti ced etat eva atra upapādayitavyam abhipretam na prathamam śāstra abhyupagamaḥ karttavyaḥ kṛte sati pramāṇa virodhe paścāt api varam parityāgaḥ pareṣām punar matam śāstra abhyupagamaḥ pratijñā tatas śāstram abhyupagamya na virodhayitavyam abhyupagama siddhānte sati vāda vidhāna vṛtteḥ 
[508,xii_508,xiv]	yadi tarhi ākāśa guṇa tva bādhane api na hetu doṣaḥ katham viruddha avi abhicārī sādhana doṣaḥ tatra api sādhana antara prasiddha artha virodhataḥ doṣaḥ iha api śāstra prasiddha artha virodhaḥ eva doṣaḥ na sat etat yatas viruddhayoḥ eka dharmiṇī ayogāt aḥ tu bādhanam viruddha aikāntikena atra tadvat asti virodhitā 
[509,i]	viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ iha paraspara viruddha artha avi abhicāritāḥ dvayoḥ api samāna balā eva dvayoḥ api āgam āśrita tvāt vastu bala pravṛttantu anumānam śāstrañca na tathābhūtam tatas tayoḥ r na paraspara bādhanam viruddha avyabhicāri vat na ca dvayoḥ api sādhanam viruddhayoḥ ekatra dharmiṇī ayogāt śāstrasya tu viruddha anumāna apekṣayā pramāṇa tva abhāvāt tad arthaḥ bādhyataḥ eva na bādhakaḥ viruddha avyabhicāri vat śāstrasya ca pramāṇa balān anugṛhītasya pratiṣiddham eva prāmāṇyam tasmāt na viruddha avyabhicāri pakṣa upakṣepa pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ 
[509,ii_509,iv]	atha api śāstram atīndriya artha darśinā pravarttitam kathantasya anumānena bādhā tatas tena pratibaddham apramāṇam eva anumānam api tatas tulya bala tvāt viruddha avyabhicāri vat atra api doṣaḥ eva iti ced tat asat yatas śāstreṇa bādhanam syāt ced anumāne virodhini pramāṇam nikhilan aṣṭam āgamaḥ pariśiṣyate 
[509,v]	yadi sakalam anumānam śāstreṇa bādhyate tadā na anumānena śāstra arthaḥ sādhyate param prati iti katham āgamaḥ pratijñā bhavet nahi kiñcid anumānam anyat vā pramāṇam yat na śāstreṇa bādhyate anitya nitya tā ādi anumānasya apara apara śāstreṇa bādhanāt asti agniḥ iti ādikam api śūnyatā śāstreṇa bādhyate atha tad apramāṇam katham apramāṇam anumānasya bādhakam anumānena bādhitam apramāṇam na sarvam iti ced nanu tat eva anumānam śāstreṇa bādhitam apramāṇam iti bhavataḥ pakṣaḥ tatas na bhavataḥ pakṣa parityāgaḥ yuktaḥ atha parīkṣitam pramāṇantena bādhanam 
[509,vi]	nanu anumānam eva parīkṣā tatas katham śāstreṇa tena bādhitā parīkṣā śāstrasya prāmāṇya hetuḥ na khalu tatra asambhavi tat sambhāvayati tasmāt anumānam eva pratyakṣa pūrvakam dṛḍha mūla tvāt pramāṇam tena bādhitam śāstram na pramāṇam eva iti na tad pratipakṣaḥ iti na viruddha avyabhicāri vat atra api doṣaḥ tena ākāśa guṇa tva abhāvena saha anitya tva sādhanāt sādhanam eva na tu doṣavat viruddha avyabhicārī tu nitya tvam tad abhāvan ca sādhayan ahetuḥ eva asambhavāt tat abhāva tad bhāvayoḥ ekatra ākāśa guṇa tva abhāvasya tu anitya tvena na virodhaḥ iti kutas doṣaḥ ekatra dharmiṇi sādhane 
[509,vii_509,x]	abādhya bādhaka tve api tayoḥ śāsra artha viplavāt asambandhe api bādhā ced syāt sarvam sarva bādhanam gandhe api pṛthivī guṇa tva viparyāsanāt anyena tena ca prakṛtena hetunā iti sambandhaḥ tena tatra eva bādhanāt asti ced asat hetoḥ sarvasya cintya tvāt sva sādhye guṇa doṣayoḥ yadi nāma tatra dharmiṇi tasya ākāśa guṇa tvasya sadbhāvaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tathā api na tad sādhyam aprakṛta tvāt aprakaraṇe api na bādhanam doṣaḥ sarvasya hetoḥ sva sādhya apekṣayā doṣasya cintayitu mabhi samīhita tvāt 
[509,xi_510,ii]	tasya sva asādhya an uparodhe api tad apara asambandha bādhane yadi doṣaḥ śāstra pīḍā lakṣaṇaḥ tadā anyena api hetunā anyatra api dharmiṇi samā eva doṣa kāriṇī pīḍā iti pratipādayan āha na antarīyaka tā sādhye sambandhaḥ sā iha na īkṣate kevalam śāstra pīḍā iha doṣaḥ sa anya kṛte samā vyāpakasya hi sādhyasya abhāva sādhanam pariharttavyam yaḥ sādhya sādhanana āntarīyakasyadvādhane hi tad abhāve vyāpyasya api nivṛtteḥ na ca ākāśa guṇa tvasya sādhyana antarīyaka tā tatas tad abhāve api na sādhya uparodhaḥ api ca 
[510,iii_510,v]	śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhyaḥ śāsra dṛṣṭokhilaḥ yadi pratijñā asiddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate pramāṇa samuccayasya vyākhyātā prāha śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhya tā sakalasya śāstra dṛṣṭasya anyathā śāstra abhyupagamasya vyartha tā na hi tad artha asādhya tāyām śāstra upagamaḥ kvacid upayogī abhyupagamam vā arhati svātantreṇa pramāṇena na kiñcid tasmāt upagamya śāstram tad arthaḥ sādhanīyaḥ tatas tad virodhe doṣaḥ eva atra ucyate asiddha hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ pratijñātvam bhavet nirddeśasya tayoḥ api śāstra artha tvasya kadācid bhāvāt bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced pratijñā eva sakalā prāptā tatas siddha tā ādi doṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ 
[510,vi]	nanu yaḥ śāstra arthaḥ na bhavati sa hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ tatra asiddha tā ādi doṣaḥ sa avakāśaḥ na tasya api sva mukhena abhyupagamāt atha sva mukhena abhyupagatam na pratijñā para mukhena abhyupagatam nitarām eva parasya api vaiśeṣika ādeḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti asiddha sādhana niddaśaḥ api bhavet tasya api yadi nāma anirddiṣṭaḥ śāstra arthaḥ pratijñā na bhavet nirddiṣṭaḥ tu bhavati eva tathā hi bhāṣya uktam āgamaḥ pratijñā na tu pratijñā yā saḥ āgamaḥ nanvā gamaḥ pratijñā eva na āgama artha nirddeśāt āgamaḥ pratijñāna svarūpataḥ tatas sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti syāt pratijñā asiddha hetu ādiḥ tasya api āgama artha tvāt 
[510,vii]	sattyam etat sakalaḥ eva śāstra arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tathā api na sādhana tvena uktasya pratijñātvam sādhya tvena anīpsita tvāt nyāya mukha prakaraṇe tatra tu svayam sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ viruddha arthaḥ nirākṛtaḥ iti pāṭhāt na ca sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasye psitatama tvam sādhya tā ca karmaṇaḥ na ca sādhana tvena iṣṭam karmma tat yathā odanam payasā bhuṅkte iti payaḥ pramāṇa samuccaye na sva rūpeṇa eva iti avadhāraṇāt naiyāyikasya ca sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti sādhya tvena eva iti bhāva pradhāna tva sya avadhāraṇāt na sādhana nirddeśaḥ pratijñā atra ucyate 
[510,viii_510,ix]	uktayoḥ sādhana tvena no ced īpsita vādataḥ nyāya prāptam na sādhya tvam vacanāt vinivarttate śāstra abhyupagamāt iti nyāyaḥ eṣa yadi tat katham nyāya prāptasya vacanena nivarttanam nyāya sūcakam hi vacanam na nyāyam eva viruṇaddhi atha vacana saṃsūcitaḥ api nyāyaḥ sādhakaḥ eva sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya asādhya tvasya 
[511,ii_511,vi]	na etat asti viruddha avyabhicāri syāt dvayam etat tathā sati śāstra abhyupagamāt etat īpsita ādi vacaḥ tathā yadi īpsita vacana ādi nyāyena asādhya tvam sādhanasya sādhyate tathā śāstra abhyupagamāt iti anena sādhya tvam tathā sati ekatra paraspara viruddha artha sādhana āde tau śaṃsa saṃśasam janayetām tathā ca śāstra abhyupagamāt iti na sādhakaḥ iti kutas śāstra dṛṣṭasya asādhana tvena iṣṭasya api sādhya tā atha śāstra abhyupagamāt iti na nyāyaḥ tathā sati īpsitam vādinā sādhyam na sādhana tvena iṣṭam atra āha anīpsitam asādhyañcet vādinā nyaḥ api anīpsitaḥ dharmaḥ asādhyaḥ tadā asādhyam bādhamānam virodhi kim 
[511,vii_511,viii]	na hi ākāśa guṇa tvam api vādinā īpsitam atas na sādhyam prakṛta parityāgena hi kaḥ prekṣāvān aprakṛtam īpsitatamam kuryāt nanu śāstram abhyupagamya tad artha virodhe svayam uktena hetunā avaśyam eva doṣa duṣṭaḥ na prativādi iṣṭasya svayañca sādhanāt na duṣṭaḥ iti pratipāditam etat atha pramāṇa virodhaḥ api yadi ākāśa guṇa tā śabdasya na syāt utpatti sthānaḥ eva śrūyeta ākāśa guṇa tve tu tad yogāt anyatra api śrutiḥ na etat asti tatra eva tasya grahaṇāt rūpavat dūra sthitena kasmāt gṛhyate rūpasya api tarhi tad ākāśa guṇa tva prāptiḥ api ca tat ākāśam ekam anekam iti vā syāt iti yadi ekam yojana sahastrāt api tad guṇasya śrutiḥ syāt aneka tve vadana deśaḥ eva tasmāt na ākāśa guṇa tvasya śabde kutaścid pratītiḥ 
[511,ix^1]	nanu ākāśa guṇa tvam antareṇa avasthānam eva na syāt avaśyam hi padārthena sthitimata bhāvyam tatra rūpa sparśa rasa gandhānām pṛthivī ādi mahābhūta catuṣṭayam āśrayaḥ śabdasya tvākāśa mana aśri tatva ayogāt pṛthivī ādīnām api tarhi ākāśa āśrita tvam eva tatas eva hetoḥ na guṇa tva abhāvāt tat eva aguṇa tvam āśrita tvena sidhyati guṇa tvañca śabdasya āśrita tve pṛthivī ādīnām guṇa āśrita tvāt aguṇa tvañcet tat eva na sidhyati āśrayasya ākāśasya sambhave ākāśa āśritam hi rūpa ādi pṛthivī ādi ca bhavet pṛthivī āde rūpa ādeḥ ca ākāśa asamavāyi tvāt 
[511,ix^2]	pṛthivī samavetam hi rūpa ādikam koyam samavāyaḥ nāma ekalolībhāvena avasthānam iti ced na tarhi śabdasya ākāśa guṇa tvam tena saha eka lolībhāvena apratipatteḥ gandhasya ca pṛthivyāḥ atha ākāśaḥ upalabhyamāna tvāt tad āśritaḥ śabdaḥ tat eva ca tasya sthānam tūlaka ādeḥ api tarhi tatra upalabhyamāna tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam tena dhāraṇāt svayam eva labhya ghu tvāt avasthānam iti ced śabdasya api tathā syāt iti anākāśa guṇa tvam atha tūlaka ādeḥ pṛthivī api sthānam ākāśe tu sthānan ākāśa kṛtam vāyunā sandhāri tvāt śabdasya api evam iti na ākāśa guṇa tā tathā hi 
[512,ii_512,v]	vāyunā preryamāṇasya śabdasya anyatra na śrutiḥ vāyuḥ eva āśrayaḥ tasya kā iyam anyasya kalpanā yathā hi vāyunā dhāryamāṇasya tūlaka ādeḥ nna vāyu guṇa tā tathā śabdasya api yathā ca preryate tūlam ākāśe mātariśvanā tathā śabdaḥ api kim vāyoḥ pratīpam śabda vid kvacid atha śabdaḥ prerayitum aśakyaḥ eva mātariśvanāḥ guṇena saṃyoga abhāvāt tūlakasya tu pṛthivī tvāt na virodhaḥ anyathā acchāya ātapa ādiḥ api preryeta kathantasya preraṇam dravyasya eva tad āśritasya preraṇāt 
[512,vi_512,ix]	saṃyukta samavāyena vāyunā preryate yadi na eṣā api kalpanā śabde preraṇam viyadaḥ kutas atha api preryate vyoma tathā sati na niṣkriyam vyāpinaḥ preraṇā ca asya sambhavati ati durghaṭam api ca saṃyukta samavāyena yadi preraṇam iṣyate samavāyena kinna asti samavetasya vāyunā 
[512,x]	vāyu guṇa tā eva śabdasya astu tad dvāreṇa tasya deśa antara gamanāt vāyoḥ sparśaḥ eva guṇaḥ iti ced na eka guṇa tvam eva dravya sya iti niyamaḥ rūpa rasa gandha sparśavatī pṛthivī ityādi para siddhāntāt dṛṣṭaḥ ca guṇasya api gandhasya vāyunā preraṇam tatra api saṃyukta pṛthivī samavāyāt eva preraṇam iti ced na tad upalambhe pṛthivī upalambha abhāvāt tatas utpannasya kevalasya vāyunā preraṇe kaḥ virodhaḥ guṇasya niṣkriya tvāt iti ced tat eva niṣkriyayatvam kevala preraṇāyām na sidhyati sa kriya tvam api sahita preraṇāyām a siddham iti ced na sahita preraṇāyāḥ asiddheḥ guṇasya sa kriya tvam katham iti ced ayam aparosyaya doṣaḥ tu 
[512,xi_512,xvi]	yadi ayuktam kvacid śāstre guṇa tva ādi niṣidhyate yuktam api atra neṣyeta tat etat rāja śāsanam kiñca na preraṇam nāma nija sthāna vināśinām sa kriya tvam na nāma asti padārthasya vināśinaḥ deśa antare tad sadṛśa kṣaṇa utpatti guṇena kim jalakallola gamanaḥ paraiḥ śabdaḥ na kim mataḥ api ca na guṇa vyatirekeṇa guṇavān māna saṅgataḥ sparśa ādi vyatirekeṇa kim anyat upalabhyate yadi ca gandhaḥ saṃyukta samavāyena vāyunā bhuvā saha ākṛṣyate śabdaḥ api pṛthivī ādi guṇaḥ eva tatas pṛthivī ādinā saha eva ākṛṣyatām kim ākāśa kalpanayā 
[512,xvii_513,i]	api ca pṛthibī ādayaḥ dhāraṇa ādi karmmaṇā parikalpyatām nāma ākāśantu katham avakāśa dānāt ākāśam api iti ced kim idam avakāśa dādad nāma avasthiteḥ avyāghātaḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ paraspara deśa avasthiti vighāta kṛtaḥ tatas avasthānasya dātrā pareṇa kenacid mahābhūta antareṇa bhavitavyam tad ākāśam tat api yat kiñcit taṃthā hi 
[513,ii_513,iv]	na avasthiteḥ vighāta usti yadi bhūta antara sthitiḥ parasparasya abhāve api na vighātoḥ ti avasthiteḥ mahābhūta antara abhāve mahābhūta antara sthitiḥ mahābhūta antara abhāva mātram ākaśamucyatām nanu mahābhūta antarasya vāyu ādeḥ kva avasthānam yadi na ākāśam nanu ākāśasya api kva avasthānam yadi mahābhūta antaram ma bhavet iti anavasthā atha ākāśam anādhāra svabhāvam ādhāraḥ ca anyasya iti ced vāyuḥ avi tarhi anādhāra svabhāvonyasya ca ādhāraḥ iti artha antara parikalpanā na sādhvī api ca 
[513,v_513,xii]	loṣṭhasya katham ādhāraḥ na ākāśam patataḥ kvacid vāyau gatimati vyomnaḥ katham ādhāra tā gatiḥ vāyoḥ gati avibandhaḥ ced ākāśāt na idam uttaram gateḥ vibandha abhāvohi vibandhaka vinākṛtaḥ atha ākāśam vyāpi nityañca dhāryatenyena tat katham tena anādhāra tā tasya param prati tu dhārakam vyāpi tvam ātmanaḥ api etat tad avastham arūpi ca tasya eva ādhāra bhāvaḥ kim param prati na kalpyate yasya ātmā na asti tādṛkṣaḥ tasya ākāśena kā kriyā diśaḥ api vyāpita ākāśa kṛtyam tābhiḥ prakattyatām paraspara vyāpitāyām eka tvam vyāpinām na kim 
[513,xiii_513,xiv]	nanu ākāśaḥ ālokaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ na ātma ādiṣu katham ekatā nanu yadi vyavahāra unurudhyate yathāvyavahāraḥ tathā padārtha kalpanā tad anurūpā eva yuktā chidram eva ākāśam acchidra kāraka abhāve ca tad vyavahāraḥ yadā ca acchidra kāriṇaḥ bhāvaḥ tad ākāśam kva gata vat na hi pārśvāpa da śasaraṇam ucyate vyomnaḥ tad abhāve ca tatra ca anyatra vā kva gatam ākāśam vinaṣṭañcet sādhvī nityatā tatra eva astu iti ced acchidram ākāśam iti ca vyāhatam tatrā pyasti avānyathā tasya padārthasya sthitiḥ eva na syāt atha kā iyam sthitiḥ kim dhāryamāṇa tā atha avihanyamāna tā yadi dhāryatā tat asat na ākāśena ghaṭa ādayaḥ dhāryante api tu bhuvā atha anupaghātaḥ tat api asatti am yatas upaghātaḥ yatas tasya tasya abhāvena tasya saḥ ākāśāt na upaghātaḥ tu vyaktam ākāśa carvaṇam tasmāt abhāvaḥ bhūtānām caturṇṇām vyoma kathyate tat anyatra mahābhūte vyavahāra usti na pramā 
[513,xvi_514,ii]	anena diś api vyākhyātā tasyāḥ api vyāpitāyām na avakāśa dāna ādikam tathā hi vyāpi tvena pratīcyādi pratyayaḥ na itara tvataḥ gatiḥ nna asti aparā tasyāḥ tad abhāva prasaṅgataḥ yadi vyāpi tvam diśaḥ sā eva pūrvā tatonyatra vyavasthitasya katham parā atha tatra ubhaya rūpa tā tathā sati ubhaya pratyaya prasaṅga atha pratiniyata vyañjaka abhāvāt kā api avasthāḥ diśaḥ bhi vyajya teneka avasthāyāḥ thāya pitṛ putra ādi rūpasya svarūpasya api pitṛ ādi tva abhivyaktiḥ putra ādi tva apekṣayā tat api asat yatas avasthāyāḥ diśaḥ vyaktiḥ nniyatāyāḥ yatonyatas tatas eva hi bhāvānām avasthā pūrva tā ādi vat 
[514,iii]	yatas eva pūrva apara deśa vyavasthita puruṣa apekṣayā itarasya parāditā digbhāgasya tatas eva bhāvānām eva sā iti kinnābhyupeyate pūrva deśa avasthita tvāt puruṣa ādīnām pūrva tā deśasya deśa antara apekṣayā tasya api punar āt ityādi apekṣayā iti kim anya diś parikalpanena āditya ādinā diś abhivyajyate tena ca ādityasya pūrva tā āditā tat idam itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ tāvat mātreṇa ca vyavahāraḥ prasiddhaḥ kim anya apekṣā parikalpanā prayāsena 
[514,iv_514,vii]	nanu apekṣām antareṇa api ṛju etadi tibhavati vyavahārāt padārtha antaram eva diś tat api asatti am yatas apekṣā bhedataḥ tatra api asti darśana mṛju iti atyanta abhyāsa tonyena vinā paścāt tathā gatiḥ tathā hi tava praguṇam etat iti loke upalabhyate vyavahāraḥ tata utyanta abhyāsāt paścāt tad anusaraṇena apekṣām vinā api kutas etat tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt anyatra api nimitta naimittika bhāva gatiḥ tathā hi 
[514,viii_514,xi]	samudra madhyam adhyāsya jāyate vibhramaḥ nṛṇām graha nakṣatra dṛṣṭyā tu diś vibhāga viniścayaḥ na nakṣatra ādi sambandha mātrāt diś a para īkṣyate svarūpa apratibhāse hi kathanta dga tirucyate tathā hi pūrva ādiś iti bhāskara udaya saṅgamaḥ eva manasi nilīyate nanu ādityasya anyathā darśane api diś vyā moha vāhi mānasānām sā eva purva upalakṣitā diś pratibhāti nādittya udaya vaśena tathā hi ādittya udayaḥ api paścima diś avalambī avabhāsate 
[514,xii_514,xiv]	atra api ucyate abhra anta mānasa āsaṅgī yatra astamayaḥ īkṣitaḥ su abhyastā sā eva diś tatra grāma ārāma ādi lakṣitā yaḥ eva ārāma grāma ādi ruttara ādi diś upalakṣaṇam āditya udaya ādi apekṣayā prāktana avasthāyām sātatyena upalabdhaḥ tad abhyāsa aparānnā dityā udayonurudhyate api tu tad upalakṣitā sā eva diś iti dṛḍha vāsanā saṅgamāt vyavahāraḥ tasmāt 
[514,xv_514,xvi]	anādi vāsanā saṅga sammukhībhūta cetasām prameya virahāt ete pratyayāḥ eva kevalāḥ na khalu ati antam avadhāna dāna tātparya paryāsita paryākula mānasaḥ api diś ādīnām nijam rūpam avadhārayati anavadhārita tad rūpaḥ eva tu lokaḥ parāmarśa virahāt gata anugati kanyāya apakṛta mānasa tayā tathā vyavaharati iti kim atra kurmmaḥ 
[514,xvii_515,iii]	anādi tvāt tu sattya tve na asti hi asya api sattya tā īśvara ādi vikalpa nām api anādi nta taḥ na kim tasmāt asat vyavastheyam diś ādīnām vyavasthitiḥ vyavahāra mātram eva idam śāstra abhyāsāt upāgatam na śāstrāṇām anādi tve sarvesām eva sattya tā paraspara virodhena bādhya bādaka bhāvataḥ tasmāt padārthānām eva paraspara apekṣayā pūrvaḥ paraḥ ityādi nāma vyavahāra artham uparacayanti sma vṛddhāḥ anādi tvāt vā saṃskārasya pūrva vyavahāraḥ eva prabodham upagataḥ tathā vyavahārayataḥ 
[515,iv]	saḥ eva ca svabhāvaḥ bhedena nirddiśmānaḥ kāla ādi ākhyām bhajati tathā hi āsīt asti bhaviṣyati iti pratyayebhyaḥ devadatta ādeḥ atītānānāgata kāla vyavasthānam āsīt sakālaḥ iti āditas ca kālasya api kāla antar evasthānam prasaktam iti anavasthā atha svarūpe ṇa eva kālaḥ pūrvaḥ na kāla antara apekṣayā tathā diś api iti svabhāva bhūta dharma bhedena tathā vyapadeśa aindrī diś pūrva iti evantarhi padārthānām api vṛkṣa ādīnām svayam eva pūrva tā na apara kāla ādi pūrva tva apekṣayā atha kāla ādeḥ svatas na pūrva āditā api tu tad saṃsa rggi padārtha apekṣayā tathā hi 
[515,v_515,viii]	rājānaḥ ye cira atītā s tad saṃsarga vyapekṣayā kālaḥ api asau cira atītaḥ iti tatra vyavasthitiḥ atra ucyate atīta bhāva saṃsargāt kālasya atīta tā yadi bhāvasya tat atīta tvam tad kāla apekṣayā apatet anyonya saṃśraya tvena na syāt anyatara sthiteḥ yaugapadyāt atīta tvam yadi syāt anavasthitiḥ na paraspara hetu tvam yugapad bhāvinoḥ dvayoḥ tayoḥ atha parasmāt ced tasya api iti anavasthitiḥ 
[515,xi]	anyat ca yadi ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vāyu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ tejaḥ guṇaḥ rūpam abguṇaḥ rasaḥ pṛthivī guṇaḥ gandhaḥ kala guṇaḥ kaḥ iti vaktavyam eva tathā ātma ādeḥ atha kālasya mahatva ādikam tad ātma ādīnām api tatas prātisvikaḥ kaścid vaktavyaḥ atha padārthānām pratibandha abhyanujñe teca kāraṇa vaśāt eva anvaya vyatirekataḥ tasya api sva kāraṇāt iti anādiḥ kāla paraṃparā api ca 
[515,xii_515,xvi]	nityasya vyāpinaḥ śaktiḥ pratibandha abhyanujñayoḥ yadi ātmanaḥ api sā prāptā na iṣṭāt anyasya bhinna tā tathā hi kālaḥ diś ātma ākāśam iti samānam etat niti ādi tayā tatas samāna deśa kāla tve nirvyāpāra tva yogataḥ anena kṛtam anyena na iti vaidharmya vid katham tasmāt asanneva ākāśa ādi vādaḥ tasmāt ākāśa guṇa tvam śabdasya na pramāṇa saṅgatam api ca
[515,xvii_516,i]	ākāśa vāyu prabhavaḥ hi śabdaḥ katham na vāyoḥ guṇaḥ uktaḥ eṣaḥ ākāśaḥ eva śrutiḥ asya tena vyomnaḥ guṇa tvam pratipannaḥ eṣaḥ jvālā ādiḥ ākāśa gataḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ kintadguṇa tvam kathitan na tasya anyaḥ api tasya āśrayaḥ iti ayuktam dhvaneḥ api syāt paṭaha ādiḥ anyaḥ yadi yaḥ yatrastha tayā pratīyate sa tad guṇaḥ jvālā ādikam api kinna ākāśa guṇaḥ tasya anyaḥ api kuḍya kāṣṭha ādikaḥ āśrayaḥ iti tatrastha tayā pratīyamānaḥ na ākāśa guṇaḥ 
[516,ii]	tat asat ubhaya stha tve bhavatu ubhaya guṇaḥ dhvaneḥ api paṭaha śaṅkha ādayaḥ kim na āśrayaḥ deśa antare śrūyamāṇa tvāt iti ced āloka ādeḥ api samānam etat āśraye api maṇi ādau tasya upalaṃbhāt iti ced kvathyamāna dravya śabde api samānam etat tasmāt na ākāśa guṇa tvam śabdasya tatrasthatā upalabdheḥ api tatrasthāloka vat na ca ākāśasya sthāpaka tvam apratigha tvāt ākāśam arūpya nidarśanam apratigham āloke sati a ākāśam prajñāyate yatra ālokaḥ eva tatra ākāśa prajñapteḥ prajñaptimat a ākāśam tasmāt ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti na subhāṣitam tasmāt na ākāśa guṇa tva bādhane kaścid doṣaḥ 
[516,iii_516,vi]	api ca pakṣa lakṣaṇa bāhya arthaḥ svayam śabdaḥ api anarthakaḥ svayam śabdaḥ hi śāstra kāreṣṭasya śāstra abhyupagamāt sādhya tā prāptiḥ iti tat nivṛti arthaḥ eva na anyat asya prayojanam yadi punar tasya api sādhya tā vyartha tā eva tasya syāt tathā sati pakṣa lakṣaṇā saṅgata tvāt śāstreṣu icchā pravṛtti arthaḥ yadi śaṅkā kutas nu iyam saḥ aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇena gṛhṇan kena nivāryate niṣiddhaḥ ced pramāṇena vāvā kena pravarttyate pūrvam api eṣa siddhāntam sva icchayā eva gṛhītavān kathañcid anyam na punar grahītum labhate na kim 
[516,ix_516,x]	yadi prekṣā pūrva kārī prapattā parīkṣā eva tasya nimittam śāstra abhyupagamasya tatas katham śāstreṣu icchā pravṛtti artham svayaṃgrahaṇam na ca sarvam eva śāstram parīkṣā kṣamam tatas pramāṇa bādhitā pariśuddhena pravṛtteḥ eva iti kutas icchā pravarttanasya sambhavaḥ yatas na icchā mātrāt pravarttante prekṣā pūrva kriyā kṛtaḥ vimṛśya kāritā puṃsām sudhiyām prathamam padam aprekṣā pūrva kārī ced tasya icchā eva nibandhanam prathama upagamaḥ tasya tāvat mātra pravarttitaḥ tatas tadvat dvitīyaḥ api tṛtīyaḥ api bhaviṣyati tad artham eṣā śikṣā ced na iccha iti eva sa śikṣyatām 
[516,xiv]	yadi śāstram icchayā grahītavyam iti ayam eva nyāyaḥ sva vacanena kathyate pūrvavat idam api tvayā icchayā eva grāhyam tadā parīkṣya yuktam grahaṇam na icchā mātram atra trāṇa miti nyāya darśanam yuktam icchā pravarttana virodhi tasmāt svayam grahaṇam ayuktam eva yadi śāstra dṛṣṭam sādhyam evantarhi svayam iṣṭa artha sādhane api śāstra artham parityajya yadi pramāṇa bādhā na tatra pravartteta kaścid abādhanam ced icchayā svayam eva pravarttate kim svayaṃgrahaṇena 
[517,i_517,iii]	parihāraḥ dṛṣṭeḥ vipratipattīnām atra akārṣīt svayam śrutim iṣṭa akṣatim asādhya tvam anavasthāñca darśayan vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artham sakalam eva śāstram tatotrā api śāstra dṛṣṭam sādhyam iti vipratipatti nirākaraṇam kena nyāyena iti ced iṣṭa akṣati asādhya tā anavasthā darśanena na hi śāstra dṛṣṭa bādhanepa uṣṭasya kṣatiḥ anāntarīyaka tayā api na sādhyam anāntarīyaka tve api tad sādhane anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti nyāyaḥ svayaṃgrahaṇena darśyate 
[517,iv_517,vi]	tasmāt asat etat samayā ahita bhedasya parihāreṇa dharmiṇaḥ prasiddhasya gṛhi iti artham jagāda anyaḥ svayam śrutim śāstreṇa racitaḥ bhedaḥ ākāśa guṇa tva lakṣaṇaḥ yasya dharmiṇaḥ tad parihāreṇa svayam eva prasiddhaḥ na śāstra kāreṇa sādhitaḥ yaḥ dharmī tasya parigrahaḥ yathā syāt iti svayaṃgrahaṇam tathā hi svayam eva yaḥ dharmī vyavasthitaḥ na anyena vyavasthāpitaḥ sa dharmī bhavati na anyaḥ iti arthāt upapannam etat 
[517,vii_517,xii]	tat asat yatas vicāra prastuteḥ eva prasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ āśrayaḥ sva icchā kalpita bhedeṣu padārtheṣu avivādataḥ vicāraḥ hi nityān ityādi rūpa tayā kvacid dharmiṇi kriyamāṇaḥ siddha rūpe kriyate yasya tu yat eva rūpam sādhayitavyam tatra tat eva tāvat vicāryatām asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana asambhavāt atha śabda rūpam siddham eva tat eva tarhi dharmi tvena upādātavyam kim asiddha viśeṣaṇa upādānena atha tathā bhūtaḥ eva icchāvādinaḥ anitya tām sādhayitum asat etat yatas śrotuḥ tatra anabhiprāyāt tasmāt tasya aprasiddhitaḥ ākāśa guṇa yuktasya sādhyasya vacanam vṛthā 
[517,xiii_517,xvii]	na hi prekṣā pūrva kāriṇām anarthikā vacanānām vṛttiḥ na tāvat prativādinām ākāśa gaṇa tva viśeṣaṇam anitya tvam abhipretam na api anabhipretam eva pratijñā mātrāt sidhyati evam hi anākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti api sidhyet anyaḥ vā yathā īpsitorthaḥ atha evam eva vādinobhiḥ ucitam tathā sati tathābhūtaḥ viveka rahitobhi ruci mātra preritaḥ kena nivāryatām tasmāt asat etat asādhyatām atha prāha siddhādeśena dharmiṇaḥ sva rūpeṇa eva nirddeśyaḥ iti anena eva tad gatam yatas siddha sādhana rūpeṇa nirddeśasya hi sambhave sādhya tvena eva nirddeśyaḥ iti idam phalavat bhavet 
[518,i]	atha evam vyākhyāyeta na sva rūpeṇa dharmī sādhyaḥ svayam eva siddhaḥ bhavati iti vacanāt anyathā svayam vacanena tasya viśeṣaṇam kim artha jātam janayati iti tathā hi na tāvat dharmiṇaḥ siddha tā mātra pratipādana artha vacanam vicāra prastāvataḥ eva prasiddha tvāt tasmāt prasiddhaḥ eva bhavati na sādhyaḥ iti asya sādhya tva niṣedha artham svayam vacanam tatas sādhya tā na dharmiṇaḥ iti uktam 
[518,ii_518,viii]	tat api ayuktam yatas prekṣāvān nā asti asau kaścid yaḥsiddham api sādhayet tam tadā pratipannā iva sādhya tām gamayet katham a evantarhi sva rūpeṇa eva iti vacanam anarthakam vicāra prastuteḥ eva asiddhasya sādhya tvāt na khalva siddham vivāda āspadībhavati tathā sandigdhe hetu vacanāt vyastaḥ hetoḥ anāśrayaḥ tathā vicārasya apa tathā siddhaḥ api atra ucyate svarūpa grahaṇam hi na siddha nivṛtti artham sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya asiddhasya nirākaraṇa artha tvāt atas eva sva rūpeṇa eva iti avadhāraṇam eva ekam phalavat pratipāditam 
[518,ix]	anyathā dvayam api pratipādanīyam bhedena kimarthantarhi siddha sādhana rūpeṇa iti uktam siddha rūpeṇa dharmiṇaḥ asiddhasya tathā dharmasya sādhana rūpeṇa iti vyākhyātavyam sa ca siddha rūpeṇa nirddeśaḥ dharmiṇaḥ kevalasya yathā samavāyi kāraṇam ātmā tathā ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ a nityaḥ iti dharmi viśeṣaṇa tvena atha yatra dharmi viśeṣaṇam tatra ākāśa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ iti vacanāt katham avagatam anitya tvam na ākāśa guṇa tvam iti kim anityaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ saḥ ākāśa guṇaḥ atha ākāśa guṇaḥ yaḥ yaḥ anityaḥ iti tat etat api prakaraṇāt avagantavyam śabdasya sādhāraṇa tve api ca tathā ca pratipāditam kathantarhi śrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti svarūpa grahaṇasya vyavacchedyam darśitam avadhāraṇa artha tve hi tat ayuktam 
[518,x_518,xi]	sattyam etat tathā api tad anya artham kṛtam anya artham api bhavati iti abhyupagamya tat uktam atha api kuryāt sādhyam tathā api svarūpa grahaṇasya vyāvarttaka tvāt adoṣaḥ nirākṛtasya katham prāptiḥ tatra vivāda darśanāt tat ca paścāt pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ anumānasya sāmānya viṣaya tvam ca varṇṇitam iha evam na hi anukte api kiñcid pakṣe virudhyate 
[518,xii_518,xiv]	sāmānya viṣayam anumānam iti pratipāditamā cā rye ṇa na ca dharmī siddhaḥ tad anyaḥ vā sādhyamānaḥ sāmānyam tatas svayaṃgrahaṇena yadi nāma na dharmī sādhya tve na parihṛtaḥ tathā api na doṣaḥ sva lakṣaṇa tvena eva parihārāt api ca kuryāt ced dharmiṇam sādhyam tatas kim tat na śakyate kasmāt hetu anvaya abhāvāt nanu doṣaḥ tayoḥ ayam uttara avayava apekṣaḥ na doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iṣyate tathā hetu ādi doṣaḥ api pakṣa doṣaḥ prasajyate sarvaiḥ pakṣasya bādhātaḥ tasmāt tanmātra liṅginaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ matā na anye pratyakṣa ādi virodha vat 
[519,iii_519,iv]	nanu sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ viruddha artha anirākṛtaḥ iti pakṣa lakṣaṇam tatra yadi dharmiṇam eva sādhyam kuryāt kaḥ doṣaḥ atha dharmī sādhayitum aśakyaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya asādhya tvāt dharmi sattāyām hi sādhyāyām sva lakṣaṇasya sādhanam bhavet hetoḥ viśeṣeṇa anvaya abhāvāt hetoḥ eva tarhi tatra śaktiḥ adṛṣṭānta tvāt tatonyasya doṣonyasya doṣaḥ iti na yuktam 
[519,v]	atha pakṣasya api asau doṣaḥ eva asiddhi arha tvāt evantarhi sarvaḥ hetu doṣaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ bhavet tad doṣeṇa pakṣasya eva asiddhi arhat tvāt atha yatra pakṣe hetuḥ anyaḥ sādhakaḥ saṃbhavati yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tatra hetu doṣaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt itya ādau tathā hi na pakṣasya asādhana arhatā doṣaḥ anyena hetunā sādhanāt yatra tu kaścid api na hetuḥ sa pakṣasya doṣaḥ sambhavī hi sva abhiprāyaḥ sa pakṣa vacanena nidarśanīyaḥ sa yathā pramāṇa va ādhāyāt na sambhavati tathā sva lakṣaṇa tve api tatas pakṣa doṣaḥ eva ayam iti nyāyaḥ 
[519,vi_519,ix]	atra ucyate asambhavi tvam pakṣasya kim idam hetu apekṣayā atha sva gatam eva asya tat etat dvayam api asat hetu saṅgāt sa doṣaḥ ced hetoḥ eva sa doṣa tā svagataḥ tu na doṣoyam darśanena asya sādhanāt yadi svabhāvataḥ eva asiddhi arha tā pratyakṣataḥ api na sidhyet anumānāt na sidhyati iti ced anumānasya eva tarhi sa doṣaḥ atas eva siddhaḥ api dharmī yadi sādhyaḥ kriyet tatra api hetu doṣaḥ eva hetoḥ tatra api ananvayāt siddha sādhyatā doṣaḥ tu anumānena siddhe sa ca pakṣa doṣaḥ eva pratyakṣa siddhe tu sva lakṣaṇe hetu doṣaḥ nvaya abhāvāt tatra api ātmanaḥ eva pratyakṣa siddhe tu ubhayoḥ tu siddha sādhya tā lakṣaṇaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ eva 
[519,x_519,xi]	tasmāt svayam anumānena siddhaḥ paraṃprati pakṣaḥ āgama siddhaḥ tu apakṣaḥ eva pratyakṣa siddha vat nanu pratyakṣa asiddhe sva lakṣaṇe hetu doṣāt apakṣatā āgama siddhe tu katham sāmānyam āgamasya viṣayaḥ sāmānyena ca anvayosti eva tat katham pakṣa doṣaḥ nanu etat eva uktam hetu doṣāt pakṣa doṣaḥ kin na tarhi tanmātra bhāvi tvāt atra ca tanmātra bhāvi tvam asti tathā hi 
[519,xii_519,xvi]	yadi āgamena siddhoyam hetunā kim prayojanam āgamena prasiddhe tu katham āgama siddha tā atha param pratyasiddhaḥ api svayam āgamāt siddhaḥ tat api asat yatas yadi āgamasya prāmāṇyam paraṃprati api siddha tā atha āgamasya aprāmāṇyam dvayam pratyapi asiddha tā tasmāt svayam anumāna siddhaḥ eva pakṣaḥ 
[520,i]	nanu pratyakṣa siddhaḥ api agniḥ svayam paraṃprati kim na pakṣaḥ na tena rūpeṇa apakṣa tvāt sāmānya rūpeṇa hi asau pakṣaḥ na viśeṣa rūpeṇa anyena tu svarūpeṇa tasya na pratyakṣa siddha tā tasmāt pratyakṣa siddhe anumānam eva na asti iti sthitam etat yadi evam ayam sa gaḍupraveśe a kṣinirgamaḥ yadi pratyakṣa siddhe na anumānam tadā tat asiddhe sutarām eva pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt anumānasya tathā anumāna viṣaye api na pratyakṣam iti katham pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ pakṣaḥ bādhanañca nāma na arthasya dhvaṃsanam api tu na asti iti jñāpanam tatra yāvān kaścid pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarva unupalabdheḥ iti anupalabdhi bādhanāt anumāna bādhanam eva tathā ca uktam tasya abhāva viṣaya tva virodhāt 
[520,ii]	tatra ucyate yat uktam pratyakṣa pūrvakam anumānam iti tatra na sāmānya viṣaye pratyakṣa pūrvakam api tu yatra sāmānya ignitva ādau sādhye tat vyakti viṣayam na pratyakṣam tatra anumānam na pravarttate tad vyakti pravṛtta pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt anumānasya sāmānye tu yadi pratyakṣa vṛttiḥ kim tatra anumānena tat eva sva lakṣaṇam anumānena sādhyamānam sāmānya rūpa tām bhajeta sva lakṣaṇam eva sāmānyam viśeṣeṇa apratīyamānam tat ayam eva arthaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayenu mānam anumānena pratīyamānam pratyakṣam eva na bhavati iti tatas tat pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam agniḥ hi mahānasa ādau pratyakṣa pratipannaḥ eva pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti atra ayam eva arthaḥ tad viparyaya vyaktau pratyakṣasya pravṛtta tvāt yatra ca na vyaktiḥ tatra tad sāmānyam asambhavyā iva vyakti vyaṅgya tvāt sāmānyasya api ca āśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti sva lakṣaṇa pratiṣedhaḥ eva pakṣaḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate pratiṣedha nirākaraṇe ca yat viṣayasya pratiṣedhaḥ tena eva nirākaraṇam gamyeta tad aviruddha tvāt anyasya 
[520,iii]	nanu pratyakṣam katham anumānena nirākarttum āśakyate anumāna śabdāḥ viṣaya tvāt tasya atas eva nirākārakaḥ sambandha abhidhāyi iti nirākriyate athavā dṛśya vikalpya arthayoḥ eka adhyavasāyāt adoṣaḥ tasmāt na siddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhya tayā pakṣa doṣaḥ tatra hetoḥ eva duṣṭa tvāt na ca hetu doṣeṇa doṣaḥ yaḥ sa pakṣa doṣaḥ hetu doṣa tayā tasya hetu lakṣaṇena eva nirākaraṇāt na ca hetu lakṣaṇena nirākṛtam pakṣa lakṣaṇena api nirākarttavyam vyartha tvāt aviṣaya tvāt ca 
[520,iv_520,vii]	hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ bbādhyam muktvā pakṣasya lakṣaṇam ucyate parihāra artham avyāpti vyatirekayoḥ hetu dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇena nirākṛtam doṣam muktvā anya doṣa parihārāya pakṣa lakṣaṇam ucyate yatas sakalam eva lakṣaṇam avyāpti vyatirekayoḥ parihārāya na ca anyena lakṣaṇena yaḥ parihṛtaḥ doṣaḥ tad aparihāre api lakṣaṇasya avyāpti ati vyāpti tā bhavet etāvat eva lakṣaṇam astu kim anyena yad artham tat kṛtam tasya anyena parihārāt anarthakam svayaṃgrahaṇam kena tarhi tad avyāpti vyatirekayoḥ nnirākaraṇam atra brūmaḥ svayam nipātar upākhyāḥ vyatirekasya bādhikāḥ saha anirākṛtena iṣṭa śruti ḥ avyāpti bādhanī 
[521,i^1]	etāvatā eva paripūrṇṇa lakṣaṇam kim anyena svayam iti yadi na kriyeta śāstra kāreṣṭasya api sādhya tā prasaṅgaḥ nipātasya akaraṇe sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya asiddhasya sva rūpeṇa iti akaraṇe siddhasya dharmiṇaḥ aparaḥ tu doṣaḥ na asti eva tad artham svayaṃgrahaṇam anartha kama doṣa parihāra artha tvāt kimarthantarhi anirākṛta grahaṇam nirākṛtam api yadi kaścid sādhyam kuryāt tatra api hetu doṣaḥ eva bhaviṣyati tena eva nirākaraṇāt iti ced na saha anirākṛtena vyatirekasya bādhanāt iti bhāvaḥ na hi anirākṛta padam antareṇa vyatirekaḥ bādhitum śakyaḥ hetu lakṣaṇena eva tasya doṣasya
[521,i^2]	bādhanāt iti ced na pakṣa mātra bhāvi tvāt tasya iti adoṣaḥ sa hetoḥ yadi iṣṭaḥ api nirākṛtaḥ na pakṣaḥ kimarthantarhi iṣṭa grahaṇam iti āha iṣṭa śrutiḥ avyāpti bādhinī na hi nirākṛtam eva vyāptam iṣyate anirākṛtasya api vyāpti viṣayasya saṃbhavāt athavā iṣṭa śrutiḥ avyāpti bādhanī iti vacanāt vyāpti arthā tatas nirākṛtam api vyāpyeta tat āha saha anirākṛtena yadi nirākṛta padam na kriyeta bhavet tasya api vyāptiḥ iṣṭa grahaṇāt sahatva nirākṛta pade na kutas sambhavaḥ tasmāt yadi śāstra dṛṣṭaḥ api arthaḥ sādhyaḥ tat etāvatā eva lakṣaṇena svayam śabda rahitena gatam kim apareṇa tatra 
[521,ii_521,v]	sādhya abhyupagamaḥ pakṣa lakṣaṇam teṣu apakṣatā nirākṛte bādhanataḥ śeṣe alakṣaṇa vṛttitaḥ idam atra arthasya tattvam sādhyasya abhyupagamaḥ pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ nirākṛta ādīnām api abhyupagamaḥ iti teṣām api pakṣatā bhavet tad nirākṛte bādhanāt śeṣe ca siddha ādau lakṣaṇasya eva apravarttanāt iti lakṣaṇam iṣṭaḥ eva pravarttate na anyatra iti tat etat asat kim anena pratipāditena vidheyam kim atra iti vidheya pratipādanañcet tat na vidheyasya prāk eva pratipādanāt asiddha asādhana artha ukta vādi abhyupagama grahaḥ iti tasya eva upasaṃhāraḥ iti api na puṣṭam yasya hi ayam arthotra iti pratipādanam tatra kim upasaṃhāreṇa 
[521,vi_521,viii]	apare punar āhuḥ vārttikakārasya eva iyam svayam pakṣa lakṣaṇasya kṛtiḥ tathā hi sutrāṇām anupapatti codanā tad parihāraḥ viśeṣa abhidhānam ca iti vārttika lakṣaṇam tat etat viśeṣa abhidhānam tat api asat sādhya abhyupagamaḥ iti sādhana tvena iṣṭasya śāstra kāreṣṭasya ca prāptiḥ anivāritā eva atha sādhya tvena iti khyāyate na ca sādhya tvena iṣṭiḥ sādhana tvena iṣṭasya 
[521,ix]	tat api asat sādhya tvena api tat iṣṭam eva atha sādhya tvena eva abhyupagamaḥ iti avadhāryate tadā sādhana tvena abhyupagatasya nivṛtti artham etat iti na anuktaḥ api icchayā avyāptaḥ sādhyaḥ syāt atha sādhya tvena abhyupagamaḥ pakṣaḥ eva tathā sati sādhana tvena upagatasya api sādhya tvena abhyupagame bhavet pakṣatā na hi tadānīm ubhaya asaṃbhavaḥ na hi ayam ekā saṃjñā adhikāraḥ śāstra kāreṣṭasya api prāpnoti tatra api abhyupagamāt atha pratyāsatteḥ vādinaḥ eva abhyupagamaḥ 
[522,i_522,iv]	tat api asat śāstra kāreṣṭasya api vādinā abhyupagata tvāt kiñca vyāpteḥ nyāyāt iti kinnābhyupagamyate buddhi kṛta pratyāsattiḥ ca śāstra kāra iṣṭe api bhavati iti anaikāntika tā pratyāsatteḥ nnirākṛte api ca sādhya abhyupagame prāptiḥ nanu nirākṛte bādhanataḥ sādhya abhyupagama abhāvāt sādhanam arhati sādhyaḥ iti tat api asat evam hi sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñe ti api niravadyam bhavet lakṣaṇa anusārī ca katham arha anarha viveka vid tasmāt asat etat evantarhi nyāya mukha pakṣa lakṣaṇam etat sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ viruddha artha anirākṛtaḥ iti 
[522,v]	atra hi evam ucyate yadi svayat nipāta rūpa ākhyā vyatirekasya bādhikā nyāya mukhena idam asti iti katham vyatireka bādha iti āha sādhya abhyupagamaḥ ityādi tatra api nirākṛte bādhanataḥ śeṣe alakṣaṇa vṛttitaḥ na doṣaḥ īpsitaḥ iti bhūta kāla abhidhāyī niṣṭhā pratyayaḥ eva sādhyatayā eva iṣyamāṇe na pravarttate tatas eva tasya nirākaraṇam iti na doṣaḥ yadi evam atra api iṣṭa grahaṇāt sādhana tvena upanyasya nirākaraṇam iti nipāta vacanam anarthakam 
[522,vi_522,x]	sattyam etat svayam iṣṭa abhidhānena gata arthe api avadhāraṇe kṛtya antena abhisambandhāt uktam kāla antara chide svayam iṣṭaḥ iti kāla antara iṣṭa vyavacchedaḥ syāt yadi kṛtyā antena pradhānena sambandhaḥ na syāt sa ca asti tatas kāla antara icchā viṣayīkṛtasya api syāt pakṣatā yat evam nyāya mukhe api tad nipāta vacanam tad nivṛttaye karttavyam atra ucyate 
[522,xi_522,xiii]	iha anaṅga miṣeḥ nniṣṭā tena īpsita pade punar aṅgam eva tayā asiddha hetu ādi pratiṣidhyate iha pramāṇa samucyaye pradhāna tā kṛtyā antasya nirddeśyaḥ pakṣaḥ kim bhūtaḥ iṣṭaḥ tatas kāla antara anurodhaḥ tat yathā āgataḥ devadattaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti tena avadhāraṇam kāla antara iṣṭa vyavaccheda artham iha anaṅga miṣeḥ nniṣṭā tena īpsita pade punar aṅgam eva iti 
[522,xiv_522,xv]	vyasta sambandhaḥ īpsita pade anaṅgam pradhānam iha punar aṅgam eva iti vyākhyātavyam athavā iha pramāṇa samuccaye anaṅgan na bhavati bhūta kāla pratipādane īpsita pade punar nyāya mukhe anaṅgam eva tayā niṣṭayā aasiddha hetu ādi pratiṣidhyate tatas tatra nipātā vacanam tasmāt na dharmiṇaḥ sādhya tā pratikṣepa artham svayaṃgrahaṇam na api śāstreṣu icchā pravṛrtttham pūrva ukta nyāyāt 
[523,i_523,ii]	avācaka tvāt ca ayuktam tena iṣṭam svayam ātmanā anapekṣya akhilam śāstram tat abhīṣṭasya sādhya tā svayam śāstre yatra kvacid stotavyam svayam prasiddhaḥ eva dharmī iti ca svayam grahaṇasya avācaka tvāt ayuktam tena iṣṭam na anyena vyākhyātrā svayam ātmanā tasmāt anapekṣya śāstram akhilam tat abhīṣṭasya sādhya tā 
[523,iii_523,viii]	tena anabhīṣṭa saṃsṛṣṭasya iṣṭasya api hi bādhane yathā sādhyam abādhātaḥ pakṣa hetū na duṣyataḥ tena śāstra kāra iṣṭa saṃsṛṣṭasya bādhane api kevala sādhane sādhyam atikramya bādhanāt pakṣa hetvora doṣaḥ anyathā api doṣe adūṣaṇa udbhāvanam eva nanu śāstra kāra iṣṭa bādhane kim tena sādhitena prauḍha tā hāneḥ uktam atra yadi kiñci dityā di api ca sarva nāśe samutpanne kiñcid āsāditam varam ghaṭasya kūpe patane na rajjū kṣepam arhati tasmāt svayam nipāta rūpa ākhya avyatirekasya bādhikāḥ saha anirākṛtena iti vyākhyātam 
[523,ix_523,xv]	tatra anirākṛta padam avaśiṣṭantat vyācaṣṭe aniṣiddhaḥ pramāṇābhyām sa ca upagamaḥ iṣyate kotra nyāyaḥ saṃdigdhe hetu vacanāt ekena pramāṇena sādhite viparyaye tad abhāve pramāṇasya hetoḥ anāśrayaḥ tat āha vyastaḥ hetoḥ anāśrayaḥ nanu yadi hetuḥ asti sādhakaḥ kasmāt na pakṣaḥ atha na tadā hetoḥ eva sa doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati kim anirākṛta vacanam 
[523,xvi]	sattyam etat tathā api pakṣa doṣeṇa prathamam eva nirākaraṇe hetu doṣa anapekṣam eva yathā syāt iti pakṣa doṣaḥ eva ayam tanmātra bhāvāt na hi pratyakṣa anumānābhyām nirākṛte kaścid sādhanam apekṣyate tathā sati anāśvāsaḥ eva iti tatra api sādhake kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ tasmāt sandigdhaḥ hetoḥ viṣayaḥ sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāva mātram ca atra saṃdehena lakṣyate na sandeha sammukhībhāvaḥ eva asaṃmukhībhūta sandehaḥ api anumānāt ekasmāt agnim avagacchati eva athavā yatra sandehaḥ utpādayitum śakyaḥ tatra hetu viṣaya tvam na svarūpa tad viparyayābhyām sādhaka bādhakābhyām niścite 
[524,i_524,iv]	yadi pramāṇābhyām aniṣiddhe hetu vacana viṣaya tā dvividhā eva tarhi bādhā katham ācāryaḥ cāturvidhyan darśayati sma atra ucyate anumānasya bhedena sā bādhā uktā caturvidhā anumāna bādhā eva trividhā darśitā pratyakṣa bādhā caturthī iti caturvidha bādha upadarśanam na dvividha bādhāyāḥ bādhakam evantarhi āgama prasiddhi bādhanam api liṅgataḥ eva anyathā anumāna bheda tva abhāvaḥ 
[524,v_524,ix]	evam etat yatas tatra abhyupāyaḥ kārya aṅgam svabhāva aṅgam jagat sthitiḥ āpta vacanam kārya pratirūpakam svabhāva pratirūpakam prasiddhiḥ katham na mukhyam etat liṅgam iti āha ātma aparodha abhimate bhūta niścaya yukta vāc āptaḥ sva vacanam śāstram ca evam uktam samantataḥ na khalu kaścid pramāṇa prasiddhaḥ āptaḥ parasya sakala manaḥ doṣa rahitasya jñātum aśakya tvāt asarva darśinā vyavahāra saṅkareṇa ca niścetum aśakyatvāt anumānataḥ tasmāt agatyā abhyupagataḥ āpta tayā aptaḥ paramārthataḥ tu na iti sva vacanena sahoktiḥ sāmya dṛṣṭaye kṛtā yatas 
[524,x_524,xi]	yathā ātmanaḥ apramāṇa tve vacanam na pravarttate śāstra dṛṣṭe tathā na arthe vicāraḥ tat anāśraye yadi ātmanaḥ pramāṇa tvam na upeyāt vacana apravarttanam eva prasaktam yathā sarvam mithyā vravīmi iti yadi sarvam eva mithyā vaktavyam mayā iti bhavatā ubhyupagamaḥ tat ayam bhāṣitasya arthaḥ na mad vacanāt pratyeyam na mad vacamāt kiñcid karttavyam evam tarhi kim ātmā parikleśitaḥ vayam ca āvacane api asya arthasya siddha tvāt yat api durvaidagdhyā avadhūta dhiyaḥ adhītam tat api avadhūtam eva 
[524,xii_524,xv]	yathā sarvam mithyā pabravīmi iti na etat eva niṣidhyate tasya mithyā abhidhāne hi prakrānta ūrthaḥ na sidhyatī ti yatas kāla traya niṣedhe api na ca etat saṅgatam vacaḥ aprāmāṇye hi vacasaḥ prakhyātyā panayaḥ bhavet yadi evam pratipadyeta sarva m uktam mṛṣā sva vacana virodhāt ayuktiḥ eva pravarttayatā vacanam ātmā
[525,i]	pramāṇa tām gata ubhyupagataḥ tatas katham tasya aprāmāṇya pratipādanam paścāttāpāt iti ced tathā api virodhaḥ eva avacanam eva varam kim āyāsena aparyālocya kṛtam iti ced nanu ayam eva doṣaḥ paryālocanam eva nyāyaḥ atha varttamāna anāgata niṣedhaḥ idam bravīmi mithyā tadā api kim anena uktena bhāvini tu śrotā eva na asti kim artham vacanam cāraṇa carcarī vacana vat adoṣaḥ iti ced na vāda prastāvāt vastu nirṇayaḥ hi vādasya arthaḥ 
[525,ii_525,iv]	tasmāt asat etat tathā śāstra prasiddherthe tad anabhyupagame vicārasya iti sāmyam eva śāstra sva vacanayoḥ tad prastāva āśraya tve hi śāstram bādhakam iti amum vaktum artham su avācā asya saha uktiḥ sāmya dṛṣṭaye yadi śāstra anabhyupagamaḥ kathantad artha vicāraḥ yadi śāstram antareṇa vicāraḥ na pravarttate dharmiṇaḥ eva abhāvāt tadā śāstram bādhakam anyathā na iti pratipādayitum saha uktim antareṇa tu śāstram sva vacanāt atirikta sāmarthyam pareṣām abhimatam iti tathā eva syāt 
[525,v_525,vi]	udāharaṇam api atra sadṛśam tena darśitam pramāṇānām abhāve hi śāstra vācoḥ ayogataḥ atas eva sāmya pradarśana artham sadṛśam udāharaṇam āha pramāṇa pratikṣepe śāstra vacanayoḥ abhāvāt pramāṇa pratiṣedhe śāstram api na eva bhavataḥ pramāṇam iti kim abhyupagamaḥ iti paraspara virodha mātram eva syāt 
[525,vii_525,ix]	sva vāc virodhe vispaṣṭam udāharaṇam āgame digmātra darśanantatra pretya dharmaḥ sukha pradaḥ nanu santi pramāṇāni iti katham ayam śāstra virodhaḥ na hi pramāṇan dharmmi śāstrāt eva bhavati yadi tu pramāṇam kiñcid na syāt kutas dharmyādi siddhiḥ iti sva vacana virodhaḥ atha siddham kiñcid abhyupagamyate yatas eva tasya siddhiḥ tat eva tasya pramāṇam bhavet pramāṇataḥ eva prameya siddheḥ pramāṇam antareṇa tu na kiñcid jñāyate iti vaktavyam tasmāt na ayam śāstra virodhaḥ śāstram abhyupagamya yadi brūyāt syāt eva iti na doṣaḥ śāstram abhyupagatam iti katham jñātavyam 
[525,x_525,xi]	sattyam etat atas eva na śāstra virodhe spaṣṭam idam udāharaṇam api tu diś mātra darśanam vārttikakāraḥ spaṣṭam āha pretya asukha pradodharmaḥ iti avaśyam evamvidhe viṣaye śāstram abhyupagantavyam iti śāstra virodhe spaṣṭam etat eva udāharaṇam tasmāt atra sva vacana vat paraspara virodhaḥ evantarhi yatra pramāṇa siddhaḥ dharmī tatra śāstram abhyupagamyamānam bādhakam eva pramāṇa tvāt śāstra prasiddhe tu dharmiṇi tad abhyupagatam tad uparodhāt eva tat vādhakam bhavet 
[525,xii_526,ii]	atra āha śāstriṇaḥ api atad ālambe viruddha uktau tu vastuni na bādhā pratibandhaḥ syāt tulya kakṣya tayā dvayoḥ na hi śāstra sva vacanayoḥ abhyupagama upanīta prāmāṇyāt aparaḥ viśeṣaḥ ekasya api tatas tulya śakti tvāt dvayoḥ api pratibandhaḥ eva na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ yathā sva vāci tat ca asya tadā sva vacana ātmakam tayoḥ pramāṇam yasya asti tat syāt anyasya bādhakam pratijñām anumānam vā pratijñā apetayaktikā tulya kakṣyām yathārtham vā bādheta katham anyathā prāmāṇyam āgamānāñca prāk eva vinivāritam abhyupeta vicāreṣu tasmāt doṣa uyam iṣyate 
[526,v_526,viii]	 iti antaraślokāḥ tasmāt viṣaya bhedasya darśanāya pṛthakkṛtaḥ anumāna abahis bhūtaḥ api abhyupāyaḥ prabādhanāt atas eva bādhana abhyupagamāt āgamaḥ anumāna abahis bhūtaḥ api pṛthak kṛta unumānāt viṣaya bheda pradarśana artham anumān ambādhakam eva śāstrantu pratibandhakam abhyupagatam ca tad pratibandhakam na anyathā anyathā atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt vyartha tā vā pṛthakkṛteḥ bhedaḥ vāc mātra vacane pratibandhaḥ sva vācī api 
[526,ix_526,x]	yadi tu prayojanam antareṇa api sva vacana śāstra vacanayoḥ anumānāt pṛthak karaṇam vyartha tvāt vaktuḥ akauśalam eva bhavet sva vacana upagama virodhayoḥ tarhi katham pṛthak karaṇam parasparam nyā ye mu khe yadi viruddha artha vādinām sva vacanena bādhyate yathā sarva m uktam mṛṣā iti pūrva abhyupagamena vā yathau lū kya sya anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādhayataḥ viṣaya bheda abhāve api hi pṛthak udāharaṇam anarthakam sattyam abhedaḥ eva tathā api pūrveṇa pratiṣṭhāpitam uttaram pratihanti iti abhyupagama virodhaḥ tat eva tu vākyam sva artham pratihanti iti sva vacana virodhaḥ 
[526,xi_526,xvi]	tena abhyupagamāt śāstram pramāṇam sarva vastuṣu bādhakam eva iti ced yadi na icchet sa bādhakam kim punar bhavet sva vāc virodhaḥ abhedaḥ syāt sva vāc śāstra virodhayoḥ yadi hi asau na icchet kintat bādhakam bhavet yadi vā tad icchāyām api bādhakam na hi icchā apramāṇasya prāmāṇyam janayati abhyupagatam pūrvam paścāt anyathā na vaktavyam karaṇe kaḥ 
[527,i_527,vi]	virodhaḥ sva vacana virodhaḥ eva evantarhi svavāc virodhe abhyupagamyamāne svāvāc śāstra virodhayoḥ abhedaḥ eva prāptaḥ na śāstra bādha vailakṣaṇyam puruṣa icchā kṛtā ca asya paripūrṇṇā pramāṇa tā puruṣa icchā kṛtā ced pramāṇa tā śāstrasya vacanasya api svasya sā paripūrṇṇā tatas na viśeṣaḥ sva vacanāt śāstrasya atha śāstram sva artha sādhanāya abhyupagatam iti pramāṇam su avacanantu para arthantataḥ na nitarām para arthe hi na mahān prayatnaḥ iti tat asat yatas parīkṣitam yadi bhavet pramāṇam tatra bādhakam parīkṣā na pravṛttā ced sva vācaḥ na viśiṣyate yadi parīkṣitam abhyupagatam tadā tad artha pramāṇataḥ eva siddhaḥ iti pramāṇa bādhā eva atha na parīkṣitam vacana mātram eva tat iti na viśeṣaḥ sva vacanāt āgamasya 
[527,vii_527,viii]	tasmāt prasiddheṣu artheṣu śāstra tyāge api na kṣatiḥ parokṣeṣu āgama aniṣṭau na cintā eva pravartate pramāṇena prasiddhe dharmiṇi vicārasya apratibandhāt śāstram parityajataḥ api na kācid kṣatiḥ kevalam abhyupagama virodhaḥ abhyupagamya virodhāt na asau śāstra virodhasya parisphuṭaḥ viṣayaḥ śāstra prasiddhe tu dharmiṇi śāstra parityāga asambhavāt saḥ eva śāstra virodhasya spaṣṭaḥ viṣayaḥ āgama aniṣṭau hi tatra cintā anavatāraḥ eva evam tarhi tat śāstram pratiṣṭhāpayan dharmiṇam pratiṣṭhāpayati tatas tat bādhakam tat tarhi śāstram apramāṇakam katham dharmiṇam pratiṣṭhāpayati prāmāṇyena abhyupagamāt sva upagamaḥ eva tarhi prāmāṇyam āda dha t dharmiṇam pratiṣṭhāpayati dharma antarañca saḥ eva prativahati iti na bhidyate sva vacana virodhāt śāstra virodhaḥ 
[527,ix_527,xiii]	virodha udbhāvana prāyā parīkṣā api atra tat yathā adharma mūlam rāga ādi snānañca adharma śodhanam tathā ca āha cittam antargatam duṣṭam tīrtha snānaiḥ na śudhyati śataśas api hi tat dhautam surā bhāṇḍam iva aśuci tathā punar āha gaṅgādvāre kuśāvartte vilvakī nīlaparvate snātvā kaṇakhale tīrthe sambhavet na punarbhavaḥ 
[527,xiv_528,ii]	yadi tarhi na kiñcid bādhyate virodha mātrakam eva kimarthantarhi tad abhyupagama virodhaḥ iti āha śāstram yat siddhayā yuktyā sva vācā ca na bādhyate dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭe api tat grāhyam iti cintā pravarttate pramāṇa sva vacanā viruddham śāstram dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭayoḥ abhyupagantavyam anyathā abhyupagame aprekṣā pūrva kārī bhavet prasiddhi nirākṛtaḥ api na pakṣaḥ tatra prasiddhiḥ svabhāva liṅgam na tu āpta vacanam nātha tathā bhāvam antareṇa pravarttate kutas tathā abhyupagataḥ abhyupagama kṛtaḥ hi tatra pratibandhaḥ na tu pramāṇa prasiddhaḥ iti na mukhyaḥ kārya hetuḥ tatra prasiddheḥ api yadi vāstavaḥ pratibandhaḥ tadā mukhyaḥ eva svabhāva hetuḥ tathā abhyupagama kṛtaḥ tad āpta vacana vat abhyupagama virodhaḥ eva tat katham bādha antaram etat atha āptavādhā eva iyam yatas vakṣyati āptotra akṣata vāc janaḥ iti pratyakṣa artha anumāna āpta prasiddhena iti ca prasiddha śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate tatas trividhā eva bādhā 
[528,iii_528,vii]	tat asat anumānasya bhedena sā bādhā uktā caturvidhaḥ iti vacanāt ā cā rye ṇa api yatra api ityādi vacanena pṛthak udāharaṇa pradarśanena cāturvidhyam upadarśitam na samarthitam syāt atra ucyate sarva loka virodhoyam pūrvakaḥ punar ātmanā svabhāva kārya rūpeṇa prasaṅgoyam kṛtothavā sarva loka prasiddhena prabādhanam prasiddhi bādhā kevala ātma prasiddhena bādhā itarā 
[528,viii_528,x]	athavā svabhāva hetu rūpeṇa kārya rūpeṇa ca prasaṅga sādhana dvaya upadarśana param etat tathā hi dvayam eva vādinā karttavyam mukhya sādhanam prasaṅga sādhanañca na aparaḥ prakāraḥ vādi vacanānām iti darśana artham athavā vyavahāriṇa anugantavyāḥ śabda arthāḥ sarvadā eva yat na tu śāstram atas tasmāt asya abhedāt pṛthakkṛtiḥ 
[528,xii_528,xiii]	amukhya tve api prasiddhi virodhasya śāstrāt avaśya abhyupagantavya tvāt pṛthakkaraṇam nanu śāstra sva vacanayoḥ na kaścid bhedaḥ iti sva vacana bādhā eva śāstra bādhā tatonyam pratipādayatā śāstra prasiddhe dharmiṇi vivāda m āracayata avaśyam eva sva vacana śāstra vacanayoḥ pramāṇa tā abhyupagantavyā tat katham na avaśyam abhyupagamaḥ 
[528,xiv_528,xvi]	tat api asat para abhyupagamena ukta tvāt pareṣām hi vādinām abhyupagamaḥ avaśyam vāda vidhāne śāstram abhyupagantavyam dharmi antara dharma vivāde api tatas idam pratipādayitum ucyate tena avaśyam śāstram abhyupagantavyam iti athavā vivakṣita viṣaya aprasiddhiḥ parama artha viṣaye śāstram iti pṛthak upādānam tatra hi mātā ca bandhyā ca iti na vivakṣita artha bādhā tatas bāhya itara tayā bhedaḥ viṣayasya vivakṣitaḥ śāstra prasiddhe rbbādhasya vibhāgaḥ iti bhinna tā 
[528,xvii]	gatam prāsaṅgikam prakṛtam prārabhyate kā iyam prasiddhiḥ d nāma yadi tāvat loka prasiddhiḥ vyāptyai kadeśena vā sarvā parigṛhyate tadā nittya tva ādayaḥ api sakala loka prasiddhāḥ tatas tad bādhane pramāṇena loka prasiddhi bādhāḥ bhavet anyeṣān ca pramāṇa viruddhānām na ca anyorthaḥ prasiddhi śabda vācyaḥ tathā aśuci nara śiraḥ kapālam ityādayaḥ atha śāstra paripaṭhitasya bādhanam ayuktam tathā sati nittya ātma ādīnām api bādhane doṣaḥ syāt 
[529,ii_529,vi]	atra ucyate prasiddhiḥ iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvam yat akampitam prasiddhiḥ vyavahāraḥ hi tad jāta tvāt tathā ucyate prakṛṣṭā siddhiḥ prasiddhiḥ tad jātam iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvam acalita tvāt prakṛṣṭa siddhi rūpam nitya tva ādi kantu calati eva śāstreṇa tu tasya niścalīkaraṇam aśakyam pramāṇa siddham śāstreṇa na apanetum hi śakyate bādhita tvāt pramāṇena prāmāṇya vinivṛttitaḥ iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvasya tu na tathā calanam anumānasya bādhakasya abhāvāt tathā ca pratipādayiṣyate iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvasya hi puruṣa icchā anurodhinaḥ artheṣu na anumānasya bādhakasya avatāraḥ 
[529,vii_529,ix]	atas eva āha artheṣu apratiṣiddha tvāt puruṣa icchā anurodhinaḥ iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvasya āptotra akṣata vāc janaḥ iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvam hi sāmānya rūpam go tva ādi kalpitam na śakyam pratiṣeddhum icchā mātra parikalpitaḥ hi na śakyaḥ vikalpita artha paritoṣaḥ na khalu su samviditam śakyam niṣeddhum tathā cademapi 
[529,x_529,xii]	nanu pramāṇa siddham eva vastu vā adhakam atha atra ucyate sva samvedanam eva pramāṇam tena vācya tvasya śabdam pratyupādāna upādeya bhāva lakṣaṇasya siddha tvāt yadi evam pratyakṣa siddha mā iva vācya tvam tatas pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ eva pakṣaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva pratyakṣa prasiddhaḥ na aparaḥ vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iti ced na tāvat mātram eva vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ tat katham anyathā abhyupagamaḥ atra ucyate bācya tvam atra sāmānyam bhāvi bhūta tayā sthitam vyāpi vyakteḥ tatas tasya kutas pratyakṣataḥ gatiḥ a 
[529,xiii_529,xiv]	kevalam vyavahārasya tathābhūtasya bhāvataḥ anādi vāsanā bhāvāt tat asti iti pratīyate a tathā ca vakṣyate saḥ api iṣṭaḥ vyavahāra bhāj anya apoha lakṣaṇam hi sāmānyam vā arcyam iṣṭasya dhvaneḥ tat ca na pratiṣeddham śakyam vāsanā pratiniyamena tathābhūta pratyaya udayāt sā ca vāsanā icchā mātra kṛta saṅketa niyamena prabodhitā niyatam sāmānyam avasthāpayati tathā hi 
[530,i_530,iii]	brāhmaṇa ādi tvam avyaktam vyaktyā niyatam icchayā saṃketa vṛtti śabdena tad anya vinivṛttitaḥ na khalu dvija tva ādī jātayaḥ aniyata varṇṇa saṃsthāna ātma tayā vyaktyā vyaktum śakyāḥ tatas tāḥ vyakti niyata ācāra upalakṣita vyakti niyata saṃketavalāt eva abhivyakti bhājaḥ nanu na kenacid atra idānīm kṛtaḥ saṃketona ādi svabhāva siddha vācya vācaka bhāva sambhavāt na upadeśasya eva saṃketa tvāt api ca brāhmaṇaḥ na brāhmaṇaḥ iti kāraṇam etat yat tu tasya adṛṣṭa hetu tvam tat atra sādhyam anyathā caṇḍāla ādi jātīnām āsāñca kaḥ para sparataḥ vibhāgaḥ etena go tva ādi jātiḥ api pratyuktā tāsām api na gardabha ādi jātibhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ upalakṣya pravartanañcet 
[530,iv_530,vi]	vāha doha ādi sāmarthya mātreṇa atra prayojanam tena upalakṣyamāṇa tvam na nāma atra na saṃgatam tathā aja ādi jātīnām api tat eka śabda gocara tvam eva lakṣaṇam tasmāt vikalpya viṣaya tvam eva jāti ḥ atas prasiddhi mātra prāpita ātma bhāva tvāt sa dharmaḥ vyavahāra jaḥ prasiddhi śabdena uktaḥ uktaḥ prasiddhi śabdena dharmaḥ tad vyavahāra jaḥ 
[530,vii_530,ix]	na kevala mayam eva dharmaḥ prasādhaka prasiddhi lakṣaṇa pramāṇa śabdena uktaḥ api tu pratyakṣa ādi mitāḥ māna śruti āropeṇa sūcitāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa mitāḥ api artha antarasya pakṣa ābhāsa ākhyasya bādhakāḥ tasmāt iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvasya go tvāt audera śakya niṣedha tvāt tena eva pratiṣedha bādhanam na hi vyavahāra artha śabdam upanibadhya viracitaḥ vaidya ādi vyapadeśa viṣayaḥ sarva virodhi anunmattena pratiṣedhyaḥ prasiddhaḥ etat eva āha 
[530,x_530,xii]	tad āśraya bhuvām icchā vartti tvāt aniṣedhinām kṛtānām akṛta anāñca yogyam viśvam svabhāvataḥ svabhāvataḥ eva yogyam tad āśraya bhuvām vyavahāra jātānām yogyam go tva ādīnām viśvam kṛtānām akṛta anāñca svayam vyutpādayiṣyamāṇānām yogyam eva viśvasya sarvatra apratikūla tvāt aprātikūlyam eva yogyatā tatas artha mātra anurodhinyā bhavinyā bhūtayā api vā bādhyate pratirundhānaḥ śabda yogya tayā tayā 
[530,xiii]	na khalu bhāvinī bhūtāḥ vā yogya tā pratiṣedhena nivarttayitum śakyā śabdasya agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti ādeḥ śva māṃsa bhakṣaṇa ādau artha mātra anurodhi tvāt tatra api arthe apratikūla tā yogya tā na hi kaścid arthaḥ pratikūlaḥ sam ketakaraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ upadeśa pratipannaḥ vā mātra śabdaḥ aviśeṣa parigraha arthaḥ tat yathā brāhmaṇa mātram bhojaya iti bhojana mātram icchati na viśeṣa parigraham karoti yā ca yogya tā artha mātra anurodhinī na tatra kaścid pratiṣedhe nyāyaḥ 
[531,i_531,v]	atas pratiṣeddhā tayā eva yogyatayā bādhyate na hi yogyatāyāḥ niṣedhya tvam pratyakṣa siddham yadi parama numānam avataret tat ca dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt asambhavī iti pratipādayiṣyate nanu ācāryaḥ śābda prasiddhena iti āha na yogyatayā bādhanam na hi iṣṭa śabda abhidheya tvam yogyatā na ca tathā prasiddha tā yogya tā hi prasiddheḥ kāraṇat na tu prasiddhiḥ eva atra ucyate tad yogya tā balāt eva vastutas ghaṭataḥ dhvaniḥ sarva usyām a pratīte api tasmin tad siddha tā tatas ācāryasya api ayam eva abhiprāyaḥ yogya tā eva śābda prasiddha vacanena pratipādyate na nirvṛttā vācya tā yogyatā ca icchā mātra anurodhinī sā ca apratikūla tā saṃkete 
[531,vi]	icchā mātreṇa vṛttiḥ hi dhvaneḥ sarvatra vastuni tanmātra vṛttiḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ sa katham kvāpi varttatām na hi vastu svarūpeṇa pravarttayati vācakam aprātikūlyam saṃkete yogyatā iti abhidhīyate icchayā nirmitiḥ yā eva sārtha mātra anurodhi tā artha mātre api anākāṃkṣā saṃketa icchā katham bhavet cakra śabda abhidheya tva pratiṣedhaḥ yadā ghaṭe prasiddhi sādhanantatra iti abhipretam diśā anayā 
[531,x_531,xiii]	 iti antaraślokāḥ nanu aprātikūlyam yogyatā sā katham bhāvinī bhūtāḥ vā atra ucyate arthasya bhāvi bhūta tvāt yogyatā api tathā vidhā svarūpa vyatiriktā hi yogyatā nāma na īkṣyate tatra yorthaḥ yena śabdenā bhi dhātum iṣṭaḥ sa tena śabdena abhidhātum yogyaḥ tat yathā vṛkṣa śabdena na hi kasyacid kvāpi pratikūla tā 
[531,xiv_531,xix]	nanu dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva na siddhaḥ tatra api pratikṣepa saṃbhavāt na etat asti pravṛtte vācya vācaka bhāva vyavahāre kasya pratikṣepaḥ yatas pravarttamānāḥ dṛśyante tad artha pratipattyā ayam eva khalu vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ tathā ca uktam yasmin ud carite śabde yadā yorthaḥ pratīyate tam āhuḥ artham śabdasya na anya darśasya lakṣaṇam iti evam tarhi pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ eva pratijñā arthaḥ kim prasiddhi bādhayā atra ucyate na etāvat mātram atra pratipādyam api tu sarve śabdāḥ kvacid deśe kāle vā vācakāḥ matāḥ nyāyena anena na hi atra pratyakṣasya pravarttanam 
[531,xx]	uktam etat yat api candra śabda abhidheya tvam yadā ghaṭe pratiṣidhyate tadā pi prasiddhi bādhanam iti yat idānīm mama ayantat śabda abhidheya tvena na pratibhāti iti ucyate siddha sādhanam atha anyasya na pratibhāsate na ca idānīm vā na ca yogyaḥ tadā na asti etat icchā mātreṇa vṛtteḥ kim iti na sambhāvyate deśa kāla nara antare ṇa śabda arthānām anyathā vācya vācaka bhāva dṛṣṭeḥ kutas niyamaḥ anena nyāyena sarvam sarva vācyam iṣṭam iti na doṣaḥ 
[531,xxi_532,iii]	khādet śva māṃsam iti eṣa yena arthaḥ pratiṣidhyate pratīti bādhita tvena sa yogya tvena bādhyate yadi idānīm tathā arthoyam māṃsa ādiḥ pratibhāsate iti ucyate tadā adhyakṣa bādhā syāt anyathā kutas na hi atra pratyakṣa bādhā pratīti bādhā atra kevalam sā api saṃketa vaśāt eva yogyatayā yogya tā vā śva māṃsa ādau api 
[532,iv]	nanu yaḥ eva saṃketa para taṃtrāḥ laukikāḥ śabdāḥ teṣu eva ayam aniyamaḥ ye tu vaidikāḥ svābhāvika artha sambandhāḥ teṣu katham aniyamaḥ vyavahāra arthañca saṃketaḥ dṛṣṭa viṣayaḥ evam uktaḥ atīndriye tu pratipatti abhāvāt katham saṃketayitum samarthaḥ āgama eka śaraṇa tvāt pratipatteḥ itaretara āśraya doṣa prasaṅgaḥ na ca anyathā saṃketaḥ tad āgama anusāriṇaḥ yuktaḥ 
[532,v_532,viii]	atra ucyate nanu vedaḥ api kena ayam siddhaḥ svābhāvika artha bhāj tatra saṃketayet ajñaḥ jñānī dveṣa daya āditaḥ yathā eva icchayā ekena kṛtaḥ saṃketaḥ agni ādīnān dahana ādiṣu tathā śva ādiṣu api na svābhāvikoyam arthaḥ iti prasidhyati loka anusāreṇa tad artha vyavasthānāt loke ca deśa kāla ādi bhedena nānā bhūta artha darśanam na ca api deśa kāla ādi vyāpi arthaḥ ihi niścayaḥ 
[532,ix_532,x]	tatra kadacid ajñaḥ eva deśa kāla ādiṣu saṃketayet upadiśet vā upadeśa pāraṃparya mātre ca andha paraṃparā tatonyathā saṃketaḥ tad adhimukta apakṣepaṇāya athavā atīndriya darśī ā iva pūrva artha a agraha visaṃvāda kṛta parihārāya iti na virodhaḥ athavā na eva pratyakṣam atra api nirūpaṇa samāgame candra śabdāt pratītiḥ nnaḥ rāśinā unumitimvinā 
[532,xi]	na hi śabdāt artha pratītiḥ pratyakṣā bhavitum yuktā yathā veda vādī āha pratyakṣaḥ hi veda vacanāt arthe pratyayaḥ yadi tāvat evam ucyate pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ sva samvedana rūpa tvāt iti samayosya bādhyate jñāna antara ālambana tayā vā apratyakṣā buddhiḥ iti sthiteḥ abhyupagame vā anyatra api ucyatām pratyakṣaḥ dhūmāt agnau pratyayaḥ iti atha anumāna rūpa abhāvāt sa bhavet ekasmāt dhūmāt agnim pratiyataḥ api atha tatra pūrva anusandhānam āsīt atra apa saṃketa kāle anyathā vyākhyān anusāriṇaḥ api vyākhyā eva ca saṃketaḥ iti atha vyākhyā na bhavati sva icchā kṛta saṃketa rūpā tatas yama doṣaḥ 
[532,xii_532,xiv]	na etat asti pratipāditam anyathā api dveṣa āditas vyākhyā karaṇam chānda satvāt varṇṇa la upa nirukta ādinā samarthanā śiṣṭa prayogataḥ vyākhyā iti ced tathā vyākhyā paraṃpara āyāte bhavet andha paraṃparā na adhyakṣatā tatas tasya na anumetya niduṣṭa tā tasmāt candraḥ śaśī iti na atra api pratyakṣatā tathā ca pratyapādi tad bhāva abhāvayoḥ darśana adarśana smṛti apekṣa hi śabda liṅge sva viṣayam pratipādayate iti tatra yaḥ candraḥ śaśī sattvāt iti āha sa na evam āha pratītiḥ eva na asti iti evam hi sati pratīti bādhā syāt pratītiḥ ca pratyakṣā yadi nāma pratītiḥ tathā api asattyeyam indu dvaya pratīti vat tasya pratīti bādhā darśyate 
[533,ii_533,vi]	pūrva pūrva anusendhānāt pratīteḥ anumāna tā anumābādhanañcātaḥ iṣṭam śāstra kṛtām idam saṃketa kāle sambandha pratīteḥ anumā tatas svabhāva aṅgam jagat sthitiḥ iti siddham nanu anumānam etat iti yuktam svabhāva hetuḥ tu katham śabdāt ca pūrva darśana sahāyāt utpannā prati iti ranu māna rūpā bādhikā na ca śabda ūrthasya svabhāvaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi vācya vācakayoḥ yadi tadā śabdāt pratītiḥ syāt anumānam tathā sati 
[533,vii]	anumānāt pratītiḥ iti sambandha sahāya tā sa ca sambandhaḥ upādāna upādeya bhāva urtha śabdayoḥ śabdaḥ ca paramārthataḥ tālu ādi vyāpāra mātra janyaḥ na vācya artha janyaḥ tatas icchayā hasta mudrā ādi vat atra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na anyathā na hi icchā parikalpitaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vāstavaḥ rajjū kīla sambandha vat na ca tathā pratītiḥ avaśyambhāvinī tena na anumānam etat mukhyam kathantarhi svabhāva hetuḥ yorthaḥ upādāna bhūtaḥ saṃketena prakāśyate kriyate ca icchayā tathābhūtaḥ sa paramārthataḥ kāraṇa bhataḥ tad artha vivakṣām antareṇa api bhāvāt anya vivakṣāyām avivakṣāya añca na ca yam antareṇa yasya bhāvaḥ tat tasya kāraṇam tasmāt 
[533,viii_533,x]	upādānatayā iṣṭa tva mātrāt eva asya vācya tā tanmātra bhāvitām prāptaḥ svabhāvaḥ vācya tā bhavet upādāna tayā vyavasthāna mātram eva vācya tā tatas upādāna tayā vyavaharaṇam eva prasiddhiḥ vyavahāra prasiddha tvāt upādāna tvasya api prasiddhi tā tatas avācya tvam upādāna tvena pratibhāsane na bādhyate yaḥ hi yasya upādāna kārya tvena apratibhāsī sa yadi param avācyaḥ tatas śabdāt tasya apratibhāsanāt yadi asau arthaḥ icchāyām api na upādāna kārya pratyaya pratibhāsī bhavet avācyaḥ 
[533,xi]	nanu na eva pratibhāsate na hi bāhya arthasya upādāna tā tam antareṇa api bhāvāt iti uktam etat na icchāyām satyām pratibhāsanāt yadā hi artha darśane sati tad vivakṣayā prayogaḥ vināśya tyanta abhyāsāt tadā kinna pratibhāti tasya upādāna bhāvaḥ atha tatas bāhya artha apratibhāsanāt pratipattuḥ evam ucyate tathā sati anumānam api na bāhya artha viṣayantatra apratibhāsanāt eva atha tatas api vikalpāt tat adhyavasāyena vastuni evam ucyate tathā sati vācya tve api evam eva bāhya artha prāptiḥ tu sarvadā bhavati apramāṇa tvāt paramārthataḥ pratīteḥ na vā pramāṇa tve vācya vācaka bhāvāḥ bhāvaḥ evam bhūta tayā eva vācya vācaka bhāva prasiddheḥ tasmāt 
[533,xii_534,iv]	upādāna tayā yorthaḥ sthiti bhāj vācyaḥ eva sa sa ca upādāna ta icchā jā pratiroddhu na śakyate tādṛś prasiddhi viṣayaḥ sarva urthaḥ vācyaḥ ucyate tatas icchā para adhīna vṛtteḥ nna niyamaḥ dhvaneḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ tatas yogyatā eva ācāryasya prasiddha śabdena abhimatā etat eva kutas iti ced atra ucyate asādhāraṇa tā tena śabde na pratipāditā sā na syāt yadi yogya tvāt vācyanna akhilam iṣyate ete eva āha āsādhāraṇa tā na syāt bādhā hetoḥ iha anyathā 
[534,v]	yadi na ācāryasya yogyatāyām abhiprāyaḥ kathamba adhakam anumānam asādhāraṇa hetuḥ satvasya acandra śabda vācye ghaṭa ādike prasiddha tvāt yadā tu yogyatāyām sakalam eva tad bācya tayā bhavet kvacid acandre asiddheḥ āha ca ācāryaḥ yatra api asādhāraṇa tvāt anumāna abhāve śabda prasiddhena viruddhena arthena apodyate na sa pakṣaḥ iti yatra viṣaye pratipakṣa bhūtasya anumānasya asādhāraṇa tā tatas eva tad abhāvaḥ abhāve śābda prasiddham anumānam bādhakam na sa pakṣaḥ aśakya niṣedha tām asya darśayan evam āha pratipramāṇa tayā niścayam vā na hi pramāṇam antareṇa niṣedhaḥ na api niścāyake satya niścayaḥ atra ca 
[534,vi_534,xii]	uttaram pūrva sahitam pūrvam uttara saṃhitam parapūrva artha sadbhāve tat etat vyāpṛtam dvyam yadā tāvat pradhāna tā śābda prasiddhasya pūrvasya avayavasya viśeṣaṇa tā tadā pratipramāṇa abhāve niścayaḥ yadā tu para avayavasya viśeṣaṇa tvam pūrvasya pradhāna tā tadā aśakya niṣedha tā nanu yadi nāma anumānasya asādhāraṇa tā tathā api katham aśakya niṣedha tā na anumānam eva pramāṇam pratyakṣasya api bhāvāt atra parihāraḥ tad niṣedha unumānāt syāt śabda arthe anakṣa vṛttitaḥ nanu śābda prasiddham yat rūpam tad pratyakṣam atonumā na asti asādhāraṇa tvasya vyarthakam vacanam na kim 
[534,xiii]	na śabda arthe akṣa apravṛtteḥ na hi śabda arthaḥ sākṣāt karttum śakyaḥ yogya tā hi śabda artha tayā niścitā śābda prasiddhasya arthasya vyavahāra kāri tve yadi nāma pratibhāsate tathā api tatas na vyavaharttavyam iti yogyatā niṣedhaḥ śabda sambandhitā vā pratibhāsamānasya sambandhaḥ ca na pratyakṣa gocaraḥ śabdasya śrotra vijñāne pratibhāsaḥ tad arthasya tu vikalpe cakṣuḥ vijñāne vā na ca anayoḥ paraspara viṣaya sāṃkaryam 
[534,xiv]	nanu agni dhūmayoḥ api sva viṣaya vijñāna pratibhāsanāt katham etat tathā gandha gandha vat ādīnām bhavatu tatra api eṣa doṣaḥ tathā api na etat samarthitam bhavati indriya vijñānena tu teṣām grahaṇam tatas na doṣaḥ atra tu sva samvedanam eva jñāna sva lakṣaṇasya grahaṇam na vācaka tvasya vyāpī ca sambandhaḥ na pratyakṣa pratibhāsī na ca samvādī śābdaḥ vyavahāraḥ tatas na pratyakṣa gocaraḥ vastu viṣaya tvāt pratyakṣasya tatonumāna gocaraḥ eva ayam
