[534,xv_535,ii]	nanu anumāna antaram bādhakam bhaviṣyati hetu antara utpannam yadi nāma sattva āditya sādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ anyaḥ hetuḥ syāt iti āha asādhāraṇa tā tatra hetūnām yatra na anvayi sattvam iti abhyudāhāraḥ hetoḥ evam kutas mataḥ yatra hi sattvam aśeṣa vastu vyāpakam asādha araṇīkriyate tatra anyatra avyāpake varāke kā vārttā na hi balavat pratipakṣa nirāsa samarthaḥ tat aparatra kṣamate tad arthī atas eva sa hetukam pakṣam upadiśati sma acandraḥ śaśī sattvāt iti anyathā pakṣa ābhāsa upanyāsa prastāve kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ hetupanyāsasya anyathā aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti api hetu upanyāsa prasaṅgaḥ atha pramāṇa bādhite hetoḥ asambhavotrā api tathā syāt iti yat kiñcid etat 
[535,iii_535,vi]	nanu uktam aśakya niṣedha tām asya darśayati sma iti aśrāvaṇaḥ iti atra api prasaṅgāt atra ucyate śābda prasiddham etat hi na mukhyam mānam ucyate pratipakṣa vinābhāvaḥ atas iti atra anavadya tā atra saṃbhavati bādhakam na tu pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ tena atra pariharatā niḥpratipakṣata anumānasya kathitā iti vakṣyate 
[535,vii_535,x]	kathantarhi pratipakṣā sambhavaḥ na hi sarvasya vācya tā tat āha saṃketa saṃśrayāḥ śabdāḥ sa ca icchā mātra saṃśrayaḥ na asiddhiḥ śabda siddhānām iti śābda prasiddha vāc prasiddham eva sarvam śābdam rūpam icchā mātra pravarttita saṃketa śabda mātra bhāvāt na hi śabdaḥ kvāpi na pravarttayitum śakyaḥ etad artham eva śābda prasiddhena ityādi vacanam anyathā asādhāraṇa tā na pratipadāyitum śakyā iti uktam etat 
[535,xi_535,xiii]	nanu anumāna abhāve śābda prasiddham abādhitam abādhita tva bhāve ca anumāna abhāvaḥ iti itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ na icchā mātra pravṛt tattvam svatas eva na sidhyati śābda siddhasya sattvasya svatas eva pramāṇa tā na hi icchā mātra anurodhi śābda prasiddham pratipakṣa abhāva pratīkṣaṇam anyatā upekṣyate svatas eva tasya balavat tvāt pratiṣedhakasya ca sattvasya svatas eva apratibaddha tvena asādhana tvāt 
[535,xiv]	nanu sattvam avācyam eva pratīyate tatas avācya tayā vyāpta tvāt kasmāt na pratiṣedhakam na icchā mātra pravarttitasya niṣeddhum aśakya tvāt iti uktam yadi tu avācyam sattvam sattva śabdena eva katham ucyate tasmāt asādhāraṇa tvāt anumānasya ābādhita śābda prasiddha tā bādhikā eva yadi tu bādhye api bādhaka tva āśaṃkā tathā sati na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ kvacid iti apratipattikam jagat bhavet tasmāt śābda prasiddham eva bādhakam na tad pratipakṣaḥ tatas ca 
[535,xv_536,i]	anumāna prasādhyeṣu viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ abhāvam darśayati evam pratīteḥ anumā tu atas śābda prasiddha vacanena na pratipakṣeṇa darśayati yathā idam apratipakṣam anumānam tathā anyat api tat api pratipakṣa sambhāvana āyāmapramāṇa tvāt na bādhakam bhavet śābda prasiddha vat eva tatas tasya api asādhāraṇa tvāt pratipakṣasya sādhana tā yathā agniḥ atra dhūmāt na agniḥ atra sattvāt agni rahita pradeśa vat 
[536,ii_536,iii]	nanu icchā mātra pravarttita vācaka tvāt ghaṭe api candra tvam iti na dṛṣṭānta usti atra tu anagniḥ pradeśaḥ vidyate eva na etat asti śābda prasiddha bādhāyāma sādhāraṇa tā bhavet satvasya atra api kāryeṇa hetunā bādhanam na kim sadhme hi pradeśa īgniḥ anumānena sādhitaḥ pratiṣedhasya kim vanheḥ nna hi sādhakaḥ iṣyate vipakṣāt bādhana āśaṅkā prāk eva vinivāritā tasmāt pramāṇe sarvatra pratiyogī na vidyate 
[536,vi]	tatonumāne viruddha avyabhicāriṇām asambhavaḥ anyathā pramāṇasya bādhana sambhave sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ yatra na dṛśyate tatra āśvāsaḥ iti ced na anupalambha mātrasya pramāṇa abhāvāt sambhave api bādhakasya utprekṣayitum aśakyatvāt anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt anena eka tva saṃkhyā vivakṣā pratyuktā saḥ api hi anupalambham eva sūcayati pratibandham vā yadi anupalambham sūcayet tat apramāṇam iti na kiñcid atha pratibandham tatas na viruddha avyabhicāri sambhavaḥ na hi pratibandhavān aparaḥ tatra sambhavati ekasya bhāva abhāva tva abhāvāt tasmāt vastu bala pravṛtta anumāne viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ abhāvaḥ 
[536,vii_536,viii]	nanu yadi asā dhāraṇa tvāt anumāna abhāvaḥ iti anena viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ abhāva sūcana anumāne tadā anumānaḥ eva kim idam na ucyate yatra api asādhāraṇa tvāt anumāna abhāve kārya hetu svabhāva hetu prasiddhena viruddhena arthena apodyate tena sa pakṣaḥ iti evam pratyakṣe api vācyam na kiñcid etat yatas etena eva pratyakṣa anumāne vyākhyāte 
[536,ix_536,xi]	yaḥ āha na vastu pratyakṣesti pratyaya tvāt keśa maśaka ākāra taimirika pratyaya vat tasya idam uttaram pratibandha prasiddhena vastunā abhāva bādhanam pratibandhasya bhāve hi vastu sarvatra vidyate yadi pratibandha rahite pratyaye vastu saṃdigdham anyathā vā iti ucyate siddham eva sādhitam bhavet atha viparyaye tadā sarvatra vastu asti iti asādhāraṇa tā pratipakṣasya 
[536,xii_537,i]	nanu pratyakṣe na anumān ambādhakam anyat bā saṃbhavati tasya sākṣāt darśita tvāt sākṣāt dṛṣṭañca kathat na astitvena śakyam pratipattum na hi tadā eva tasya eva darśana adarśanayoḥ sambhavaḥ nanu hetu antareṇa abhāva sādhanam na anupalambhena na sat etat yatas sākṣātkṛtena bādhā asti pratyaye kvāpi kasyacid tathā sati pramāṇam syāt sarvam eva aviśeṣatas na hi bhrānta pratyaye api sākṣātkṛta keśa ādi rūpe bādhakam asti tatas na sākṣātkṛti mātreṇa pramāṇam 
[537,ii]	anena ābādhita tvam api pratyuktum na hi sākṣātkaraṇam iva ābādhita tvam api sva rūpeṇa ativyāpi avisamvādinya bādhita tve sati pramāṇam iti ced soyam harītakīm prāpya devatā virecayati iti nyāyaḥ yadi avi samvādanam asti kim abādhayā avisamvādena eva na doṣaḥ sa ca avisamvādaḥ na pratibhāsamāne apratibhāsamānañca gamyam pratibandhāt pratibhāsamāna rūpasya sa ca pratibandha rūpaḥ anumāne api samānaḥ iti tatra pratipakṣa sambhave dvayoḥ api na vā kvāpi iti samānam tasmāt na sākṣātkaraṇena pratyakṣam api pramāṇam 
[537,iii_537,vi]	atas eva āha arthasya asambhave abhāvāt pratyakṣe api pramāṇa tā pratibaddha svabhāvasya tad hetu tve samam dvayam pratibandhaḥ eva hi pramāṇa tve nibandhanam nanu ca tatra eva pratyakṣe apratipakṣa tva pratipādanāya anumāna abhāvaḥ iti kasmāt na uktam yadi etāvat prayojanam krama prāptasya vyatikrame prayojana abhāvāt 
[537,vii_537,xi]	na etat asti sādhu yatas śabda asiddhasya māna tvam pratighāta vinākṛtam nivedayitum atra uktā pratimāna nirākriyā yadi tatra pratyakṣe anumāne vā pratibandhaka māna nirākaraṇam ucyate śābda prasiddha anumānasya sāmarthyam apratihatam apratipāditam bhavet tatas etad artham prathama prāpta ullaṃghanam api ca apragāḍha anumāne api yatra apratyanumāna tā tatra prauḍhā anumānā isau dūrāt eva nirākṛtā yatra hi śābda prasiddha ma prauḍham api anumānam apratipakṣam asādhāraṇīkaraṇa kāraṇam tatra prauḍhatarama prati yatna siddham eva apratipakṣa tayā 
[537,xii]	nanu sakalam eva yogyam iṣṭa śabda abhidhāna tāyai aprātikūlyam eva yogyatā iti nyāyāt iti atra vastu bala pravṛttam eva anumānam tathā pratyakṣeṇa upalambhāt na ānukūlyasya api abhāvāt yathā eva tasya pratikūla tā na pratīyate tathā anukūla tā api pratyakṣataḥ anyatas vā tatas katham etat vastu bala pravṛttam śābda prasiddham anumānam tatra yadi icchā mātra āyātaḥ dharmaḥ na bādhyate vāstavaḥ tatra kim pratibandha bala āyātaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat eva atra pratipādyam prayojanam 
[537,xiii_537,xviii]	nanu icchā mātra para adhīnaḥ avaśyam eva na bādhyate tasya sannihita tvena sadā eva pratipattitaḥ yaḥ tu vastu bala āyātaḥ sa na syāt api kutra cit kāraṇānām hi kāryeṣu niyata tvat na vidyate tatas bādhaka śaṅkā syāt pramāṇe vastu bhāvini tatas tatra eva yuktā iyam bādhakasya nirākriyā daṇḍāyūpasya yaḥ nyāyaḥ parihāraḥ udīritaḥ sa na asti prathama ullaṃghena tasya atikrama kramaḥ atra ucyate 
[538,i_538,ix]	avastu vṛtti vyavahāra mātrāt prasiddha sambandha tayā anumānam na bādhitam yatra parasya bādhā bhaviṣyati iti atra katham vimarśaḥ arthoyam evam pratipadyamānaḥ na nyāya dharmāḥ nugata tva hīnaḥ icchā para adhīna vidheḥ ca dṛṣṭaḥ tyāgaḥ api tad tyāga kṛta avatāraḥ sukha upanītasya samīhitasya tyāgaḥ api tat tasya vidhānaḥ eva na vastu vṛttam punar evam asti dharādharaḥ kampayitu nna śakyaḥ iti sakalam aśaṃkam kāpatha āvṛtti jātam yadi param a munīnām vṛttam etat na vā ājñā katham iha duritānām darśanam nāstikānāmu pahata nayanānām spaṣṭa bhāvān adṛṣṭeḥ tasmāt atra eva bādhaka abhāva pratipādanam iti yuktam etat 
[538,x_538,xi]	athavā bruvataḥ lakosya anumā abhāvaḥ ucyate kintena bhinna viṣayā pratītiḥ anumānataḥ yatra api ityādinā yatra api asādhāraṇa tvāt anumā na asti sādhikā iti sambandhaḥ na hi candra śabda vācya tvenu mānam vastu bala bhāvi bhāvakam yadi tarhi sādhakam anumānam nāstikena viparyayasya abhāvasya sādhanam abhāve śābda prasiddhe na viruddhena apodyate iti anena anumāna niṣedhena na etat vastu bala bhāvi anumānam iti pratipāditam yadi tu etat api anumānam anumāna pratiṣedhaḥ virodhi nivarttitaḥ syāt na tu anumāna tvam asya na iṣṭam eva svabhāva aṅgam jagat sthitiḥ iti vacanāt tathā hi śabda prasiddham eva kevalam atra bācakam na vastu bala pravṛttam anumānam na hi bācyayatvam atra pratyakṣataḥ grahītum śakyam tatra vastu mātrasya pratibhāsanāt atha api syāt yadi avikalpaka tvāt vastu mātram pratibhāti na vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ api tarhi na eva pratibhāti tatra yathā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ api 
[538,xii_538,xv]	sattyam etat tathā api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sarva viṣayaḥ na vācaka bhāvaḥ tathā hi vācya vācaka bhāvoyam deśa kāla nara antare vyabhicārī tatas tasya kārya kāraṇa tā na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi yadi api paramārthataḥ pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddhaḥ tathā api sakala jagat avijñāna prasiddhi vaśāt pratyakṣa vat pratibhāti tathā hi dṛṣṭam etat mayā pūrvam dhūmaḥ pāvaka kāraṇaḥ saḥ eva ayam iti jñānam anyathā deya bhāj katham 
[538,xvi]	yadi nāma pūrvam na vikalpitam mayā pūrvam tathā api mayā dṛṣṭam eva sa vikalpa kantarhi pratyakṣam āpatitam iti ced na prāc avikalpanāda vikalpayatā eva tadā mayā dṛṣṭam iti pratīteḥ na ca kāla antara bhāvī vikalpaḥ prāgbhāvinaḥ pratyakṣasya sa vikalpa tā nibandhanam tena saha sambandha abhāvāt na tu uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ vikalpasya nirviṣaya tve katham tena avikalpaka tā vyavasthāpyate na ca atīta viṣayam pratyakṣam tena katham avikalpaka tā vyavasthā na anupalabdheḥ atīta viṣaya tva avyāghātāt tathā hi atītasya varttamānasya ca pratipattṛ pratyakṣa nivṛtti lakṣaṇa anupalabdheḥ abhāva vyavahāra sādhanī evam eva sakalaḥ lokasya vyavahāraḥ anyathā vyavahāraḥ na syāt iti na tiṣṭhet na ca pratiṣṭhet kaścid iti prāptam 
[539,ii_539,v]	tasmāt amūḍha smṛti saṃskāraḥ pratipattā yadā bhavet atīta varttamānasya pratyakṣasya nivarttane abhāva vyahārasya tadā tena pravarttanam sarvasya jagataḥ siddham idam vastu avigānataḥ vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ tu mayā pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaḥ iti na evam kasyacid pratītiḥ tathā hi 
[539,vi_539,vii]	śabda arthaḥ darśanāt eva gṛhyete vācya vācakau na upadeśamvinā saḥ api na upadeśaḥ tayā īkṣyate na khalu śabda artha upalambha mātrakāt anupadeśāt idam vācya vācakam iti ullekhaḥ kasyacid upadeśaḥ api yadi anyathā kaścid brūyāt parityajet eva anyathā vyākhyā vikalpaḥ na syāt na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ anyathā netum śakyaḥ 
[539,viii]	nanu pratyakṣam saṃjñā karmā iti vaiṣeśikāḥ ācakṣate tathā hi yajñadattoyam iti vastu śru ti īkṣaṇe saṃketa kāle pratyakṣāt evam eva avagacchati saṃketa karaṇa kāle hi yadā puras vartti deva datta ādi nām acikīrṣā viṣayīkṛtam vastu puras paśyanti jantavaḥ śruti gocara cāri ca śabda rūpam yajñadattaḥ ityādi kantadā bhavati asya saṃjñā iyam iti vyavahāra kārī niścayaḥ na ca bhinna jātīya pratyakṣa pratyaya grāhyaḥ na bhavati pratibandhe niścitaḥ tathā hi 
[539,ix_539,xiii]	smaraṇa anubhavau syātām na anyathā pariniścitau paraspareṇa sambaddhau vijātīya tayā sthitau sa jñā saṃjñi sambandhona pratyakṣaḥ tat etat asat yatas saṃjñā saṃjñā vatoḥ yogaḥ yadi pratyakṣa niścitaḥ na syāt eva anyathā bhāvaḥ kāla antara parigrahe a yadi pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddhaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ katham deśa kāla nara antarenyathā bhavati na hi pratyakṣa gṛhītam anyathā bhavati nīla ādikam anyaḥ vā vastu sambandhaḥ tathā upadeśa anvayī dṛśyate eva ayam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratyayaḥ tathā hi 
[539,xiv_539,xvii]	evantā avat ayam vakti nāma asya idam iti sphuṭam nāma eva asya idam iti tu na jāna iti parisphuṭam a kadācid anya kāleyam anyat eva kariṣyati apara aparavān śāsya kena nāma niṣidhyatām vṛttam mama api etat eva na vāñchāvāraṇam kvacid kasyacid kenacid śakyam kadācid brahmaṇā api tat nanu ābhyantaranta stham avivṛddham tripūruṣa anugam nāma kuryāt anare pratiṣṭhitam iti nyāyāt kathat na icchā vāraṇam na tad lakṣaṇa yoginām aneka tve katham vāraṇam ayam api ca upadeśaḥ eva na ca ayam ullaṃdhyamānaḥ upadeśaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt na pratyakṣam saṃjñā karma tatas na kārya kāraṇa bhāva vat vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iti na vastu bala pravṛttam śābda prasiddham anumānam 
[539,xviii_540,ii]	tena anumānāt vastūnām sat asat ta anurodhinaḥ bhinnasya ātat vavaśāt vṛttiḥ tat icchā jā iti sūcitam icchā mātra pravarttitam eva etat chābda prasiddham anumānam na vastu bala bhāvi tatas vastu na gamayati agnihotra ādi śabdasya yathārthoyam prakalpitaḥ tathā anyaḥ api śva māṃsa ādiḥ icchayā parikalpyatām 
[540,iv_540,vi]	kohi icchā parikalpanābhāj svabhāveṣu bhāveṣu niyamaḥ atha adṛṣṭa virodhāt akalpanā na hi anya artha parikalpanāyām adṛṣṭa nirūḍhiḥ samīhita phala avāptiḥ nna hi kalpanayā kvacid anyathā nāmataḥ sarvaḥ sarvam eva prasādhayet sattyam etat vayam api evam pratijñāsiṣmahi bhavān eva tu asya anartha patha prasthāna sya mahā sāmarthyaḥ pravarttayitā tathā hi 
[540,vii_540,x]	yadi arthasya parīkṣyeta niścayāya paraṃparā upadeśasya sā eva syāt anartha andha paraṃparā atīndriya dṛśaḥ santi yadi arthasya asya vedakāḥ tathā satyavatārassyāt paraspara virodhinām na hi anyoti indriya darśī labdha avakāśaḥ karkkaśaḥ bhavataḥ tasmāt ayam api kenacid arthaḥ kalpitaḥ eva na ca tatas eva saṃpratyayaḥ iti anyaḥ api parikalpanīyaḥ svayam jānānena tad aparijñānam katham kalpanīya yam iti ced saḥ eva jñāsyate kintava cintayā na mām avicārya visamvādayet api tatas cintā iti ced parityajyata antarhri upadeśa mātra pratyāśā 
[540,xi_540,xiii]	prakṛti pratyaya anugamena kalpanā iti ced nanu saḥ api prakṛti pratyaya arthaḥ upadeśāt eva siddhaḥ tatas saḥ api prayoga darśanāt eva samarthanīyaḥ prayogaḥ api prakṛti pratyaya artha ādi sambandha paramparetaretara āśrayaṇe dharmaḥ tathā na syāt iti ced uktam atra kiñca dharmaḥ evam bhavati iti ayam api upadeśaḥ eva iti yat kiñcid etat nanu candraḥ śaśī sattvāt prasiddha vācya vat tatas katham avastu bala pravṛttam etat anumānam uktam atra api ca candra tām śaśinaḥ anicchan kām pratītim sa vāñchati iti tam pratyadṛṣṭāntam tat asādhāraṇam matam 
[540,xiv]	sakala pratīti pratikṣepa kāriṇaṃpratyadṛṣṭānta tvāt uktam asādhāraṇa tvāt anumāna abhāvaḥ iti sa hi śaśinaḥ sakala jagataḥ prasiddhim āgatasya candra śabda abhidheya tayā tattvam anicchan anyām api pratītim na icchati iti prasiddham eva etat tatas tam pratyadṛṣṭāntam anumānam sattvāt ityādikam tatra ca sarva hetūnām asādhāraṇa tā iti uktam eva tatas ca acandraḥ śaśī sattvāt iti korthaḥ candraḥ śaśī na sattvāt iti hetoḥ na anena candra tvam sādhayitum śakyam kena tarhi sādhyate asau iti tañca kathamba adhakam śābda prasiddhena avastu bala bhāvinā iti abhiprāyaḥ 
[540,xv_541,ii]	nanu candrasya eka tvāt asādhāraṇa tā tat katham etat labhyam sakala pratīti pratikṣepa vādinaṃprati etat anumānam asādhāram abhipretam na kiñcid etat yatas na udāhāraṇam eva akam adhi kṛtyā idam ucyate lakṣaṇa tvāt tathā avṛkṣaḥ dhātri iti uktau ca bādhanāt avṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapā sattvāt iti atra na parihāraḥ ekatvāt vṛkṣasya iti na ca ekam udāharaṇam abhisandhāya lakṣaṇam pravarttate 
[541,iii]	nanu koyam nyāyaḥ ekam udāharaṇam abhisandhāya lakṣaṇam na pravarttate na khalu tat udāharaṇat na sādhanīyam atha anyat api udāharaṇam antar bhāvya lakṣaṇam karttavyam evam hi lakṣaṇa kṛtaḥ śāstra prayāsa sādhyam iti na pratipattṛ parikleśaḥ yatra tarhi na udāharaṇam anyat asti tatra kim apravarttanam lakṣaṇasya dṛśyate ca akuṭilikāyāḥ ityādi tathā 
[541,iv_541,vii]	meru mandara maināka kaila āśa uśīraka ādayaḥ ekaika rūpāḥ santi eva tatas na ekā api udāhṛtiḥ atra ucyate vidheyam lakṣaṇam tat hi yat avyāptyā vinā kṛtam ati vyāptyā ca tena idam avyāpi syāt para uktitaḥ tathā hi na vakṣaḥ śiṃśapā sattvāt iti atra api pratīti bādhā vaktavyā sā katham para udita nyāyāt avataret na hi vṛkṣaḥ ekaḥ plakṣa ādeḥ api bhāvāt atha sādharāṇatayā anumānam asti eva tena bādhā bhaviṣyati iti ced atra āha 
[541,viii_541,ix]	atra api loke dṛṣṭa tvāt karpūra rajata ādiṣu samayāt varttamānasya kā asādhāraṇatā abhidhā candra śabda abhidhānam api karpūra ādiṣu dṛṣṭam eva tatas katham ekatā candramasaḥ na ca samaya mātra vṛttayaḥ śabdāḥ kvāpi na pravarttante tatas te trā pi anumāna bādhā eva tat iyam pratītibādhā nāma na asti eva iti āpatitam 
[541,x_541,xiii]	atha rajata ādiṣu candra śabda vācya tvam na eva prasiddhi bhāj kevalam yathā kathañcid gandha yukti ādi vādibhiḥ kalpitam na vastu vṛttam tat tat asat yadi tasya kvacid sidhyet siddham vastu balena tat pratīti siddha upagame aśaśini api anivāraṇāt asāyayam arthaḥ yadi kaḥ rpūra ādau na paramārthataḥ prasiddham taiḥ eva kalpitam gandha yukti ādi vādibhiḥ candre tarhi vastu siddham tat tat katham prasiddhi bādha udāharaṇam 
[541,xiv_542,ii]	atha pratīti siddham eva tat tena pratīti bādha iti ced pratīti siddha upagame śaśini api anivāraṇam eva karppūra ādau na hi tatra api va pratītiḥ tatonumāna bādhanam eva na pratīti bādhanam atha karppūra ādau hlāda ādinā nimittena pravarttate tena na tad udāharaṇam tatas sādhāraṇam atra ucyate tasya vastuni siddhasya śaśini api anivāraṇam tad vastu abhāve śaśini vāraṇe api na duṣyati 
[542,iii_542,iv]	yadi karppūra ādau nimitta prayuktam candra śabda abhidhānam śaśini api tasya nimittasya bhāvāt avāryam eva atha tadvat svabhāvāt nivāraṇam tadā śaśini vāraṇe api na doṣaḥ vastu pratibaddham vastu abhāvena bhavati iti na aprasiddham etat tasmāt avastu niyata saṃketa dhvani bhāvināma yogyāḥ padārthāḥ dharmāṇām icchāyāḥ anirodhanāt 
[542,v_542,vii]	avastu niyata saṃketa mātra bhāvinām dharmāṇām yogyāḥ sarva padārthāḥ iti tad yogya tā bādhane doṣaḥ prati iti bādhā lakṣaṇaḥ nanu nimitta prayuktaḥ śabdaḥ sakalaḥ eva ḍavittha ādi śabdānām api kiñcid nimittam sāmānya viśeṣa rūpam eva na prasiddhi mātrakam eva tat etat asat na pravṛtti nimittam upādāya śabdaḥ tad nimittavati pravarttate iti pramāṇam nimitte api nimitta antara apekṣāyām anava sthā tathā hi 
[542,viii]	yadi tasya kvacid sidhyet siddham vastu balena tat nimittavati iti vākya śeṣaḥ apratīti siddha upagame śaśini api anivāraṇāt pratīti mātra siddha śabda artha upagame aśaśini api anivāraṇam na hi yatra kvacid pravarttamānaḥ vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ pratiniyama marhati pratiniyame pramāṇa abhāvāt tatra yathā nimitte nimittam antareṇa eva pravarttate tathā nimittavati api na hi nimitte api icchātoni atha āvṛttiḥ 
[542,ix]	atha svabhāvāt eva tatra varttate anyatra api svabhāvaḥ kena nivāraṇīyaḥ atha tena saha paramārthataḥ sambandha usti iti tatra eva pravarttate jāti ādau etat katham jñātavyam icchā mātreṇa varttamānaḥ śabdaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa katham anya mātrā anyathā vartteta varttamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tena varttate iti vyapadiśyatena na icchā mātra vṛtteḥ api sambhavāt na hi icchā mātra vṛtteḥ anyasya ca viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ icchayā anupalabdhiḥ iti ced sā iyam upalabdhiḥ atīta icchāyām api saṃbhavati na hi anupalabdhiḥ sarvasya bādhika icchāyāḥ varttamāna sannihita viśeṣasya eva bādhikā na sarvasya tasmāt yadi kasyacid āpi atra āsīt icchā buddhasya cira atītasya tad upadeśāt idāni intanānām vyavahāraḥ kim atra viruddham tasmāt nimitta vat nimittavati api pravarttanām kim anarthaka nimitta parikalpanayā 
[542,x]	anyaḥ punar āha na nimitte prathamam pravarttate paścāt nimittavati krameṇa vṛtteḥ adarśanāt atha nimitte kvāpi dṛṣṭaḥ padārtha tvam go tvam iti na tasya śabda antara tvāt tasya hi vācaka tvam yasya yatra prayogaḥ prayoga bala āyātā sakalasya bādhya bādhaka bhāva siddhiḥ anvaya vyatireka kalpanāyām hi dravya vṛttiḥ eva bhāva pratyaya antaḥ śabdaḥ bhāva pratyaya apagame dravya vṛtti tvāt atha dravya vṛtteḥ bhāva pratyaye sati kathat nimitta mātra vācaka bhāvaḥ yadā tu
[543,i_543,ii]	nimitta mātre varttate tadā bhāva pratyayaḥ tam eva artha vyanakti iti yuktam na hi bhāva pratyayam antareṇa dravya bhāva vācya tā dvayoḥ go śabdayoḥ vivekena pratīyate tatas bhāva pratyayāt vivekaḥ na etat asti na hi svārthikaḥ eva sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ tatra dravya vṛtteḥ eva pratyaye kṛte nimittasya tad viśeṣaṇasya pratītiḥ iti na kiñci d virudhyate na ca prakṛti pratyaya artha vibhāgaḥ pāramārthikaḥ samudāyāḥ eva vācakāḥ prayogataḥ pratīyante prakṛti pratyaya ādi vibhāgaḥ tu bāla vyutpattaye yathā kathañcid eva prakalpitaḥ anyathā bālasya mukhena vyutpādayita pama śakya tvāt tasmāt na nimittam upādāya nimittavati varttate iti pramāṇam atra kiñcid 
[543,iii_543,vii]	aparaḥ prāha nimittavati eva śabdaḥ pravarttate nimittam tu anabhidhīyamānam eva vyavaccheda kama sambhavi tad nimitta tvāt tat etat asat yatas yadi tasya kvacid sidhyet siddham vastu balena tat pratīti siddha upagame śaśini api anivāraṇāt yadi tasya kvacid nimitte sidhyet siddham vastu balena tat nimittamapratipādayatā śabdena kathantad vyavacchinne pravarttanam tad vyavacchede ced avabodhaḥ tat api buddhau ārūḍham katham āvacyam nimittavataḥ api śabdāt pratipatti riti vācya tvam sā nimitte api samānā 
[543,viii_543,xi]	atha prādhānyena dravyam eva pratipādyate guṇaḥ tu mādhurya ādiḥ nna pratīyamānaḥ api vācyaḥ na antarīyaka tayā pratīteḥ na vivakṣā vinā abhāvī pradhāna guṇa tānayaḥ yat uddiśya pravṛttiḥ syāt tasya prādhānya saṅgatiḥ tatra kadācid mādhuryyam eva pradhānam kadācid dravyam iti loka vyavasthā loka vyavasthayā ca vācya vācaka abhāvaḥ tathā hi madhureṇa arthi bhāvaḥ ced guḍam bhakṣaya sarvadā yadi arthaḥ vyādhi abhāvena tad kṛtyai madhu bhakṣaya 
[543,xii]	yadā lolupa jātīyaḥ kaścid bhakṣakaḥ tad artha guḍa upadeśaḥ mādhurya pratipādayati yadā tu prabhāva viśeṣāt śleṣma nivṛttaye pratipādayati madhu ādi kantadā dravya mātra pratipādakam pradhānam tasmāt dvayam eva pratīyate pradhāna guṇa bhāvaḥ tu kadācid kathañcid kasyacid iti vibhāgaḥ tatra dvaya me pratītau na aparad nimittam iti prasiddha mātrakam avaśiṣyate 
[543,xiii]	atha api syāt upalakṣaṇam nimittam na tasya vācya tā yathā katarat devadattasya dhāma yatra kākaḥ iti na kākasya api gṛha vacana vācya tā yathā na vācya tā tathā tad abhāve api devadatta gṛham eva tena tasya na upādeya tā tathā brāhmaṇa ādi śabdānām api manuṣya tva ādi paricodanāyām na ca kākena asādhu upalakṣyate tasya anitya tvāt prekṣā pūrva ākārī hi kākena upalakṣitam anyat eva devakula ādikam nimittīkaroti anyathā vyavahāra abhāvaḥ 
[543,xiv]	kathantarhi avācya bhūtaḥ kākaḥ upalakṣaṇam pratyakṣa siddha tvāt atas eva kāka śabdena eva asya pratipādanam na tu evam jāti ādi nimittanām api para vācaka tva pratipādanam tasmāt avācyam api vyavaccheda kambhavati yat pṛthak pratipādyate yat tu tatas eva śabdāt pratīyate tat vācyam eva śabdena buddhau āhitasya vācya tva vyapadeśāt tatra pratītiḥ eva śabdāt na vācyatā iti ced pratīti siddha upagame śaśini ani vāraṇāt vācya tāyāḥ nimitta vat nimittavati api tā abhāvaḥ syāt iti atas pratītitaḥ eva vācya tve nimitte api samānam 
[544,ii]	nanu tailam dīyatām iti pātram pratīyamānam api na vācyam taila śabdasya na tasya sarvadā pratīti abhāvāt svayam ānīta ipi pātre taila dānasya arthita asaṃbhavāt tasmāt anabhidhīyamānasya śabda antara apratipāditasya na upalakṣaṇa tva sambhavaḥ lakṣitena hi kiñcid lakṣayitum śakyate alakṣitena lakṣaṇe ati prasaṅga atha prathamam upalakṣaṇāt tatas punar atyanta abhyāsāt sa śabdaḥ tad vyavacchinnaḥ eva pravarttate vinā api tadā nimitta pratītim evantarhi śva māṃse api pravarttatām agni hotra ādi śabdaḥ tad nimittasya kāka vat tatra vṛtta tvāt anyathā katham na vastu artheṣu go śabdaḥ pravarttate tatra tasya prasiddha tvāt iti ced śva māṃsena api kāla deśa antare pratītiḥ nna asti iti kutas etat tasmāt vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ nāma aniyate eva icchā racitam saṃketa bala avalambana tvāt iti na kācid kṣatiḥ vedasya apauruṣeya tve api duṣṭa tāyāḥ sarvatra yogyatāyāḥ anivāraṇāt 
[544,iii_544,v]	tām yogyatām nirundhānam saṃketa pratiṣedha jā pratihanti pratīta ākhyā yogyatā viṣayā anumā śabdānām artha niyamaḥ saṃketa anuvidhāyinām na iti anena uktam atra eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ virudhyate yaḥ hi śva māṃsa ādikam na agnihotra ādi śabda arthaḥ iti āha tasya yogya tā viṣayā anumā pratirodhinī yatas śabdānām ā abhidheya niyamaḥ saṃketa mātra pravṛttīnām na asti iti koyat niyamaḥ ekena eva abhidheyena bhavitavyam iti tatra yaḥ āha pratīti bādhitam śva māṃsa abhakṣaṇa kalpanam iti sa paryanuyujyate pauruṣeye vedaḥ iti pratīti bādhitam idam api yatas ṛc girauvṛcaḥ cakruḥ sāmāni sāmagirau iti pratīteḥ atha karotiḥ smaraṇe varttate na nirvarttanaḥ eva tathā hi saṃskāre api dṛśyate pṛṣṭham kuru pādau kuru iti na atra anyathā asambhavāt eva pratītiḥ atha prāmāṇyam anyathā na bhavet iti kalpanā sarva āgamānām api apauruṣeya tā prasaṅgaḥ tad kalpanā nimitta sadbhāvāt atas eva saugataḥ 
[544,vi_544,vii]	naimittikyāḥ śruteḥ artham artham vā pāramārthikam śabdānām pratirundhānaḥ na vācyaḥ tena vārṇiṇataḥ naimittikī śrutiḥ nna kācid asti iti yadi vadet na tasya doṣaḥ paramārthataḥ sambandha balena na iti api yadi pratibrūyāt na vācyaḥ eva asau yaḥ tu sāṃketikam api mīmāṃsaka ādiḥ nna iti āha saḥ eva ucyate tatas prasiddhi bādhanam ayuktam 
[544,viii_545,ii]	tasmāt viṣaya bhedasya darśanāya pṛthakkṛtā anumāna abahis bhūtā pratītiḥ api pūrvavat yathā śāstram su avacanañca prastāva āśraya tvena abhyupagatambādhakam bhavati na anyathā pratijñānasya arthasya bādhanāt na sarvathā viparyayasya bādhanam eva dvayoḥ tulya kakṣa tvāt tathā pratītiḥ api na pāramārthika arthasya bādhikā api tu pratīti mātraka prasiddhasya pratikṣepasya bādhikā iti parama arthaḥ siddhayoḥ pṛthak ākhyāne darśayan ca prayojanam ete sa hetuke prāha na anumā adhyakṣa bādhane 
[545,iii]	tatra ācāryeṇa idam uktam sva rūpeṇa eva nirddeśyaḥ svayam iṣṭaḥ a nirākṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ yadi pratyakṣa anumāna āgama prasiddhena tat yathā aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti na santi pramāṇāni prameya arthāni iti pratijñā mātreṇa yatra api asādhāraṇa tvāt anumāna abhāve śābda prasiddhena viruddhena arthenā podyate na sa pakṣaḥ iti anumādhyakṣa bādhane mukva āgama prasiddhi bādhane sa hetuke prāha pratijñā mātreṇa śābda prasiddhena iti anyathā yadi viṣaya bheda upadarśanat nābhimatam abhaviṣyat ācāryasya sa hetuka tvam anayoḥ eva na brūyāt tasmāt ayam eva abhiprāyaḥ pradhāna bhūtasya sakala nyāya vādinām nyāya parameśvarasya 
[545,iv_545,ix]	na khalu prayojana viveka para manasaḥ paripuṣṭa itara prayojana vacasaḥ sambhavanti vacasvinaḥ tathā hi antarvindhya nivāsi sāndra vitata dhvānta uddhata dhvaṃsi dhīr ati uccais udaya adri santata sata preṅkha nmayūkha utkaraḥ ācāryaḥ na vibhārga gaḥ pratihataḥ na anyaiḥ apūrvoravir nna asta vyastagabhasti hasta viphala prārambha sambhāvitaḥ tasmāt viṣaya bhedaḥ eva atra yuktaḥ pariśiṣṭantu prāk eva uktam 
[545,x_546,i]	tatra api adhyakṣa bādhāyam nānā rūpa tayā dhvaneḥ prasiddhasya śrutau rūpam yat eva pratibhāsate advayam śabala ābhāsasya adṛṣṭeḥ buddhi janmanaḥ adhyakṣa bādhāyām api vaktavyam asti eva yadi nāma gamyamāna tvāt ācāryeṇa na uktam tatra api na vaktavyam aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti na sambandhasya pratiṣedhaḥ kintarhi yat rūpam śrutaum pratibhāsate advayam śabalāyām buddheḥ ananubhāvāt na hi jāti sambandhaa ādīnām śabda pratibhāsa sahacaritaḥ pratibhāsaḥ apratibhāsamānañca katham pratyakṣam apratyakṣa pratikṣepe ca katham pratyakṣa bādhā tat etat pratipādayiṣyate tasmāt pratibhāsinaḥ eva rūpasya pratikṣepe doṣaḥ pratyakṣa bādhā lakṣaṇaḥ tad artha artha uktiḥ asya eva kṣepa idhyakṣeṇa bādhanam tad artham eva ācāryeṇa pratyakṣa artha anumāna āpta prasiddhena nirākṛtaḥ iti arthasya grahaṇam tasya eva rūpasya artha tvāt tad jāḥ tyādikam arthaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsa sāmarthya abhāvāt 
[546,ii_546,iii]	yatra tu apratibhāsanam na tat pratyaśakṣam iti na pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ tad pratikṣepaḥ etat eva āha 
[546,iv_546,vi]	tat eva rūpam tatra arthaḥ śeṣam vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam avastu rūpam sāmānyam atas tat na akṣa gocaraḥ tena sāmānya dharmāṇām apratyakṣa tva siddhitaḥ pratikṣepe api abādhā iti śrāvaṇektyā prakāśitam parisphurat puras vartti rūpeṇa pratibhāsamānam eva arthaḥ sāmānya sambandha ādayaḥ tu tathābhūtarūpa vyāvṛttitaḥ parikalpitāḥ na artha rūpāḥ vijātīya rūpa vilakṣaṇa tvasya eva darśanāt sāmānyasya ca aparasya dvitīya rūpa vat apratibhāsanāt nanu 
[546,vii]	vilakṣaṇa tvam nāma idam sa jātīnām parasparam vijātīyasa jātīnām vyavahāraḥ tatas katham gavām eva yathā anyasmāt ago vyāvṛtti darśanam gavā śvānān tathā anyasmāt goḥ aśvāt ca vilakṣaṇāt tatas vyāvṛtti mātreṇa nāsām kārya prasidhyati vastu rūpantu sāmānyam vibhāgena vyavasthiteḥ pravarttayati asāṃkaryam vyavahārantad arthinām svarūpeṇa pratītasya na sāṃkaryasya sambhavaḥ 
[546,xii_546,xiii]	tat etat asat yatas sāmānya ādi svarūpeṇa yadi jātu pratīyate svarūpeṇa pratītasya na sāṃkaryam prasaktimat svarūpa apratibhāse api yadi asāṃkārya sambhavaḥ samarthakāra dṛṣṭānām asāṃkarya pratīyatām vyakti vyaṅgyam hi sāmānyam vyakti rūpam alakṣitam vyañjakam na vibhāgena vyavahāraḥ tatas katham 
[546,xvii_547,i]	na yāvat vyaktīnām sajātīya vijātīyānām asāṃkaryantāvat na sāmānyam asāṃkaryeṇa pratīyate yāvat ca sāmānyanna asaṃkara pratītikam na tāvat vyakti asaṃkara pratītiḥ iti ita retara āśraya tvāt apratītiḥ eva sāmānyasya atha sāmānyam eva prathamam pratīyate na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣya buddhiḥ iti tat asat sāmānyam api kadācid viśeṣyam eva parasparam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt sāmānyasya ca sarvadā viśeṣaṇa tve vyakti sandehe api kasmāt na pratītiḥ tad viśeṣaṇam yat vyavacchedakam tat ca vyavacchedakam yat sandeha vyāvarttana samartham tathā hi 
[547,ii_547,vi]	na eva vyāvarttatertha ātmā vidyamānaḥ svarūpataḥ avidyamāna rūpaḥ tu daivena eva nivarttitaḥ viśeṣaṇa sahasre api na pūrvasya nivarttanam vyakti nirddhāraṇat tasmāt sāmānyasya viniścayaḥ ayam sa gauḥ iti niścayaḥ rūpa nirddhāraṇa mātrakāt eva pra varttate samāna tā hi sāmānya vyaktīnāñca samāna tā saṃsthāna śakti bhedena tasmāt jātiḥ anarthikā 
[547,vii]	kakudādi saṃsthānam vāha ādi śaktiḥ ca yadi sāmānya niścaya hetuḥ tat eva sāmānyam tat ca avyatiriktam eva tābhyaḥ avāntara bhede kathantad sāmānyam sāmānya vādinaḥ api katham vyaktiḥ vilakṣaṇaiḥ eva iti ced kin na karkka ādibhiḥ teṣām asāmarthyāt ced eṣām vilakṣaṇa tve katham sāmarthyam parasparataḥ vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam iti ced na pāda prasāraṇa mātram etat trāṇam anyathā sāmānyam antareṇa eva varṇṇa saṃsthāna mātreṇa asāṃkarya vyavahāra mātra siddheḥ nna vaktavyam etat sāmānyam antareṇa katham iti atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam iti parihārasya kākaiḥ abhakṣaṇāt na te kakudādi saṃsthānasya sāṃkaryam anyatrā darśanāt yatra tu brāhmaṇa ādau saṃsthāna ādi sākaryam tatra viṭa samaya mātram śaraṇam sat ācāra mātra madya pādīnām tasmāt su dūram api gatvā tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ eva hetuḥ sāmānya vibhāgena aparam iti vyarthakam aparam api ca 
[547,viii_547,x]	brahmahatyā ādi dāna ādi pāpa puṇya vyavasthitiḥ śāstrāt eva tatas māna nirūpaṇam anarthakam iti uktam etat na iha sāmānya dharmāṇām pāpa puṇya janaka tva ādīnām pratikṣepe api abādhā tad prakṣepa kṛtaḥ etat śrāvaṇa śabdena prakāśitam indriya vijñāne teṣām apratibhāsanāt na ca anumāna bādha iti yadi tatra tad rūpa bādhane doṣaḥ iti etat pratipādyam śabda sva lakṣaṇam na asti iti eva kasmāt na uktam kintaddhi ta antena sambandhi nimittena śabdena ukteḥ evantu vacanena sambandha nirākaṇam eva atra abhipretam sa ca anvaya vyatireka samādhi gamyaḥ eva tat katham iyam pratyakṣa bādha udāhṛtiḥ anena api śabdena vivakṣā baśāt abhipreta ūrthaḥ ucyate eva iti na doṣaḥ vācakena kasmāt na ucyate iti ced na yatas sarvathā avācya rūpa tvāt siddhyā tasya samāśrayāt bādhanāt tad balena uktaḥ śrāvaṇena akṣa gocara 
[547,xi]	na hi śabda sva lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ api vācakaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya sarva śabdānām sāmānya viṣaya tvāt atha sva lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ sāmānya vṛttiḥ api sva lakṣaṇam ova upalakṣayati tad adhyavasāyataḥ evantarhi śrāvaṇa śabdaḥ api śravaṇa indriya grāhyatā upalakṣitam rūpam sva lakṣaṇam eva āha tad lakṣaṇa tvāt sva lakṣaṇasya na hi indriya grāhya tvāt a param api sāmānyam prasiddham prayojanam api asti eva pramāṇa prasiddha tva pratipādanam siddhyā pramāṇena tasya bādhaka tvasya samāśrayāt āśrayaṇāt tad balena eva bādhanāt pramāṇa prasiddhaḥ hi arthaḥ parasya apramāṇa prasiddhasya bādhakaḥ sa hi viruddha tayā pratīyamānaḥ parasya abhāvam prabodhayati tad abhāva pratipādanam eva bādhaka tvam na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tatas pramāṇam idam anena pramāṇena prasiddham śabdasva lakṣaṇam iti sa parikara pratipādanam hi parisphuṭa pratipattikam iti prayojanam anumāna virodhe api nityaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti padārthānām satām eva abhivyaktim paśyatā unupalakṣita tattvasya sāṃkhyasya nitya tā abhyupagamaḥ sonu māna bādhitaḥ 
[548,ii_548,iii]	kāraṇānām na sāmarthyam evam sati tadā bhavet tatas kāraṇa bhāvena vinā paryeṣaṇam bṛthā kāraṇa abhimata paryeṣaṇam hi kāraṇa tvam antareṇa vṛthā bhavet karttavyasya tena kasyacid abhāvāt vyaktiḥ kriyate iti ced nanu vyaktiḥ api padārtha svabhāvā padārthasya nitya tve vyakteḥ api nitya tvāt sadā sthitā eva iti na kiñcid karttavyam atha vyaktiḥ kriyate na padārtha bhinnā tarhi sā padārthataḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsāt abhede padārthasya api kārya tā prasaṅgaḥ 
[548,iv]	na ca pramāṇam mṛd piṇḍe ghaṭa ādeḥ asti sādhakam kārya tvāt asti tatra iti sattve kāryasya kā kriyā vyaktiḥ sattvam vinā na asti vyakti bhāve ca sambhavet pradīpa ādeḥ iva vyaktiḥ sarvasmāt iti ced matiḥ kulāla ādeḥ iva utpattiḥ sarvasmāt na kim iṣyate paramāṇuśaḥ api mṛd paṇḍa nayane anyatra dṛśyate tat asti tatra adṛṣṭañced khara śrṛṅge api tat bhavet paścāt tasya na dṛṣṭiḥ ced paścāt dṛṣṭaḥ tadā bhavet 
[548,xi_548,xii]	yadi paścāt upalabhyate ghaṭaḥ paścāt eva bhavatu vyakti vat pūrvantu katham sadbhāvaḥ vyaktiḥ anyathā na yuktā iti ced ayam aparoḥ tu doṣaḥ na tu anupalabhyasti iti śakyam vaktum nanu anupalabdhiḥ upalabdheḥ abhāvaḥ tatas upalabdhiḥ eva na asti katham abhāvaḥ bhāvasya yadi evam śaśa viṣāṇa ādīnām abhāvaḥ na sidhyet tatas asat akaraṇāt iti hetuḥ nna syāt tatas śaśa viṣāṇa arthinaḥ api upādāna upādānam bhavet yatas 
[548,xiii^1]	tat asti tatra tena asya tad kāraṇa tayā grahaḥ tad utpattyā vinā bhūtam tad ced asat matam tad utpādana śaktam astitvāt eva gamyate anyathā ca gatau tasya tasya astitvam na gamyate atha yasmāt yat utpannantat tatra asti iti gamyate utpatteḥ prāc avijñātam tasyāḥ tat gamyatām katham sattvena na hi sambandhaḥ tathā utpattiḥ prasidhyati yathā ca kāraṇāt kāryantat sattvāt api tat bhavet yat pūrvakam hi yat kāryan tat tasya iti vyavasthiteḥ tad sattva pūrvakam kāryan tattasya eva katham bhavet itarasya iva ced śakteḥ sarva kārya samudbhavāt śakteḥ eva
[548,xiii^2]	hi śaktiḥ syāt abhede ca katham bhavet vyakteḥ ced śaktitaḥ jātiḥ vyaktiḥ kim śaktitas parā parā ced na asti ajanyā syāt saṃtī ced janyate katham vyakiḥ ca buddhiḥ sā api asti tatas tasyāḥ na janyatā atha samvedanam vyaktiḥ tasya ajanyasya kā janiḥ tasmāt na vyakti kārya tvam kārakāṇām pramā anvitam ghaṭe santam asasthe tu pramāṇam anumāna vid mṛd piṇḍa ādau tu na eva asti ghaṭa ādīnām pramāṇa vid sarvam eva tatas anityam vyakti vat kṛtaka tvataḥ tatoyam nitya tā pakṣaḥ kutonumiti bādhitaḥ pratyakṣa artha anumāna āpta prasiddhena svadharmiṇi iti
[549,vii_549,xi]	svadharmi vacanantarhi kimartham tathā hi pramāṇa bādhitaḥ pakṣaḥ na iti yuktam idam matam paratra tatra vā dharmiṇī etat kvātra upayoga vat na hi para gharmiṇi bādhitam abādhitambhavati sarvathā bādhitam sādhayitum aśakyam iti hetu viṣaya tva abhāvāt apakṣaḥ iti nyāyaḥ atra ucyate sarvatra vādinaḥ dharmaḥ yaḥ sva sādhyatayā īpsitaḥ tat dharmavati bādhā syāt na anya dharmeṇa dharmiṇi 
[549,xii_549,xiv]	sarvatra eva dharmiṇi tasya dharmasya sambhave api sva para matena tathā api yaḥ svayam vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ tad dharmavati dharmiṇi bādhyamāne yadi bādhā bhavet tadā doṣaḥ na tu anya dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi bādhyamānaḥ iti svadharmi vacanam anyathā asya uparodhaḥ kaḥ bādhitenyatra dharmiṇi ayam atra nyāyaḥ tat dharmavati eva dharmiṇi bādhyamāne bādhā na anya dharmavati kṣatiḥ iti 
[549,xv_549,xvii]	gata arthe lakṣaṇe na asmin sva dharmi vacanam punar bādhāyām dharmiṇaḥ api syāt bādheti asya prasiddhaye āśrayasya virodhena tad āśrita virodhanāt sva rūpeṇa eva nirddeśyaḥ svayam iti lakṣaṇāt eva siddheḥ svadharma yuktaḥ eva ca dharmī vādinā svayam iṣṭaḥ tathā sati tasya eva tad anurūpa bādhane na eva doṣa prasaṅgaḥ na anyasya sambhavaḥ 
[549,xviii_549,xxii]	na etat asti dharmiṇaḥ api bādhāyām yathā syāt āśraya virodha dvāreṇa tad dharmasya api abhāva aprasaṅgataḥ anyathā evamvidhaḥ dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ iti abhidhānataḥ tabdādhām ā iva manyeta svadharmi vacanantataḥ evamvidhaḥ dharmaḥ iti prakṛta dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ tasya eva bādhane doṣaḥ syāt na dharmiṇaḥ api bādhanam doṣa vat manyate nanu etat api artha siddham sattyam kecid tu dharmiṇaḥ kevalasya uparodhe api doṣavattām upāgatāḥ tad dharma bādhanañcet doṣa vat dharmi dvāreṇa vā bhavatu sākṣāt vā sarvathā sādhya dharma bādhanam doṣavat 
[550,i_550,iv]	sattyam etat tathā api vipratipatti niṣedha artham etat tathā hi kecid kevala dharmi bādhane api doṣaḥ aivati kathayanti yathā paraiḥ anutpādyā pūrvarūpan na kha ādikam sakṛt śabda ādi ahetu tvāt iti ukte prāha dūṣakaḥ tadvada vastu svabhāvaḥ asan dharmī vyomādiḥ iti api na evam iṣṭasya sādhyasya bādhā kācana vidyate vādī prāha paraiḥ saha kāribhiḥ khādikam anutpādya apūrvarūpan na bhavati śabda ādeḥ kāryasya sakṛt ajananāt yadi anutpādya rūpam bhavet sakṛt eva sva kārya śabda ādikam kuryāt 
[550,v]	atra prativādya āha atha eva ayam anutpādyā pūrvarūpa tā abhāvam sādhayati vyoma ādīnām tathā vyoma ādi dharmiṇaḥ api vastu tva abhāvam sādhayati na dharmi bādhanam kevalam doṣavat na hi evam vādinaḥ doṣaḥ tena hi vastu bhūtam ākāśa ādikam na bhavati iti etat eva sādhayitum iṣṭam tatas avastu bhūta ākāśa dharmiṇī anutpādya apūrverūpa pama ākāśa ādikam na bhavati sakṛt ahetu tvāt iti na doṣaḥ vikalpa pariniṣṭhite dharmiṇi sādhya sādhanāt vastu bhūtaḥ tu dharmī na tasya tena tasya kevalasya bādhāyām api na doṣaḥ ithi svadharmi vacanam na hi para dharmiṇi bādhyamāne sa dharmaḥ na sidhyati tatas sādhya dharmi siddheḥ avyāghātāt adoṣaḥ 
[550,vi_550,vii]	athavā anutpādya apūrvarūpan na bhavati sakṛt ahetu tvāt asya ayam arthaḥ anityam ākāśam tatra paraḥ nityam ākāśam dharmi bādhitambhavati bādhya tā antathā api anityam ākāśan dharmi bhaviṣyati avaśyam hi hetunā sādhya viparyayaḥ bādhitavyaḥ nityaḥ hi dharmī na prakṛta sādhya dharma ākāraḥ tatas tad bādhane kaḥ iva doṣaḥ yadi asau dharmaḥ tad bādhanena sidhyet syāt eva doṣaḥ tathā hi anityam ākāśam svarabhedasya sambhavāt ślaṣma ādinā upaghātaḥ hi galabandhasya saṃbhavaḥ 
[550,viii]	gala vile hi ākāśaḥ upahate svarabhedasya sambhavaḥ tathā hi saṃkaṭa vipula te dikam vivarāṇām dṛṣṭam atādavasthyam tānitya tā atha yadā artha antara bhāvaḥ eva tatra ākāśantu tat eva vipula tā ādi kasmāt pūrvavat na upalakṣyate avaṣṭabdha tvāt iti ced avaṣṭambhaḥ kathat nityasya iti yat kiñcid etat api ca paṭa ādi avayavī na utpannaḥ eva kevalam tantau tantu antara sañcāra mātram kasmāt ākarṣaṇe na pṛthak bhāvaḥ iti ced galavilasya api ākarṣaṇe śarīrasya kasmāt na pṛthak bhāvaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt anityam ākāśam avastu vā paramata bauddha matam iti ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ athavā sa pratigha padārtha saṃsṛṣṭam āloka ādikam eva ākāśa manyā saṃsṛṣṭa padārtha antaram anityam ākāśam iti sthitaḥpakṣaḥ tathābhūtasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭa tā sādhyate tatas tad anya dharmi bādhane na doṣaḥ eva yatas 
[550,ix_551,i]	dvayasya api hi sādhya tve sādhya dharma uparodhi yat bādhanam dharmiṇaḥ tatra bādhā iti etena varṇitam yadi api nāma sādhya dharmi dharmi samudāya sādhanantathā api yatra dharmiṇi bādhyamāne sa prakṛtaḥ dharmaḥ uparudhyate eva tatra doṣaḥ iti anena sva dharmi vacanena kathitam na tu tad asambaddha para parikalpita dharmi bādhane yatas 
[551,ii_551,iv]	tathā eva dharmiṇaḥ api atra sādhya tvāt kevalasya na dharmī hi svarūpeṇa siddhaḥ eva aprasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhya dharma sādhane upayoga abhāvāt tena viśiṣṭa tayā tasya sādhanam abhimatam na svarūpataḥ tatas kevala bādhane na doṣaḥ eva nanu yena rūpeṇa dharmī tad ādhāra tayā samīhitaḥ tad rūpa bādhane niyame na doṣaḥ na vastu rūpasya nitya rūpasya vā akāśasya asamīhita tvāt api ca 
[551,v_551,vii]	dharmiṇaḥ sādhya sādharmyāt anyat rūpam bhavet yadi hetoḥ vā tat niṣeddhāraḥ ke vayam vastu cintakāḥ na khalu vastu bala āyātam kiñcid kvicid pravarttamānam kenacid vastu cintā abhiyoginā niṣeddhum śakyam pramāṇa pratipanna vastu anuyāyi tvāt pramāṇikasya yadi evam atra bādhā syāt nyānyā anutpādya śaktikaḥ sakṛt śabda ādi ahetu tvāt sukha ādiḥ iti pūrvavat 
[551,ix_551,xiii]	sukha duḥkha moha ātmakam hi pradhānam śabda ādi vyakta padārtha hetuḥ iṣyate tatas sakṛt ahetu tvāt avastu sat sukha ādikam bhavet pradhāna rūpasya nitya tvasya bādhane syāt eva avastu tā tat asat yatas virodhitā bhavet atra hetuḥ aikāntikaḥ yadi krama kriyā anitya tayoḥ avirodhāt vipakṣataḥ vyāvṛtteḥ saṃśayāt eva śeṣavat bhedaḥ iṣyate atra krama kriyā hetuḥ akrama pratiṣedhena krama kriyāyāḥ ca anitya tayā virodha abhāvāt tatas anitya tā abhāvat na gamayati iti katham dharmi bādhā tad vādhayā ca dharmasya bādhā bhavet tasmāt svadharmi vacanam 
[551,xiv_551,xvii]	svayam iṣṭaḥ yatas dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tasmāt tad āśrayaḥ bādhyaḥ na kevalaḥ na anya saṃśrayaḥ vā iti sūcitam na hi kevala dharmi bādhane vādī iṣṭa sādhya bādhanam tad anya ādhāra dharmi bādhane vā tasmāt sādhya dharma upayogi dhaḥ i rma bādhane doṣaḥ tasmāt svayaṃśrutya ani adharmāṇām bādhā abādhā iti kathyate tathā svadharmiṇā anyasya dharmiṇaḥ api iti kathyate atas eva āha yaḥ hi dharmī dharma viśiṣṭaḥ tatra yadi sādhya dharma viruddhena pratyakṣa anumāna āgama prasiddhena na bādhyate sa pakṣaḥ anyathā tad ābhāse iti pūrva uktaḥ eva arthaḥ iti 
[552,i_552,iii]	nanu aparaḥ api sa pakṣa ābhāsaḥ aprisiddha viśeṣyaḥ aprasiddha ubhayaḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ iti aprasiddha viśeṣyaḥ tat yathā vibhuḥ ātmā aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ sāṃkhyam prati vināśī śabdaḥ iti aprasiddha ubhayaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam ātmā tat katham eṣām anupanyāsaḥ na sat etat yatas pakṣa doṣaḥ na yuktoyam uttara avayava sthiteḥ pakṣa upanyāsa mātreṇa tad doṣa tva vyavasthiteḥ 
[552,iv]	yatra vibhuḥ ātmā iti yadi kaścid vibhu tva yuktam ātmānam sādhyam kuryāt kaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ dharmya bhāvena hetoḥ āśraya asiddha tvāt iti ced hetoḥ tarhi doṣaḥ na sādhyasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt tathā vināśī śabdaḥ iti kva viśeṣaṇam asiddham yadi śabde tat ayam a doṣaḥ yayaḥ atas eva sādhyate anyathā kaḥ sādhyatā arthaḥ atha viparyaya sidhyā asiddhaḥ ucyate yadi nāma mūḍhasya viparyaya siddhiḥ tathā api na tāvatā pakṣa doṣaḥ yadi ca pramāṇena viparyaya siddhiḥ tadā tad pramāṇa bādhitaḥ eva pakṣaḥ iti sa doṣaḥ māna viruddha tā lakṣaṇaḥ na tu doṣa antaram atha dṛṣṭāntena siddhaḥ tadā sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti tasya eva doṣaḥ na pakṣasya aprisiddha ubhayasya tu bhayathāḥ doṣaḥ iti sarva imī hetu doṣaḥ eva atha hetu doṣāt eva pakṣa doṣaḥ yam yatas sarvathā pakṣaḥ eva na sidhyati tathā ca sarve hetu ādi doṣāḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ bhaveyuḥ na sa kaścid hetu doṣaḥ yaḥ na pakṣa uparodhī yatas 
[552,v_552,vi]	sarva sādhana doṣeṇa pakṣaḥ eva uparudhyate tathā api pakṣa doṣa tvam pratijñā mātra saṃjñinaḥ na hi tad uparodha mātrakāt eva tasya pakṣasya doṣaḥ sādhana doṣasya api pakṣa doṣa tā prasaṅgāt atha sādhana doṣaḥ tat uparodhi api na pakṣa doṣaḥ tat amat atra nyāya abhāvāt atha pakṣa svarūpam tat kālañca atikramya pakṣa vyatirikta sādhana kāla svarūpa upanipāti tvāt pakṣasya na doṣaḥ api tu hetoḥ eva ananvaya ādikaḥ doṣaḥ 
[552,vii]	tat api asat samāna tvāt ananvasya ananvayaḥ hi asambandhaḥ sa ca dviṣṭa tvāt ubhayasya api atha api syāt āśraya asiddha tā hi sādhya apekṣā pakṣa doṣaḥ na sādhana apekṣā sādhana apekṣā tu sādhana doṣaḥ eva uktam atra yadi dvyam api paraspara apekṣam sādhayet katham sa pakṣa doṣaḥ na ca ayam niyamaḥ siddhe dharmiṇi sādhya sambandha mātra saṅgamaḥ eva sādhanīyaḥ iti sva rūpeṇa eva nirddeśyaḥ iti vacanāt kathantarhi uktam asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana asambhavāt āśraya asiddha tvena hetoḥ eva tatra asambhavaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ tasmāt asiddha dharmi dharma samudāyaḥ api pakṣaḥ eva tasmāt hetu nirapekṣaḥ eva doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iti tatas 
[552,viii_553,iv]	uttara avayava apekṣaḥ yaḥ doṣaḥ sonubadhyate tena iti uktam atas apakṣa doṣaḥ asiddha āśraya ādikaḥ uktam etat uttara avayava apekṣaḥ na doṣaḥ pakṣaḥ iṣyate tathā hetu ādi doṣaḥ api pakṣa doṣaḥ prasajyate sarvaiḥ pakṣasya bādhātaḥ tasmāt tanmātra saṅginaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ matā na anye pratyakṣa ādi virodha vat 
[553,v_553,vii]	tasmāt asiddha āśraya ādikaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ na iti nyāyaḥ nanu aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti na anumānam pramāṇam acandraḥ śaśī iti dharma svarūpa viparīta vat vidhānena upadarśitā na dharmi dharma viśeṣa dharmi rūpa bādhā na ca udāharaṇam apradarśitam su jñānam tat kim atra kāraṇam iti na vidmaḥ atra ucyate dharmi dharma viśeṣāṇām svarūpasya ca dharmiṇaḥ bādhā sādhya aṅga bhūtānām anena eva upadarśitā 
[553,viii]	anena eva ca udāharaṇena dharma svarūpa nirākaraṇa pradarśana pareṇa sarveṣām eva sva rūpa viśeṣāṇām upadarśitā bādhā katham anyena anyasya darśanam iti ced sādhya tva aviśeṣāt tatra prativyakti na udāharaṇam śakyam upadarśayitum na ca tad upadarśane prayojanam eka udāharaṇa pradarśanena eva tad dharmaṇaḥ su jñāna tvāt upalakṣaṇa mātrakam hi udāharaṇam 
[553,ix_553,xiv]	nanu viśeṣaḥ kathandharma dharmiṇoḥ tad dharmā na ukta apekṣayā tasya viśeṣa tvam sādhyanta devānyathā sādhana vaiphalyam tatra udāhṛti diś mātram ucyaterthasya dṛṣṭaye dravya lakṣaṇa yuktonyaḥ saṃyogerthosti dṛṣṭi bhāj adṛśyasya aviśiṣṭasya pratijñā niṣprayojanā etāni udāharaṇāni na anyaḥ avayavi avayavebhyaḥ tulān ati viśeṣa agrahaṇāt na anyeva yavāḥ avayavinaḥ vā apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt na asti dravyam guṇa dravyāṇām dravya adravya tva prasaṅgāt dharmi svarūpa nirākaraṇena pāścātyam ekam dharmi dharma viśeṣa nirākaraṇena na ca udāharaṇa dvyam yathākramam ādyam yat rūpa vyatiriktam yat tat tathā evaḥ pa labhyate tad rūpa anupalambhe ca vyatirekaḥ na sidhyati na hi vyatirekeṇa anupalabhyamānam vyatirekeṇa pratyakṣam bhavati avyatirekeṇa upalabhyate vyatiriktañca upagamyate atas eṣa virodhaḥ 
[553,xv_554,ii]	yadi tu avayavāḥ na anye pratyakṣa tvam avāritam pratyakṣaḥ vayavī yatra tad rūpāḥ te api tādṛśāḥ anyathā avayavānām avayavi pratyakṣat tve apya pratyakṣatāyām anyatā eva na syāt athavā na anye avayavāḥ avayavinaḥ tasyāḥ pratvakṣa tva prasaṅgāt anyat tve hi teṣām apratyakṣatāyām avayavinaḥ api apratyakṣata aprasaṅgāt na hi apratyakṣā vayavaḥ vayavī pratyakṣaḥ bhavitum yuktaḥ prathama avayavi vat eva atha sthūlaḥ vayavī pratyakṣaḥ na anyaḥ iti matiḥ ekasya sthūla tā viruddha iti pratipāditam atas avayava samāhāra mātram avayavī na aparaḥ tasmātra anye avayavāḥ iti sthitam 
[554,iii]	tathā na asti dravyam iti guṇa vyatiriktam iti sambandhaḥ guṇa dravyāṇām dravya adravya tva prasaṅgāt iti guṇasya vā dravya tvam dravyasya vā guṇa tvam iti arthaḥ tathā hi vyatireke sati paraspara vyāvṛtta tvāt rūpam sat tayā adhiṣṭhitam dravyasya grāhyam guṇānām api tathā eva iti nyāyaḥ tatas dvyos paraspara parihāreṇa sthita tayoḥ ekaḥ guṇaḥ anyat dravyam iti kutas vivekaḥ aparaspara parihāre api kutas vivekaḥ atha guṇasya dravya tvam guṇa tvam dravyasya dravya tvam iti vivekaḥ iti matiḥ 
[554,iv_554,vii]	tat api ayuktam svarūpa vyatirekeṇa guṇa tva ādiḥ nna vidyate guṇa tvasya anyatāyāñca sattā tatra api vidyate tatas dravya aviśeṣaḥ sa prāk prasaṅgaḥ anivāritaḥ sattve samastam syāt dravyam vyatireka itara tvayoḥ paraspara parihāreṇa avasthita tve na dravya itaratvayaḥ rvivekaḥ iti siddham eva etat vyatireke tu dravya tva yogāt dravyam guṇa tva yogāt guṇaḥ iti syāt viveka āśaṅkā tat api na samyak paraspara parihāreṇa sthitayaḥ rūpa rasayoḥ iva kutas dravya itarate guṇa tva ādi yogāt iti ced na guṇa vyaktyā vyajyamāne guṇa tvam na anyathā samāna ākāra tā mātram guṇa tvam dravya tvañca tasya viśeṣaḥ tad vijātīya vyakti vyakta tvam nāma vijātīya vyakti tvañca vijātyā dhyāsita tvam itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ 
[554,viii]	atha jātīnām svatas eva vilakṣaṇa tvam parasparataḥ iti ucyate tatra api vijāti a dhyāsita tvam eva vyāvṛtti kāraṇam svarūpeṇa vyāvṛtta tve vyaktīnām api tathā iti vyarthikā parā jātiḥ guṇaḥ iti samāna ākāra pratyaya anibandhana tvāt guṇa tva ādeḥ guṇa tvam iti ced kim idānīm antar gaḍunā sāmānyena sāmānya ākāra pratyaya nibandhana tvasya pratiniyamena eva prasiddha tvāt svaka prayojanasya tathā ca na dravya adravyayoḥ svarūpataḥ viśeṣaḥ kaścid tasmāt dravya astitve dravya at ravyayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ eva na astitve tu bhavati viśeṣaḥ iti yuktam samvṛti sat dravyam tatonye guṇāḥ iti ubhaya sva rūpa viśeṣa nirākaraṇa mukhena udāharaṇam tat yathā sarvam vākyam anṛtārtham 
[554,ix_554,x]	anṛta artham vacaḥ sarvam iti vākya anṛta tvayoḥ tad svarūpa viśeṣasya kṣepe doṣaḥ vivakṣite vākya tvam anṛta tvañca sāmānyena yadā nirākarttum abhipretam tadā ubhaya svarūpa nirākaraṇam yadā tu vākyasya dharmiṇaḥ dharma unitya tvañca anṛta abhidheya tvam tadā ubhaya viśeṣa nirākaraṇam sarvasya vākyasya viśeṣasya anṛta abhidheya tvasya ca nirākaraṇāt prāmāṇyam hi vacana sāmarthyāt atas tena vākya tva anṛta abhidheyatka abhāva nirākaraṇam dharmi viśeṣaḥ ca atra kaścid anitya tva ādikaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ yadi hi ānitya tvam
[555,i_555,v]	na sādhyate vyarthakam eva vaktṛ prāmāṇya aṅgīkaraṇam yadi nityatā syāt na vaktā kiñcid kriyeta iti vyarthaḥ eva vaktā syāt atas sva vacana viruddham etat yadi nityam bhavet vākyam vaktuḥ vyartha tvam āpatet avākya rūpa upakṛtau siddha upasthāyitā patet vaktuḥ hi vākya svarūpam anupakurvāṇasya na vākya upakāritā atad kṛta upakāre na tasya kiñcid iti anupakārī na vākyena vaktā pekṣyate apekṣyate ca tasmāt anitya tā tasya sādhanīyā tatas tad viśeṣa nirākaraṇa mukhena ayam pakṣa ābhāsaḥ iti kathitam tatra vārttikakāraḥ udāharaṇa diś mātram eva nidarśayati anayā diśā śeṣa udāharaṇa vyākhyā pratipatti artha na avaya vi anyat tva mātram sādhyate api tu dravya lakṣaṇa yogena kriyāvat guṇavat samavāyi kāraṇam dravyam iti tathā dṛṣṭi bhāva tvena anyat tvam ātrantu yadi avayavinaḥ sādhyate tadā samvṛti sat mātram tat siddham eva parama artha santova yavā samvṛti sannavayavī iti siddha sādhanam anyat tva mātre sādhye 
[555,vi_555,vii]	iṣṭaḥ hi avayavī kāryam dṛṣṭyā adṛśyeṣu asambhavi aviśiṣṭasya ca anyasya sādhane siddha sādhanam avayava paramāṇu ādi vyatireka mātra tayā prasiddhaḥ eva bhrānta buddhi ākāraḥ tasya eva sādhane niyamena eva siddha sādhya tā dṛṣṭaḥ eva ca na ati dūra vartti paraspara sāmīpya vyavasthitānām saṃsakta keśa viṣaya eka ghana ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ tatas na tāvat mātreṇa vijñāna ākāra vyatirikta a ayavi prasiddhiḥ atas dravya lakṣaṇa yogaḥ eva tatra sādhanīyaḥ tatra ca guru tvam guṇaḥ adhas gatiḥ ca kriyā tayoḥ ca samavāyikāraṇa tvam iti lakṣaṇa yoge vijñāna ākāra vyatireka siddhiḥ tathā ca 
[555,viii_555,xi]	guru tva adhas gatī syātām yadi asau syāt tulānatiḥ avaśyam hi guru tva prayukta adhas gamane tadā ākṛṣyamāṇasya tulā śirasaḥ api natiḥ na ca asau asti avayava adhikā tatosau na dravya lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ iti āha tad nirguṇa kriyaḥ tasmāt samavāyi na kāraṇam yayoḥ guṇa kriyayā urasau samavāyi kāraṇam tad abhāvena na tathā bhavati iti upasaṃhāraḥ 
[555,xii_555,xiv]	tatas eva na dṛśyosa avadṛṣṭeḥ kārya rūpayoḥ dṛśya tvam api tasya na asti eva tasya hi dvyī gatiḥ upacārataḥ mukhyatas ca na tāvat upacārataḥ tad kāryasya gaurava ādeḥ adṛṣṭeḥ na api upacāreta rataḥ rūpasya avayava vyatirekeṇa adṛṣṭeḥ vijñāna ākāra yaḥ sthūlatayā upa lambhāt na dhikasya ca adarśanāt tad bādhāni aviśeṣasya na antarīyaka bhāvinaḥ 
[556,i_556,iv]	anyaḥ viśeṣasya ukta anya tā mātra apekṣayā dravya lakṣaṇa yogena tasya sādhya tvam na antarīyaka tvena anyathā anyat tva mātrasya asādhya tvāt tathā hi guru tva adhas gati tyāge pratibhāsosya kevalaḥ pratibhāsaḥ ca vijñāna avyatireke api adurghaṭaḥ timira viparītīkṛta darśana śakti nayanānām api keśa daṃśa maśaka makṣika ādayaḥ sa dadhi mokṣa pakṣa nikṣiptāḥ pratyakṣa īkṣitāḥ iva avabhāsante na ca te tad avabhāsāt eva asantaḥ na bhavanti atra āsūkṣmāt dravya mālāyāḥ tolya tvāt aṃśu pāta vat dravya antara guru tvasya gatiḥ nna iti aparobravīt 
[556,vi]	sūkṣma dvi aṇuka ādi pratidravyamālāyāḥ tulā māna saṅgamāt aneka dravya madhyam adhyāsīnam dravya antara guru tvam na śakyamu pa lakṣayitum iti tulānati viśeṣa agrahaṇam dvayoḥ hi hema piṇḍayoḥ saṃyoge yadi api avayavi antaram utpannam guṇa kriyāvat tathā api dvi aṇukāva antara dravya mālā api tatra āste eva tatas tad anantara guru tvam adhya pāti na lakṣyate karpāsa bhāra madhya śatita daṃśu pāta guru tvam iva na ca alakṣyamāṇam api tasya guru tvam adhas gamanañca na asti tatas tad nirguṇa kriyaḥ tasmāt iti asiddham etat 
[556,vii_556,x]	tat asat yatas na upalakṣyam guru tvam ced kutas tasya adhikam gatiḥ iyam eva hi tad vitti pratyāśā tad kṛtiḥ katham gurutva adhas gati viśeṣam antareṇa pratibhāsa mātram eva sidhyati na ca tena siddhena siddha sādhya tā vyatikramaḥ api ca tasya krameṇa saṃyukte pāṃśu rāśau sakṛt yute bhedaḥ syāt gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite 
[556,xii_556,xiii]	krameṇa saṃyukte hi pāṃśu rāśau guru tva yuktān ekāva vaya vibhāra sadbhāvāt mahat gauravam sakṛt yute tu ekaḥ eva avayavī iti na mahat gauravam atas bheda prasaktiḥ na ca upalambhaḥ bhedasya aneka aṃśu ni caya nipāte tu upalakṣyate tatas asau na dṛṣṭāntaḥ atha pūrva sakala avayavi vi nāśe paryanta vartī ekaḥ eva avayavī tatas neka avayavinām abhāve samānam eva gauḥ evam akrameṇa anyathā ca saṃyukte pāṃśu rāśau iti na doṣaḥ tathā sati dravya mālā tolyate iti na yuktam syāt antyasya tu gaurava anumāpa lakṣaṇam na yuktam 
[556,xiv_556,xv]	athavā yāvat ārambhakayoḥ guru tvam pṛthak bhūtayoḥ avayavayaḥ rava yavinaḥ api tad ā ārabdhasya tāvat eva tatas na bhavati tulānati viśeṣaḥ evantarhi sarva avayavi nāśe satya vayavinaḥ utpattiḥ iti paramāṇūnām api vināśaḥ iti nityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ iti virodhaḥ siddhāntasya atha vibhāgena vināśaḥ paramāṇūnām tu na vibhāgaḥ anavaya tvāt iti ced na anavayava tvasya ayogāt avaśyam hi pūrva apara diś bhāgena bhāvyam mūrttimatām tasmāt na avaya vi nāśaḥ iti yuktam 
[556,xvi_557,i]	atha api syāt bhavatu paramāṇūnām vināśaḥ itina kācid naḥ kṣatiḥ evantarhi krameṇa māṣaka ādīnām saṃkhyā sāmyan na yujyate pañcamāṣakaḥ piṇḍaḥ na syāt eka tvāt avayavinaḥ māṣaka avayavinām vinaṣṭa tvāt ekam eva suvarṇṇām ityādi bhavet aneka gaurava sambhave hi pañca ityādi saṃkhyā sambhavaḥ eka tvetu eka saṃkhyā eveka tvāt avayavinaḥ 
[557,ii_557,iii]	atha eka tve api gauravasya tathā vyapadeśaḥ tathā sati na parama arthaḥ saṃkhyā tasmāt avayavānām avināśe tad gatām saṃkhyā upapadyate māṣaka ādi sāmya nibandhanam tatas neka dravya sambhave krameṇa avayavinām utpatteḥ gauravasya niyamena viśeṣataḥ atha śariśa sarṣa pāduttara uttaram sakalam eva na upalakṣyate eka anupalakṣaṇa vat sarveṣām aviśeṣāt 
[557,iv_557,vii]	na etat asti ekasya anupalakṣa tve api aṃśoḥ nna anupalakṣya tā tad aṃśu ni cayasya api tatas na idam samañjasam na hi enām upalakṣaṇe tad saṃhātasya api eka aṃśu gaurava anupalakṣaṇe api bhāra gaurava upalakṣaṇāt aṃśa nicayaḥ ca karpāsa bhāra vyapadeśa bhāgī kiñca sarṣapādāmahā rāśeḥ uttaraḥ vṛtti mad guru tvam kārya mālāyāḥ yadi na eva upalakṣyate āsarṣapāt gurutvanta dvaṇa rṇa kṣatam analpakam tolyantad kāraṇaṅkārya gaurava anupalakṣaṇāt 
[557,ix]	raktikā catur bhāgaḥ sarṣapaḥ tasmāt sarṣapāt prabhṛtyā mahā rāśe uttarottara kārya mālā nibandhanam bṛddhimat gauravam na upalabhyate āsarṣapāt tu guru tvam apacaya vat pūrva pūrvam sutarām eva na upalabhyate iti prāptam atas kārya gaurava anupalakṣaṇāt kāraṇam eva tolyam pāriśeṣyāt tasya iti nyāyaḥ parisphuṭaḥ eva gaurava viśeṣa upayogitaya upalabhyam eva tolyat na anyat uttarottarasyahi kāryasya gaurava anupakṣaṇe tat gauravam kāraṇasya api taula tve tad kāraṇasya tasya api tad kāraṇasya iti eva yāvat kāraṇam paramāṇavaḥ tolyāḥ teṣām parasya kāraṇa bhūtasya ā vayavasya abhāvāt tathā hi 
[557,x_558,ii]	paryanta a ayavi dhvaṃse guru tvantu tayoḥ api punar tat eva paśyāmaḥ bhūyas dhvaṃse tayoḥ api tatonumānataḥ vidmaḥ guru tvam paramāṇuṣu tatas nāvayati dravyam dravya lakṣaṇa yuktimat api ca aṃśoḥ gauravānupalakṣaṇe api bhāraḥ eva tasya dṛṣṭa tvāt na tvayavī dṛśyaḥ kevalam kārya darśanāt eva tasya sattā vyavasthāpyate tat ca sakalam asat yatas na ca dṛṣṭa uṃśu vat sorthaḥ na ca tat kāryam īkṣyate gurutva āgati vat sarva tad tulā anu palakṣaṇāt māṣaka ādeḥ anādhikyam anatiḥ sa upalakṣaṇam yathā sva makṣeṇa adṛṣṭe rūpa ādau adhika adhike pratyakṣa anumānābhyām apratītam katham asti iti gamyatā m 
[558,iii_558,v]	nanu gurutva āgatau api prakāra antareṇa api gateḥ sambhavāt katham asat na anyasya api rūpa ādeḥ anupalakṣaṇa tvāt māṣaka ādeḥ avayivinaḥ na adhika mapara mavayavebhyaḥ kathat na tarhi tulā anati viśiṣa agrahaṇāt iti a ācāryeṇa pratiniyamaḥ uktaḥ na upalakṣaṇa tvāt sā natiḥ kevala ucyamānā apyarasya api nidarśikā katham sarvam eva na upalakṣyate iti jñānavyam kim atra jñātavyam yathāyatham cakṣuḥ ādinā rūpa ādeḥ adhika adhikasya anavagamāt na hi rūpa rasa ādīnām avayavebhyaḥ viśeṣa gatiḥ avayavi sambhave api tasmāt guṇa kriyā vat dṛśya avayavi abhāvaḥ eva iti dharma viśeṣa bādha dvāreṇa pakṣa doṣaḥ ayañca pakṣaḥ abhyupagama sva vacana anumāna pratīti vādhitaḥ abhyupāyaḥ sva vāc ādi bādhāyāḥ sambhavena tu udāharaṇam api anyat diśā gamyam yathā uktayā rūpa bādha ādi vat avayavi bādhaka nyāya upadarśanam atonyat api ācārya nidarśitam udāharaṇam avagantavyam tat ca prāk upadarśitam eva 
[558,vi_558,ix]	nanu sādhya nirddeśaḥ pakṣa pratijñā iti etat pakṣa lakṣaṇam naiyāyikānām asya kaḥ doṣaḥ asiddha hetu dṛṣṭāntasya api tattva prasaṅgaḥ nanu sādhyate iti sādhyam asiddha hetu dṛṣṭāntau tu sādhayiṣyete tat kathantayoḥ pratijñātva prasaṅgaḥ sattyam etat yadi varttamāna sādhya nirddeśaḥ iti labhyeta tri kāla viṣaya tvāt tu kṛtyānām atathā ātmakam tathā param pratinyastam sādhyanna iṣṭam tadā api tat 
[558,x]	tri kāla viṣayaḥ hi sarve eva kṛtya pratyayāḥ tatas bhāvi sādhya tvam api pratijñā syāt katham sādhyasya bhāvi tvam tadā atathā ātmaka tvena nirddeśāt sādhyam api tat tadā sādhana tvena niddiṣṭam tena tadā asādhyam na ca asiddham sādhanam sādhyam prati tatas tasya paścāt sādhana tvam tatas paścāt tana sādhya tayā eva tasya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā 
[558,xi_559,i]	nanu yathā sādhya śabda kāraka apekṣayā sādhyat na pratipādayati kriyate ghaṭaḥ iti tathā sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam api na pratyāyayiṣyati iti kutosiddha sādhanasya pratijñātva prasaṅgaḥ sattyam etat yadi nibandhanam atra pratyāyana adhikāraḥ na syāt pratyāyana adhikāre tu sarva asiddha avarodhinī tasmāt sādhya śrutiḥ nneṣṭam viśeṣam avalambate 
[559,ii]	pratyāyana adhikāreṇa nivartti akāraka apekṣayā sādhyam apara sarva sādhya saṃgrahārikā eva sādhya śrutiḥ atas na sādhya antara vyavaccheda samarthā kāraka sādhya vyavacchedaḥ tu jñāpaka hetu adhikārāt na ca sa hetukam kiñcid bhavati iti ahetukena api bhavitavyam sarvasya sarvatra bhāva prasaṅgāt na ca asādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam sādhyampakṣaḥ iti nibandhanam asti tatas sādhya śrutiḥ nneṣṭam viśeṣam avalam vitum alam kāraka sādhya vyāvṛttiḥ tu pratyāyana adhikārāt iti na tayā sāmyam 
[559,iii_559,v]	tena aprasiddha sandigdha hetu dāharaṇa kṛtam anyathā śaśaśrṛṅga ādau sarva asiddhe api sādhya tā tathā ca asiddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāta ghaṭa vat iti sāṃkhyam prati cākṣuṣa tvāt ākāśa vat iti vā yadi tu prakaraṇa anapekṣā bhavet pratilakṣaṇa kṛtaḥ tathā śaśaśrṛṅga ādau api sādhya tā prasaṅgaḥ 
[559,vi]	atha api syāt atra api sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti na sarvasya pratyāyana adhikāre api sādhyasya pratijñātvam api tu sādhyam iti karmaṇi kṛtya pratyaya vidhānāt karma ca karttuḥ īpsitatamam karme ti viśiṣṭam eva yatra prakarṣaḥ na ca sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam karaṇa tva ādīptitatamam anyathā payasā odanam bhuṃkte iti na payasaḥ karaṇa tvena vivakṣitasya karma tvam bhojana kriyayā apyamānasya api tathā īpsitam na īpsiṣyamāṇaṅkarma api ca pañcasu ava yaveṣu lakṣya tayā prakṛteṣu avayava antara lakṣaṇa viṣaya parihāreṇa pratijñā lakṣaṇam vyavatiṣṭhate iti asādhana bhūta sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti pratīyate tathā caturvidham sarva tantra pratitantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama siddhānta nyāya sūṃtre prakrame lakṣaṇa vidhānāt abhyupagama siddhānta lakṣaṇaḥ sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti pratīteḥ nna ati prasaṅgaḥ iti na doṣaḥ 
[559,vii_559,x]	tat etat sakalam asat yatas sarvasya ca aprasiddha tvam kathañcid tena na kṣamāḥ karma ādi bheda upakṣepa parihārā vivecane prāc asiddha svarūpa tvāt sādhyaḥ vayavaḥ iti asat tulya siddhānta tā te hi yena upagama lakṣaṇaḥ na khalu siddhāntaḥ siddha hetu dṛṣṭānta vyavaccheda kṛt sarvasya asiddhasya abhyupagamāt śāstra dṛṣṭasya hi abhyupagatasya abhyupagama siddhānta tvāt tasya ca hetu tvena abhyupagame api sādhyatā abhyupagamaḥ avaśyaṃbhāvī na asiddhasya hetutā iti tri kāla viṣaya tvantu kṛtya pratyayānām pratipāditam abhyupagama śabdaḥ api tri kāla viṣaya pratyayaḥ eva kṛtya grahaṇasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt tatas sakalasya siddhānta tā tulyā tatas na siddhānta upakramaḥ parihāraḥ 
[560,i_560,ii]	atha sādhanasya sādhyasya ca lakṣaṇe prakṛte sādhana lakṣaṇa parihāreṇa sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñe ti sādhyaḥ eva pratijñā na sādhana nirddeśaḥ tat api asat sarveṣām asiddha tvāt avayava lakṣaṇānām arthasya asiddha tvāt prāk lakṣaṇa abhidhānāt tatas sādhyarnirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti sarvasya sādhyasya nirddeśaḥ iti syāt tad vinirmuktasya ca sādhana tvam athavā sādhana tvena nirmuktasya sādhya nirddeśya pratijñātvam iti kaḥ imam vivekam vidhātum alam sandehaḥ eva tarhi iti ced na atra uttarasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
[560,iii_560,iv]	nanu sādhyam iti karmaṇi kṛtya pratyayaḥ karma ca karttuḥ īpsitatamam na ca sādhana tvena upāyatayā abhīṣṭasya īpsitam atvam tat kathantasya sādhya tā natat asti sādhanasya eva upāyatayā sādhya tvena īpsitatama tvāt na ca atiśaya pratyayaḥ tatra aṅgīkṛtaḥ yoga vibhāgasya kaiścid abhyupagamāt daparaiḥ ātiśāyikasya pratyākhyāta tvāt na ca bhūta pratyayaḥ tatra tantram eka bacanam vākariṣyati kaṭau kaṭān iti ca iṣṭa tvāt abhyupagama siddhānta tā ca asti eva tasmāt sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti asat etat atra ca dharmī dharmaḥ samudāyaḥ vā sādhyaḥ bhavet 
[560,v_560,ix]	tatra dharme sādhyena sādharmyam hetuḥ dharmiṇī anarthakaḥ yadi dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tasya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti anikya tvam iti bhavet pratijñā tathā sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇam iti dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam virudhyate na hi sādhya dharmasya anitya tvasya autpatti matvā ādi dharmau vidyate yena tad dharma bhāvi tvam syāt ghaṭa ādeḥ dharmiṇaḥ tu siddha tvāt tādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti na saṅgatam atha ubhayam sādhyam ubhaya pakṣa bhāvī doṣaḥ nanu samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ na samudāyaḥ siddhaḥ na api tad dharmaḥ utpattimatvam na bhavati atra ucyate samudāyasya sādhya tve api anyonyasya viśeṣaṇam sādhyam dvyam tadā asiddham hetu dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam 
[560,x]	udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti hetu lakṣaṇam sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāham miti udāharaṇa lakṣaṇam tat etat samudāya sādhya tve vidhaṭeta tathā hi samudāyasya samudāyi vī atirekeṇa abhāvāt tat eva dvayam sādhyam bhavet na ca sādhya dharma viśiṣṭa dharmi dharmeṇa utpattimatu ā ādinā udāharaṇasya sadharmyam asti tathāvidhe dharmiṇī a siddhaḥ hetuḥ parasya iti na hetu lakṣaṇam na apya nitya tā viśiṣṭena dharmiṇā udāharaṇasya ghaṭa ādeḥ sādharmyam asti iti na dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam iti na sidhyati hetu dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam asambhavāt samudāyasya sādhya śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati samudāyeṣu hi pravṛttāḥ śabdāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante iti nyāyāt 
[560,xi_561,ii]	tat api asat asaṃbhavāt sādhya śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ yadi iṣyate śāstreṇa alam yathāyogam lokaḥ eva pravarttatām kim hi tadā lakṣaṇa vacanena yathā durvihita lakṣaṇam asambhavāt arthasya anyathā vyācaṣṭe tathā hetu ādi svarūpam api anyathā parikalpayiṣyati yathā sa gamakaḥ tathā dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam api vyarthakam śāstram 
[561,iii_561,vi]	nanu pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ iti bhavadbhiḥ api upacārāt pakṣa śabdaḥ dharmi vṛttiḥ iṣṭaḥ eva tathā ca pakṣaḥ dharmī avayave samudāya upacārāt atra api hi saḥ eva doṣaḥ na idam asti yatas jijñāsita viśeṣasya dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa rūpa tā tasya dharmaḥ yadā hetuḥ katham atra upacāra tā 
[561,vii_561,ix]	yaḥ eva hi jijñāsita sādhya dharma lakṣaṇa viśeṣaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ tasya mukhyasya eva pakṣasya grahaṇam tasya dharmaḥ hetuḥ tatas na doṣaḥ nanu samudāyasya asiddhatve kathantasya dharmaḥ iti sidhyati na idam api yuktam yasmāt samudāya prasiddhiḥ ced kathampakṣaḥ bhavet asau sandigdhe sādhya dharme hi dharmi mātrasya pakṣatā 
[561,x]	yadāhi samudāyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tadā asyāḥ jijñāsita viśeṣa tvāt apakṣa tā eva tathā ca āha tatra tu svayam sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti siddhaḥ ced katham sādhya tvena īpsitaḥ tasmāt pakṣa dharmaḥ iti korthaḥ sandigdha sādhya dharma dharmi dharma iti tadā atra katham samudāya asiddhau tad dharmatā na sidhyati kathantarhi avayave samudāya upacārāt iti uktam 
[561,xi_561,xiii]	atra ucyate codyasya parihāra artham upacāra pravarttanam dharmi dharmaḥ iti prokte lakṣaṇa atiprasaṅgi tā tatra hi codayanti pakṣa dharmaḥ iti na sat etat na hi hetu svarūpa nirūpaṇa kāle pakṣasya sambhavaḥ pradeśa ādi dharmi mātreṇa hetum upalabhya vyāpti smaraṇe paścāt nitya tattvaa ādi sādhya dharma buddhiḥ prāk tu tad buddheḥ abhāvāt dharmi mātram eva samviditam avaśiṣyate sandigdhaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ iti ced na 
[561,xiv_561,xvi]	niyama abhāvāt nanu sandigdhe hetuḥ pravarttate kathat na niyamaḥ na siddha pratikṣipta mātrasya nirācikīrṣita tvāt niścite nirākṛte ca hetuḥ pravarttate prayojana abhāvāt aśakteḥ ca tasmāt dharmi dharmaḥ iti eva vācyam atra ucyate dharmi dharmaḥ iti vacane dṛṣṭānta dharmi dharmasya api hetu tve cākṣuṣa tvam api hetuḥ syāt atas pakṣa bhūtaḥ dharmī gṛhyeta iti pakṣa grahaṇam kathandharmyā iva pakṣaḥ bhavet iti āha avayave samudāya upacārāt yadi api hetu grahaṇa kāle samudāyaḥ na bhavati baddhi sthaḥ tathā api paścāt bhaviṣyati 
[562,i]	nanu yaḥ paścāt bhaviṣyati sa katham prathame sannihitaḥ atas eva upacāraḥ nyathā mukhya tā buddhyā vyāraḥ paḥ upacāraḥ katham asat nihite buddhiḥ iti ced kim manorathe api dāridryam na hi asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti na dṛśyate tatra hi yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ yadi vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ śāṭakaḥ ca vātavyaḥ ca iti vyāhatam tatra ayam abhiprāyaḥ vaktuḥ yaḥ śāṭakaḥ bhaviṣyati sa vātavyaḥ atra api kim prayojanam iti ced asti prayojanam sūtram iti ukte śāṭaka paṭaka ādeḥ api prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt anya nirāsa artham evam vacanam evam atra api yaḥ pakṣaḥ bhaviṣyati yatra sādhya siddhiḥ bhāvinī tasya dharmaḥ iti na dṛṣṭānta dharmi dharma prasaṅgaḥ tatoyam arthaḥ sandigdha sādhya dharma dharmi dharma iti kathantarhi tad aṃśaḥ tad dharmaḥ vaktṛ abhiprāya vaśāt na tat eka deśaḥ pakṣa śabdena samudāyā vacanāt iti vacanam 
[562,ii_562,iv]	tat asat anya doṣaḥ kathat nāma paratra upanipātyate vyākhyātuḥ eva doṣaḥ durātmanaḥ na khalu anyena karkaṭikā bhakṣyate anyasya nāsā āccheda kriyā sādhya dharma dharmi samudāyaḥ pakṣaḥ tatra yadi tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti sāmānyena ākhyāyate tadā dharmī api tad aṃśaḥ eva tena vyāptaḥ iti na sādhya dharma vyāpta tā lakṣaṇam bhavet atas āha tad aṃśaḥ tad dharmaḥ aṃśa śabdasya sāmānya vacana tve api dharmaḥ eva aṃśaḥ gṛhyate vaktṛ abhiprāyāt pakṣa dharmasya anyena dharmiṇā vyāpti asiddheḥ na tat eka deśaḥ iti asya arthaḥ na eka deśa mātram pakṣa śabdena samudāyā vacanāt pakṣa śabdena hi dharmī sandigdha sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ ucyate tena samudāya vācakaḥ na pakṣa śabdaḥ samudāya artha pratītiḥ tu sāmarthyāt tasya dharmiṇoṃśaḥ sāmarthyāt dharmaḥ eva na hi saḥ eva tasya dharmaḥ 
[562,v]	yadi tu pakṣa śabdena samudāyaḥ ucyate samāna pradhāna bhāva avayavaḥ tadā tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti dharmi lakṣaṇena aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti api syāt aniṣṭañcā idam iti tena evam vyākhyāyate tasmāt na kvacid asmābhiḥ asambhavāt anya śabdonyatra parikalpitaḥ api ca mata anujñā nāma idam nigraha sthānam sva pakṣe doṣam anud dhṛtya para pakṣe doṣa todanam mata anujñā athavā asmākam prayojanam asti upacāra yogya dharmi parigrahaḥ bhavatu na idam iti na upacāraḥ yuktaḥ na ca mukhya sambhave upacāra kalpanā yogaḥ api ca sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti atra pūrva avadhāraṇam vā syāt para avadhāraṇam vā sādhya nirddeśaḥ eva pratijñā na sādhana nirddeśaḥ athavā sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva na anyathā tatra 
[562,vi]	pūrva avadhāraṇam vyartham aniṣṭam itaratra tu yadi pūrva avadhāraṇam vyartha tā bhavet tat nivartti asya sādhana nirddeśasya hetu lakṣaṇena dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇena ca pratijñātvasya viśeṣa vihitena bādhanāt prakalpya apavāda viṣayam utsargasya pravṛtteḥ uttara avadhāraṇe tu sādhya hetu udāharaṇa nirddeśasya api pratijñātvam iti aniṣṭam 
[562,vii_563,iv]	nanu sādhyasya eva nirddeśaḥ pratijñā na siddhasya iti avadhāraṇe kaḥ doṣaḥ na hi tasya sādhana ādibhiḥ ākṣepaḥ atra idam ucyate sādhana ākhyāna sāmarthyāt tad arthe sādhya tā matā sādhanam hi sarvam asiddha sādhanāya upādīyate siddhe kim sādhanena iti sādhanasya lakṣaṇa ākhyāna sāmarthyā deva asiddha arthe sādhya bhāva gatā eva na prasaṅgaḥ siddhasya iti na tad nivṛtti artham avadhāraṇam hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ rvyāpteḥ anāśaṅkyañca sādhanam 
[563,v]	syāt etat sādhya tvena eva nirddeśaḥ pratijñā iti śabda vyāpāra apekṣayā asiddha sya sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya nirākaraṇa artham pūrva avadhāraṇam na hi tatra na sādhana sāmarthyam atra āha hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ vyāpteḥ anāśaṅkyam sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭam yathā eva hi śabda vyāra apekṣayā asiddhasya sādhana tvena nirddiṣṭasya pratikṣepaḥ sādhya tvena eva nirddeśaḥ iti tathā udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetu riti ādinā hetu ādi lakṣaṇena sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti sādhya sādhana tva bhaṅgyā hetuḥ eva tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva iti śakyam vyākhyātum iti hetu ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ vyāptiḥ 
[563,vi_563,vii]	pūrva avadhāraṇe tena pratijñā lakṣaṇa abhidhā vyarthā vyāptiphalā soktiḥ sāmarthyāt gamyate tatas pūrva avadhāraṇe vyarthatāyām pariśeṣyāt uttara avadhāraṇam tasya ca vyāpteḥ phalam tathā hi sādhya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti anya lakṣaṇena api yadi vyāptiḥ tathā api pratijñā eva na apratijñā iti ayoga vyavaccheda phalam vākyam iti sādhana tvena api nirddiṣṭasya sādhyasya nirddeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti vākya arthaḥ anyathā vyartha tā 
[563,viii_563,x]	nanu svayam eva ucyate tathā ca asiddha dṛṣṭānta hetuvādaḥ prasajyate iti hetu ādi lakṣaṇa vyāptyā pareṇa parihāra abhidhāne prāc asiddha svarūpa tva ādi parihāraḥ tathā sarvasya ca aprasiddha tvāt iti ādikaḥ na eṣaḥ api doṣaḥ paraspara virodhena prasaṅgasya upapādanam kṛtam evam anena eva na tu sva iṣṭa prasādhanam 
[563,xi]	paraspara virodha pradarśana mātram eva etat na tu anena hetunā sādhya artha prasiddhiḥ para pakṣa nirākaraṇa mātrasya eva iṣṭa tvāt tasmāt uttara avadhāraṇam eva etat tathā ca ayoga vyavacchedāt yāvatī kācid aprāptiḥ pratijñātu asya sarvā asau nirākriyate pratijñā eva na apratijñā iti sādhana tvena yat apratijñātvam tat api nivarttyate 
[563,xii_564,i]	nirākṛtantāvat pratijñā lakṣaṇam pratijña ābhāsa lakṣaṇam idānīm nirākarttum āha hetu pratijñā vyāghāte pratijñā doṣaḥ iti asat sa hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva uktaḥ vaidhamyaṇa asu śikṣitaiḥ yat āha paraḥ pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ nāma pratijñā doṣaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya anitya tvāt iti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā sarvasya anitya tvāt iti hetuḥ yadi sarvam anityam katham śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdena vinā sarva tva abhāvāt atha śabdasya api anitya tvam katham nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
[564,ii_564,iv]	atra āha na ayam pratijñā doṣaḥ yatas viruddha teṣṭa asambandhaḥ anupakāra saha āsthitī evam sarva aṅga doṣāṇām pratijñādoṣa tā bhavet virodhe sati pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ nāma pratijñā doṣaḥ sa ca virodhaḥ iṣṭa asambandhaḥ sa ceṣṭā sambandha unupakārakaḥ saha āsthitiḥ ca yadi tāvat hetuḥ tam artham na upakaroti duṣṭa tvāt sādhya virodhī tadā sarva aṅga doṣāṇām eva pratijñā doṣa tvasya prasaṅgaḥ 
[564,v_564,vii]	na hi kaścid api hetu ādi aṅga doṣaḥ sādhya anupakāra lakṣaṇena virodhena virodhī tatas sarvasya liṅga doṣasya pratijñāt boṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ na ca bhavati yatas pakṣa doṣaḥ para apekṣaḥ na iti ca pratipāditam param apekṣya api yadi pakṣa doṣaḥ tadā sādhana doṣaḥ eva kaścid na syāt pratijñā artha uparodhena pratijñā doṣa tva intarbhāvāt apṛthak vacanam eva sādhana doṣāṇām bhavet kaḥ hi amūḍha cetanaḥ ekatra antarbhūtam pṛthak brūyāt tasmāt asan evaṃbhūtaḥ pakṣa doṣaḥ atha saha asthiti svabhāvaḥ virodhaḥ tadā 
[564,viii_564,x]	iṣṭa asambhavya siddhaḥ ca iṣṭe pakṣe yadi asambhavī hetuḥ tadā asau asiddhaḥ iti asi ddha tayā eva nirākṛtaḥ syāt na pratijñā virodhaḥ atha tena pratijñātasya nirākaraṇam tathā sati yena pramāṇena sa sādhyate tad pramāṇa nirākṛtaḥ pratijñā doṣaḥ iti na virodhaḥ nāma kiñca saḥ eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ anitya tva sahetu tve śabdaḥ evam prakīrttayet 
[564,xi_564,xvii]	yadi anitya tvena sa hetu tve evam śabde prakīrtayet yāvatā dṛṣṭānta ākhyān atonyat kim atra asti artha anudarśanam na etat ākhyānam hetoḥ api tu vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya anitya tvāt atra api evam vaktavyam anityasya sarva tvāt aśikṣita tvāt tu evam abhidhānam tathā ca uktam sa hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva uktaḥ vaidharmyeṇa asu śikṣitaiḥ na hi dṛṣṭānta ākhyānāt aparam artham atra paśyāmaḥ etat eva kutas iti ced yatas evam hi hetuḥ ayam bhavet yadi śabdaḥ eva anitya tvam pratipādayet na ca idam yuktam yatas 
[565,i_565,ii]	viśeṣe bhinnam ākhyāya sāmānyasya anuvarttane na tad vyāptiḥ phalam vā kim sāmānyasya anuvarttane sarve eva hi prayogāḥ śābda nyāya anugatyā pratīyante śābdaḥ ca nyāyaḥ vidhiḥ nniṣedhaḥ niyamaḥ ca vidhiḥ api bādhakaḥ bādhyaḥ ca tathā niyamaḥ api tatra bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ sāmānya viśeṣa vidhānayoḥ tatra kadācid prathamam bādhyam kadācid bādhakam sarvathā viśeṣaḥ bādhakaḥ bādhyam sāmānya vidhānam iti vyavasthā evam eva vyavahārasya dṛṣṭa tvāt atra ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti viśeṣe śabde bhinnasya viśeṣasya vidhānam nitya tvasya anitya tvasya ca sāmānye dharmiṇi vidhānam iti bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ yathā takram kauṇḍinyāya brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadhi dīyatām iti dadhi dānam sāmānyena vṛttam takra dānena viśeṣa vihitena bādhyate prakalpya apavāda viṣaya mutsargobhinivaśate iti tasmāt sāmānya anuvarttanena tasya viśeṣa sya vyāptiḥ na ca sāmānya anuvarttanasya phalam etat vacana sāmarthyāt vacanasya sa avakāśa tvāt 
[565,iii]	yadi tu ayam arthobhipretaḥ tadā nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya tvāt iti brūyāt bhavet viśeṣayoḥ anyatra akṛtārthayoḥ eka viṣaya upanipātaḥ tathā ca sati virodhaḥ ca mūḍha tvāt evam api syāt iti ced na kaścid evam sambhavī na hi tatra eva nitya tvam vidhāya punar anitya tva vidhāyī tadā eva mūḍhaḥ sambhavati yasya ca vākya artha vyutpattiḥ api na asti na tasya vādedhikāraḥ 
[565,iv_565,v]	atha pratijñā hetu virodha udāharaṇam yathā kathañcid kalpanīyam yadi kaścid evam brūyāt tadā pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhāt pratijñā virodhaḥ doṣaḥ iti tat eṣyate eva prayogaḥ tu nityaḥ śabdaḥ anittya tvāt iti evam hi niyamāt śabdaḥ eva anittya tvam bhavet tatas nittya tva nirākaraṇe virodhaḥ atas eva āha syāt nirākaraṇam śabdaḥ sthitena eva iti atas bravīt 
[565,vi_565,vii]	ācāryaḥ āha syāt atra pratijñā arthasya nirākaraṇam hetunā yadi śabdaḥ sthitaḥ syāt śabda sthitena eva nirākaraṇam bhavet saha anavasthānāt virodhinoḥ anyatra ca pratipādanam etat iti na nirākaraṇam etat iti tasya vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta upadarśanam eva etat hetuḥ idānīm na asti iti ced āha yatra sādhya vipakṣasya varṇyate vyabhicāritā pañcamyā tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ hetuḥ tu upanayāt mataḥ 
[565,viii_565,x]	yat anityantat sarvam asarvaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti katham etat gamyate iti ced āha viruddha viṣayeni asmin badan āha anyatām śruteḥ sā ca bheda apratikṣepāt sāmānyānām na yujyate nittya tva viruddham anittya tvam śabdāt anyasmin viṣaye pratipādayan eva anya tām śabdasya āha sarvam anitya tvena vyāptam śabdaḥ ca anitya tvāt tatonyaḥ iti asarva tvam tadā asya hetoḥ anyat tva pratipādanāt sā ca anyatā asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śabdasya api sarva tvāt iti āha 
[566,i_566,iv]	sā ca bheda apratikṣepāt sāmānyānām na yujyate na hi bhedam pratyākhyāya sāmānyasya ātma lābhaḥ bhedānām eva avāntara bheda pratyākhyāna viṣaye niyata tvāt atha api syāt sarva śabdena samudāyaḥ ucyate na ca śabdaḥ eka deśaḥ samudāyaḥ tat asat evam hi pratyekam apoddhāre na kaścid sarvaḥ syāt vṛkṣaḥ na śiṃśapā eva iti dṛśyate bheda pratikṣepaḥ tat asat 
[566,v_566,vii]	vṛkṣaḥ na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacid sarva śruteḥ eka vṛttiḥ nniṣedhaḥ syāt na tāvatā saḥ sarvaḥ sarva bhedān ām a tattve tad asambhavāt atha vivakṣātaḥ śabdaḥ eva ekaḥ sarvaḥ tathā sati śabda paryāyaḥ asarva śabdaḥ iti pratijñā artheka deśa asiddha tā bhavet anittyaḥ śabda udhvani tvāt itya ādi vat 
[566,viii]	nanu śabdasya dhvani tvam katham asiddham na hi sva rūpa abhāve kaścid sambhavati na sva rūpeṇa dharmi tvena asiddhaḥ hetu tvena asiddha tvāda siddhaḥ ucyate hetu tvam hi bhede sati bhavati na anyathā kutas jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ bhedasya avaśyambhāvi tvāt na hi śabdaḥ śabdena jñāpyate asiddhatvāt jñāpyasya na ca asiddham asiddhena sādhyate atha siddhaḥ śabdaḥ tathā api na sādhyate na hi siddham siddhena sādhyate 
[566,ix_566,x]	nanu sādhya sādhanayoḥ ekatvam na iṣyate dharmi sādhanayoḥ puna rabhede kaḥ virodhaḥ asti virodhaḥ śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti ukte na samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ syāt nanu sāmarthyāt śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti na samudāya tva vyāghātaḥ na hi śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti vacane anyatra anittya tā pratīyate kevalā vā na hi dhūma tvāt agnimān dhūmaḥ na bhavati bhavati tatra sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena bheda bhāvāt iha api yadi evam kriyate nityaḥ śabda tvāt ayam go śabda vat iti tadā bhavati eva hetuḥ iha punar sarvaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ śabda tvāt iti na sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ 
[566,xi_566,xii]	nanu kim śabda tvasya dharmi tve sādhana tvam virudhyate yadi pratibandhaḥ katham na sādhana tvam atha api na asti tathā asatyanaikāntika tvam eva atas ca na asiddha tā nāma doṣaḥ asādhāraṇa tvena anaikāntika tvāt tasmāt dharmiṇaḥ hetu bhāvinaḥ na aikāntika tā eva doṣaḥ na asiddha tā atha punar nnirddiśyamāna tā yogaḥ na siddhaḥ iti āsiddhaḥ ucyate nahi kiñcid bhinnam asti yat punar pratipādyam tatra śabdaḥ nittyaḥ śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti vā vaktavyam 
[566,xiii_567,i]	nanu ubhayam na etat asti anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti ukte hetu antaram apekṣyate tad nirāsāya śabda tvāt iti etat punar ucyate śabda tvāt nāśitā iti atra dharmi antara nirākṛtau śabda śabda prayogasya punar sāmarthya saṅgatiḥ yadi śabda tvāt anittyaḥ iti ucyeta dharmmantara apekṣā syāt anittyaḥ śabdaḥ iti ca hetu antara apekṣā tad nirākaraṇāya ubhayatra upādānam iti na doṣaḥ 
[567,ii_567,v]	atra ucyate yadi śabda tva sāmarthyam hetu antaram anarthakam atha āsāmarthyam asya asti punar uktena tena kim tasmāt punar nnirddeśe yat vivakṣitam tat atra na asti iti asiddha tā eva doṣaḥ ananvaya doṣaḥ eva kasmāt atra na ucyate bhavatu samuccayena asau api doṣaḥ aniyata kathāyām niyata kathā āyāntu parājita parājaya ābhāḥ vā t paryanuyojya apekṣaṇāt ca na yuktaḥ tasmāt ayuktaḥ eva dharmī svadharma sādhane na śaktaḥ ced avivāda prasaṅa gaḥ tathā ca hetu vaiyarthyam syāt tena 
[567,vi_567,vii]	jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ bhedāt dharmiṇaḥ hetu bhāvinaḥ asiddheḥ jñāpaka tvasya dharmya siddhiḥ sva sādhane jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ hi bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tad abhāve hetu tvam asiddham na hi prakāśa tayā pradīpaḥ prakāśayan tad rūpa apratipattau sva artha kriyā nirvarttana samarthaḥ bhede ca jñāpakaḥ jñāpya jñāpanam vidhatte na ca atra bhedaḥ dharmi rūpāt tatas jñāpaka tva asiddheḥ asiddhaḥ anvaya asiddheḥ api jñāpakatva asiddhiḥ iti ced na bhede sati anvaya cintā syāt atra tu bhedaḥ eva na asti iti tāvatā doṣavat tve konvaya cintāyām vyāpāraḥ tasmāt dharmī sva sādhane asiddhaḥ 
[567,viii_567,ix]	nanu dīpa ādayaḥ sva sādhane siddhāḥ eva sattyam siddhāḥ na tu parokṣam aparokṣāḥ sādhayanti iti viṣama aupanyāsaḥ na hi pra dīpa darśane svarūpe vivādaḥ atra tu śabda darśane api anittyatāyām vivādaḥ eva yaditva vivādaḥ pratyakṣa siddha tā eva śabda tva vat eva bhavet dharma dharmi vivekasya sarva bhāveṣu asiddhitaḥ sarvatra doṣaḥ tulyaḥ ced na samvṛtyāḥ viśeṣataḥ 
[567,x]	nanu kṛtaka tva śabda tvayoḥ api pradīpa vat eva pratyakṣa siddha tvam atha dharma bheda kalpanena bhedāt sādhya sādhana abhāvaḥ pradīpe api samānam etat tatra api pradīpasya svarūpam iti kalpanā bheda usti eva na samvṛtyā bhedāt pradīpasya svarūpam iti atra api yathā bheda kalpanā tathā na sādhanam sa vyapāra nirvyāpāḥ rā vasthāyām pradīpa vyapadeśaḥ svarūpam iti tu svarūpa mātram eva tatra artha kriyā kāri tvāt svarūpam svarūpāt artha kriyā iti pradīpaḥ tu dharmī nirvyāpārasya tu svarūpam eva na asti vivakṣita artha kriyā yā bhāvāt avyāpāra tā iti na yuktam atiprasaṅgāt na ca evam vacane na kaścid arśa ssidhyati bheda kalpanā ced na sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena api tad siddheḥ tasmāt na dharmī svarūpasya sādhanam bheda abhāvāt kṛtaka tvānittya tva śabdānām tu vyāvṛtti kṛtosya iva bhedaḥ tathā hi 
[567,xi_568,i]	ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam konyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate ekaḥ hi artha ātmā sa pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkṛtaḥ tatas kim aparamasya parīkṣyam nanu dharmi mātram pratyakṣa siddham nānittya tva ādi kaḥ dharmaḥ iti ced na anittya tvena saha ekatvāt na hi anittya tvam nāma tasmāt aparam
