[568,ii_568,v]	anittya tva paratve hi śabda dharmi grahaḥ katham kāla antara vyāpitayā ita rathā ced asat dvayam kāla antara vyāpi yadi nittya tvena parigrahaḥ pramā antara sahasre api na anityat tva grahaḥ tathā pratyakṣa pratipanne hi pramāṇa antarataḥ katham nirākriyā syāt pratyakṣa mūlam sarvam pramāṇa antaram karkaṭaka sadharmāṇaḥ hi janaka bhakṣāḥ rāja putrāḥ eva na pramāṇa bhūtāḥ pratyayāḥ pratyakṣañca pramāṇam pradhānam sarva pramāṇānām tat kim mahākālaḥ eva ḍākinībhiḥ bhakṣyate 
[568,vi_568,viii]	atha pratyakṣeṇa na nittya tvam na anittya tvam pratīyate sva rūpa mātra kantena mīyate sarva vastunaḥ nittya tvam anittya tvam vā pāścātya pramāṇa avalambanam nanu anittya tvam svabhāva bhūtam katham agṛhītam nāma nittya tvam hi vitata kāla kalā vyā pitvam viparyayeṇa anittya tvam nittya tva grahaṇam tatra bhāvasya vyāpita agrahe sā ced na gṛhyate prāptam anittya tvasya vedanam 
[568,ix]	yadā eva bhāvānām kāla antara vyāpitā na pratīyate tadā eva anittya tā pratītiḥ parisphuṭā sā vyāpitā eva na pratīyate na tu anittya tvam iti ced kim idam anittya tvam nāma tasya evo pādhi bhūtam nāma antaram tadā eva tat asti atha vā paścāt tadā eva tat asti iti ced kasmāt adhyakṣeṇa na pratīyate apratīyamānam kathantadātma bhūtantat tādātmyena pratīyamānam hi tad ātma bhūtam sambandhi tayā hi pratīyamānam tat avaśyam eva bhavet apratīyamānam tu tad samānam ayuktam tathā api paścāt tad sambandhi tayā pratīyate iti ced 
[568,x_568,xii]	upalabdhi lakṣaṇa āptam yat na pratyakṣeṇa mīyate tadā tat asti iti katham abhāvaḥ na anyathā gatiḥ yatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptena upalambhaḥ tat eva asat iti vyavasthāpyate na aparaḥ prakāraḥ abhāva sādhane tathā ca uktam siddham pramāṇaiḥ vadatām arthāt eva viparyayāt iti atha bhrāntiḥ asau tena anupalambhe api adoṣaḥ 
[568,xiii]	sarvatra dharmi grahaṇe yadi bhrāntiḥ pravarttate dharmi pramāṇa abhāve hi pramāṇam anumā katham asiddha dharmi sambandhaḥ katham hetuḥ prasiddhi bhāj pratyakṣam anumānañca pramāṇam na bhavet yadā tadā prameya sidghiḥ syāt iti vijñaptimātrakam yadā pratyakṣataḥ bhāvi bhūta rūpa aparigrahaḥ tadā pratyakṣatas siddha dharmi sambandha sambhave hetoḥ anumiteḥ siddhiḥ bhāvi bhūtasya vastunaḥ 
[568,xvii_568,xviii]	tadā adhyakṣa itara arthasya prasiddhiḥ sa nibandhanā yadi tu bhāvi bhūta rūpayoḥ ekatā iṣyate tadā pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddheḥ anumāna vaiyarthya bhrānti sadbhāve sarva apahāri lopaḥ eva iti na kiñcat bhavet tasmāt anittya tva nnittya tvam vā pratyakṣa siddham eva atha na pratyakṣa siddha tā dharma tvāt dharmi mātram eva hi pratyakṣa siddham anyathā anumāna abhāvāt sarva dharma prasiddheḥ pratyakṣa te eva 
[569,i_569,iii]	tat asat yatas pratyakṣataḥ hi dharmasya prasiddhau dharmi siddha tā na śuddha dharmi mātrasya pratyakṣam api sādhanam na khalu dharma vinākṛtaḥ kvacid dharmī prasiddhi bhāj śabda tvena padārtha tvena ca avaśyam parigrahāt tatas yathā śabda tva ādi grahaṇan tathā nittya tva ādeḥ api na tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
[569,iv_569,viii]	nanu kasyacid vyabhicāriṇaḥ dharmasya yadi na pratyakṣeṇa kaḥ iva atra doṣaḥ tat yathā sthāṇu puruṣa tvayoḥ sthāṇu tvam puruṣa tvañca vinā draṣṭum hi śakyate ūrdhva tā mātrakam vyāpi itara tvāt na vinā artha dhīḥ na hi vyāpītarattvam parityajya grahītum śakyam tat eva tasya rūpam tat ced na gṛhītam agṛhītam eva tat nanu dīrgham dīrgha tvenā parigṛhyamāṇam api dṛśyate eva na tatra avayayasya eva dṛṣṭeḥ tasya ca na sā dīrgha tā avayavinaḥ hi sā dīrgha tā sa ca anumāna gamya stathā hi calati ekatra calati samastam iti gamyate tat ekam iti tena idam eka tvam anumānataḥ 
[569,ix]	ekasmin ākṛṣyamāṇe avayave sarva avayava samāhāraḥ eva ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ upalabhyate tad anyena saha ekam iti na ca tad anumānam paraspara sambandhaḥ eva tathā anumīyate na eka tvam na ca asau anumāna viṣayaḥ pratyakṣa apravarttane hi na para pramāṇa viṣayaḥ bhavet na khalu tat eva dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭañca ghaṭate tasmāt kāla vyāpya vyāpi vā tat pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhyate na asau anumāna viṣayaḥ tatra yadi asya tena rūpeṇa na pratyakṣa viṣaya tā na tasya tada rūpam na khalu nīlatvena viṣayīkṛtam adhya kṣataḥ pīta ādikam kāla antara avyāpitayā gṛhītam tathā eva tat iti mantavyam anyathā sakala kāla kalā kalāpa saṃkalane tadā eva sakalam parisamāptam iti tadā eva sakala kāla karttavya artha kriyā prasaṅgaḥ kāla kalānām bhāvi bhūtānām agrahaṇena tathā iti ced tad grahaṇe tat vyāpitā api na gṛhyate eva iti tad kāla mātra sambandhi tā eva gṛhyate iti prāptam tathā ca vidyut ādi vat anittyaḥ eva 
[569,x]	nanu viduda ādīnām vināśe satya nittya tā na tad kāla sambandhi tā mātreṇa nanu vināśakasya kasyacid abhāvāt katham vināśaḥ megha avaṣṭambhāt eva vināśaḥ iti ced iha api samāna asamāna jātīya avaṣṭambhaḥ iti kinneṣyate tasmāt vidyudaḥ api uttara kālānupalambhaḥ eva vināśaḥ sa ca sarva padārthānām iti na nittya tā grahītum śakyā 
[569,xi_570,i]	nanu uttara kālam api ghaṭa ādīnām grahaṇe katham agrahaṇam ucyate na tasya eva agrahaṇāt na khalu pūrva kālaḥ api gṛhyate kim punar tad kāla bhāva abhāvaḥ na khalu kaścid muhūrtta diva samāsa ādikaḥ kālaḥ pratyakṣa pramāṇa prasiddhau rūpa ādi padārtha vyatirekī na prathama divase māsa pratītiḥ nna prathama yāme divasa ādi pratītiḥ na dvitīye tadā pūrvasya uttarasya ca apratīteḥ smaraṇena pratyeṣyate eva kālaḥ divasādiḥ iti ced na smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt na hi smaraṇam apūrva artha vidhāyi 
[570,ii]	pratyakṣa pūrvakam smārttanna apratyakṣa artha gocaram pratyakṣeṇa ca māsa ādeḥ na kālasya parigrahaḥ tad samahāra rūpa tvam kālasya yadi bhaṇyate samāhāra grahena asti pramāṇam iti sādhitam aneka adhyakṣa siddha tva at na asiddhiḥ iti ced matam aneka adhyakṣa siddhiḥ kim kenacid śakya sādhanā smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvam prāk eva pratipāditam sāṃvṛtam smaraṇa āyātam na tu tad pāramārthikam kālasya sāṃvṛta tve ca tat byāptiḥ sāṃvṛtī sphuṭam tasmāt anitya tā bhāva svabhāvaḥ iti gamyatām yadi svabhāvaḥ eva asau bhedaḥ syāt sāṃvṛtaḥ katham saṃvṛtiḥ nirupādānāḥ na sādhyam na ca sādhanam sambandha sambhavāt eva sādhya sādhanayoḥ sthitiḥ na hi sambandha sadbhāva virahe sādhya sādhane 
[570,ix_570,x]	atra ucyate vyāvṛttam ekatonekam eka rūpeṇa kalpanā viṣayīkurute tena dharmi dharma vyavasthitiḥ vyāvṛttiḥ sarva bhāvānām sajātīya itara arthataḥ pratyakṣa pratyaya grāhyā kalpanā mātra tonvayaḥ sa vikalpam adhyakṣam akṣa vyāparataḥ yadi pūrva aparatvena adhyakṣam sahabhāve api na anvayaḥ yena prathamatas dṛṣṭam ekam eva tad anvaye na tasya bhāsate aśeṣa vyakti bhāsa prasaṅgataḥ dūra tāditayā vyakteḥ abhāsanam iti sthitau vyakti agrahe na tat vyāpi sāmānya grahaṇam bhavet 
[570,xv_570,xviii]	pūrva vyakti grahaṇa saṃskārāt vyaktyātare tathā grahaṇam iti ced na etat asti yatas saṃskāra smaraṇe hetuḥ tad vastu grahaṇa āhitaḥ vyakti grahaṇa saṃskārāt katham artha antare vidaḥ vyakti grahaṇa kṛtaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ tatra eva smaraṇa vijñāna hetuḥ nna apūrva artha darśanasya na ca pūrva artha darśanasya na api adṛṣṭa smaraṇasya artha antarañca sāmānyam vyaktibhyaḥ tat katham adṛṣṭasya tasya smaraṇam api na ca pūrva apara artha smaraṇa darśanāt spaṣṭa itara ākāra vyakti rūpam antareṇa aparam vibhāvayāmaḥ darśane hi dvayoḥ parisphuṭa ākāra vyatirekeṇa na apara ākāra pratītiḥ vyakti dvayam eva hi tatra pratibhāsate samāna ākāra pratyaya sambhavāt pratibhāsate iti ced tat asattyam pratibhāsā unumānena sādhyaḥ iti abhibhāṣitam kuḍya ādi pratibhāsaḥ kim anumānena sādhyate 
[570,xix^1]	yadi pratibhāsaḥ prāgbhāvī vismṛtaḥ tadā tad smaraṇāya anumānamucyeta anyaḥ vā yatnaḥ kriyeta na tu pratibhāsana kāle eva na hi kuḍya ādi pratibhā sonumānena sādhyaḥ kuḍya ādayaḥ vā na hi yatas kuḍya ākāraḥ pratibhāsaḥ tatas kuḍyam asti pratibhāsate vā iti loka pratītiḥ api tu para rūpa viviktena svena rūpeṇa yatas paśyāmi iti tatosti pratibhāsate vā na ca vyakti rūpa vivekinā rūpeṇa sāmānyavabhāsanam na khalu sāmānyasya varṇṇa saṃsthāna antara tva mupalakṣayāmaḥ varṇṇa saṃsthāna bāhyam eva sāmānyasya rūpam iti ced na tarhi sāmānyam asti varṇṇa saṃsthāna bāhyasya bāhyasya abhāvāt vyāpitā eva tasya rūpam iti ced yat tarhi varṇṇa saṃsthāne na asamānam asamānam eva tat na hi vyāpitā varṇṇa saṃsthānavatī varṇṇa saṃsthānasya eva vyāpitā iti ced yadi vyāpitā vyāpitayā eva pratīyeta kāla antare pratīyate eva iti ced na 
[570,xix^2_571,ii]	vyakti sattva asattvayoḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt vinaṣṭe api pūrva viśeṣe tathā eva pratīteḥ na ca avināśaḥ pūrvasya tatra upalabdheḥ katham vināśaḥ iti ced yadi naṣṭam katham pūrvatra na upalabhyate pareṇa te na vā vyāpitāyāḥ abhāvāt iti ced upalabhyate eva tat rūpam deśa vyāpti mātrakam eva apratītam tirodhānāt kim idam tirodhānam adṛśya ātma tā kathandṛśyasya adṛśya ātma tā deśa antare dṛśya ātma tā eva atītau na padārthaḥ iti ced dṛśya ātma tā vyatirekeṇa na padārthaḥ iti nirṇṇītam etat kiñca deśa antare dṛśyamāna tā vināśe vyāpitā eva vinaṣṭā bhavet tathā ca na nittyam sāmānyam tathā ca vyakti rūpam eva na sāmānyam iti āyātam vyakti vyatiriktasya samāna ākārasya pratyaya mātra tvena avastu tvāt pratyayaḥ tarhi samānāḥ ete iti katham varṇṇa saṃsthāna kriyā kṛtena samāna tvena samāna tvāt evam iti adoṣaḥ rāṣṭra kūṭa ādi samāna tāvat api ca yaḥ evam āha samāna kāra pratyaya nibandhanam sāmānyam iti eka artha kriyā kṛtaḥ samāne pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati tad eka kāraṇa kṛtaḥ vā na samāna rūpa kṛtaḥ brāhmaṇa ādi samāna tāvat 
[571,iii]	nanu brāhmaṇa ādi jātīm antareṇa katham puṇya pāpa vyavasthā jāti sadbhāve api katham na hi jātiḥ hanyate na api pivati madyam na ca puṇya pāpa vyavasthā āgamāt anyatas pramāṇa dasti saḥ eva āgamaḥ katham pratipādayet iti na hi brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti jātim antareṇa śakyam pratipādayitum prativyakti pratipādanā sambhavāt upadeśāt samāna kāra parāmarṣāḥ rśā dva iti na doṣaḥ samāna para amarṣaḥ ca anādi vāsanā upadeśāt eva na tad vyatirekeṇa aparam atra pramāṇa prasiddham api ca 
[571,iv_571,vi]	samāna pratyayaḥ vyakti vyatirikta śarīra vat atha anyathā iti jñātavyam anyathā andha viceṣṭitam viśeṣa vyatirikta ātma vedanat na prasiddhi bhāj tat anyathā tu samvittau na prameya astitā satī yadi vyakti vyatirikta ākāra saṅgataḥ samāna pratyayaḥ sa tathā na siddhaḥ iti katham tatas prasiddhiḥ sāmānyasya atha pratyaya mātram tadā na sidhyati sāmānyam na hi pratyaya mātrāt artha viśeṣa siddhiḥ yat ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ saḥ eva tatas sidhyati anyathā atiprasaṅga bhinna abhinnam sāmānyam iti ced na paraspara virodhāt tathā hi 
[571,vii_571,xiii]	bhinnāt anyat abhinnañcet bhinna tā asya punar katham bheda avabhāsane bhinnam abheda usya katham punar kenacid bhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ ced sāmānyam syāt tat eva hi ananyatā punar tasya na syāt atyanta bhedataḥ anyena abhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ ced bhinna abhinnat na tat tadā tena eva abhedita āyāntu tat punar syāt sahasradhā tata upakṛṣyam āṇan tan na syāt eva kṣayam gatam bhinna abhinnam yadi bhavet dṛśya adṛśyam prasajyate dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭam bhavet ekam iti jātam mahādbhūtam dṛśya adṛśya tayā vastu sat asattva prasiddhitaḥ tathā hi eka tvam prāptam evam hi mṛtasya api amṛta ātma tā tasmāt kalpita rūpa tvam sāmānyasya iti gṛhyatām tatas vyāvṛtti bhedena bhinna tvam dharma dharmiṇoḥ sa yatra na asti tatra eva pratijñā artha eka deśa tā 
[572,i_572,iii]	parama artha vicāreṣu tathābhūtā aprasiddhitaḥ tattva anyat tvam padārtheṣu sāmvṛteṣu niṣedhyate samvṛti sat sāmānyam vyaktitaḥ bhinnam eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām vibhāvanāt tat ca varṇṇa ādi rūpam eva tathā hi yadi vyakti atirekeṇa na varṇṇa ādi vyavasthitam vyakti antara gatan na syāt iti bheda vyavasthitiḥ vyāvṛttam anuvṛttañca na abhinnam iti yuktimat tatas kalpanāya asiddha bheda tā dharma dharmiṇoḥ akṣataḥ tu na bhedasya grahaṇantena tattvataḥ pratyakṣataḥ ca siddhasya pāramārthika tā yatas pratyakṣa pūrvakam yatra anumānañca pravarttate tatas sādhana rūpasya saṃvṛti sthita bhāvanā tattvena tu na tasya staḥ tattva anyat tve pramā anvite kalpanā mātrataḥ bhede tattvataḥ vyakti rūpa tā tena pratyakṣatas siddhā vyaktiḥ eva pratīyatām pratyakṣa pūrva katvā cca anumānataḥ vyakti sādhanam tasmāt parantu sāmānyam yadi siddhyet na bheda vid tatas na bhede vṛttiḥ syāt bhedānām asamāptitaḥ 
[572,x]	tathā hi yadi sāmānyam pratīyate tadā bheda an ullekhe bhedena syāt eva vṛttiḥ nānirūpite kaścid pravarttate atha vyakti darśana puraḥsara sāmānya grahaṇe tad sambandha grahaṇam iti yatra sāmānyam tatra vyaktyā bhavitavyam iti bhede vṛttiḥ tat eva bhedam pratiyataḥ katham bhavati tatas sāmānyāt anumāna pratītiḥ vyakti pratipattiḥ iti prāptam tathā ca anumita anumānataḥ vyakti pratītiḥ iti punar tatra api sāmānya pratītiḥ tatas api sāmānyāt apara vyakti sāmānya pratītiḥ iti anavasthā atha api ante vyaktim pratyeti tathā sati viśeṣa abhāvāt ādau eva pratyetu kim paramparā pariśrameṇa vyakti pratipattau ca sarva artha kriyā prasiddhiḥ iti na pravaratteta eva tasmāt buddhi viracitam eva sāmānyam na bāhyam iti yuktam 
[572,xi_572,xii]	nanu buddhi rūpa pratipattau api katham bāhyaḥ vṛttiḥ evam eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva dṛṣṭeḥ asmākam api tarhi sāmānya pratīteḥ vyaktau vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya atra api tulya tvāt tat etata prāpya harītakīm devatā virecayati iti prāptam yadi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva kim antarga rḍunā sāmānyena tasmāt 
[572,xiii_573,ii]	saṃvṛtisat sarva sāmānyam iti gṛhyatām vastu sāmānya bhāve hi na vṛttiḥ nna nivarttanam sāmānyam abhyupagacchatā vyakti pratītiḥ abhyupagantavyā anyathā pravṛtti abhāvāt vyakti pratītau tatas eva liṅgāt dhūma ādikādaḥ tu kim sāmānyena sāmānyatas api liṅga bhūtāt eva tasya pratītiḥ atha vyakti antareṇa saha na sambandhaḥ liṅga vyakteḥ sāmānyasya tu vyāpi tvāt asti iti sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ tat etat asat vyāpi tve api hi sāmānyam tathā eva grahaṇe sati vyakti antarasya gamakam katham iṣyeta tattvataḥ 
[573,iii]	yadi api vyāpi sāmānyam tathā api tasya anumāna kāla bhāvinaḥ vyāpyasya agrahaṇe kathantasya vyāpakam iti gṛhyeta agṛhīta sambandhāt ca pratītau ati prasaṅgaḥ sāmānya antara vyakteḥ api pratīti prasaṅgāt atha tayā na sambandha ddha miti pratyucyeta agra hīta sambandhasya api tarhi pratītiḥ syāt api ca katham idam jñātavyam iti prāk pratipāditam api ca yadi sāmānyāt vyakti pratītiḥ śabdāt api sāmānyam pratīyate tatas kim vyakti avāptiḥ nna bhavet asattyā asau pratītiḥ iti ced sarvā tarhi sāmānya pratītiḥ asattyeti kim sāmānyena 
[573,iv_573,vii]	nanu sarvatra sāmānyam asti eva vyakti apratīteḥ tu na samvādaḥ vyaktīnām eva artha kriyā sāmarthyāt sāmānyena tu vinā na śakyā pratyetum iti sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ vyakti apratītiḥ tu tad sambandha ddha liṅga abhāvāt nanu liṅgataḥ api sāmānyam eva pratyeyam tatra ced vyakti pratītiḥ kin na sarvatra sāmānya mātram eva śabdena pratyāyyate liṅgāt tarhi vyaktiḥ api pratīyate iti prāptam tathā ca prāktanaḥ doṣaḥ atha api syāt vyatiriktam sāmānyam doṣavat ubhaya rūpa tve hi adoṣaḥ tat api asat vyaktaiḥ pratīti doṣaḥ kim pakṣetra api na sambhavī tatas api hi na sāmānyāt vyakteḥ asparśataḥ gatiḥ 
[573,ix]	sāmānyam hi yadi vyakti vyatirikta avyatiriktam iṣyata tadā api vyakteḥ pratītiḥ anyathā vā iti dvayīm gatim na ativarttante pratipattāraḥ pratītiḥ ced sakala anubhava sambhavāt kim iti pravarttate na ced pratītiḥ katham pravarttanam pratītam api apratītim iti pravarttanam iti ced tat eva tena eva rūpeṇa pratipanna apratipannam iti vyāhatam vidhi niṣedhayoḥ eka niṣparyāye dvayoḥ ātma lābha abhāvāt atas eva paryāyāṇām bhedaḥ iti ced kenacid paryāyeṇa bhinnam pratītam apareṇa na iti samayaḥ yena na pratītam tad artham katham pravarttanam tasya eva paryāyaḥ iti ced apratīta tve katham tasya eva iti pratītiḥ pratīte pi na pravarttate iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ tatas samvṛti sat eva dharmi dharma lakṣaṇam evantarhi anittyaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt iti atra api syāt yasya vyatiriktam sāmānyam tasya kasmāt na bhavati apratijñā artha eka deśa tvam tad sāmānya yogasya dharmi śabdena eva pratipādanāt iha api tarhi vyāvṛtteḥ pratipādanāt na bhaviṣyati 
[573,x_573,xii]	sāmānya yogaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ anyasmāt tasya vā gatiḥ sāmānya yogaḥ tad bittim vinā na eva pravarttate tad rūpasya pratītiḥ tu prāk eva vinivāritā tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva atra śabdataḥ saṃpratīyate yadi sāmānya yogaḥ śabdataḥ viśeṣāṇām pratīyate iti abhyupagamaḥ sa tarhi katham vyakti apratītau pratīyate yasya eva bhojanam tasya eva bhagna bhāṇaḍa bāgitā svarūpantu viśeṣāṇām na pratipādana arham iti prāk eva nirṇṇīta tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti sthitiḥ 
[574,i_574,iii]	nanu vyāvṛttiḥ api vyāvṛtta vastu pratītim antareṇa katham pratīyate yadi pratīyate kim vyāvṛttyā anyathā anupapattyā tarhi vyāvṛtti kalpanā iti kin na sāmānya abhyupagamaḥ prati iti anusāreṇa abhyupagamaḥ iti na sāmānyasya nanu kim aham vyāvṛttim pratipadye iti lokasya pratītiḥ vilakṣaṇa tva pratīteḥ pratītiḥ eva iti na doṣaḥ tathā hi yadi anīpsita bhedena na pratīyeta śabdataḥ tat vastu na vibhāgena pravarttana samāgamaḥ 
[574,iv]	avaśyam hi vijātīya vilakṣaṇena rūpeṇa pratipattyā bhāvyam anyathā anabhipreta parihāreṇa na pravartteta sāmānya lakṣaṇāt eva tasya anabhipreta vilakṣaṇa tā iti ced svayam atathā bhūte katham dharma antara yoge api tathā abhāvaḥ tad yogāt asya tathā pratītiḥ iti ced atadbhūtasya anya yoge sva rūpeṇa apratīyamānasya pratītiḥ eva na yuktā sva rūpeṇa ced vilakṣaṇa tva gatiḥ vyarthakaḥ tarhi sāmānya yogaḥ saḥ eva bhedaḥ na lakṣyeta yadi sāmānyat na bhavet sāmānyānām tarhi kutas bheda upalakṣaṇam sāmānya antara yoge avasthā svarūpataḥ eva upalakṣaṇe vyaktīnām api saḥ eva prasaṅgaḥ iti vyarthakam sāmānyam dvayoḥ ca yadā bheda pratītiḥ tadā katam na hi akatra sāmānyam varttate tasmāt avaśyam anena vyaktīnām bhedaḥ pratyetavyaḥ sa ca vijātīyāt bhedaḥ sarveṣām eva iti tat eva sāmānyam 
[574,v_574,xii]	nanu jātim antareṇa saḥ eva sajātīya vijātīya bhedaḥ katham tathā hi vyakteḥ parasparam bhede sāmānyam na parasparam vyakti bhedaḥ bhavet eva tasya na asti pratīta tā vyakti apekṣayā bhede yathā śāvaleya vāhuleyayoḥ karkād bhedaḥ tathā karkaśa āvaleyayoḥ api vā āhuleyāt iti tayoḥ api samāna jātita aprasaṅgaḥ na sarva darśanam yena sa pvadarśī karaṇena saṃketa vyaktī karaṇe vibhāgaḥ bhavet tat etat api na yuktam na ayuktam yatas sāmānyasya api sadbhāve na doṣoyat nivāritaḥ vyakti vyaṅgyam hi sāmānyam iṣyate na svarūpataḥ vyakti śūnya pradeśa ādau tasya vyakteḥ adarśanāt vyaktiḥ eva tata upekṣyā sā ca sarvā na dṛśyate tatas tatra api saṃketa kriyā vyāptiḥ nna sidhyati 
[574,xiii]	sāmānyam api upalakṣya eva saṃketaḥ vidhātavyaḥ vyavaharttavyamvā na ca sāmānyam upalakṣyate vyaktim antareṇa sakala vyakti darśane hi niyata sāmānya darśanāt anākulaḥ saṃketaḥ bhavet tadā api vyaktīnām eva darśanāt vyarthakam eva sāmānyam tathā hi eka vyakti darśanena saṃketoyam gauḥ iti katham pratiniyata sāmānya pratītiḥ na hi paśutva ādi sāmānyeṣu kasyacid sāmānya vivekena upalakṣaṇam go tvam atra saṃketa biṣayaḥ iti ced kintadgo tvam iti na vivekaḥ katham kriyatām yat evaṃbhūta vyakti abhivyaṅgyam iti tena vyaktīnām evam bhūta tvam iti itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ tad sāmānya upalakṣaṇe vyaktīnām eka tvam vyakti ekatve ca pratīniyata sāmānya upalakṣaṇam gauḥ gauḥ iti svayam eva vivekaḥ iti ced na gauḥ iti sāmānyasya karkādiṣu avṛttyā eva upalakṣaṇāt yatra gauḥ iti
[575,i^1]	buddhiḥ tat eva go tvam iti pratītiḥ iti ced nanu avibhāvita prameya rūpā buddhiḥ katham prameyam upalakṣayet na hi varṇṇa saṃsthāna vyatiriktam asyām prameyam upalakṣayāmaḥ tat eva sāmānyam anugata tvāt iti ced na anugamasya asambhavāt na hi varṇṇasya anya vyakti anugatam rūpam eka vyakti darśane api tad anugama pratīti prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca sarva vyakti pratipattiḥ syāt vyakti vyaṅgya tvāt na sāmānyam tathā pratīyate iti ced sarvathā tarhi na pratītiḥ yāvat vyakti darśanam pratīyate iti ced na sāmānyasya tāvat mātra tva abhāvāt tathā ced sāmānyam vyaktayaḥ eva iti na sāmānyam aparam tathābhūta ajñāna jananam eva sāmānyam iti
[575,i^2]	prativacane tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam iti syāt bahūnānta danya vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam na hi tad vijātīya vyāvṛtti mātrāt aparam sāmānyam upadarśayitum śakyam vijātīyatā api tad itara vyāvṛttiḥ eva yathā eva tasmāt ekaḥ bhinnaḥ tathā parāparaḥ api iti nidarśanat na anyathā sāmānyantum na śakyam nidarśayitum idantat iti abhinna tvāt na eva nidarśanam iti na pratyuttaram tad abhāva prasaṅgāt na hi vyaktīḥ nnirasya sāmānyam vyavasthāpayitum śakyam vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt sāmānya nirāse api evam eva iti na yuktam vyavahārasyaā anya vyāvṛtti nibandhanasya api sambhavāt akarma adravya vat sāmānyānām api vyāvṛttiḥ eva parasparam vyavahāra hetuḥ 
[575,ii_575,v]	atha vyakti yogaḥ bheda vyavahāra hetuḥ parasparam sāmānyānām tathā api doṣaḥ eva yatas sva rūpeṇa na bhinnañcet anyasmāt bhidyatām katham śukla yogāt paraḥ śuklaḥ iti bhedaḥ pratīyate na khalu anyasya bhedaḥ anyatra samavaiti samavaityeva vyakti sāmānyayoḥ samavāya sambandhāt iti ced sāmānyasya abhedaḥ vyaktau samavetaḥ iti vyaktīnām eva abhinna tā tatas sarva sāmānya yogāt gauḥ api syāt aśva ādikaḥ api ca goḥ sāmānyam go tvam vyaktīnāñca svarūpam sajātīya vijātīyānām na bhidyate parasparam tatas katham vyaktayaḥ sāmānyasya bhedikāḥ 
[575,vi_575,viii]	atha svarūpāt eva bhinnāḥ vyaktayaḥ vijātīyābhyaḥ saḥ eva tarhi bhedaḥ sāmānyam astu kim apareṇa sāmānyasya abhyupagame api saḥ eva vyakti bhedaḥ sāmānyasya bhedakaḥ sāmānya antarebhyaḥ sa tarhi siddha upasthāyī sāmānya viśeṣaḥ atha sva rūpeṇa eva sāmānyam bhinnam sāmānya antarāt tad yogāt bhedaḥ sāmānyavatām yathā śuklam rūpam svayam eva paṭaḥ tu tad yogāt iti tat api na saṅgatam yatas varṇṇa rūpam sitam na eva kvacid kevalam īyate tatas tasya svayam śukla rūpa tā katham īyate dravya stham eva sarvadā sitā ādikam tatas pṛthak aparidṛśyamānam svayam eva tad rūpam iti katham pratīyate kena cit dravyāt eva sā tasya śuddha tā iti na kim matam 
[575,ix_576,i]	nanu tasya yadi dravyāt cuklatā svarūpam tarhi kintasya dravyasya api tarhi kim rūpam iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ dravyam iti eva pratīyamānam iti ced dravyam iti api varṇṇa saṃsthāna saṃsparśinī na pratītiḥ varṇṇa saṃsthānañca guṇaḥ eva iti tad aparam dravyam katham bhūtam pratīti viṣayaḥ na ca saṃsthānam api varṇṇa ādi atirikta tām svīkaroti varṇṇaḥ eva tathā varttula tvaā ādi rūpeṇa pratibhāsate 
[576,ii]	nanu dravyam api pratibhāsate eva tathā hi sparśana jñānena api saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ iti ekatayā avabhāsanam na ca guṇa mātre pratyabhijñānam anyathā rūpam sparśaḥ iti syāt na ca sparśana grāhyam rūpam yuktam tasmāt dravyaḥ eva pratyabhijñānam yuktimat tasmāt yadi atas bhinna viṣaya jñāna grāhyam tatas tat bhinnam tat yathā ghaṭāt paṭaḥ bhinna viṣaya jñāna grāhyañca dravyam iti svabhāva hetuḥ 
[576,iii_576,v]	atra ucyate na rūpa ādi vivikterthe pratyabhijñāna darśanam na hi asmarataḥ eva asti pūrva pratyaya gocaram na tāvat darśane ghaṭa ādikasya pratibhāsaḥ na api sparśa vijñāne prathamam prathamam hi avayava mātrakam eva pratibhāti tat ca para avayava abhāve api tathā eva avabhāsate na ca asau ghaṭaḥ nikhila diś vibhāga avayava vyāpinaḥ ghaṭa avayavi tvāt na api rūpa mātram ghaṭaḥ rūpa samavāyi kāraṇasya tathā vyapadeśāt pratyabhijñānasya ca tadā abhāvāt 
[576,vi_576,x]	atha apara apara avayava guṇa antara ādi pratibhāsane avayavi grahaṇam iti matiḥ tat api na asti yatas eka deśa antarasya eva tadā grahaṇa sambhave na saṃsthānau ayavinaḥ grahaṇasya asti sambhavaḥ tathā guṇa antarasya api naṣṭe api smaraṇa udayaḥ anumānāt gatiḥ yātu na apratyakṣa puraḥsarā yadā ghaṭa ādau avaya guṇa antarāṇām upalabdhiḥ tadā guṇa avayava antarāṇāḥ manupalambhe katham avayavinām na tāvat mātram ghaṭaḥ 
[576,xi]	atha smaraṇa sahāya pratyabhijñānataḥ ghaṭa ādi avayavi parijñānam tad ā avayavi guṇa antara apa uddhāre kaḥ tatra ghaṭaḥ iti api syāt aviyogaḥ tu parasparam ekasāmagrya ghīna tvāt na ca aviyoga grāhakam pramāṇam asti paraspara parihāreṇa upalambhāt aviyogaḥ tu smaraṇa pratyabhijñāna pratyaya grāhyaḥ na ca smaraṇa pratyabhijñānayoḥ pṛthak aprāmāṇye samudāyaḥ prāmāṇyam prāpnuyāt 
[576,xii]	nanu śivikā udvahane pṛthak aśaktānām anyathā śaktiḥ upalabhyate na tatra teṣām kārya jananāt tathābhūta pūrva kāraṇa janya svarūpam eva śaktiḥ na vyatiriktā iha tu smaraṇa pratyabhijñayoḥ kim kārya avayavi pratītiḥ iti ced na tad vyatirekeṇa apara pratīti abhāvāt atha prati iti antaram udeti niścaya rūpam tat asat apramāṇat niścayaḥ aniścayaḥ eva na khalva pramāṇat niścayaḥ pramāṇasya vyarthaka tā prāpteḥ 
[576,xiii_577,ii]	atha tadā anumānena avayava antara niścaye pratyabhijñāna deka tā pratīteḥ avayavi pratītiḥ na hi avayavasya avayava antareṇa eka tā guṇa antarasya vā tad antareṇa iti tat api ayuktam anumānasya pratyakṣa puraḥsara tvāt yathābhūtam tad pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam kevalan tathā bhūtam eva anumānena pratyeyam tatas kevalasya apṛthak bhūtaṃsya pratyakṣeṇa pratīteḥ tathā bhūtasya eva anumānāt api pratītiḥ tatas ca eka tvam pratyabhijñānāt anyathā dṛṣṭa vastuni pratyakṣeṇa katham yāyāt yati iti pathamāñjasam 
[577,iii]	na hi pratyakṣeṇa anyathā pratipannam pratyabhijñāna sahasreṇa api pratyetum anyathā śakyam pratyabhijñānam api pratyakṣam eva iti ced na anumāna viṣaye pravṛtteḥ tat ca anumānam aneka viṣayam pratyabhijñānam katham vyavahāra hetuḥ iti ced pramaṇa tvena eva iti vadāmahe pramāṇa tā ca anumāna tvena anumānena eva tarhi tat eka tvam tatas vayavī sattya tā bhāj prasidhyati iti naḥ pakṣa siddhiḥ na pāramārthikasya eka tvasya aprasādhanāt tad artha kriyā kāritayā eka tvam tatra iti na parama arthaḥ na ca tena eva sārtha kriyā karttavyā iti niyamaḥ agni antareṇa api dāhakasya kriyā dṛṣṭeḥ mukhya abhāvāt katham upācaritam ekatvam iti ced anādi vāsanātaḥ upacāra para paraṃpara eva eṣā iti na doṣaḥ 
[577,iv_577,v]	athavā prathamam dṛṣṭau mukhyam ekatvam ucyate tat adhyāropataḥ paścāt bhaktitortha kriyā kṛtaḥ tasmāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ apa uddhāra parikalpanātaḥ tattva anyat tve bhavataḥ na tu vāstave tattvataḥ na bhedaḥ bhedaḥ tu buddhi parikalpita apoddhārataḥ na cā sauvapa uddhāraḥ pratyakṣataḥ na api tad pūrvaka anumān ataḥ api ttu anādi vāsanā akṛta anumāna paraṃpara āgataḥ iti na parama arthaḥ asti tarhi tattva anyat tvam kasmāt pratiṣidhyate iti ced na 
[577,vi_577,ix]	parama artha vicāreṣu tathābhūta aprasiddhitaḥ tattva anyat tvam padārtheṣu sāṃvṛtteṣu niṣidhyate iti uktam na hi paramārtha tvena abhedaḥ samvṛtya eva bhedaḥ iti digamvara dararśanam api tu ubhayam parama arthaḥ iti atas eva āha anumāna anumeya artha vyavahāra sthitiḥ tu iyam bhedam pratyaya saṃsiddham avalambya prakalpyate 
[577,x_577,xiii]	syāt etat yadi na bhedaḥ katham anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ āpa uddhārika bheda bhāvāt sāṃvṛta bheda āśraya tā na hi sāṃvṛtaḥ bhedaḥ na āśrīyate paramārthikaḥ ca abhedaḥ iti kevalam samvṛti bhedena visamvādaḥ parama arthe ca na vyavahāraḥ iti ubhābhyām prayojanam tasmāt yadā yathāsvam bheda niṣṭheṣu pratyayeṣu vivekinaḥ dharmaḥ dharmāḥ ca bhāsante vyavahāraḥ tad āśrayaḥ na anyathā anumā nā divya vahāraḥ tathā ca āha sarve eva ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi nyāyena iti vyāvṛtti bhedataḥ bhedaḥ eva śaraṇam vyavahāra upanītotra saḥ eva āśliṣṭa bheda dhīḥ sādhyaḥ sādhana tām nītaḥ tena asiddhaḥ prakāśita 
[578,i^1]	na hi vyāvarttamāna bhedena vyāvṛttīnām bhedaḥ eka tvāt tasya yatas tu vyāvarttate tad bhedāt tatra aśabda vyāvṛttyā śabdaḥ dharmī akṛtaka vya āvṛttyā tu kṛtaka tvam dharmaḥ sādhāraṇā sādhāraṇa tvena bhedāt na śabda aśabda ātvayoḥ tathā tat katham bhāva pratyayaḥ bheda abhāve bhavet bhavatu vā paryāyaḥ eva syāt bhāva pratyaya vācya tvāt eva bhedaḥ iti ced na itaretara āśraya tvena doṣāt ṣaṣṭhī samarthāt bhāva pratyayaḥ bhāva pratyayāt bhede ṣaṣṭhī sambandha ta iti api ca artha nimittakena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam na śabda nimittakena arthena iti evambhūtaḥ eva asau arthaḥ yatas śabda pramāṇakāḥ vayam 
[578,i^2_578,ii]	yat śabdāḥ prāhuḥ tat asmākam pramāṇam śabda antareṇa ca pratipādyamāna usau arthaḥ nyaḥ eva evantarhi paryāyata abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt anittyaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt iti saḥ eva śabdaḥ avidya māna bheda dhīḥ sādhya dharmī san sādhana tām nītaḥ iti asiddhaḥ api ca śabda tvāt anittya tā yadi tat tarhi śabda tvam śabdaḥ iti eva pratītam kim punar uccaryate punar uccāraṇam dharma prādhāni artham iti ced na phala abhāvāt dharmi prādhānye api bhavati eva hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ yatas kṛtakaḥ iti pradīpa nyāyena tu na anumāna vyavahāraḥ tatas punaruktam nāma nigraha sthānam bheda vivakṣāyām asiddham eva iti sthitam etat bheda sāmānyayorddharma bhedāt aṅgaṅgitā tatas yathā anityaḥ prayatna utthaḥ prayatna uttha tayā dhvaniḥ 
[578,iii]	yatoyam abhede sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhinna vyāvṛttika tayā doṣaḥ tatas bheda sāmānyayoḥ vyāvṛtti bhedāt aṅga aṅgitā sādhya sādhana bhāvena na virudhyate na hi abheda bhāvī doṣaḥ saṃbhavati bheda bhāve na hi badhira doṣaḥ sa karṇṇakasya tasmāt anityaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka śabdaḥ prayatnāna tarīyaka tvāt iti na asiddhatā doṣaḥ śabda gatam hi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam dharmi śabdā śabda gatam hetuḥ iti pratipannaḥ sādhya sādhana bhedaḥ śabda gatam hi prayatna anantarīyaka tvam prayatna anantarīyaka tvaā antarāt api bhidyate sāmānya rūpeṇa tu vivakṣyamāṇam na tad antarāt bhidyate api tu aprayatna anantarīka tvāt eva tatas vyāpi tvā avyāpitayā bhedaḥ eva yathā vṛkṣa tva śiṃśapā tvayoḥ na hi avyāpya iva vyāpi bhavati tena śabda viśeṣaṇam avyāpi dharmi tad atad gatam hetuḥ vyāpi tvena bhedāt vyāpitvā abhāvena tarhi na asti śabda tvasya bhedaḥ iti soyam ananvaya doṣaḥ eva prāptaḥ atas śabda tvāt iti atra hetau ananvaya doṣaḥ eva parisphuṭaḥ na tu asiddha tā ādi doṣaḥ asiddha tāyām api ananvayi tvam eva kāraṇam iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ parisphuṭaḥ yuktaḥ 
[578,iv_578,vi]	na etat asti yatas na eṣān anvayitā doṣaḥ na asti iti etena bhaṇyate asiddha tā api doṣotra bhavati eva parisphuṭaḥ na khalu bheda abhāvāt asiddha tā abhāvaḥ tatosiddha tāyām satyām tām avakalpya para doṣa udbhāvanam na nyāyam anudhāvati hetu sambhave hi sati tad anvayāditā paricodanā gocaraḥ iti uktam tasmāt asiddha tā doṣaḥ bheda abhāve bheda tva doṣaḥ eva iti sāṃpratam manyāmahe tatas 
[578,vii_579,i]	pakṣa aṅga tve api abādha tvāt na asiddhiḥ bhinna dharmiṇi yathā aśvaḥ na viṣāṇi tvāt eṣa piṇḍaḥ viṣāṇavān yadi nāma pakṣa viśeṣaṇam viṣāṇi tvam piṇḍa antara vyavacchedāya tathā api hetu tvam na virudhyate sādhya pratibaddhaḥ hi hetuḥ tathā pratīyamānaḥ sādhya sādhakaḥ sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhya aṅga tve api na virudhyate tatas hetuḥ eva bhinna dharmiṇi dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhya kāla aṅgatāyām api 
[579,ii_579,iv]	sādhya kāla aṅga tā vā na nivṛtteḥ upalakṣya tat na khalu viśeṣaṇam viśeṣa kāla bhāvi ā iva aṅgam tat upalakṣya prāk eva nivṛtteḥ yathā katarat devadattasya gṛham yatra kākaḥ parirāraṭī iti saḥ idānīm devadatta ādi gṛham upalakṣya nivṛttaḥ api tad upalakṣayati eva kāla antaraḥ api nanu avidyamānaḥ katham upalakṣaṇam tad phalāyāḥ viśeṣa niṣṭāyāḥ buddheḥ sambhavāt tasmāt upalakṣaṇan na pratijñā artha eka deśa tayā asiddha tā doṣa bhāgī yadi tarhi bhinna dharmiṇi sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena bhedān na pratijñā artha eka deśa asiddha tā doṣaḥ abhinna dharmiṇī eva doṣaḥ iti prāptā śrāvaṇa tva ādeḥ api pratijñā artha eka deśa tā kṛtaka tvānittya tvayoḥ ca samāna vyāptikayoḥ 
[579,v_579,viii]	na sat etat yatateḥ viśeṣa upa pratijñā arthaḥ dharma bhedāt na yujyate na kevalam viṣāṇi tvāt iti evam ādikaḥ viśeṣaḥ api asādhāraṇaḥ api śrāvaṇa tva ādikaḥ na bhavati dharma bhedāt eva nanu yatas eva aśabdāt vyāvṛttyā śabda tvam tāvat mātrakāt eva śrāvaṇa tvam tathā ca āha śrotra grahaṇa lakṣaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat katham asati vyāvṛtti bhede dharma bhedaḥ iti 
[579,ix_579,xi]	tat asata yasmāt paraspara antarbhāve hi dharma bhedaḥ na yukti bhāj artha antara abhisaṃvaṃdhā sambandhe hi viveki tā śravaṇa jñāna sambandhāt asambandhāt eva vyāvarttanam śrāvaṇa tvam śabda tvantu aśabda sāmānyāt eva vyāvṛttiḥ yadi api śābdaḥ na asti aśrāvaṇaḥ tathā api sāmagrya bhāvāt aśrāvaṇaḥ api puruṣa antara apekṣayā bhavet aśabdaḥ tu na puruṣa antara apekṣayā api iti na aśrāvaṇa tva vyāvṛttiḥ śabda tvam śrāvaṇa tvam eva tathā bhavet na śabda tvam tasya śrāvaṇa aśrāvaṇa asādhāraṇa tvāt 
[579,xii]	etena yat ācārya vacanam nanu dṛṣṭaḥ saṃghātānām pārārthyam saṃghāta tvāt saṃskṛtam anittyam saṃskṛta tvāt iti pratijñā artheka deśaḥ hetuḥ na atra sarve saṃghātāḥ saṃskṛtam vā pratijñā arthaḥ api tu cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ tat eka deśaḥ ca dṛṣṭānta abhāva prasaṅgāt atha punar śabda tvam asādhāraṇam syāt śakyam evam bhavitum pratijñā arthasya hi asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ śrāvaṇa tvam asādhāraṇam yuktam na tu śabdasya anyat śabda tvam asti iti asiddha tvam eva hetu doṣam tad uktam uktam pakṣa lakṣaṇam 
[579,xiii_580,iii]	hetu lakṣaṇam ucyate tatra ca pakṣa dharmaḥ yatas hetuḥ tad ābhāsāsāḥ ca bhūyasā tasmāt tat vistaraḥ pūrva hetu ādi arthāta pradarśyate sa pakṣe san asat dvedhā pakṣa dharmaḥ punar tridhā pratyekam asapakṣe api sat asat dvividha tvataḥ nanu hetu lakṣaṇam eva vaktavyam yaḥ san sajātīyaḥ iti ādikam hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇañca kimartham pakṣa dharma vistara nirddeśaḥ hetuḥ hetvābhāsaḥ vā prāyaśas pakṣa dharmaḥ eva tatas vivekena hetu hetu ābhāsa lakṣaṇasya spaṣṭa nirdeśa artham ādau prabheda nirddeśaḥ tathā sati ayam pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ ayam viruddhaḥ ayam anaikāntikaḥ iti sukhena ākhyāyate gṛhyate ca atas eva āha 
[580,iv_580,v]	pakṣa dharma prabhedena sukha grahaṇa siddhaye hetu prakāraṇa arthasya sūtra saṃkṣepa aucyate pakṣa dharma prabhedena yaḥ saṃkṣepaḥ ucyate sa sukha grahaṇa artham hetu prakaraṇa arthasya eva hetu prakaraṇa arthaḥ hetu hetu ābhāsa lakṣaṇa nirddeśaḥ tad arthaḥ hetu hetvābhāsa tvam atas eva hetvābhāsāt pūrvam iti uktam hetuḥ ca ābhāsaḥ ca hetvābhāsam ābhāsaḥ ca pratyāsatteḥ hetvābhāsaḥ eva nābhāsa mātram 
[580,vi_580,viii]	nanu ca dharmi dharma mātra tayā upasaṃhriyamāṇaḥ dharmaḥ sādhanam na pakṣa dharma tayā asti ca atra pradeśe vana gahana ādau dhūmaḥ iti dharmi mātre pradarśanāt na ca dharmi mātram pakṣaḥ na hi dharmī sādhyaḥ tasya siddha tvāt dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī anumeyaḥ iti vacanāt sa yam etat samudāya artha sādhya tvāt dharma mātretha dharmiṇi amukhye api ekadeśa tvāt sādhya tvam upacaryate 
[580,ix]	hetu vyāpāra viṣayaḥ samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ sa ca na pakṣaḥ siddha tvāt tasmāt asiddha sādhya dharmā dharmī tad viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ katham asiddham viśeṣaṇam upacārāt prayojana abhāvāt anupacāraḥ iti na saṃgatam sarva dharmi dharma pratiṣedha artha tva ādikam prāk eva pratyayāt iti na ucyate punar tathā ca cākṣuṣa tva ādi parihāraḥ 
[580,x]	nanu cākṣuṣa tvam sajātīyaḥ eva sat na dharmi dharmaḥ tatra dharmi dharma grahaṇāt eva tasya nirāsaḥ na upacāra rahitena dharmi dharma grahaṇena sādhya dharmi dharma tā labhyate vaidharmya dṛṣṭā tadharmiṇaḥ api dharmaḥ iti syāt na asan tad atyayaḥ iti vacanāt katham hi tatra eva āsantatra eva ca san iti tatas sādhya dharmi parigraha artham upacāraḥ sādhya dharmi dharma grahaṇam eva tarhi karttavyam na tatra api upacāraḥ eva śaraṇam na hi asiddham anadhyāropitam viśeṣaṇam sambhavati pakṣaḥ iti anena api tat eva ucyate iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipādane prayāsāt gaurava doṣaḥ iti ced na pakṣa śabdasya api sādhya paryāya tvāt tathā ca jana vyavahāraḥ ayam mamapakṣaḥ idam mama abhipretam iti tathā ca ācāryaḥ 
[580,xi_580,xiii]	samudāya artha sādhya tvāt dharma mātretha dharmiṇi amukhye api ekadeśa tvāt sādhya tvam upacaryate na hi anupacaritaḥ kevalaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ nanu dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī anumeyaḥ na ca tatra upacāra sambhavaḥ na jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ iti tatra abhiprāyāt tathā anumānam arhati anumeyaḥ iti arthartha bhāvāt yaḥ ca anumānam arhati yaḥ ca
[581,i_581,ii]	jijñāsita viśeṣaḥ tatra sādhyam asiddha tvāt upacaritam eva tasmāt upacarita arthaḥ eva pakṣaḥ upacarita sādhya aṅga viśiṣṭaḥ eva dharmī iti yāvat nanu upacarita dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ iti api syāt pakṣa grahaṇam sādhya dharmi parigraha artham sādhya dharmiṇaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ saḥ eva hetuḥ na viruddha unaikāntikaḥ vā tasya pakṣasya dharmaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ 
[581,iii]	nanu etasmin viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāve viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedaka tvāt anya dharmitā niṣedhāt asādhāraṇa tā sarvasya syāt na hi viśeṣaṇam avyavacchedakam śabda viśiṣṭañca kṛtaka tvam śabda ātmakam katham paṭa ādi ātmakam tatra vā yāyāt vyatireke kadācid bhavet api na ca vyatirekaḥ dharmiṇaḥ dharmāṇām iṣyate na ca vyatiriktasya kāraṇāt anyat viśeṣaṇam tathā ca sati sarvaḥ kārya hetuḥ eva bhavet tasmāt viśeṣaṇe asādhāraṇa tā aviśeṣaṇe tu apakṣa dharma tvāt asiddha tā doṣa prasaṅgaḥ 
[581,iv_581,vi]	na etat asti yatas ayogam yogam aparaiḥ atyanta ayogam eva ca vyavacchinatti dharmasya nipātaḥ vyatirecakaḥ yadi eka prakāraḥ eva vyavacchedya vyavacchedaka bhāvaḥ syāt ayam doṣaḥ aneka prakāraḥ tu sa dṛśyate kvacid ayogam vyavacchinatti kvacid aparaiḥ yogam kvacid atyanta ayogam iti prabhedāḥ vyatirecakena hi nipātena vyavacchedaḥ vidhātavyaḥ na anya yoga vyavaccheda niyamena avadhāraṇa mātram eva hi tasya arthaḥ na ca anyathā avadhāraṇe doṣaḥ katham ayam vibhāgaḥ eka ākāra tve abhidhānasya artha bheda abhāvāt na kevalasya artha bhedaḥ api tu saṃsargi bhedāt saṃsargi bhedaḥ tu 
[581,vii_581,x]	viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyābhyām kriyayā ca saha uditaḥ saṃsargiṇaḥ eva ca pradhānam yatas vivakṣāta uprayoge api tasya arthoyam pratīyate yathākramam abhisambandhaḥ viśeṣaṇena saha uditaḥ ayogam vyavacchinatti viśeṣyeṇa anya yogam kriyayā tu atyanta ayogam iti viśeṣaṇa ādi padāni eva ca avadhāraṇam pratipādayanti nipātāḥ tu dyotakāḥ taiḥ tasya eva spaṣṭīkaraṇāt tathā hi ghaṭena udakam ānaya iti yadi kāraṇa viśeṣa apekṣā na syāt karaṇa viśeṣa prayogaḥ vyarthakaḥ bhavet tathā karma ādeḥ api iti avadhāraṇam ghaṭa ādi pada pratipādyam eva tāni ca bhinnāni iti artha bhedaḥ 
[581,xi_582,i]	nanu teṣām bhedāt artha bhedaḥ eva prāptaḥ sādhāraṇañcau ādhāraṇam pratīmaḥ ta tonvaya vyatirekābhyām apoddhāra parikalpanayā avadhāraṇa nipāta vācyam eva na tad aprayoge apratīti prasaṅgāt yohi yena vinā api pratīyate sa kathantasya arthaḥ kathantarhi bheda abhidhāyinām abhinnam abhidheyam na ca śabdānām vyavacchedaḥ eva abhidheyaḥ tasya vastu abhidhāyi tvāt vyavacchedasya ca abhāva rūpa tvāt na etat asti vyavaccheda phalam vākyam yatas caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ pārthaḥ dhanurdharaḥ nīlam sarojam iti vā yathā 
[582,ii_582,v]	paraspara sambaddha arthaḥ pada samudāyaḥ vākyam atra tu vākyapūrakam padam eva vākya śabdena uktam teṣām eva vyavaccheda phala tvāt tad anyasya vākyasya abhāvāt ca yasya ca vākyasya yat phalantadeva tasya pratipādyam saḥ eva rthaḥ na ca vyavacchidyamāna vyatirekeṇa anyaḥ vyavacchedaḥ tatas vyavacchidyamāna artha pratīteḥ vyavacchedyaḥ api tad anya vyatirekāt pratīyate eva iti vyavacchedaḥ eva pratipādyaḥ atha vastu pratipādyate vyavacchedaḥ tu pramāṇa antara pratipādyaḥ abhāva rūpaḥ ākṣipyate sa ca ākṣiptaḥ eva kāra ādinā dyotyate tat api asat yatas katham anya abhidhāne anyaḥ ākṣipyeta anvayamvinā asambandhe api ca ākṣepe ati prasaṅgaḥ a nivāritaḥ 
[582,vii]	yadi hi vyatirekaḥ vyatireka vat a vyatirekī tādātmyāt ākṣipyeta vyatireke api sambandhāt ākṣipyate iti ced na vyatireke padārthasya pratyakṣeṇa aparasmāt avyatirekeṇa pratīti prasaṅgāt tatas abhāva pramāṇantarāt vyatireka pratītau api tad asambaddha tayā eva pratītiḥ syāt na hi avyatirekiṇā vyatireka sambandhaḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ atha eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt vyatirekeṇa eva saha padārthaḥ utpadyate avyatireke api 
[582,viii_582,xi]	tat ayuktam yatas vyatirekeṇa tasya asau padārthasya anvayāt svayam na hi bhinnasya sadbhāve abhinnaḥ asau bhedam arhati na hi viṣāṇasya idam viṣāṇam iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ dvayoḥ api paraspara vyavacchedena samāna kāla bhāvi tvena pratīteḥ samuccayaḥ eva bhavet na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ paraspara upakāri tvena samāna kālatā ādhāra ādheya abhāvaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya nibandhanam iti ced na auttara adharyeṇa apratīteḥ vyatireka madhye padārthaḥ pratīyate iti ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ iti ced yadi evat na sambandha pratītiḥ na hi yasya madhye yaḥ vyavasthitaḥ sa tasya iti vyapadiśyate na hi ghaṭasya ālokaḥ andhakāraḥ iti vāci apadiśyate ghaṭa madhye vā vyavasthitaḥ ghaṭasya ghaṭaḥ iti abhāva madhya avasthitiḥ avaśyambhāvinī na abhāvam antareṇa paṭa ādi vyavasthitiḥ tad vyāpita aprasaṅgāt abhāva madhye api tarhi na sthitiḥ apara abhāvam antareṇa vyāpi tva prasaṅgāt eva na sva rūpeṇa eva hi asau padārthaḥ abhāva madhye api tiṣṭhet yā yā madhya sthitiḥ sā adhāra vyatiriktā abhāvam antareṇa na bhavati yathā paṭa madhya sthitiḥ abhāva madhya sthitiḥ api sthitiḥ iti
[583,i_583,iii]	svabhāva hetuḥ abhāva madhya sthitiḥ svayam eva tad svabhāva tvāt abhāvasya na hi jatunaḥ kāṣṭa saṃyogaḥ iti tasya api kāṣṭena saṃyoge apareṇa saṃyojakena bhāvyam svayam eva tathā abhāvāt tat etat asat yatas jatu svabhāvataḥ vahneḥ kāṣṭa yogam avāpnuyāt abhāvaḥ na svarūpeṇa vyāpi madhya kriyā kṣamaḥ avyāpī sa padārśaḥ ced abhāvaḥ syāt anarthakaḥ abhāvasya api vyāpi tve tad madhye anya sthitiḥ katham 
[583,vii_583,viii]	svabhāva mātreṇa na vyāpinaḥ madhyasthayati abhāvaḥ avyāpi tva prasaṅgāt avyāpinaḥ eva iṣyante iti ced kim idānīm abhāvena abhāvaḥ hi sāṃkaryam mā bhūt iti iṣyate tat ca svayam avyāpi tvena eva padārthānām prasiddha m iti vyartha tā anivāryā abhāvena vyāpī kutas abhāva sahitena vā svākāraṇena iti kaḥ virodhaḥ tat api asat 
[583,ix_583,xi]	abhāvaḥ avyāpinam kuryāt padārtham vyāpinam yadi sāṃkaryam pūrvam asya syāt anyathātvam katham punar na khalu vyāpya vyāpī vidhātum śakyaḥ pūrvam hi vyāpi tve padārtha saṃkaraḥ atha pūrvat na asti eva svarūpam eva asya tarhi tathā anyathā adṛṣṭeḥ atha svarūpeṇa na vyāpī na api avyāpī vyāpti prayogāt vyāpī tad abhāva yogāt avyāpī tathā ca āha 
[583,xii_583,xvi]	bhinnāḥ iti para upādhiḥ abhinnāḥ iti vā punar bhāva ātmasu prapañca uyam saṃsṛṣṭeṣu eva lakṣyate tat api asat yatas anyathā yadi tasya asti pratītiḥ dvaya varjanī tadā anya yogāt tat vastu dvaya bhāj iti gamyate anyathā tu etat syāt sa ca bhāvaḥ tad anyau ca tayoḥ ca tathā paraḥ sva rūpeṇa pratīyante upādhīnām aniśritāḥ tat miśraṇa pratītiḥ ced bhrāntiḥ eva bhavet tathā tathā padārtha abhāvaḥ syāt avidyā sādhakam bhavet 
[583,xviii]	sa ca api upādhimān bhinnaḥ svayam eva upādhibhyaḥ iti vyarthakam apara upādhi kalpanam upādheḥ svayam eva bhidyate upādhimat antarāt upādhitaḥ iti na pramāṇam atra kiñcid yadi ca svarūpeṇa eva bhinnaḥ tat eva bhinna tvam upādhimat antara apekṣāyām api pratyapekṣya manya deva bhinna tvam iti ced na tāvatā bhinna tvānām upayoga abhāvāt 
[583,xix_583,xx]	svarūpa bhedāt bhedena sarvebhyaḥ vinivṛttitaḥ apareṇa api bhedena kalpitena atra kaḥ guṇaḥ atha asmāt api bheda usmāt api iti mateḥ bheda kalpanā na hi pramāṇa prasiddham anarthakam api śakyam parikalpayitum parityāga viṣayam yadi evam upādheḥ api bhinnaḥ iti pratīteḥ aparaḥ bhedaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tasmāt api bhedaḥ iti anavasthā bhedānām sva rūpeṇa bheda abhāvaḥ eva prasaktaḥ 
[584,i_584,vi]	svāgatam bhavatu doṣaḥ nanu ayam eva abhyupagamaḥ na etat asti sva rūpeṇa hi bhedasya abhāve api para rūpataḥ na bhedaḥ para tā tasya bheda abhāve bhavet katham na hi sva rūpeṇa abhidyamānam para rūpeṇa bhidyate tasya aparatvam eva āgatam bheda abhāve tasya hi svarūpeṇa abhede paraḥ eva na asti tad abhāvāt kathantataḥ bhedaḥ atha bhedakam sva rūpeṇa bhinnam tatas abhinnam api dharmi rūpam bhetsyate tat api ayuktam yatas yadi tasya svarūpeṇa bhedonyasya api asau bhavet apasarppataḥ hi dūreṇa na śakyam upasarppaṇam 
[584,vii]	yadā eva tasmāt aparaḥ bhedakaḥ svarūpeṇa bhidyate tadā tad anyasya daiva raktāḥ kiṃśukā stavaka avataṃsakāḥ na bhinna abhinnena bhavitum śakyam na khalu bhedaḥ paramabhindana n bhedaḥ bhavati tasmāt ekasya svarūpa bhede bhedasya bhedavataḥ api tathā saḥ iti na parasmāt bhedaḥ tasmāt sva rūpam eva apara asaṃsargi svabhāvataḥ bhedaḥ iti tādātmyam eva bheda artha svabhāvayoḥ iti bhedaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ saḥ eva tātparyeṇa abhighātavyaḥ anyathā padārtha abhidhānam api na bhavet ākulasya padārtha tva ayogāt artha kriyā kāri hi vastu na ca sakala saṃsarge artha kriyā sambhavinī sa ca padārtha antarāt bhedaḥ svarūpataḥ pratyakṣa gamyaḥ tatra saṃketa karaṇe saḥ eva śabda gamyaḥ iti vyavacchedaḥ eva śabdasya abhidheyaḥ na hi vyāvṛttam avyāvṛttayā abhidhātum śakyam 
[584,viii_584,ix]	nanu svarūpa gatā sā vyāvṛttiḥ tatra svarūpa an abhidhāne kathantada vyatirikta vyāvṛtti abhidhānam atha vyatiriktā vyāvṛttiḥ tadā asau sva vyakti anugata tvāt jātiḥ eva bhaṅgi antareṇa pratipāditā bhavet tathā ca anugatam eva rūpam pratipādyam na vyāvṛttiḥ iti katham vyavaccheda phalam vākyam na asti etat yatas 
[584,x_584,xii]	saḥ eva hi tad anyasmāt vyāvṛttaḥ ghaṭaḥ ucyate na tu sāmānya yogena vyāvṛttasya eva bhinna tā pratipāditam etat na avyāvṛttam svayanta t apara yogāt vyāvṛttam sāmānya yoge hi sāmānam eva syāt tat vā na bhavet asamānasya samāna tā para yoge api na yuktā svayam eva samānañcet vṛthā sāmānya kalpanā a samānasya sāmānyam abhāve api na tad ātma tā 
[584,xiv_584,xvi]	yadi nāma sāmānya vat syāt na tu samānam eva tasya svena rūpeṇa pratibhāsanāt bheda avabhāsane hi sāmānya vat iti yuktam abheda avabhāsane sāmānyam iti eva yadi na bheda grahaṇam sāmānyam iti eva syāt viśeṣaḥ iti vā atha bhedena api pratibhāsanam abhedena api tat asat yasmāt bhedena pratibhāsaḥ ced tena sāmānya vat bhavet abhedena avabhāsaḥ ced sāmānyam tena tat bhavet 
[585,i_585,iii]	na hi ekasya rūpa dvayam yuktam bhinnam abhinnañca na tat sāmānyantena eva rūpeṇa vyakteḥ bhinnam tena eva rūpeṇa abhinnam kintu kenacid rūpeṇa bhinnam kenacid rūpeṇa abhinnam iti vyavasthā tad sattya itarat yatas na ca dvi rūpam sāmānyam paraspara vibhedataḥ syātām dve vastunī tatra sāmānyam aparam bhavet sāmānya rūpayoḥ bhedāt vyakti tā eva prasajyate vyakti sāmānya tāpyasya rūpa bhedāt na yujyate 
[585,v_585,viii]	yadi sāmānyasya dve rūpe kenacid bhinnam abhinnam apareṇa iti tathā paraspara vibhinna tvāt tayoḥ vyakti rūpa tā bhavet na hi bhinna svarūpāt aparā vyaktiḥ vyakti tva yogāt vyaktiḥ iti ced vyakti tvam nanu sāmānyam tad yogāt syāt samāna tā tasya vyakteḥ abhinna tve vyāpitā na prasajyate rūpa dvayasya kalpe ca prasaṅgaḥ pūrvavat bhavet 
[585,ix_585,x]	tasmāt bhinna tā eva vyaktīnām rūpam tatas vyakti tvena tat sāmānyam atha sāmānya yogāt sāmānyam tatra aparam sāmānyam tatas tat dvayam sāmānya vat na sāmānyam nahi sāmānya vat eva sāmānyam tatas sāmānya rūpa dvaye samānam iti buddhiḥ sā na vyaktau nahi sāmānya yuktā sāmānya rūpeṇa bhinnena vyavasthānāt 
[585,xi_585,xii]	atha bheda sāmānyayoḥ bhinnayoḥ api kenacid rūpeṇa vibhinna tā apareṇa abhinnatā iti tayoḥ api bhede param sāmānyam upaplavate tathā sati sāmānya sāmānya rūpayoḥ vyakti tā tatas pūrva sāmānya samāna tā na syāt sāmānya ayogāt anya sāmānyena vyavadhānāt na ekasya api tatas sāmānya yogaḥ iti asamāna tā tatas samāna ākārā iyam pratipattiḥ avastukā 
[585,xiii]	nahi sāmānyānām syāt vādinām parisamāptiḥ iti sarva avyaktaḥ eva pratipatti gocaraḥ parisamāptau api vyaktaḥ eva na hi tatra sāmānyam anicchatām sāmānya sambhavaḥ pūrvatra api antya samāna tve hi pūrvakam sāmānyam tad abhedāt pūrvakam api iti tatas sāmānya buddhiḥ sa ālambanā syāt na ca evam iti yat kiñcid etat evambhedānām api yadi bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ sarva bheda vyāpī tatas abhinnānām parasparam bheda yoge api tad yukta tā nābheda bādhani iti sakalam abhinnam eva bhavet sāmānya tadvatām bhedaḥ iti ced na 
[585,xiv_586,ii]	vyakti abhede na sāmānyam vyaktiḥ eva tu tat bhavet sā ca svatas na bhinnā iti tatas advaitam prasajyate tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam nanu avyatiriktā vyāvṛttiḥ yathā vijātīyāt tathā sajātīya abhimatāt api tat katham sā vijātīyāt eva nirbhakṣya śakyā pratyetum sattyam etat yadi svarūpa saṃgrāhī sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet abhinnaḥ na vibhedena śakyaḥ bhettum kathañcana yadā tu punar bhrānti mātrāt api prāptiḥ vyaḥ vahāra jagat gatiḥ tadā nirbhakṣyate a bhinnam bhinna saṃsṛṣṭi sambhavi 
[586,iv]	sthāṇau hi davīyaḥ deśa vyavasthitena na bhedaḥ san api pratyetum śakyaḥ saṃsthāna mātrakasya tatra pratipatteḥ na saṃsthāna mātram viśeṣa rahitam sambhavati dūra deśa tayā tu tasya apratibhāsane pratibhāsa mātrakam samānam sarvatra utpadyate iti vyakti vyatiriktam tat eva sāmānyam dṛśya vikalpya artha ekīkaraṇena tat eva abhinnam iti samvṛ yā bhavati bhinna bhinna tā na paramārthataḥ paramārthataḥ eva bhedaḥ kasmāt na bhavati ekīkaraṇa kalpanāyām dvayoḥ apratibhāsanāt astu tarhi bhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ sāmānyasya eva pratibhāsanāt yat ca vyatiriktam pratibhāsate tat vyatiriktam eva 
[586,v_586,ix]	tat api asat yatas vyakti asaṃsargi rūpasya pratibhāsena tat bhavet sāmānyam na hi sāmānyam kevalam vyakti rūpavat atha kevalam api samāna tā yogāt sāmānyam tat api asat bhinna sāmānya yoge hi sāmānyānām samāna tā tatas parantu sāmānyam vyaktiḥ eva parisphuṭā bhrānta apratipattiḥ eva tarhi sāmānyam tad vyaktīnām samāna tvāt vyaktau tarhi pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca na syāt na hi bhrānta buddhi svarūpa pratipattau vyakti pratipati pravarttane yukte ati prasaṅgāt bhrāntyā pravṛttiḥ iti ced na aparasya abhrānteḥ abhāvāt tadā api vā svarūpa pratipattiḥ eva iti na vyakti pratipattiḥ tatas para apara bhrānti abhyupagame anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ eva iti yat kiñcid etat yadi tarhi na sāmānya yogaḥ vyatiriktā itara tayā na api ubhaya rūpa tayā na bhrānti rūpa tāya na api vyakti pratipattiḥ kaḥ tarhi śabda liṅgābhyām artha pratipattau upāyaḥ 
[586,x_586,xiii]	vyavaccheda phala tvena pāriśeṣyāt upāya tā śabdāt artha gatau nyāyaḥ kaḥ iva anyaḥ bhaviṣyati nanu pāriśeṣyāt vastu vyavasthā api tu pramāṇena na ca vyavaccheda pratīti grāhi pramāṇam upalabhyate atra ucyate tad anya vyatirekeṇa pravṛtteḥ upalabdhitaḥ vyavaccheda phalam vākyam iti kinna avadhāryate 
[586,xiv]	tad anya vyavacchedena hi vyavahāriṇām pravarttanam upalabdham na ca apratīti pravarttanam tatas vyavaccheda pratītiḥ ākṛṣyate tat hi para asaṃsargeṇa pratīyate pratyakṣeṇa vikalpena ca tatra pratyakṣeṇa vastu svabhāva līnaḥ eva vyatirekaḥ pratyaya viṣayaḥ kalpanānām tu na vastu viṣaya tā tatas vyatireka mātram eva śabda kalpanā viṣayaḥ 
[586,xv_587,i]	nanu vastu pratipattau vyatirekasya khaṇḍaśas katham pratipattiḥ atra idam ucyate vastu asti vyatireka yoga viṣayaḥ yaḥ kalpanā gocaraḥ sattya asattyatayā tu bhedam aparam kaḥ kalpyet dhī dhanaḥ yat mātrāt vyatireka saṅgama gatiḥ tanmātram eva astu vaḥ sāmānyena yadi prayojana vidhiḥ kaḥ tad viśeṣe guṇaḥ 
[587,v_587,viii]	yāvatā vinā vastunā vyavacchedaḥ pratyetum aśakyaḥ tāvat mātram vyavahāriṇām prayojana prasiddhaye prabhavati na ca sattya vastu saṃgatam eva vyavacchedanam pratyetum śakyam asatti asaṅgamena api tasya pratīti darśanāt tasmāt vyavaccheda viṣayam eva vākyam vastunaḥ tatra asattya tvāt nanu vastu sattve vyatirekasya api tada vyatireke tad līnasya katham sattya tā atra ucyate pratīyamānam api etat asattyam iti kaḥ kramaḥ visamvādāt asatti añcet bhedaḥ sattyaḥ na kimmataḥ 
[587,ix_587,xi]	ayanta avat avyavaccheda vādi anuyoktavyaḥ kim idam pratīti viṣayasya asattya tvam nāma yadi tena pratīyamānena rūpeṇa tat asti eva katham asattyatā atha apratīyamānena tadā tarhi sarvam asattyam iti asattyam eva sattyam eva kiñcid nā asti iti garddha bhīkṣīrāyitam para pakṣeṇa atha prāpya rūpa tā na asti tena visamvādāt asattyam na svarūpataḥ svarūpa sattya tve api prāpya rūpa tā arthinaḥ tad abhāve dasattyam eva viparyaya pratītiḥ asatti a tvam aprāpya rūpasya yata prāpya rūpa tayā grahaṇam viparyaya pratyayāt aparam evantarhi prāptam idam vyavacchedaḥ sattyaḥ iti yatas prāpyatenya vyavacchinnam pravṛttaiḥ vyavahāribhiḥ vastu avastu vyavaccheda bhedaḥ tatra aparaḥ vṛthā yadi yat prāptam tat sattyam āyātam vyavacchedasya sattya tvam tasya prāpteḥ 
[587,xii]	nanu asatti avastu vyavacchedaḥ tena pratipannaḥ na ca asau prāptaḥ sattya vastu vyavaccheda prāpteḥ na ca anya pratītau anya prāptau avisamvādaḥ tatas kutas vyavacchedasya sattya tā koyama sthāna abhiniveśinaḥ asthāna gataḥ paryanuyogaḥ bhedaḥ tāvat prāptaḥ tāvat mātreṇa vyavahāri paritoṣaḥ na ca prāpta paritoṣāḥ vyavahāriṇaḥ para apara bhedam niścetum kṣamā yena vyavaccheda bheda avadhāraṇayā visamvāda samvedana saṅgamaḥ tasmāt vyavahāri jana prītyā avisamvāda uyam ucyate na tattvam avisamvādaḥ parama artha vicāraṇe uktam etat sāṃvyavahārikam eva vyatireka viṣayam pramāṇam prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti vacanāt yadi pramāṇena pramāṇam pratīyate anavasthā pramāṇam antareṇa pratipattau prameyasya api iti na pramāṇa adhīnaḥ prameya adhigamaḥ syāt tatas uktam 
[587,xiii_587,xv]	prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa gamyate na tu tattvataḥ pramāṇena matiḥ tattvam anavasthā tathā uditā yatas tatra api vicāraṇā vyavahāraḥ pramāṇañcet anavasthā niveditā apramāṇāt gatau sā eva prameye api bhaviṣyati pramāṇa lakṣaṇam prāptam vyarthakam sarva siddhitaḥ pramāṇena vinā eva iti tat idam na samañcasam 
[587,xvii_588,ii]	tasmāt avicārita sūkṣma tattvam vyavahāra mātram āśritya sarvatra avisaṃvādaḥ na paramārthataḥ tathā hi itas taṭa mitas vyāghraḥ kena astu prāṇinaḥ gatiḥ bheda abhede avisamvādaḥ dvaye api hi na yujyate yadi pratīyamānāt prāpyam vastu bhinnam katham anya prāptau visamvāda abhāvaḥ avisaṃvādaḥ ca atha abhinnam sarva ātmanā tathā sati tat api tadā eva pratipannam kim artham pravarttate kim vā prāpsyati tatas na visamvādaḥ soyamitas taṭa mitaḥ vyāghraḥ iti nyāyaḥ tasmāt 
[588,iii_588,v]	vyavaccheda phalam vākyan na vastu viṣayam kvacid evakāra aprayoge api yadā ībhya usti pratīyate āstām tāvat etat kim evam kvacid dṛśyate dṛśyate eva pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ nīlam sarojam iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya kriyāṇām prayoge viśeṣaṇa avadhāraṇe ayoga sya vyavacchedaḥ viśeṣya avadhāraṇe anya yogasya kriyā avadhāraṇe atyanta ayogyasya iti vibhāgaḥ katham aprayoge niyama viśeṣa avadhāraṇam prakaraṇa vivakṣā viśeṣa ādibhyaḥ 
[588,vi_588,ix]	nanu yathā pārthaḥ eva dhanurdharaḥ iti viśeṣya sannidhāne nā avadhāraṇāt viśeṣya antaram vyavacchinatti tathā viśeṣaṇa sannidhāne viśeṣaṇa antaram iti prāptam tatas caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ eva iti sakala guṇa antara vyavacchedaḥ na ca upapattimat etat na ca ayoga ani ayoga vyavaccheda yoḥ viśeṣaḥ satyam etat pratiyogi vyavacchedaḥ tatra api artheṣu gamyate tathā prasiddheḥ sāmarthyāt vivakṣā anugamāda dhvaneḥ 
[588,x]	tatra yadi dhanuḥ dharoyam na vā iti dhānuḥ dvayam sandeha prakaraṇe prasa jyate caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ iti tadā tasya eva sandeha vyavacchet aṅkaroti iti adhānuḥ dvayam eva vyavacchidyate anyathā aśrotṛ saṃskārakam bruvāṇaḥ pravaktā na bhavet tatas pratiyogi vyavacchedaḥ eva gamyate na anyaḥ tathā tatra api anya yoga vyavaccheda vākye yadi pratiniyataḥ pratiyogī prakṛtaḥ pārtha rādheyayoḥ kaḥ kodaṇḍa dharaḥ tatas karṇṇaḥ eva vyavacchidyate pārthaḥ eva dhanurdharaḥ iti na rāma ādi vyavacchedaḥ tathā yoga vyavacchede api yadi prakriyate kim anyaḥ api asya guṇaḥ saṃvi dyate tada sakala guṇa vyavacchedaḥ eva avyabhicāri varjyam caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ eva na paṇḍita ādiḥ pārtha vicāre api yadi kim anyaḥ api jagati dhanurdharaḥ iti sandeha prakaraṇam tadā sarva viśeṣya antara vyavacchedaḥ eva sarvasya tadā pratiyogi tayā prakramāt 
[588,xi_588,xii]	tad ayoga vyavacchedāt dharmī dharma viśeṣaṇam tad viśiṣṭa tayā dharme na niranvaya doṣa bhāj tasya dharmasya anyena yoge prasiddhe tad ayogaḥ eva aśaṃkyate tatas tasya pratipādanena anya vyavacchedaḥ iti na anvaya doṣaḥ yatas pakṣasya dharmaḥ eva ayam iti prasiddheḥ eva iyam eva asat bhūtā ayogasya pratiyogi tvāt anya yogasya ca viparyāt sāmarthyāt ca ayam arthaḥ pratīyate 
[589,i]	na hi anya yoge labdhe tatra avadhāraṇam tatra eva patati virodhāt sandigdham hi nirākriyate vidhīyate vā na siddham pratiṣiddham vā vivakṣā anurūpaḥ ca pratiyogī tathā śabdaḥ api iti evam eva pratipattiḥ na hi vivakṣitam anyathā anyathā śabda pratipādana sāmarthyam na hi svabhāvataḥ pradīpa vat pratipādakāḥ dhvanayaḥ iti pratipāditam 
[589,ii_589,v^1]	nanu pārthasya eva dhanurdhara tvam iti viśeṣaṇena api saha avadhāraṇam anya yogam eva vyavacchinatti na ayogam iti prakṛta virodhaḥ na virodhaḥ yatas viśeṣaṇa tvam pārthasya yadi api pratipādyate śabdena na tu tat tasya parama arthena vidyate viśeṣaṇam atra guṇa bhāvāt āśritam dharma bhūtam ucyate pārthaḥ tu dhanurdhara tvasya āśraya tvāt viśeṣyaḥ eva anyaḥ hi vāstavaḥ nyāyonyaḥ śabda nayaḥ iti atra ca prakaraṇāt vastu dharmasya grahaṇam iti adoṣaḥ eva atra avadhāraṇa arthaḥ vyavaccheda rūpaḥ pratyakṣa tonumānāt ca pratīyate vibhāgena iti nā pratīti doṣaḥ anya yoga vyavacchedena hi viśeṣaṇaḥ ekasya tad bhāve anyasya atattvam syāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya yoginaḥ ca nipātasya aviśeṣaḥ yadi pakṣasya eva dharmaḥ kṛtaka tvanta dā anyat sakalam akṛtakam bhavet anyaḥ pradeśaḥ ca na dhūmavān tat etat pratyakṣa anumāna virodhi pratyakṣataḥ hi
[589,v^2]	dhūmaḥ anyatra pratipannaḥ anumānataḥ pratyaya bheda bhedi tva ādeḥ pratyakṣāt vā pratipannam kṛtaka tvam loka pratītyā ca anumāna lakṣaṇayā viśeṣaṇa ādi sahacarita avadhāraṇa artha nipātasya tad arthasya ca ayoga vyavaccheda ādeḥ vācya vācaka bhāvasya anyasya vā pratītiḥ iti kaḥ tatra anyathā bhāvaḥ tat etat pakṣa dharmaḥ iti samāsa artha vyākhyānam bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ bheda saṃsargau vā samāsa vākya arthaḥ iti vibhāgena pratīteḥ bhavatu pakṣasya dharmaḥ sa tu navadhā kim iti ācārye ṇa nirddiṣṭaḥ asiddha viruddhānai kāntika samyak hetu pratipādana artham hi tāvantaḥ eva nirddeśyāḥ na navabhiḥ prayojanam iti āha 
[589,vi_589,vii]	svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau dvau hetu viparyayau vivādāt bheda sāmānye śeṣaḥ vyāvṛtti sādhanaḥ navānām api upayoga usti iti navadhāniḥ ddeśaḥ svabhāva kāryayoḥ tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandhāt hetu tāḥ na anyeṣām iti dvayasya nirddeśaḥ tayoḥ eva ca viparyaya sādhane viruddha tā iti aparam dvayam darśana adarśana mātrakāt ana ekāntikasya api paraiḥ aikāntika tvam pratipāditam iti tad vyavaccheda artham aparam dvayam śeṣāṇān tu trayāṇān nirdeśaḥ vyāvṛtti prādhānya pradarśana artham vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa hetuḥ gamakaḥ tatas anumānena vyavacchedaḥ eva sādhyaḥ iti arthaḥ pradarśitaḥ 
[589,viii_590,iv]	tatra te nava pakṣa dharmāḥ prameya kṛtaka anitya kṛta śrāvaṇa yatna jāḥ anityayanta jāḥ sparśa anittya tva ādiṣu te nava nanu kṛtaka tva prayatna anantarīyaka tvayoḥ eka tvāt āvṛttau api aneka tā katham hetu tā viruddha tā ca kathañca nava tvam na hi saḥ eva āvarttamānaḥ saṃkhyā bhedasya āśrayaḥ atra ucyate yasmāt nittya anittya prayatna utthāḥ madhyama trika śāśvatāḥ ayatna aniti anityāḥ ca prameya tva ādi sādhanāḥ tasmāt sarvam upapannam 
[590,v_590,vi]	na khalu sādhanam nāma svarūpeṇa kiñcid sādhya apekṣayā sādhana tva lābhāt sādhye ca bheda saṃsparśini saḥ eva ekaḥ samyak hetuḥ viruddhaḥ ca iti na kiñcat upapannam tena dvau hetū anittyaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti svabhāva hetuḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ca kāryam katham idam vyajñāyi svabhāva hetuḥ kṛtaka tvam kārya hetuḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavati tad lakṣaṇa yogāt anya lakṣaṇa abhāvāt tu na viparyayaḥ na hi svabhāvāt anyena vyāptiḥ gamyasya kāraṇe sambhavāt vyabhicārasya dvidhā vṛtti phalantataḥ 
[590,vii]	samāna vyāptika tvāt kṛtaka tvasya na ca samāna vyāptikam kāryam kāraṇe vyabhicārāt kāryasya na avaśyam kāraṇāni tadvanti bhavanti iti tatas sakalam kāryam dbidhāvṛtti dvidhā āvṛtti ca prayatnāna tarīyaka tvam tatas kārya hetuḥ na hi anityāḥ iti eva prayatna anantara bhāvi jñāna kārī a ārambhiṇaḥ tena tad sa pakṣe dvidhā varttate hetu antara jñāna kārya ārambhiṇaḥ tu sarvatra eva anityāḥ tena vyāpi tvāt kāryam api jñānam svabhāva hetuḥ eva vastutas tathā ca upalambhe eva sattā ucyate na ca prayatna anantarīyaka jñāna lakṣaṇa sattā tad anyeṣām asattva prasaṅgāt tatas tu jñānam anvaya vyatireka bhāva upakalpita bhedam kārya koṭi viṭaṅkam ārohati tatas kārya hetuḥ tat jñānam prayatna anantarīyaka śabda vyapadeśyam 
[590,viii]	katham punar gamyate prayatna antaram jñānam anittya kāryam iti tathā ca āha prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kārya samaḥ vyaktiḥ api prayatna kārya abhāvaḥ api tat yathā pradīpa sannidhāpana prayatnaḥ na ghaṭasya kārya tām upapādayati cakra ādi bhramaṇa prayatnaḥ tu tathā iti ubhayathāḥ darśanāt katham ekāntaḥ tathā ca āha bhāṣya kāraḥ yadi nityam śabdam upapādayiṣyāmaḥ tadā vyajyate śabdaḥ atha anyathā tadā kriyate iti na ca śabdam karoti iti karaṇa vyavahārāt kriyate śabdaḥ iti pratīmaḥ prayoga artha tvāt karoteḥ yathā pādau me kuru pṛṣṭham vā iti pratyabhijñā ca śabda nitya tve hetuḥ tatas nityasya sataḥ vyaktiḥ eva ghaṭa vat śabdasya api pradīpataḥ 
[590,ix_591,i]	tat atad kālayoḥ yasya siddhiḥ asti pramā anvitā upalambhaḥ punar vyaktiḥ vyakteḥ anyat na lakṣaṇam tathā prāk vidyamānasya kutaścid upalambhanam na kārya tvam sataḥ pūrvam akāryantadā vidi atra ucyate prayatna anantaram jñānam prāk sataḥ niyamena na tasya āvṛtti akṣa śabdeṣu sarvathā anupayogataḥ yathā khalu prayatna anantara bhāvī ghaṭaḥ prayatna kāryaḥ na kulāla prayatna vyaṅgyaḥ sakala kāraka grāmasya vyartha tā prasaṅgāt sarvam sarvasya asti iti na kenacid kiñcid īhitavyam iti anīhitam jagat syāt niyamaḥ kārakaiḥ kriyate anyathā asamañjasā bhāvaḥ iti koyat niyamaḥ nāma yatas 
[591,ii]	na anya vyāvarttanam vyasya niyamaḥ nāma vidyate tatas vyāvarttanam na asti kāraṇānām śataiḥ api vyāvarttanam abhāvaḥ ca punar tasya kathaṅgatiḥ avidyamānasya punar gatau udaye e saḥ api ca asti eva niyamaḥ sarvaḥ satkārya vādinaḥ tatosataḥ na tasya api kṛtiḥ yuktimatī kvacid atha api asya vibhāgena sataḥ vyaktiḥ vidhīyate sā api kāryā yadi bhavet tatra syāt kalpanā dvayam yadi asattvam kriyā aśakyā sattve api kāraṇam katham sattva asattvantu na ekasya vidyate māna saṃgatam bhāve api tat sadā asti eva kārakaiḥ tatra kim kṛtam abhāvena kriyāśaktiḥ iti kāraka tā vṛthā 
[591,x]	tasmāt prayatna anantara bhāvī kulāla ādi kāryaḥ ghaṭaḥ na vyaṅgyaḥ yathā tarhi pradīpa vyaṅgyaḥ saḥ eva kāla antara upalabdhaḥ tathā prayatna vyaṅgyaḥ śabdaḥ api bhaviṣyati na ghaṭasya prāk pramāṇa sadbhāvāt śabdasya tu prayatnāt prāk pramāṇa abhāvaḥ sattve pratyabhijñātaḥ atra api sattvam prāk iti ced na 
[591,xi_591,xii]	pratyabhijñā pratyayasya śataśas nirāśā sāt na hi nirastam punar āyāti na mṛtaḥ pratyujjīvati api ca pratyabhijñā kim jñātam sādhayati sattvam atha jñātayoḥ madhya bhāvi yadi jñātam sādhayati tat idānīm jñānena eva prāktanena sādhita smaraṇena vyavahṛtam kaḥ tatra pratyabhijñāyai upayogaḥ pratyabhijñayā idānīm api tat asti iti sādhyate smaraṇantu tad kālam eva sādhayati yathā dṛṣṭasya
[591,xiii_591,xvii]	smaraṇāta tat asat yatas yadi smaraṇa sadbhāvāt pratyabhijñā pravarttate smṛterthe pratyabhijñānam anindriya jam eva tat na ca akṣaja smṛtīm uktvā pratyayaḥ paraḥ iṣyate tena akṣajatva abhāvena smaraṇasya apramāṇa tā na hi smaryamāṇerthe pravarttanam akṣāṇām anyathā kānyakubja ādīnām api pratyakṣatā bhavet tatas mṛtānām api pratyakṣatā prasaṅgaḥ 
[591,xviii_592,i]	atha dṛśyamāna tāyām akṣa vṛttiḥ dṛśyamāne api kim pratyabhijñayā smaryamāṇena saha ekatva pratītiḥ prayojanam iti ced tat asat smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt tat prameya ekatā katham asattya tve hi dharmasya asattya tvam dharmiṇaḥ sphuṭam na pūrva kāla sambandhaḥ smaraṇena vineyate rūpa mātra avabhāsaḥ tu vinā api pratyabhijñayā 
[592,iii_592,v]	sita pīta avabhāsa mātrakam hi na nittya rūpa avabhāsanam prathama avabhāsane api tasya bhāvāt atha tatra api nittya tā kāla antara sthāyitā lakṣaṇa pratibhāsate eva na hi tasyāḥ niṣedhakam pratyakṣama āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣedha artha vastunaḥ yadi kāla kalā vyāpi vastu grahaṇam akṣataḥ sarva kāla kalā ālambe grahaḥsyāt maraṇa avadheḥ 
[592,vi_592,viii]	tasmāt smaraṇena pūrva kāla avalambanam na adhyakṣataḥ tatas smaraṇasya apramāṇa tvāt tad pratīta vastu eka tā asattyā dharmiṇaḥ asatti a tve asatti a tvāt dharmasya atha varttamānasya sattya tve pūrvasya asat tyata āsthitau sattyā satti atayā ālīḍhā tayoḥ syāt ekatā dhruvam dvayoḥ sattyāsattyatāyām tat eka tā api sattya asattyā eva yuktā na asattyā eva tat api yat kiñcit yatas 
[592,ix_592,xi]	yadi dharmi vaśena asyāḥ sattyā satti atayā sthitiḥ varttamāna tayā sattyā avarttamāna tayā mṛṣā varttamāna rūpasya sattya tvāt tad gata eka tvam api sattyam dharmi rūpā anuvṛtteḥ smaryamāṇa eka tā tu tatas eva asattyā iti prāptam atas vastunaḥ ekatā na sidhyati ekaikatā kathat nāma sattyā ced pratyayaḥ na kim ātmani eva ātmanaḥ kasmāda vyāhatiḥ sva vacasi api atha idam pratyabhijñānam bhinne dṛṣṭena dṛśyate dṛśyamānam tatas abhinne bhavati iti avasīyate 
[592,xiv_592,xvi]	tat ayam pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ bhinnāt nivarttamānaḥ abhinne vyavatiṣṭhate etāvat eva vastu yat uta bhinnam abhinnañca tatas bhinnāt vyāvarttamānam abhedam sādhayati anyathā na syāt eva na khalu sarvatas vyāvarttitum śakyam tat etasat yatas bhede api anyaḥ viśeṣa usti tatas yena nivarttate varam viśeṣaḥ tasya eva na tu artha antara kalpanam 
[592,xvii]	pratyabhijñā pratyaya udaya mātreṇa varam bheda viśeṣaḥ eva asau iti kalpanam natu abhedasya bheda vijātīyasya adṛṣṭaḥ ca ayam pratyabhijñā udayaḥ samāna ākāra parāmarśa vidhāyiṣu lūna punar prasūta darbha arbhaka ādiṣu tatas paratra api tathā kalpanam eva nyāyyam tatra lūnatā upalabhyate madhyam adhyāsīnā tena na tatra bhede api abheda kalpanā na punar atra tathā iti viṣamaḥ khalu keśa pāśa upanyāsaḥ tat etat sattyam eva patataḥ kāśa kuśā avalambanam sthavīyasaḥ sampannam tathā hi 
[592,xviii_593,ii]	lūna tā nāma vicchedaḥ parāsaṃghaṭanam sa ca tatas pūrva parityāgāt vittiḥ saṃghaṭate kutas asaṃghaṭita dṛṣṭiḥ ca samā dārṣṭa antika itare aparaḥ truṭayatāyām api mṛtaḥ pratyabhijñānam āsthitaḥ saḥ api durātmā ātmanā eva ātmānam āhanti vinaṣṭe pūrvake rūpevinaṣṭena ekatā saha nānā tvepa tathā eka tvam bhavati pratipāditam api ca 
[593,iii]	vinaṣṭam akṣasya na gocaraḥ kvacid tatas smṛteḥ eva sa gocare careta smṛteḥ pramāṇa tvam apākṛtam puras tatas pramāṇa anumatā eva nityatā atas prakāśam smṛtiḥ artha saṃgrahe na vastu idānīm yadi nāma sādhayet tadātanam vastu tu gamyate tayā tatas pramāṇa avagatā hi pūrva tā tayā saha ekatva viniścayaḥ dṛḍhaḥ katham pramāṇāt aparaḥ bhaviṣyati dṛḍhaḥ api saṃpratyayaḥ utthitaḥ satām parākriyeta iti virodhitā svatas 
[593,ix_593,x]	avicalita niścaya pratyaya pratyaya protsāhyamāna mānasaḥ api yadi niścayam eva parākuryāt tadā nyat vacasi anyat asya manasi syāt idam tad bodha sarva svam pratyabhijñāna vādinām ati dūram samārūḍhā patanti eva jhaṭiti api ati viṣamam sthānam dūram ārūḍhasya pratyāsannataraḥ pātaḥ nirvāpa nimnaḥ hi puras pradīpaḥ su dūram ujjvālya vināśam eti 
[593,xiii_593,xvi]	tathā hi anubhūta artha viṣayā smṛtiḥ ced naṣṭa tā katham na anubhūta artha viṣayā yadi sā smṛti tā katham yadi anubhūta artha viṣaya tā smṛteḥ svarūpat na atīta smaraṇam syāt na atītā pratyakṣataḥ avagatā atha anavagatam eva smṛtyā avadhāryate tathā sati na smṛtiḥ hi smṛtiḥ apūrva artha viṣayā bhavatu tathā api na pratyabhijñānam pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa vastu viṣayam hi pratyabhijñānam iṣyate anyathā pramāṇa tā abhāvaḥ tat eva atītam sat pūrvam ucyate iti ced tat api paraspara virodhi 
[593,xvii_593,xxi]	yadā atītam na tada grāhyam yadā grāhyam na tat tathā smaryamāṇena rūpeṇa tat atītam na vastu tat niścayasya dṛḍha tvāt ca prāmāṇyam upapattimat pratyabhijña nam api evam akṣa yogaḥ tu apārthakaḥ yadi dāḍharyam niścayasya vinā api akṣa sambandham pramāṇam eva tat etat durātmanaḥ vicāra akṣam asya akṣānti mātrakam tathā hi avisamvāda sadbhāvāt pramāṇam jñānam iṣyate varttamāne avisamvādaḥ na tu pūrva vināśini na syāt yadi tat eka tvam kintatā urtha kriyā na sā 
[593,xxii]	apareṇa api dahane na artha kriyā sampādyate eva tad artha kriyā karaṇāt eka tvam tu tat akāri vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam sāmvṛtam iṣyate eva ekam iti hi vyapadeśa vikalpāḥ tad artha sāmarthya mātreṇa samañjasa jātaya na khalu artha kriyā virahita artha viṣayāḥ vyapadeśa niścayāḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ ādriyante tatas tad artha kriyā kāritayā eka tvam pratyabhijñāna viṣayaḥ tatas numānam na tad rūpa liṅgam rūpasya aneka tā tad anya kalpita dharma yogāt iti na pratyabhijñā tattvataḥ eka tve pramāṇam ghaṭa ādiṣu tarhi tad artha kriyā karaṇa pravaṇeṣu kasmāt na pratyabhijñā saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ iti tad samānaḥ iti
[594,i_594,iii]	pratyayaḥ eva pratyabhijñā api ca saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ ānītaḥ tat eva idam śītam udakam iti tathā hi yadā anyam ānayā iti ukte tad vyakti antaram ānayet tat eva punar ānītam iti syāt niścaya udayaḥ yadā ghaṭāt anyaḥ piṭharikā ādikaḥ āneya tvena vivakṣitaḥ tadā anyamānayā iti uktau yadā tad ghaṭa vyakteḥ vyakti antarānayanam tadā saḥ eva ayam ghaṭaḥ ānītaḥ iti vyavahāra darśanam 
[594,iv_594,ix]	atyanta rūḍha tvāt tu vyavahārasya anādi va āsanā saṅgateḥ na bhākta bhāva abhimānaḥ tasmāt na pratyabhijñātaḥ śabdasya ekatva niścayaḥ pratipādana śakteḥ tu samāna tvāt tathā bhramaḥ yadi anyaḥ katham anyatra viśvāsasya pravarttanam na hi anyatra aparijñāte kaścid viśvasiti kvacid eka tve api na viśvāsaḥ vyabhicārasya darśanāt tad samāne tathā anyatra viśvasiti eva kaścana samāna saṃskāra sambhāvanām avyabhicāriṇīm avalambya viśvāsaḥ yathā tad putra ādau tathā tad upādāna santāne api 
[594,x_594,xiii]	atha kṣaṇika tva katham pratidāna icchā eka tve punar sutarām eva na ghaṭate tathā hi bhayena lajjayā yuktam dattasya pratipādanam bhaya lajjā adhikāḥ yasya bhaya lañje tu kiṃkṛte atha tad sannidheḥ asya tat grastasya ātmanaḥ gatiḥ atad grāse api tad grāsaḥ tasya ātmani api vibhramaḥ kṣaṇa prabandhe api saḥ eva vibhramaḥ kim asya na etat vyavahāra kāraṇam na nittyatāyām api kāraṇa udayāt paraḥ para syā api abhimāna kāraṇam 
[594,xvi]	ātmānam nittyam abhyupagacchataḥ api na kārya kāraṇa bhāva kṛta abhimānataḥ yuktiḥ tathā hi ātmā na eka svabhāva tāyāḥ paurvāparyeṇa pracyavate tatas tasya bhaya lajjā ādi vikāra sambhavāt kathambhaya āditas bhayam atha tasya bhayam utpadyate tad yogāt bhītaḥ nā svarūpeṇa abhīta tayā tasya kācid pīḍā kārya kāraṇa bhāva mātram eva kevalam tathā vyavahāra hetuḥ na ca vyavahāra mātreṇa pīḍā pīḍā bhavati putra pīḍayā vyatiriktayā api sambandhāt pīḍitaḥ eva iti ced na sva gata āsya aparā pīḍā iti tena pīḍitaḥ anyathā śatru pīḍayā api pīḍitaḥ syāt tena api upaghātyaḥ paghātaka lakṣaṇaḥ asya asti eva sambandhaḥ 
[594,xvii_595,i]	putraḥ api yadi śatruḥ syāt na tad pīḍā kṛtā kṣatiḥ tasmāt pīḍita rūpeṇa pīḍā na para pīḍanāt tatas kṣaṇikatā eva iti na santā nāt viśiṣyate ātmā iti tena sarva uyam vyavahāraḥ tathāvidhaḥ santāna mātrakeṇa hi sakalaḥ saḥ eva ayam iti vyavahāraḥ tena śabdasya na nittya tā tatas katham prayatna anantaram asya vyaktiḥ utpatteḥ eva tu pramāṇa viṣayaḥ tad lakṣaṇa yogāt 
[595,ii_595,iii]	bhedāt pratyaya bhedena kārya tā na dhvaneḥ satī na pradīpa ādi bhedena vibhidyante ghaṭa ādayaḥ na khalu vyañjaka alpa mahat tvena bhidyate vyaṅgyam atha pradīpa abhi vyaktam nīlotpalam raktam dṛśyate candra ātapa abhivyaktam pītam sitam khaḍga bhivyaktam vadanam gauram api śyāmam iti evamādi 
[595,iv_595,vi]	tat api asat yatas vyañjakāt anya rūpa tvam bhāvānām yadi vidyate tad anya rūpa kāra tvāt vyañjakam kārakam bhavet vyañjakena hi tad rūpam hāpayatā svarūpa viparītam prakāśayitavyam tat tu tasya rūpam avidyamānam katham prakāśayitum śakyam anyathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādinām api prakāśanam bhavet tat api viparīta ākhyātitaḥ prakāśataḥ eva iti ced dattam atra utraram 
[595,vii_595,ix]	atha bhrāntiḥ asau tena ayam adoṣaḥ iti ced tat asat yatas vyañjakam janakam bhrānteḥ yadi tat vyañjakam katham prakāśayat hi kiñcid syāt vyañjakam vyañjakam sphuṭam anyathā timira ādīnām api syāt vyañjaka ātma tā na hi teṣām api bhrānti kāri tvāt dūṣaṇam param atha bhrame api tad rūpam aparam parigṛhyate dhvaneḥ tena prayatna ādi vyañjakosya mataḥ satām 
[595,xiv_595,xv]	yadi api nāmālya mahat tva ādikaḥ dhvani saṃsargāt śabdasya bhedaḥ tathā api asau bhrānti kṛtaḥ eva na tattvataḥ bhrāntau api śabdasya aparam tattvam pratibhāsate eva sphoṭa ātmanaḥ tat api pratyucyate bhrānta rūpāt param rūpam yadi śabdasya vidyate bhedena eva avabhāseta na anyathā bhrānta tā gatiḥ na hi bhinnam abhinnena rūpeṇa pratibhāsitam bhinnam iti eva gami eta abhinnam eva anyathā bhavet bhrāntau api yadi bhrāntiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva viśīryate bhrāntau abhra anta tā vittau bhrāntiḥ sā iti pratīyate 
[595,xix]	na hi vibhrama avabhāsi rūpāt apara satti a śabda rūpa sadbhāve bhedena anavabhāsanam upapattimat bhrāntyā na bhedaḥ vabhāsate iti ced bhedaḥ api bhrānta rūpāt aparam śabdasya rūpam tatas tasya bhedena avabhāsana prasaṅge punar bhrāntiḥ eva upakṣeptavyā punar tad rūpa bhedaḥ iti anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ eva sattya śabda ātmanaḥ bhrāntau api na bhrāntau sattya rūpam eva śabdasya kevalam avasthitam tatas tat eva pratibhāseta iti na bhrāntiḥ nnāma bhavet 
[596,i_596,iii]	tasmāt tattva avabhāsi tve na bhrāntiḥ nnāma vidyate sarva meya parityāge bhrāntiḥ bhrāntiḥ iti sthitam nanu śabda mātra janita artha pratipatti lakṣaṇa artha kriyā vidyate na tu mahat tva ādi kṛtaḥ kaścid artha pratyaya bhedaḥ tatortha kriyā kāritayā sphoṭa mātram eva sattyam itarada sattyam viparyayāt 
[596,iv_596,v]	tat api asatti am yatas na artha pratyāyanam śabdasya artha kāri tvam iṣyate saṃketa bhāvanātaḥ tu tad artha pratibhā udayaḥ vāsanāyāḥ prabodhasya śabda vid kāraṇam matam pāraṃparyeṇa janakam na ca bhedakam iṣyate upādānasya bhedena bhedaḥ na sahakāriṇaḥ tatra api sahakāri tvāt na dhvaniḥ bhedakaḥ mataḥ 
[596,viii_596,ix]	sa bhāga vāsanā samāgamāt eva artha pratyayaḥ tad artha ākāra vikalpa rūpaḥ upajāyate śabdaḥ tu tatra sahakārī vāsanā prabodvāreṇa pāramparyeṇa janakaḥ tatosya na bhedaka tā śabdasya tu sākṣāt artha kriyā tat jñāna jananam tat ca dūrāt ūra bhedena sphuṭa asphuṭatayā udvegān udvega sahabhāvitayā bhidyate eva tat kathat na bhedaḥ sva artha kriyā kārī tathā ca vastu eva bhedaḥ na bhrānti mātrakam yadi ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ syāt prayatna anantaram jñānam niyamena na syāt prāk api artham kasmāt na pratipādayati śrutasya pratipādana sāmarthyāt anyathā apratipādanañcet 
[596,x_596,xii]	nanu śrutaḥ evam saṃketa kāle sodyā api anuvarttate tatas pratītiḥ eva bhavet na paścātna prayatnāt prāc apratītiḥ tadā vyañjaka abhāvāt na iti ced samāna kāla vyakti kārī hi vyañjakaḥ tat etat asat yatas yathā samāna kālasya vyañjakaḥ vyañjakaḥ bhavet tathā sarva ātmanā vyaṅgya vyañjakaḥ vyañjakaḥ bhavet tathā kāla antara sthāyī sa tena vyajyate yadi tadā kāla antare tasye vyañjaka apekṣitā katham 
[596,xvi]	na hi vyañjakam aviparīta rūpa avyaktau vyañjakam bhavati na ca kāla antara sthāyi rūpa vyaktau kāla antare vyañjakena kiñcid kṛtam avyaktasya vyañjaka apekṣā anyathā tadā api apara vyañjakam punar aparam iti vyaktiḥ eva na syāt anavasthā duḥsthitā yat api paścāttana jñānāt prākapi anupalambhanam tat api ayukta prayatnāt prāk sataḥ prayatna anantaram yat rūpam tatra niyamena jñāna ayogāt na hi prāk api tat eva rūpam tasmin eva upalabhyamāne anupalabdham yuktam tasya ca prāgbhāvinaḥ prayatnasya tatra sarvathā anupayogāt pareṇa eva sarva ātmanā vyakta tvāt sva kāla saṅgatam eva rūpam vyanakti iti ced kim va etat anyena anyasya vyavacchedaḥ pūrva apara jñāna eka tve prayatna bheda upi na vibhedakaḥ aneka tve jñāna kālāt bhidyate jñeyam api 
[596,xvii_597,i]	atha āvaraṇa abhāvaḥ yadā tadā upalabdhiḥ nna vidyamānasya api āvaraṇa tiraskṛta tvāt kuḍya antaritaḥ na eva kaṭaḥ san api dṛśyate tad abhāve kṛte anyena punar dṛṣṭeḥ sa gocaraḥ idam pratyakṣatas siddham pramāṇena avadhāritam śabde api āvaraṇa abhāvaḥ prayatnena vidhīyate satām api āvaraṇa bhāve anupalambhāt tad abhāve punar upalambhāt anvayavi atirekābhyām āvaraṇa bhāva kṛtaḥ upalambha vyāghātaḥ natu āvaraṇe svayam eva na bhavati vikāraḥ vā paraḥ pratyakṣeṇa upalambhāt tad avasthasya eva 
[597,ii_597,iii]	tat etat anālocita parāparasya parasya vacanam yatas pratibhijñā udayāt eva tatra api avikṛtaiḥ gatiḥ abhāve api upalambhasya katham pratyakṣataḥ gatiḥ upalambha nivṛttiḥ hi tad rūpa abhāva sādhanī upalabdhiḥ parasya iti na pramāṇam iha īkṣyate pratyabhijñānataḥ tasya madhye api yadi sādhanam pratyabhijñā anumānam syāt na pratyakṣa puraḥsaram pratyakṣa apūrvaka tve hi bhavet andha paraṃparā anumānasya tasya api tathābhūta aprasiddhitaḥ 
[597,vii]	na hi āvaraṇa vyavahita anupalambhe tadā eva pratyakṣataḥ upalambhaḥ avikṛtasya paścāt upalambhaḥ nirāvaraṇasya iti ced tadā eva bhāvaḥ a vikṛtiḥ vā syāt madhya bhāvaḥ tu pratyabhijñayā parokṣaḥ pratīyate tathā ca anumānam yatas idānīm avikṛtam tasmāt prāk api iti anumāna lakṣaṇa yogāt tatra ca pratyakṣa abhāve kathantad anu mānam pratyakṣa pūrvakam sarvatra ca pūrva apara bhāvaḥ pratyabhijñā pramāṇakaḥ eva anumāna pūrvaka tāyām anumānasya tat api anumānam anumānāt eva iti aparyavasānāt andha paraṃparā pareṇa pratyakṣatas pratīyate tena pratyakṣa pūrvakatā iti ced tatra api na pratyakṣatā na hi pareṇa pratyakṣatas pratipannam iti parasya pratītiḥ atha asau kathayet na vacanasya prāmāṇya abhāvāt sattya vādi tvañca na ātmanaḥ api pratipattum samarthaḥ paraḥ yat anena pratipannam tat eva mayā pratipannam iti na hi para pratipattyā miśritam pratīyamānam tathā pratyetum śakyam tat eva idam iti tatas itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ paraspara kathanena eka tā pratipatteḥ 
[597,viii_597,ix]	atha anumānena pratītiḥ tathā bhū vikāra darśanāt tena api saḥ eva pratipannaḥ iti tathābhūta tā eva tarhi sidhyati na ekatā iti na idam yuktimat na khalu anumānam sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam na hi dhūmāt agniḥ saḥ eva sidhyati yadi romāṃca sambhava ādinā samāna vyavahāreṇa ekatā sukha ādīnām ātmanaḥ ca na kim atha sukha ādīnām paraspara vyāvṛta tayā pratīteḥ nna ekatā tathā sati pratīyamānayoḥ api sva parābhyām amiśrita pratīteḥ bhedaḥ eva yuktaḥ samāna deśa tā api tad pratītyabhāvena pratīyate eva na hi bhāva svabhāvāt aparaḥ deśaḥ tasmāt satām api āvaraṇa sadbhāvena upalambhaḥ iti na siddham etat 
[597,x_597,xii]	nanu pratītiḥ asti tat eva para pratipannam mayā pratipannam iti na ca bādhakam asti na ca atra sūkṣma īkṣikayā bādhakamāneyam yatas utprekṣyeta hi yaḥ mohāt ajātam api bādhakam sa sarva vyavahāreṣu saṃśaya ātmā kṣayam vrajet nahi sūkṣma īkṣikayā nirūpyamāṇam kiñcid avasthāpanām arhati 
[597,xiii_598,i]	tat asa tathā hi sūkṣmokṣikā niṣedhena pramāṇasya niṣedhanam nahi pramāṇāt aparā paraiḥ sūkṣma īkṣikā iṣyate sūkṣma īkṣikā loka vyavahāra bādhanī na avatārayitavyā iti pramāṇa nirapekṣaṇā eva vyavaharttavyam iti syāt tathā ca vyarthakaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ na hi sthūla buddhi vyavahāra saṃbarddhana artham śāstra vyāpāraḥ śāstra moha nivarttam iti sarva abhyupagamāt 
[598,ii_598,v]	nirūpaṇe bādha kañcet na nivārayitum kṣamam na hi vajram patan mūrdhni pallavena nivāryate saṃsāra vyavahāraḥ ca na anucchedyaḥ vipaścitā yathā dṛṣṭa vidhānāt vā vyavahārasya kā kṣatiḥ andha paraṃparayā eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva rūpaḥ vyavahāraḥ vyavahāriṇām anuparate eva atas eva asya bhāva nirūpaṇena nivarttanam nirvāṇa mārga ābha niviṣṭaiḥ na hi samvṛti mātra tvāt saṃsāraḥ paraḥ īkṣyate tattvam eve ca nirvāṇam evam sati avatiṣṭhataḥ na tattva atattvayoḥ bhedaḥ iti eṣā paramārtha tā atattvam iti manvīta tattvam eva avicāritam 
[598,vii]	tattvam hi nirūpyamāṇam sakalam advaitībhavati atannirūpeṇa tu tat eva prapañca rūpam atattvam saṃsāraḥ tatas vinirūpaṇāt saṃsāra ucchedaḥ iṣṭaḥ eva āpatitaḥ iti katham hi apavrajyā yā varttana tattva dṛṣṭiḥ tāvat vyavahāraḥ na bādhyatas eva tasmāt iṣṭam eva āpatita mayam eva tu vidvat jana vyavahāraḥ tatra śanais śanais avidyā apanaya artham anityat tvam tāvat prasādhyate yatra viparyastaḥ lokaḥ tasmāt yat yadā dṛśyate tadā tat pūrva apara kāla vyavacchedena grahaṇāt yat yathā dṛśyate tathā tat iti avagantavyam anyathā padārtha vyavasthā bhāvaḥ eva syāt 
[598,viii_598,ix]	atra paraḥ prāha yadi nāma asat nihitam pūrva aparam rūpam madhya grahaṇe anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam na gṛhyate sannihita pratyakṣeṇa tathā api na anupalambha mātrāt abhāvaḥ kāla antare tat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tadā ca upalabhyate eva tathā hi yatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇam yasya tatra upalambhanam na hi anyatra ghaṭaḥ tādṛś anyatra api upalabhyate 
[598,x_598,xiv]	tathā yadā upalabhya rūpa tvam tadā tasya upalambhanam na anyadā tasya tādṛś tvam na anyat ā api upalambhanam tat api anālocanam yatas eka tve tasya rūpasya tattva atattvam katham bhavet aneka tve tu tad paścāt upalabhyate iti asat nahi kālaḥ nāma aparaḥ yena tad abhāvāt tatrastha rūpa abhāve tadā anupalambhaḥ tat eva rūpam pūrva apara bhāvena upalabhyamānam kāla ākhyām labhya bhate tathā hi eṣa kālaḥ varttate asmākam iti śīta pīḍita avasthā śīta kālaḥ na anyaḥ 
[598,xv_599,iii]	eka tve tasya bhāvasya kālasya api ekatā bhavet tad kāla abhāva taḥ tasya tatas na anupalambhanam tasmin tiṣṭhati kāla abhāva asiddheḥ anya tve vā kālasya api nitya tvāt saḥ api upalabhyate eva pūrva para ādi rūpaḥ atha kṣaṇa lava ādayaḥ kalā avayavāḥ tadā kālaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ eva prāptaḥ kālatvad nāma sāmānyam nityam iti ced na kālasya dravya padārtha tvāt tadā api vā pūrva apara bhāvasya upalabdheḥ sārvakāli vayā iva upalabdhiḥ atha kāla avayavānām anupalambhāt anupalabdhiḥ tat etat api asat yatas anyasya darśana abhāvāt dṛṣṭasya adarśanam katham adṛśyamānena ekatvam katham gabhyeta kenacid etena atīta sahacāri padārtha upadhānam pratyuktam 
[599,iv]	na ca pūrva aparabhā vi kṣaṇa vyaṅgyaṅ kāla tvam yuktam tasmāt yadi śabdaḥ prayatna anantaram upalabhyaḥ pūrva vyavasthita rūpeṇa api upalabhyeta pareṇa api ititi ekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tatas ca tasya api pūrva aparasya rūpasya tadā eva upalambhāt aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ na asti iti kṣaṇi kaḥ tā eva tasya ca ghaṭa ādi kṣaṇasya sarva ātmanā upalambhāt āvaraṇam akiñcitkara tvāt ayuktam atha akṣa upakārī prayatnaḥ tadā api sarva ātmanā upalabdhau pūrvarūpa upalabdhiḥ ita na akṣa upakāraḥ pratiniyata rūpa upalambha kārī tatas niyamena ana tara rūpeṇa upalabdhiḥ iti na asti etat dṛśyate ca anantaram eva tatas tāvat mātra tā eva tasya na nitye akṣa upakāraḥ tathā hi
