[599,v_599,viii]	saṃskārataḥ api tasya eva tathābhūta upalabdhitaḥ na saṃskāre api yasya asti tatra tasya upalambhanam avidyamānat nitya tvam upalabdhum na śakyate satta upalambhaḥ eva iti na upalambha atirikta tā na hi nitya tvam anyat śakyam upalabdhum nanu yadi nāma na upalabhyate tathā api katham anitya tā bhāvaḥ anupalambhaḥ eva asatta upalabdhi lakṣaṇasya na ca tad rūpam anulabdhi lakṣaṇam 
[599,ix_599,xi]	atas eva upalambhaḥ eva sattā tad abhāve katham sat tā iti na nitya tā sambhavaḥ śabda upakāra pakṣe tu sā eva anitya tā atas eva kadācid nirapekṣasya kārya ākṛti virodhataḥ kādācid ka phalam siddham tat liṅgam jñānam īdṛśam yadi asau śabdonyaḥ vā kāla antara vyāpī tadā tathā eva upalabhyeta kadācid upalambhaḥ kāryat na syāt na hi tasya kādicitkam rūpam na ca anyathā upalambhaḥ tad rūpa grahaṇam atha bhrāntiḥ asau na khalu arvāk darśanaḥ vyāpi rūpam upalabdhum samarthaḥ na ca tat asāmarthye grāhyam anyathā bhavati bhrāntiḥ api ca tad avisamvādāt pramāṇam 
[599,xii_599,xv]	nanu bhrāntiḥ abhrānta darśanena bādhyate tadā ca asau bhrāntiḥ iti śakyam avasātum na pratyabhijñā pratyayena kāla deśa vyāpi rūpa sādhakena vinivarttanāt tat etat asat pratyabhijñāna sāmarthyam prāk eva atra apahastitam pratyakṣeṇa eva bādhā asya bhavati iti upapāditam na hi pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ pratyakṣam pramāṇam pratyakṣam avyāpi rūpa grāhyam indriya vyāpārāt avisamvāda sambhavāt ca tatas pratyakṣaṇā eva pratyabhijñā bādhanam iti prāk eva upapāditam api ca 
[599,xvi_600,i]	khaṇḍaśas grahaṇam vyāptau api syāt yadi vastunaḥ savavastu ekam eva syāt tasya grahaṇam aṃśaśas yadi vastu ekam api nānā rūpa kāla deśa sambandhi tayā vyāpi anyathā parigṛhyate iti sambhavaḥ ekam eva sakalam vastu syāt vastu vastu iti sarvasya pratyabhijñānāt eka tve ghaṭa ādi bhedaḥ na syāt iti ced śabdasya api tarhi alpa mahat tva ādi bhedaḥ na syāt udātta ādi bhedaḥ ca iti samānam udātta ādi bhede api śabdaḥ iti vyavahārāt eka tvam api ced ghaṭa ādi bhede api vastu vastu iti kin na vyavahāraḥ ekatva aneka tvam astu iti ced ekatva asatti a tvam eva tarhi prāptam tathā hi 
[600,ii_600,iv]	pratyabhijñāna sāmarthyāt ekatva grahaṇe sati eka tā aneka tā prāptiḥ apramāṇīkṛtañca tat yadā hi pratyabhijñānam apramāṇantada eka tvam pratyabhijñā asādhyam asattyam iti bhedaḥ eva sattyaḥ pariśiṣyate tasmāt abhinnasya na bhinna rūpam grāhyam pramāṇam kvacid asti sattyam bhinne tu bhāve tad abheda siddhiḥ vikalpakāt eva na tad pramāṇam 
[600,vi]	bhede hi satye sati tad abhedaḥ kalpanā śilpa uparacitaḥ eva pratyavamarśana mātra sādhanaḥ bhedetu asattye kasya asāvabhedaḥ na ca abheda mātreṇa vyavahāraḥ tasmāt bhedena dharmiṇā bhavitavyam yasya dharmaḥ abhedaḥ na hi dharmiṇaḥ asattya tve tad abhedaḥ tathā bhavati na hi śaśa viṣāṇa asattya tve tat taikṣṇyam sattya tvam 
[600,vii_600,x]	nanu bhedaḥ api abheda dharmiṇī asati kasya pratīyatām tat asat yatas yena eva anya sambandhaḥ tena bhedaḥ saḥ ucyate anyathā anyena saṃsarge bhedaḥ eva viśīryate abhedaḥ tu bheda pratyākhyānena bhavati tasya dharma rūpa tvāt sāmānya dharma vat tasmāt kadācid narapekṣasya kārya ākṛti virodhataḥ kādācid ka phalam siddham tat liṅgam jñānam īdṛśam 
[600,xi]	yadi na anyaḥ padārtha ātmā atruṭyat svabhāvaḥ sarvadā tadā jñānam api tathā eva kāryam bhavet yat tu kadācid kārya akaraṇam viccheda rūpantan na syāt na hi tad rūpe gṛhyamāṇe tat rupam eva para apekṣa grahaṇantasya api agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt tasmāt tat jñānam īdṛśam vicchinna rūpantat rūpasya eva kādācid kasya phalam iti siddham tatas kāryāt anitya tā pratītiḥ 
[600,xii]	nanu svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau hetū nirddiṣṭau udāharaṇa dvayena iti ayuktam prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ayam eva kārya hetuḥ svabhāva hetuḥ cetu śakyam upadarśayitum svabhāva hetutva avadayam iti eka vākyatā eva atra vādinām kārya hetuḥ tu jñānam liṅga mita udānīm eva pratipāditam tatas ekena eva tantreṇa dvayat nirddiṣṭam iti vyarthakaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti nirddeśaḥ 
[600,xiii_601,i]	sattyam etat tathā api etena eva prasiddhaḥ api svabhāvasya pṛthakkṛtiḥ kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam kāryeṇa hi saha nirddeśe tad sāha caryāt īdṛśaḥ eva sarvaḥ svabhāva hetuḥ sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ eva svabhāva hetuḥ api syāt āśaṃkā tad vyāvṛti artham apara prakāraḥ api svabhāva hetuḥ asti yaḥ sa pakṣa vyāpī iti kṛtaka tva ādityasya pṛthak nirddeśaḥ 
[601,ii_601,vii]	nanu tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvidhā ca āsan tad atyaye sa hetuḥ viparīta usmāt viruddha unyaḥ tu aniścita iti kim artham pṛthak vacanam atra ucyate vyutpati arthā ca hetu ukti rukta artha anumitau kṛtā prabheda mātram ākhyātum lakṣaṇantu na bhidyate pṛthak vacane hi tat eva parisphuṭam bhavati tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvidhā ca yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt ca iti anyathā dvayasya apradarśane dvidhā ca iti etat eva sambhavati lakṣaṇam san ā iva sajātīyaḥ iti etat tu udāharaṇa abhāvāt asambhavi lakṣaṇam bhavet 
[601,viii_601,xiv]	nanu vipakṣāt vyāvṛttaḥ bhavatu tāvatā sarva saṅgrahaḥ iti na āśaṅkā yuktā sattyam etat tathā api vyutpati artham tasya eva ayam sva artha anumāna lakṣaṇasya udāharaṇa prapañcaḥ tat eva tu lakṣaṇam yat sva artha anumāne nanu tritayam tarhi darśanīyam kārya hetuḥ svabhāva hetuḥ tādṛśaḥ sa pakṣa vyāpī ced tathā ca dhyutpādanam bhavet na ca udyam etat yatas tena atra kārya liṅgena svabhāvaḥ api eka deśa bhāj uktaḥ sadṛśa udāhṛtiḥ ca atas prayatnāt vyakti janmanaḥ 
[601,xv]	yatas vyutpati arthaḥ prabheda nirddeśaḥ tena anena eva kārya liṅgena svabhāvaḥ api eka deśa bhāj pratipāditaḥ ācāryeṇa sadṛśam udāharaṇam atas eva anyathā agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti parisphuṭam eva kārya hetum kasmāt na udāharati kim yatna pratipādya kārya hetu tvena prayatna ānantarīyaka tva udāharaṇena tasmāt prayatnāt vyakti janmanaḥ kārya svabhāva lakṣaṇasya sadṛśam udāharaṇam abhyadhāyi jñānam api hi prayatna anantara bhāvi svabhāvaḥ api iti bhavati sadṛśam udāharaṇam 
[601,xvi_601,xvii]	nanu prayatna anantaram svabhāvaḥ eva svabhāva antarantu jñānam akāraṇasya aviṣaya tvāt na yuktam etat para abhiprāyeṇa ukta tvāt pare hi śabda nitya tva vādinaḥ jñānam eva prayatna anantara bhāvi icchanti tān pratīdam ucyate viṣayasya api kāraṇa tvam asti eva akāraṇasya aviṣaya tvāt tatas prayatna anantara bhāvi jñānam yat tvayā iṣyate śabdena api tat janayitavya su a ākāra arpaṇena tatas samasta pūrva aparabhāvi rūpa grahaṇa prasaṅga tasya anyathā grahītum aśakyatvāt na khaṇḍaśas grahaṇam iti pratipāditam 
[602,i_602,iv]	atha api syāt gṛhyate eva bhāvi bhūta rūpa tā sakala kāla kalā kalāpa vyāpinī anyathā paścāt darśane katham smaraṇam ayam sa mayā tadā dṛṣṭaḥ iti tathā hi ayam dṛṣṭaḥ tadā api iti na agṛhīte pravarttate smaraṇena gṛhīta tvam pūrva vṛttam hi sādhyate tat api kuca udyam eva yatas grahaṇam na vijānāti mayā bhāvi api gṛhyate smaraṇantu vijānāti tat etat parama adbhutam 
[602,v]	yatra hi grahaṇasya grahaṇa svabhāvasya na vyāpāraḥ tatra tad anusāriṇaḥ eva smaraṇasya vyāpāraḥ iti mahat etat vastu tattva viveka kauśalam na hi bhāvi rūpam grahītum śakyam sandehāt kadācid na bhavet api atha matiḥ yadi bhaviṣyati gṛhītam eva mayā iti paścāt smaraṇena gṛhītam iti viṣayīkariṣye iti pratīteḥ gṛhītantat api iti va sat 
[602,vi_602,viii]	gṛhītaḥ api hi yadi arthaḥ katham atra pravarttatām sandigdhañca gṛhītañca paraspara virodhinī yadi tat api bhaviṣyati tadā gṛhītam eva iti mahān grahaṇa vyāpāraḥ vidyamānam hi jñānam grahaṇa svabhāvam anyathā vā na aparaḥ prakāraḥ paraspara virodhāt anyonya vyavaccheda rūpa tvāt pratyakṣe api hi sandehaḥ yadi pratyakṣatā katham grahaṇe hi na sandeha unupalabdhau tu saṃśayāt 
[602,ix]	yadi grahaṇam varttamānaḥ iva na saṃdehaḥ tasya avyatirekāt na ca tadā gṛhyamāṇam bhāvi varttamāna rūpa avyatirekāt varttamāna vat eva atha bhāvi kāla sambandhāt bhāvi evantarhi svarūpataḥ na bhāvānām varttamānāditā api tu bhāvi vartamāna bhūta padārtha sahabhāva mātram kālasya aparasya abhāvāt bhāve vā saḥ api padārthaḥ eva sahakārī tathā sati tasya api bhāvi rūpa grahaṇe bhāvi rūpa tā gṛhītā eva iti na sandehaḥ bhavet anitya padārtha sahacarita tvam bhāvi bhūta tvam iti ced na tathābhūtasya grahītum aśakyatvāt katham ayam eva mayā gṛhītaḥ iti smaraṇam svarūpam gṛhītam eva sāhacarya agrahaṇe api iti api na samyak na hi svarūpam bhūta bhāvitā iti bhavataḥ eva idam matam tasmāt varttamāna jñāna grahaṇāt varttamānam eva gṛhyatām 
[602,x_602,xii]	nīla avabhāsa jñānena yathā nīlatayā gatiḥ varttamāna avabhāse api varttamāna tayā gatiḥ atha agṛhīte katham smaraṇam nanu ayam gṛhīte api samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi gṛhyamāṇe smṛtiḥ nna asti grahaṇa anantaram hi sā atīte grahaṇe tasya rūpa abhāve na sā smṛtiḥ idānīm smaraṇam jātam katham jānāti pūrva tām avidyamānam nīrūpam kathantad rūpa tā smṛteḥ atat rūpā api jānāti smṛtiḥ iti ati sāhasam atha ātmā jñaḥ tadā api āsīt sa jānāti eva pūrva tām grahaṇe hi asya sāmarthyam smaraṇe api upapadyate smaraṇam grahaṇam ca ādaḥ vyatiriktam yadā ātmanaḥ 
[602,xvii_603,iii]	grahaṇa smaraṇe tasya na evam staḥ atad svabhāvataḥ na smaraṇa grahaṇa pṛthagbhāve tasya atad svabhāvasya grahītusmartṛ tā śarīrasya api prasaṅgāt anitya tayā na iti ced ākāśa ādīnām api syāt tatra asamavāyāt anayoḥ iti yadi matam tat api asat samam yasmāt anusandha ānataḥ tasya grahaṇa smṛti yogi tā vyoma ādīnām api bhavet tulyantatrā api codanam 
[603,iv_603,v]	smaraṇam anyathā na upapadyate iti smartā parikalpyate na hi pūrva apara kāla bhāvinam kañcid antareṇa idam yuktimat iti tathā ca ākāśa ādīnām eva idam astu kimartha antara parikalpanā prayāsena samavāyaḥ api evam eva paricodanīyaḥ smaraṇa ādīnām vā nityatā abhyupeyā saḥ eva ātmani ced tat eva āyātam smṛtvā ca katham ajñāyi yatra agrahaṇa saṃśayaḥ smaraṇasya tadā a bhāvāt pūrva tāyāḥ kathaṅgatiḥ iti
[603,vii_603,viii]	tasmāt na pratyakṣeṇa iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt nityāyām na prayatna anantaram pūrva anusandhānena grahaṇa sambhavaḥ iti apūrva apara rūpa grahaṇāt anitya tā śabdasya iti sthitam etat yat ca uktam svabhāva antaram jñānam na prayatna anantaram iti tat anyathā api pariharttum alam yadi nāma svabhāva anantaram tathā api prayatna anantara tā pi sambhavati eva na hi atra ati sūkṣma īkṣikā prayojanavatī tasmāt anena eva udāharaṇena dvayam api kārya svabhāva liṅga dvyam darśitam 
[603,ix_603,xii]	nanu kārya svabhāva hetu udāhaṇam eva kasmāt bhedena upadarśitam na anyaḥ api bhedaḥ atra samādhiḥ yatna antarīyikā sattā yaḥ vā ātmā svaḥ avibhāgavān sa tena avyabhicārī syāt iti arthan tad prabhedanam yasya yatna anantareṇa sattā saḥ eva hetuḥ tat avyabhicārāt nahi vyatiriktaḥ kārya tām virahayya avyabhicārī nanu vyabhicārāt eva hetuḥ na kārya tayā bhasma api hi kāryam agneḥ na ca tasya avyabhicāraḥ tathā kārya tām antareṇa api saṃyogi jalam ādhāram gamayati 
[603,xiii]	tat asat yatas na ucyate kārya tayā gamakaḥ eva api tu gamakaḥ kārya tayā eva vyatiriktaḥ kārya tāmvinā na gamayati iti yathābhatamvā bhasma kāryam atītāt api agneḥ bhavat deśa antara sthāt api tathābhūtam gamayati eva atas eva kārya tā prayuktam gamaka tvam yena tad viśeṣāt viśiṣyate evambhūtaḥ eva khalu atra api nimitta nimitti bhāvaḥ saṃyogena tu gamakatve adhāraḥ api ādheyasya gamakaḥ syāt atha ādhāraḥ ādheyam antareṇa api āste tena asau na gamakaḥ ādheyantu na ādhāram antareṇa jala ādyāḥ te tatas gamakam yadi avantadeva kāryam gamakam iti āyātam yena hi vinā yat na bhavati tat tasya kāryam na ca ādheyasya sthitiḥ ādhāram antareṇa bhavati atas kāryam na tu sthitiḥ eva kāryat na jalam evantarhi sthitiḥ eva gamikā na jalam iti na vyabhicāraḥ 
[604,i_604,ii]	atha sthiti viśiṣṭam jalam eva gamayati jala viśiṣṭā sthitiḥ eva gamayati iti kinna bhavati yuktañca etat eva tasyāḥ eva anvaya vyatirekeṇa gamaka tvāt na ca sthiti vyatiriktam aparam jalam nanu patat api jalam eva bhavati tat jalam na tu tat eva anyat api jalam jalam eva na ca jala tvam sāmānyam asti iti pratipāditam sattve vā na tat gamakam vyaktiḥ eva gamikā sā ca kāryam iti na kārya t anyasya gamaka tvam 
[604,iii]	atha ekā eva sā vyiktiḥ iti matam tat api asat tat eva sthitam tat eva anyathā iti prasaṅgāt paryāyeṇa tathā abhāve api na doṣaḥ iti ced evantarhi pūrva aparayoḥ eka tā pratīti abhāvāt katham ekā vyaktiḥ nakhalva pratīyamānam itareṇa saha ekam pratītiḥ eka tām sādhayati na pratītyapratītī apratīteḥ bhāva sādhana ayogāt pratyabhijñā tu pratyākhyātā tasmāt sarvatra nirūpyamāṇā kārya tā eva gamaka tve nibandhanam 
[604,iv_604,vi]	yena rūpeṇa janya tvam jala bhasma ādi vastunaḥ tena eva gamaka tve api sthitam iti anyatas a gatiḥ yova ātmā svaḥ vibhāgavān iti yasya yaḥ ātmā sa gamakaḥ tasya vṛkṣa ātmā śiṃśapā sā gamikāḥ vṛkṣa tāyāḥ nanu yathā vṛkṣa ātmā śiṃśapā tathā vṛkṣaḥ api śiṃśapa ātmā eva tādātmyasya ubhaya gata tvam antareṇa abhāvāt na avibhāgavat tva abhāvāt vṛkṣaḥ hi śiṃśapā vyatirekeṇa api asti palāśa ādiḥ na tu śiṃśapā tathā iti sā eva avibhāgavatī gamikā nanu 
[604,vii_604,xi]	samāne api tad ātma tve avibhāgaḥ gamakaḥ yadi tādātmyam gamaka tve syāt ekantat nibandhanam tādātmyantu vinā api anyaḥ avyabhicāraḥ tathā īkṣyate dhūmasya tena tādātmyam gamaka tve anibandhanam anvaya vyatirekābhyām na hi tasya animitta tā tat etat asat uktam etat na tādātmyam tad utpattī vinā kvacid gamaka avi abhicāri tvam tena te tad nibandhanam tat avāntara bhede api gamaka tvasya bhinna tā tad ātmakasya gamakaḥ tad ātmā eva na bhedinaḥ 
[604,xiii_604,xvi]	kāryantat vyatiriktasya kāraṇasya iti bhinna tā atas eva āha saṃyogi ādiṣu yeṣu asti pratibandhaḥ na tādṛśam na te hetavaḥ iti uktam vyabhicārasya sambhavāt saṃyogena gamaka tve agniḥ api dhūma saṃyuktaḥ iti gamakaḥ kinna dhūmasya avyabhicāra abhāvāt iti ced sa tarhi avyabhicāraḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva vyatirekiṇaḥ 
[604,xvii_605,i]	atra paraḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena gamaka tve tasya dbiṣṭha tvāt agniḥ api gamakaḥ syāt na yatna antarīyikā sattā iti vacanāt na ca kārya kāraṇa vyatirekeṇa aparaḥ kārya karaṇa bhāvaḥ tena kārya karaṇa bhāvena gamakaḥ iti kāryaṃtvena kāraṇam na ca gamakaḥ evantarhi kāraṇam api gamakam kasmāt na bhavati bhavati eva na anyathābhāvaḥ sa tu jñātuntathā na śakyate yathā jñāyate tathā agamaka tvemeva tena ca rūpeṇa gamakaḥ eva tathā hi 
[605,ii_605,vi]	kurvatā vahni tā dhūmam kāraṇa tvam avāpyate kurvatām yadi gamyeta gamaka tvam bhavet api yat tva śakyan tathāḥ gantum iti doṣaḥ na tasya saḥ tathā tat kāryam eva syāt dhūma abhāvāt abhāvataḥ vyāpakam vyatirikta tve kāraṇam sarvam eva hi evam svabhāva hetau api vācyam tatra api śiṃśapa ātmā syāt vṛkṣaḥ api gamakaḥ yatas tādātmyam sugamanna iti gamaka tvam na vidyate tathā vā āgamaka tve syāt avibhāga tayā gatiḥ tasmāt sarvā gatiḥ kārya avibhāga tvena vastunaḥ 
[605,ix]	yathā ca vṛkṣa apāvakayoḥ aniyatam tādātmyam kāraṇa tvam ca śiṃśapā tu adhūmam prati tathā gamaka tvam api aniyata tvena eva aniyame katham gamakaḥ aniyamena gamaka tva nibandhanasya bhāvāt evam hi tad tad nibandhana sambhavati yadi tad anuvarttanam anyathā api tattva iti prasaṅgaḥ saṃyoge api evam eva iti ced tat na yatas 
[605,x_605,xii]	saṃyoga ādiṣu yeṣu asti pratibandhaḥ na tādṛśaḥ na te hetavaḥ iti uktam vyabhicārasya sambhavāt saṃyogī ādhāraḥ ādheyena tulya tvāt saṃyogasya samavāyī jāti guṇa kriyā padārthaḥ na ca ādhāraḥ ādheyam gamayati avinā abhā asya kārya kāraṇa bhāva ākhyasya asaṃbhavāt tathā jātiḥ kevalā api pratīyamānā vinaṣṭāyām vyaktau na jātimantam avagamayati kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya asambhavāt eva 
[605,xiii_605,xv]	atha ādheyam ādhāram gamayati tatra avinābhāvasya sambhavāt iti matiḥ tathā tarhi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva gamakaḥ avinā abhāvaḥ eva iti ced tat api asat avinā abhāvaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ atas āha sati vā pratibandheḥ tu saḥ eva gati sādhanaḥ niyamaḥ hi avinābhāvaḥ aniyataḥ ca na sādhanam sa ca niyamaḥ parasya paratra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva gamaka tvasya anyathā abhāvāt iti pratipāditam svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau hetū dvau ca viparyayau nirddiṣṭau iti vyākhyātam 
[605,xvi_606,i]	idānīm vivādāt bheda sāmānyaḥ iti vyācaṣṭe bhedaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ ekānta vyatirekī sāmānyam ekānta anvayi tayoḥ anaikāntikayoḥ api gamaka tvam āha paraḥ tatra tattvam pratipādayati ācāryaḥ agamaka tvam tatra yaḥ sanni tyādinā nanu aikānti kavya tirikeṇa āgamaka tvam eva yuktam sattyam yadi ekasmāt eva antāt vyatirekaḥ sidhyati sa tu na sidhyati pakṣaḥ eva vyabhicāra āśaṅkātaḥ tathā hi aikāntika tvam vyāvṛtteḥ avinābhāvaḥ ucyate tat ca na apratibaddheṣu tatas eva anvaya sthitiḥ 
[606,ii]	nirātmakāt vyāvṛttim eva prāṇa ādi katham sidhyati yadi sa ātmaka tvena avinābhāvaḥ bhavet tat ca apratibaddheṣu na sambhavati sarvatas vipakṣāt vyāvṛtteḥ sva mukhena pratipattum aśakteḥ na khalu sakala vipakṣa darśanam yena atra na asti atra na asti iti pratīyāt anvaya mukhena tu sambhavati yatas tat niyata tvena grahaṇam pratibandha grahaṇam sa ca pratyakṣa pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ tatas niyata tva grahaṇāt anya vyāvṛttiḥ ākṛṣyate anyathā niyata rūpa agrahaṇam eva tathā hi 
[606,iii_606,iv]	anya bhāve api atad bhāvaḥ tad bhāve abhāvaḥ eva ca anya abhāve api abhāvaḥ na tatas tad kārya tā gatiḥ yadā hi anya bhāve api bhāvaḥ na asti candana gandhasya tad bhāve bhāvaḥ ca tadā candana gandhaḥ tad kāryam iti sidhyati anyathā na iti nirṇṇayaḥ sa ca vyatirekam antareṇa na astiti vyatirekaḥ api tad ā ātma bhūtaḥ prasidhyati 
[606,v_606,vii]	nanu anvayaḥ api vyāpī na sidhyati sarvatra asmāt asya udayaḥ iti na etat asti asmāt eva udayosya iti tāvat mātreṇa tad gatiḥ sa ca anyasmāt anutpādaḥ tadā eva avagataḥ tathā na hi etasmāt anyatra bhavati eva iti etat gamaka tve nibandhanam api tu asmāt eva na anyasmāt iti tathā ca pratipattiḥ asti eva tat anyasmāt prāk anutpādasya darśanāt tad abhāve abhāvam jhaṭiti eva pratiyatām 
[606,viii_606,xiii]	nanu yadi nāma asvasmāt no tpattimat kutaścid anya viśeṣāt bhaviṣyati na hi anyaḥ iti eva sarvaḥ samānaḥ tatas na vyatirekaḥ tad bhāve a bhāvaḥ iti avyatirekaḥ api na niścitaḥ adṛśyasya api sambhavāt tat etat asat yatas ayam hetuḥ tava evam syāt tava eva ayam anugrahaḥ sva anugrahe api anicchā ced vataḥ eva asi sarvathā tava evam gamakaḥ hetuḥ anyathā a sambhavāt iti pratipādite yadi evam na iṣyate anyā gatiḥ anviṣyatām na ca sambhavati iti sva badhāya tarhi śūla takṣā api ca tad abhāvāt abhāvosya jhaṭiti eṣa katham bhavet anantaram bhavet na evam yadi anyat api kāraṇam 
[606,xiv]	aviguṇa sāmagrī sannidhānā ttat bhavati eva tad abhāve tu jhaṭiti eva na bhavati iti aniti api śācā ādi kāraṇa tvena sambhavati tat api jhaṭiti eva upayāti apayāti ca iti yadi abhyupagamaḥ sa tarhi piśācaḥ pāvakena vaśīkṛtaḥ iti pāvakasya eva hetu bhāvaḥ yadi anyasmāt api bhavet anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt yādṛcchikaḥ samvādaḥ iti prekṣā pūrva kāriṇām upāya anveṣaṇam yat pratiphalam niyamena na syāt asmākam tvad vaitavādinām na paramārthataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ nāma tasmāt pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa abhyupagame parisphuṭa anvaya sthitiḥ yasmāt 
[607,i_607,iii]	sva ātma tve hetu bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā sidhyati atas viśeṣe na vyatirekaḥ na ca anvayaḥ na hi atadātmani yatas tad abhāvāt niyamena abhāvavān na hi apratibandhaḥ nivarttakaḥ parasya svayat nivarttamānaḥ atiprasaṅgāt tathā ca na idam nirātmakam jīvat śarīram apramāṇa ādi tā prasaṅgāt iti hetuḥ na hi apratibandhavataḥ nivṛttau pratibaddha itarasya nivṛttiḥ na ca pratibandhavān avyāpakaḥ na ca tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandham antareṇa vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ anyena api prakāreṇa kasmāt na bhavati iti ced na prakāra antara asambhavāt saḥ api na prakāraḥ pratipannaḥ eva sādhakaḥ samīhitasya na ca tathā atas vyatirekitayā bhi matasya na vyatirekaḥ na api anvayaḥ iti ubhaya abhāvāta gamakaḥ eva sātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādima tvāt iti 
[607,iv_607,vii]	kathantarhi tad ubhaya abhāvāt ācāryeṇa ayam vyatireki uktaḥ tasya api etat eva vaktum abhimatam syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ yatas adṛṣṭi mātram ādāya kevalam vyatirekitā ukta anaikāntikaḥ tasmāt anyathā gamakaḥ bhavet para abhiprāyeṇa adarśana mātra siddham vyatirekam upādāya ācāryeṇa ayam vyatirekī iti pratipāditaḥ na tu niścita vyatirekaḥ anyathā niścita vyatireka sambhave gamakaḥ syāt tathā ca ācāryaḥ na kṣipet anaikāntika madhye tatas ācāryasya na atra niścita vyatireka abhiprāyaḥ 
[607,viii_607,xi]	nanu prāṇa ādi abhāvaḥ nairātmya vyāpī sa ca jīvat śarīre na asti iti niyamena vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyasya jīvat śarīre nairātmyasya nivṛttiḥ iti kathanna ātma siddhiḥ na siddhiḥ yatas prāṇa ādi abhāvaḥ nairātmya vyāpī iti vinivarttane ātmanaḥ vinivartteta prāṇa ādiḥ yadi tat ca na yadi vipakṣayoḥ vyāptiḥ sidhyet tadā aprāṇa ādi nivṛttau jīvat śarīre nairātmya nivṛttiḥ iti sidhyati ātmā vinā api anvayena sā eva tu vyāptiḥ vipakṣayoḥ sa pakṣa prāpti mantareṇa na sidhyati ātmanaḥ apratibandhe vattve na nivarttaka tvam eva na sidhyati na ca anivarttakasya nivṛttiḥ nivartti anivṛttyā vyāptā sidhyati tasmāt avyāpyasya nivṛtti abhāve pya avyāpakasya nivṛtteḥ anivṛttiḥ iti na ātma siddhiḥ 
[607,xii_608,ii]	anyasya vinivṛttya anya vinivṛtteḥ ayogataḥ tad ātmā tad prasūtaḥ ced na etat ātma upalambhane pratibandham antareṇa api yadi nivṛttiḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ eva tad ātmā tad prasūtaḥ ced atha ātmā prāṇa ādiḥ sarvam idam ātmā eva eti tatas vā prasūtaḥ ātmanaḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt na eṣa parihāraḥ yatas etat ātma upalambhane 
[608,iii_608,iv]	tasya upalabdha avagatau ca gatau ca prasidhyati yadi ātma upalabdhiḥ tad lakṣaṇa tvāt aparaḥ api tad svabhāvaḥ iti sidhyati saḥ eva tu na upalabdhaḥ kutas tad lakṣaṇa tvāt iti hetuḥ sidhyati samavāyaḥ api iha buddhi nibandhanaḥ na ātma anupalabdheḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tu pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ na apratyakṣaḥ ātmani iti kutas tad ātma tva tad prasūtī yatas 
[608,v_608,viii]	te ca atyantuparokṣasya dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ na ca ghaṭa ādau nairātmyam yatas atyantam na parokṣa tve anupalabdheḥ abhāvau id ātmanaḥ asambhava abhāve katham tat vyāpta tā gatiḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya hibhavataḥ anvaya vyatirekau kāraṇa vyāpaka tva sādhakau na ca ātma upalambhaḥ tatas kathantasya kāraṇa vyāpaka bhāvaḥ tad abhāve ca na prāṇa ādiḥ tad ātmā tad prasūtaḥ iti ca na sidhyati api ca 
[608,ix_608,xi]	anyatra adṛṣṭa rūpasya ghaṭa ādau na iti vā kutas ajñāta vyatirekasya vyāvṛtti vyāpitā kutas yaḥ hi anyatra dṛśyate deśe kāle vā saḥ idānīm atra vā na asti iti pratīyate iti sakalasya jagataḥ pratītiḥ yaḥ tu na jātucit pratīteḥ viṣayaḥ sa na asti atra iti kutas ullekhaḥ na hi adṛṣṭe pravarttante vitarkkāḥ kasyacid kvacid tādātmya pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarva apekṣaḥ param yadi 
[608,xiii_608,xiv]	vitarkkaḥ hi dṛṣṭaḥ eva kvacid aparatra adṛśyamāne pravarttata isti na vā iti na iti tu kutas niścayaḥ yadi paramayam ātmā na bhavati iti tādātmya niṣedha mātram na tu ghaṭa ādau ātmā na asti iti niścayaḥ vyāpita āyāntu sutarām eva tad vivikta upalambhena yadi ātmā na iti niścayaḥ ghaṭa ādau jīvataḥ kārī api asau na iti bhavatu asau 
[608,xv]	yathā vyatirikta tayā ghaṭa ādiḥ upalabhyamānaḥ nirātmakaḥ iti gamyate jīvat śarīram api tathā syāt na hi tat api tad vivikta tayā na upalabhyate tasmāt upalabhyatā abhāvāt ātmanaḥ na ghaṭa ādau na astitā gatiḥ tena ātmanaḥ ajñāta vyatirekasya vyāvṛtti vyāpitā prāṇa ādi abhāva vyāvṛtti vyāpita ātmanaḥ kutas yasya hi vyāvṛttiḥ yat vyāvṛttyā vyāptā tad vyāvṛttiḥ tena vyāpyate na ca ātma vyāvṛttiḥ asiddhā prāṇa ādi abhāvena vyāptā iti jñāyate tatas katham prāṇa ādi a bhāva vyāvṛttiḥ ātmanā vyāptā sidhyati yena prāṇa ādi abhāva vyāvṛtteḥ ātma siddhiḥ tasmāt na atra vyatireka niścayaḥ 
[608,xvi_609,iv]	nanu yathā ghaṭa ādau na prāṇa ādayaḥ iti pratīyate tathā ātmā na asti iti kim iti na pratītiḥ viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ yatas prāṇa ādeḥ ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva asattvam pratīyate na anupalambha mātrāt tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva asattvam pratīyate upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteḥ prāṇa ādīnām abhāva pratītirajīvat śarīre nanu evam ātmā iti viparyayaḥ api ca santu nāma nirātmakāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ tathā api na ātmā prasidhyati prāṇa ādi abhāva anivṛttyā 
[609,v_609,vii]	nanu yadi ātmā jīvat śarīre na bhavet prāṇa ādīnām api asambhavaḥ ātma abhāvasya prāṇa ādi nivarttaka tvasya ghaṭa ādau dṛṣṭa tvāt na anya abhāvasya nivarttaka tvāt tathā hi yasya hetoḥ abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇaḥ na dṛśyate dehe api yadi asau na syāt yuktaḥ dehena sambhavaḥ buddhi prayatna ādayaḥ api ghaṭa ādau na santi eva tad kintada bhāvāt prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ atha ātmanaḥ iti kaḥ khalu atra bhavataḥ sandeha apoha hetuḥ tatra yasya buddhi ādeḥ kāraṇasya abhāvena ghaṭe na dṛśyate prāṇa ādiḥ saḥ eva yadi dehe na syāt syāt prāṇa ādi viraha prasaṅgaḥ na ca buddhi ādayaḥ na santi tat katham prāṇa ādi nivṛtti prasaṅgaḥ 
[609,viii_609,xiv]	atha nairātmyena sādharmyam asti jīvat śarīra ghaṭa ādīnām yadi nāma buddhi ādi sadbhāva asadbhāva kṛtam vaidharmyam api tathā api nirātma tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat jīvat śarīram api prāṇa ādi virahi aprāṇa ādi virahi dharma tayā vā sa ātmakam atra ucyate bhinne api kiñcid sādharmyāt yadi tattvam pratīyate tadā prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām sa ātma tvam kinna mīyate na hi evam api kiñcit mātra sādharmyat na asti aniṣṭañcet pramāṇam hi sarveṣṭhīnāt nibandhanam bhāva abhāva vyavasthām kaḥ karttuntena vinā prabhuḥ 
[609,xv_609,xvii]	na hi icchayā pramāṇam api tu yatra pramāṇa sambhavaḥ tatra prekṣāvat icchā na aniṣṭam api pramāṇa ānītam viparyeti svātantryeṇa hi icchā nirapekṣam pramāṇam yuktam anyathā icchayā pramāṇasya svātantryeṇa vinā bhāva abhāva vyavasthā na syāt vādī icchayā viṣaya bhūta sādhya pratipādanam prativādi icchayā parityāgaḥ iti na bhāva abhāva vyavasthā asaṃkaraḥ te api tarhi buddhi ādayaḥ ātma abhāvena syuḥ iti pratipādayāmaḥ tatas yat uktam buddhi ādi sadbhāve na prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ iti tat ayuktam na ayuktam anyeṣām eva tatra pravarttaka tvāt yadi ātma abuddhi ādīnām pravarttaka tayā niścitaḥ yuktam nivarttamānaḥ nivarttakaḥ iti na ca evam yatas 
[610,i_610,iii]	smṛti icchā āyatna jaḥ prāṇa nimeṣa ādiḥ tad udbhavaḥ viṣaya indriya vittibhyastāḥ sva jāti samudbhavāḥ anyonya pratyaya apekṣā anvaya vyatireka bhāj etāvatī ātma bhāvoyam anavasthāni akalpane kvacid aniṣṭe tad anyatra vā smṛtiḥ icchā prayatnaḥ ca tatas prāṇa nimeṣa ādayaḥ pravarttante smṛti ādīnām kutas iti ced viṣaya indriya āyatta vittibhyaḥ tāḥ sva jāti samudbhavāḥ viṣayasya viṣayaḥ eva pūrvakaḥ tathā indriya vityoḥ anyonyaya pratyaya apekṣitayā etāvati hetu pratyaya kalāpe ayam ātma bhāvaḥ pratibaddhaḥ kim apareṇa anupayoginā 
[610,iv]	nanu smṛtiḥ pūrva para anusandhāna rūpa ātmānam vinā na bhavati tathā hi yena dṛṣṭam saḥ eva smarttā na hi anya dṛṣṭam anyasya smaraṇa viṣayaḥ nanu idam api vyatireka mātram eva katham atas api prasiddhiḥ na hi smaraṇam eka tve dṛṣṭam pūrva aparayoḥ eka tvasya pratyakṣeṇa apratipatteḥ smaraṇasya ca apramāṇa tvāt yadi api pareṇa upalabdham na smaryate pariviśeṣeṇa smariṣyate na hi paraḥ iti eva sarvaḥ samānaḥ sva hetutaḥ tathābhūtaḥ sa jātaḥ yena saḥ eva smaraṇasya hetuḥ na aparaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamāt na hi ātmā iti eva smaraṇam api tu pāṭava abhyāsa sambha visantāna bhāvāt anyathā tadā smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
[610,v_610,viii]	nanu na evam ucyate ātmani sati smaraṇam eva yadi smaraṇam ātmani eva sati ātma antare smaraṇa abhāvāt na etat api samyak yatas tad vikāra vikāri tvāt anvaya vyatirekataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvoyam anyathā na vyavasthitiḥ pūrva anubhava abhyāsa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinī smṛtiḥ tad vikāra vikāriṇī ca iti na ātmā kāraṇam 
[610,ix_610,xii]	atha nitya vyāpinā vinā na bhavati tathā sati kāla ādīnām api kāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt atha anubhavitṛ smartṛ tvena vinā na bhavati tat etat asat smaraṇanubhavābhyām hi smartā anubhavitā ca yaḥ kalpyate vyomni tad bhāvaḥ kathat na iti avagamyate smaraṇa anubhavānyatha anupapattyā hi smarttā anubhavitā ca kalpyate kaścid na tu ākāśa ādi vyatiriktaḥ tathā ca ekaḥ kaścid asti iti kalpyatām sa ca na ākāśa ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ vyāpi nitya tvaa amūrtta tva ādinā viśeṣa abhāvāt atha aham iti karttṛ tvena pratīyamānaḥ ātmā nāmurtta tva mātram 
[610,xiii_611,iv]	nanu aham iti pratyaye śarīram eva pratibhāti aham devadattaḥ gārgyaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti śarīram anityam iti ced na śarīra avasthāḥ anityāḥ avasthātā tu para loka ādau na bhinnaḥ iti varam eṣa eva kalpanā na tu vyatiriktasya śarīra adhiṣṭhānam eva ca smaraṇa ādiḥ pratīyate na amūrtta adhiṣṭhitam atha nityaḥ tāvat pratipattā siddhaḥ śarīram anyat hā iti kim apareṇa vicāreṇa tat api asat avasthā saṃhatiḥ yasmāt aparasya apravedanāt śarīram atas eva asmad pakṣa siddhiḥ abādhitā api ca 
[611,v_611,x]	nitya rūpe avikārya ihi smaraṇa anubhavau kutas yadi smarttā tat eva asya sadā rūpam kutortha vid sukha ādinā vikāresya nityatā api na yujyate sukha ādinā avikāresya na yuktā sukhita āditā smaraṇantu phalam yasmāt anubhūteḥ tatas na kim atha aham iti vijñānāt na hetu phala mātrakam tathā hi pūrva dṛś grāhyam aham smṛtyā artha niścitam pratyemi iti janaḥ sarvaḥ karttṛ tvam avagacchati tat asat yasmāt pūrva dṛṣṭam smarāmi iti na eva ātma udaya mātrataḥ pramāṇam pratyayaḥ sarvaḥ tathā satya samañjasam 
[611,xi]	yadi ātmanaḥ kāraṇa tā mātrāt pratyayaḥ pramāṇam sarvaḥ pramāṇam bhavet iti sakalam eva sakalasya siddhimat tatas mahat asamañjasam tasmāt anupahata āśrayeṇa yat utpadyate tat eva pramāṇam tathā ca sati cakṣuḥ ādi janitaḥ pratyayaḥ na anusaṃhinam paricchinatti iti kathaneka tā āgamaḥ pūrva aparayoḥ sattyaḥ syāt yena smaraṇena ca asya sāmarthyam sandhāne ca api vidyate iti vacaḥ sattya tām yāyāt na hi pramāṇa bhūtam pratyayam vinā ātmānam anya t vā anusaṃhitam pratyeti ātmā tatas aham smarāmi iti samvṛti mātrakam etat atas sāmu ṛtena eva ātmanā sakalam samañjasam eva api ca 
[611,xii_611,xiv]	śrāvaṇa tvena tad tulyam prāṇa ādi vyabhicārataḥ na tasya vyabhicāri tvāt vyatireke api ced katham na asādhyāt eva viśleṣaḥ tasya nanu evam ucyate sādhyenuvṛttya bhāvorthāt tasya anyatra api asau samaḥ na hi śrāvaṇa tvasya prāṇa ādeḥ ca viśeṣaḥ vyatirekasya kevalasya ubhayatra samāna tvāt tatas ekasya vyabhicāritā anyasya na iti koyam nyāyaḥ 
[611,xv]	nanu na vyatirekasya samāna tvam viṣaya bhedāt śrāvaṇa tvam hi sa pakṣa vipakṣābhyām api vyāvarttate na prāṇa ādiḥ asādhyāt eva vyāvṛtteḥ nanu sa pakṣāt api vyāvṛttam śrāvaṇa tvam iti sa pakṣa anugama abhāvaḥ pratipādyate sa prāṇa ādeḥ api samānaḥ eva na hi tasya api sa pakṣa āsthitā sa pakṣa bhāva abhāva upanyāsaḥ tad kva upayogī tathā hi 
[611,xvi_611,xvii]	asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ iti sādhyeḥ titā ucyate artha āpattyā atas eva uktam ekena dvi adarśanam niyamena avadhāraṇam avadhāryamāṇa viparyaya sādhanam anyathā yadi asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ sa pakṣāt api syāt tad avadhāraṇam apārthakam atas eva bhavadbhiḥ api artha apatya ekena dvi adarśanam atas vākyāt asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ iti kṛtam 
[612,i_612,iii]	īdṛś avya bhicārotonanvayeṣu na sidhyati yaḥ hya vyabhicāra unvayena vyāptaḥ avadhāraṇa lakṣaṇaḥ sa katham vyāpaka anvaya abhāve bhavet athavā asādhyāt eva vikchedaḥ iti na idam anvaya pratītim antareṇa pratīyate na hi sakala vipakṣa darśana sambhavaḥ anvayadvāreṇa tu sambhavati ātmani pratibaddha tvāt anyasmāt vinivarttate anivṛttaḥ tad anyasmāt kathantatra nibadhyate 
[612,iv_612,vii]	atha sādhyestitā na asti na astitā tarhi prāptā iti katham asāghyāt eva iti avyabhicāraḥ yatas pratiṣedha niṣedhaḥ ca vidhānāt kīdṛśaḥ aparaḥ asādhyaḥ eva na asti iti yat avadhāraṇam tat sādhye nāstitvam niṣedhati asādhyaḥ eva na asti sādhye tu na na asti iti pratiṣedha niṣedhane vidhānam eva pratipādayet atha nivṛttiḥ nnāsataḥ sādhyāt asādhyeṣu eva no tatas na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kim nivṛtteḥ asataḥ matā 
[612,viii]	atha prāṇa ādi hetoḥ sa pakṣa abhāvāt na tatas nivarttanam na hi asataḥ nivarttanam śakyam apādāna tva abhāvāt na ca asat nāma kiñcat yatas nivarttanam pratīyeta yadya sa taḥ na nivṛttiḥ nivṛtti nivṛttiḥ katham sā api na iti ced nanu nivṛtti nivṛtteḥ nniṣedhe nivṛtti nivṛtti nivṛttiḥ katham asataḥ iti anavasthānāt apratipattiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nivṛttiḥ iti ca ekaḥ eva arthaḥ yat eva nivṛtti nivṛttim pratyadhikaraṇam tat eva nivṛttim pratyapādānam 
[612,ix_612,x]	nanu yena saṃyogaḥ samasti tad viyoga īpādānam na ca abhāvena saṃyogaḥ yena na sambhavati sa kim sutarām na apādānam viśleṣa mātrepa ādānam na saṃyoge satī iti api sadā eva pāpāt virate iti etat katham anyathā buddhyā saṃbhāvanā tatra yadi atra api na kimmatā atostu sutarām eva tasya apādāna tā gatiḥ 
[612,xii_612,xv]	yatra sorthaḥ na sambha vaḥ ti kadācid sutarām eva tat tasya apādānam yatas nivṛtti abhāvaḥ tu vidhiḥ vastu bhāvaḥ asataḥ api san vastu abhāvaḥ tu na asti iti paśya bāndhva vijambhitam asatya bhāvaḥ na iti nivṛtti abhāvaḥ vidhiḥ eva vastu bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ asataḥ api asti abhāvaḥ tu abhāve yukta rūpaḥ api na asti viparyaye api itaraḥ iti kim anyat vā andhya viceṣṭitāt yatas anyonya parihāreṇa sthitiḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ prakāra antara tā bhāvāt ubhayat na ityayuktimat 
[612,xvi_613,i]	asati bhāve asattvam niyama bhāvi iti tat eva nivṛttiḥ api vyapadiśyate na hi tatra avidyamānam anivṛttantataḥ avidyamānam api tatra na eva adhikaraṇa tvasya ayogāt na vidyamāna tā abhāvaḥ eva tatra abhāvaḥ saḥ api na iti ced na anyonya abhāva rūpa tvāt bhāva abhāvayoḥ kutas pratiṣedhaḥ dvayoḥ api bhāvaḥ hi niyamena abhāva vyavacchedena tattvam pratilabhate abhāve hi na bhāva ssyāt iti yatas bhāvaḥ abhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ tatas tad nivṛttau niyamena bhāvī anyathā bhāva nivṛttau api yadi na bhavet na bhavet eva tathā hi yadi bhāvaḥ na abhāve na bhāvaḥ eva pratīyate abhāvaḥ yadi na asti eva tatas bhāvaḥ pratīyate saḥ api na pratiṣedhaḥ sonupalabdheḥ asattvataḥ dvayoḥ asattve abhāvasya na sattvam vinivāritam 
[613,iii]	yadi api bhāva abhāvyoḥ dvayoḥ api asattvantathā api bhāvasya asattvam anivāritam eva evam hi bhāvasya asattvam yadi bhāvaḥ na bhavati tathā abhāvasya api asattvam bhavet ya dya bhāvaḥ na bhavati bhāvasya anavagamane saḥ eva abhāvaḥ pratīyate tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ pravarttamānaḥ eva tad vivikta upalambha lakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vidhi bahirbhāvena vyavasthāpyate tatas eka pramāṇa vṛttyā eva anyathā tve anyathā bhāva vyavasthāpanam na prakāra antara sambhavaḥ yat tatra pratyakṣena antaryātam tat sarvam anyat eva bhāva rūpa grāhiṇā ca pratyakṣeṇa tatra yat na tādrūpyeṇa paricchidyate tasya tena rūpeṇa abhāvaḥ eva na prakāra antara tā abhāve api paricchidyamāne yaḥ tathā na paricchidyate sa bhāvaḥ eva iti kutas prakāra antaram bhavatu prakāra antara abhāvaḥ sa tu bhāva ubhāvaḥ vā abhāve na iti sādhikaraṇa tā na paricchettum śakyā tasya eva aparicchedāt na hi asan paricchettum śakyaḥ 
[613,iv_613,vi]	tat asat yatas nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim iṣyate sā api na pratiṣedha uyam nivṛttiḥ kinniṣidhyate bhavantam eva tāvat paryanuyuṃjmahe yadi tasmāt asataḥ sa pakṣāt na nivṛttiḥ kimvṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati na prakāra antaram asti iti evam hi nivṛttiḥ abhāva rūpā na bhavati yadi bhāvaḥ syāt vṛtti rūpaḥ sā api na iti ced na nivṛttā tarhi nivṛttiḥ yatas ayam eva bhavet pratipāditaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nivṛttiḥ tatas kinniṣidhyate na hi pratipāditam tat eva ca niṣiddham bhavitum yuktam tasmāt vṛtti niṣedhaḥ eva nivṛttiḥ iti na niṣedhaḥ tasyāḥ 
[613,vii_613,x]	atha adhikaraṇa tayā na tasya pratītiḥ apādāna tayā vā iti na tasmāt nivṛttiḥ iti ucyate atra ucyate vidhānam pratiṣedhañca muktvā śābda usti na aparaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūka tā yadi kaścid paryanuyuṃkte bhavantam nanu prāṇa ādiḥ sa pakṣe na dṛśyate tatas nivṛttaḥ tasmāt asādhāraṇaḥ katham agamakaḥ tathā tve ca aśrāvaṇa tvam api gamakam syāt tatas niyamena asati sa pakṣe na nivṛttiḥ iti vaktavyam anyathā mūka tā atra prāptā 
[613,xi_613,xii]	atha api bhavet evam eva bhavatu na svayam api kathañcid pariccheda sambhavāt vacanam nivārayitum śakyam na buddhiḥ avaśyam eva kathañcid pratipattavyam api ca yadi abhāvaḥ na adhikaraṇa tvena apādāna tvena vā pratyetum śakyaḥ sadā sarva ātmanā eva vyavahāra ucchedaḥ yatas sa tāñca na niṣedha usti saḥ asatsu ca na varttate jagati anena nyāyena nañarthaḥ pralayaṅgataḥ 
[613,xiii_614,i]	nañarthaḥ abhāvaḥ eva tatas ca abhāvasya aparicchede kathantasya prayogaḥ yatas buddhiḥ tena abhidheyena vācakam viniyujyate tasya pratītaye abhāva dvyam etat na sambhavi yadi abhāva mātram viṣayīkriyate vyarthakaḥ eva prayogaḥ nañaḥ anirūpita viṣayasya najaḥ aprayogāt prayoge vā na prayojanam atha yasya abhāvaḥ sa viṣayīkarttavyaḥ tathā sati katham pratīyamānasya eva abhāvaḥ atha anyathā pratīyatenyatha abhāvaḥ tathā hi santaḥ eva kenacid deśa ādi yogena niṣidhyante 
[614,ii_614,iv]	atra ucyate deśa kāla niṣedhaḥ ced yathā asti na niṣidhyate na tathā na yathā sosti tathā api na niṣidhyate idānīm iha anena rūpeṇa na asti iti api na śakyaḥ eva niṣedhaḥ tathā hi yat rūpam yaḥ kālaḥ yaḥ deśaḥ sa yadi asti kathat niṣidhyate atha na asti na buddhyā viṣayīkaraṇa sambhavaḥ abhāvasya paricchettum aśakyatvāt atha viṣayīkriyate tathā sati adhikāraṇa ādi tayā api anyathā viṣayīkarttum aśakyatvāt avaśyam hi kāraka bhāvena paricchedonyathā asambhavāt atra deśe na asti iti yadi adhikaraṇa bhāvosti viṣayīkṛtaḥ katham abhāvaḥ atha abhāvaḥ atham viṣayīkaraṇam 
[614,v_614,vii]	atha pratiṣeṣyamānaḥ api aniṣedhaḥ kriyate tathā sati sa pakṣa āropeṇa api sa pakṣāt vinivarttanam asti eva iti katham sa pakṣāt avyāvṛttiḥ tena vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ na bāhya āśrayaḥ sambhavati atas vyavahāra ucchedaḥ nanu vidhi vyavahāraḥ sambhavati atas na vyavahāra ucchedaḥ na viṣayīkṛtasya vidhāna abhāvāt ghaṭosti iti yadi sattvena parigrahaḥ tat eva vidhānam kim punar asti iti vidhānena atha asattvena tatas virodhāt na asat asti iti vidhātum śakyam sattvena ced paricchedaḥ vidhiḥ tatra nirarthakaḥ asattvena paricchede vidhiḥ tatra nirarthakaḥ 
[614,viii_614,x]	asattvena paricchedāt asamarthaḥ paraḥ vidhiḥ tasmāt āśritya śabda arthe bhāva abhāva samāśrayam abāhya āśrayam atra iṣṭam sarve vidhi niṣedhanam anyaḥ hi pramāṇa arthaḥ anyaḥ ca śabda arthaḥ bhāva abhāva samāśrayaḥ śabda arthaḥ na tu evam pramā arthaḥ pramāṇa arthaḥ hi na bhāva abhāva samāśrayaḥ na hi pramāṇa arthonyathā sambhavati niyata rūpeṇa grahaṇāt 
[614,xi_614,xii]	śabdāt tu yādṛśī buddhiḥ nnaṣṭe a naṣṭe api tādṛśī bhāva abhāva āśrayaḥ tena śabda arthaḥ na pramā tathā tatas vikalpa buddhi nirūpyamāṇaḥ viṣayaḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ vikalpānām vastu vṛtti niyama abhāvāt na ca sarvam avikalpakam api pramāṇam vidhi rūpeṇa ced vṛttam apramāṇantataḥ tad apramāṇa tā pratipādanāya pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedha rūpeṇa ced vidhiḥ 
[614,xiii]	nanu yadi asau bhrāntaḥ eva pratyayaḥ tadā tathā tvena eva ātmānam prakaṭīkaroti sva samvedanasya abhra anta tvāt na hi svarūpam anyathā darśayitum śakyam sva rūpa hāni prasaṅgāt anya ākāra pratibhāsane hi tat eva svarūpam tatra api tathā iti anavasthā bhavet svarūpasya ca bhāve bhāva upādana tā niṣidhyate sa ca dharmī svena rūpeṇa pratipannaḥ katham vidhi niṣedha sādhāraṇaḥ yena tābhyām sambadhyeta 
[615,ii_615,vi]	atra ucyate tābhyām sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāti abhāve api tādṛśaḥ śabda pravatteḥ asti iti saḥ api iṣṭaḥ vyavahāra bhāj na khalu bāhya antara sva svarūpa āśrayoyam vyahāraḥ api tu śabdā rthā śrayaḥ na ca śabdāt bāhya abhyanta svarūpa pratītiḥ nanu tad vyatirekeṇa apara syāḥ bhāvāt kim adhikaraṇaḥ vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ anya apoha adhikaraṇaḥ iti brūmaḥ koyam anyā apohaḥ nāma yaḥ śabdāt pratīyate nanu tat eva idam ucyate kaḥ pratīyate iti na kiñcid api tathā api vyavahāra uyam anādi vyāmoha vāhī yatas śabda artha lakṣaṇaḥ dharmī vidhi niṣedhābhyām sambaddhaḥ prakāśate vicāryamāṇasya bāhyasya antarasya vā tādṛśasya abhāve api tathā ca uktam rūpantasya na kiñcana 
[615,vii]	nanu āropita bāhya rūpam rūpantasya vidyate eva na jñāna jñeya vyatirekeṇa aparasya abhāvāt bhrāntam rūpam iti ced tat api yadi svarupeṇa pratīyate katham bhrāntam atha na pratīti viṣayaḥ katham apratīyamānam asti iti śakyamadhyavasātum paścāt bhrānta tā jñāyate iti ced prathamantarhi svarūpeṇa na pratīyate katham asti iti vyavasthā viṣayaḥ para rūpeṇa pratipattau pratipatti antaram bhrāntam na saḥ iti anavasthā 
[615,viii]	atha sattye api tasmin sattya tā niścayāt bhrānta tā ucyate kā tasya sattya tā artha asaṃsparśitā nanu tat eva tasya rūpam katham asattyatā na hi nija rūpa sthitiḥ eva asattyatā anyathā niścaya jananāt asattyaḥ iti ced niścayaḥ eva tarhi asattyaḥ tena tasya jananāt saḥ api asattyaḥ eva iti ced na anyathā niścayasya vāsanayā jananāt niścayasya bhrānta tā tarhi iti api na saṅgatam tasya api svarūpe avasthānāt tasmāt arūpaḥ eva śabda arthaḥ kathantarhi asti iti vyavahāraḥ śabda vṛtteḥ asti iti vyavahriyate śabda pravṛtti lakṣaṇāt hi vyavahārāt asti iti pratīyatenyāpohaḥ iti nāmnā pratyāyyate sāmānya ādi graha vyāvṛttayoḥ yadi tu na kiñcid iti ucyate tadaḥ t trāsaḥ syāt pareṣām atas eva āha saḥ api iṣṭaḥ vyavahāra bhāj anyathā vyavahāra ucchedaḥ eva syāt iti paraḥ pratikṣipet 
[615,ix_616,i]	tathā hi anya vyāvarttanam śabdāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvataḥ paraspara apratītānām kevalā eva atra vidyate agnim ānaya iti ukte anagni parihāreṇa pravarttate pratiyanti api pāvakam śabdāt avastu saṃsparśī vikalpaḥ svarūpa samvedanaḥ udaya bhāgī tatas pravṛtti vikalpaḥ tatas gamana svarūpa anubhavaḥ tatas prāptiḥ anyathā vā iti vyavahāraḥ na nāma vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ kaścid anyathā syāt padārthānām vidhāna pratiṣedhane eka dharmasya sarva ātma vidhāna pratiṣedhanam anānātma tayā bhede nānā vidhi niṣedha vat eka dharmiṇī a saṃhāraḥ vidhāna pratiṣedhayoḥ 
[616,iii]	yadi dharmiṇaḥ dharmāṇām abhedaḥ tadā eka dharmasya vidhāne pratiṣedhane vā sarva dharma vidhāna pratiṣedhane syātām na hi tasmin vihite tadā ātmā avihitaḥ nāma tasya api avidhāna prasaṅgāt tathā pratiṣedhasya na hi khalu go vidhāna niṣedhane bheda abhāvena khaṇḍa tā abhāvāt na hi tena śabdena pratipādite tasmin tad ātmā apratipāditaḥ yuktaḥ pratipāditaḥ eva asau bhrāntyā na avasīyate sarvam eva tarhi na avasitam iti pratīti vilopaḥ na ca kiñci d avasitam kiñcid nā iti śakya samarthanam vibhāgasya asattvāt vibhāge hi sati evam bhavati na anyathā upalambhaḥ eva hi sattā ucyate tad vibhāgāt vibhāgaḥ eva sattāyāḥ tatas katham ekasya eva kiñci d avasitam na aparam iti 
[616,iv_616,vii]	yat kiñcid etat nanu kṣaṇikatā aviniścaye api bhavati nīlat niścitam na ca dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma na tatra api virodhāt tathā hi niścayena yadi nīla tā gatiḥ sā kṣaṇa sthiti vidhāna varjitā na aparaiḥ kṣaṇika bhāva sādhanam māna siddham aparaiḥ na bādhyate yadi pramāṇa asiddham para pramāṇena bādhyate anavasthā tat api apareṇa iti anāśvāsaḥ eva atha yadi nāma nīla niścayasya kṣaṇikatāyām apravarttanam tathā api na tena kṣaṇikatā bādhyate na api tad sādhanena nīla niścayaḥ samuccayena dvayoḥ api pravarttanāt trayaḥ hi yogāḥ samuccayaḥ vikalpaḥ bādhanam iti samuccayaḥ nīlam idam utpalañca dharmayoḥ samuccayāta vikalpaḥ sthāṇuḥ puruṣova iti dvayoḥ ekatra asambhavāt bādhanam sarppaḥ rajjuḥ iti sarppatā a sambhavāt te da tra nīlanvakṣaṇika vasam uccaye kaḥ doṣaḥ 
[616,viii_616,xi]	atra ucyate bādha lakṣaṇa yogena katham atra samuccayaḥ na bādhyam bādhakena eva samuccetum kvacid kṣamam niścayaḥ hi nīla tāyāḥ kṣaṇika tā parihāreṇa yadi syāt bādhitā eva kṣaṇika tā bhavet tad vivikta rūpa grahaṇāt vivikta rūpa pratipādanam eva hi bādhanam nanu na idam atra iti bādhanam abhāva pramāṇena na ca pratyakṣam kasyacid bādhakam 
[616,xii_616,xiv]	na yuktam etat yatas nati niścayaḥ eva ayam na pramāṇam phalam hi saḥ tad vivikta upalambhaḥ tu pramāṇam niścayaḥ tatas na khalu ayam niścayaḥ svatantram pramāṇam pratyakṣa pramāṇa anusārī khalu ayam na asya anyathā bhāvaḥ yadi nāma kathañcid vivikta pratyaya udaye api na udayam āsādayati tathā api tad yogya tayā eva tasya niṣedhaḥ etat ca uttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tatra yadi nīlam kṣaṇika parihāreṇa
[617,i_617,ix]	niścitam tena eva kṣaṇikatā bādhitā katham sā pareṇa sādhyate atha sādhita eva tena api tathā api pareṇa spaṣṭīkriyate atra ucyate yadi pramāṇam tat pūrvam gateḥ aspaṣṭa tā katham na ca spaṣṭīkṛtaḥ sorthaḥ sādhitaḥ ca iti durghaṭam aspaṣṭa tā kathat nāma niścaye api bhavet iyam atra asau spaṣṭa tā anyatra niścayaḥ a yukti saṅgataḥ tasmāt sa pūrvakaḥ bhrāntaḥ uttaraḥ vā iti gamyatām na hi eka viṣaye jñāne paraspara virodhinī tasmāt eka vidhāne tad avyatirikta sakala vidhānam iti vyarthakaḥ śabda antara vikalpa antara avatāraḥ atha nānā bhūtāḥ upādhayaḥ nānā bhūta śabda vikalpānām viṣayaḥ tat ayam aprasaṅgaḥ tat asat bhede eka dharmiṇī a saṃhāraḥ vihita pratiṣiddhayoḥ 
[617,x]	yadi parasparam āśrayāt ca bhedaḥ tadā bhinnāḥ eva terthāḥ pratipāditā dharmī ca tadā na aparaḥ teṣām āśrayaḥ iti katham sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā hi nīlam utpalam iti guṇa dravya pratipādane na aparam adhikaraṇantayoḥ tat na sāmānādhikaraṇyam na ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣa tā pratītiḥ pṛthak artha pratipādanāt ghaṭa paṭa vat atha nīlat na kevalam tathā sati nīla rūpa pratipattyā eva dravya pratītiḥ khaṇḍaśas pratīti abhāvāt atha jāti guṇau tathā api sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ adhikaraṇa vācakasya aparasya abhāvāt atha nīlam dravyam eva pratīyate na nīla tā mātram tathā sati eka śabdena dvya abhidhānam apareṇa api tathā iti catuṣṭayasya trayasya vā abhidhāne katham iva sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vā na hi ekena anekena vā śabdena pratipāditāḥ bhinna rūpāḥ sāmāna adhikaraṇa bhājaḥ atha nīla ādi kevalam pratyetum aśakyam tatas na bhinna pratīti vat asāmānādhikaraṇyam te tu nīla ādayaḥ aniyata jāti bhāvinaḥ jāti ādayaḥ ca aniyata guṇa bhāvinaḥ tatas niyata tva pratipādanāya śabda antara prayogaḥ 
[617,xi_617,xiii]	tat asat pratyakṣāt vyatirikta tvam nīla ādeḥ gamyate na ced śabdena api saḥ eva arthaḥ pratīyeta anyathā katham yadi pratyakṣe niṣkṛṣṭam nīla ādi na pratibhāsate śabdāt api tathā eva pratibhāsatām tatra eva sambandha pratipatteḥ atha parokṣa tayā tathā na pratītiḥ pratīyamānam katham parokṣam asat nihita tvāt ced na asannihite api śabda jñāna vṛtteḥ akṣa vyāpāra abhāvāt iti ced na akṣam eva pratīti kāraṇam svarūpa pratyāyanaḥ ced akṣā nakṣayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yatra ca sannidhānam tatra katham anyathā pratītiḥ akṣa vyāpāra abhāvaḥ tu na kiñcid vahanti spaṣṭa tām vihanti iti ced nanu yadi nāma spaṣṭa tā abhāvaḥ tathā api nīla tā pratiniyata dravya āveśena eva pratyāyyā katham anyathā pratyeyā tathā ca pada antara prayoga abhāvaḥ atha aniyata dravya vṛttayaḥ nīlaa ādayaḥ tathā sati nīlam api aniyatam nīla śabdāt gamyate utpalam api tad vācaka tvāt tatas 
[618,i_618,iii]	punar api na sāmānādhikaraṇyam dvayoḥ aniyata vācakayoḥ eka artha pratipādanā sambhavāt paraspara vyavacchedāt evam pratītiḥ iti api na saṅgatam upāttasya vyavacchedaḥ katham anyonyataḥ bhavet vyavaccheda kriyāyām hi sā anya apohasya vācya tā yadi aniyatam nīla ādi śabda pratipādyam na punar anyena niyantum śakyam na hi pratyakṣe pratipannam anyena vivarttyate bhrānta tā prasaṅgāt saṃśayaḥ tarhi śabda antarāt nivarttyate samuccayena hi pratipaāditam aśakyam nivarttayitum yadā tu vikalpaḥ kim nīlam utpalam atha anyat iti tadā vikalpasya nivarttanam śabda antarāt upapannam 
[618,iv_618,vi]	tat api asat yatas vikalpaḥ api hi yadi arthaḥ sattyaḥ tad śabdataḥ gataḥ nivarttanam kutasyasya śabda antara samāgame yadi asau arthaḥ eva asattyaḥ kalpanā viṣayaḥ kim apareṇa anyathā karttum śakyaḥ dvayoḥ api pramāṇa tvāt atha tena sandigdha rūpaḥ eva pratipāditaḥ sandigdha rūpa tā ca dṛḍha pratyaya nivarttyatā eva tata upareṇa nivarttanam upapannam na hi tathābhūtaḥ eva na tathābhūtaḥ 
[618,vii_618,xiii]	tat api asat nivarttyatā hi tena eva śabdena pratipāditā tatas parasya śabdasya kim vidheyam bhaviṣyati nanu pūrva pratyayena niyamena nivarttyatā pratipādita apareṇa tu niyamena iti asti upayogaḥ tat api asat yatas yaḥ pramāṇa bala āyātaḥ aniyamaḥ sonyathā katham māna antara gatena api śakyaḥ karttum iti sthitam tasmāt apramāṇa tā eva pūrvasya parasya vā tatas asādhaka tvāt parasya api tathā bhūta tvāt sāmānya mātra vacane param vyartham 
[618,xiv]	atha anumānam bādhakam eva na tasya api pratyakṣeṇa bādhanāt na anumānāt tīkṣṇa jvālā ādi viśeṣaṇa parigrahaḥ tatas tatra api sandehaḥ eva sāmānyena sandehaḥ iti ced na sāmānya pratipatteḥ sandeha rūpa tvāt aniyata viśeṣa pratipattiḥ hi sāmānya pratipattiḥ na hi ākāra niyama sambhavi sāmānyam tathā hi 
[618,xv_618,xvii]	sāmānyam yatra tatra asti vyaktiḥ evam vidhā iti na pratītiḥ tena sāmānya jñānam sarvam upaplavaḥ tadā kim aparatrānupaplavena api na hi sāmānyam pratīyamānam api vyakti pratiniyama pratiniyata pratītim ākarṣati tatas sāmānya pratītiḥ upaplutā vyaktau upaplatā na sāmānyaḥ iti ced tat asat vyaktau upaplatā sā ced sāmānyam kva upayujyate na sāmānyam kvacid vāha doha ādau upayoga vat 
[618,xviii_619,i]	yad arthaḥ ca ayam ārambhaḥ tatra ced tad upaplavaḥ nanu sāmānya pratipattim antareṇa saḥ eva vyakti viṣayaḥ vikalpa upaplavaḥ na yuktaḥ nanu sāmānya niścaye api tat eva sāmānyam niścitam bhavet katham aparatra saṃśayaḥ na anyasmin niścite paratra sandehaḥ yuktaḥ sarvatra niścaye sarva sandeha prasaṅgāt atha api syāt sambhavinaḥ eva arthasya sandeha viṣaya tā na aparasya tathā hi 
[619,ii_619,iv]	yaḥ yatra sambhavī dṛṣṭaḥ sa yatra vyabhicāra bhāj tad darśanena tatra eva saṃśayaḥ saṃpravarttate saṃśayaḥ hi sambhavini vyabhicāriṇi na upapannaḥ sāmānye ca yatra yaḥ sambhavati tatra dṛśyamāne tatra saṃdehaḥ go tve niścite śāvaleya ādau aśva tve karkādau iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ tat etat asat yatas 
[619,v_619,viii]	śavaleya ādi sandigdha rūpa pratyaya mātrakāt pratītiḥ nnāparasya atra katham sāmānya kalpanā kim ayam śāvaleyaḥ atha vāhuleyaḥ garjita mātrakam eva śrūyate śāvaleya ādi viśeṣam tu na avadhārayāmaḥ iti śāvaleya ādi ākāra vikalpakam eva kevalam lokaḥ pratyeti evam anyat api sāmānya vikalpanam draṣṭavyam athavā anādi vāsanā saṅgi sāmānya ākāra vittitaḥ vikalpa upamataḥ sāmya padārthasya na kalpanā 
[619,ix_619,xi]	tasmāt na bāhya āśrayaḥ vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi ayogāt atha upādhaye eva kevalāḥ śabdaiḥ vikalpaiḥ ca pratīyante lakṣita lakṣaṇena tu tad upādhimataḥ pratītiḥ liṅgatā tarhi upādhi vibhāgānām tatas liṅgena niścite dravye na sandehaḥ iti kim apara upādhi pratyāyanena dravyam na jñāyate kimbhūtam iti tad artham apara upādhi pratipādanam tat asat yadi eka upādhinā saḥ arthaḥ pratītaḥ sva svarūpataḥ upādhi antara samvittiḥ aparam kim kariṣyati atha anyathā pratīta usau eka upādhi samāgame upādhi antara saṃsargaḥ param karttum aśaktikaḥ 
[619,xiii]	atha upādhi antara yoga mātrakam eva śabda antara pratipādyam na tasya viśeṣaḥ tathā sati kevala pratipādane katham artha kriyāyāḥ prasiddhiḥ na khalu artha kriyā upādhinā eva kevalena vidhātum śakyā atha tad vāreṇa upādhimataḥ pratītiḥ na pūrva upādhinā eva pratipādanāt atha pūrva upādhina upādhi antara rahitasya pratipādanam tathā ca svayam eva abhyadhāyi na sa śakyaḥ tatonyena iti 
[619,xiv]	nanu yadi anya upādhinā saḥ anyathā pramāṇa bhūta pratyaya pratipādyaḥ kṛtaḥ katham upādhi antara sahasreḥ api anyathā vidhīyeta na hi pramāṇena vihitam anyathā pramāṇena anyena vidhātum śakyam samavāya sambandhāt hi sakala upādhi avapṛktaḥ eva vyavasthitaḥ tat katham anyathā pratyetum śakyam pratipādane vā tat eva tasya rūpam katham anyena anyathā vidhānam atha na eva anyena anyathā vidhānam api tu adhyāra upamātram anyatas bhavati tad anya nivṛttiḥ tu asambhava niyamāt na hi tad dharma yuktañca syāt tad anya dharma yuktañca iti 
[619,xv_620,ii]	tat asattyam yatas prāptiḥ paśu antarāṇāñcet pramāṇena upapāditā na adhyāra upasahasre api tasyāḥ śakyam nivarttanam atha api aprāptiḥ anyeṣām tad arthasya eva mānataḥ kim upādhi antareṇa atra nivarttyam na hi kiñcana tasmāt abhra anta pratyayena sakalam eva pratyeyam pratyakṣa pramāṇa vat tatas para upādhi pratipādanam vyartham yadi tu pṛthak eva upādhayaḥ pṛthak upādhimān tatas upādhi pratipādana mātrāt alakṣita lakṣaṇāt eka dharmiṇī a saṃhāraḥ eva atha upādhi pratipādane api upādhimatām tathā sati punar api ekopādhinā pratīteḥ sarva upādhi grahaṇam na hi prapyakṣeṇa na tathā agrahaḥ atha pratyakṣeṇa api kadācid saṃsthāna mātrasya grahaṇam dūrāt saṃnikarṣe tu varṇṇa sākṣāt 
[620,iii_620,viii]	tat api ayuktam varṇṇa saṃsthāna mātrasya grahaḥ dravyamvinā yadi kadācid api na dravyam grāhyam prāptam na vastu tat atha saṃsthānam adravyam grahītum na hi śakyate varṇṇaḥ api adravyakaḥ na iti tatas dravyam param katham tasmāt na sāmānya adhikaraṇyam bhavatām api kathantat iti ced tat āha ekam dharmiṇam uddiśya nānā dharma samāśrayam vidhau ekasya tad bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam niṣedhe tad viviktañca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam vyavahāram asatya artham prakalpayati dhīḥ yathā tam tathā eva avikalpya artha bheda āśrayam upāgatāḥ anādi vāsanā udbhatam bādhanterthaṃna laukikam 
[620,xi]	na khalu asmāka mayam pāramārthikaḥ vyavahāraḥ sāma anadhi karaṇya ādi viṣayaḥ śabda artham āśritya avastu sanniveśinam pravarttanāt tathā hi śabdaḥ iti aśabda vyāvṛtti apekṣayā dharmi tayā vyavasthāpanam śabda śabda arthasya sa ca śabdaḥ pratyabhijñāna balāt sadā sthāyitayā svīkṛtaḥ kṛtaka tā bahirbhāve na ca tatas pratibhāsitam apya nitya tvam viparyasta vyavahāra apahārāt anupalabdham iva asat iti iva vyavasthāpitam tatas anitya tā sādhaka pramāṇāt apara vyavahāra pravarttane na viparyaya vyavahāra viṣaya apahārāt tadā sattvena vyavasthāpitam vihitam iti pratīyate tatas sa śabda śabda arthaḥ dharmī tad bhāja ātma bhāvena pratipannaḥ niṣedhe ca tad apasāritam tatas tad vivikta tayā pratipattau tad viparyasta dharma apekṣaka tayā pratīyate pratītayaḥ eva vidhi niṣedhavatyaḥ kevalam na bhāvaḥ tathā abhatarūpataḥ calati tathā hi evam eva mayā pratipannaḥ prāk iti sā eva pratipattiḥ pratyakṣā tathātvena vyavahāra viṣaya tām āpāditā na tu tatra vikalpaiḥ apara aparaiḥ vihitam niṣiddham vā kiñcid 
[620,xii_621,ii]	na khalu vikalpā atīta pratipatti rūpa saṃsparśinaḥ tadā tasyāḥ abhāvāt atas eva anya apohaḥ śabda vikalpa arthaḥ bhrānti mātra vyāvarttanāt yadā tarhi na bhrānteḥ avatāraḥ pratyakṣa anantaram eva ghaṭoyam iti vikalpaḥ akasmāt ca dhūmāt agni pratipattiḥ tatra katham anya apoha śabda artha tā na idam api sādhīyaḥ tathā hi avṛtti viṣayaḥ vahniḥ pravṛtteḥ viṣayīkṛtaḥ avṛtti viṣaya tvasya tatra api vinivarttanam 
[621,iii]	tathā hi vahni niścayaḥ prāha pravṛtti viṣayoyam agniḥ kim audāsīnyam atra bhavataḥ iti tad audāsīni aviṣaya tā nivarttana mātrakam vikalpasya arthaḥ na hi tatra vahniḥ svarūpeṇa pratīyate na ca anyathā pratipatti pratītiḥ pratipattiḥ nna ca pratyakṣa uttara kāla bhāvinā vastu vikalpena nīlam śabda viṣayam pratipannam pūrva apara rūpa asannidhānāt idantat iti nu vikalpaḥ eva na bhavati mānasa pratyakṣa tvāt atha kṣaṇika tā tena na pratipannā tatas na pratyakṣatā na varttamāna tā pratipattiḥ eva kṣaṇika tā pratipattiḥ iti niveditam nivedayiṣyate tasmāt anya apoha āśrayeṇa dharma dharmi bhāva sāmāna adhikaraṇyā ādi vyavahārāḥ artha bhede hi vyavahāra viṣaye sarvam upapannam tasya eva sarvatas vyāvṛtteḥ nna hi vyāvṛttiḥ tasmāt anyāyena eka artha upasaṃhāraḥ na syāt kathantarhi śabdasya anitya tvam iti bheda nibandhanā vibhaktiḥ śilāputrakasya śarīram iti yathā 
[621,iv_621,viii]	nanu vyāvṛttīnām abhinna tvāt kathambhedaḥ na hi vastunaḥ vyāvṛttayaḥ bhidyante na eṣa doṣaḥ samvṛtyā bheditā tāsām parama artha tayā na sā tena śabda artha tā bheda abheda rūpa nibandhanam parama arthapekṣayā na kadācid bhedaḥ samvṛtyā tu tāsām ubhaya rūpa tā tathā hi tad phalaḥ atad phalañca arthaḥ bhinnaḥ ekaḥ tatas tatas taiḥ taiḥ upaplavaiḥ nnīta sañcayā apacayaiḥ iva atadvān api sambandhāt kutaścid upanīyate dṛṣṭimbheda āśrayaiḥ te api tasmāt ajñāta viplavāḥ 
[621,x_621,xi]	nanu yadi saṃvṛtya ayam vyavahāraḥ sa vāsanā mātra nibandhanaḥ kathat na visamvādī laukikaiḥ nna vikalpya parityajyate na khalu avisamvādinam vyavahāram kaścid na parityajyate uktam etat tam tathā eva avikalpya ityādi nanu etat eva katham na khalu atyanta mūḍhaḥ api pramāṇa bādhanam anutprekṣyāḥ te atra ucyate avisamvādāt avikalpanam avisamvāda sambhave hi nāvā antara sūkṣma aikṣikāḥ yuktāḥ vyavahāriṇaḥ avisamvāda arthī hi tad lābhāya khalu vikalpayitum kṣamaḥ 
[621,xii_621,xiv]	bheda abheda visamvādaḥ kva nu tasya upayujyate artha kriyā na bhinnena ma dhuryeṇa bhavet guḍāt atad vyāvṛtti mātreṇa prāptena artha kriyā udayaḥ dharma bhedaḥ tu anādi vāsanātaḥ tad phala itara avadhi nibandhana buddhi ākāra parikalpitaḥ sattyavastu pratibandhāt avisamvādī tatra pratibhāsa bheda nirūpaṇāyām abhimata phala prāpti janita paritoṣaḥ pūruṣaḥ na ādriyate vastu tatva nirūpaṇa aparaḥ api tad artha kriyā arthī loka vyavahāram eva anusarati 
[621,xv_622,ii]	tathā ca uktam rūpaṇa vyavahārābhyām laukike vartmani sthitau jñānam pratyabhilāpañca sadṛśau bāla paṇḍitau tena sa dharmī vyāvṛtti bheda nibandhanaiḥ upaplavaiḥ vikalpa lakṣā rṇa eni iti sañcaya upacayaiḥ iva kutaścid vyavahāra sambandhāt dṛṣṭim upanīyate darśana patham tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇāt prāpti lakṣaṇam tasmāt te vyavahāriṇaḥ parijñāta viplavāḥ iti tasmāt asataḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ sa pakṣāt vā na viruddhā 
[622,iii_622,v]	api ca nairātmye ghaṭa ādīnām prasiddhe sati prāṇa ādi abhāve vyāpti siddhiḥ nna anyathā na ca ātmā ghaṭa ādiṣu na asti iti sidhyati sattā sādhana vṛtteḥ ca sandigdhaḥ syāt asat na saḥ asattvam ca abhyupagamāt apramāṇāt na yujyate jīvat śarīre hi sandigdhaḥ ātmā katham ghaṭāt au asandigdhaḥ na khalu sandigdham sādhanena prāṇa ādinā anyena vā viṣayīkarttum śakyam tatas ca 
[622,vi_622,viii]	asataḥ avyatireke api sa pakṣāt vinivarttanam sandigdham tasya sandehāt vipakṣāt vinivarttanam ātmanaḥ sandehe ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva syuḥ sa pakṣā vā tatas sa pakṣāt vinivṛttiḥ sandigdhā tatas katham ayam vyatirekī nanu bauddha abhyupagamāt nirātmanaḥ eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ yadi evam sarva dharmāḥ anātmānaḥ iti jīvat śarīre api na ātmā syāt apramāṇakaḥ eva bauddha abhyupagamaḥ iti ced tadā tarhi ghaṭa ādayaḥ api tad abhyupagamāt na nirātmānaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ yatas 
[622,ix_622,x]	ekatra niyame siddhe sidhyati eva nivarttanam dvairāśye sattyadṛṣṭe api syāt adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ adarśane sati api adṛṣṭeṣu anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteṣu saṃśayaḥ eva na hi kaścid anupalambha mātra kāt abhāvam sādhayitum samarthaḥ api ca siddhaḥ nāma ghaṭa ādiṣu ātma abhāvaḥ tathā api prāṇa ādayaḥ na ātma sādhana samarthāḥ na hi teṣām vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva siddhā vṛtteḥ api sambhavāt 
[622,xi_622,xiii]	nanu vipakṣān nivṛttaḥ kathantatra eva varttate na hi nirātmakam ekam prāṇādimat anyathā ca yukta na hi idam arddha jaratīyam labhyam eka bhāva niyamaḥ eva yuktaḥ na etat asti yatas avyakti vyāpinaḥ api arthāḥ santi tad jāti bhāvinaḥ kvacid na niyamaḥ dṛṣṭyā pārthivāḥ loha lekhya vat bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandeham nivārayet 
[623,i_623,iii]	na hi nairātmyam iti eva sakalam samānam yena nirātmaka tayā jīvat śarīram aprāṇa ādikam bhavet api tu nirātmakam eva kiñcid prāṇa ādimat aparam anyathā yathā pārthivam eva loha lekhyam aparam itarat tathā hi bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ saṃdeham nivārayet na khalu nairātmyena saha virodha aprasiddhau prāṇa ādeḥ nnivṛttiḥ nnairātmyasya na hi prāṇa ādi saha anavasthāne na itareṇa vā virodha lakṣaṇena viruddham nairātmyena yena tat nivarttayet atha sākṣāt virodha bhāve api pāramparyeṇa virodhaḥ iti nivarttakāḥ praṇādayaḥ nairātmyasya 
[623,iv_623,vi]	tat asat yatas kvacid viniyamāt konyaḥ tad kārya ātma tayā sa ca yadi prāṇa ādayaḥ ātmani niyatāḥ syaḥ syāt nairātmyena saha pāramparyeṇa virodhaḥ vyāpaka virodhena vyāpyasya api virodhāt na ca asti ātmani niyamaḥ prāṇa ādīnām tādātmyam tad utpattim antareṇa niyama ayogāt anyathā niyamasya asambhavāt na ca prāṇa ādīnām ātma kārya tvam ātma tmaka tvam vā prasiddham pramāṇataḥ 
[623,vii_623,ix]	nairātmyāt api tena asya sandigdham vinivarttanam nairātmyāt api tena ātma pratibandha abhāvena asya sandigdham vinivarttanam na hi tatra apratibaddhaḥ tad vipakṣāt vyāvarttate astu nāma tathā api ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvam bhāvam icchati yathā na avyatireke api sa pakṣe prāṇātādikaḥ sa pakṣāvyatirekī ced hetuḥ hetuḥ atonvayī na anvaya vyatirekī ced anairātmyan na sa ātmakam 
[623,xii_623,xiii]	yathā sa pakṣa abhāva abhāve api na sa pakṣe bhāvaḥ tathā nairātmya abhāve api na ātmā jīvat śarīraḥ iti nanu viṣamoyam upanya saḥ sa pakṣe hi vyatireka abhāve api na bhāvaḥ tasya asattvāt na hi asati bhāva saṃbhavaḥ jīvat śarīre tu tasya sattvāt vyatireka abhāve niyamena bhāvaḥ parasya rāśeḥ abhāvāt 
[623,xiv_623,xv]	sattyam etat na viṣama upanyāsa mātrakāt eva iṣṭa siddhiḥ yadi sa pakṣe na abhāvaḥ saḥ eva tarhi na nivṛttaḥ bhāvaḥ abhāve tu nivṛtte niyamena bhāvaḥ abhāva vyāvṛttiḥ eva bhāvaḥ iti sa pakṣa abhāvāt na evam iti ced na abhāva tva ayogāt prāṇa ādi bhāve hi katham sa pakṣasya abhāvatā yathā hi asati sa pakṣe aprāṇa ādi vyatireke api na viparyayaḥ tathā jīvat śarīre api narātmya vyatireke atha jīvat śarīrasya sattvāt viparyayaḥ na sa pakṣe avidyamāna tvāt na hi avidyamāne bhāva sambhavaḥ 
[624,i_624,iv]	avidyamāna tā eva tarhi na nivṛtta iti āyātam avidyamāne vidyamāna tāyāḥ virodhaḥ iti sā vyāvṛttā avidyamāna tāyāḥ tu na virodhaḥ iti sā avyāvṛtti ttā eva yathā eva sa pakṣaḥ avidyamānaḥ tathā tatra api na hi avidyamāne avi dya mānatā virodhaḥ atha sā api avidyamāna tā na tatra tathā sati jīvat śarīre nairātmya vyāvṛttau api na nairātmya vyāvṛttiḥ yathā sa pakṣe bhāva abhāve api na abhāvaḥ tasya sattvāt iti ced na idam asti yatas anya sattve kathat nāma vyabhicārī niyamyate vyabhicārī sva doṣeṇa parasmāt katham anyathā 
[624,v]	yaḥ hi svayam vyabhicārī sa katham anya sattve nā anyathā vā tat avyabhicārī syāt kiñca yadya vidyamāne kiñcid na sanna asat vidyamānam avidyamānam api vidyamānena sanna asat iti kinnābhyupagamyate yathā avidyamānasya na ādhāra tā tathā adheya tāpi iti yat kiñcid etat etat ca prāk eva pratyapādi api ca na abhāva mātram nairātmyam api tu pratiniyata rūpasya ātmanaḥ abhāvaḥ na ca pratiniyata rūpa adarśane tad abhāva siddhiḥ na khalu abhāvāḥ parasparataḥ vyāvarttante bhāva bhede tad abhāvānām bhedāt bhāva pratiniyama abhāve ca kutas tad abhāva bhedaḥ na ca ātmā pratiniyata rūpa tayā upalabdhaḥ yena tad viparyaya abhāve sa sidhyet tatas nairātmya abhāve abhāva nivṛtti mātram na tu ātma siddhiḥ tasmāt 
[624,vi_624,x]	sa pakṣāvyatirekī ced hetuḥ hetuḥ atas anvayī na anvayya vyatirekī ced anairātmyam na sa ātmakam iti saṃgrahatiḥ api ca yat na antarīyakaḥ sva ātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu nivarttakaḥ saḥ eva atas pravṛttau ca pravarttakaḥ yasya dhūmasya agninā antarīyakaḥ svabhāvaḥ pravṛttiṣu vidhiṣu siddhaḥ saḥ eva agneḥ nnirvarttakaḥ svayam nivarttamāne na anyathā pravṛttau ca saḥ eva pravarttakaḥ agniḥ dhūma ādeḥ iti hi prāmāṇikī gatiḥ 
[624,xi_624,xiii]	na antarīyaka tā sā ca sādhanam samapekṣate kārye dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭiḥ ca kārya kāraṇa tā hi te na khalu na antarīyaka tā sā dhanam darśana adarśanam lakṣaṇam anvaya vyatireka sādhanam vinā prasidhyati nanu vyatiriktayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvānāntarīyaka tā sā dhanam na dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭī na tayoḥ eva dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭyoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva tvāt na hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām anyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na api dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭibhyām anyau anvavyatirekau iti yasya tu punar 
[624,xiv_625,ii]	artha antarasya tad bhāve abhāvaḥ niyamataḥ agatiḥ artha antarasya na sādhanam na antarīyaka tāyāḥ tad bhāve api na aparasya abhāva niyamaḥ iti na tad abhāve abhāvasya gatiḥ tasya vyāpaka tā abhāvāt na ca avyāpakam nivarttamānam aparasya nivarttakam na ca ātmā vyāpakaḥ siddhaḥ tat katham asau prāṇa ādeḥ nnirvarttakaḥ yatas abhāvāsambhavāt teṣām abhāve nitya bhāvinaḥ ātmā hi na svayam deśa kālayoḥ vinivarttate nitya tā vyāpti sadbhāvāt tatas tad abhāvāt abhāvaḥ prāṇa ādīnām iti asiddham etat 
[625,iii_625,vi]	atha anvaya mātrāt eva ātmā kāraṇam prāṇa ādīnām na hi vyatirekam apekṣate sarvatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sarvaḥ tat api ayuktam yatas kārya svabhāva bhedānām kāraṇebhyaḥ samudbhavāt taiḥ vinā bhavataḥ nyasmāt tad jam rūpam katham bhavet yadi anvaya mātrāt eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tadā tad abhāve api bhavati iti prāptam tatas taiḥ vinā api kāryasya bhavataḥ anyasmāt katham tad jam rūpam anyasmāt api bhaviṣyati iti ced na anyasmāt tad rūpa abhāvāt 
[625,vii_625,xi]	atad rūpa tve saḥ eva na bhavati yatas sāmagrī śakti bhedāt hi vastūnām viśva rūpa tā sā ced na bhedikā prāptam eka rūpam idam jagat nanu sāmagrī bhedāt bhedaḥ iti kutas etat bhedaḥ tāvat upalabhyate sa kāraṇa bhedāt anyathā ca iti cintā antaram eva etat tat asat yatas ātmā prakalpyate adṛṣṭaḥ prāṇa ādeḥ pratibandhataḥ niyamena vinā tasya pratibandhaḥ kathat na saḥ 
[625,xii_625,xv]	yathā eva ātmā vyāpī nityaḥ anvaya mātreṇa kāraṇam tathā ākāśa ādayaḥ api tatas ātma vat ākāśa ādi gatiḥ api iti na artha siddhiḥ atha ātmanā prerakeṇa vinā na prāṇa ādayaḥ tatas ātmā bhastrā ādhmāpayitā iva pratīyate golaka prerayitā iva karaṇaiḥ gavākṣa antarita prekṣakaḥ iva darśanena iti tat api ayuktam yatas niṣkriyasya vibhoḥ na eva preraka tvam pramāṇa vat karaṇaiḥ nna vinā dṛṣṭiḥ iti na ātmā prasidhyati 
[625,xvii]	bhastrā ādhmāpayitā hi sa kriyaḥ sa prerakaḥ tathā avyāpitayā na tu evam ātmā kathantasya preraka tvam na hi vyāpya mūrttasya prerakata yukti saṅga tā atha prerakaḥ tasya api anyaḥ prerakaḥ iti anavasthā gavākṣaka antaritaḥ ca karaṇa cakṣuḥ ādi samanvitaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmā tu na evaṃbhūtaḥ katham prekṣakaḥ atha tasya api karaṇāni santi tatra api aparaḥ gavākṣaka antarita nyāyaḥ iti anavasthā eva 
[626,i]	api ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām agni ādau kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sa katham atra anyathā bhavet atha tatra api anvaya mātrakāt eva tathā sati taiḥ vinā anyasmāt api bhavati iti prāptam anyathā vyatirekasya api sambhavaḥ tathā ca taiḥ vinā bhavataḥ anyasmāt api śakra mūrddhādeḥ bhavataḥ katham agni janya tā ubhaya janya tā ced na tatas nyasmāt bhavati iti na ubhayam api kāraṇam tasmāt anyatas api bhavataḥ na tad kāryatā na api anyakārya tā iti kāryaka raṇa bhāvaḥ eva syāt tathā sati kārya bheda abhedau kāraṇa bheda abheda āyattau iti tad abhāvāt na syātām dṛśyate katham pratikṣepaḥ iti ced na darśanasya api kārya kāraṇa bhāvā sambhave asambhavaḥ eva 
[626,ii_626,iv]	nīlam hi nīla vijñānāt pratīti niyame sati pratīyate anyathā na eva bhrāntā abhrānta vivecanam yadi hi īdṛśī sāmagrī bhrānta itara pratyaya janikā iti niyamaḥ tadā bhavet prameya pratiniyamaḥ anyathā yathā kathañcid pratibhāsa mātrakam iti sakala loka vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ atha pratibhāsaḥ svayam paraspara bhedī sva samvedana pratyaya prameyaḥ 
[626,v_626,viii]	tat api asatti am pratibhāsa mātrāt lokasya vyavahāraḥ na sidhyati tāvat mātra avabhāse hi karttavyam kim atas param artha kriyā karaṇa pravaṇaḥ hi bhāvaḥ upādeyaḥ anyaḥ anyathā iti prekṣāvatām vyavahāraḥ pratibhāsa mātra kantad kṣaṇaḥ eva tathā bhavat aheya upādeyam tathā vijñaptimātrakam advaitam iti na bheda abhedau sa ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām iti na ātmā kasyacid kāraṇam iti na tasya kutaścid anumānam tatas 
[626,ix_626,xi]	sāmagrī śakti bhedāt hi bhāvānām viśva rūpa tā sā ced abhedikā prāptam eka rūpam idam jagat eka rūpam iti aheya upādeyam pratibhāsa mātrakam advaitam iti yathā atha śakra mastakasya agni rūpam api asti tad vilakṣaṇam api asti tatas kāryam agniḥ tatas api bhaviṣyati atra āha bhedaka abhedaka tve syāt vyāhatā abhinna rūpa tā ekasya nānā rūpa tve dve rūpe pāvaketaraḥ 
[626,xii_626,xiii]	rūpa bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt padārtha bhedasya tata ugniḥ eva dhūmasya janakaḥ iti na vyabhicāraḥ kārya hetoḥ na hi tad agni rūpa tāyām aparam śakraśiraḥ yena tu rūpeṇa bhinnam tat ajanakam eva kutas vyabhicāra āśaṅkā tat tasya ājananam rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā na tasya ājananam rūpantat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham tatas svabhāvau niyatau anyonyam hetu kāryayoḥ tasmāt sva dṛṣṭau iva tat dṛṣṭe kārye api gamyate 
[626,xv_627,iii]	nanu ekam katham anekasmāt kleda vat dugdha vāriṇaḥ drava śakteḥ yatas kledaḥ sā tu ekā eva dvayoḥ api bhinna abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinne ca dravatā katham abhinne hi ucyate buddheḥ tad rūpāyāḥ abhedataḥ na khalu dugdha vāriṇoḥ abhinna rūpa tā tad anya kaṭhina rūpa bhedāt vyāvṛtteḥ eka tvāt ekatā tathā kāryasya api vikledasya na hi vikledaḥ api paramārthataḥ abhinnaḥ tad anya vyāvṛttyā tu tathā vyapadeśaḥ iti na vyabhicāraḥ 
[627,iv_627,vi]	tadvat bhede api dahanaḥ dahana pratyaya āśrayaḥ yena aṃśena dadhat dhūmam tena tena tathā gatiḥ dahana pratyaya aṅgāt eva anya apekṣāt samudbhavāt dhūmaḥ tat vyabhicārī iti tadvat kāryan tathā param tadvat iti dugdha vāri vat eva drava tāyāḥ tat anyavya tvattyā bhede api dravya pratyaya āśraya tva vat bhedaḥ api dahana prayaya āśrayaḥ tad anya vyāvṛttya eva yena aṃśena iti dahana pratyaya kāraṇa tvena tena eva gatiḥ anyatra dravya vyabhicārāt dahana pratyaya aṅga tām antareṇa na utpadyate dhūmaḥ iti na tat vyabhicāraḥ tathā hi 
[627,vii_627,ix]	dhūma indhana vikāra aṅga tā pade dahana sthiteḥ anagniḥ ced dhūma ūsau sa dhūmaḥ ced sa pāvakaḥ dhūmaḥ ca indhana vikāraḥ ca tayoḥ eva aṅgam vahniḥ nna anyaḥ tena yadi asau na uṣṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ śakra mūrddhādiḥ tadā na sa dhūmaḥ api tuṣpādiḥ eva etat eva kutas na hi adṛṣṭam niyamam arhati na anyathā bhavati iti nīlam api tarhi na anyadā anyathā bhavati iti kutas etat tathā sati nīlam eva na bhavati iti ced samānam etat dhūmaḥ eva na bhavati iti kutas etat iti samānam aparatrāpi iti 
[627,x_627,xiv]	nanu svarūpa lakṣaṇam nīla ādi na sva rūpa abhāve sati na ca janyatā lakṣaṇam dhūma ādikam tatra api svarūpam eva lakṣaṇam iti na samānam etat atra ucyate na svarūpa ābhāsa mātrāt vastutas vastu tā sthitiḥ svarūpasya avabhāsaḥ hi bhrānta itara vidām samaḥ sva rūpa mātra nīla pīta ādi avabhāsanam hi bhrānta abhra anta pratyaya samānam iti na vastu sidhyati kāraṇa kārya tā kṛtaḥ tu vibhāgaḥ iti alam prasaṅgena svabhāva hetoḥ kathat na antarīyaka tā iti ced 
[627,xv_628,i]	atra ucyate na antarīyaka tā jñeyā yathā svam hetu apekṣayā svabhāvasya yathā uktaṃprāc vināśa kṛtaka tvayoḥ vastu mātra anubandhī vināśaḥ iti prāk pratipāditoyam arthaḥ iti punar nna carvita carvaṇasya vidhānam tasmāt anvaya vi atireka lakṣaṇaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti na ātmanā prāṇa ādīnām iti na gamakāḥ 
[628,ii_628,vi]	ācāryasya api ayam eva abhiprāyaḥ sakalaḥ iti kutas etat iti ced ahetutva c ati nyāyaḥ sarva uyam vyatirekiṇaḥ abhyuhyaḥ śrāvaṇa tva ukteḥ kṛtāyāḥ sāmya dṛṣṭaye sakala vyatireka hetu udāharaṇa sāmya kathana artham ācāryeṇa śrāvaṇa tvasya vyatirekiṇaḥ na aikāntika pratipādanam kṛtam iti sarva uyam nyāya ācāryasya api abhiprāya sthaḥ iti mantavyam evantā vat vyatirekī na hetuḥ iti pratipāditam sarvasya vyatirekiṇaḥ śrāvaṇa tve asamāna tvāt tasya ca asādhāraṇa tvena anaikāntika tvāt tathā hi sa pakṣāt ca vipakṣāt ca vyatirekaḥ na bhāvikaḥ sambhavya dṛṣṭi mātreṇa vyatirekī iti kathyate 
[628,vii]	nitya anitya nirātmaka sātmaka rāśi dvaya vyatirekeṇa na rāśi antaram bhāva abhāvayoḥ paraspara parihāra virodhasya bhāvika tvāt anyathā avyavahāra masam aṃjasam jagat syāt na ca ubhaya pakṣā sambhavi kiñcid yadi nityāt anityāt ca vyāvṛttam śrāvaṇa tvam na bhavet eva tarhi niradhikaraṇa tvāt śabdaḥ eva adhikaraṇam iti ced na śabda tvasya api samānaḥ doṣaḥ tat api sarvatas vyāvṛtteḥ nna bhavet eva tathā hi 
[628,viii_628,x]	nitya anitya tva sandehe śabde hetu upapācanam sa ced ubhayatas hīnaḥ sandehotra tayoḥ katham na hi tatas vyāvṛtta tvena niścitaḥ tayoḥ eva sandeha sambhavī na tarhi śrāvaṇa tvam sandeha hetuḥ śabda tva mātreṇa eva sandehāt nanu śabda tvāt sandehe kim apareṇa api na sandeha hetu tā bhājā bhāvyam 
[628,xi_628,xiv]	nanu yaḥ hi kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ sa uparatra dṛśyamānaḥ tatra śaṅkām upajanayet tat eva ca sandeha hetutvam ucyate śrāvaṇa tvat na katham sandeha hetuḥ na etat asti yatas dṛṣṭe vidhi vidhānena saṃdehetra niṣedhataḥ bhāva abhāvena saṃdehe kaḥ sva pakṣa parigrahaḥ yatra hi prameya tva ādau sādhāraṇa anaikāntike saṃdehaḥ sa darśana dvāreṇa vidhi mukhena asādhāraṇe tu pratiṣedha mukhena iti tu konayoḥ viśeṣaḥ 
[628,xv_628,xviii]	nanu na dṛṣṭam śrāvaṇa tvam nitya anityayoḥ iti tayoḥ apratipatti hetuḥ eva yuktam apratipatti mukhasya eva dṛṣṭa tvāt na idam sādhīyaḥ yatas vyāvṛttiḥ ekasya yadā niyamāt pratiyoginaḥ vṛtyā abhāvya virodhe hi vyāvṛttiḥ na uṃbhayoḥ api na ekānte dvābhyām paraspara virodhibhyām vyāvṛtti sambhavaḥ audāsīnyam tu atra na labhyate eva 
[629,i_629,ii]	nanu dvayoḥ ekatra pramāṇa abhāvāt eva sandehaḥ na śrāvaṇa tva hetu kṛtaḥ yadi param tat apratipatti hetuḥ eva sādhāraṇa anaikāntike api tarhi pramāṇa abhāvāt eva sandehaḥ na sahetu kṛtaḥ darśana dvāreṇa saḥ api saṃdeha hetuḥ eva śrāvaṇa tvam api adarśana dvāreṇa iti samānam etat atha sandehe sati na saṃdeha vyāvṛttiḥ tatas iti saṃdeha hetuḥ ucyate śrāvaṇa tvam api evam eva iti yat kiñcid etat 
[629,iii_629,v]	api ca prameya tvam dvayoḥ dṛṣṭam dvayoḥ nniścaya kṛt na kim dvayoḥ darśana yoge hi vidhāne syāt dvayoḥ api dṛṣṭam hi yadi atra tat tad vidhānam eva kuryāt na asti iti dvītīya aṃśa avalambanam kutas atha dvaya rnna ekatra paraspara virodhinoḥ bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ evantarhi pakṣaḥ eva saṃdehaḥ na spakṣa dvārakaḥ darśane api pakṣa saṃdeha dvārakaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ saḥ ubhayatra adarśane api samānaḥ 
[629,vi]	nanu ekānta vyāvṛtti kṛtaḥ saṃdehaḥ ekāntena dvābhyām vyāvṛtta tvena niścayāt yohi dvābhyām rāśi antarā sambhavibhyām vyāvṛttaḥ sa tena eva rūpeṇa apratipatteḥ hetuḥ tathā ca ācāryeṇa apyaya vyatirekī kathitaḥ tathā ca āha yaḥ hi asādhāraṇaḥ sādhana dharmaḥ sa yāvatā bhedena sarva saṃgrahaḥ tatra saṃśaya hetuḥ tadvatā tad saṃgrahāt ekānta vyāvṛtteḥ ca tat katham ayam vyāvṛtteḥ eva saṃśayāt saṃśaya hetuḥ 
[629,vii_629,xi]	na etat asti uktam etat yatas dvābhyām vyāvṛtteḥ yasya niścayaḥ anyatra tasya bhāve asanniścayaḥ syāt dvayoḥ api vyāvartta kañca tatra eva punar saṃdeha kṛt katha tad vyāvṛtteḥ dvayoḥ anyat na vyavaccheda sādhanam yaḥ hi yasmāda vyāvṛttaḥ sa kathantasya na vyavaccheda sādhakaḥ atha dvayoḥ vyavaccheda sādhyaka tvāt eva apratipatti hetuḥ 
[629,xii_629,xvi]	na idam asti yatas sarvasya hetoḥ hetu tvam vyavaccheda prasādhane vyāvṛttiḥ śabda liṅgābhyām prasādhyate iti sthitam sattyam anya vyāvṛtti sādhakaḥ eva hetuḥ kintu tad anya vidhāna ākṣepaka tvena iha tu na kiñcid anyat ākṣipyate dvayoḥ api nivṛtteḥ kṛtaka tvena tu nitya tā nivṛttyā anitya tā ākṣepaḥ sattyam etat nitya vyāvartta nāt a nyat na anitya tvam vidhīyate anya vyāvarttanāt eva kṛtortha unumayāḥ yatas 
[629,xvii]	anityasya nityata ropasya vyavaccheda mātreṇa kṛtārtham anumānam nitya anitya vikalpayoḥ eka vyāvarttanena aparasya svatas eva sthānāt tat api kadācid na bhaviṣyati iti ced na tasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt kārya hetau katham iti ced āstānta avat etat śrāvaṇa tvena tu yadi dvayam api vyavacchinnam tat anyathātva vidhānam pratyakṣa siddham bhavet iti hetuḥ eva bhavet anyena tu hetunā tad eka sādhanena na hetuḥ iti ced na pratyakṣa siddhe katham anyaḥ 
[630,i]	hetuḥ niṣedhakaḥ syāt vidhāyakaḥ vā atha pratyakṣam na niṣedha kṛt tatas parasya pareṇa vidhānam niṣedhanam vā na śrāvaṇa tvena dvayoḥ vyavacchede katham apareṇa vidhānam anyathā tatra api apareṇa vidhānam iti katham aparasya api pramāṇatā bhavet iti sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ na ca pratyakṣam aniṣedha kam tathā abhāve hi vidhāyakam api na syāt vidhānam vastu pratipādanam na ca vastu tat apara vyatirikta niṣedham antareṇa pratipāditam bhavati yatas 
[630,ii_630,iv]	anya asaṃsargi tat vastu bhavet vā an yena miśritam anyena miśraṇe vastu na syāt avyavahārataḥ tathā vā na niṣedhasya parasmāt api sambhavaḥ atra vicāryate vastu svayam svarūpataḥ parasmāt avyāvṛttam anyathā vā yadi vyāvṛttam pratyakṣeṇa tathā gṛhītam agṛhītamvā gṛhītañcet katham anyasya aniṣedhaḥ saḥ eva hi parasya tatra niṣedhaḥ yat parihāreṇa tasya rūpa antara tayā pratibhāsanam anyathā saṃkula pratipatteḥ avyavahāraḥ iti niṣphalam pramāṇam atha pareṇa pramāṇena aparasya niṣedha vyavahāraḥ 
[630,v_630,viii]	tat api asat yatas pratyakṣeṇa pratītasya parasmāt yadi bādhanam pratyakṣasya apramāṇa tve parasya api apramāṇa tā pratyakṣasya apramāṇa tve kaḥ paratra samāśvāsaḥ atha vastu miśraṇam eva pareṇa tatas para pramāṇa śatena api na niṣedhaḥ na hi svarūpam anyathā karttum śakyam atha kenacid rūpeṇa āmiśritam iti niṣedhaḥ yena rūpeṇa miśraṇam tena api rūpeṇa pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītam eva anyathā anyathā grahaṇe katham vyāvṛtta tā arthasya pareṇa pratītau vyāvṛtta tā avagamaḥ iti ced pareṇaa anyathā pratītau sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ iti pratipāditam uṣṭrāt praviṣṭa mātrasya yoni athā garbbhaveśmani pratibhāsaḥ parodhyakṣaḥ tena pūrvasya bādhanam 
[630,ix]	garbbhagṛhe hi prathama praveśe apramāṇam eva prathama darśanam tena tat bādhyate na tu pramāṇam eva tasmāt yadi pratyakṣeṇa ubhaya vyāvṛtta śabda grahaṇam tadā na parasmāt saṃdeha unyathā vā tathā śrāvaṇa tvena vā tasmāt avyāvṛtta tayā eva śrāvaṇa tvāt saṃdehaḥ evam sarvaḥ vyatirekī adarśana mātrantu upādāya ācāryeṇa vyatirekī pratipāditaḥ kathantarhi ekānta vyāvṛtteḥ iti vacanam na ekāntena niścaye vyāvṛtteḥ iti arthaḥ api tu ekāntasya niścayasya vyāvṛtteḥ iti na hi nitye anitye vā asya bhāvena abhāvena vā niścayaḥ tatas paramārthataḥ avyāvṛttiḥ eva tatas naikāntika tā evantā vat vivādāt bhedaḥ iti vyākhyātam 
[630,x_630,xiv]	sāmānyam idānīm vyākhyāyate yathā ekānta vyāvṛttaḥ vyatirekī gamakaḥ tathā ekāntena anvayi api tathā hi prameya tvāt anitya tvam śabdasya api ghaṭa ādi vat ākāśāt asataḥ tasya vyāvṛtteḥ hetuḥ anvayī na hi ākāśasya sattvam asat tvam vā tasya asattvāt tena avyabhicārita anvayaḥ hetuḥ gamakaḥ eva na etat asti ākāśa asattva pakṣe hi yadi api asya na sambhavaḥ tathā api asyā prameya tvam kathañcid na nivarttate 
[631,i^1]	asatām api kathañcid prameya tā asti eva anyathā vidhi niṣedhāmyām vyavahāraḥ eva na bhavet na hi sattvam kevalam vyavahartum śakyam paraspara parihāreṇa hi vyavyasthitāḥ padārtha ātmānaḥ vyavahāra viṣayaḥ anyathā artha kriyā virahāt anartha tā syāt artha kriyā arthinām sva para vibhāga abhāve ca kaḥ vyavaharet kva vā kimartham vā iti sarvam asat eva bhavet na hi para pakṣam asada pratiyatā sva pakṣaḥ śakyaḥ samarthayitum ākāśañca sa pratigha padārtha abhāva mātram avaśyam pramātavyam anyathā na padāt padam api calitavyam āpatet tasmāt sataḥ padārthān pratiniyamena vyavasthāpayatā prameyaḥ abhāvaḥ evam sa vyavasthāpitaḥ 
[631,i^2]	pramāṇena vyavasthāpitaḥ iti prameyaḥ na hi vastu viṣayam eva pramāṇam pariccheda lakṣaṇa tvāt pramāṇasya pariccheda kāryā iva pramāṇam na ced sva viṣaye pareṇa bādhyate tasmāt vyavahāra avisamvāda sādhana pratyaya paricchedya tvāt prameyaḥ eva abhāvaḥ iti na avyabhicarita anvayam prameya tvāt iti tatas sādhāraṇa tayā na aikāntikam atha prameya tā pratyakṣa paricchedyata eva ucyate tathā sati pratyakṣasya vastunaḥ udayāt artha kriyā sāmarthyam eva prameya tvam tatortha kriyā kāri tvam eva gamakam iti āpatitam tat ca avastunā api vyāvṛtteḥ vyatireka sambhavāt katham anvayī hetuḥ bhavati ca asataḥ api vyāvṛttiḥ iti pratipāditam 
[631,ii_631,iv]	etena vastu tva ādayaḥ api vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt anvayavyatireki eva kārya svabhāva lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ nanu anupalabdhiḥ api tṛtīyaḥ hetuḥ iti pratipāditam pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvatra sādhyate anupalambhate ityādinā atha vastu viṣaya hetu prabheda upadarśanam etat tathā sati pratibandha unupalabdherūpa pādanīyaḥ na ca tādātmya tad utpattibhyām apara pratibandha prakāraḥ iti pratipāditam 
[631,v_631,viii]	atra ucyate kāraṇa vyāpaka abhāvāt abhāvaḥ vyāpya kāryayoḥ gamyate na paraḥ kaścid abhāvasya prasādhakaḥ abhāvaḥ hi nāma na kaścid svatantraḥ vyavahāra viṣayaḥ api tu vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ eva tat ca vastu sandihyamāne parokṣa tayā kathat na asti iti sidhyati na hi tasya anupalabdhiḥ eva gamikā abhāvasya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt evam tu tad abhāvaḥ sidhyati yadi tasya kāraṇam vā na asti iti tatra ca darśitaḥ saḥ eva dvividhaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti siddha pratibandhikā eva anupalabdhiḥ 
[631,ix_632,ii]	udāharaṇam kasmāt na upāttam upāttam eva yatas hetu svabhāva vyāvṛttyā eva artha vyāvṛtti vaṇarṇanāt siddha udāharaṇa iti ukta anupalabdhiḥ pṛthak na tu upāttam eva anupalabdheḥ udāharaṇam na tu pṛthak kim kāraṇam hetu svabhāva vyāvṛtya eva arthasya kāryasya svabhāvasya ca vyāvṛtti kathanāt niveditam etat 
[632,iii_632,vi]	ātma tve hetu bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā sidhyati ityādi svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ api nirddiṣṭā eva hetu svabhāvayoḥ anupalabdhayoḥ eva bhāvasya nivarttanāt tathā ca uktam siddham pramāṇaiḥ vadatā mityādi upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvam viśeṣaṇam iti katham sidhyati atra ucyate tatra api adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa ādeḥ anivarttanāt sandeha hetu ta ākhyātyā dṛśya arthe sā iti sūcitam 
[632,vii_632,ix]	pareṇa uktam ghaṭa ādau prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ ātma nivṛtteḥ yadi ca jīvat śarīrāt api ātmā vyāvṛttaḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ api vyāvartteran atra ācāryeṇa pratipāditam ghaṭādau ātmā sattvam eva dṛśya tvam eva adṛśya tvāt ātmanaḥ na siddham anupalabdhi mātrāt saṃhedāḥ dehāḥ diti atas dṛśya īrthe anupalabdhiḥ gamikā iti sūcitam eva nanu vyavaccheda sādhana tve sarve eva hetuḥ anupalambhaḥ eva tat katham hetu tritayam 
[632,x_632,xii]	na eṣa doṣaḥ yatas anaṅgīkṛtavastu aṃśaḥ niṣedhaḥ sādhyate nayā vastuni api tu pūrvābhyām paryudāsaḥ vidhānataḥ vastuni api pradeśe na paryudāsaḥ sādhyate api tu anaṅgīkṛta vastu abhāve niṣedhaḥ sādhyate pūrvābhyā tu svabhāva kārya hetubhyām paryudāsa dvāreṇa tena viṣaya bhedāt bhedaḥ eva pratibandha samāna tāyām api 
[632,xiii_632,xvi]	nanu kaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhau pratibandhaḥ tādātmyam iti āha tatra upalambheṣu astitvam upalabdheḥ nna ca aparam na hi anupalabdheḥ anyā eva asattā api tu anupalabdhiḥ eva nanu jñāna vyatirekaḥ anupalabdhiḥ sattā vyatireka unupalabdhiḥ sattā vyatirekaḥ tu abhāvaḥ tat katham anayoḥ tādātmyam yathā ca jñāna jñeyayoḥ bhedaḥ tathā tad abhāvayoḥ api na khalu jñānam eva padārthasya sattā jñāna vyatirekeṇa api tasya abhāvāt tathā hi
