[632,xvii_633,i]	sattā parokṣa api arthānām anumānena gṛhyate pāvakasya na kimbhāvaḥ dhūma dṛṣṭyā anumīyate na ca tatra api anumāna upalambhaḥ eva sattā anumāna abhāve api sattāyām vyabhicārāt na anumāna nivṛttiḥ abhāvam gamayati atīta anāgatayoḥ api anumāna vṛtteḥ na idam sādhīyaḥ na hi anya anupalabhyeṣu na astita anupalambhanāt 
[633,ii]	upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya hi tad anupalabdhyā abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyate na ca teṣām upalambhāt anyā eva sattā tathā hi vipratiṣiddham etat upalabdhi yogyaḥ na ca upalabhyate iti tasmāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta padārtha satta upalambhaḥ eva tathā hi yadi upalabhyamāna tā upalabdhissā padārtha svabhāvā eva atha upalambhanam upalabdhiḥ kartṛsthatayaḥ cyate tadā api upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta sattā tayā prāptā eva tat avyatireke ca na bheda pratipattiḥ vyatirekasya gamya tvāt bhedasya tat avyabhicārāt upalambhaḥ sattā ucyate na ca vyatirikta samāna kāla upalambhāt upalambhaḥ padārthānām api tu tad anupraviṣṭa upalabhyamāna tā lakṣaṇa upalambhāt eva tasmāt upalambhe eva sattā tatas tad anupalambhaḥ eva asattā iti vakṣyati na hi parasparam abhāvānām paramārthataḥ kaścid bhedaḥ bhāva viśeṣaṇa bhede tu bhedaḥ paṭasya abhāvaḥ śakaṭasya iti ca na ca nirviśeṣaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ tattvam pratilabhate atha bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhāva bhūtam viśeṣaṇam ekam eva atas tad abhāvayoḥ api eka tvam eva na ca paramārthataḥ abhāvasya tatas pratiṣedhya bhede api 
[633,iii_633,v]	nanu yadi abhāvaḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ tadā avipratipattiḥ eva sattyam etat yatas ityajña jñāpanāya eka anupākhyā udā hṛtiḥ matā ekā svabhāva anupalabdhi lakṣaṇāḥ iti parijñāna rahitasya yaḥ hi jñāna jñeya abhāvayoḥ abhedam na avagacchati yaḥ vā sāṃkhyotyanta vimūḍhaḥ sarvam sarvatra vidyate iti āgrahavāt tasya ājñasya pratī yartham ekā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ kintarhi tatra prasādhyate 
[633,vi_633,vii]	viṣaya asattvataḥ tatra viṣayi pratiṣidhyate jñāna abhidhāne sandeham yathā adāha ādapāvakaḥ viṣayaḥ hi jñāna abhidhānayoḥ sattvam tad saṃdehaḥ ca tayoḥ sandehasya tasya viṣayasya abhāve niyamena jñānam abhidhānam sandehaḥ ca nivarttate viṣayasya viparyayasya sattvāt yathā na pāvakaḥ dāha abhāvāt dahana bhāve hi pakṣa antare pāvaka saṃdehaḥ tad abhāve tu viparyayasya bhāvāt kutas tasya sambhavaḥ yatas adāhāt aparā na asti apāvaka tā yathā ca na adāhāt aparā apāvaka tā 
[633,viii_633,xii]	tathā anyāna upalabhyeṣu na astita anupalambhanāt tad jhāna śabdāḥ sādhyante tad bhāvāt tad nibandhanāḥ na khalu anyā eva na astitāḥ nāma upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteṣu anupalambhana svarūpāt bahis tatas tad siddhausiddhaḥ eva tad ātmībhāvaḥ nanu abhāvaḥ anupa lambhena sādhyate tat katham sādhya sādhanayoḥ eka tā tat api asat na siddham etat eva atra na ca asiddham asiddhataḥ siddhim ṛcchati na eva atra pratibandhaḥ tatas na tat 
[633,xiii]	yat ucyate sādhya sādhanayoḥ bhedena bhavitavyam saḥ eva atra sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na siddhaḥ tad kathai tathā bhedasya siddhiḥ na khalva siddham asiddhataḥ siddhimatā yāvat sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na siddhaḥ param prati na tāvat bheda siddhiḥ yāvat ca na bheda siddhiḥ nna tāvat sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ pratibandhe hi sati sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na tādātmyam pratikṣipataḥ anupalambha abhāvayoḥ aparaḥ pratibandhaḥ na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tayoḥ 
[634,i_634,iii]	nanu abhāvena anupalambhaḥ kriyate yadā eva ghaṭa ādeḥ apanayanam karoti kaścid tadā eva anupalambhaḥ satyam etat yadi abhāvaḥ pareṇa anupalambhataḥ pramāṇena jñāyate tatas na saha anupalambhavat asya pratibandhaḥ prasidhyet anyathā itaretara āśraya doṣa prasaraḥ kena nivāryaḥ pratibandhe pramāsiddhenu palambha pramāṇa tā pramātvenu palambhasya pratibandhaḥ prasidhyati anyonya āśrayataḥ na evam ekasya api prasiddha tā itaretara kṛta kāryam atas eva na sidhyati 
[634,v_634,vii]	tasmāt anupalambhāt na abhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratibandha abhāvāt tādātmya pratibandhe tu saḥ eva anupalambhaḥ abhāvaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyate siddhaḥ hi vyavahāroyam dṛśya adṛṣṭa avasan iti tasyāḥ siddhau asan digdhau tad kārya tve api dhīdhvanī nanu vyavahāra sādhane api na asti eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ anupalabdhyā eva sakalaḥ vyavahāraḥ sādhanīyaḥ tadā ca dṛṣṭānta antara sa dhane anavasthā eva vyavahāraḥ ca kārya bhūtaḥ eva anupalabdheḥ tatas kāraṇāt kārya sādhanam ayuktam na avaśyam kāraṇāni tat vanti iti 
[634,viii_634,ix]	tat asat yatas siddhaḥ eva ayam vyavahāraḥ dṛśya adṛṣṭi nibandhanaḥ tāvat mātra nibandhana tayā abhāva vyavahāra yogya tā anupalabdhi svabhāva eva yogyatāyāḥ aa nartha antara tvāt vyavahāraḥ tu avaśyam eva tad darśanāt sa cetanaḥ pravarttayet tāvat mātra nibandhanam abhāva vyavahāram smaran avaśyam eva tad cetanāvān bhavati kāya vāc vyavahārantu yadi nāma na pravarttayati mā sma pravarttayat pramāṇasya pramāṇa tā pratīti sādhana tayā na kāya ādi vyavahāra sādhanāt tasmāt 
[634,x_634,xiii]	vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohāt atra ananubruvan kevalam siddha sādharmyāt smāryate samayam paraḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ kārya kāraṇa tā yadvat sādhyate dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭitaḥ kārya ādi śabdāḥ hi tayoḥ vyavahārāya kalpitāḥ na khalum darśana adarśana viśeṣa vyatirekeṇa apara kārya kāraṇa tā kāryam asya iti ayam eva arthaḥ etad antareṇa na bhavati iti yadi tu vyatiriktaḥ etasmāt tadā etad abhāve api bhavet eva tathā sati vyarthakaḥ pratibandhaḥ paraḥ 
[634,xiv_634,xvi]	atha tad abhāve na bhavet tathā sati saḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti vyarthakaḥ paraḥ nanu sambandhe sati tad abhāve na bhavati tad bhāve bhavati iti sidhyati sambandhe sati tad bhāve bhavati iti yadi iṣyate tad abhāve api sambandhaḥ pūrvakasya iti cintyatām dviṣṭhaḥ eva hi sambandhaḥ eka bhāve katham bhavet yogya tā yadi sambandhaḥ kāraṇasya phala udaye kāraṇāt eva kāryasya bhāvaḥ iti eva yuktimat tathā hi kāraṇam tādṛś nija kāraṇa sambhavi 
[635,ii_635,iv]	na ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām aparaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratibhāti atīndriya dṛśaḥ api tasmāt anvaya vi atirekābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavahārasya sādhya tā kathantarhi śabda anyat tvam artha anyat tvam antareṇa na tayoḥ eva dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭyoḥ vyavahāra artham lāghavena kārya ādi śabda niveśaḥ tena kāraṇāt kārya saṃsiddhiḥ svabhāva antargamāt iyam hetu prabheda ākhyānena darśita udāhṛtiḥ pṛthaka 
[635,v_635,viii]	kāraṇam hi samartham kārya svabhāvaḥ eva vastutas tata unupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetuḥ eva tatas na asyāḥ pṛthak upanyāsaḥ nanu katham svabhāva anupalambhaḥ svabhāva hetau antar bhavati tādātmya pratibandham antareṇa yathā ca bhāvayoḥ na parasparam bhedaḥ tathā abhedaḥ api na khalu nirātmanaḥ tādātmya sambhavaḥ na hi śaśa viṣāṇam khara viṣāṇa ātmakam atra hi pratividhīyate pratiṣeghya viparīta svabhāva ātmikā eva anupalabdhiḥ tathā hi eka upalambha anubhavāt idam na upalabhe iti buddheḥ upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ 
[635,ix]	na khalu rikta ātmā abhāvaḥ pramāṇa gocara vicāravattaraḥ na ca tena siddhena api sva rūpa mātrataḥ kiñcita prasiddhimat vastu sāṃkarya paryālocana locanaiḥ eva sa tathā iṣyate tatra yadi vastu deśa kāla avasthā antara bhāvāt vyāvṛttam svarūpataḥ kim aparābhāva kalpanayā atha na vyāvṛttam svarūpataḥ tathā api vyarthakaḥ paraḥ abhāvaḥ ekatra vyarthaḥ para trāsam arthaḥ iti pratyapādi idam prāk eva tasmāt anya bhāva rikta tayā evam svabhāva bhūtaḥ aḥ dharma bhedena tathā vyapadiśyate ghaṭa ādeḥ abhāvaḥ iti yatas ekasya padārthasya vivakṣita padārtha svarūpa vivikta ātmanaḥ yaḥ upalambhaḥ tasya yaḥ anubhavaḥ sva samvedana tayā tasmāt eva idam na upalabhe iti smaraṇa viparivarttamāna matiḥ kalpanā rūpopajāyate tatra pradeśa anubhavaḥ eva aparasya anupalambhaḥ yatas etat anyena svarūpeṇa na upalabhe iti ayam eva atra arthaḥ tena sva rūpeṇa anupalabdhiḥ asya tena rūpeṇa idam na asti iti 
[635,x_635,xii]	nanu ca tad upaghātakam iha na asti iti tasya abhāvaḥ anena rūpeṇa iti sādhyam tat katham viparyayasya vacanam sattyam etat yadi paraḥ api atra arthaḥ na antar bhavet sa tu antarbhavati eva tathā hi viviktaḥ tena rūpeṇa pradeśa ūnena vā ghaṭaḥ na bhedotra vidagdhānām pratibhāti kathañcana yadi sa ūnena rūpeṇa viviktaḥ na syāt ayam api na tena iti parisphuṭa arthe kaḥ parasya vyāmohaḥ tasmāt tad vivikta tā eva asya atra abhāvaḥ yatas ca tad vivikta pradeśa darśanāt eva na upalabhe tat iti matiḥ tad anya rūpeṇa ca upalabhe iti tatonupalambhasya upalambhasya ca tādātmyāt upalambhaḥ eva anupalambhaḥ 
[636,i_636,ii]	nanu bhavatu ayam anupalambhaḥ jñāna antarasya jñeyā antarantu katham jñāna jñeyayoḥ abhedaḥ iti pratipāda nāt adoṣaḥ athavā vā śabdaḥ iva arthe yathā upalabhe iti vikalpa viṣaya tvāt tathā adhyavasīyamānaḥ upalambhaḥ tathā na upalabhe iti vyavasāyāt anupalambhaḥ api iti ced na aviviktasya vedane abhāva vedanasya sāmarthya pramāṇena gṛhītasya anyathā karttum aśakyatvāt pratipādi tañca etat iti na ucyate tathā hi 
[636,iii_636,viii]	na hi smṛtim vināa bhāva pramāṇasya asti sambhavaḥ vinā viśiṣṭa anubhavam pratiyogi smṛtiḥ na yat nanu abhāva sādhitāḥ bhāva saṃbhavāt eva viśeṣa siddhiḥ bhāvānām tat katham abhāvam antareṇa āsākarya na etat asti yatas viśeṣaḥ gamyaterthānām viśiṣṭāt eva vedanāt tathābhūta ātma saṃvittiḥ bheda dhī hetuḥ asya ca yadi na viśiṣṭam vedanam vedanā antara viviktam bhavet na vedya viśeṣa gatiḥ yadi ca sva sambedanena tad rūpa samvedanasya ananubhavaḥ tadā tasya api viśiṣṭa tā na gamyate abhāva samvedanena gamyeta
[636,ix]	na hi pratiyogi smaraṇam antareṇa abhāva pramāṇa udayaḥ na ca viśiṣṭa samvedana abhāve pratiyoginaḥ smaraṇam atha pūrvantasya viśiṣṭa anubhavaḥ tathā satyasya api iti vyarthakaḥ eva abhāvaḥ atha abhāvena saḥ eva abhāva vyavahāraḥ sādhyate kim anyena siddhasya anyena sādhanena vyavahāra sādhane sā eva anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetu svabhāvā tasmāt anya vivikta sva samvedana bhāvāt eva bheda vikalpaḥ saḥ eva ca bhedaḥ tad anya abhāvaḥ 
[636,x_636,xiii]	tasmāt svatas dhiyoḥ bheda siddhiḥ tābhyām tad arthayoḥ anyathā hi anavasthānāt bhedaḥ sidhyet na kasyacid dhiyaḥ sva samvedanā t eva anya vyāvṛtta tā prasiddhiḥ tatas api arthasya iti parisamāptaḥ sva samvedana vyavahāraḥ yadi tu na pratyakṣāt eva bhedaḥ api tu abhāva pramāṇataḥ tathā satyanavasthānāt apratipattiḥ tathā hi abhāvena pramāṇena yadi bhedasya kalpanā saḥ api abhāvaḥ pareṇa anya abhāve na eva avatāryate 
[636,xiv]	saḥ api anyena tatonyena tad anyaḥ api anavasthitiḥ iti na vyavahāraḥ abhāvena hi pramāṇena yadi anadhigataḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhedaḥ pratīyate tasya abhāvasya pratiyogi smaraṇe satyavatāraḥ pratiyogi tayā ca smaraṇam pratyakṣatas bheda grahaṇe sati bhavati iti vyarthakaḥ abhāvaḥ idānīm api pūrvavat pratyakṣeṇa eva bheda grahaṇam iti 
[636,xv_637,i]	atha tathā api na abhāvam antareṇa bhedaḥ iti na abhāvasya vyartha tā tathā sati tatra api apareṇa pratiyogi smaraṇena abhāva avatāra kṛtā bhāvyam tat api smaraṇam apekṣyate iti anavasthā abhyupagamya ca idam ucyate na tu punar sambhavati idānīm gṛhyamāṇasya tadā pratiyogi tayā smaraṇam yena tadānīm abhāva avatāre tasya asmāt bheda grahaṇam iti na sambhavati abhāva avatāraḥ tasmāt apratipattiḥ eva para darśane bhedasya 
[637,ii_637,vi]	viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavān na atonyāni anirākriyā tad viśiṣṭa upalambhotaḥ tasya api anupalambhanam viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavaḥ eva tad anyasya abhāva sādhanam na tu viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavam antareṇa anyasya tatra abhāva siddhiḥ nanu viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavāt tathābhūta tā eva tasya sidhyati kathantatra tasya bhedaāḥ bhāvaḥ na hi deśa kāla antara bhāvinaḥ tatra abhāvaḥ tasya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt tat asat yatas viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhave katham anyā nirākriyā anya anirākriyāyām hi saḥ eva tu na sidhyati 
[637,vii]	viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhave hi padārtha anubhavaḥ eva na syāt viśiṣṭaḥ ced adhigamyate rūpam ghaṭa ādeḥ kim apara abhāva pratipattyā na cā bhāva sahasra pratipattyā api viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavaḥ sva rūpa viśeṣa pratipad amvinā svarūpa pratipattiḥ tu avaśyam eṣitavyā na ca paraḥ bhāvaḥ svarūpataḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ iti pratipāditam tasmāt viśiṣṭa rūpa anubhavaḥ eva aparasya abhāva sādhanam anupalambhanam api tasya viśiṣṭa upalambhanam eva anyasya 
[637,viii_637,ix]	tasmāt anupalambhoyam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gataḥ sva mātra vṛtteḥ gamakaḥ tad abhāva vyavasthiteḥ tad niyata rūpa upalambhaḥ eva abhāvaḥ iti siddham abhāva anupalambhayoḥ tādātmyam pratyakṣa siddha tvañca siddhami ti na asi i ddha pratibandha abhāva doṣaḥ sa ca anupalambhaḥ samarthaḥ eva hetuḥ iti sva mātra vṛtteḥ eva abhāva vyavahārasya pravarttakaḥ anyathā yadi anubhava abhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ bhāva abhāvaḥ ca abhāvaḥ tadā anavasthānāt asiddhiḥ eva iti āha 
[637,x_637,xi]	anyathā arthasya nāstitvam gamyatenu palambhataḥ upalambhasya na astitvam anyena iti anavasthitiḥ yathā abhāva abhāvaḥ anupalambhena tathā upalambha abhāva rūpaḥ api anupalambhaḥ tasya apareṇa anupalambhena tad abhāvaḥ api apareṇa iti na anavasthānataḥ muktiḥ atha arthasya abhāvaḥ upalambha sādhana tvāt upalambha abhāvena sādhyate upalambhasya tu bhāvaḥ na apara sādhanaḥ iti tad abhāvaḥ api na aparasādhanaḥ 
[637,xii_637,xv]	tat etat asat sva samvedana siddha tvam upalambhasya yuktimat tad abhāvasya samvittiḥ svatas iti ati sāhasam sva samvedana bhāve hi bhāvaḥ eva bhavet ayam pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ ced vijñānasya anya vittitaḥ atha apara pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ samvedanasya vastunaḥ api tarhi iti prāptam 
[638,i_638,iv]	nanu vastu anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt na para pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati tasya vijñānāt anyat rūpam iti samvedanasya samvedana tvāt apara rūpa abhāvaḥ iti tad apara pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ tathā ca idam na upalabhe iti upalambham eva uttama puruṣeṇa nirasyati na vastu idam na asti iti tasmāt anupalambhoyam svayam pratyakṣataḥ gatam iti jñāna abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ eva tat asat anya upalambhena anyasya parā asattā gatiḥ katham tad vivikta tayā ced syāt tat kim na anupalabdhi tā 
[638,vi]	na khalu tad vivikta tām antareṇa jñāna antarasya abhāva sādhanam jñāna antara samvedanena tad vivikta upalabdheḥ eva ca tad anupalabdhiḥ tat katham pratyakṣa siddhaḥ tad anya samvedana abhāvaḥ atha upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam iti na viśeṣaṇam avyabhicārāt tathā sati viśeṣaṇam na syāt anupalabdhi tā tu na apaiti tasmāt yāvān kaścid pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarva unupalabdheḥ iti paryudāsa lakṣaṇaḥ a bhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ saḥ eva ca anya apekṣayā anupalambhaḥ yat tu punar idam na upalabhe iti uttama puruṣa prayogaḥ sa jñāna paryudāsa lakṣaṇa anupalabdhi prakaraṇataḥ na tu artha abhāva nirāsāya tat avyatirekāt asau eva vastunaḥ api abhāvaḥ iti yadā hi satta upalambhayoḥ eka tā tadā vastu vyatirekasya api pratyakṣa siddha tā eva na khaṇḍaśas sambhavaḥ 
[638,vii_638,x]	nanu vyāpaka anupalabdhyā a bhāvaḥ sidhyati tathā hi upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasyabhāvaḥ upalambhena vyāptaḥ tad abhāvataḥ tad sarūpāt vastu abhāva prasiddhiḥ sattyam etat svabhāva anupalambhaḥ yam abhāvasya aprasādhakaḥ sarvatra eva bhavet evam pratyakṣāt tad abhāva vid yadi vyāpaka anupalabdhi rūpa labdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya pratyakṣa prasiddhaḥ abhāvaḥ sarvatra tarhi tad abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva na svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ nāma vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca amūḍhasya yadi abhāva sādhanī mūḍhasya api sā eva smaraṇena viṣayīkriyatā kim anupalabdhi antara kalpanayā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ vā yadi mūḍhasya sā eva punar amūḍhasya api bhaviṣyati akasmāt dhūma pratipatti vat na khalu tatra tri tvam apaiti kiñca 
[638,xi_638,xii]	vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ atra bhedaḥ na paramārthataḥ upalambhaḥ eva sat tā iti pūrvam saṃpratipādanāt dṛśyasya hi satta upalambhena vyāptā iti ayam avaṣṭambhaḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhi vādinaḥ ayañca svabhāva anupalabdhi vāde api samānaḥ eva na hi tādātmye sati na vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ tathā ca upalambhaḥ eva sat tā iti pratipāditam tad kārya hetu vyāpti avyatirekāt tad svabhāva aviśiṣṭam iti tad anapalambhaḥ svabhāva anupalambhaḥ eva uktaḥ iti kārya anupalabdhim svabhāva anupalambhaḥ eva antar bhāvitām yaḥ vyācaṣṭe vyāmūḍhaḥ sa katham saṃvedana anupalambham svabhāva anupalambhanam na vyākhyāsyati tasmāt anya bhāvaḥ eva aparasya abhāvaḥ anya upalabdhiḥ eva ca anyasya anupalabdhiḥ sā ca svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva 
[639,i_639,iii]	nanu evam api vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ asambhavinī sattyam svabhāva anupalabdhau eva sarvāsām antarbhāvaḥ iti iṣṭam eva saṃgṛhītam na kācid naḥ kṣatiḥ kathantarhi bhedaḥ vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ bhedāt pracaya apacaya āptitaḥ vṛkṣa śiṃśapayoḥ dūrādūra tvena ca bhinna tā vṛkṣa tā pracayinī śiṃśapā tvam tu apacaya vat dūre vyāpaka an upalabdhiḥ vyāpya apekṣayā samīpe tu svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ iti anayoḥ bhedaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta satta upalambhayoḥ tu parasparam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvāt na bhedaḥ śakya kalpanaḥ tena svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva iti sthitam anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetau antarbhavati iti atas eva 
[639,iv_639,ix]	adṛśye niścaya ayogāt sthitiḥ anyatra vāryate yathā aliṅgonya sattveṣu vikalpa ādiḥ na sidhyati atas aniścaya phalāḥ hi eṣā na alam vyāvṛtti sādhane ādya adhikriyate hetoḥ niścayena eva sādhane eṣā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ hetoḥ nnābhāvam vipakṣe niścāyayati dūra deśa ādau niścaya ayogāt adṛśya apekṣayā hi na iyam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ ādyā tu hetoḥ vipakṣāt sarvatovyāvṛtti niścaye vyāpriyate yā kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ hetu svabhāva vyāvṛttyā eva ityādi varṇṇitā tatra api prasaṅga sādhana tām aṅgīkṛtya sādhikā nanu virodhī nāma liṅga antaram na asti atra śīta sparśaḥ agneḥ iti sa katham prabheda lakṣaṇena uktaḥ anupalabdhau eva tasya api antar bhāvāt yatas tasyāḥ svayam prayogeṣu svarūpam vā prayujyate artha bādhana rūpam vā bhāve bhāvāt abhāvataḥ 
[639,x^1]	virodhī hi hetuḥ tasyāḥ eva anupalabdheḥ prabhedaḥ tad anya prabheda vat anyathā virodhi virodhi kārya virodhi vyāpaka ādīnā mapi paraḥ pṛthak nirddeśa kṛt bhavet yadā tu tasyāḥ eva ayam aneka prakāraḥ bhedaḥ tadā ayama doṣaḥ tathā hi svarūpam vā prayujyate svabhāva kāraṇa vyāpaka kārya anupalabdhiḥ iti atha apratiṣedhasya bādhana rūpam vā na asti atra śīta sparśogneḥ iti yathā eva anupalabdhiḥ abhāva sādhikā tathā sākṣāt paramparayā vā virodhinaḥ upalabdhiḥ api kasmāt virodhasya nivarttaka tvāt katham virodha prasiddhiḥ ekasya agneḥ bhāve avikala kāraṇasya
[639,x^2]	śīta ādeḥ abhāvāt virogha gatiḥ upalambha anupalambha lakṣaṇaḥ hi virodhaḥ tatas virodhi darśanāt anupalambhaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya sādhyate tatra dūra deśa varttinaḥ vahne rūpa labdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhiḥ anumāna siddhā sā abhāvam sādhayati iti na virodha upalabdhiḥ svabhāva anupalabdheḥ anyā saḥ eva ca uṣṇa sparśaḥ śītaspa rśa bhāvaḥ tad vivikta tvāt anuṣṇa aśīta sparśaḥ ca tatas te yā upalabdheḥ eva tad anya anupalabdhiḥ evam viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ api kārya hetu anumāna siddha svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvatra viruddha upalabdhau eka sāmagrī adhīnatayā anumānam 
[640,i_640,ii]	anyonya bheda siddheḥ vā dhruva bhāva vināśa vat paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa tayā virodhaḥ śāśvata itara vat tādātmya pratiṣedhaḥ hi paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa virodhataḥ sādhyate tat yathā na sa ghaṭoyam pradeśaḥ tad parihāreṇa upalabdheḥ sarvatra sākṣāt abhāva sādhanī viparyaya upalabdhiḥ eva 
[640,iii_640,iv]	pramāṇa antara bādhāt vā sa apekṣa dhruva bhāva vat yathā paraspara bādhane virodhaḥ tathā pramāṇa bādhane api sa apekṣa dhruva bhāvayoḥ iva tathā hi sa apekṣam anapekṣam iti paraspara virodhaḥ dhruva bhāvi tvam itarat iti ca sa apekṣa dhruva bhāvi tvayoḥ tu paraspara parihārā abhovaḥ api pramāṇa bādhana lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ iti virodha antaram etat tathā hi 
[640,v_640,vii]	sa apekṣāt viruddhaḥ bhāvaḥ sa dhruva adhruvayoḥ api anyonya parihāreṇa virodhaḥ paramārthataḥ yadi evam pramāṇam virodhinam sādhayati na tu pramāṇavirodhaḥ nāma aparaḥ sattyam etat tathā api virodhi vyāptena rūpeṇa arthataḥ virodhāt uktam etat asya api kim prayojanam virodhi vyāpta upalabdhiḥ api pratiṣedhasya sādhikā yathā syāt iti darśana artham tathā hi na dhruva bhāvī bhutasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti dṛśyate prayogaḥ 
[640,viii_640,xii]	aparaḥ punar āha viruddha kārya vyāpyasya yā upalabdhiḥ prayujyate tatra kārya svabhāvasya hetoḥ antar gamāt api sarve ekatayā hetuḥ nna bhinnaḥ anupalabdhitaḥ trividhaḥ api tatas hetuḥ tasyāḥ eva prabhedanam anupalabdhiḥ eva ekaḥ hetuḥ kārya svabhāvayoḥ tad prabheda tvāt na khalu tad prabhedaḥ tatas bhidyate na hi śāvaleya ādikasya go tvāt bhedaḥ tatra kārya hetuḥ viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetuḥ api viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ anagni nitya tva abhāva sādhanāt 
[640,xiii_640,xv]	tat etat asat pratibandha ānurūpyeṇa yadi hetuḥ prakalpyate tādātmyena tad utpattyā svabhāvaḥ kāryam eva ca anitya tvena saha vahninā ca pratibandhe vyāpaka viruddhena virudhyate hetuḥ iti tad anupalabdhi bhāva kalpanam tatra ca sākṣāt hetu kalpanam parityajya pāraṃparya āśrayaṇam asambhavi kāryeṇa vahni gatau tad viruddha śīta nivṛttiḥ nna tu śīta nivṛttau eva sākṣāt vyāpāraḥ dhūmasya tatas pāramparyeṇa hetu tā kalpanam anumita anumānam na ca dvayoḥ ekena śabdena pratipādane trayāṇām vā na anyaḥ eva asau hetuḥ 
[640,xvi_640,xviii]	na hi śabda vaśāt arthaḥ sambhavati anyathā kvacid bhedaḥ prayoga mātrasya kalpitaḥ syāt tathā sati na asti atra śīta sparśaḥ dhūmāt iti dhūmāt agni anumānam kārya hetuḥ agninā śīta sparśa abhāva sādhanam viruddha upalabdhiḥ śīta anupalabdhyā śīta abhāva vyavahāra sādhanam svabhāva an apalabdhiḥ iti pāramparya hetūnām atas anumita anumānam aparam eva anumānam na ca trayāṇām eka śabda pratipādane
[641,i_641,iii]	bhavati ekatvam hetu antaratvañca prayoga samāsaḥ eṣaḥ na rūpa samāsaḥ iti nyāyaḥ tasmāt sarvatra eva hetuḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti ayuktam atha vyavaccheda sādhane sarva anupalabdhiḥ na viṣaya bhedāt eva hetu bhedāt tathā ca uktam anaṅgīkṛta vastu aṃśaḥ niṣedhaḥ sādhyatenayā vastuni api tu pūrvābhyām paryudāsaḥ vidhānata iti
[641,v_641,viii]	atha paramārthataḥ vyavaccheda sādhanāt anupalabdhiḥ eva iti matam tathā sati pratyakṣam eva sva samvedam iti kinna uktam tasmāt asat etat tatas prayoga bhedāt eva bhedaḥ viruddha vyāpta upalabdheḥ sa apekṣa tvāt vināśasya na dhruva bhāvaḥ yatas hetu antara samutthasya sannidhau niyamaḥ kutas tasya api hetu antarasya sva hetu sāpekṣa tvāt aniyamaḥ punar aparasya api iti na phala bhāvi niyamaḥ 
[641,ix_641,xiii]	atha bhāvasya yaḥ hetuḥ kulāla ādiḥ saḥ eva tad vināśasya api iti niyamaḥ atra ucyate bhāva hetu bhava tve kim pāramparya pariśramaiḥ tathā hi nāśanam janayitvā anyam sa hetuḥ tasya nāśanaḥ tam eva naśvaram bhāvam janayet yadi kimbhavet yadi vināśam janayitvā sasva hetuḥ eva tasya nāśanaḥ naśvaram eva janayatu kim anena pāramparyeṇa atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam iti ced anyathā vastu svabhāva tvāt na etat iti tathā hi 
[641,xiv_641,xvi]	ātma upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha ātmanaḥ sataḥ na ātma upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate yadi ātma upakārakaḥ vināśa hetuḥ nna sambhavati siddha svabhāvasya sataḥ iti siddha itara svabhāvena tena bhāvyaṃtasvabhāvena tena bhāvyam tathā ca na sa tasya vināśa hetuḥ atha siddhasya api viśeṣasya karttā tathā sati sa viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ tad anyaḥ vā bhavet yadi sa siddhaḥ pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ atha siddhe tasmin tad ātmā na śakyaḥ karttum iti tad ātma vyatirekī vidheḥ tathā sati tasya na upakārakaḥ eva asau iti kaḥ tasya asau bhavet na kaścid iti arthaḥ syāḥ dvā da bhaṅgaḥ tu vihitaḥ eva na sa vidheyaḥ punar 
[641,xvii_641,xviii]	api ca sa padārthaḥ sva kāraṇāt kāla antara vyāpī tat anyathā vā yadi pūrva pakṣaḥ tadā sarva kāla kalā vyāpī sarva kāryasya sādhakaḥ pratipannaḥ yadi tadā nāśakaḥ kiṅ kariṣyati gata udake kaḥ khalu setubandhaḥ payonirodhāya hi setubandhaḥ payaḥ avirodhī na hi setubandhaḥ prayāsa mātram hi sa setubandhaḥ 
[642,iii]	atha na tathā asya sampratipattiḥ tathā satya nirūpita sva viṣayaḥ katham vināśa hetuḥ pravartteta nirūpya bhāvinam bhāvampravarttate iti ced na na rūpite siddhi svabhāve kaḥ iva vināśa hetoḥ upayogaḥ virodhi svabhāve kapāle upayogaḥ iti ced nanu asau api virodhī nivarttakaḥ eva tatra api saḥ eva pūrvakaḥ prasaṅgaḥ paraspara parihāra mātreṇa tu nivarttakaḥ eva na syāt 
[642,iv_642,v]	atha siddhasya kāla antara sthāyitayā abhāvam karoti śūnyatā lakṣaṇam vināśa hetuḥ kāla antara sthāyinaḥ śūnyatā kriyamāṇā tad avirodhinī na tasya nivarttikāḥ jalam iva ādhārasya jalam api āsakta kumbhaḥ tasya nivarttakam eva iti ced na tatra kāla antara sthānasya aprasiddha tvāt nanu anumānena kāla antara siddham eva nivartyate tat asat 
[642,vi_642,vii]	anumāna aprasiddhasya na tasya eva nivarttanam anyasya abhāvaḥ eva iti na tasya api nivarttanam pratyakṣa vat anumānam api pramāṇam eva tat siddham api sattyam eva katham abhāvaḥ tasya abhāve hi tasya tad pratītiḥ asattyā bhavet iti na pratyakṣa anumāne staḥ tad abhāvāt na bhāva siddhiḥ iti kasya vibhāgaḥ saṃbhāvyamānasya vibhāgaḥ iti ced anvayāt abhyāse eva eṣa na ca vastunaḥ nirṇṇayaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat 
[642,viii_642,x]	atha tasya eva anyathā tvaṅ karoti kapāla ādi lakṣaṇam vināśa hetuḥ atra api ucyate ghaṭa ādau anyathā tvaṅkiṅkim vā mṛd dravyaḥ iṣyate ghaṭa ādau anyathātvasya siddheḥ bhāvaḥ kathat na saḥ yadi ghaṭa rūpe sonyathā bhāvaḥ saḥ eva ādhāra unyathātvasya tatas ghaṭaḥ svena rūpeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ katham anyathā atha na dṛśyate ghaṭaḥ kasya asau anyathā bhāvaḥ ghaṭa pūrvakonyathā bhāvaḥ tasya iti vyapadeśyaḥ 
[642,xi_642,xii]	nanu vināśe sati tad pūrvakaḥ saḥ api vināśoni athā bhāva iti anavasthā atha mṛd dravyasya anyathā bhāvaḥ tat api avinaṣṭam eva kathantasya anyathā bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ vināśaḥ tatra api pūrvasya mṛd dravyasya na vināśaḥ tadā abhāvāt na uttarasya bhāvāt iti nanu bhavat pakṣe api ayam eva doṣaḥ kārya kāle hi na kāraṇaṅkathantasya tat kāryam na etat asti yatas kāraṇam pūrva bhāvyā iva sama kālan na kāraṇam vināśaḥ sama kālaḥ tu bhāvena iti asat uttaram 
[642,xiii]	na hi anyadā bhāva unyadā vināśaḥ iti upapattimat etat yadā eva bhāvaḥ tadā eva vināśe vinaṣṭaḥ iti yuktam na tu abhāve abhāvaḥ yuktaḥ mṛtasya maraṇa abhāvāt kāryante mṛte api yuktam eva tasya bhāva antara tvāt abhāvaḥ tu tasya eva śūnyatā na asti tat iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīteḥ asāmāna adhikaraṇyantu padārthasya vināśaḥ iti vyapadeśi vat bhāvāt śilā putrakasya śarīram iti yadvat na tu evam agniḥ dhūmaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
[642,xiv_643,i]	nanu atra api na sāmāna adhikaraṇī amparama arthataḥ smaryamāṇam hi pūrvakam rūpam vinaṣṭam iti pratīyate tad uttara kāla bhāvinā vināśena na ca tathā sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat api asat evam hi sati mahān virodhaḥ tathā hi smaryamāṇasya rūpasya na vināśosti tattvataḥ tadā dṛśyasya rūpasya vināśaḥ iti sāhasam 
[643,ii]	vināśaḥ iti hi na astitvam ucyate na ca vidyamānā avasthāyāḥ na astitā avidyamāna avasthāyāntu saḥ eva na asti iti kathat na astitā tasmāt na asti iti vyatirikta abhāva vādinaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvaḥ tasmāt na anyaḥ abhāvaḥ bhāvāt tatas sāmānādhikaraṇyam uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ hi saḥ eva abhāvaḥ yaḥ tad vyāvṛttimataḥ pūrvasya bhāvaḥ tasya ca upalabdhi rūpa ntarasya anupalabdhiḥ sā ca varttamāna rūpa grāhya grāhi pratyakṣa svabhāva uttareṇa saha saṃghaṭitasya grahaṇe kāraṇa avadhi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti pratipāditam atas para asaṃghaṭitasya eva pratītiḥ udaya mātrāt eva iti para anapekṣaḥ vināśaḥ 
[643,iii_643,vi]	nanu svabhāvaḥ hi sa tasya ittham yena apekṣya vinaśyati tat katham anapekṣyaḥ atra ucyate vyāpī yadi bhavet bhāvaḥ kasmai param apekṣyate atha avyāpī svayambhāvaḥ tad apekṣā vṛthā bhavet iti uktam atas eva āha anapekṣaḥ ca kimbhāvaḥ atathābhūtaḥ kadācana yathā na kṣepa bhāj iṣṭaḥ saḥ eva udbhūta nāśanaḥ 
[643,vii_643,xiii]	prathamataram eva pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ truṭyat tayā katham atathā bhūtaḥ kadācid yathā saḥ eva nittya vādinaḥ naśyat avasthāyām kṣaṇam api anapekṣa tve bhāvaḥ bhāvasya na iti ced yadi anapekṣaḥ bhāvaḥ vināśe kṣaṇam api eket na apekṣate iti na bhāvaḥ bhāvasya bhavet kṣaṇam api tathā hi nittyam sattvam asattvam vā ahetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt iti uktam tathā bhāva kṣaṇa an antarambhavan vināśaḥ kathantad ātmā bhavet atadātma tā āyāñca na sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat etat api kāśa kuśa avalambanam bhāvaḥ hi sa tathābhūtaḥ abhāve bhāvaḥ tathā katham 
[643,xiv]	bhāvaḥ eva uttara bhāva asaṃghaṭitaḥ vināśaḥ sa katham bhāva abhāve bhavet na hi tad ātmā ca syāt tad abhāve ca bhavati ca iti yuktam evantarhi vināśa usti iti katham vināśa bhāve vinaṣṭaḥ vyatirikta vināśa bhāve api svarūpasya apracyuteḥ katham vināśaḥ sā eva vyatirikta vināśa bhāve api svarūpasya apracyuteḥ katham vināśaḥ sā eva vyatirikta vināśāsikā pracyutiḥ iti ced bhavatu tathā api asau vyatirikta tayā eva pratyaya viṣayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ upalabhyatām etat eva vyatiriktasya vyatirikta tvam yat para rūpa avihantṛ tvam nāma virodhāt vighātaḥ pratyuktaḥ eva vināśam antareṇa virodha aprasiddheḥ tasmāt 
[643,xv_643,xvi]	ye apara apekṣya tad bhāvāḥ tad bhāva niyatāḥ hi te asambhavāt vibaṃdhe ca sāmagrī kārya karmmaṇi tat yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī vibandha sambhāvana avahitā sva prasava janane na kiñcid apekṣate iti tat niyatā tathā vināśe api bhāvaḥ iti anapekṣa tvāt vināśe kṣaṇikaḥ bhāvaḥ iti sa apekṣatāya at na avaśyambhāva vibhāvi nāśasya utpattimat tvāt vināśitā eva iti ced na pratibandha abhāvāta na hi pratibandham antareṇa hetuḥ sādhyasya sādhakaḥ 
[644,ii_644,v]	ahetu tve api nāśasya tādātmye sādhya sādhanam kāraṇatvantu sādhyasya paścāt bhāvāt na yuktimat na hi paścāt bhāvinā vināśena kāraṇena bhavitum yuktam prāgbhāvinaḥ utpattimatu asya kāryantu na avaśyambhāvi kāraṇāt atas tad kāraṇa tvena na hetuḥ nanu tādātmyam ahetuka tve bhavati iti kutas etat katham vā hetuka tvat nāśasya mudgarāt anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt saḥ eva hi kārya dharmmaḥ atra ucyate 
[644,vi_644,vii]	bhāva abhāvaḥ vināśaḥ ced uttarā ghaṭana ātmakaḥ sa pūrvam api dṛṣṭa tvāt kathat na aśaka hetukaḥ yaḥ hi yam antareṇa api dṛśyate sa kathantad hetukaḥ na anvaya mātreṇa hetuḥ iti pratipāditam etat yathā ca vināśaka sannidhau kapāla ādi bhāve parāsaṃghaṭitasya ghaṭasya pratītiḥ tathā udaya anantaram api na hi pūrvam api para rūpa saṃghaṭanā pratīyate maraṇa avadhi pratīti prasaṅgāt iti pratipādanāt parāsaṃghaṭanam eva ca yat atra api vināśaḥ vināśena eva asaṃghaṭanā kriyate iti ced tat asat yatas 
[644,viii_644,ix]	asāmarthyāt apārtha tvāt nāśena eva na tad kriyā na hi asaṃghaṭite nāśaḥ samarthaḥ ghaṭite api hi yadi asau hetoḥ saṃghaṭitaḥ eva utpannaḥ iti tathā eva pratyakṣa gṛhītaḥ iti kaḥ tatra nāśasya upayogaḥ asāmarthye hi tadā tasya bhavet atha asaṃghaṭitaḥ eva asau sva hetutaḥ tathā sati vyarthakaḥ nāśaḥ kṛtasya karaṇa abhāvāt tasmāt kṣaṇikaḥ eva svabhāvataḥ pratyakṣa tova gata unyathā pratipatteḥ asa bhavāt yaḥ ca anyathā pratipattum aśakyaḥ sa na unyathā bhavati pratyakṣatonyathātvasya bādhā dha nāt tasmāt anapekṣaḥ eva tat niyataḥ na aparaḥ yathā antyā kāraṇam āmagrī 
[644,x_644,xi]	nanu sa apekṣyaḥ api ādityasya astamayaḥ udayaḥ ca avaśyambhāvī nirapekṣatāyām udaya astamaya anantaram eva bhavet astamaya udayam sāma agrī ca abhedena niyatā api tu padārtha antarekura ādike tatas tat dṛṣṭāntataḥ viparyayaḥ eva bhavet na tu prakṛta sādhya siddhiḥ atra ucyate na udaya astamaya vyāptiḥ āditya astamaya udaye kadācid anyathā api syāt pramā na asti viparyaye 
[644,xii_644,xvii]	yadi nāma bhūyas darśanantathā api pramāṇa abhāvan na vyāptiḥ udaya astamayābhyām astamaya udaya bhāvayoḥ tathā hi pativrata upākhyānam śrūyate sambhavaḥ ca asti hemante cirāt udaya bhāvataḥ jhaṭiti a ḥ taṅgateḥ bhāvāt tadvat ati anta saṃbhavaḥ na ca astamaya ādityasya api śailādinā antarita tvam tat ca antarita tvam asmad ādi apekṣayā pare tu yoginaḥ paśyanti eva api ca sa apekṣāṇa antāvat avaśyam bhāvitā iti yadi nāma keṣāñcid avaśyambhāvaḥ pareṣāntu na tathā iti saṃśayaḥ yat api uktam vyatirikta bhāva niyata antyā sāmagrī vināśaḥ tu na vyatiriktaḥ tat api asat yatas yonyasvabhāve niyataḥ sva hetoḥ sutarām asau sva svabhāva ātmake nāśe kim evat na prakalpyate na hi vināśaḥ nāma avastu svabhāvonyaḥ eva vastunaḥ eva tu tattvam aparā saṃghaṭitam pratīyamānam
[645,i]	śilāputrakasya śarīram iti nyāyena tathā pratipādana viṣayaḥ bhāvasya vināśaḥ iti yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī tad aṃkura utpādana svabhāva niyatā tathā bhāvaḥ api tad uttara svabhāvā saṃghaṭita vyavahāra niyate iti kinnāma aniṣṭam api ca anapekṣyatayā tat niyata tvam sāmānyena sādhyate vastu avasthā bheda kalpanantu jāti uttaram eva ghaṭa śabda mūrtta amūrtta vikalpanāvata tasmāt anupalabdhi prabhedaḥ eva viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ sā ca svabhāva hetau eva hetuḥ bhavatī bhūt bhāve ca viparyayau tena yaḥ san sa jātīye dvedhā ca sa hetuḥ viparyaye viruddhaḥ tad anyaḥ tu aniścitaḥ pañca prakāraḥ tatra bheda sāmānyayoḥ gamaka tva vivādaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ śeṣaḥ tri prakāraḥ vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa gamaka tva pratipādana arthaḥ tathā hi 
[645,ii_645,iii]	na anvayat vārakaḥ hetuḥ gamakattva vyavasthitaḥ bhāva mātra samādhikye tridhā api agamaka tvataḥ yadi anvayaḥ gamaka tve prayojakaḥ anitya tvāt aprayatnā anantarīyakaḥ iti api gamakaḥ syāt asti abhāva anvayaḥ atha ana bhāva mātreṇa gamaka tvam anvayasya vyatireka sāhitya apekṣayā gamaka tvāt ayantarhi gamakaḥ sparśa tvāt nityaḥ iti ayam api na gamakaḥ sama tvāt anvayasya ayantarhi syāt anitya tvāt prayatna anantarīyakaḥ iti atra hi balavān anvayaḥ durbalaḥ vyatirekaḥ tathā hi 
[645,iv_645,v]	na pradhānantadanyasya viśeṣam samapekṣate prayojaka para apekṣan na dṛṣṭam bhojana ādiṣu yadi prayojaka tvam anvayasya gamaka tve syāt na vyatirekasya sa pūrṇṇa tām apekṣeta tam anādṛtya eva gamaka tvam prayojayet bhojana prayojaka vat vyatirekaḥ tu prayojakaḥ sadbhāva mātram eva anvayasya apekṣate na sama tva ādikam yathā prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ iti yaḥ prayatna anantarīyakaḥ saḥ nityaḥ eva nitya tā vyavacchedaka tvena gamakaḥ evam anyaḥ api hetuḥ tathā hi 
[645,vi_645,vii]	nityāt vyāvarttate yena tad abhāvam sa sādhayet anitye varttamānan na tad abhāvasya sādhakam anitye yadi nāma dṛṣṭantathā api na nitya abhāvam sādhayati nitya tā abhāve tu dṛṣṭantada bhāva sādhane niyamena rāśi antara saṃkrāntiḥ dṛṣṭantu na niyamena anyatra na bhavati tat anyatra yadi ca darśana dvāreṇa gamakaḥ tadā dṛṣṭam eva agnim gamayet sakalat na tad apara vyakti gatiḥ tatas tad anya vyakti prāptau apramāṇa tā bhavet atha saḥ api kroḍīkṛtaḥ eva na dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa kroḍīkaraṇa asaṃbhavāt 
[645,viii_645,ix]	nanu vyāvṛttiḥ api tad anvayat vāreṇa eva niścitā tad kathanna anvaya prādhānyam na darśanasya vyāvṛtti niścaye nadhikārāt darśanam hi dṛśyamāna tām eva niścāyayati na tad aparam na anya darśanam anya niścaya hetuḥ saṃskārāt anyatra api niścayaḥ iti ced tat asat saṃskārāḥ khalu yat vastuḥ upaprakhyā prabhāvitāḥ vyavasthā hetavaḥ tatra tatonyatra na niścayaḥ 
[645,x_646,ii]	yadā tu saḥ eva pratibandhaḥ vyatireka pradhāna tayā gṛhyate tadā tad dvāreṇa hetuḥ anya apohasya gamakaḥ nanu darśana dvāreṇa pratibandha gatau katham vyatirekeṇa pratibandha gatiḥ na etat api samucitam vacaḥ anvayena api sambandhaḥ vyatireka pradhānataḥ atikramya na sāmbhāvyaḥ iti prāk eva varṇṇitam 
[646,iii]	anvayena hi sambandha grahaṇe tad vyaktyā eva bhavet na anyathā uktyā tathā hi na anyasya ukteḥ tadā anvaya gatiḥ atha tayā api paścāt tathā sati vyabhicārāt asambandhaḥ eva prāk tanyāḥ na syāt vyabhicārataḥ vyakti sāmānye sambandhaḥ iti ced kim idam vyakti sāmānyat nāma na khalu a vibhāvita svarūpam sambandhitayā anyathā vā pratyetum śakyam vyaktiṣu samāna pratipatti nibandhanam iti ced asti samānaḥ iti pratipattiḥ na tu tasya anibandhanam idam iti śakyat nidarśayitum yadi nāma pratyakṣataḥ na pratītim kārya darśanāt anumānāt pratīyatām pratīyatām kāraṇa sāmānyat na tu tad sāmānyantasya īdaṃtayā nirūpaṇāt eka kārya kāri tvam vā nibandha naṅ kim apareṇa tathā hi 
[646,iv_646,vi]	na asmākam asmin karttavye bhedaḥ kaścana vidyate iti lokaḥ samastoyam eka vākya tayā sthitaḥ tasmāt ayam dhūmaḥ eṣāmpāvaka bhedānām ekena kenacid a vinā na bhavati iti etat abhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ dhūmaḥ iti anya apoha sambandhena eva sambandha grahaṇat na anyena iti vyāvṛttiḥ eva sādhyate hetunā śabdena vā tatas vyāvṛttiḥ eva prādhānyena gamyate sāmarthyāt tu vyakti sattānāntarīyaka tayā pratīyate anagneḥ abhāve niyatam kācid agni vyaktiḥ ākṣipyate anyathā nagni vyāvṛttiḥ eva na syāt 
[646,vii]	nanu anyaḥ tu aniścitaḥ iti pañca prakāraḥ anaikāntikaḥ uktaḥ na ca idam yuktam toṣavataḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca aparasya api aneka antika tvāt nābhi prāya parijñānāt na hi ayam arthaḥ anyaḥ pañca prakāraḥ niścitaḥ api tu tatra yaḥ sat sajātīye dvedhā ca āsan tad atyaye niścitaḥ sa hetuḥ viparīta tayā niścitaḥ sa viruddhaḥ sa ca sarvaḥ tādātmya tad utpattibhyām pratibaddhaḥ eva anyaḥ tu na niścitaḥ eva saḥ eva sa pratibaddhaḥ anaikāntikaḥ iti vākya arthaḥ śeṣavat viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ api idam eva lakṣaṇam iti tayoḥ api anaikāntika tvam na nivāryam tasmāt sakalam anavadyam tathā hi viruddha avyabhicāriṇoni ena apahṛta viṣayasya sādhya apratibaddha viṣaya tvam kathantarhi avyabhicārī apratibaddhaḥ avyabhicārī ca iti vyāhatam evantarhi avyabhicārī saṃśaya hetuḥ iti api vyāhatam eva asmad pakṣe tu apratibandhāt eva saṃśaya hetuḥ avyabhicāri tvaṅ katham iti ced abhyupaga ma dvāreṇa iti na doṣaḥ tathā ca āha yadā tarhi śabda tvam nityam abhyupaiti tadā ayam hetuḥ eva syāt yatas 
[646,viii_646,x]	na kvacid śrāvaṇa tvasya nāśi tve dṛṣṭi sambhavaḥ nityaḥ eva hi dṛṣṭa tvāt gamaka tvasya sambhavaḥ gamakatva lakṣaṇa abhyupagamāt gamakaḥ darśana adarśana mātreṇa ca vaiśeṣikasya gamaka hetu tā sā ca atra asti iti gamakaḥ eva prāptaḥ ācāryaḥ prāha syāt gamakaḥ yadi atra kṛtaka tvam api kaścid anitya tve hetun na brūyāt ubhayantu gamakam upalabhamānasya sva abhyupagamāt eva saṃśayaḥ tasmāt vaiśeṣikasya evam abhyupagacchatoti saṅkaṭa praveśaḥ tathā hi 
[646,xi_647,i]	śabdasya anitya teṣṭā ced yojyā śabda tva nitya tā tad dvāreṇa hi nitya tve paraḥ api gamakaḥ bhavet na khalu samāna nyāya yogī na tathā bhavati nyāyaḥ eva asau tathā na syāt tathā ca sakala vyavahāra ucchedaḥ eva samānaḥ ca kṛtaka tvena hetu tva nyāyaḥ śrāvaṇa tvasya api iti asau api kṛtaka tva sādhya viparyaya avyabhicārī na gamakaḥ katham tasmāt para abhyupagamena viruddha avyabhicārī na anyathā iti ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ avagantavyaḥ 
[647,ii_647,iii]	yadā tarhi śabda tvam nityam abhyupaiti iti vacanāt tasmāt apratibaddhaḥ eva saṃśaya hetuḥ iti vyāpti hetu ādi lakṣaṇam tatra pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti sāmarthyāt apakṣa dharmaḥ na hetuḥ viparītaḥ pakṣa dharma aviruddhaḥ iti apakṣa dharmaḥ na viruddhaḥ anyaḥ tu anaikāntikāḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ iti apakṣa dharmaḥ na anaikāntikaḥ tatas sva nāmnā eva vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ siddham iti dharmya siddhau api asiddhaḥ eva anyatara ādya siddhau api tathā ca ācāryaḥ 
[647,iv_647,vi]	dvayoḥ siddhena dharmeṇa vyavahārāt viparyaye dvayoḥ ekasya ca asiddhau dharmmya siddhau ca na iṣyate yadi tarhi pakṣa dharmaḥ hetuḥ katham anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityasya akṛtaka tvāt anityasya kṛtaka tvāt iti tathā asat akaraṇāt upādāna grahaṇāt sarva sambhava abhāvāt śakyasya śakya karaṇāt kāraṇa bhāvāt ca satkāryam iti 
[647,viii_647,xi]	atra ucyate hetoḥ sādhya anvayaḥ yatra abhāve abhāvaḥ ca kathyate pañcamyām tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ hetuḥ tu upanayāt mataḥ tat yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ anityasya kṛtaka tvāt tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti tathā a nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityasya akṛtaka tvāt tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti pañcamī antena nanu dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām iti artha sata tvam tathā asat akaraṇa ādikam api draṣṭavyam ete ca yathā na hetavaḥ tathā pratipāditam api ca 
[647,xii_647,xiii]	asiddha pratibandhasya na hetoḥ sādhya sādhane sāmarthyam atra na asti etat atas eva na hetavaḥ asat akaraṇāt iti katham ayam hetuḥ asataḥ śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ na karaṇam dṛṣṭam iti na ca etāvatā vyatirekeṇa viparyaya sādhanam yadi kasyacid asataḥ kriyā na upalabhyate sarvasya tathā na iti kutas iyam vyāptiḥ na hi viparyaye pratibandham antareṇa vyatireka vyāpti prasiddhiḥ 
[647,xiv_647,xix]	dhūma abhāve agni abhāvasya katham vyāptiḥ prasidhyati pāvakena yadi vyāptaḥ dhūmaḥ sidhyati mānataḥ na khalu sakalam jagat baṃbhramyamāṇena api tatra anyatra atra ca na asti iti vyāpī vyatirekaḥ pratyetum śakyaḥ kāla deśa vyāptikasya bhramaṇasya eva asambhavāt anvayena tu pratibandha grahaṇe tad sāmarthyāt eva vyāpi vyatireka prasiddhiḥ etat ca prāk eva pratipāditam tasmāt ete na hetavaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ eva hetuḥ viruddha unaikāntikaḥ ca anena ca para artha anumānam eva sat asattva prakhyāpana prakrameṇa prakaṭitam śeṣaḥ prapañcaḥ pramāṇa samuccayaḥ eva avagantavyaḥ pariśiṣṭa rūpanirūpaṇāya iti vyudāsitam manosya vārtika kṛtaḥ 
[648,i^1]	he vādinaḥ na khalu saṃtata pakṣa pāta dveṣam manaḥ sva para pakṣa kṛta andhakāram tattva prabodhana vidhāyi manasvi vṛttam madhyastha bhāvaḥ iti tatra matiḥ vidheyā tīrthyāḥ śrī dharmakīrtteḥ mmatam idam amalam tādṛśām eva gamyam mādṛś vyākhyātum īśaḥ katham iti su ciram cintyatām atra hetuḥ asmin tu abhyāsa mātrāt yadi bhavati paraḥ tatra tatva artha siddhyai yuktosmin pakṣapātaḥ sva paramatiḥ iyam yukti ayuktyoḥ kṛtārthā saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtam idam para bodha siddhyai vaktum punar su bahu sādhu ca śakyam atra 
[648,i^2_648,xx]	ratna ākarāt adhigatasya hi ratna rāśeḥ prauḍhaḥ pratigraha kṛtasti na tena bhāṣyam śarīra śomām rāgāya grāmyā vāñchaṃti alaṃkṛtim vārttikasya api alaṅkāraḥ mayā kāri na garvataḥ iti unmukta para artha sādhana dhiyām evam matiḥ śreyase tad tāthāgata dharma nīti nipuṇam cetaḥ vidheyam sadā kṣīrodāda paraḥ api kim jalanidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ vidhātā kvacid lakṣmī candramasoḥ samasta jagatām ānanda dātraḥ rjanaiḥ iti anindyam idam āracayya yat prāptam artha kuśalammayām alam tena sarva jagat artha sādhanī siddharaḥ tu jagatosya sarvadā iti vārttika alaṅkāra pramāṇa mahā bhāṣye tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ca ayam pramāṇa mahā bhāṣya vārttika alaṃkāraḥ kṛtiḥ iyam kutīrthyatama stoma vighana paṭoḥ ācārya prajñā kara gupta sahasra aṃśu mālinaḥ pramāṇa vārti kalaṃkāra tāla patra
